40001001	Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇarpur ro rumkun Daud, rumkun Abraham.
40001002	Abraham daḇen Ishak, Ishak daḇen Yakub, Yakub daḇen Yehuda ma naek srar ḇyesi,
40001003	Yehuda daḇen Peres ma Zerah ro Tamar, Peres daḇen Hezron, Hezron daḇen Ram,
40001004	Ram daḇen Aminadab, Aminadab daḇen Nahason, Nahason daḇen Salmon,
40001005	Salmon daḇen Boas ro Rakhab, Boas daḇen Obed ro Rut, Obed daḇen Isai,
40001006	Isai daḇen raja Daud. Daud daḇen Salomo ro Uria swari,
40001007	Salomo daḇen Rehabeam, Rehabeam daḇen Abia, Abia daḇen Asa,
40001008	Asa daḇen Yosafat, Yosafat daḇen Yoram, Yoram daḇen Uzia,
40001009	Uzia daḇen Yotam, Yotam daḇen Akhas, Akhas daḇen Hiskia,
40001010	Hiskia daḇen Manasye, Manasye daḇen Amon, Amon daḇen Yosia,
40001011	Yosia daḇen Yekhonya, ma naeksrar ḇyesi ro fafisu ḇaḇemanfyan ḇe Babel.
40001012	Ḇarpur ro ḇaḇemanfyan ḇe Babel, Yekhonya daḇen Sealtiel, Sealtiel daḇen Zerubabel,
40001013	Zerubabel daḇen Abihud, Abihud daḇen Elyakim, Elyakim daḇen Azor,
40001014	Azor daḇen Zadok, Zadok daḇen Akhim, Akhim daḇen Eliud,
40001015	Eliud daḇen Eleazar, Eleazar daḇen Matan, Matan daḇen Yakub,
40001016	Yakub daḇen Yusuf Maria swari, ḇeaḇen Yesus sapḇe Kristus.
40001017	Inja sikam sesyos samfur seser rifiak ro Abraham isof Daud, syos samfur seser rifiak ro Daud isof ḇaḇemanfyan ḇe Babel, ma syos samfur seser rifiak ro ḇaḇemanfyan ḇe Babel isof ro Kristus.
40001018	Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇeaḇenya farfyar ḇyedi ryadine: Rofyor snaḇyedi Maria, ssḇuki dapsasor Yusuf, ro fafisu ani imoḇesḇa kuker Rur Ḇesren, rofyor sukenem ḇeimbeswa ḇaim.
40001019	Snar Yusuf Maria swari, snon ḇenapes dirya, inja imewer ifrur mamyai swari Maria ro fababa, mḇoi kyara fa imewer famyun i.
40001020	Ḇape fafisu kyara fasis swaruser ani, Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso ḇyair faroi ro mafu ḇo ikofen: “Yusuf romawa Daud wamkak awer fa wun Maria ḇeswa ḇedi, snar romawa doresya irya samambraḇ ro Rur Ḇesren.
40001021	Nari daḇen romawa snon oso ma nari nwir I ḇe Yesus, snar iso nari ḇeḇuk koreri faro er ḇyesi ro sasar sena.“
40001022	Roi ḇeḇesya ine ndariryanya insa imnis Manseren wos Ikofen faro nabisya:
40001023	"Mḇoi nari ḇinkbor oso imoḇesḇa, ma daḇen romawa snon oso ma nari snir I ḇe Imanuel" -- isoine: Allah ryous ko.
40001024	Rofyor ḇyir ro anenef ḇyedi, Yusuf iso rosai Manseren malaikat ḇyedi syoser faroi kwar. Inja dun Maria ḇeswa ḇyedi,
40001025	ḇape denefusi ḇa isof daḇen romawa snon ḇyedi ma nyiriḇe Yesus.
40002001	Yesus ḇyeḇeaḇen kwar ro Betlehem ro sup Yudea ro awar Wairek Herodes, snon ḇefawinananem mak ono srama ker ḇar Wamurem ḇe Yerusalem ma sifuken:
40002002	"Wairek Yahudi ḇeaḇen baboya Isyaro, moḇo? Nkomam kwar mak ḇyedi ro ḇar Wamurem ma nkorama fa nkaksyom I."
40002003	Fafisu wairek Herodes ma mnu Yerusalem ḇesiper simnaf rarirya sikandor kam.
40002004	Inja iryur mananir imam ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudisya ro er Yahudi, ma ifuken ro si, moḇ rosaiso nari Wairek ḇyeḇeaḇen roya.
40002005	Sikofen faro i ḇo soḇo: "Ro Betlehem sup Yudea snar raris nabisya sfas kwar bosoḇo:
40002006	'Ma au Betlehem, wabaḇa syadi mnu-mnu ro sup Yehuda, ḇape nari manfarkin oso isasyar ro au, fa nari ḇyefarandows er Yesi Israel.' "
40002007	Ramnai kuker fasasis Herodes dor snon ḇefawinananem mak ansi ma kuker aḇaḇen kaku ifuken kuker aunos faro si, fafisu rosai makya ḇyairya.
40002008	Raimnai iwansi ḇe Betlehem, doḇo: "Mkora, mkosewar pyum kaku insa mkofawi roi ḇekur Romawa ani ma rofyor mkosrow i kwar, mko ḇaryas fasau ma ḇeaya insa aya kako yara fa yaksyom I."
40002009	Simnaf wairek ani wos ḇyena kwar, sra beri. Indo mam kada, mak smam ro Wamurem ani pyon si isof imnai ro moḇ rosai Romawa ani, isya ro ya.
40002010	Fafisu smam mak ani, simarisen kaku.
40002011	Ma ssun ro rum ani ma smam Romawa ani fnoḇek snari Maria, inja sḇansuba ma si syom I. Sikam sḇas kamon papus sena ma ssḇuk samsom farsarser faro I, isoine brawen, mamḇoḇo ma manispum.
40002012	Snar snon ḇefawinananem mak ansi sismai ananun ro malaikat oso insa skaḇer awer faro Herodes, inja sibur ḇe mnu sena siso nyan ḇese.
40002013	Snon ḇefawinananem mak ansi sibur kwar, Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso fyasnai faro Yusuf ro mafu ma doḇo: "Wakḇok wun Romawa anine kuker snari, mko frar ḇe Masir ma mkokain ro diwa isof Yakofen wer faro au, snar Herodes iḇesyewar Romawa ani fa myun I."
40002014	Inja Yusuf ikbok, ma dun Romawa ani kuker snari ro roḇ ani beri, ma sskobur ḇe Masir,
40002015	ma skokain ro diwa isof Herodes imar. Roi nane nesya insa Manseren wos Ikofen kuker sḇayo nabi: "Ro Masir Yor Romawa Yedi."
40002016	Fafisu Herodes ifawi, mḇoi snon ḇefawinananem mak ansi seankar i kwar, imsor kaku. Inja iwan fa smun romawa-romawa mkun ro Betlehem ma fanam Betlehem sya kam, isoine romawa ḇeḇewampasi wambarek risuru ḇesop imnis kuker rosai isma ma ifawi kwar ro snon ḇefawinananem mak ansi.
40002017	Rarirya wos Manseren Ikofen kuker sḇayo nabi Yermia isrow:
40002018	"Komnaf mkaren ro Rama, ḇarop ma kankanes ḇekum ḇarmor; Rakhel kyanes romawa ḇyesi ma imewer sawos sneprei indi, snar romawa ḇyesi sisyaḇa kwar."
40002019	Rofyor Herodes imar kwar, Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso fyasnai mankundi ro mafu faro Yusuf ro Masir, doḇo:
40002020	"Wakḇoke, wun romawa ani kuker snari ma mkokaḇer ḇe sup Israel, snar beaw fa ḇemun Romawa anisya simar kwar."
40002021	Inja Yusuf ikbok ma dun Romawa ani kuker snari ma skora ḇesup Israel.
40002022	Rofyor imnaf kwar mḇoi Arkhelaus ḇyewairek ro Yudea fa syadwer Herodes, kmari, inja imkak ryaḇe Betlehem. Snar sisma ananun ro mafu, inja Yusuf ryaḇe sup Galilea.
40002023	Skora kwar ro diwa, Yusuf kyain ro mnu oso snori Nazaret. Roi nanekam ndarirya insa nasrow wos nabi-nabisya sikofen, nari sap Iḇe: "Snon Nazaret".
40003001	Rofyor Yohanes Ḇeḇemasasi Sren ryama ro sup ḇeursḇa Yudea ma ḇyaryas:
40003002	"Mkombror, snar Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyas fyanam kwar!"
40003003	Kaku beri iso Nabi Yesaya ikofen ḇaryar rofyor doḇo: "Mkaren snonkaku ḇekaru ro sup ḇerursḇa: 'Mkofasos nyan faro Manseren, mkofrur nyan ḇeaḇyoḇer faro I.' "
40003004	Yohanes syun syatu ro onta bur, ma ḇeḇoḇek ḇyedi ro aiwan kif, ma roḇean ḇyena kampam ma umbersup.
40003005	Kawasa ḇekain ro Yerusalem, ma Yudea ḇesiper ma ro war Yordan ḇesiper srakam faro i.
40003006	Raimnai skarem sasar sena ma Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren faro si ro war Yordan.
40003007	Ḇape rofyor myam kawasa Farisi ma Saduki sya siḇor sakrama ma sakor masi sren, inja ikofen faro si ḇodoḇo: "Ne ikak ḇeknampu kpu ḇyena mko. Mansei ḇekofen faro mko, insa mkofrarḇur masasor nari ḇerama?
40003008	Inja mkoḇuk bon ḇemnis kuker marandor ḇekaku.
40003009	Ma mkokara awer ro mkosnemna mkoḇo: Nkoine kma nkoḇedi Abraham! Yakofen faro mko: Allah ipok kaku fa ifrur romawa faro Abraham ro karui nane!
40003010	Mkanya fyasos kwar ro ai fuarya, ma ai knam ḇeḇuk bon ḇepyumba, nari neḇeroḇen ma sikun na ro for.
40003011	Yaḇuk masi sren faro mko kuker war imnis aḇyair marandor, ḇape ḇera papur aya Ikada Ipoksyadi ro aya ma yasyusḇa fa yaper roi ḇesower wemin ḇyesi. Ikada nari ḇyuk masi sren kuker Rur Ḇesren ma kuker for.
40003012	Badei ḇeras isya kwar ro Ḇramin ḇyesuya. Nari Ifrur sren sayar aḇrui ḇyedi, ma iryur aḇrui ḇyesi ro kron, ḇoi pissya nari ikunsi ro for ḇepok ḇembrerḇa."
40003013	Yesus ryama ker Galilea ḇe Yordan faro Yohanes insa Isma masi sren ro i.
40003014	Ḇape Yohanes kyurpum ḇe I, ḇodoḇo: "Aya iso ḇesmai masi sren ro Aukada, ḇesyaḇo Woḇo rwama faro aya?"
40003015	Inja Yesus kyarem, ma Ikofen faro i: "Iḇye roi ḇeḇesya nane ndarirya mura, insa kuḇeimnis Allah marisen ḇyena kam." Inja Yohanes isouser I.
40003016	Isma masi sren kwar, Yesus Isasyar fasau bur warya ma ro fafisu ani beri nanki ḇyas ma Myam Rur Allah imnis manjawa dado faro I,
40003017	ma simnaf mkaren ro boiyas ḇekofen: "Inekada Romawa Yaswar kaku, faro I Ya ḇeḇare."
40004001	Raimnai Rurya dun Yesus ḇe sup ḇerursḇa insa Isma fafrowes ro Ibiris.
40004002	Ma ḇyefarfor ras ma roḇ samfur rifiak kwar, papupesya Yesus Ibiser.
40004003	Raimnai ḇefararwrowesya ryama ma ikofen faro I: "Kaku Au Rumkun Allah, buk sasoser insa karu nane nemamami."
40004004	Ḇape Yesus kyarem: "Fas-fasya isya: 'Snonkaku sikenem snar mamamiya dererḇa ḇape ro wos oser-oser ḇesasyar ro Allah sḇari.' "
40004005	Ḇarpur Ibiris dun Iḇe Mnu Ḇasrenya ma ryir I ro Rum Allah bunemya,
40004006	raimnai ikofen faro I: "Kaku Au Rumkun Allah, wasawen mankundau snar fas-fasya isya: 'Ḇekur Au Allah syoser malaikat-malaikatsya ma nari skansin fa siser Au kuker siḇrasna insa wemin besu susbui awer ro karui.' "
40004007	Yesus Ikofen faro i: "Fas-fas oso isya kako: 'Wafrowes awer Manseren Allah bedi!' "
40004008	Raimnai Ibiris dun I wer ḇe bon ḇekaki kaku ma fyasnai faro I ḇaḇesasoser ḇeḇor kam ro supswan ine kuker payamyum ḇyena,
40004009	ma ikofen faro I: "Nanekam nari jaḇukna faro Au, rofyor Ban suba ḇo wasyom aya."
40004010	Inja Yesus Ikofen faro i: "Ibiris, wabur Aya! Snar fas-fas isya: Mḇoi wasyom faro Manseren, Allah bedi, ma derer faro I monda ḇenadi!"
40004011	Raimnai Ibiris ibur I, mamkada, ma malaikat-malaikat srama fa suf farmyan Yesus.
40004012	Ḇape rofyor Yesus Imnaf, mḇoi sfor Yohanes ikwar I syof bur ḇe Galilea.
40004013	Ibur Nazaret ma kyain ro Kapernaum, ro danosen andirya, ro supya fyor Zebulon ma Naftali,
40004014	insa ḇyeimnis wos Manseren Ikofen kuker sḇayo Nabi Yesaya:
40004015	"Sup Zebulon ma Naftali, nyan ḇeso munda, ḇe sup war Yordan ḇarya, isoine Galilea, sup er-er ḇese, --
40004016	er ḇekain ro pampan, smam kwar Isnai ḇeba ma faro ḇekain ro sup kadarin marmar, Isnaiya dek kwar faro si."
40004017	Ro fafisu ani Yesus ḇyaryas: "Mkombror, snar Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyas fyanam kwar!"
40004018	Ma rofyor Yesus Isya imbran sye danosen Galilea, myam manbekanayek risuru, isoine Simon sap kako ḇe Petrus ma ḇedar ḇyedi, Andreas. Suisya ssunap pam ro danosen, snar su mandaswan in.
40004019	Yesus Ikofen faro su: "Murama, muso Aya, insa Yana muḇe mandaswan snonkaku."
40004020	Inja fafisuya beri subur pam suḇena ma suso I.
40004021	Ma rofyor Yesus Ibur moḇ ani kwar, myam manbekanaek risuru wer, isoine Yakobus Zebedeus mandaḇendi kuker ḇedar ḇyedi Yohanes, sufnoḇek kma suḇedi, Zebedeus, skoisya skoyanem pam ḇe waiya. Yesus dor su,
40004022	fafisuya beri subur waiya kuker kma suḇedi, ma suso I.
40004023	Yesus Imbran yar sup Galilea ḇesiper; ma ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum nadi sena ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ma ḇyuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇeduf ma ḇeḇeroro sibor ro fandu er ine.
40004024	Inja ḇyesno-sno ro sup Siria ḇesiper ma ssun faro I snonkaku ḇeduf ḇepyumba sya kam, ḇeduf dafduf ḇeḇor kam ma ḇeḇeroro, rur ḇemaḇaksya sower si, ma ḇeduf mandai ma ḇepapipen, ma Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro si.
40004025	Ma kawasa sibor kaku semarani ma siso I. Sramuma ker Galilea ma Dekapolis, ro Yerusalem, ro Yudea ma Yordan ḇarya.
40005001	Fafisu Yesus myam kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, dek ro urek oso ma kyain kwar, manfamyan ḇyesi siryur faro I.
40005002	Raimnai Yesus irandak dawos ma fyarkor si ḇo Ikofen:
40005003	"Aski faro snonkaku rur ḇesaḇarar sya ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, snar siḇena Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyas.
40005004	Aski isya faro snonkaku ḇeḇarop sya, snar nari sisma sneprei.
40005005	Aski isya faro snonkaku sne ḇesḇunek sya, snar siso nari ḇena supswan ine, ḇeromowi imnis Allah ankankinem ḇyedi.
40005006	Aski isya faro snonkaku ḇebiser ma ḇembrow snar napnapes ya, snar nari sisyopen.
40005007	Aski isya faro snonkaku ḇesaswar sya, snar nari sisma fakamaman.
40005008	Aski isya faro snonkaku sne ḇesren sya, snar nari smam Allah.
40005009	Aski isya faro snonkaku ḇeyun aski, snar nari sap siḇe romawa-romawa Allah.
40005010	Aski isya faro snonkaku ḇeḇekandera snar napnapes, snar sikada nari sisma Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyas.
40005011	Aski isya faro mko, rofyor skoryae mko ma sifrur kandera mko ma sonef mko kuker wos ḇeḇor ḇeḇyeḇa snar Aya.
40005012	Mkoryaḇ ma mkomarisen, snar ḇaḇyak mkoḇena naba ro boiyas, snar rarirya kako sifrur kandera kwar faro nabi-nabi ḇepon mko sya."
40005013	"Mko ine karumasen supswan. Rofyor karumasen ani ḇyuar, kuker rosaiso nari kofrur fa myasmasen wer? Ḇyuk fainda werḇa rarirya ḇyeḇesawen ma snonkakusya saref apapen i.
40005014	Mko ine isnai supswan. Mnu ḇekain ro Urek bori ipok fyanarḇa.
40005015	Oso wer snonkaku spam paramrom raimnai sikawefi kuker fyomba, mḇoi skafi ro adadu, isof ḇyeisnai snonkaku sya kaim ro rum ya.
40005016	Rarirya isnai ḇedi isak ma isnaiyar snonkaku sya insa smam fararur ḇepyum ḇena ma sisandik Kmami ro boiyaswa."
40005017	"Mkokara awer, Yarama ine fa Yaḇerer sasoser Refo Yahudi roḇaido syap nabi-nabi. Yarama fa Yaḇerer naba, mḇoi insa Yaḇeimnisna.
40005018	Inja Yakofen faro mko: Kaku beri rofyor nanki ma supswan ine ssupromes ḇaim, sasoser Refo Yahudi, mir roḇa pun oso nari ryoḇa beri isof nakam namnis.
40005019	Rarirya mansei ḇeḇerer roi oso ro sasoser Refo Yahudi ḇebaḇa syadi, ma fyarkor i kuker nyan ḇemnisḇa faro snonkaku ḇese, ima nari kyain ro moḇ ḇekakiḇa syadi ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa; ḇape mansei ḇeḇeuser ma ḇefarkor mnis sasoser Refo Yahudi, ikada nari kyain ro moḇ ḇekaki syadi ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa.
40005020	Inja Yakofen faro mko: Rofyor kankenem ḇaḇeagama mkoḇena nanapes syadiḇa ro kankenem ḇaḇeagama ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi syaḇa, kaku ḇeri nari mkaksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswaḇa.
40005021	Mkomnaf kwar wos Allah Ikofen faro kpu koḇesi: Mko mamun awer; mansei ḇemamun nari seifa ismai.
40005022	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Snonkaku mansei ḇemsorya faro naek ḇyedi nari seifa ismai; mansei ḇekofen faro naek ḇyedi: Ne, korwar! nari ssuni ḇeḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama ma mansei ḇekofen: Famyun Allah! nari sisawen i ro for ḇembrerḇa.
40005023	Inja rofyor, wun farsarser ḇena ḇe rokef farsarser fa bukfarser, ḇape kwara smai naek ḇedi imsor au,
40005024	rwir farsarser ḇena ro ḇarpon rokef farsarserya ma rwa bedasi ḇepon kuker naek bedi resari, raimnai insape kwaḇer ma buk farsarser ḇena.
40005025	Fasau fa bedasi kuker mbroḇ bedi rofyor ausya kaker kuker i ro nyanya faduri, imbude mbroḇ bedi ḇyuk au faro mankaraya ma mankara dakḇuk au wer faro ḇefnoḇek i sya fa wasmai ro buindi.
40005026	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nari wasasyar ro diwaḇa, rofyor bak namuk nyaki ḇenaḇa.
40005027	Mkomnaf kwar wos berok radine: Mkofrur farbuk awer.
40005028	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Mansei myam bin oso ma irmomen i ro sneri, ifrur farbuk kuker i kwar ro sneri dori.
40005029	Inja rofyor mkamsu ḇar rakuya ḇyeninyan au, weri ḇo wasawen i, snar ipyum syadi faro au rofyor kina oso ro ḇaken bedi ryo, ro ḇaken bedi ḇesiper ḇyeḇesawen ro for ḇembrerḇa.
40005030	Rofyor ḇramsu ḇar rakuya ḇyeninyan au, kwaruk i ma wasawen i, snar ipyum syadi faro au kina oso ro ḇaken bedi ryo ro ḇaken bedi ḇesiper ḇyeḇesawen ro for ḇembrerḇa.
40005031	Wosya ḇyeḇekofen kwar kako: Mansei ḇefaspar swari nari ḇyuk syap faspar faro i.
40005032	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Mansei ḇefaspar swari snar farbukḇa, i ḇefrur fa swari i frur farbuk; ma mansei ḇefakawin kuker bin fyaspar ani, ikako dakfrur farbuk.
40005033	Mko mnaf kako kwar wos sikofen faro kpu koḇesi: Swowar ankar awer, mḇoi wufepen sowar bedi ro ḇarpon Manseren.
40005034	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Mkopok mko sowar ḇa beri, iḇye kuker nanki, snar nanki irya Allah karapesa nasan ḇyedi,
40005035	iḇye kako kuker supswan, snar supswan Allah araref ḇyedi rya, roḇa kuker Yerusalem, snar Yerusalem irya mnu Wairek Ḇeba,
40005036	swowar awer kako kuker ḇru ḇedi, snar wapokḇa fa wafrur snonburyam oser fa ipyoper roḇa pyaisem.
40005037	Rofyor mḇoi, iḇye mkokofen: mḇoi, rofyor roḇa, iḇye mkokofen: roḇa. Rosai ḇesyadi ro ine ḇyeknam ro ḇeḇarḇor ya.
40005038	Mkomnaf kwar kako wos: Mkamor syadwer mkamor ma nakor syadwer nakor.
40005039	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Mkomunsu awer snonkaku ḇefrur ḇarḇor faro mko, mḇoi manseiryawer ḇyaser fofer raku bedi, buk kako faro i fofer rasar bedi.
40005040	Ma faro snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇeḇuksof au snar irmomen sansun bedi, buk kako syatubedi.
40005041	Ma manseirya wer ḇeḇedafdifer au fa wambran fnoḇek i kawanwan mil oser, wambran fnoḇek i kawanwan mil risuru.
40005042	Buk faro snonkaku ḇeyor ari faro au, ma snonkaku ḇeyor ari rosai ro au wamewer awer.
40005043	Mkomnaf kako kwar wos: Mkoswar min mkoḇesi ma mkain mbroḇ mkoḇesi.
40005044	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Mkoswar mbroḇ mkoḇesi ma mkoḇenadi wark ḇeḇewayam mko sya.
40005045	Snar kuker rarirya mkoḇe romawa-romawa faro Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa, ḇeḇuk ori faro snonkaku ḇarḇor ma ḇeḇye sya ma ḇyuk mekemya dado faro snonkaku ḇenapes ma ḇenapesḇa.
40005046	Rofyor mko swar faro ḇeswar mko sya, rosai wasma ḇeḇaḇyak ya? Mkofawiḇake ḇeyor balasten sya kako sakfrur rarirya?
40005047	Ma rofyor mkoḇuk aroo munda faro naek mkoḇesi monda, rosai ḇesyadi ro fararur snonkaku ḇesesi sena? Mkofawiḇake snonkaku ḇefawi Allahḇa sya sakfrur rarirya?
40005048	Inja mkonapes imnis raris Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa moḇ inapes rai."
40006001	"Mkoswarepen, mkofrur awer fandun agama mkoḇena ro ḇarpon snonkaku insa smam na, snar rofyor mkofrur rarirya, nari mkosma ḇaḇyak ḇa ro Kma mkoḇedi ro Boiyaswa.
40006002	Inja rofyor buk farsarser, mkonuk maon ḇeḇaryas awer na, raris kawasa ḇeḇarḇor sya sifrur ro rum-rum nadi ma ro rumbins swaf, insa sisma sanandik ro snonkaku. Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri ḇaḇyak sedi sisma ikwar.
40006003	Mḇoi woḇo buk farsarser ido, ḇramsi ḇar rasar ya ipok ifawi awer rosai ḇramsi ḇar raku ya ifrur ya.
40006004	Iḇye farsarser ḇena buk na kuker yakyokef, insa Kmami ḇemam roi ḇeyokef na nari myunsu na faro au."
40006005	"Ma rofyor mkoḇenadi, mkoḇenadi awer imnis snonkaku ḇemarares sya. Simarisen soresḇo sḇenadi ro rum nadi sena donna ma sampak farsam, insa kawasa smam si. Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri sisma ḇaḇyak sedi kwar.
40006006	Ḇape rofyor waḇe ḇenadi, swun randum ro sim bedi, ma kwen kedwai ya ma ḇenadi faro Kmami ro moḇ ḇeyokef. Ma Kma bedi bemam roi ḇeyokef na nari myunsu na faro au.
40006007	Oso wer rofyor mkoḇenadi mko kaḇkaḇer awer imnis raris snonkaku ḇefawi Allahḇa sya. Skara ḇo soḇo nadi ḇekwan na, nari naser kankarem.
40006008	Inja mkomnis awer si, snar Kma mkoḇedi Ifawi roi ḇeḇor mkoḇe fandun na, ro fafisu mkor na ḇaim faro I.
40006009	Inja mkoḇenadi radine: Kma nkobedi ro boiyaswa, Nkofasren Snomḇri kada,
40006010	Ḇaḇesasoser Bedi ryama kada, Marisen bedi ryarirya kada Ro supswan ine imnis ro boiyaswa.
40006011	Buk maro nko ro ras ine roḇean namnis maro nko
40006012	ma Wapyos nyaki sasar nkoḇena, imnis nkakpyos nyaki sasar snonkaku ḇeḇesasar maro nko sya;
40006013	ma Wun nkoḇe fafrowes na awer, mḇoi faspar nko bur Ibirisya. [Snar Au ḇena Ḇaḇesasoser ya ma papaik ya ma payamyum ya isof fyoro-fyoro. Amin.]
40006014	Snar rofyor mkopyos snonkaku sasar sena, Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa Dakpyos sasar mkoḇena kako.
40006015	Ḇape rofyor mkopyos sasar snonkaku ḇa, Kma mkoḇedi kako Ipok dakpyos sasar mkoḇena ḇa."
40006016	"Ma rofyor mkofarfor, mkomam saneso awer imnis snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor. Smam saneso, insa snonkaku smam si skara sisya ro ḇaḇefarfor. Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri sisma ḇaḇyak sedi kwar.
40006017	Ḇape rofyor waḇe befarfor, rwem ḇrumbri ma bansren mkamsi,
40006018	insa snonkaku sya smam awer ausya ro ḇaḇefarfor, mḇoi derer Kma bedi ro moḇ beyokef. Mḇoi Kma ḇedi ḇemam roi ḇeyokef nari myunsu na faro au."
40006019	"Mkosewar awer papus ro supswan ine; snar ro supswan ine nari snus ma praf nari nenafanamkok ma ḇekarau-rau sya simkok ma skarauna.
40006020	Ḇape mkosewar faro mko papus ḇero boiyaswa; snar ro boiyaswa snus ma praf nenafanamkokḇa ma ḇekarau-rau sya sipok skakok na ma skarauna ḇa.
40006021	Snar ro moḇ papus ḇena naisya roya, ro dia snembri isya kako.
40006022	Mkamor ḇyepadamara faro ḇaken ya. Rofyor mkamsu suḇye, ḇaken ḇedi ḇesiper isnai;
40006023	rofyor mkamsu suḇarḇor, beken ḇedi ḇesiper pyampan. Inja rofyor isnai ḇero au pyampan, nari pampan ya pyampan bos beri.
40006024	Snonkaku oser ipok duf farmyan tuan risuruḇa. Snar rofyor rarirya, nari dayin oso ma iswar suminya, roḇa ido ḇyeuser faro oso ḇoi suminya ḇyefandun i ḇa. Mkopok mkoḇe manfyan faro Allah ma faro papus ba."
40006025	"Yakofen faro mko: Mkomkakwarek awer kankenem mkoḇena, nari rosai mkan roḇa mkinem, ma mkomkakwarek awer ḇaken mkoḇena kako, rosai nari mkofmar na. Mkofawiḇake kankenem ya isyadi ro roḇean ma ḇaken ya isyadi ro famamar?
40006026	Mkomam faro man sya ro farsyos, ḇeyakḇuḇer morḇa ma ḇeyakufḇa ma ḇeyakryur roḇean ro sayarḇa, ḇesyaḇo Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa ḇyuk roḇean ḇemnis faro si. Inja mkofawiḇake mko kada mkosyadi bur ro man sya?
40006027	Mansei ro fandu mko snar imkakwarek kankenem ḇyedi inja pyam rof oser monda ro nyan kankenem ḇyedi?
40006028	Ma snaro mkomkakwarek roi ḇefmar? Mkomamepen mampyoper pampen ro maper, ḇesur ḇoi ḇefararur ḇa ma ḇefawi ḇeroren ḇa,
40006029	ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Salomo kuker payamyum ḇyena kako, ḇape daksansuni kuker sansun ḇepyum inis pampen sya osoḇa.
40006030	Inja raris Allah fyamankor aḇris ro maper, ḇeḇesya ro ras ine ma meser sisawen si ro for, inja Allah ipokḇake fa fyamankor mko syadi wer, ne, mko snonkaku ḇekyar mnis ḇa?
40006031	Inja mkomkakwarek awer ma mkoḇo: Rosaiso nari nkan ya? Rosaiso nari nkinem ya? Rosaiso nari nkofmar ya?
40006032	Roi nanefa kam er-er ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa sya siso ḇesewar na. Ḇape Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa Ifawi, mḇoi mkoḇe fandun nakam.
40006033	Inja mkosewar bepon Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ma napnapes ḇyedi, nari nakaem neḇeḇuk fnoḇek faro mko.
40006034	Inja mkomkakwarek awer meserdi, snar meserdi nya ananjar ḇardi. Ananjar ro ras-ras imnis faro ras ani."
40007001	"Mkoḇe ḇaḇemankara awer snonkaku, insa sakḇe mankara awer mko.
40007002	Snar kuker ḇaḇemankara mkobuki ḇyemankara, nari ssḇuki ḇyemankara mko kako ma warnkyara mkobuki ḇyewarnkyara, nari ssḇuki ḇyewarnkyara mko kako.
40007003	Snaro mam faro ai muḇen ro naek bedi mka ḇyedi, ḇoi ai mnuk ḇeba ro mka ḇedi wafawi i ḇa?
40007004	Rariso wakofen faro naek bedi: Iḇye yer ai muḇen ḇero mka bedi, ḇoi ai mnuk ḇeba ḇero mka bedi baḇir i ḇa.
40007005	Ne, snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, wasasyar ḇepon ari ai mnuk ḇeba ro mka ḇedi, insape nari mka ḇedi myam fa buki ryer ai muḇen ani ro naek bedi mka ḇyedi."
40007006	"Mkoḇuk awer roi ḇesren faro make sya ma mkosawen awer inkin mor faro randib sya, insa saref apepen awer i, raimnai i warye fa kyar sawek mko."
40007007	"Mkore, nari sḇuk faro mko; mkosewar, ma nari mkosma; mkonuk, nari kedwa ya ḇyeḇeseḇen faro mko.
40007008	Snar snonkaku mansei ḇeyor, isma ma snonkaku mansei ḇesewar, isrow ma snonkaku mansei ḇenuk faro i kedwa ya ḇyeḇeseḇen.
40007009	Isyake snon oso ro mko ḇyuk karui faro romawa ḇyedi, rofyor dor ifen,
40007010	roḇaido ḇyuk ikak rofyor dor in?
40007011	Inja rofyor ḇeḇarḇor mko ya, mkofawi mkoḇuk roi ḇeḇye faro romawa mkoḇesi, isyadi wer kuker Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa! Nari ḇyuk roi ḇeḇye faro ḇeyor faro I sya."
40007012	"Roi ḇeḇor mkomarisen insa snonkaku sifrur faro mko, rarirya mkakfrur faro si kako. Irya sasoser ḇeyufur Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi sya.
40007013	Mkosun ro kedwai ḇefyos ya, snar kedwai ḇeḇam ma nyan ḇemgkeiya dun faro for ḇembrerḇa, ma kawasa sibor ssun ro i;
40007014	snar kedwai ḇefyos ma nyan ḇemkei ḇa ḇeyun faro kankenem ya, kawasa ḇesma i sya sibor ḇaḇeri."
40007015	"Mkoḇesasor mko ro nabi-nabi sararer, ḇerama faro mko ḇefrur farari domba, ḇape kaku ḇeri sikada randip arḇur ḇermomen.
40007016	Nari mkomam bir si ro bon sena. Rariso snonkaku srokem awai bon ro aser borekke roḇa imyui bon ro manḇines borek?
40007017	Rarirya ai knam ḇeḇye na nbuk bon ḇeḇye, mḇoi ai knam ḇeḇyeḇa na nbuk bon ḇeḇyeḇa.
40007018	Rarisyaḇa ai knam ḇeḇye ipok imarem bon ḇeḇyeḇa maroḇa, ma ai knam ḇeḇyeḇa ipok imarem bon ḇeḇye ono ḇa.
40007019	Inja ai knam ḇemarem bon ḇeḇyeḇa, nari sroḇen na ma sisawen na ro for ya dori.
40007020	Inja nari mkomambir si ro bon sena.
40007021	Nari mkoḇo snonkaku ḇeyor Ayaḇe: Manseren, Manseren! siso nari ḇesun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa, roḇa kaku, mḇoi ḇeḇeuser Kma Yedi marisen ḇyena ro boiyaswa sikada.
40007022	Ro ras ḇepupes ya snonkaku sibor kaku sor Aya, ḇo soḇo: Manseren, Manseren, mḇoi nkoiso ḇeḇardi snonsnon Bedi, ma ḇeyaw Ibiris kuker snonsnon Bedi ma ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor kuker snonsnon Bedi kako?
40007023	Rofyor ani nari yawos isnai faro si ma Yakofen: Yamam ḇaḇir mko ḇaḇeri! Mko bur Aya, mko kaem ḇefrur ḇarḇor!"
40007024	"Manseisi ḇemnaf wos Ayenane ma ḇeḇeuserna sya, simnis kuker snonkaku ḇefawi nananem ḇefrur rum ḇyedi ro saprop ḇepnas.
40007025	Ḇarpur mekem ya imyun ma daf ya myun, ma wam ya ifnak rum ani, ḇape rum ani kyarḇaken ḇa snar ḇyeḇeḇawes ro saprop ḇepnas.
40007026	Ḇape mansei si simnaf wos Ayenane ma ḇeḇeuserna ḇa sya, simnis kuker snonkaku ḇefawi nananem ḇa, ḇefrur rum byedi ro karyen.
40007027	Ḇarpur mekem ya imyun ma daf ya ryama, ma wam ya ipok ḇo ifnak rum ani, isof rum ani kyarḇaken ma imkokbos beri."
40007028	Ma Yesus dawos rarirya posa kwar, kawasa ḇeḇor ḇemnaf farkarkor ḇyena sikam sikandor,
40007029	snar fyarkor si imnis snonkaku ḇena papoik, mḇoi imnis kuker ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudisya ḇa.
40008001	Yesus isabu kwar ro urek ya, snonkaku sibor semarani ḇo siso I.
40008002	Ro fafisu ani snon ḇeduf pado oso ryama kyunem ma ḇyansuba faro Yesus, ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ikofen: "Tuan, rofyor Tuan wamarisen, Tuan wapok fasren aya."
40008003	Inja Yesus pyan ro snon ani ḇo Ikofen: "Yamarisen fa waprei." Ro fafisuya beri snon ani isren ro dafduf pado ani.
40008004	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro i: "Waswarepen, wakofen ḇadir awer pararei bedine faro snonkaku oso, ḇoi rwafa fasnai mankundaw faro imam ma buk farsarser, raris Moses ḇyuk sasoser kwar faro si."
40008005	Fafisu Yesus syun ro Kapernaum mananir sarar oso ryama faro I mo ikofen, ḇo doḇo:
40008006	"Tuan, manfyan ayedi ḇyarek ro rum ma iduf dafduf papipen ma iduf fafaya ḇa."
40008007	Yesus ikofen faro i: "Woḇo Yarafa Yaḇuk pararei faroike?"
40008008	Ḇape mananir sarar ani kyarem faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Tuan, yasyusḇa fa yor Au ḇe rum ayedi, mḇoi Wakofen wos oser monda, nari manfyan ayedi iprei.
40008009	Snar mankundaya yaso sasoser ro mananir ayedi, ma ro baḇ ayedi sordade sisya. Rofyor yakofen faro sordade yesi oso: Rwa!, nari rya, ma faro oso wer: Rwama!, nari ryama, roḇa wer faro manfamyan yesi oso: Wafrur roi ine!, nari ifrur roi ani."
40008010	Rofyor Yesus imnaf kwar rarirya, I kandor ma Ikofen faro kawasa ḇeso Insya: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri kakyar ḇeba ḇera dine Yasma ḇaim ro fandu snonkaku oser ro fandu kawasa Israel si.
40008011	Yakofen faro mko: Kawasa sibor nari srama ker Wamurem ma Wamḇarek fa skain sanan kam kuker Abraham, Ishak ma Yakub ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa,
40008012	ḇoi romawa-romawa Ḇaḇesasoser ansi kada nari sisawen si ro moḇ ḇepapan-ḇepampan bos kaku, ro moḇ ḇeser kankanes ma arkfafais nakor."
40008013	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro mananir sarar ani: "Waburmura ma nari wasma raris kakyar bedi." Ma ro fafisu ani beri manfyan ḇyani i prei.
40008014	Skorama ro Petrus rum ḇyedi, Yesus myam Petrus imbanyori ḇyarek snar ḇyis.
40008015	Yesus duf bin ani ḇrasi, ma bis ani iburi beri. Ikḇok beri ma duf farmyan I.
40008016	Ro mandira ya ssun faro Yesus snonkaku ḇeḇor rur ḇemaḇak siswoḇer sya ma kuker wos oser monda Yesus iyaw rur-rur ansi ma ḇyuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇeduf si.
40008017	Roi ḇeḇesya nane ndarirya insa Nabi Yesaya wos ikofen fa ḇekur moḇ ine ya imnis, doḇo: "Iso ḇeḇar papokḇa koḇena ma ḇekamar dafduf koḇena."
40008018	Ro fafisu Yesus myam kawasa ḇeḇor sores yaryar I, Iwan fa manfamyan ḇyesi skaḇor ḇe danosen ya ḇar iwara.
40008019	Raimnai snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi oso ryama ma ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Guru, yamarisen yaso Au, ḇe moḇ sai rwayoḇ na."
40008020	Yesus ikofen faro i: "Randip arḇur ya isma niw ma man sya sisma narem, ḇape Rumkun Snonkaku daksma moḇ fa Denef ro ḇa."
40008021	Snonkaku oso ḇese, isoine oso ro manfamyan ḇyesi, ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, buk fa yara resari fa yakrir mami."
40008022	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro i: "Waso Aya ma snonkaku ḇemar sya iḇye sikrir snonkaku ḇemar sesi."
40008023	Raimnai Yesus dek ro wai ya ma manfamyan ḇyesi siso I.
40008024	Kniko monda wam doḇer ḇeba myun ro danosen ani, isof bak na nbaser wai ani, ḇape Yesus denef.
40008025	Inja manfamyan ḇyesi oso ryama ḇyan I, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, wafnoḇek, koine koro."
40008026	Ikofen faro si: "Snaro mkomkak, mkokyar mankunba?" Raimnai Yesus iyori, ma Imsor wam ma bak anna, ma danosen ani iḇrin bos beri.
40008027	Ma snonkaku ansi sikandor, ḇo sikofen: "Snon rosaisoine, indiriso wam ma ḇakna neuser sasoser ḇyedi?"
40008028	Sko fyafer kwar ro ḇarya, isoine ro sup ya fyor kawasa Gadara, snonkaku biris iswoḇer suya surama ker rusna, fa su srow Yesus. Suḇarḇor bos beri, isof snonkaku ono sipok sunuk nyan ani ḇa.
40008029	Ma snon ansui suyar naba, suyoḇo: "Rosai waḇe wafrur ḇe nko, ne, Rumkun Allah? Inja rwama kwar ya isoineke fa buk kandera faro nko ḇepon ro fafisu ya ḇaim?"
40008030	Mḇoi ḇyinkwan knikrosi randip naiḇeba ono simbran sanan.
40008031	Inja Ibiris ansi sor faro Yesus, soḇo: "Rofyor wayaw nko, iḇye wawan nko fa nkosun ro randip nai siwa."
40008032	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Mkora!" Inja sisasyar ma ssun ro randip nai ansi. Rarirya randip nai ḇesiper ansi soper kam ro fofen ya ḇe danose ya dori ma simsar kam.
40008033	Inja ḇewaren randip ansi sifrar ḇe mnu ya ma sfawar roi ḇeḇor nakam ro snonkaku Ibiris iswoḇer ansu ya.
40008034	Inja kawasa ro mnu ansya kam sisasyar fa sra sisrow Yesus, ma sisrow Yesus kwar, sikam sordafdifer I insa Ibur sup sedi.
40009001	Inja Yesus dek kwar ro wai ya posa skokaḇor. Fyoroḇa skofyafer ro mnu marin ḇyedi.
40009002	Ma kawasa ssun faro I snon ḇepapipen oso ḇeḇarek ro kamḇoi anenef ḇyedi. Rofyor Yesus myam kakyar sena Ikofen faro snon ḇepapipen ani: "Wakyare, ne, romawa Yedi nyaki sasar bena neḇepyos kwar."
40009003	Snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ono simnaf rarirya sikofen ro sisnesna, soḇo: "Idonef Allah."
40009004	Ḇape Yesus Ifawi swaruser sena inja Ikofen: "Snaro mkokara roi-roi ḇeḇyeḇa ro mkosnemna?
40009005	Rosai ḇepyan ya, Yakofen: Sasar bena neḇepyos kwar, roḇaido Yakofen: Wakḇok ma wambran?
40009006	Ḇape insa mkofawi, ro supswan ine Rumkun Snonkaku ipok ipyos sasar" -- raimnai Ikofen faro snon ḇepapipen ani; --"Wakḇok, wakanow kamḇoi anenef bedi ma wabur ḇe rum bedi!"
40009007	Ma snon ani iyori fa ibur.
40009008	Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ḇemam roi ḇeḇesya ani simkak ma sisandik Allah ḇeḇuk kwar papoik ḇerarirya faro snonkaku.
40009009	Rofyor Yesus ibur kwar ro dia, Myam snon oso snori Matius kyain ro rum ḇeyor som, inja Ikofen faro i: "Waso Aya." Ma Matius iyori ma iso I.
40009010	Ḇarpur ya rofyor Yesus danan ro Matius rum ḇyedi, ḇeyor som sibor srama ma snonkaku ḇesasar ono sanan kam kuker Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesi.
40009011	Rofyor snon Farisi smam rarirya sikofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesi, soḇo: "Snaro Guru mkoḇedi danan kuker ḇeyor som ma snon sasar?"
40009012	Yesus imnaf rarirya Ikofen: "Snonkaku ḇeprei sefandun ḇena monsyaḇa, ḇoi snonkaku ḇeduf sya siso ḇeḇefandun ḇena mon."
40009013	Inja mkora, ma mkokara wos ine kankunesḇyedi isoine: "Roi Yaḇefandun ya isoine sne ḇesaswar ḇoi farsarser ḇa, snar Yarama fa yor ḇenapes sya ḇa, ḇoi Yor kawasa ḇesasar."
40009014	Ḇarpur ya manfamyan Yohanes ḇyesi srama faro Yesus ma sifuken, soḇo: "Rariso indiri nko kuker Farisi sya nkoḇe farfor, mḇoi manfamyan besi sakfarfor ḇa?"
40009015	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Inja manfakawin ya bati ḇyesi semarindiro fafisu manfakawin ya isya kyainus si? Ḇape fafisu isyama nari ssun manfakawin ya bur si ma ro fafisu ani insape nari sakḇe farfor.
40009016	Snonkaku osoḇa beri syokop sansun ḇekwar kuker marker ḇebabo, snar nari marker ḇebabo ani ismeruk sansun ani, ma makmuk ya iba syadi wer.
40009017	Rarirya kako somunaḇebabo seḇeser ro kibonḇeḇerereḇa snar rofyor rarirya ido nari kibon ḇeḇerere ani imef ma swan ansi sisbawer ma kibon ani kako ḇyemommom. Inja somuna ḇebabo sya seḇeser ro kibon ḇebabo kako, ma rarirya sukam suḇe ḇefaduru."
40009018	Fafisu Yesus dawawos rarirya faro si, mananir rum nadi, oso, ryama faro Yesus ma ḇyan suba faro I, ḇo doḇo: "Inaikir ayedi insandi imar, ḇape yor fa rwama insa rwir ḇramsi roi, nari ikenem wer."
40009019	Inja Yesus iyor i fnoḇek manfamyan Ḇyesi ma siso snon ani.
40009020	Rofyor ani bin ḇeduf dafduf rik ḇewampasi wambarek samfur seser risuru ryama fyanam Yesus ro ḇarpur Ḇyedi ma pyan ro Yesus syatu Ḇyedi pusyom na.
40009021	Snar kyara ro sneri: "Mḇoi yapan monda ro syatu Ḇyenano nari yaprei."
40009022	Ḇape Yesus isiḇer fa myam i ma Ikofen: "Wamku ser snembri, ne inai Yedi, kakyar bedi ḇyuk pararei faro au kwar." Inja ro fafisu ani beri bin ani iprei bos.
40009023	Rofyor Yesus rya kwar ro mananir rum nadi ani rum ḇyedi ma myam siwuf sonker ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sembrus,
40009024	ikofen faro si: "Mko sasyar bur, snar inai ine imarḇa, ḇoi denef. Ḇape simbrif I."
40009025	Rofyor kawasa ansi seḇeyaw kwar, Yesus syun ma duf inaikir ani ḇrasi, rofyor ani inaikir ani ikbok beri.
40009026	Rarirya roi ḇeḇesya ani ḇyesno yar-yar sup ya fyor ani.
40009027	Rofyor Yesus imbran pdef mararan Ḇyedi ro diwa, snon ḇepraf risuru suyom I ma suyor ḇo suyoḇo: "Waswar nu, ne, Romawa Daud."
40009028	Ro fafisu Yesus syun ro rum oso, snon ḇepraf ansu ya sura faro I ma Yesus ikofen faro su: "Mukyar, nari Yapok yafrur raris fararyor muḇena?" Sukarem, suyoḇo: "O Manseren, nukyare."
40009029	Raimnai Yesus pyan ro mkamor suḇesi ma Ikofen: "Musma raris moḇ mukyar rai." Fyorya beri mkamor suḇesi sḇas.
40009030	Ma Yesus danun pakrek faro su, ma ikofen: "Muswarepen naḇye insa snonkaku osero ifawi awer roine."
40009031	Ḇape rofyor susasyar ya beri suḇaryasi ro supya fyor ani ḇesiper.
40009032	Rofyor snon ḇepraf ansuya susasyar, kawasa ssun faro Yesus awer oso biris ya iswoḇer i.
40009033	Ma rofyor Ibiris ya ḇyeḇeyaw, awer ani dawawos beri. Kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sikandor soḇo: "Roi ḇera dine komam baim ro Israel."
40009034	Ḇape Farisi sya soḇo: "Kuker papoik ro mananir Ibiris Iyau Ibiris ya."
40009035	Rarirya Yesus Imbran yar ḇe mnu nakam; Ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum nadi ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa ma iyaw dafduf ma papipen nakaem.
40009036	Myam kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, Yesus sneri dek kuker sawarwar faro si, snar simor ma ssoninyan imnis domba ḇena manfarandowsḇa.
40009037	Inja Ikofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesi: "Fafisu afufya imnis kwar, ḇoi yaf ya ibabo ḇeyinek sya sibor ḇa.
40009038	Inja mkor faro tuan ḇena afuf ya, insa fyarem ḇeyinek sya sibor faro afuf ani."
40010001	Yesus dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru Ḇyesi fa siryur ma ḇyuk papoik faro si insa ssḇuki yaw rodur ḇeḇarḇor ma dafduf kam ma raryarḇa nakam.
40010002	Wawan samfur seser risuru ansi sisnosna naiso nane: Ḇeponya Simon sniri kako ḇe Petrus ma ḇedar ḇyedi Andreas, ma Yakobus Zebedeus mandaḇendi, ma ḇedar ḇyedi Yohanes,
40010003	Filipus ma Bartolomeus, Tomas ma Matius ḇeyor som, Yakobus Alfeus mandaḇendi, ma Tadeus,
40010004	Simon snon Zelot ma Yudas Iskariot ḇeḇoḇ Yesus.
40010005	Wawan samfur seser risuru ansi Yesus iwansi kuker ananun faro si: "Mkoso awer nyan ḇeraḇe er ḇese ma mkosun awer ro mnu-mnu Samaria,
40010006	ḇoi mkora faro domba-domba ḇeḇor ro fandu er Israel.
40010007	Mkora ma mkoḇaryas: Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa fyanam kwar.
40010008	Mkoḇuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇedufsi; mko ḇawes ḇemarsi; mkofasren ḇeduf padosi; ma mkoyaw Ibiris ya. Papoik nane mkosma waworekna monda kwar, inja mkakḇuk waworek kako.
40010009	Mkun awer brawen, roḇa sarak roḇa kansai roiḇeḇoḇek mkoḇena.
40010010	Mkun awer roi ḇeḇaryam ro maran mkoḇena, mkun syadi awer sansun risuru, roḇesower roḇa ankyon, snar snonkaku ḇefararur oso nari isma ḇaḇyak.
40010011	Rofyor mkosun ro mnu-mnu ḇeba ma kasun, mkosewar ro dia snonkaku ḇefrur pyum fa mkokainus si rao isof ro mkombran wer.
40010012	Rofyor mkosun ro rum ono, mkokofen aroo faro si.
40010013	Rofyor ḇena rum ya ḇyenaḇye, aroo mkoḇena nkain faro si, ḇape roroḇaido aroo ani kyaḇer faro mko.
40010014	Ma rofyor snon oso ḇyenaḇye mkoḇa, ma imnaf wos mkoḇenaḇa, mkosasyar ma mkobur rum roḇa mnu ma mkokokef fafen ḇero mkowemna.
40010015	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri ro ras mankara ya sup Sodom ma Gomora kandera sedi nari myanan syadi kandera ḇekur mnu ine."
40010016	"Mkomame, Yawan mko imnis domba ro fandu randip arḇur, inja mkofawi kaku imnis ikak ma mkonapes imnis man jawa.
40010017	Ma mkepen mko ro snonkaku sya kam; snar nari ono sḇoḇ mko faro kankain karkara agama ma siprer mko ro rum nadi sena.
40010018	Ma snar Aya nari ssun mko ḇe ḇarpon ḇena papok ma wairek-wairek imnis fasasnai faro si ma faro snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇa sya kako.
40010019	Rofyor sḇoḇ mko, mkararyof awer rariso ma rosai nari mkawos ḇesyan na, snar nakam nari Yaḇukna ḇe mko ro fafisu ya beri.
40010020	Snar nari mkoiso ḇeyawos mko ya ḇa, ḇoi Kma mko ḇedi Rur Ḇyedi; iso nari ḇeyawos pyan ro mkosḇam na.
40010021	Ono nari sḇoḇ naek sesi fa smun si, rarirya kako sinan oso faro romawa ḇyesi. Ma romawa sya srakrakrok sinan sesi ma nari smun si.
40010022	Ma nari Yafnai fa kawasa kam sayinmko ma sisurem mko ḇape faro mansei ḇemku isof papupes ya nari sisma aski.
40010023	Rofyor sewayam mko ro mnu ine, mko frar ḇe mnu ḇese; snar Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri rofyor mkora faro mnu-mnu Israel nakam ḇaim, Rumkun Snonkaku ryama kwar.
40010024	Romawa farkor oso isyadi ro guru ḇyedi ḇa, rarirya kako manfyan oso isyadi tuan ḇyedi ḇa.
40010025	Inja, rofyor romawa farkor ani imnis raris guru ḇyedi, ma manfyan ani imnis raris tuan ḇyedi, kuker rarirya imnis kwar faro si. Rofyor tuan ḇena rum ya snir i ḇe Beelzebul, rosai wer kuker kina ḇero rum ya.
40010026	Inja mkomkak awer si, snar roi oso isisen ma iyokef ḇa snar nakam nfababa ma kofawi na kam kwar.
40010027	Rosai Yakofen faro mko ro panpan, mkawos na roisnai; ma rosai sfararumro knaram mkoḇena mkoḇaryas na ro rum bunem iyaswa.
40010028	Ma mkomkak awer faro mansei ḇemun ḇaken ya, ḇape ḇepok fa ḇemun rur ya ḇa; mkomkak syadi faro ḇepok ḇemun iḇye rur ya ma ḇaken ya ro for ḇembrerḇa ya.
40010029	Mkofawi ḇake manesu risuru sḇoḇ su kuker maeja ropia oser? Rariryano osero ro man mkun ansi ipok imar famfnomḇa rofyor Mami ro Boiyaswa Imarisenḇa.
40010030	Ma mko kako snonburyam mkoḇena naser karkor epen.
40010031	Inja mkomkak awer snar mkoḇe maeja syadi ro manesu ḇeḇor.
40010032	Snonkaku oser-oser ḇekarem Aya ro ḇarpon snonkaku, Aya kako nari Yakkarem i ro ḇarpon Mami ro boiyaswa.
40010033	Mḇoi mansei ḇefamyun Aya ro ḇarpon snonkaku, Aya kako nari Yakfamyun i ro ḇarpon Mami ro boiyaswa."
40010034	"Mkokara awer ḇo mkoḇo, Yarama fa Yun aski faro supswan ine; Yarama fa Yun askiḇa, mḇoi Yun sumber.
40010035	Snar Yarama fa Yararwas romawa sya bur sikmas si, inai sya bur sisnas si, Imbikin sya bur imbanyo sesi,
40010036	ma kina ro rum oso nari sembroḇ yaesi.
40010037	Mansei ḇeswar snari ma kmari syadi ro Aya, ikada isyusḇa faro Aya; ma mansei ḇeswar romawa ma inai ḇyesi isyadi ro Aya, ikako daksyusḇa faro Aya.
40010038	Mansei ḇeḇar aprop ḇyedi ḇo ḇeso Ayaḇa, isyusḇa faro Aya.
40010039	Mansei ḇefaduru kankenem ḇyedi nari kankenem ani ryo bur i, ma mansei kankenem ḇyedi ryo bur i snar Aya nari isma i wer.
40010040	Mansei ḇena mko irya daknai Aya, ma mansei ḇena Aya irirya daknai Mami ḇewan Ayanya.
40010041	Mansei ḇena nabi oso snar i nabi nari isma ḇaḇyak nabi, ma mansei ḇena snon ḇenapes oso nari isma ḇaḇyak snon ḇenapes.
40010042	Ma mansei ḇeḇuk war ḇepnunek sek oser monda faro awak param oso, snar i ḇeso Aya, rarirya Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri ḇaḇyak ḇyedi ipok ryo bur iba."
40011001	Yesus danun faro manfamyan samfur seser risuru Ḇyesi kwar raimnai ibur moḇ ani fa ḇyuk farkarkor ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Beḇye ro mnu-mnu sena.
40011002	Ro bui Yohanes imnaf fararur Kristus ifrurna,
40011003	inja iwan manfamyan ḇyesi fa sifuken faro I, ḇo soḇo: "Auso nari ḇeramayake, roḇa nari nkowaf snono ḇese?"
40011004	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkora, ma mkokofen faro Yohanes rosai mkomnaf ma mkomam na:
40011005	snonkaku ḇepraf sya smam, manis sya simbran, ḇeduf pado sya seḇefasren, ḇepro sya simnaf, ḇemar sya siḇer si, ma faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sya ankankinem ḇeḇye ya ḇyeḇeḇaryas faro si.
40011006	Ma aski isya faro snonkaku ḇefafayaf Ayaḇa sya."
40011007	Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesi sibur kwar, Yesus irandak dawawos faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ro Yohanes: "Fainda rosai mkora ḇe sup ḇeḇeursḇa? Fa mkomam amboḇer wam ya iyowmura-muma? Roḇa rosaiso mkora kuker ya?
40011008	Fa mkomam snonkaku ḇefmar sansun ḇepyum? Snonkaku ḇefmar sansun ḇepyum moḇ sedi isya ro rum wairek-wairek.
40011009	Inja fainda rosai mkora kuker ya? Mkomam nabike? Kaku, ma Yakofen faro mko, mḇoi isyadi ro nabi.
40011010	Snar fas-fas isya kyur i: Mame, Yawan wawan Ayedi fa pyon au, ikada nari fyasos nyan Bedi ro ḇarpon Bedi.
40011011	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri rofandu snonkaku bin sya saḇen si oso ḇanim ikḇawes fa iba syadi Yohanes Ḇemasi, ḇape ḇebaḇa syadi ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa ikada iba syadi Yohanes.
40011012	Rofyor Yohanes Ḇemasi ikḇawes isof knikine, Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa ḇyeḇesrewma snonkaku ḇesrew isya ssewar fa siḇriwark i.
40011013	Snar nabisya kam ma Refo Yahudi sḇardi isof Yohanes ikḇawes
40011014	ma -- rofyor mkomarisen mkonai -- ikada Elia nari ḇeramumanya irya.
40011015	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram iḇye imnaf!
40011016	Kuker rosai Yaḇuki kyarai syos baboine? Sikada simnisbos romawa fnak ḇekain ro pasar ma ḇeyor faro min sesi:
40011017	Nkowuf sonker faro mko, ḇape mkomas ḇa, Nkokanes kankanes-saneso, ḇape mkomandakḇa.
40011018	Snar Yohanes ryama, ima dananḇa, madinemba, ma sikofen: Rurḇemaḇak siswoḇer i.
40011019	Ḇarpur wer Rumkun Snonkaku ya ryama, Ikada danan ma dinem, ma sikofen: Mkomame, I snonkaku ḇeyandafdaferma ḇeyinemuk, bati ro snon ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasar. Ḇape Allah fawawi Ḇyena nfasna napnapes ro fararur ḇyena."
40011020	Raimnai Yesus ryakrok mnu-mnu ḇembror ḇa, snar ro moḇ anna Yesus ifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor kaku, ḇo ikofen:
40011021	"Ne, Korazim nari rwo! Ne, Betsaida nari rwo! Snar rofyor ro Tirus ma Sidon aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor ḇeḇesya kwar ro fandu mko, nakḇesya ro diwa sikada simbror fyoro kwar ma smandak.
40011022	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Ro ras mankara ya, mnu Tirus ma Sidon nari kandera-suna nmanan syadi ro kandera mkoḇena.
40011023	Ma au ne, Kapernaum, inja nari beḇekanow isof ro nankike? Roḇa, nari beḇesabu isofro munaibui! Snar rofyor aḇyair kanandor ro fandu mko nakrarirya ro Sodom kada, nari mnu ani isya kyain kaker isof ras ine.
40011024	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Ro ras mankaraya, Sodom sya kandera sena nari nmanan syadi ro kandera mkoḇena."
40011025	Ro fafisu ani Yesus isandik ma ikofen: "Yakofen kasumasa faro Au, Mami, Manseren nanki ma supswan, snar nakam wayokef na bur snonkaku ḇefawi nananem, ḇape ḇasna faro snonkaku waworek.
40011026	O Mami, snar raririrya marisen Bedi.
40011027	Nakam neḇeḇuk kwar faro Aya ro Kma Yedi ma snonkaku oso ḇa myam ḇaḇir Romawa ya derer Kma ya, ma snonkaku oso ḇa myam ḇaḇir Kma ya derer Romawa ya ma snonkaku Romawa ya imarisen fyasnai faro si.
40011028	Mkoramuma faro Aya, mkokam ḇemor ma ḇembrus ma ḇeḇekandera, nari Yaḇuk mananai faro mko.
40011029	Mkoḇar kamnam Ayedi ma mkofarkor ro Aya, snar Aya yamyaren asuser ma sneri ikaki ḇa ma rur mkoḇesi nari sisma kananon.
40011030	Snar kamnam Ayedi ifrur marisen ma kamnam Ayedi myanan."
40012001	Ro fafisu ani, ro ras Mananai Yahudi, Yesus imbranuk yaf gandum ono. Snar manfamyan Ḇyesi sibiser inja sinek gandum yorem ono ma san si.
40012002	Farisi ono smam rarirya, sikofen faro I: "Mamkada, manfamyan Ḇyesi sifrur roi kopok kofrur ḇa ro ras Mananai Yahudi."
40012003	Ḇape Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkowasya ḇaimke rosai Daud, ifrur ro fafisu i ma ḇeso isya sibiser,
40012004	rariso syun ro Rum Allah ma rariso sikam san mamami fasasos, ono ḇese sipok san ḇa, iḇye Daud ma ḇeso isya, derer monda faro imam-imamsya?
40012005	Roḇaido mkowasya ḇake ro Refo Yahudi, ro ras-ras Mananai Yahudi imam-imamsya seyuk sasoser ras Mananai Yahudi ro Rum Allah dori, ḇape skor si ḇeḇesasarḇa?
40012006	Yakofen faro mko: dine oso isya iba syadi ro Rum Allah.
40012007	Rofyor mkofawi kankunes ro wos ine: Yamarisen sawarwar ya ḇoi farsarser ḇa, rarirya nari mkoḇuk samamyaiḇa faro snonkaku ḇesasar ḇa sya.
40012008	Snar Rumkun Snonkaku ya Ikada Manseren faro ras Mananai Yahudi ya."
40012009	Rofyor sskobur ro dia, Yesus syun ro rum nadi sedi.
40012010	Ro dia snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar oso isya. Sifuken faro Yesus: "Ipyumke koḇuk pararei faro snonkaku sya ro ras Mananai Yahudi?" Knam karkara sedi insa ssḇuk sasar faro I.
40012011	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro si: "Rofyor oso ro mko isma domba oso ma isapi ro der ro ras mananai Yahudi, nari isasyar i bur derya ḇake?
40012012	Mkokaraḇake snonkaku sya semaedya syadi ro domba ani? Rarirya kako kofrur roi ḇeḇye ro ras Mananai Yahudi."
40012013	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro snon ani: "Fos ḇramsi!" Ma fyos ḇrasi, ma ḇrasi iprei beri.
40012014	Raimnai Farisi ansi sisasyar fa sna awi insa smun Yesus.
40012015	(15a) Ḇape Yesus ifawi knam aw sedi inja ibur moḇ ani. (15b) Kawasa sibor siso Yesus ma ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf sya kam.
40012016	Danun pakrek faro si, insa sikofen ḇayir awer mansei irya,
40012017	insa wos Yesaya ikofen kwar ya imnis, ḇo doḇo:
40012018	"Mkomam, ine Manfamyan Ayedi yakinfir kwar, ma Yaswar I, snar kuker I rur Yedi imarisen. Nari Yaḇuk rur Yedi faro I, ma nari iso ḇekofen ḇair sasoser faro er-er sya.
40012019	Ima nari dakfaḇaḇri ḇa ma sḇari fyarbaba ḇa ma kawasa sakrower mkaren Ḇyedi ḇa ro sampakri ḇo.
40012020	Ajumek ḇekorew ma ḇesawayom nari pyankar iba, ma marom ḇepawya nari Fyasye i ḇa, isof Ifrur fa sasoser ya ḇyefainda.
40012021	Ma er-er sya nari sikyar faro I."
40012022	Ḇarpurya sun faro Yesus snon oso rur ḇemaḇak ya iswoḇeri. Snon ani ipraf ma ḇyeawer, ma Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro i, isof awer ani dawos ma myam wer.
40012023	Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sikandor, ma sikofen: "Inenido Romawa Daudke?"
40012024	Ḇape rofyor kawasa Farisi ansi simnaf rarirya, sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Kuker Beelzebul, mananir rur ḇemaḇak, Iyaw rur ḇemaḇak sya."
40012025	Ḇape Yesus Ifawi swaruser sena inja Ikofen faro si, ḇo doḇo: "Ḇaḇesasoser oso ḇeyunḇesisye nari ryo ma mnu oso roḇa kina ro rum ḇeyunḇesisye ipok kyain kawan ḇa.
40012026	Rarirya kako rofyor Ibiris iyaw Ibiris, ikako irarwas ma ḇyembroḇ mankundi; rariso nari ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi kyain nako?
40012027	Rarirya rofyor Yayaw rur ḇemaḇak kuker papoik ro Beelzebul, kuker papoik rosai kpu mkoḇe sya ssḇuki dakyaw i? Inja siso nari ḇeḇemankara ḇemko.
40012028	Ḇape rofyor Yayaw rur ḇemaḇak kuker papoik Allah Rur Ḇyedi, inja kaku ḇeri Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ryama kwar faro mko.
40012029	Roḇaido rariso snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇesun ma ḇefasar papus ro snon ḇesambraḇ oso, rofyor sfes ḇepon snon ani ḇaim? Sfes ḇepon i kwar insape sfasyar rum ani.
40012030	Mansei ḇefnoḇek Ayaḇa ikada isampum Aya ma mansei ḇeryur fnoḇek Ayaḇa, ikada fyasasye.
40012031	Inja Yakofen faro mko: Sasar ḇeḇor kam ma anonef ro snonkaku nari nasma ḇaḇepayasyos, ḇape anonef faro Rur Ḇesren ikada isma ḇaḇepayasyos ḇaḇeri.
40012032	Rofyor snonkakuya isampum Rumkun Snonkaku, ikada isma payasyos, ḇape rofyor isampum Rur Ḇesren ikada isma payasyos ḇaḇeri ro supswan ine payasyos oḇa, ma ro ras ḇepupes ya kako payasyosḇa.
40012033	Rofyor mkokofen ai knam oso ipyum rarirya bon ḇyena kako napyum; rarirya kako ai knam oso mkoḇo ipyumba, rarirya kako bon ḇyena nakpyum ba. Snar ai ani bon ḇyena naiso koḇuki ifawi i na.
40012034	Ne, ikakḇeknampu mkun ḇyesi, rariso mkofawi mkawos roi ḇeḇye, ḇape mankun mko mkoḇarḇor? Snar roi mkap kuker sḇadon irya nek ro sne.
40012035	Snonkaku ḇepyum sawos roi ḇepyum ro fayar ḇepyum, ma snonkaku ḇeḇyeḇa sikada sawos roi ḇeḇarḇor ro fayar ḇeḇarḇor.
40012036	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: wos famfnom snonkaku sya sawos na nari skarem na ro ras mankara ya.
40012037	Kuker wos anna nari ssḇuk kaku faro au, ma kuker wos anna kako nari ssḇuk samamyai faro au."
40012038	Ro fafisu ani ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi kuker Farisi ono sikofen faro Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Guru nkomarisen nkomam aḇyair oso ro Au."
40012039	Ḇape kyarem faro si: "Syos ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇefrur farḇuk ine soḇo sor aḇyair oso ro Aya. Ḇape sikada nari sisma aḇyair osoḇa derer aḇyair Nabi Yunus.
40012040	Snar raris Yunus kyain ro in ḇeba sasop ya dori ḇeras rikior ma roḇ rikior, rarirya kako Rumkun Snonkaku nari kyain ro mun aiḇui ḇeras rikior roḇ rikior.
40012041	Ro fafisu mankara ya, kawasa Niniwe nari sikḇwawes ma sifnoḇek syos ine ma ssḇuk samamyai faro si. Snar kawasa Niniwe sikada simbror rofyor simnaf Yunus ḇaryas ḇyena ma kaku ḇeri ro dine mkakmam snon oso isya iba syadi wer ro Yunus!
40012042	Ro fafisu mankara ya wairek bin ro ḇar Wambrau ani nari diḇri fnoḇek syos ine ma nari dakḇuk samamyai kako. Snar wairek bin ine ryama ker supswan pember fa dakmnaf Salomo fawinananem ḇyena, ma kaku ḇeri mkakmam snon oso isya ro dine isyadi wer ro Salomo!"
40012043	"Ro fafisu rur ḇemaḇak ya isasyar bur snonkaku, ikada imbran iḇor farma ro sup-sup manuren syewar moḇ mananai. Ḇape ismaḇa.
40012044	Inja ikofen: Nari yarerḇe rum yabur ani. Ma rya kwar ro rum ani myam ma rum ani ḇyebei, sisasapu sren i ma sfasos pyum i.
40012045	Rarirya isasyar ma dor rur ḇemaḇak rifik ḇesawo syadi wer ro i ma ssun fa sikenem ro dia. Ma ro papupes ya snonkaku ani iḇyeḇa syadi wer ro ḇepon ya. Rarirya kako kuker syos ḇeḇarḇor ine."
40012046	Fafisu Yesus isya dawawos kuker kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, mkakmam snari ma naek Ḇyesi sores ro ḇandi ma sesewar fa sisrow ma sawawos kukeri.
40012047	Rarirya snonkaku oso ikofen faro I: "Mame, snami ma naek ḇesi sisya ro ḇandi ma ssewar fa sisrow Au."
40012048	Ḇape Yesus kyarem faro snonkaku ḇekofen wos ani faro Inya: "Manseiso sna Yedi? Ma manseiso naek Ayesi?"
40012049	Raimnai Ikofen, ma fyos ḇraminya ḇo fyasnai faro manfamyan Ḇyesi: "Sine sna Yedi ma naek Ayesi.
40012050	Snar mansei ryawer ḇefrur Mami marisen Ḇyena ro boiyaswa, ikada naek ma srar Ayedi ma sna Ayedi."
40013001	Ro ras ani Yesus isasyar ro rum ani ma rya kyain ro danosen andir ya.
40013002	Kawasa sibor semarani ḇo srama spanjuḇer I, inja dek ro wai oso ma kyon roi, mḇoi kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam sores ro ḇande.
40013003	Ma dawos roi nabor farosi kuker sarḇer. Doḇo: "Snon ḇekekef mor oso isasyar fa kyekef mor.
40013004	Ro fafisu kyekef ya, mor ono nasapi ro nyan andir, ma mansya srama san na rao naḇro.
40013005	Mor ono nasapi ro moḇ ḇeḇekarui, ḇeḇesaprop mankunba inja nasur fasaw,
40013006	ḇape rofyor ori dek kwar, nmaryoi ma nmas snar nerares ḇa.
40013007	Mor ono wer nasapi ro manuk borek; ma manuk anna naduḇ epenna isof nmas ma namar.
40013008	Ma ono nasapi ro saprop ḇepyum raimnai nasur ma namarem: ono ḇeutin, ono ḇesamfur ri wonem, ono wer ḇesamfur rikior.
40013009	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido iḇye kada imnaf!"
40013010	Ma manfamyan ḇyesi srama sifuken faro i, ḇo soḇo: "Snaro wawos faro si kuker sarḇer?"
40013011	Yesus kyarem: "Faro mko kada mkosma fakamaman fa mkofawi kankunes Ḇaḇesasoser ro boiyaswa, ḇape sikada roḇa.
40013012	Snar mansei ḇena, nari ssḇuk faroi wer isof nya farsbawer; ḇape mansei ḇeyakna ḇa, rosai wer isya faroi nari neḇeyun bur i.
40013013	Eḇedari yawos faro si kuker sarḇer; snar smam ḇape imnis smam ba ma srower ḇape imnis srower ḇa, ma sifawi ḇa.
40013014	Inja Yesaya ḇardadi ḇyedi imnis fa kyur si: Nari mkomnaf kuker knaram mkoḇesi, ḇesyaḇo mkokara ḇa, nari mkomam keker mka mkoḇesi, ḇesyaḇo mkofawi ḇa.
40013015	Snar er ine sisnesna napup kwar, ma siknasna nadiw, ma simkasna nasef; insa smam awer kuker simkasna ma simnaf awer kuker siknasna ma sifawi awer kuker sisnesna, isof skaḇer ma yaḇuk pararei faro si.
40013016	Ḇape aski faro mko snar mka mkoḇesi smam ma knaram mkoḇesi simnaf.
40013017	Snar yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nabi ma snonkaku ḇenapes sya sibor simarisen sakmam ma sakmnaf, roi mkomam ma mko mnaf nane, ḇape sakmam ma sakmnaf na ḇa.
40013018	Inja mkomnaf naḇye, sarḇer snon ḇekekef mor ani.
40013019	Faro snonkaku oser-oser ḇemnaf wos ḇekur Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa, ḇape sifawi na ḇa, snar ḇeḇarḇor ya ryama ma dun mor ḇekekef anna ro sisnesna; irya mor ḇekekef ro nyan andir.
40013020	Mor ḇekekef ro saprop ḇeḇekaruina irya snonkaku ḇemnaf wos ya ma fasaw ḇeyun na kuker raryaḇ.
40013021	Ḇape nerares ḇa inja nasur fasaw knik monda. Rofyor kanderama ḇaḇewayam ono ndama nkuri snar wos ani, snon ani isapi fasaw kaku.
40013022	Mor ḇesapi ro fandu manuk borek irya snonkaku ḇemnaf wos ani, raimnai araryof ananjar awar kirai ine ma sne ḇero nana nepen epen wos anna isof namarem ba.
40013023	Mor ḇesapi ro saprop ḇepyum irya snonkaku ḇemnaf wos ani ma ḇefawi, rarirya nebon, ono ḇeutin, ono ḇesamfur riwonem, ono wer ḇesamfur rikior."
40013024	Yesus ḇyuk sarḇer oso ḇese wer faro si, doḇo: "Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis raris snonkaku ḇekekef mor ḇepyum ro yaf ḇyedi.
40013025	Ḇape rofyor kawasa syakam senef, mbroḇ ḇyedi ryama ma dakkekef ampyampumber mor ro fandu gandum ansi, raimnai ibur.
40013026	Ro fafisu gandum ansi sisur ma simarem randak ya, ampyampumber ansi kako saksur.
40013027	Inja tuan ḇena yaf ya manfamyan ḇyesi srama faro i ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: Tuan, rariso mor ḇepyum siso kwekef ro yaf bedi, ḇesyaḇo ampyampumber sine srama kero?
40013028	Tuan ani kyarem: Mbroḇ koḇediso ḇefrur rarirya. Raimnai manfamyan ansi sikofen faro i: Inja tuan wamarisen ido nkora nkopas ampyampumber ansi?
40013029	Ḇape ikofen: Roḇa, snar imbude mkopas sasar gandum sya rofyor mkopas ampyampumber ansi.
40013030	Inja sisur kam mura isof fafisu afuf ya. Ro fafisu ani nari yakofen faro ḇeyuf ansi: Mkoryur ḇepon ampyampumber ansi ma mkororbos si fa sebosbos ma seḇekun; ḇarpur ya mkoryur gandum sya ma mkosun si ro sayar ayedi."
40013031	Yesus ḇyuk sarḇer oso ḇese wer faro si, doḇo: "Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis raris sasawi mor, sun ma skekef ro yaf sena.
40013032	Kaku mor aniso ḇebaḇa syadi ro mor ḇese sya kam, ḇape rofyor isur kwar, sasawi ani iba syadi rofaran ḇese sya kam, ma isyadi wer ḇyeai knam, isof man ro farsyos sya srama smunnarem ro snaw-snaw ḇyena."
40013033	Ma fyar-fyar sarḇer ine kako faro si: "Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis raris mur bin oso dun fa ḇyukḇaren terigu amek rikior ma ifrur fa napisen kam."
40013034	Nakam Yesus ḇyuk na faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kuker sarḇer,
40013035	insa nabi ya wos ḇyedi imnis isoine: "Yamarisen yaḇas sḇari fa yawos sarḇer, Yamarisen yawos ro roi ḇero kankunes ro randak supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ya."
40013036	Raimnai Yesus ibur kawasa ḇeḇor ansi. Manfamyan ḇyesi srama ma sikofen faro i, ḇo soḇo: "Wakofen fasnai faro nko ro sarḇer ampyampumber ro fandu gandum ansi."
40013037	Ma kyarem faro si, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ḇekekef mor ḇepyumya ido irya Romawa Snonkaku;
40013038	yaf ya irya supswan. Mor ḇepyum sya irya romawa-romawa Ḇaḇesasoser ma ampyampumber sya irya romawa-romawa ḇeḇarḇor.
40013039	Mbroḇ ḇekekef ampyampumber sya irya Ibiris. Fafisu afuf ya irya ras papupes ma ḇeyuf ansi irya malaikat.
40013040	Ma raris ampyampumber sya siryur si ma sikun si ro for rarirya kako ro ras ḇepupes ya.
40013041	Rumkun snonkaku nari iwan malaikat ḇyesi ma nari siryur roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇeninyan ma snonkaku kam ḇefrur ḇarḇor ro Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
40013042	Sikam nari sisawen si ro for; rodia nari sisma kankanes ma arkfafais nakor.
40013043	Rofyor ani kawasa ḇenapes sya nari sisnai imnis ori ro Ḇaḇesasoser Kma sedi. Mansei ḇeḇeknaram, iḇye imnaf!"
40013044	"Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis papus beyokef ro yaf ya, ma snonkaku oso isma na, raimnai iyokef na wer. Snar raryaḇ ḇyedi rya ḇyoḇ pres papus ḇyena fa ḇyukkoḇes yaf ani.
40013045	Rarirya kako kuker Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis snon ḇesewar inkin mkamor ḇepyum.
40013046	Rofyor isrow kwar inkin mkamor ḇeḇemaeja kaku, rya ma ḇyoḇ pres papus ḇyena fa ḇyukkoḇes inkin mkamor ani."
40013047	"Rarirya kako Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis pam paspos ḇenap ro soren, ma in syoso-syoso sḇar ro pam ani.
40013048	Pam ani ifo kwar spawi ḇebonde ma skimfir in ḇepyum sya ma siser si ro aiḇar ḇoi in ḇepyumba sya sisawen si.
40013049	Rarirya kako ro fafisu ras ḇepupes ya: Malaikat-malaikat sya nari srama fa sirarwas snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor sya bur snonkaku ḇenapes sya,
40013050	raimnai sisawen snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor sya ro for ḇembrerḇa; ro diwa nari skanes ma sark fafais nakor.
40013051	Mkofawi roi ḇeḇor nanekam kwarke?" Skarem: "Mḇoi, nkofawi kwar."
40013052	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro si: "Inja ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya oser-oser isma farkarkor ḇekur Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis tuan oso ḇesasyar papus ḇebabo ma ḇekwar nakam ro kron ḇyedi."
40013053	Yesus fyar-fyar sarḇer anna posa kwar, ibur moḇ ani.
40013054	Ryama kwar ro mnu ḇyedi, fyarkor kawasa ro dia ro rum nadi sedi. Sikandor kam ma sikofen: "Ro moḇ rosai isma fawawi ma samambraḇ ḇyuki ifrur aḇyair kanandor nane?
40013055	Ko kam kofawi irya rumawa ro snon ḇefawi nananem ḇefrur rum? Kofawi kako snari snori Maria ma naek ḇyesiso: Yakobus, Yusuf, Simon ma Yudas?
40013056	Ma srar ḇyesi kako sisya skainfadu ko? Inja moḇ rosaiso isma roi ḇeḇor nanefa ro ya?"
40013057	Ma sikam sfafayaf ḇo siyaw i. Inja Yesus ikofen faro si: "Nabi oso semafi ro moḇ-moḇ ḇese, mḇoi demir ro mnu mankundi ḇyedi ma rum ḇyedi kada sefandun i ḇa."
40013058	Ma snar kakyarḇa sena, Yesus dakfrur aḇyair kanandor nabor ro dia ḇa.
40014001	Ro fafisu ani Yesus ḇyesno faro Herodes, koranofiak ro supya mnuk ani, dakmnaf i.
40014002	Rarirya ikofen faro ḇefararur ḇyesi: "Irya Yohanes Ḇemasi; diḇri kwar ro fandu ḇemar sya eḇedari samambraḇ anna nafararur roi."
40014003	Snar Herodes iwan kwar fa sfor Yohanes, ḇo sewanka i ma ssun i ro bui, snar dun ḇedar ḇyedi Filipus swari, Herodias fa fyakawin i.
40014004	Snar Yohanes isonk Herodes, ḇo doḇo: "Wapok wun Herodiasḇa, snar rarirya beyuk sasoser agama!"
40014005	Herodes ḇyenamu myun Yohanes ḇape imkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snar skarai nabi rirya.
40014006	Ḇape ro ras munara swarapepen Herodes ḇyeḇeyaben ya, Herodias inai ḇyedi ifyer ro ḇarpon sedi ma ifrur raryaḇ Herodes sneri,
40014007	isof Herodes ḇyeasas kuker syasi nari ḇyuk faroi rosai ryawer imarisen dor ro i.
40014008	Snar inai ani snari fyarkor ninyan i kwar inja ikofen: "Buk faro aya Yohanes Ḇemasi ḇruri ro sayer oso."
40014009	Inja wairek sneri fyafardun, ḇape snar sna ḇyedi ma dakam ḇyesi, eḇedari ḇyuk sasoser fa ssḇuk Yohanes ḇruri faro i.
40014010	Inja iwan fa speremuk Yohanes ḇruri ro bui,
40014011	raimnai siseri ro sayer oso, ma ssḇuki faro inai ani ma duni faro snari.
40014012	Raimnai Yohanes Ḇemasi manfamyan ḇyesi srama ssun aipyokem ani fa sikrir i. Ḇarpur ya sra faro Yesus fa sikofen ḇadir faro i.
40014013	Yesus imnaf Yohanes imar kwar imarisen kyaḇer bur moḇ ani ma dek wai oso ḇemoḇ ḇeḇeursḇa. Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor ansi simnaf inja sisasyar ro mnu sena siso nyan ḇeraḇande fa siyomuser i.
40014014	Fafisu Yesus ryande, myam kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ma iswar si, ḇo ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf si.
40014015	Fanam mandira, manfamyan ḇyesi srama faroi ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Moḇ ine ḇyeuserḇa ma fyanam roḇ kwar. Inja wawan kawasa ḇeḇor ansine fa sra insa skoḇes roḇean ro mnu-mnu na."
40014016	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro si: "Sipok sibur awer, mkoiso nari ḇefan si."
40014017	Skarem faro i, ḇo soḇo: "Inkosma monda ro dine mamami ririm ma in risuru."
40014018	Yesus ikofen: "Mkun na muma maro aya."
40014019	Raimnai iwan kawasa ḇeḇor ansi fa skain ro aḇris sya. Rofyor dun mamami ririm ma in risuru kwar, iwakwaker ḇe nanki ma ikofen kasumasa ma ḇyeḇokna posa pyanasnis na ma ḇyuk na faro manfamyan ḇyesi, raimnai manfamyan ḇyesi sirwas na faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
40014020	Ma sikam sanan isof sarḇor. Sanan posa kwar siryur mamami ker-ker ḇedawer na ma siserna ro noken samfur seser risuru nafo.
40014021	Kawasa ḇeyanan ansi kam indokada sesyaran ririm, ḇoi bin ma romawasya seḇeyakkor ḇa.
40014022	Raimnai Yesus ḇyuk sasoser fasau faro manfamyan ḇyesi fa sek ro wai ma spon i ḇe ḇariwarḇar, ro fafisuya kako iwan kawasa ḇeḇor ansi fa sibur.
40014023	Ma iwan kawasa ansi fa sibur kwar, Yesus dek ro urek ani raryas demir ḇyenadi. Ro fafisu roḇ kwar, derer ro dia.
40014024	Ro fafisu ani manfamyan ḇyesi skaḇor kwar bur sup ya isof ro danosen ya faduri, ma wai ani ikren-ikḇar ro bak na, snar sko sor wam ya.
40014025	Ro fafisu kyamadui meser (indokada oras) kior Yesus ryama faro si imbran ro warya bori.
40014026	Ro fafisu manfamyan ḇyesi smam imbran ro war ya bori, sikandor, simkak ḇo sfararar ma soḇo: "Faknik ri rya!"
40014027	Ḇape Yesus ikofen fasaw faro si: "Mkoknon! Ayai ri, mkomkak awer!"
40014028	Inja Petrus dor faroi: "Manseren, aurya ido, wakofen ḇo yambran ro warya bori mufaḇe au."
40014029	Yesus ikofen: "Rwamuma!" Inja Petrus dado bur wai ya ma imbran ro war ya bori fa isrow Yesus.
40014030	Ḇape rofyor ḇyabir wam ya ipok, imkak ma iswarḇaḇ imbrur inja dar-dor: "Manseren, wafnoḇek aya!"
40014031	Yesus isawar fa iser i ma ikofen: "Ne, snonkaku ḇekyar mnis ḇa, snaro beḇirḇar?"
40014032	Raimnai suyek ro wai ya ma wam ya kako iḇrin.
40014033	Ma snonkaku ḇero wai ani sḇansuba faroi, soḇo: "Kaku ḇeri Rumkun Allah risoau."
40014034	Rofyor skofyafer kwar skorande ro Genesaret.
40014035	Rofyor kawasa ro mnu ani smamḇaḇir Yesus, sikofen ḇayir i ro sup ani ḇesiper. Inja ssun ḇeduf sesi kam faro Yesus.
40014036	Sor faro i insa span monda ro syatu pusyom ḇyena. Ma snonkaku ḇepan roi isya siprei kam.
40015001	Ḇarpur ya Farisi ono kuker ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ḇeraker Yerusalem srama faro Yesus ma sikofen:
40015002	"Snaro manfamyan ḇesi sḇeyuk rari ro kpu koḇesi? Snaro sḇan siḇrasna ḇa ro fafisu sanan?"
40015003	Ḇape Yesus kyarem faro si: "Snaro mko kako mkakḇeyuk Allah sasoser ḇyena ḇekur kako rari kpu mkoḇesi?
40015004	Snar Allah ikofen: Besyowi snami ma kmami; ma oso wer: Mansei ḇefras snari roḇa kmari ikada ismai samamyai marmar.
40015005	Ḇape mko kada mkoḇo: Mansei ḇekofen faro snari ma kmari: Rosai yasma na fa yaḇuk ḇesyowi mu, yaḇukna nfarser kwar faro Allah,
40015006	snonkaku ani ikada ḇyesyowi snari ma kmari ḇa. Rarirya Allah wos ḇyena mkoḇeuser naba snar rari mankun mkoḇena.
40015007	Ne, snonkaku ḇemarares Kaku ḇeri ro Nabi Yesaya ḇardadi ḇyedi ḇekur mko:
40015008	Er ine som Aya kuker sḇardip monda, Mḇoi sisnesna kada nbinkwan bur Aya.
40015009	Fromo monda kakyar ma nadi sena faro Aya, snar farkarkor ssḇuk farkor na sasoser snonkaku monda."
40015010	Raimnai Yesus dor snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi ma ikofen faro si:
40015011	"Mkomnaf ma mkokara pyum: Roi ḇesun ro sḇadon naiso ḇeḇemamas snonkaku sya ḇa, mḇoi roi ḇesasyar ro sḇadon naiso ḇeḇemamas snonkaku."
40015012	Ma manfamyan ḇyesi sra ma sifuken faro i: "Wafawi kwarke wos wakofen na nekarui ḇekarkar faro Farisi ansi?"
40015013	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Rokaker Kma yedi ro boiyas kyerḇa na, nari neḇepas kuker rares ḇyena kam.
40015014	Mkomam monda si. Si snonkaku ḇepraf ḇekfin ḇepraf sya. Rofyor snon ḇepraf oso ikfin min ḇepraf oso, nari susapi ro der."
40015015	Raimnai Petrus ikofen faro Yesus: "Wakofen ḇayir sarḇer ine faro nko."
40015016	Yesus kyarem: "Mko kako mkakfawi ḇayim sarḇer ani?
40015017	Mkofawiḇake roi ḇeḇor ḇesun ro sḇadon nsun pdef ḇesnewar raimnai sisawen na ro akyek?
40015018	Ḇape rosai ḇesasyar ro sḇadon neknam ro sne ma naiso ḇefrur mamas snonkaku.
40015019	Snar ro sne iso ḇekara swaruser ḇeḇyeḇa, mamun, farḇakbuk rmomen, karaw, soar ankar ma anonef.
40015020	Naiso ḇefrur mamas snonkaku. Ḇape kanan kuker ḇramin ḇeḇan ḇa, ikada ḇyemamas snonkaku ḇa."
40015021	Raimnai Yesus kyaḇerbur ro dia ḇe sup Tirus ma Sidon.
40015022	Bin Kanaan oso ro sup ani ryama ma dor: "Waswar aya, o Manseren, Romawa Daud, snar inai yedi rur ḇemaḇak ya iswoḇer i isof ḇyenyawa ḇa."
40015023	Ḇape Yesus kyarem wos oso faro i ḇa. Raimnai manfamyan ḇyesi srama ma sor faro Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Wawan i fa ibur, snar iyawuser koḇo dor ḇesya kwari."
40015024	Yesus kyarem: "Yasma wawan monda faro domba-domba ḇeḇor ro fandu er Israel."
40015025	Ḇape bin ani fyanam Yesus ma ḇyansuba faro i ma ikofen: "Manseren wafnoḇek aya."
40015026	Ḇape Yesus kyarem: "Kopok kun roḇean ḇefasos faro romawa sya ma neḇesawen faro make sya ḇa."
40015027	Bin ani ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Kaku ḇaboi Manseren, ḇape makei ya dakan kako roḇean mom-mom ḇesapi ro meja tuan ḇyedi."
40015028	Inja Yesus kyarem ma ikofen faro i: "Ne, awino, kakyar bedi iba, rarirya roi wor ani wasmai raris moḇ wamarisen rai." Ma ro fafisu ani beri inai ḇyedi iprei.
40015029	Fafisu sskobur supya fyor ani kwar, Yesus imbran sye danosen Galilea ma dek ro urek oso ma kyain ro dia.
40015030	Fyoroḇa kawasa sibor semarani ḇo srama ḇe I ma ssun snonkaku ḇepapipen, manis, ḇepraf, awer ma ḇese sibor wer, ma srir si ro ḇarpon Yesus ma ḇyuk pararei faro sikam.
40015031	Rarirya kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sikandor snar smam awer sya sawawos, manis sya siprei, ḇepapipen sya simbran, ḇepraf sya smam, ma rarirya si sandik Allah Israel.
40015032	Raimnai Yesus dor manfamyan ḇyesi ma ikofen: "Sneri iswar kuf kawasa ḇeḇor ansine. Ras rikior kwar siso aya ma nanano kyur siḇa. Yamewer yawan si fa sibur kuker basbiser, nari simsoi ro nyan ya bori."
40015033	Manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faro i, ḇo soḇo: "Rariso moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa ine kosma roḇeyan fa koḇukfan snonkaku ḇeḇor ansine?"
40015034	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Mkosma roḇeyan ri ḇeso?" Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Mamami rifik ma in kasun ono sisya kako."
40015035	Raimnai Yesus iwan kawasa ḇeḇor ansi fa skain ro saprop ya bori.
40015036	Raimnai dun mamami rifik anna kuker in ansi, ikofen kasumasa, raimnai pyanasnis na ma ḇyuk na faro manfamyan ḇyesi, fa manfamyan ḇyesi sakḇuk na faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi.
40015037	Ma sikam sanan isof sarḇor. Ḇarpur ya siryur mamami ker-ker ḇedawer na, sismai noken rifik nafo.
40015038	Snonkaku ḇeyanan ansi kam sesyaran rifiak, bin ma romawa sya seḇeyakkor ḇa.
40015039	Raimnai Yesus iwan snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi fa sibur. Ikada dek ro wai ma skopaw ḇesup Magadan.
40016001	Ḇarpur ya snon Farisi ma Saduki ono srama simarisen sifuken sye Yesus. Sor insa Yesus fyasnai faro si aḇyair oso ro boiyaswa.
40016002	Ḇape Yesus kyarem faro si: "Ro mandira snar rep na narik, inja mkoḇo: Ras ya nari iḇrin,
40016003	ma ro arwo babo snar rep na narik ma nkadum, inja mkoḇo nari rasya ipyum ba. Sananai nanki mkofawi mkomambir na ḇape aḇyair awar mkofawi na ḇa.
40016004	Syos ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇeso mnisḇa sine senamu sor aḇyair oso. Ḇape faro si nari koḇuk aḇyair oso ḇa derer aḇyair Nabi Yunus." Raimnai Yesus ibur si.
40016005	Rofyor Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi skaḇoruk danosen, sfanander sun mamami.
40016006	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Mkepen ma mkoḇesasor mko ro mur Farisi ma Saduki."
40016007	Ma skara ro mankunsi ma sikofenyae faro si: "Ikofen rarirya snar kun mamami ḇa."
40016008	Ma ro fafisu Yesus ifawi rosai ḇefnai fa sawosyae si, inja ikofen: "Snaro mkawawos ro mkun mamami ḇa?
40016009	Ne, snonkaku ḇekyar mnis ḇa! Mkofawi ḇaimke? Mkoswarepen ḇake mamami ririm faro snonkaku syaran ririm ma mkoryur bedawer na noken ri ḇeso?
40016010	Roḇaido mamami rifik faro snon syaran rifiak ma bedawer na mkoryur na ro inoken ri ḇeso?
40016011	Rariso mkofawiḇa ḇo mkoḇo yawos ro mamami, mamami naiso yakofen na ḇa. Yakofen faro mko: Mkoḇesasor ma mkepen mko ro mur kawasa Farisi ma Saduki."
40016012	Ro fafisu ya insape sifawi Yesus dawos insa sepen si ro mur mamami ḇa, ḇoi ro farkarkor snon Farisi ma Saduki.
40016013	Yesus ryama kwar ro Kaisarea Filipi, ifuken faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Kawasa sya soḇo, manseiso Rumkun Snonkaku ya?"
40016014	Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Ono sikofen: Yohanes Ḇemasi, ono wer sikofen: Elia ma ono kako sikofen: Yermia roḇaido oso ro fandu nabisya."
40016015	Raimnai Yesus ifuken faro si: "Ḇape mko kada rosai mkakkofen, manseiso aya?"
40016016	Inja Simon Petrus kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Au kada Wairek Rumkun Allah ḇekenem!"
40016017	Yesus ikofen faro i: "Aski faro au Simon Yunus mandaḇen ḇyedi snar snonkaku riso ḇekofen ḇadir faro au ya ḇa, ḇoi Kma yedi ro boiyaswa.
40016018	Ma aya kako yakofen faro au: Au irya Petrus ma ro karui orḇom ine nari yaḇawes jemaat ayedi ma mun aibui ipok i ḇa.
40016019	Faro au nari yaḇuk asyopder ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa. Rosai fes ro supswan ine nari neḇefes ro boiyas ma rosai per ro supswan ine nari neḇeper ro boiyaswa."
40016020	Raimnai Yesus myunwark manfamyan ḇyesi insa sikofen ḇayir awer faro manseirya wer mḇoi irya Wairek.
40016021	Rofyor ani Yesus ikofen ḇayir randak faro manfamyan ḇyesi nari ryaḇe Yerusalem ma ro diwa isma kandera nabor ro ḇeḇarara, mananir imam ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya, isof smun i ḇape nari ḇyeḇeḇawes ro ras ḇeḇekior ya.
40016022	Ḇape Petrus pyaw Yesus fa isoi ma isonek i, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, Allah myam monda awer roi ḇera dine! Roi ḇeḇesya ani ipok kyur awer au."
40016023	Inja Yesus iknenef ma ikofen faro Petrus: "Biris wabur. Au karui ḇekarkar aya, snar kwara karkara Allah ḇyena ḇa, ḇoi karkara snonkaku."
40016024	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mansei ḇemarisen ḇeso aya, fyamyun mankundi, ḇoi ḇyar aprop ḇyedi ma iso aya.
40016025	Snar mansei ḇeḇekuker kankenem ḇyedi, ikada nari kankenem ḇyedi ryo bur i; ḇape mansei kankenem ḇyedi ryobur i snar aya, ikada nari ismai kankenem ḇyedi.
40016026	Fandun rosai snonkaku oso isma supswan ine ḇesiper ḇape kankenem ḇyedi ryobur i? Inja rosai nari koḇuki syadweri ya?
40016027	Snar Rumkun Snonkaku nari ryama kuker payamyum Kmari ma malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi siyaker i; rofyor ani nari myunsu faro snonkaku oser-oser raris rosai ifrur kwar.
40016028	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri ro fandu snonkaku ḇeryur sine ono nari simar ḇa isof sakmam Rumkun Snonkaku ryama raris wairek ro Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi."
40017001	Ras riwonem nande Yesus dun Petrus, Yakobus ma naek ḇyedi Yohanes, skofnoḇek I ḇo skek bon ḇekaki oso. Ro bon ani bori skerer ḇaken.
40017002	Fafisu ya Yesus fyadwer mankundi ro ḇarpon skoḇena; Ḇarpon ḇyedi isnai imnis ori ma sansun ḇyena napioper karḇas imnis isnai.
40017003	Skomam wer Moses ma Elia suyawawos kuker I.
40017004	Petrus ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, aski ḇefnakḇa nkoisya ro moḇ ine. Inja wamarisen kada, yafrur aḇdares rikior ro dine, oso faro Au, oso faro Moses ma oso wer faro Elia."
40017005	Ma rofyor Yesus dawawos kaker, kuker arḇeḇer mandif ḇesna oso isabu fa iswoḇer sko ma ro mandif ani skomnaf mkaren oso ikofen: "Ine Rumkun yaswar kakurirya, faro I sneri imarisen, iḇye mkomnaf I."
40017006	Manfamyan ḇyesi simnaf rarirya simkak kaku ḇo skain wepur ma sḇansuba.
40017007	Raimnai Yesus ryama pyan ro sko ḇo ikofen: "Mkoyor mko, mkomkak awer!"
40017008	Ma ro fafisu sko kanow skoḇrusna, skomam snonkaku oso ḇa ḇoi Yesus derer.
40017009	Ro fafisu skado ro bon ani, Yesus danun faro sko: "Mkofarfyar awer mamam ani faro snonkaku osoḇa beri rofyor Rumkun Snonkaku ḇyeḇeḇawes ḇaim ro fandu ḇemar sya."
40017010	Raimnai manfamyan ḇyesi sifuken faro i, ḇo soḇo: "Rarirya ido snaro ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi soḇo, nari Elia ryama resari?"
40017011	Yesus kyarem: "Kaku nari Elia ryama fa fyasos roi ḇeḇor nakam
40017012	ma yakofen faro mko: Elia ryama kwar, fama snonkaku sya smambir iba, ma sifrur faro i raris marisen sena. Rarirya kako Rumkun Snonkaku nari isma kandera ro si."
40017013	Ro fafisu ani manfamyan ansi sifawi Yesus dawawos ro Yohanes Ḇemasi.
40017014	Fafisu Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi skaḇer faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snon oso ryama faro Yesus ma ḇyansuba ḇo doḇo:
40017015	"Manseren, waswar romawa yedi. Iduf mandai ma ḇyekandera kaku. Fafisu ono isapi ro for ono wer isapi ro war.
40017016	Yuni kwar faro manfamyan ḇesi, ḇape sipok sifruri fa iprei ḇa."
40017017	Inja Yesus ikofen: "Ne, mko syos ḇekyar ḇa ma ḇeḇarḇor, fafisu rosai kaker nari yakain fandu mko? Fafisu rosai kaker nari yakḇaḇ asuser mko? Mkun romawa ani muma!"
40017018	Yesus ḇyewef rur ḇemaḇak ani, isof isasyar buri ma romawa ani iprei beri.
40017019	Ḇarpur ya ro fafisu Yesus derer manfamyan ḇyesi srama sifuken faro i: "Snaro rur ḇemaḇak ani nkopok nkoyawi ḇa?"
40017020	Ikofen faro si: "Snar mkokyar mnis ḇa. Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri rofyor mkosmai kakyar ḇeba ḇemnis sasawi mor monda nari mkokofen faro Urek ine: Wakren bur moḇ ine ḇe diwara, --ma urek ani nari ikren, ma roi oso ipok ḇyerer au ḇa. [
40017021	Dafduf mandai ine ḇyeḇeyaw monda kuker nadi ma farfor.]"
40017022	Rofyor Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi sisya kam ro Galilea, ikofen faro si: "Rumkun Snonkaku ya nari sḇoḇi faro snonkaku sya
40017023	ma nari smun i ḇape ro ras ḇeḇekior nari ḇyeḇeḇawes." Rofyor manfamyan ansi simnaf rarirya sisnesna nfafardun fafaya ḇa.
40017024	Ro fafisu Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi srama ro mnu Kapernaum ḇeyor som faro Rum Allah sya srama faro Petrus ma sikofen: "Rariso guru bedi nari ḇyak som dirham risuru ansuyake roḇa?"
40017025	Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇo: "Mḇoi nari ḇyake." Ma rofyor Petrus syun ro rum ya, Yesus ifuken ḇepon i: "Simon wakkarai rariso? Faro manseisi wairek-wairek supswan ine ssun som? Faro kawasa ḇyesike roḇaido ro snon mandaman sya?"
40017026	Petrus kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Ro mandaman sya!" Inja Yesus ikofen faro i: "Rarirya kawasa ḇyesi ma roḇa.
40017027	Ḇape insa koḇe karui ḇekarkar faro si awer, rwa swarera ro danosen. Ma in pos ḇepon ya wai sḇari, nari wasma pipi dirham rifiak ro i. Wun si ma buk faro si fabuk ḇakwarek aya ma au kako."
40018001	Rofyor ani manfamyan ansi srama faro Yesus ma sifuken: "Manseiso ḇeba syadi ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa?"
40018002	Inja Yesus dor romawa kasun oso fa dores fandu si raimnai ikofen:
40018003	"Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri rofyor mkombror ma mkomnis kuker romawa kasun ineḇa ido, nari mkopok mkosun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa ḇa.
40018004	Mḇoi mansei ḇerun sneri fa imnis romawa kasun ine, iso ḇeba syadi ro Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa.
40018005	Mansei ḇefaduru romawa kasun ḇeradine snar snonsnon Ayedi, ikada fyaduru Aya."
40018006	"Ḇape mansei ḇeḇeninyan oser ḇaken ro romawa kasun ḇekyar faro Aya sine, iḇye wer sfes karui yas-yas oso ro sasukor ḇyedi ma simsawer i ro soren.
40018007	Supswan ryokada kuker ḇaḇeninyan ḇeḇor ḇyena: Mḇoi ḇaḇeninyan ya isya, ḇape snonkaku ḇeḇeninyan ya ryokada.
40018008	Rarirya rofyor ḇramin roḇa wemin besi oso ḇyeninyan au, kwaruk i ma wasawen i, snar ipyum syadi faro au fa swun ro kankenem ya kuker ḇaramuk roḇa bemanis ro wasararir kuker ḇramin besuya ma wemin besuya ḇo si sawen au ro for ḇemḇrerḇa.
40018009	Na rofyor mka besu ya oso ḇyeninyan au, weri ma wasawen i, snar ipyum syadi faro au fa swun ro kankenem ya kuker mka oser ro bemka risuru ḇo sisawen au ro for ḇembrerḇa.
40018010	Mkoswarepen, ro karkara mkoḇena mkorun awer oso ro romawa kasun sine. Snar yakofen faro mko: Malaikat sesi sisya ro boiyaswa ḇemam Mami ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇesyakwar ro boiyaswa. [
40018011	Snar Rumkun Snonkaku ryama fa ḇyuk aski faro snonkaku ḇeḇor sya.]"
40018012	"Rariso karkara ḇedi? Rofyor snonkaku oso ismai domba utin oser, ma oso ro si iḇor, rariso nari ryirḇake samfur risiw seser risiw ansi ro ḇonya ḇo rya syewar ḇeḇor ani?
40018013	Ma yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri rofyor ismai, raryaḇ ḇyedi iba syadi snar oser ani, ro samfur risiw seser risiw ḇeḇorḇa ansi.
40018014	Rarirya kako Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyas imarisenḇa fa oser ro romawa sine iḇor."
40018015	"Rofyor naek bedi ifrur sasar, wasoneki ro fafisu muyerer. Rofyor imnaf anun bena rarirya wasma kaḇer naek bani wer.
40018016	Rofyor imnaf auḇa, wun snonkaku oser roḇa suru wer, insa farkarkor ro snonkaku risuru roḇa kior ḇeḇesaksi ro wawos ani ḇyeḇeyawos namuk kwar.
40018017	Rofyor fyandun siḇa, mkun wawos anna faro jemaat. Ma rofyor imewer imnaf jemaat kako, ikada komam i imnis snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇa roḇaido imnis snon ḇeyor som.
40018018	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri rosai mkofes ro supswan ine nari neḇefes ro boiyas ma rosai mkoper ro supswan ine nari neḇeper ro boiyas.
40018019	Ma yakofen wer faro mko: Rofyor snonkaku risuru ro fandu mko ro supswan ine suḇe sne oser fa suyor rosairya kaker, fararyor suḇedi Kma yedi ro boiyaswa nari ḇyuki faro su.
40018020	Snar ro moḇsai snonkaku risuru roḇa kior siryur kuker Snori, ro moḇ ani Aya isya ro fandu si."
40018021	Ḇarpurya Petrus ryama ikofen faro Yesus: "Manseren, nari yaḇuk ampun ḇefis faro naek yedi ḇefrur sasar maro aya? Isof ḇefikke?"
40018022	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Roḇa! Yakofen faro au: Isof ḇe fikḇa, mḇoi isof samfur rifik ḇe fik.
40018023	Snar Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis raris wairek oso ḇemarisen ḇefrur karkor kuker manfamyan ḇyesi.
40018024	Rofyor irandak kwar kuker karkor ani, ssun faroi snon oso ḇeḇenyaki talenta syaran samfur.
40018025	Ḇape snon ani ipok fa ḇyak nyaki ḇyenaḇa, inja wairek ani ḇyuk sasoser insa sḇoḇi kuker kina ḇyena ma nana ḇeḇor ḇyena kam fa sḇukḇak nyaki ḇyena.
40018026	Ḇape manfamyan ani ḇyansuba ma syom wairek ani ḇo ikofen: Wakḇaḇ aya resari, nyaki ḇeḇor ayena kam nari yaḇak pres na.
40018027	Inja saswar ya dek ro wairek ani sneri faro manfamyan ani, isof ipyos nyaki ḇyena ma ḇyemkei i.
40018028	Ḇape rofyor manfamyan ani isasyar, isrow manfamyan ḇese wer ḇeḇenyaki faroi dinar utin oser. Iserepen i ma damkoser min ḇyani sasukor ḇyedi, ḇo ikofen: Bak nyaki bena!
40018029	Ma min ḇyani ḇyansuba ḇo dor faroi: Wakḇaḇ aya resari, nyaki ayena nari yaḇak nakam.
40018030	Ḇape fyandunḇa ḇoi ḇyemin ḇyani fa ismai ro bui isof ḇyakpres nyaki ḇyena.
40018031	Min ḇese ḇyesi smam rarirya sisnesna nfafardun ma sra sikofen ḇayir roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya anna faro tuan sani.
40018032	Wairek ani iwan fa sor snon ani ma ikofen faroi: Ne, manfamyan ḇeḇarḇor, nyaki bena kam yapyosna kwar snar wor kwar ro aya.
40018033	Snaro au kako wakswar min bediḇa imnis moḇ yaswar au raya?
40018034	Inja tuan ḇyani imsori ma ḇyuki faro ḇewaren ḇui, isof ḇyak pres nyaki ḇyena.
40018035	Inja Kma yedi ro boiyaswa nari dakfrur rarirya kako faro mko, rofyor mkono oser-oser ḇyuk ampunḇa faro naek ḇyedi kuker sne ḇesiper."
40019001	Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor posa kwar, ibur ro Galilea ma syuḇer ro Yudea ro war Yordan ḇarya.
40019002	Kawasa sibor semarani ḇo siso i ma ḇyuk pararei faro si rodia.
40019003	Snon Farisi ono srama faro Yesus fa sifrowes sas i. Sifuken: "Iḇyeke snon oso fyaspar swari kuker knam famfnom monda?"
40019004	Yesus kyarem: "Mkowasya ḇake, ḇefrur snonkaku sya ro randak ya ifrur snon ma bin?
40019005	Ma ikofen: Rarirya snonya nari ibur snari ma kmari ma ḇyeoser kuker swari, isof sukam suḇe ḇaken oser.
40019006	Rarirya suḇe suru werḇa ḇoi suḇe oser. Inja, rosai Allah ḇyefa ḇeḇeoser kwar, snonkaku sipok sfaspar i ḇa."
40019007	Sikofen faroi: "Rarirya ido, snaro Moses ḇyuk sasoser fa ssḇuk syap faspar rofyor snon oso fyaspar swari?"
40019008	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Snar mkosnemna npakrek eḇedari Moses ḇyuk fa mkofaspar swa mkoḇesi, ḇape ro randak ya raririrya ḇa.
40019009	Ḇape yakofen faro mko: Mansei ḇefaspar swari, mḇoi swari ifrur farḇakbuk ḇa, raimnai ḇyuk bin oso ḇese, ikada ifrur farḇuk."
40019010	Manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faro i: "Rofyor ḇaḇeoser fakawinya ryarirya ido, ipyum syadi fakawino awer."
40019011	Rarirya ikofen faro si: "Kawasa sipok sifawi kam wos ineḇa, derer faro snonkaku ḇesma fakamaman sya.
40019012	Snon ono sisya sipok sfakawin ḇa snar spansnasem rofyor sisnassi saḇen si ḇayim, ma snon ono sḇeḇekar, ma snon ono wer mankunsi sifrur rarirya snar Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa. Mansei ḇepok ḇefawi ido ikada ifawi."
40019013	Raimnai snonkaku ansi ssun faro Yesus roma kapira ono, insa isawardofen si ma ḇyenadi kuker si; ḇape manfamyan ḇyesi simsor snonkaku ansi.
40019014	Ḇape Yesus ikofen: "Mkorir romawa kapira ansi, srama faro aya ḇo mkodwarek awer si; snar snonkaku ḇemnis sisya siso ḇena Ḇaḇesasoserro Boiyaswa."
40019015	Raimnai isawardofen si posa ḇarpur ya ibur moḇ ani.
40019016	Snon oso ryama faro Yesus ma ikofen: "Guru, fararur syowi rosaiso nari yafrur insa yaksmai kankenem ḇemnaiḇa ya?"
40019017	Yesus kyarem: "Snaro wafuken Aya ro mnuk rosai ḇeḇye ya? Derer oser monda ḇeḇye ya. Ḇape rofyor wamarisen waksun ro kankenemya ido beuser Allah sasoser ḇyena kam."
40019018	Snon ani ikofen faro I: "Sasoser rosai ḇeḇesyani?" Yesus ikofen: "Mamun awer, wafrur farḇuk awer, kwaraw awer, ḇesaksi ankarkar awer,
40019019	ḇesyowi snami ma kmami ma waswar min besi ḇese imnis waswar mankundaw."
40019020	Snonkḇor ani ikofen faro i: "Nakam yaḇeuser na kwar, rosai ḇemnisḇa kaker ya?"
40019021	Yesus ikofen faro i: "Rofyor wamarisen wafrur imnis ido, rwamura, ḇoḇ nana ḇeḇor bena ma bukna faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sya, rarirya nari wasmai nana ro boiyas, ḇarpurya rwamuma ma waso Aya."
40019022	Fafisu snonkbor ani imnaf wos anna, ibur kuker sne ḇefafardun, snar nana ḇyena nabor.
40019023	Yesus kofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Yakofen faro mko; kaku ḇeri syamswen kaku faro snon ḇenana oso fa daksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser ro Boiyaswa.
40019024	Yakofen wer faro mko, ipyan syadi onta oso syun ro wairusmkir ya ro snon ḇenana oso syun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
40019025	Ro fafisu manfamyan sya simnaf rarirya, sikḇiresma sikofen: "Rofyor raririrya ido nari mansei ḇesma koreri ya?"
40019026	Yesus myam si ma ikofen: "Faro snonkaku roi nane ndariryaḇa, ḇape faro Allah roi ḇeḇor kam ndarirya."
40019027	Raimnai Petrus kyarem ma ikofen faro Yesus: "Inko ine inkobur kam roi ḇeḇor inkoḇena kwar ma inkoso Au; inja ḇaḇyak rosaiso nari inko isma ya?"
