40019028	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri rofyor awar babo ro fafisu Rumkun Snonkaku ya dek ro karapesa nasanḇyedi, mko ine, ḇeso Aya kwar, nari mkokain kako ro karapesa samfur seser risuru fa mkakḇe mankara keret samfur seser risuru ro er Israel.
40019029	Ma mansesi ḇebur kwar rum sena, roḇa naek ma srar sesi, roḇa sna ma kma sesi, roḇa romawa sesi, roḇa yaf sena snar Aya, snon ani nari isma kaḇer utin ḇeutin ma nari isma kankenem ḇemnaiḇa ya.
40019030	Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor ḇepon sya nari spupes, ma ḇepupes sya nari spon."
40020001	"Snar Ḇaḇesasoser ro Boiyaswa imnis tuan ḇena rum oso isasyar ro arwo prim kaku fa syewar snonkaku ono fa sifararur ro yaf anggur ḇyedi.
40020002	Rofyor nyawosi kuker snonkaku ansi kwar ro ḇaḇyak sedi dinar oser ro ras oser, posa iwan siḇe yaf anggur ḇyedi.
40020003	Indokada oras siw arwo isasyar wer ma isrow snonkaku ono sarores monda ro pasar.
40020004	Ikofen faro si: Mkora mkakfararur kako ro yaf anggur ayedi, ma nari yaḇak pyum mko. Ma sikako sakra.
40020005	Indokada oras samfur seser risuru ma oras kior mandira ya kako isasyar ma syewar ḇefararur ono wer.
40020006	Indokada oras rim mandira isasyar wer ma isrow snonkaku ono wer, inja ikofen faro si: Snaro mkarores monda ro dine ro ras ḇesiper ine?
40020007	Sikofen faroi: Snar snonkaku ono ssḇuk fararur faro nko ḇa. Ikofen faro si: Mkora kako ḇe yaf anggur ayedi.
40020008	Fafisu mandira kwar tuan ani ikofen faro manwadwaren yaf ya: Wor ḇefararur ansi ma baksi, bak ḇepon ḇesun papupes sya isof ḇesun ḇepon sya.
40020009	Inja ḇefararur ro indokada oras rim sya srama ḇyaksi ma oser-oser isma dinar oser.
40020010	Ḇarpur ya ḇefararur ḇepon ansi sakrama, skara soḇo nari sismai syadi, ḇape sikako oser-oser ismai dinar oser kako.
40020011	Fafisu sisma ḇaḇyak sedi, sikada surem faro tuan ani,
40020012	soḇo: Ḇesun papupes sine sifararur oras oser monda ḇesyaḇo baksi imnis kuker inko, ḇefararur marḇak ras ḇesiper ma ḇerires dares pnas ro ori.
40020013	Ḇape tuan ani kyarem faro oso ro si, ḇo _doḇo: Naek, yafrur sasar faro au ḇa. Rariso kuna wosi kwar kuker ḇaḇyak dinar oser ro ras oser?
40020014	Wun rarwas ḇedi ḇo wabur; yamarisen yaḇuk faro ḇesun papupes ani imnis kuker yaḇuk faro au.
40020015	Ipyumḇake yafrur marisen ro sneri kuker nana yena? Roḇaido wamsor, snar yafrur pyum?
40020016	Rarirya kako snonkaku ḇepupes sya nari spon ma ḇepon sya nari spur."
40020017	Fafisu Yesus ryaḇe Yerusalem, dor ḇardi manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyesi ma ikofen faro si ro nyanya faduri:
40020018	"Knikine kora ḇe Yerusalem ma Rumkun Snonkaku nari sḇoḇi faro mananir imam-imam ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya, ma nari ssḇuk samamyai marmar faro i.
40020019	Ma nari ssḇuki faro er-er ḇefawi Allah ḇa sya, insa sonef i, siprer i ma spai i ro aprop, ma ro ras ḇeḇekior ya nari ḇyeḇeḇawes."
40020020	Raimnai Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesu fnoḇek sna suḇedi skora faro Yesus, ma sna suḇedi ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi fa dor roi oso ro i.
40020021	Yesus ikofen: "Rosai wamarisen ya?" Kyarem, ḇo _doḇo: "Buk sasoser, insa romawa ayesuine sukain ro Ḇaḇesasoser bedi, sumindi ro ḇar raku ma sumin ya ro ḇar rasar ḇedi."
40020022	Ḇape Yesus kyarem, ḇo ikofen: "Mkofawi ḇa rosaiso mkor ya. Mḇoi nari mkakinem sek aninem yinem ya?" Sukofen faro Yesus: "Mḇoi rarirya."
40020023	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Sek aninem yedi, mḇoi nari mkakinem i, ḇape kankain ro ḇar raku ma ḇar rasar ayedi, yapok fa yaḇuki ḇa. Ine nari ḇyeḇeḇuk faro snonkaku mansesi Kma yedi fyasos kwar sya."
40020024	Manfamyan samfur ḇese ansi simnaf rarirya simsor faro mambekanaek ansu ya.
40020025	Ḇape Yesus dor si ma ikofen: "Mkofawi ḇaḇesasoser er-er sya, ssḇuk sasoser faro kawasa kuker ḇramin mankarmomen ma ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara sya sewayam si kuker pakakrek.
40020026	Rariryaḇa fandu mko. Mansei ḇemarisen ḇeba ro fandu mko, iḇye duf farmyan mko,
40020027	ma mansei ḇemarisen ḇeḇemananir fandu mko, iḇye ḇye manfamyan ḇe mko;
40020028	imnis raris Rumkon Snonkaku ryama insa suf farmyan i ḇa, mḇoi insa duf farmyan ma insa ḇyuk kankenem ḇyedi fa ḇyukḇak namuk kawasa ḇeḇor."
40020029	Ro fafisu Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesi sisasyar ro mnu Yerikho, kawasa sibor semarani ḇo siso i.
40020030	Snon ḇepraf risuru suisya sukain ro nyan andir ya, ma sumnaf, Yesus imbranuk, inja suyor ḇo suyoḇo: "Manseren, Rumkun Daud, waswar nu!"
40020031	Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sewef su insa suḇefasis. Ḇesyaḇo insape ssubras syadi wer, suyoḇo: "Manseren, romawa Daud, waswar nu!"
40020032	Inja Yesus dores kan ma dor su. Ikofen: "Rosaiso mumarisen insa yafrur faro mu?"
40020033	Sukarem, ḇo suyoḇo: "Manseren, numarisen insa numam wer."
40020034	Rarirya saswar ya dek ro Yesus sneri, inja pyan ro sumkasna ma ro fafisu ya kako sumam beri ma suso I.
40021001	Fafisu Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi sfanam kwar Yerusalem ma srama ro Betfage ro urek Zaitun, Yesus iwan snon risuru ro manfamyan ḇyesi kuker anun:
40021002	"Muraḇe mnu ḇero ḇarpon muḇedi, ma ro diwa nari musrow keledai bin oso ḇyeḇefes ma mkun ḇyedi isya ro risḇyedi. Muper keledai ani ma muyuni muma faro Aya.
40021003	Ma rofyor snonkaku ono sifuken mu, mokofen faro si: Manseren ḇyefanduni. Nari isiḇer i fasaw wer."
40021004	Roi ḇeḇesya ine ryarirya insa ḇardi nabiya ḇyaryas ani imnis:
40021005	"Mkokofen faro imfun Sion: Mamkada, Wairek bedi ryama faro au, Ikada fyafir ma ḇyeaḇaḇen ma dek ro keledai oso, keledai kuḇ babo."
40021006	Inja manfamyan ansuya sura ma sufrur raris moḇ rosai Yesus ḇyuk kwar faro su.
40021007	Suyun keledai bin ani fnoḇek mkun ḇyedi, ma sḇor keledai ani dokor ḇyedi kuker sansun sena ma Yesus dek fa kyain roi.
40021008	Kawasa ḇeḇor sḇor sansun sena ro sampakya, ma ḇesesya wer skaruk airam ono fa skekna ro sampak ya kako.
40021009	Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ḇesoi sya ḇembran ro ḇarpon ma ḇarpur Yesus ssibras, soḇo: "Aski faro Rumkun Daud, I ḇesma ḇok ḇerama kuker Manseren snori, aski ro moḇ ḇekaki syadi!"
40021010	Rofyor syun ro Yerusalem, mnu ḇeba ani imbrus ma kawasa ansi sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku saisoine?"
40021011	Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi skarem: "Ine nabi Yesus ro Nazaret ro sup Galilea."
40021012	Raimnai Yesus syun ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma iyaw snonkaku kam ḇefarḇaḇyan ro Allah Rum ḇyedi rawndi sya. Pyamḇar meja-meja sḇuksadwer pipi na ma bangku-bangku ro snonkaku ḇeḇoḇ manjawa sya.
40021013	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro si: "Fas-fas isya: Rum Ayedi nari snir iḇe rum-nadi. Ḇape mkokada mkofrur iḇe nas snonkaku ḇemamun."
40021014	Rarirya ḇepraf sya ma manis sya srama faroi ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma ḇyuk pararei faro si.
40021015	Ḇape rofyor mananir imam-imam ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi smam aḇyair kanandor ifrur na ma romawa-romawa ḇebras ro Allah Rum ḇyedi sya: "Aski faro Rumkun Daud!"
40021016	Sisnesna namsor, ma sikofen faroi: "Wamnaf romawa sine roi sikofen na?" Yesus ikofen faro si: "Yamnaf; mkowasya ḇaimke: Ro sḇadon romawa makḇoi ma romawa ḇeyinem sus fasos kwar sanandik?"
40021017	Raimnai ibur si ma isasyar ro mnu ya fa ryaḇe Betania ma denef ro dia.
40021018	Ro arwori ro maran kyaḇer wer ḇe Yerusalem, Yesus ibiser.
40021019	Fanam nyanya Yesus myam ara knam oso inja imbran yoḇi fa syewar bon roi, ḇape ismai royo ḇa derer fyabairam monda. Inja Yesus ikofen faro ai knam ani: "Wapok wamarem wer ḇa isof fyoro-fyoro!" Ma ro fafisu ani beri ara knam ani myas.
40021020	Manfamyan ḇyesi smam roi ḇeḇesya ani sikandor, ma sikofen: "Rariso isof ara knam ani myas fasaw beri?"
40021021	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri rofyor mkokyar ma mkoḇe ḇirḇarḇa, nari mkofrur roi ḇeraris yafrur faro ara knam ani, dererḇa ḇoi rofyor mkokofen faro bon ine: Wakḇaken ma rwop randa wamsawer ro soren! nari ndarirya.
40021022	Ma rosairya wer mkor ro nadi kuker kakyar, nari mkosmai na."
40021023	Raimnai Yesus syun ḇe Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma fafisu fyarkor ro dia, mananir imam-imam kuker ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara er Yahudi srama faroi, ma sifuken: "Kuker papoik rosaiso bukfrur roi ḇera dine na? Ma manseiso ḇeḇuk papoik ani faro Au?"
40021024	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Aya kako nari yaḇuk fakfuken oso faro mko ma rofyor mkokarem i faro Aya, nari Aya kako yakkofen faro mko kuker papoik rosaiso yaḇuki ifrur roi annane kam ya.
40021025	Ḇakḇuk masi sren Yohanes ryama kero? Ryaker boiyaswake roḇa ryaker snonkakuke?" Sawos yae faro si, ma sikofen: "Rofyor kokofen: Ryamaker boiyaswa, nari ikofen faro ko: Rarirya ido, snaro mkokyar faro i ḇa?
40021026	Ḇape rofyor kokofen, ḇo koḇo: Ryamaker snonkaku, komkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snar sikam skara Yohanes ani nabi rirya."
40021027	Raimnai skarem faro Yesus: "Inko fawiḇa." Inja Yesus ikofen faro si: "Rarirya ido, Aya kako yakkofen faro mkoḇa kuker papoik rosaiso yaḇuki ifrur roi annane kam ya."
40021028	"Ḇape mko kara rariso: Snon oso ḇena romawa risuru. Rya faro romawa rak ya ma ikofen: Romawa jedi ras ine rwa wafararur ro yaf anggur.
40021029	Romawa ani kyarem: Mḇoi, mami. Ḇape rya ḇa.
40021030	Inja sinan ani ryawer faro romawa ḇeḇesuru ya ma ikofen rarirya kako. Ma romawa ani kyarem bo doḇe! Yamewer. Ḇape ḇarpurya fyafko ma rya.
40021031	Mansei ro fandu romawa ansu ya ḇeḇeuser kmari marisen ḇyedi?" Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Romawa ḇeḇesuru ya." Yesus ikofen faro si: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri ḇeyor som ma bin ḇefrur farḇuk nari spon mko fa ssun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
40021032	Snar Yohanes ryama fa fyasnai nyan ḇenapes faro mko, ḇape mko kyar i ḇa. Ḇape ḇeyor som ma bin-bin ḇefrur farḇakḇuk sikada sikyar faroi. Ḇape mkomam i ḇesyaḇo mkofafko ḇa ma mkokyar faro i ḇa kako."
40021033	"Mkomnaf sarḇer oso ḇese wer. Snon ḇena saprop oso dom yaf anggur raimnai kyeri ḇo dar werek i. Raimnai ḇyai der moḇ ḇekafos anggur ma ḇyawes kaderen ḇekaki fa sḇukwaren yaf ani. Raimnai ḇyeasas yaf ani faro ḇeḇuk sasureffa sifararur ro yaf ani ḇoi ryaḇe sup ḇese.
40021034	Fafisu afufanggur ya fyanam, iwan manfamyan ḇyesi faro ḇefararur ro yaf ani fa ssun rarwas ḇyedi ro anggur bon anna.
40021035	Ḇape ḇefararur ro yaf ani sfor manfamyan ḇyesi: siprer sia, smun sia ma sso sia kuker karui.
40021036	Ḇarpur ya tuan ani iwan manfamyan ono ḇese wer, sibor syadi ro ḇepon ansi, ḇape si kako sifrur si raris min sesi.
40021037	Ḇarpurya iwan romawa ḇyedi faro si, ḇo ikofen: Roma ḇyedi nari sararyof i.
40021038	Ḇape rofyor ḇefararur ro yaf ansi smam rumkun ḇyani, sawos yae faro si: Roma ine iso nari ḇeḇewaris yaf ine, mkorama komun i, insa kona waris ḇyedi.
40021039	Inja sfori ma sisawen i ḇe yaf ya ḇandiri posa smun i.
40021040	Rofyor tuan ḇena yaf ani ryama, rosaiso nari ifrur faro ḇefararur ro yaf ani?"
40021041	Sikofen faro i: "Nari myun snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ansi ma yaf anggur ani nari ḇyuki faro ḇeḇuk sasuref ono ḇese, sikada nari ssḇuk bon ro yaf ani faroi ro fafisu afuf ya."
40021042	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Mkowasya ḇaimke fas-fas ro Refo: Ḇefawi nananem ḇaḇawes rum, karui sisawen ya iso ḇeḇe karui dopir: roi ḇeḇesya ine ryama ro Manseren mun ḇyedi, roi ḇefrur kanandor ro ḇarpon komkasna.
40021043	Rarirya yakofen faro mko, nari Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ḇye ḇeyun bur mko ma nari ḇye ḇeḇuk faro er oso ḇeḇuk bon faro Ḇaḇesasoser ani. [
40021044	Mansesi ḇesapi ro karui ani, nari sekis-kis ma mansesi karui ani ḇyarek epen sya nari semnuk-mnuk.]"
40021045	Fafisu mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi ansi simnaf sarḇer Yesus ḇyani, sifawi siso Yesus syarḇer si.
40021046	Inja ssewar nyan insa sfori, ḇape simkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snar kawasa ḇeḇor ansi karkara sena I nabi rirya.
40022001	Raimnai Yesus dawos wer kuker sarḇer faro si:
40022002	"Ḇaḇesasoser ro Boiyaswa imnis raris wairek oso, ḇefrur munara fakawawin faro rumkun ḇyedi.
40022003	Iwan manfamyan ḇyesi fa sra sor snonkaku dor kwar fa ḇeso munara fakawawin ani, ḇape simewer sramari.
40022004	Iwan manfamyan ono ḇese wer, kuker ananun: Mko kofen faro snonkaku yor ansi: Kaku ḇeri, roḇean ayena yafasos na kwar, sapi snoman ma rofanfan yesi seḇekaruk kwar; nakam neḇefasos kwar, inja mkorama ḇemunara fakawawin ine.
40022005	Ḇape snonkaku dor ansi sefandun iba; ono sraḇe yaf sena, ono sraḇe sasewar sena,
40022006	ma ono wer sfor manfamyan ansi, sḇewayam ma smun si.
40022007	Rarirya wairek ani imsor, ma iwan sarar ḇyesi fa sra smun ḇemamun ansi ma sikun mnu sedi.
40022008	Posa kwar ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: Munara fakawawin ya ḇyeḇefasos kwar, ḇape snonkaku yor ansi sisyusḇa.
40022009	Inja mkora wer ḇenyan farsam nakam ma mkor snonkaku mkosrow ro diwa sya, mkun si faro munara fakawawin ine.
40022010	Rarirya manfyan ansi sra siryur snonkaku kam sisrow ro nyan diḇo, snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ma snonkaku ḇepyum, isof sim munara fakawawin ani ifo kuker dakam ansi.
40022011	Fafisu wairek ani syun fa isrow dakam ansi, myam snon oso daksansun sansun munara ḇa,
40022012	inja ikofen faroi: Ne, naek, snaro swun ro dine ḇoi waksansun sansun munara ḇa?
40022013	Ḇape snon ani ḇyefasis monda. Inja wairek ani ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: Mkofes wemin ma ḇramin ḇyesya ma mkosawen snon ani ḇemoḇ ḇepampan syadi, ro diwa kankanes ma arkfafais nakor naisya.
40022014	Snar sibor seḇeyor, ḇape skinfir sya sibor ḇa."
40022015	Ḇarpurya snon farisi ono sra sna awi fa ssewar nyan rariso sifrowes Yesus kuker fakfuken oso.
40022016	Siwan manfamyan sesi fnoḇek snon Herodian ono fa sifuken I: "Guru, inkofawi, Au snonkaku ḇenapes ma kuker napnapes ḇuk farkarkor ro Allah nyan ḇyena ma Au wamkak ḇa faro mansei rya wer, snar au swewar snonsnon ḇa.
40022017	Wakofen faro nko karkara bedi: Inja koḇak som faro Kaisarke roḇa?"
40022018	Ḇape Yesus ifawi sne ḇeḇarḇor sena inja, ikofen: "Snaro mkofrowes Aya, ne snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor?
40022019	Mkofasnai faro Aya pipi faro som ani." Inja ssun faroi dinar oser.
40022020	Ma ifuken faro si: "Kakop ma fas-fas mansei ḇyedi sine?"
40022021	Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Kakop ma fas-fas Kaisar." Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro si: "Mkoḇuk faro Kaisar rosai Kaisar dor ro mko ma mkoḇuk faro Allah rosai Allah dor ro mko."
40022022	Simnaf rarirya sikandor ma sisusu bur Yesus ma sibur beri.
40022023	Ro ras ani Saduki ono sra faro Yesus, ḇena karkara, aḇiḇer ya isya ḇa.
40022024	Sifuken faro I: "Guru, Moses ikofen, rofyor snon oso imar bur swari ḇoi suna romawaḇa, ḇedar ḇyedi ḇyuk bin ani insa ssuyaḇen romawa oso sadwer naek ḇyedi ḇemar ani.
40022025	Rarirya ro fandu inko mambekanaek rifik sisya. Ḇepon ya fyakawin, ḇape nya romawa osoḇa ḇo imar. Inja naek ḇyedi fyakawin bin ani insa ssuyaḇen sadwer naek ḇyedi ḇemar ani.
40022026	Rarirya kako ḇeḇesuru ma ḇeḇekior ya isof ḇeḇefik ya.
40022027	Ḇarpur ya sikam simar, ma bin ani kako dakmar.
40022028	Inja mansei ro fandu mambekanaek rifik ansi nari befakawin bin ani ro fafisu aḇiḇer ya? Snar sikam sfakawin kuker bin ani kwar."
40022029	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkosasar bos, snar mkofawi Refo ḇa, ma rarirya kako Allah papoik ḇyena!
40022030	Snar ro fafisu aḇiḇer ya snonkaku sfakawin ḇa, ḇoi sikenem imnis malaikat ro boiyaswa.
40022031	Ḇape ro mnuk aḇiḇer fandu ḇemar si mkowasya ḇake rosai Allah ikofen, radine:
40022032	Aya ine Allah Abraham, Allah Ishak ma Allah Yakub? Snar I Allah faro snonkaku ḇemar sya ḇa, ḇoi I Allah faro snonkaku ḇekenem sya."
40022033	Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇemnaf ansi sikandor farkarkor ḇyena.
40022034	Fafisu snon Farisi sya simnaf, Yesus isisen wark snon Saduki sya sisḇasna, inja siryur
40022035	ma oso ro si, isoine snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi, ifuken sas Yesus:
40022036	"Ne, Guru, sasoser rosaiso ḇeba syadi ro sasoser Refo Yahudi?"
40022037	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Waswar Manseren, Allah ḇedi, kuker snembri ḇesiper ma kuker rur bedi ḇesiper ma kuker karkara ḇena ḇesiper.
40022038	Ine sasoser ḇepon ma ḇeba syadi.
40022039	Ma sasoser ḇeḇesuru ḇemnis kuker sasoser ḇepon ani iso ine: Waswar min besi imnis waswar mankundaw.
40022040	Sasoser ansuine suiso ḇeḇeknam sasoser nakam ro Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi-nabi."
40022041	Fafisu snon Farisi ono sisya siryur, Yesus ifuken faro si, doḇo:
40022042	"Rariso karkara mkoḇena ro Wairek? Mansei rumkun ḇyedi rya?" Sikofen faro I: "Daud rumkun ḇyedi rya."
40022043	Yesus ikofen faro si: "Rofyor rarirya ido, snaro Daud ikofen kuker sḇayoi Rur ya ma dap iḇe Manseren ḇyedi, ro fafisu ikofen:
40022044	Manseren ikofen kwar faro Manseren yedi: kwainkada ro ḇar raku Yedi, isof Yarir mbroḇ besi fa waref epen si.
40022045	Inja rofyor Daud dapiḇe Manseren ḇyedi, rariso dapi ḇe rumkun ḇyedi wer?"
40022046	Snonkaku osoḇa kyarem faro I, ma randak ro ras ani snonkaku osoḇa beri ḇemku fa ḇefakfuken roi ono faro I.
40023001	Ma Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ma faro manfamyan ḇyesya, doḇo:
40023002	"Ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi skain kwar ro karapesa Moses.
40023003	Inja mkoso ma mkoḇeuser roi ḇeḇor sfarkor faro mko, ḇoi mkoso awer fararur sena, snar sfarkor na ḇape sifrur naba.
40023004	Sfes kamnam ḇemarḇak, raimnai srir na ro kawasa sya erdai sena, ḇape mankunsi ḇardi sakḇyunekro naba.
40023005	Fararur sifrur nakam, simarisen monda insa snonkaku smam na; imnis raris kaḇrai nadi ḇeḇam ma syatu sena pusyom ḇekwan na;
40023006	simarisen skain ro moḇ ḇekaki ro munara ma ro ḇarpon rum nadi;
40023007	simarisen sisma syom ro pasar ma simarisen sor siḇe Rabi.
40023008	Ḇape mko kada, sap awer mkoḇe Rabi; snar mkosma Rabi oser monda ma mko kam mkoḇe mambekanaek.
40023009	Ma mkap awer mansei ryakaker ḇe kma ro supswan ine, snar Kma oser monda faro mko, isoine Allah ro boiyaswa.
40023010	Sap awer mko kako ḇemanfarkin, snar Manfarkin oser monda faro mko, isoine Wairek.
40023011	Mansei ḇeba syadi ro fandu mko, iḇye wer duf farmyan mko.
40023012	Ma mansei ḇekanow mankundi, nari ḇyeḇepandun ma mansei ḇerun mankundi, nari ḇyeḇekanow.
40023013	Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkosisen kedwai Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa ro ḇarpon snonkaku. Snar mankun mko mkosun ḇa ma mko dadwarek ḇeḇesewar fa ḇesun sya. [
40023014	Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkoren kabom-kabom sya rum sena ma mkosisen wark mamam snonkaku kuker nadi ḇekwan mkoḇena. Inja nari mkosmai samamyai ḇemarḇak syadi.]
40023015	Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkokaḇor soren ma mko mbranuk sup, fa mkun snonkaku oser monda insa daksun ro agama mkoḇedi ma syun kwar, mkofrur iḇe romawa for ḇemḇrerḇa, ḇeḇarḇor syadi ḇe suru ro mankun mko.
40023016	Mkoroë, ne, manfarkin ḇepraf, ḇekofen: Soar imnis raris Rum Ari Ḇesren, soar ani dau roi oso ḇa; ḇape soar imnis raris brawen ro Rum Ari Ḇesren, soar ani iyaḇek.
40023017	Ne, mko snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa ma snonkaku ḇepraf, rosaiso ḇeḇefandun syadi, brawen roḇa Rum Ari Ḇesren ḇefasren brawen ansi?
40023018	Soar imnis raris rokef farsarser, soar ani daw roi oso ḇa; ḇape soar imnis raris farsarser ḇero rokef ya, soar ani iyaḇek.
40023019	Ne, mko snonkaku ḇepraf, rosai ḇeḇefandun syadi, farsarser roḇa rokef farsarser ḇefasren farsarser anna?
40023020	Inja mansei ḇesowar imnis raris rokef farsarser syowar imnis raris rokef farsarser ma kako imnis raris roi ḇeḇor kam ḇerir ro bori na.
40023021	Ma mansei ḇesowar imnis raris Rum Ari Ḇesren, syowar imnis raris Rum Ari Ḇesren ma kako imnis raris I, ḇekain ro rum ani.
40023022	Ma mansei ḇesowar imnis raris Boiyaswa, syowar imnis raris karapesa Allah ma kako imnis raris I, ḇekain ro karapesa ani.
40023023	Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro marisan, ampui ma konsop mkoḇak na, ḇape roi ḇeḇefandun syadi ro sasoser Refo Yahudi mkamdwerna, isoine: napnapes ma sawarwar ma ḇaḇeuser. Inja kofrur oser ma kopok kamdwer ḇese na ḇa.
40023024	Ne, mko manfarkin ḇepraf, papanursya mkoryan sibur aninem mkoḇena, ḇape onta ḇero aninem na mkoren si.
40023025	Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar skaninem ma ben ḇeyanan mkoḇan sren ḇandisi, ḇape donsi kada sifo kuker fasyar ma rmomen.
40023026	Ne, snon farisi ḇepraf, mkoḇan sren ḇepon sek aninem ya dori resari, rarirya nari ḇandiri kako daksren.
40023027	Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkomnis raris russauf kuker kamara ḇepyoper, ipyumra ḇandiri ro mamam, ḇape ro dori ifo kuker ḇemar kor ma buramek.
40023028	Rarirya kako mko, ro mamam snonkaku ro ḇandi mkonapes, ḇape ro mkodom na nafo kuker ḇarḇor ma sasar.
40023029	Mkoroë, ne, ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Farisi, ne, kawasa ḇeḇarḇor mko, snar mkoḇawes aḇerpapor ro nabi-nabi ma mkofamankor kakop rusro snonkaku ḇesren sya ma mkokofen:
40023030	Rofyor nko kenem ro awar kpu nkoḇesi kada nari nkakso si ḇa ro mamun smun nabi sya.
40023031	Ḇape rarirya ido mankun mko ḇardi mkoḇe saksi, mḇoi mkoḇe kpu ro ḇemun nabi ansi.
40023032	Inja, mkofamfon sasar ro kpu mkoḇesi!
40023033	Ne, mko ikak, ne, ikak ḇeknampu kpu ḇyesi! Rariso nari mkoper mankun mko ro samamyai for ḇembrer ḇa?
40023034	Inja, mkomam, Aya yawan faro mko nabi-nabi, ma snon ḇefawinananem ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi: ono ro si nari mkomun si ma mkopai si ro aprop, ono wer nari mko prer si ro rum-rum ari mkoḇena ma mkoḇewayam si ro mnu ḇe mnu.
40023035	Insa mko kamar rik ḇesbawer ro snonkaku ḇesasar ḇa, randak ro Habel snon ḇenapes ani, isof ro Zakharia Berekhya mandaḇendi, mkomun ro fandu moḇ ḇesren ma rokef farsarser.
40023036	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri roi ḇeḇor nane kam nari syosbabo ine siso ḇeḇar na!"
40023037	"Yerusalem, Yerusalem, au ḇemun nabi-nabi ma ḇeso si kuker karui snonkaku siwan yoḇ au sya! Rarwan nabor kwar yaswar kuf fa yafanjur romawa besi, imnis mankoko sinan ḇeryur mkun sesi ro prer ḇyesi baḇsi, ḇape mko mewer.
40023038	Mkomam rum mkoḇanine nari ḇyeḇebur ma ḇyeusḇa.
40023039	Ma Yakofen faro mko: Randak ro knikine nari mkomam Aya wer ḇa, isof mko kofen: Sanandik faro I ḇerama kuker Snonsnon Manseren!"
40024001	Raimnai Yesus isasyar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma rya. Manfamyan ḇyesi srama ma sfasnai payamyum ro Allah Rum ḇyedi.
40024002	Ikofen faro si: "Mkomam roi ḇeḇor anna kam? Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri nari karui oso ro dine ḇyeḇemam monda ḇa ḇo ḇyarek ro oso bori; nakam nari neḇekakok."
40024003	Fafisu Yesus kyain ro urek Zaitun bori, manfamyan ḇyesi srafaroi insa sawawos ro mankunsi kuker I. Sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Wakofen maro nko, fafisu rosaiso roi anna ne nari ndamuma ya ma aḇyair rosaiso ḇefasnai raramuma bedi ma aḇyair ḇefasna papupes supswan ya?"
40024004	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkepen mko insa snonkaku ono sfarkor ninyan awer mko!
40024005	Snar snonkaku sibor srama sap snori ma sikofen: Aya ine Wairek, ma nari sfarkor ninyan kawasa sibor.
40024006	Nari mkomnaf rakrok mbroḇ ma ḇaryas embroḇ. Rariryano mkepen mko, ma mkokarsosen awer; snar roi nane kam nari ndarirya resari, ḇape papupes ya ryama ḇaim.
40024007	Snar er nari sikḇawes sisampum er ḇese, ma ḇaḇesasoser sisampum ḇaḇesasoser ḇese na. Nari basbiser isya ma rim ḇeba nmun ro moḇ nabor.
40024008	Ḇape nakam insape kandera ḇemun randak ḇeyunḇe awar babo ya.
40024009	Rofyor ani nari ssḇuk mko fa sewayam ma smun mko ma nari er ḇeḇor kam sayin mko snar snonsnon Ayedi,
40024010	ma snonkaku sibor nari siwarki ma sḇoḇ yae si ma sayin yae si.
40024011	Nabi sararer sibor nari sikḇawes fa sfarkor ninyan kawasa sibor.
40024012	Ma snar sasar na, naba syadadi inja saswari ro snonkaku sibor ndoë.
40024013	Ḇape mansei ḇemku epen isof ḇarpur ya kada nari isma aski.
40024014	Ma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser ine nari ḇye ḇeḇaryas ro supswan ḇesiper fa ḇyesaksi faro er sya kam, raimnai insape awar papupes ya."
40024015	"Inja rofyor mkomam ḇarḇor ḇeḇyeḇa ndo moḇ ḇesren, raris Nabi Daniel ikofen kwar -- ḇeḇewasya mkokara pyum --
40024016	rarirya kawasa ro sup Yudea iḇye syadi sifrar sibur ḇe bon na.
40024017	Snonkaku ḇeyun wam ro kaderen ro rum ya bori ido awer fa dun roi oso ro rum ḇyedi,
40024018	ma snonkaku ḇero yaf kyaḇer awer fa dun sansun ḇyena.
40024019	Ara faḇye faro bin-bin ḇemoḇesḇa ma ḇesus romawa ro fafisu ani.
40024020	Mkoḇe nadi, insa rofyor mkofrar mkobur ya isrow awer fafisu prim ya ma isrow awer ro ras Mananai Yahudi ya.
40024021	Snar ro fafisu ani nari wayam ḇefnak ḇa nmun, roi ḇeradine nmun ḇaim ro awar madero isof babo ine ma nari napok nmun wer ḇa.
40024022	Ma rofyor ya Allah ḇyuk fafisu ya fa iknampuḇa kada, nari roi ḇekenem nakam oso isma askiḇa; ḇape snar snonkaku Allah kyimfir sya, eḇedari fafisu ani ḇyei fa iknampuri.
40024023	Rofyor ani snonkaku ono sikofen faro mko: Mkomame, Wairek isya ro dine, roḇaido Wairek isya ro diwa, mkokyar awer si.
40024024	Snar Wairek-Wairek sararer ma nabi-nabi sararer nari sikḇawes ma nari sifrur aḇyair ḇeba syadi ma aḇyair kanandor, isof sfarkor ninyan snonkaku Allah kyinfir kwar sya kako.
40024025	Mkoswarepen naḇye, Yakofen na ḇepon kwar faro mko.
40024026	Inja, rofyor ono sikofen faro mko: Mkomame, Isya ro sup ḇeursḇa, mkoramura awer; roḇaido: Mkomame, Isya ro sim ya dori, mkokyar awer.
40024027	Snar imnis raris samar ḇearḇeḇer ro ḇar wamurem ḇe ḇar wambarek, rarirya kuker raramuma ro Rumkun Snonkaku.
40024028	Ro moḇ rosai ḇepsursya sisya, ro dia mankankan spanjuḇer."
40024029	"Fafisu wayam ani isyof fasaw bur, ori nari pyampan ma paik ya isnaiḇa ma mak sya nari sfarsapi ro nanki ma papoik-papoik ro nanki nari namarmer.
40024030	Rofyor ani nari aḇyair Rumkun Snonkaku fyasnai ro nanki ma kawasa kam ro supswan ine nari skanes ma nari smam Rumkun Snonkaku ryama ro mandif ro nanki kuker papoik ma payamyum ḇyena.
40024031	Ma nari Iwan malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi fa sisasyar ma siwuf sonker berok naba kaku ma nari siryur snonkaku Allah kyimfir kwar sya ro supswan ḇesiper.
40024032	Mkun farkarkor ro sarḇer ara knam: Rofyor snau-snau ḇyena nakpirew ma nkakyei randak, mkofawi fyor ryas ya fyanam kwar.
40024033	Rarirya kako rofyor mkomam roi ḇeḇor nane kam, mkofawi beri, mḇoi fafisu ḇyedi fyanam kaku kwar, ro kedwai ya ḇarpondi.
40024034	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri syos ine, nari ryo ḇaim, roi ḇeḇor nane ndarirya resari.
40024035	Nanki ma supswan ine nari ndo, ḇape wos Ayedi kada nari ryoḇa.
40024036	Ḇape ras ma fafisu ani snonkaku oso ipok ifawiḇa beri, ma malaikat-malaikat ro boiyaswa kako roḇa, ma Rumkun ya kako roḇa, derer Mami mankundi."
40024037	"Snar imnis raris roi ḇeḇesya ro awar Nuh, rarirya kako nari roi ḇeḇesya anna ndarirya kako ro raramuma ro Rumkun Snonkaku ya.
40024038	Snar imnis raris kawasa ro awar faḇruḇ ya ḇaim, sanan ma sinem, sekawin ma sfakawin si, isof ro ras Nuh syun ro wai ya,
40024039	ma sifawi royoḇa beri ḇepon ro faḇruḇ ya ryama myun sikam, rarirya kako nari roi ḇerarirya ndama ro fafisu rarama Rumkun Snonkaku ya.
40024040	Rofyor ani snonkaku risuru suisya ro yaf, nari oso ḇyeḇeyun ma sumin ya ḇyeḇebur;
40024041	rofyor bin risuru suso fas, sumindi ḇyeḇeyun ma sumindi ḇyeḇebur.
40024042	Inja iḇye mkepen mko, snar mkofawiḇa ras rosai Manseren mkoḇedi ryama ya.
40024043	Ḇape mkofawi mnuk ine: Ro fafisu tuan ḇena rum ya ifawi ḇepon fafisu rosai ḇekaraw sya srama ro roḇ ya, nari iwaren ma ipok myam monda rum ḇyedi ḇo sfasyari ḇa.
40024044	Rarirya mko kako mkofasos, snar Rumkun Snonkaku ryama ro fafisu mkokaraḇa."
40024045	"Manfamyan mansei ḇeḇesyowi ma ḇefawi nananem, ikada tuan ḇyedi ikanow i fa myamwarek snonkaku ḇyesi ma ḇyuk nanan faro si ro fafisu ya?
40024046	Aski faro manfamyan, rofyor tuan ḇyedi isrow isya ifararur ro fararur ḇyedi ro fafisu tuan ḇyedi ryama.
40024047	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nari tuan ḇyedi ikanow i fa myamwarek roi ḇeḇor ḇyena kam.
40024048	Ḇape rofyor manfamyan ani iḇarḇor ma ikofen ro sneri:
40024049	Tuan ayedi nari ryakaki muma ḇa, inja irandak iprer manfamyan ḇese sya, ma dan dinem kuker ḇemasaser sya,
40024050	rarirya tuan ḇyani nari ryama ro fafisu kyara ḇaḇeri, ma ifawi ḇa,
40024051	ma nari myun i ma ifrur faroi imnis snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor. Ro diwa kada nari ismai kankanes ma arkfafais nakor."
40025001	"Rofyor ani Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis inkbor samfur, ḇeyun parambrom sena ma sra sisrow manfakawinya.
40025002	Rim ro fandu si sifawi royoḇa mḇoi rim ḇese sya sifawi nananem.
40025003	Inkbor ḇefawi royoḇa ssun parambrom sena, ḇape ssun mani ḇa,
40025004	mḇoi inkbor ririm ḇefawinananem ansi ssun parambrom sena ma mani kako ro botol sena.
40025005	Ḇape snon manfakawin ani ryama fasauḇa isof enef ya myun si inja senef kam.
40025006	Rofyor romfawru simnaf mkaren ḇeyor: Manfakawin ryama! Mkosrow i!
40025007	Inkbor ansi sikbok kam ma sfasasos parambrom sena.
40025008	Inkbor ḇefawi royoḇa ansi sikofen faro inkbor ḇefawinananem ansi: Mkoḇuk mani mkoḇena ono ḇeinko, snar parambrom nkoḇena fanam nambrer.
40025009	Ḇape inkbor ḇefawinananem ansi sikofen: Roḇa, nari namnis faro nkoḇa ma faro mkoḇa kako. Ipyum syadi mkora faro ḇeḇoḇ mani ma mkokoḇes ro diwa.
40025010	Ḇape rofyor sramura fa skoḇes mani ya, manfakawin ani ryama ma ḇefasos kwar ansi siyaker i ma ssun kuker i ro sim munara fakawin ani, posa kedwai ya ḇyeḇesisen.
40025011	Ḇarpur ya inkbor ḇese ansi srama ma sikofen: Tuano, tuano, bas kedwai ya ma ḇe inko!
40025012	Ḇape kyarem: Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri yamam ḇaḇir mkoḇa.
40025013	Rarirya, mkowaren, snar mkofawiḇa ras ma fafisu ya."
40025014	"Snar Ḇaḇesasoser Boiyaswa imnis raris snon ḇemarisen ḇesasyar ḇe mnu ḇese, inja dor manfamyan ḇyesi ma ḇyuk nana ḇyena faro si, kuker kakyar insa sifararur kuker na.
40025015	Rarirya ḇyuk faro oso talenta ririm, faro oso wer suru ma faro oso wer ḇyuk oser, sisma raris samambraḇ sena, raimnai rya.
40025016	Manfamyan ḇena talenta ririm ani rya fasau. Ifararur kuker pipi ansi ma isma syadi talenta ririm wer.
40025017	Manfamyan ḇesma talenta risuru ani kako dakfararur rarirya ma isma syadi talenta risuru wer.
40025018	Ḇape manfamyan ḇena talenta oser ani kada rya ma ḇyai saprop ya ma derak tuan ḇyedi pipi ḇyani.
40025019	Fyoro kwar manfamyan ansi tuan sedi iburma ma ifrur karkor kuker manfamyan ḇyansi.
40025020	Manfamyan ḇena talenta ririm ani ryama ma dun syadi talenta ririm, ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: Tuan, talenta ririm iso wakyar ḇe aya; mame yasma syadi talenta ririm wer.
40025021	Inja tuan ḇyani ikofen faroi: Fararur bedi ipyum kaku, ne, manfamyan ḇeḇye ma ḇeḇesyowi yedi; fasnai kwar ḇesyowi roi kasun, nari yaḇuk fa mamwarek roi ḇeba. Swun ma wakun aski ro tuan bedi.
40025022	Raimnai manfamyan ḇesma talenta risuru ani dakrama, ma ikofen: Tuan, talenta risuru suiso wakyarma ḇe aya; mame yasma syadi talenta risuru wer.
40025023	Inja tuan ḇyani ikofen faroi: Fararur bedi ipyum kaku, ne, manfamyan ḇeḇye ma ḇeḇesyowi yedi; fasnai kwar ḇesyowi roi kasun, nari yaḇuk fa mamwarek roi ḇeba. Swun ma wakun aski ro tuan bedi.
40025024	Insape manfamyan ḇena talenta oser ani dakrama ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: Tuan, yafawi au snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ḇeyuf ro moḇ kwekef ro ḇa ma ḇesrai ro moḇ rosai kwer ro ḇa.
40025025	Rarirya yamkak ḇo yara yerak talenta ḇani ro saprop ya dori: Talenta bani isoine! Tuan wuni!
40025026	Inja tuan ani kyarem: Ne, au, manfamyan ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇemyarenḇa, wafawi, yuf ro moḇ yakekef roḇa ma yasrai ro moḇ rosai yaker ro ḇa?
40025027	Rarirya ipyum syadi pipi yesi buksi faro snonkaku ḇefarḇaḇyan sya, insa yasiḇer ido yun pipi yesi kuker pampen ḇyesi.
40025028	Rarirya mkun talenta ani buri ma mkobuki faro ḇesma samfur ani.
40025029	Snar snonkaku mansei ḇena ya nari ssḇuk faroi wer fa nya nabor syadi wer. Ḇape mansei ḇenaḇa, nari rosai nya na nari neḇeyun bur i.
40025030	Ma manfamyan ḇeḇefainda ḇa ani mkosawen i ḇe ḇondi, ḇe moḇ ḇepampan syadi. Ro diwa nari ismai kankanes ma arkfafais nakor."
40025031	"Rofyor Rumkun Snonkaku ryama kuker payamyum Ḇyedi ma malaikatsya kam siyaker I, ma nari kyain ro karapasa nasan Ḇyadi.
40025032	Raimnai er sya kam nari seḇefanjur ro ḇarpon Ḇyedi ma nari kyinfir si oser ḇe oser, raris ḇefarandosya kyinfir domba sya bur kambing sya,
40025033	ma nari domba sya ḇyesi fa snara ḇar raku ḇyedi ma kambing sya snara ḇar rasar ḇyedi.
40025034	Ma nari ikofen faro ḇenara ḇar raku ḇyedi: Mkorama, ne, besma ḇok ro Kma Yedi, mkakna Ḇaḇesasoser ḇefasos kwar faro mko ro fafisu supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ya.
40025035	Snar rofyor yabiser mkofan Aya; rofyor yambrow mkoḇe war fa yinem; rofyor yaḇe snon dakam mkoḇe moḇ fa yaḇeryar ro;
40025036	rofyor yaḇaḇer mkoḇuk ḇe Aya mar fa yafmar; rofyor yaduf, mkofaduru Aya; rofyor yasma ro bui, mkora kaki Aya.
40025037	Rarirya snonkaku ḇenapes ansi nari skarem faro I, ḇo sikofen: Manseren, fyor rosaiso nkomam wabiser ma nkofan Au, roḇa wambrow ma nkoḇuk war fa winem?
40025038	Fyor rosaiso nkomam Au ḇe snon dakam, ma nkoḇuk moḇ ryar faro Au, roḇa baḇer ḇo nkoḇuk mar faro Au?
40025039	Fyor saiso nkomam waduf roḇa wasmai ro bui ma nkora kaki Au?
40025040	Ma Wairek ani nari kyarem faro si: Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri roi ḇeḇor kam mkofrur faro oser ro fandu naek Ayesi ḇeḇenyawa ḇa sine, irya mkofrur kwar maḇe Aya.
40025041	Ma nari ikofen kako faro ḇeyores ro ḇar rasar Ḇyedi: Ne, mkobur ḇarpon Ayedi, ne, snonkaku ḇesma fras, mkosun ro for ḇembrer ḇa ḇefasos kwar faro Ibiris kuker malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi.
40025042	Snar fyor Yabiser, mkofan Aya ḇa; fyor Yambrow mkoḇuk war fa Yinemba;
40025043	fyor yaḇe snon dakam, mkoḇuk moḇ fa Yaḇe ryar ro ḇa; rofyor Yaḇaḇer, mkoḇuk mar faro Aya ḇa; rofyor Yaduf ma Yasmai ro bui, mkora kaki Aya ḇa.
40025044	Ma nari sikaem skarem faro I, ma sikofen: Manseren, fyor saiso nkomam wabiser, roḇa wambrow, roḇa besnon dakam, roḇa baḇer roḇa waduf, roḇa wer wasmai ro bui ḇape nkuf farmyan Au ḇa?
40025045	Ma nari kyarem faro si: Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri roi ḇeḇor rosai mkofrur ḇa faro naek Ayesi ḇeḇenyawa ḇa sine, rarirya kako mkakfrur na faro Aya ḇa.
40025046	Ma snonkaku sine nari ssun ḇe moḇ wayam ḇekain fyoro, ḇape snonkaku ḇenapes sya ssun ro kankenem ḇemnaiḇa ya."
40026001	Yesus imnai kwar kuker farkarkor ḇeḇor ḇyena, ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi:
40026002	"Mkofawi, ras risuru wer nari semunara Paskah, ma nari Rumkun Snonkaku ḇyeḇeḇoḇ fa spai I ro Aprop."
40026003	Ma ro fafisu ani mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara er Yahudi siryur ro Imam Ḇeba ḇenir Kayafas rum ḇyedi,
40026004	ma saw aw oso insa sfor Yesus kuker nyan ankar fa smun I.
40026005	Rarirya sikofen: "Roi ḇeḇesya ani ḇyeḇefrur awer ro fafisu munara, imbude mbrus isya ro fandu kawasa sya ri."
40026006	Fafisu Yesus isya ro Betania, ro Simon ḇeḇe pado rum ḇyedi,
40026007	bin oso ryama faro Yesus, dun botol ḇeser mani ḇespum ḇediref pyum kaku ma ḇekakur. Mani ani isbawer i ro Yesus ḇruri, ro fafisu kyain danan.
40026008	Manfamyan ansi smam rarirya sisonek Yesus ḇo sikofen: "Fainda rosai kofnak mani ine?
40026009	Snar mani ine kyakur inja koḇoḇ i kada ma pipi sya koḇuk si faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sya."
40026010	Ḇape Yesus ifawi swaruser sena inja ikofen: "Snaro mkosonek bin ine? Snar ikada ifrur fararur ḇepyum oso faro Aya.
40026011	Snar snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sya sisya ḇesya kwar ro fandu mko, ḇape Aya kada nari yakain nus mko ḇesya kwarḇa.
40026012	Snar isḇawer mani ani ro ḇaken Ayedi, ifrur fasasos oso faro ḇaḇe kardir Ayedi.
40026013	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri ro moḇsai ryawer sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya ro supswan ḇesiper, rosai ifrur ine nari sakfayai kako fa sikswarepen i."
40026014	Raimnai oso ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi, ḇenir Yudas Iskariot, rya faro mananir imam-imam.
40026015	Ma ikofen: "Rosai mkomarisen mkoḇuk faro aya, insa yaḇoḇi faro mko?" Sḇak faro i kumpan sarak samfur rikior.
40026016	Ma rofyor ani syewar fafisu ḇepyum insa ḇyuk Yesus faro si.
40026017	Ro ras ḇepon ro ras munara Mamami Ḇepisen Ḇa Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi srama faro I ma sikofen: "Inja moḇ rosaiso wamarisen insa inkofasos roḇeyan Paskah faro Au?"
40026018	Yesus kyarem: "Mkora ḇe mnu faro snon oso ma mkokofen faroi: Guru doḇo: fafisu Yedi fyanam kwar; inja ro rum bedi Yamarisen yafrur munara Paskah kuker manfamyan Ayesi."
40026019	Rarirya manfamyan ḇyesi sifararur imnis moḇ sai Yesus ḇyuk faro si ma sfasos Paskah ani.
40026020	Ma roḇ kwar, Yesus kyain danan fnoḇek manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi.
40026021	Ma fafisu sanan, Ikofen: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri nari oso ro fandu mko nari ḇyoḇ Aya."
40026022	Ma kuker sne ḇefafardun oser-oser ikofen faro Yesus: "Aya ḇake, o Manseren?"
40026023	Kyarem: "Ḇefnoḇek Aya ḇo ḇesowen mamami ro ben ine, iso nari ḇeḇoḇ Aya.
40026024	Kaku ḇaboi Rumkun Snonkaku nari ibur rarirya imnis sfas kwar fa ḇekur I, ḇape raro faro mansei ḇeḇoḇ Rumkun Snonkaku ya. Ipyum syadi snon ani ḇyeḇeyaḇen awer."
40026025	Yudas, ḇemarisen ḇeḇoḇ I kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Aya iryake, o Rabi?" Yesus ikofen faroi: "Raris moḇ wakofen rai."
40026026	Ma fafisu skain sanan, Yesus dun mamami, ikofen kasumasa posa, pyanasnis i raimnai ḇyukḇaboḇ manfamyan ḇyesi ḇo ikofen: "Mkun ma mkan na, inenido ḇaken Ayedi rya."
40026027	Raimnai dun sek aninem, ikofen kasumasa posa ḇyuki faro si ma ikofen: "Mkinem kam ro sek aninem ine.
40026028	Snar inenido rik Ayenai rya, rik ḇeḇeasas sisbawer faro kawasa sibor fa ḇeḇuk payasyos ro sasar.
40026029	Ḇape Yakofen faro mko: Randak ro knikine nari yapok yinem wer ḇa ro bon anggur knam ine isof ro ras yinem i wer, isoine yinem babo fnoḇek mko ro Mami Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi."
40026030	Sidisen dow sanandik posa kwar, Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi sra ḇe urek Zaitun.
40026031	Ma Yesus ikofen farosi: "Roḇ ine kakyar mkoḇena kam nari neḇirḇar snar Aya. Snar fas-fas ya isya: Nari Yamun ḇefarandosya ḇoi domba nai ansi nari sibur ḇesisye.
40026032	Ḇape rofyor yiḇer Aya kwar, nari yapon mko ḇe Galilea."
40026033	Petrus kyarem faro I: "Min ayesine kakyar sena neḇirḇar faro Au rariryano, ḇape aya ma roḇa kaku."
40026034	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Yakofen faro au, kaku ḇeri roḇ ine, mankoko sya sor ḇaim famyun Aya ḇe kior kwar."
40026035	Petrus ikofen faro I: "Isof ro yamar fnoḇek Au, yapok yafamyun Au ḇa." Manfamyan ḇese ansi kam sakkofen rarirya kako.
40026036	Ma Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sraro moḇ oso ḇenir ḇe Getsemani. Raimnai ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mkokain ro dine, ḇoi Yara fasaw knik ḇediwara fa yanadi."
40026037	Ma dun Petrus kuker Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesu fnoḇek I. Rarirya rofyor ani sneri fyafardun ma ryadadai,
40026038	inja ikofen faro si: "Sneri fyafardun fafayaḇa, imnis yaḇe yamar kaḇor. Mkokain ro dine ma mkowaren fnoḇek Aya."
40026039	Raimnai imbran pak ḇur sko, posa ḇyansuba ma ḇyenadi, ma Ikofen: "O Mami, rofyor wamarisen kada, iḇye wun sek aninem ine bur Aya, ḇape raris marisen Ayedi awer, ḇoi raris marisen bedi."
40026040	Raimnai kyaḇer faro manfamyan ḇyesi ma isrow sisya senef. Inja ikofen faro Petrus: "Mkopok mkowaren ḇake kuker Aya ro oras oser?
40026041	Mkowaren ma mkoḇenadi, insa mkosapi awer ro fafrowes ya: rur ya kada imyaren user, ḇape kraf ya ma ipok ḇa."
40026042	Raimnai ryaḇe ḇe ḇesuru ya wer ma ḇyenadi, ikofen: "O Mami, rofyor sek aninem ine Wamarisen fa wuni bur Ayaḇa, ḇoi rofyor Wamarisen fa yinem inido, marisen ḇena ndarirya mura!"
40026043	Ma rofyor kyaḇer wer, isrow skenef, snar enef ya myun sko mankenem.
40026044	Rarirya myam monda sko ro moḇ ani ḇoi kyaḇer wer ma ḇyenadi ḇe rarwan ḇeḇekior ma ḇyenadi, nadi insanja wer.
40026045	Raimnai kyaḇer wer faro manfamyan ḇyansi ma ikofen faro si: "Insape mkenef mura ma mkomnaisu mko. Mkomam fafisu ya ryama kwar, nari Rumkun Snonkaku ḇye ḇeḇoḇ faro snonkaku ḇesasar sya siḇrasna.
40026046	Mkokḇok, mkorama kora. Ḇeḇoḇ Aya ani fyanam kwar."
40026047	Rofyor Yesus isya dawawos kaker, Yudas oso ro manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi, ryama fnoḇek kawasa dandonek ḇeba ḇeyun sumber ma karbere, rak mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara Yahudi siwan sirya.
40026048	Snonkaku ḇeḇoḇ Yesus ani ikofen ḇair aḇyair ine kwar faro si: "Snonkaku nari yasyum ya ido, Iria, inja mkofor I."
40026049	Ma imbran fasaw fa isrow Yesus ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Aroo Rabi," ma isyum I.
40026050	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faroi: "Ne, bati, rosai rwama kuker ya?" Rarirya kawasa ansi srama siser Yesus ma sfor I.
40026051	Ḇape snon oso ro ḇeso Yesus pyas sumber ḇyedi ma pyerem manfamyan imam ḇeba ya knaram ḇyedi fa imuk.
40026052	Inja Yesus ikofen faroi: "Swower sumber ani, snar mansei ḇefnak kuker sumber nari ryo kuker sumber.
40026053	Roḇaido kwarai, mḇoi yapok ḇake fa yor ro Mami, insa fyarem fasaw sarar malaikat isyadi ro samfur seser risuru fa sifnoḇek Aya?
40026054	Rofyor rarirya ido, rariso nari ḇaḇemnis fas-fas ro Refo, berok ḇo ḇeyoḇo, mnuk ine nari ryarirya?"
40026055	Rofyor ani Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi: "Mkowarki Ayaḇe ḇeḇarḇorke, isof mkorama kuker fasasos sumber ma karbere fa mkofor Aya? Ḇape ras-ras Ayaisya yakain yafarkor ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma mkofor Aya ḇa.
40026056	Ḇape nakam nari ndarirya insa fas-fas ro nabi-nabi namnis." Ro fafisu ani manfamyan ansi sifrar sibur I.
40026057	Sfor Yesus kwar, ssun iḇe ḇarpon Imam Ḇeba Kayafas. Ro dia ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara sya sisya sfanjur kwar.
40026058	Ma Petrus iyom ro ḇarpur isof ro buḇes Imam Ḇeba ya, ma rofyor syun randum kwar, kyain fandu ḇewaren sya insa dakmam papupes ro wawos anna.
40026059	Mananir Imam-Imam, fnoḇek Kankain Karkara Agama ansi ssewar ḇaḇesaksi sararer faro Yesus, insa isma samamyai marmar,
40026060	ḇape sismai onoḇa, ro saksi sararer ḇeḇor ansi. Ḇape ḇarpurya snon risuru, suyores ma sukofen, ḇo suyoḇo:
40026061	"Snon ine ikofen: Nari yakakok Allah Rum ḇyedi raimnai yaḇawes i wer ro ras rikior."
40026062	Raimnai Imam Ḇeba ya iyori ma ikofen faro I, ḇo doḇo: "Rariso kwarem wos oso ḇa faro saksi-saksi ḇeḇuksof Au sine?"
40026063	Ḇape Yesus ḇyefasis monda. Raimnai Imam Ḇeba ani ikofen faro I, ḇo doḇo: "Kuker snonsnon Allah ḇekenem, wakofen faro nko, Auryake Wairek, Rumkun Allah iso Auke roḇa."
40026064	Yesus kyarem: "Iso wakofen kwar ya. Ḇape yakofen faro Au, randak ro knikine nari mkomam Rumkun Snonkaku ya kyain ro ḇar raku Ḇepok syadi ma ryama ro mandif ro nanki."
40026065	Inja Imam Ḇeba ya pyansawek mar ḇyena ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Donef Allah. Fainda rosai kosewar saksi kaker? Knikine mkomnaf kam anonef ḇyena.
40026066	Rariso karkara mkoḇena?" Skarem ḇo soḇo: "Ikada isma samamyai marmar!"
40026067	Raimnai saninef ro mkasi ma skuki; ḇese sya siprer I,
40026068	ma sikofen: "Indo insas wakofen faro nko, ne Wairek, manseiso ḇeprer Au ya?"
40026069	Ro fafisu ani Petrus kyain ro buḇes ya ro ḇondi. Kniko infyan bin oso ryama faroi, ma ikofen: "Au kako wakso fnoḇek kuker Yesus, snon Galilea ani."
40026070	Ḇape fyamyun ro ḇarpon snonkaku ansi kam, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawiḇa, rosai wakofen ya."
40026071	Ro fafisu ryaḇe kedwai ḇeba ya, infyan oso ḇese myami ma ikofen faro snonkaku ḇero dia sya: "Snon ine dakfnoḇek Yesus snon Nazaret ani."
40026072	Ma fyamyun wer ḇo fyores: "Yafawi snon aniḇa beri."
40026073	Fyoroḇa ro fafisu ani, snonkaku ḇero dia sya sra faro Petrus ma sikofen: "Kaku ḇeri au oso ro fandu si, snar komnaf ro wos ḇedi."
40026074	Inja Petrus ani ifras ma fyores: "Yamam ḇaḇir snon aniḇa." Ma ro fafisu ani mankoko sya sor randak.
40026075	Rarirya Petrus iswarepen rosai Yesus ikofen faroi kwar: "Mankoko sya sor ḇaim, famyun epen Aya ḇe kyor kwar." Rarirya isasyar ḇe ḇondi ma kyanes kuker sne ḇefafardun.
40027001	Fafisu isnai kwar, mananir imamsya ma ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara er Yahudi siryur ma sna wosi fa smun Yesus.
40027002	Sai wanka ro ḇrasi, raimnai ssuni ma ssḇuki faro Pilatus, gubernur Roma ro mnu ani.
40027003	Rofyor Yudas, ḇeḇoḇ Yesus ani, myam, Ismai samamyai mar-mar kwar, fyafko. Inja kyaḇer pipi sarak samfur rikior ansi faro mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara sya, ḇo ikofen doḇo:
40027004	"Aya ine yasasar kwar snar yaḇoḇ rik snonkaku ḇesasarḇa ine." Ḇape skarem faroi: "Inko fandunrosai? Kwara ro mankundaw!"
40027005	Rarirya syo pipi sarak ansi ḇe Rum Ḇesren ya dori, raimnai ibur moḇ ani fa rya fyes mankundi.
40027006	Mananir Imam-Imam ssun pipi sarak ansi ma sikofen: "Pipi ansi kopok kosun siḇa ro ḇurua farsarser, snar pipi rik sirya."
40027007	Sawos yae faro si posa ssḇuk pipi ansi skoḇes saprop sapḇe Saprop Ḇefawi ḇefrur uren saprop, fa sifrur ḇe rus faro dakam sya.
40027008	Iso eḇedari isof ras ine sor iḇe Saprop Rik.
40027009	Rarirya Nabi Yermia wos ikofen ya imnis: "Sna pipi sarak samfur rikior, isoine maeja sawos namuk kwar faro snon oser imnis karkara ro fandu er Yahudi,
40027010	ma ssḇuk pipi ansi faro ḇaḇyak ḇefawi ḇefrur uren saprop ani, saprop ḇyedi, raris Manseren danun faro aya."
40027011	Raimnai ssun Yesus ḇeḇarpon gubernur Pilatus. Ma gubernur ani ifuken I: "Au ryake wairek kawasa Yahudi?" Yesus kyarem: "Iso mankundaw wakofen ya."
40027012	Ḇape raris safsof mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara sya sḇuksof I, kyarem wos oso ḇaḇeri.
40027013	Inja Pilatus ikofen faro I: "Inja wamnafḇake safsof ḇeḇor saksi-saksi sine sawos faro Au?"
40027014	Ḇape kyarem royo ḇaḇeri, isof gubernur ani ikmom kaku.
40027015	Biasa ro ras-ras munara ḇeba gubernur fyaspar snonkaku besmai oso imnis kankinfir ro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
40027016	Ma rofyor ani snon ḇeḇarḇor kaku oso isya ismai ro bui snonsnon ḇyedi Barabas.
40027017	Snar sfanjur kwar ro dia, inja Pilatus ikofen faro si: "Mansei mkomarisen yafaspar faro mko, Barabas roba Yesus, sapḇe Kristus?"
40027018	Pilatus ifawi kwar, mḇoi ssun Yesus ma ssḇuki faroi snar sayin I.
40027019	Ro fafisu Pilatus kyain ro karapesa karkara ḇenapes ya, swari fyarem anun faroi: "Wafrur roi osoḇa beri faro snon ḇenapes ani, snar snon ine ifnaiḇo roḇandi yasma wayam ro mafu."
40027020	Ḇape snar dafdif mananir imam-imam ma ḇeḇarara sya, kawasa ḇeḇor ansi simarisen kam insa sor fa Barabas ḇyeḇefaspar ma Yesus kada isma samamyai marmar.
40027021	Gubernur kyarem faro si ma ikofen: "Mansei ro fandu snon ansuine mkomarisen yafaspar faro mko?" Sikofen: "Barabas."
40027022	Pilatus ikofen wer faro si: "Rarirya ido rosaiso nari yafrur kuker Yesus, sapḇe Kristus ani?" Sikam ssibras: "Ikada ḇyeḇepai epen ro aprop!"
40027023	Ikofen wer: "Ḇape sasar rosaiso ifrur kwar ya?" Ḇape ssibras naba syadi wer: "Ikada ḇyeḇepai ro aprop!"
40027024	Fafisu Pilatus myam nyan ḇyena kam nefromo, isyadi wer siḇe sifrur mbrus inja dun war fa ḇyukḇan ḇramin ḇyesi ro ḇarpon kawasa ansi ma ikofen: "Aya, yaḇe sasarḇa faro rik snon ine; Irya mankun mkokarem!"
40027025	Ma kawasa ansi kam skarem: "Mḇoi rik ḇyena nek inko ma romawa nkoḇesi!"
40027026	Raimnai fyaspar Barabas faro si, ḇape Yesus kada siprer I raimnai ḇyeifa spai ro aprop.
40027027	Ḇarpur ya gubernur sordade ḇyesi ssun Yesus ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes, raimnai sor sordade ḇese sya kam fa sfanjur ḇo sores yar Yesus.
40027028	Sper sansun ḇyena ma ssansun I kuker syatu ḇefuk.
40027029	Siyanem wower ro kaḇrai borek ma sriri ro Yesus ḇruri, raimnai ssḇuk amboḇer ḇaken oso fa dufepen ro ḇrasi ḇar raku ya. Posa ssḇansuba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma skoryae I, ḇo soḇo: "Aroo, ne Wairek kawasa Yahudi!"
40027030	Saninef I ma ssun amboḇer ani fa ssḇuki dos ro ḇruri.
40027031	Sonef I raposa sper sansun syatu ḇefuk ani buri ma ssansuni wer kuker sansun ḇyena. Raimnai ssuni ḇo sisasyar bur mnu ya, fa spai I ro aprop.
40027032	Fafisu sisasyar bur mnu ya, sisrow snon Kirene oso snori Simon. Snon ani sedafdifer i fa ḇyar pyan Yesus aprop ḇyedi.
40027033	Ma sra ro moḇ ḇenirḇe Golgota, isoine: Moḇ Ḇukor bei.
40027034	Raimnai ssḇuk anggur ḇefmnai kuker pus fa dinem. Ryepen anggur ansi kwar, imewer dinem sindi.
40027035	Spai I kwar posa serarwas sansun ḇyena kuker kinsor mansei ḇena nanya.
40027036	Raimnai skain ma siwaren I ro dia.
40027037	Ro ḇruri bori ro aprop pum ya sfas ḇair knam rosai ḇefnai fa isma samamyai ya: "Ine Yesus Wairek Yahudi."
40027038	Spai fnoḇek I snon mamun risuru, oso ro ḇar raku ma oso ro ḇar rasar ḇyedi.
40027039	Snonkaku ḇeyunuk ro dia sonef I ma skakiker siḇrusna ḇo sikokofen, ḇo soḇo:
40027040	"Ne, Au ḇeyoḇo ḇekakok Allah Rum Ḇesren ḇyedi ma ḇeḇawes i wer ro ras rikior, faspar mankundaw rofyor Allah Rumkun ḇyediso Au, wado bur aprop ya!"
40027041	Rarirya kako mananir imam-imam sifnoḇek ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma ḇeḇarara sya skoryae I ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo:
40027042	"Snonkaku ḇese fyaspar si, ḇape mankundi kada ipok fa fyaspar I ḇa! I kada Wairek Israel? Ipyum syadi wado bur aprop iyasi ma nari nkokyar Au.
40027043	Ryir kakyar ḇyedi faro Allah: ipyum syadi Allah fyaspar I, rofyor Allah imarisen kuker I! Snar ikofen kwar: Aya ine Allah Rumkun ḇyedi."
40027044	Rarirya snon mamun spai fnoḇek I suyakkoryae I kako.
40027045	Randak ro oras samfur seser risuru orkok isof ro oras kior mandira, pampan ya ikawef sup ya fyor ani.
40027046	Indokada oras kior ya Yesus dor kuker mkaren ḇeba: "Eli, Eli, lama sabakhtani?" Isoine: Allah Yedi, Allah Yedi, snaro Wabur Aya?
40027047	Kawasa ḇeyores ro dia simnaf rarirya, sikofen: "Dor Elia."
40027048	Ma snonkaku oso ro si ryama fasaw; dun bunek, fa syowen i ro anggur ḇemnir, raimnai kyuki ro amboḇer oso ḇo isui fa Yesus dinem.
40027049	Ḇape snonkaku ḇese sya sikofen: "Mkoḇuk awer, insa komam pan imbude Elia ryama fa fyaspar Indi."
40027050	Yesus dar naba wer raimnai ryir nyawa ḇyedi.
40027051	Ma mkomam, eruk kroben ro Rum Ḇesren ya imsap ra ḇyesuru ro ḇo isof ro sop ma ḇyerim ḇeba, ma urek karu na nakpef,
40027052	ma rus na nḇas, ḇo snonkaku ḇesren ḇemar kwar sya sibor siḇer si.
40027053	Ḇarpur ro Yesus aḇiḇer ḇyedi, sikam sisasyar ro rus, ma ssun ro mnu ḇesren ya fa sfasnai mankunsi faro kawasa ḇeḇor.
40027054	Mananir sarar ma sordade ḇyesi ḇewaren Yesus ansi simkak fafayaḇa ro fafisu smam rim ma roi ḇeḇesya anna, inja sikofen: "Kaku ḇeri, ine Allah Rumkun ḇyedi."
40027055	Ma ro dia bin ono sibor sores ḇinkwan ḇo smam, isoine bin-bin ḇeso Yesus ker Galilea fa ḇeyuf farmyan I.
40027056	Ro fandu si kosmai Maria Magdalena, ma Maria Yakobus ma Yusuf sna suḇedi, ma Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesi sna sedi.
40027057	Mandira kwar snon ḇenana oso snori Yusuf ḇyeknam ro Arimatea, ikako dakḇe manfamyan faro Yesus kwar.
40027058	Rya faro Pilatus ma dor Yesus ḇaken ḇyedi. Pilatus ḇyuk sasoser insa ssḇuki faroi.
40027059	Inja Yusuf dun ḇaken ani, ma pyarek i kuker kruḇen ḇepyoper,
40027060	raimnai ikrir I ro rus ḇebabo ḇyedi, pyaikir ro urk karui, ma ikris kwar karui ḇeba oso ḇe kedwai rus ani, raimnai ibur.
40027061	Ma Maria Magdalena kuker Maria ḇese ani sukain ro dia ro ḇarpon rus ani.
40027062	Meserdi, isoine ras fasasos ya isyonde, mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi sikam srama ro ḇarpon Pilatus,
40027063	ma sikofen: "Tuan, inko swarepen, snon ḇefarkor ninyan ani fafisu ikenem ya ikofen: Ras rikior nasyof kwar nari Yiḇer Aya.
40027064	Inja buk sasoser insa siwaren rusya isof ras ḇeḇekior ya; imbude manfamyan ḇyesi kofawiḇa ḇo srama skaraw indi, raimnai sikofen faro kawasa sya, ḇo soḇo: Diḇri kwar ro fandu ḇemar sya, isof farkarkor ninyan ḇepur ya ipyum ḇa syadi ro ḇepon ya."
40027065	Pilatus ikofen faro si: "Sine manwadwaren faro mko, mkora ma mkowaren rus ani pyum kaku."
40027066	Rarirya srama kuker fafnoḇek ro manwadwaren ansi sematerai rus ani ma siwareni.
40028001	Ras Mananai Yahudi isyonde kwar, ro arwo prim kaku ro ras ḇepon ro usbu ani, Maria Magdalena ma Maria ḇese ani sura sumam kaki rus ani.
40028002	Kniko ḇama rim ḇebayo myun snar Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso dado ker nanki ryama ḇe karui ani ma ikrisi ma kyain ro bori.
40028003	Ḇarpon ḇyedi isnaper ma sansun ḇyena napyoper imnis manwaref bur.
40028004	Ma manwadwaren ansi simkak ra sradadai simnis kaku snonkaku ḇepsur.
40028005	Ḇape malaikat ani ikofen faro bin ansu ya, ḇo doḇo: "Mumkak awer; snar yafawi musewar Yesus spai ro aprop ani.
40028006	Isya ro dineḇa, snar diḇri kwar, imnis raris moḇ ikofen kwar raya. Murama, mumam moḇ ḇyarek ro ine.
40028007	Ma mura fasaw fa muḇaryas faro manfamyan ḇyesi mḇoi diḇri kwar ro fandu ḇemar sya. Iswara pyon mko ḇe Galilea; ro diwa nari mkomam I. Kaku ḇeri yaḇaryas faro mko kwar."
40028008	Subur fasau rus ani, kuker makakak fnoḇek raryaḇ ḇeba ma sufrar fasau fa sukofen ḇayir faro manfamyan Yesus.
40028009	Kniko ḇama Yesus isrow su ma ikofen: "Aroo faro mu." Sufanam I ma sufor wemin ḇyesu ya ma suban suba faro I.
40028010	Rarirya Yesus ikofen faro su: "Mumkak awer. Mura mukofen faro naek Ayesi, insa sra ḇe Galilea, ma ro diwa nari smam Aya."
40028011	Fafisu sui sya ro nyan ya faduri, manwadwaren ansi ono sra kwar ḇemnu ya ma sikofen ḇadir roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya anna kam faro mananir imam-imam.
40028012	Ma sna wosi kuker ḇeḇarara-ḇeḇarara ansi kwar, sawos namuk fa ssḇuk pipi sibor faro sordade ansi
40028013	ḇo sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Nari mkofen radine, manfamyan ḇyesi srama ro roḇ ya ma skaraw I ro fafisu nkenef ya.
40028014	Ma rofyor roi ḇeḇesya ine gubernur dakmnafi, nari nkawos kuker i, fa nkofadiren mko."
40028015	Sismai pipi ansi ma sifrur raris moḇ sisma ananun rai. Ma farfyar ine imbran ro fandu kawasa Yahudisya isof ras ine.
40028016	Ma manfamyan samfur seser oser ansi sraḇe Galilea, ḇe urek rosai Yesus fyasnai kwar faro si.
40028017	Fafisu smam I sḇansuba faro I, ḇape ono seḇirḇar.
40028018	Yesus isnefer si ma ikofen: "Papoik nakam ro boiyaswa ma supswan ine ne ḇeḇuk kwar maro Aya.
40028019	Inja mkora mura, mkofarkor er sya kam ḇe manfamyan Ayesi ma mkoḇuk masi sren faro si kuker snonsnon Kma ya ma Rumkun ya ma Rur Ḇesren ya,
40028020	ma mkofarkor si fa sifrur roi ḇeḇor kam raris yaḇeasas kwar faro mko. Ma mkofawi, Aya ine nari yarous mko besya kwar isof awar ḇepupes."
41001001	Ine kada Ankankinem Ḇeḇye randak kaku ḇekur Yesus Kristus Rumkun Allah.
41001002	Imnis fas-fas ḇero surat Nabi Yesaya, Manseren ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mame, nari Yawan manfamyan Ayedi 'fa pyon Au, iso nari ḇefasos nyan ḇe Au;
41001003	mkarem snonkaku oso isya ḇye ruran ro sup ḇeursḇa: Fasos nyan ḇemkei ma ḇeaḇyoḇer faro Manseren."
41001004	Rarirya Yohanes Ḇemasi rya ḇe sup ḇeursḇa fa ḇyaryas: "Mkombror ḇo mkosma masi sren insama Allah ipyos sasar mkoḇena."
41001005	Inja kawasa ḇero sup Yudea ḇesiper ma ḇero Yerusalemsya kam srama ro i, ma skaram sasar sena ma sisma masasisren ro war Yordan.
41001006	Yohanes syatu ḇyena ro onta bur, ḇeḇoḇek ḇyedi ro aiwan kif ma anan ḇyena kampam ma umber sup.
41001007	Wos ikofen na ndok ra dine: "Ro ḇarpur ayedi ḇepok syadi aya nari isyama, yakunem fa yaper kaḇrai roḇesower-wesisya monda, yasyus ḇa.
41001008	Aya ma yamasi mko kuker war monda ḇape i, nari imasi mko kuker RurḆesren."
41001009	Ro fafisu ya Yesus ryaker Nazaret ro sup Galilea, ma Yohanes ḇyuk masasisren faro I ro war Yordan.
41001010	Rofyor isasyar bur war ya, Myam nanki ḇyas, ma Rurḇesren ya isaḇu ro i imnis manjawa.
41001011	Ma mkarem oso ryok ro nanki mumfes, ḇo doḇe: "Au kada Rumkun saswar ayedi, faro Au yamarisen."
41001012	Fyor o ḇa Rur ya fyarkin Yesus ḇe sup ḇeursḇa.
41001013	Ḇyarek ras samfur rifiak ro sup ḇeursḇa anya, ma biris ifrowes i. Ikenem ro fandu aiwan ḇeḇarḇor sya ma malaikatsya suf farmyan i.
41001014	Sfor Yohanes raimnai Yesus rya ḇe Galilea ma Ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah,
41001015	Doḇe: "Fafisu ya imnis kwar; Ḇaḇesasoser Allah fyanam kwar. Mkombror ma mkokyar faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya."
41001016	Rofyor Yesus imbran ro yendisare ḇero danosen Galilea, myam Simon ma naekri Andreas. Suisya ssunap pam ro danosen ani snar mandaswan suirya.
41001017	Yesus ikofen faro su ḇo doḇe: "Ne, murama muso aya, ma nari Yana mu ḇe mandaswan snonkaku."
41001018	Inja fyor ya beri subur pam suḇedi ma suso i.
41001019	Ma ro marandan ḇyani fyoro ḇa wer Yesus myam Yakobus, Sebedeus mandaḇendi, ma naekri Yohanes, suyanem pam ya ro wai ya dori.
41001020	Yesus dor su beri ḇo subur sinan kma suḇe Sebedeus kuker snon ḇeyan ḇaḇyak ḇyesi, ma suso i.
41001021	Skosun ro Kapernaum; ras Mananai Yahudi ya syeḇen mura, Yesus Syun beri ro rum Ari ya dori ma Ḇyuk farkarkor faro kawasa sya.
41001022	Kawasa sikandor rofyor simnaf farkarkor Ḇyena snar fyarkor si imnis snonkaku ḇena papoik; ḇo imnis kuker snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya ḇa.
41001023	Ro fafisu ani snon rur-ḇemaḇak sisawoḇer oso isya ro rum Ari ya dori. Snon ani dar naba ḇo doḇe:
41001024	"Rosai waḇe wafrur kuker inko, Yesus snon Nazaret? Waḇe rwama fa mun inko kwar ya isoine ke? Yafawi au kwar: Ḇesaranden ḇeramuma ker Allah."
41001025	Ḇape Yesus Ḇye wef i ḇo doḇe: "Be fasis, wasasyar buri!"
41001026	Rur-ḇemaḇak anya kyiker farma snon ani, posa dar naba ḇo isasyar buri.
41001027	Kawasa ansya kame sikandor kaku, isof sifuken yae ro mankun si ḇo soḇe: "Rosaisoine? Farkarkor ḇebabo ke? Dawawos kuker papoik, ma rur-ḇemaḇak syano dawos epen si, ma siso user wos Ḇyena."
41001028	Fyorya abar ḇyedi ifrar yar sup Galilea ḇesiper.
41001029	Sisasyar ro rum Ari anya, Yesus kuker Yakobus ma Yohanes skora ḇe Simon ma Andreas rum suḇedi.
41001030	Simon imbanyori ḇyis ḇo ḇyarek. Skokofen ḇadir beri dafduf ani faro Yesus.
41001031	Inja Yesus rya myam bin ani, i kin ḇrasi ma Ḇyausi. fyor ya beri ḇasḇis anya ibur i. Ma posa bin anine duf farmyan sko.
41001032	Ro mandira ya, rofyor ori syun kwar, sun snonkaku ḇeduf ma snonkaku rur-ḇemaḇak sisawoḇer sya kam faro Yesus.
41001033	Inja kawasa ḇero mnuḇeba anya sya kame, siryur ro rum ya rawendi.
41001034	Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇesma dafduf ḇeḇor ansi, ma rur-ḇemaḇak sya iyaw sibor kaku; imewer ḇyuk fa rur-ḇemaḇak ansya sawosri, snar sifawi I kwar.
41001035	Ḇyarḇir meser ro arwo prim ya, Yesus ikḇok ma isasyar ḇe moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa oso ma ḇye nadi ro diwa.
41001036	Ḇape Simon kuker min ḇyesi siyaw user I.
41001037	Rofyor sisrowi, sikofen ḇei ḇo soḇe: "Kawasa sya kame, ssewar au!"
41001038	Inja Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorama, kora ḇe moḇ ḇese, ḇe mnu-mnu ḇeba ḇefanam nane, insa Yakḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine kako ro diwa, snar si ḇeḇewar Yarama ya!"
41001039	Ma Yesus rya ḇe sup Galilea ḇesiper, ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye anya ro rum Ari sena, ma iyaw rur-ḇemaḇak sya.
41001040	Snon ḇeduf pado oso ryama faro Yesus i, ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon Ḇyedi ma dor fafnoḇek ro I ḇo doḇe: "Sye, Wamarisen ido Buk pararei ḇe aya!"
41001041	Yesus sneri iswar kufi, inja isawar ra pyan ro snon anya ma ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Yamarisen. Waprei ro dafduf bedi!"
41001042	Rofyor ya beri dafduf pado anya isyof buri, ma iprei.
41001043	Yesus iwan ifa ibur, ḇo danun pakrek faroi ḇo doḇe:
41001044	"Waswarepen, wapok fa baḇdas awer parare bedine faro manseirya kaker, imboi rwa fasna mankundau faro imamsya, ma buk farsarser ḇekar parare ḇedi, imnis sasoser Musa ḇyani insa ḇye fasasnai-kaku faro si."
41001045	Ḇape snon anya ibur ma ḇyaḇdas parare ḇyanya ḇe moḇ-moḇ na kam, isof Yesus ipok fa syun fababa wer ro mnu ḇeba ani ḇa. Ḇyarek ro moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa na, ḇape kawasa siswek i ḇesya kwar beraker moḇ nakam.
41002001	Ras ri ḇeso nawase, Yesus Kyaḇer wer ḇe Kapernaum, ma abar nakofen ḇadir isya ro rum.
41002002	Mura kawasa sya srama spanjuḇer rao moḇ anna nafyos, ma kedwaya ḇarpondi kako. Rofyor ḇyaryas wos ya faro kawasa ansi,
41002003	snonkaku ono sisya sun snon ḇeapaper oso faro i; ma snon rifiak skoḇar i kuker waryar oso.
41002004	Ḇape sisma nya no ḇa fa suni faro Yesus, snar donek ya iba, mura skek kukeri ma skoḇas rum ya bori imnis kaku murḇaḇ ro moḇ Yesus Kyon ro ya, posa skokyui ro ḇarpon Ḇyedi.
41002005	Rofyor myam kakyar skoḇena, ikofen faro snon ḇeapaper anya ḇo Doḇe: "Ne rumkun Yedi, wasma payasyos ro sasar ḇena kwar!"
41002006	Ḇape ro moḇ anya snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya ono sisya kako, inja skara fasis ro sisnes na ḇo soḇe:
41002007	"Rosai ḇefnai fa snonkaku ine dawos rarirya? Donef Allah. Mansei nari ḇepok fa ḇeḇuk ampun ro sasar, nkofawi monda Allah mankundi.?"
41002008	Ḇape Yesus myamkir swaruser ma karkara sena, inja ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkokara ro mkosnemna rarirya, snaro?
41002009	Rosai ḇepyan syadi ya, Yakofen ḇe snon ḇeapaper ine ḇo yoḇe: Wasma payasyos ro sasar ḇena kwar roḇa i do: wakḇoke, wakanow yar ḇena ma wambran.
41002010	Ḇape insama mkofawi ro supswan ine Rumkun Snonkakuya ipok ipyos sasarna." Ma ikofen kaku faro snon ḇeapaper anya ḇo doḇe:
41002011	"Yakofen kaku faro au, wakḇoke, wakanow yar ḇena ḇo wabur ḇe rum bedi!"
41002012	Ma snon ḇeapaper anya ikḇoke, ikanow yar ḇyena ma isasyar ro fandu kawasa ansya, isof sikandor kam ma sisandik Allah ḇo soḇe: "Roi ḇera dine, nkomam ono ḇaim!"
41002013	Raimnai Yesus rya wer ḇe danosen andir ya, ma kawasa sya kam sra yoḇ i inja fyarkor si.
41002014	Posa, rofyor imbran uk ro moḇ anya, myam Lewi Alfius mandaḇendi kyain ro rum ḇeyor som ya, inja ikofen ḇe i ḇo doḇe: "Waso Aya!" Mura Lewi dores ma isoi.
41002015	Raimnai rofyor Yesus inanus Lewi rorum ḇyedi, snon ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasar sibor saknan warpu i kuker manfamyan ḇyesi, snar kawasa ḇeso i sya sibor kaku.
41002016	Rofyor snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ro ḇar Farisi sya smam Yesus inan fnoḇek snon ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasarsya inja sifuken faro manfamyan ḇyesi ḇo soḇo: "Snaro Yesus danan us ḇeyor som ma kawasa ḇesasarsya?"
41002017	Yesus imnaf wos anya ma ikofen yoḇ si ḇo doḇe: "Snonkaku ḇepre syama sefandun dokter ḇa, imboi ḇeduf sya kada. Yarama ine, yaḇe yor snonkaku ḇenapes ḇa, imboi kawasa ḇesasar!"
41002018	Ro fafisu oso, rofyor Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesi ma kawasa Farisi sfarfor, snonkaku ono srama ro Yesus ma sifuken ḇo soḇe: "Snaro Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesya ma snon Farisi manfamyan sesya sfarfor ḇoi, manfamyan ḇesya sakfarfor ḇa?"
41002019	Yesus Kyarem ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Jadi fa manfakawin ya bati ḇyesya sfarfor rofyor isya kuker si? Rofyor manfakawin anya isya kaker ro fandu si, nari sipok fa sfarfor ḇa.
41002020	Ḇape nari fafisu ya isyama manfakawin anya ssun i bur si, ma rofyor anya insape sakfarfor.
41002021	Snonkakuyo ḇyuk kruḇen ker ḇebabo yo syokop marwai yo ḇaim, snar rarirya ido nari kruḇen ker ḇebabo ya syawek fanuk marwai ani, imuk naba syadi wer.
41002022	Rarirya kako, snonkaku yo nari isar swan ḇebabo yo ro kibon ḇeḇerereyo ḇa, snar rarirya ido, swan ansya nari sisai pef kibon ḇeḇerere ani, ma swan kuker kibon sudawer kame. Inja swan ḇeḇabo ya, ipyum syadi ḇyeḇeser ro kibon ḇebabo kako!"
41002023	Ro ras Mananai Yahudi oso Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya simbran uk ro yaf gandum oso, ma ro fyor simbran anya manfamyan ansya spanuk gandum yorem ono.
41002024	Inja snon Farisi sya sikofen faro i ḇo soḇe: "Mam kada! Snaro manfamyan ḇesya sifrur roi kopok fa kofrur ḇaḇeri ro ras Mananai Yahudi?"
41002025	Yesus Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkowasya roi Daud ifrurna ḇaim ke? Rofyor i ma ḇeso i sya sananjar ma sibiser,
41002026	rariya syun ro rum Allah, rofyor Abyatar ḇye imam ḇeba ya, dan mamami farsarser-snonkaku ḇese sakan ḇa derer imainsya kada ma ḇyuk kako faro ḇeso isya."
41002027	Ma Yesus ikofen ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Ras Mananai Yahudi ḇyeḇefrur faro snonkaku sya, ḇoi snonkaku sya seḇefrur faro ras Mananai Yahudi yaba,
41002028	inja Rumkun Snonkaku Ya kako Ḇye Manseren faro ras Mananai Yahudi ya."
41003001	Ḇarpur Yesus syun wer ḇe rum nadi. Ro diya snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar oso daksun.
41003002	Snon Farisi ono sisya ssḇair, imbude Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snon anya ro ras Mananai Yahudi yandi, insama rarirya ido ssḇuk sasar ḇe Yesus.
41003003	Yesus ikofen faro snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar anya ḇo doḇe: "Rwama wores ro fa-du!"
41003004	Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Ne, rosai ssḇuk fa kofrur ro ras Mananai Yahudi yani, ḇaḇe naḇye ya ke, frur fanor i, kofanaḇak kankenem snonkaku ke komun si?" Ḇape ssḇe fasis monda.
41003005	Yesus Fyafayaf snar ḇaḇe marares sena ma kuker masasor myam yar si ḇo Ikofen faro snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar anya ḇo doḇe: "Fos ḇramsi!" Ma snon anya fyos ḇrasi ma iprei.
41003006	Ro diya snon Farisi nansya si sasyar ma se sne oser kuker snon Herodiani sya fa soḇe ssmun Yesus.
41003007	Ḇarpur Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesi sisusu bur ḇe danosen ya, ma kawasa Galilea siḇor sisoi.
41003008	Siya sibor kako sra ker Yudea, Yerusalem, Idumea, war Yordan ḇar iwara, Tirus ma Sidon, srama faroi, snar simnaf Yesus fararur ḇyena.
41003009	Yesus iwan manfamyan ḇyesya fa ssfasos wai ya faroi snar imkak donek ya sifyosepen indi.
41003010	Snar snonkaku ḇeduf ifrur fa ḇeprei sibore, ro diya ḇeḇeroro ro dafduf sibor sra yoḇ i ma sifyos apepeni imfa siḇe sspan roi.
41003011	Rofyor rur ḇemaḇak sya smam i, sisapi ma sḇansuba faroi ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma sar naba: "Au ine Rumkun Allah."
41003012	Ḇape Yesus ḇyewef si snar imewer kaku ssḇaryas indi.
41003013	Imnai ro diya Yesus dek ro urek oso. Dor snon imarisen sya ma srama yoḇi.
41003014	Kyinfir snon samfur seser risuru fa sifnoḇek i, insa nya si ḇe manfamyan fa ssḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya,
41003015	ma ḇyuk papoik faro si fa ssḇukyau rur ḇemaḇak sya.
41003016	Snon samfur seser risuru isiḇer ansya sisosine: Simon, nyir i kako ḇe Petrus,
41003017	Yakobus Zebedeus mandaḇendi ma Yohanes Yakobus ḇedardi, snon suine nyir su ḇe Boanerges isoine romawa karadu,
41003018	ḇefnoḇek kako sya sisosine Andreas, Pilipus, Bartolomeus, Matius, Tomas, Yakobus Alfeus mandaḇendi, Tadeus, Simon snon Selot,
41003019	ma Yudas Iskariot, na ḇeḇoḇ Yesus.
41003020	Ḇarpur wer Yesus syun ro rum oso. Kawasa sibor kaku ssfanjur wer isof skoḇe skonano jadi ḇa.
41003021	Fyor ya Yesus naek ḇyesya simnaf moḇ ine, ssrama ssiḇe ssun i, snar soḇe swar user ḇyena namnis ḇa kwar.
41003022	Rofyor ya kako ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ḇera ker Yerusalemsya sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Rodur Ḇeelzeḇul syouri, ma: 'Kuker snopor mananir rur ḇemaḇak iyau rur ḇemaḇak sya.' "
41003023	Ro diya Yesus dor si ma fyarkor si kuker wos sarḇer, ḇo doḇe: "Rariso ro kakara mkoḇena ibiris iyau ibirisya?
41003024	Ḇaḇesasoser oso fyarmafmef ido na isonem ḇa,
41003025	ma sim oso kina byena sun besisya, sim ani ipok isonemba kako.
41003026	Rarirya kako rur ḇemaḇak ya, ḇye mbroḇ mankundi isof irarwas ido na ipok fa isonem ḇa, imnis ra fafisu ḇyeja iḇro kwar.
41003027	Rarirya snon oso ipok syun fa fyasyar snon ḇesambraḇ oso arasa ḇyena ro rum ḇyedi ḇa rofyor snon ḇesambraḇ ani ḇyeḇefes ḇaim. Rofyor snon ḇesambraḇ ani siyaḇeki kwar in sape arasa ḇyena sfasyarna.
41003028	Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko: Sasar ma anonef ḇeḇor romawa snonkaku sya sena kam nari nasma ampun.
41003029	Ḇape oso doḇe donef Rur-ḇesren ya ido, ima na isma ampun ḇa fyoro-fyoro, mboi syasar snar ifrur sasar ḇekain fyoro-fyoro."
41003030	Yesus ikofen rarirya snar soḇe rur ḇemaḇak ya syouri.
41003031	Yesus snari ma naek ḇyesya sra yoḇi. Sores ro ḇandi ḇo siwan ono ḇese fa sor Yesusi.
41003032	Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇekain yar-yar Yesus sya sikofen faroi ḇo soḇe: "Ne, mam kada snami ma naek Bansi ḇeyores ro ḇandi siwa, ssewar fa siḇe sisrow Au."
41003033	Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mansei Yana ḇe sna ma naek?"
41003034	Myam yoḇ kawasa ḇekain yar-yar i ansya raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Sine sna ma naek srar Ayesi rya.
41003035	Mansei ḇeḇeuser Allah marisen ḇyena, sirya naek snon ma srar bin ma sna Ayesi rya."
41004001	Rofyor oso Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor wer ro danosen andir ya. Ma kawasa donek ḇefnak ḇa siryur yar i, inja dek ro wai ḇepyar na iya fa kyain ro wai anya ḇoi kawasa ansya ssna ro ḇonde ro danosen andir ya.
41004002	Ma ḇyuk farkarkor faro si roi nabor kuker sarḇer. Ro farkarkor ḇyena ikofen faro si ḇo Doḇe:
41004003	"Ne mkorower! Snon ḇekekef mor oso isasyar fa kyekef mor.
41004004	Rofyor daḇuḇer mor ono sisapi ro nyan andir, ma man sya san si ra siḇro.
41004005	Mor ono sisapi ro moḇ ḇeḇe karui, ḇeḇe saprop ḇekpor ḇa, inja mor anna nasur fasau snar saprop ya isrepek.
41004006	Fama rofyor oridek ma isam nakam nnmaryoi snar ne rares ḇa.
41004007	Mor ono wer sisapi ro moḇ ḇeḇe kaḇraiborek, ma kaḇraiborek anna naduḇ epen si isof simar, inja ssḇuk bon ḇa.
41004008	Mor ono kada sisapi ro saprop ḇepyum ma sisur pyum kaku ḇo simarem, bon nna ono ne samfur rikior ono ne samfur riwonem ma ono wer ne utin oser."
41004009	Ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mansei ḇeḇe kna fa imnaf ido imnaf naḇye!"
41004010	Fafisu Yesus derer ro mankundi, ḇeso i sya ma manfamyan snon samfur seser risuru ḇyansya sifuken i ro sarḇer ani.
41004011	Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Kankunes Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇyeḇeḇair kwar faro mko, ḇape faro snonkaku ḇese roi ḇeḇor anna neḇefarkor ḇe si kuker sarḇer,
41004012	insa: Se mka fa smam ḇape skara na ḇa, se kna fa simnaf ḇape sifawi kankunes ḇyeja ḇa, imbude simbror ḇo sisma ampun di."
41004013	Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Inja mkofawi sarḇer ine kankunes ḇyeja ḇake? Rarirya ido nari mkofawi sarḇer ḇese na kankunes nena rariso?
41004014	Ḇekekef mor anya kyekef wos ya.
41004015	Snonkaku ro nyan andir ro moḇ wos ya ḇyeḇekekef ro nanya, isoine ḇemnaf wos ya, raimnai biris ya ryama pyoser wos insandi simnaf anna bur si.
41004016	Rarirya kako mor ḇeḇeḇekekef ro moḇ ḇeḇe karui isoine, snonkaku ḇemnaf ma ḇeryaḇ fasau wos anna fa sna na.
41004017	Fama wos anya ḇye rares ḇa inja kyain kawan ḇa. Rofyor kandera ma marindi nkur si snar siso wos refo ya inja sisusu beri.
41004018	Ma mor ḇese ḇesapi ro mbron kaḇrai borek, isoine ḇemnaf wos ya,
41004019	raimnai makakak faro supswan ma faraurowes nana ma raryaḇ faro roi ḇese nsun ma nposer wos anya isof ḇye bon ḇa.
41004020	Ḇarpur kaku mor ḇesapi ro saprop ḇepyum, isoine snonkaku ḇemnaf ma ḇekram wos anya isof wos anya ḇye bon, ono ne bon samfur rikior, ono ne bon samfur riwonem ma ono wer ne bon utin oser."
41004021	Ma Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snonkaku spam padamara fa srir i ro bade ya baḇdi ḇa roḇaido kamboi anenef ro ya baḇdi ḇa, ḇoi sriri ro kadadu ḇyedi.
41004022	Snar roi oso ipok iyokef ḇa ḇoi na kam nnbair ro sananai ya, ma roi oso ḇye ḇefamyun ḇa snar na kaem nnfababa.
41004023	Mansei ḇeḇe kna fa imnaf ido imnaf naḇye!"
41004024	Raimnai ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Mkokara roi mkomnaf na! Warnkyara mkoḇukkara naek mkoḇesi nari ssḇuki dakkara au kako ma nari isyadi wer faro au.
41004025	Snar mansei ḇesma roi ono ido nari ssḇuk faroi wer, imboi mansei ḇesma roi ono ḇa, rosai wer isma na nari ssun na buri."
41004026	Raimnai Yesus doḇe: "Ḇaḇesasoser Allah moḇ ryaya isoine: imnis raris snon beḇuḇer mor ro saprop,
41004027	posa roḇ-meser denef ma ikḇok, imboi mor ḇyuḇer ansya sikpireu, sisur ma sikaki, ḇeker anya fyaun warek si ḇa.
41004028	Sup ro saprop ya do i so ḇeḇuk bon, randak ya ne yof, ne yorem, ḇarpur ne bon posa nakraf.
41004029	Rofyor bon anna nnmas kwar snon ḇeker anya kyaruk na snar fafisu afuf ya imnis kwar."
41004030	Yesus ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Kuker rosai koḇuk karkara mura ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ya, oroḇaido kuker wos sarḇer rosai koḇuki ikofen fasnai ya?
41004031	Ḇaḇesasoser anya imnis raris sasawi mor ssḇuḇer ro saprop ya ḇo. Sasawi mor ya iso ḇebaḇa syadi mor rokaker ḇese kam ḇero sup ya bori.
41004032	Ḇape rofyor ssḇuḇeri isur ma iba syadi rofaran ḇese na kam ma ḇye snau ḇeba, isof man ḇero farsyos sya ssmun narem ro kadaun ḇyena."
41004033	Kuker wos sarḇer ḇeḇor ḇera dine Yesus fyarkor wos ya faro si imnis raris fawawi sena,
41004034	rarirya Yesus fyarkor kawasa ansya kuker sarḇer monda, ḇape faro manfamyan ḇyesi kada fyasna ḇair kankunes ro sarḇer anna kame.
41004035	Ro ras anya mun mandira ya Yesus ikofen ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorama kokaḇor ḇe ḇar iwara."
41004036	Skobur kawasa ḇeḇor ansya ḇo skokaḇor ma wai ḇese kako nakso Yesus.
41004037	Fyoro ḇa wam doḇer ma bak na nek ro waiya ra fanam imsar.
41004038	Fafisu ya Yesus denef ḇo fyak noraya ro waiya urndi. Ma manfamyan ḇyansya ssḇani ḇo sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mankorari yo, au ma ḇefandun ko ḇa ḇo na koro!"
41004039	Yesus ikḇok ma myunwarek wam ya ma ikofen faro danosen ya: "Wamnai! Wa-brin!" Ma wam anya imnai beri ḇo danosen anya iḇrin dam.
41004040	Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snaro mko mkak mankenem rarirya?"
41004041	Simkak kaku ḇo sawos yae ro mankun si: "Inja snon saisoine, isof wam ma danosen ya kako nakso wos ḇyena?"
41005001	Ma skofyafer ro danosen ya ḇar iwara ro sup kawasa Gerasa sya sedi.
41005002	Yesus dado bur waiya rande beri, snon rur ḇemaḇak sisower oso rya ker kubir na muma fa isrou Yesus.
41005003	Snon anya ikenem ro kubir anna snar snonkaku yo syambraḇ fa iyaḇek i ḇa, snar siyaḇek i kwar kuker wanka,
41005004	apyaur fama pyauk ma imerdawdiwer na, isof snonkaku yo syambraḇ fa fyadurui ḇa.
41005005	Ras roḇ imbran ḇyediwai ro kubir ma urek na ḇo ḇoi fyararar ma ikoḇ mankundi kuker karui.
41005006	Yesus ḇyinkwan kaker ḇesya ḇo myam raroi, inja ifrar fa isroui ma ḇyan suba faro Yesus,
41005007	ma dar naba ḇo doḇe: "Nyaki rosai ḇekur au ma aya, ne Yesus Manfun Allah ḇekaki syadi? Kuker snonsnon Allah Wafrur susa awer aya!"
41005008	Snar rofyor Yesus ikofen kwar faro i ḇo doḇe: "Ne, au rur ḇemaḇak, wasasyar bur snon ine!"
41005009	Raimnai ifuken snon ani: "Snombri so?" Kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Snonsnon ayeja isoine syaran-syaran snar inkobore."
41005010	Snon rur ḇemaḇak sya ssour anya dor samsom insa Yesus iyaw awer rur ḇemaḇak ansya bur sup ani.
41005011	Ro diya randip nai yo simbran ssewar nanan ro urek fuwar oso,
41005012	inja rur ḇemaḇak ansya ssor faro Yesus ḇo soḇe: "Wawan inko fa inkosun ro randip siwa!"
41005013	Yesus ḇyuk raris fararyor seja ma rur ḇemaḇak ansya sisasyar bur snon anya fa ssun ro randip ansi. Randip nai anya soper ro fofen ya ma simsar kam ro danosen ya ma simar: barbor seja fanam syaran risuru.
41005014	Raimnai ḇewaren warek randip ansya sifrar ḇe mnu ḇeḇa ma mnu-mnu mawa fa sḇaryas inja kawasa ansi sisasyar fa sakmam rosai ḇeḇe jadi kwar ya.
41005015	Srama faro Yesus ma smam snon rur ḇemaḇak sya ssour anya kyain, syansun i ma iknon dam, ḇape simkak.
41005016	Snonkaku ḇemam roi ḇeḇe jadi anna sfarfyar faro ḇerama babo ansya rosai ḇeḇe jadi kuker snon rur ḇemaḇak sya ssower anya ma randip ansi.
41005017	Simnaf rarirya sor faro Yesus insa ibur sup sedi.
41005018	Rofyor Yesus dek wer ro waiya snon insanja rur ḇemaḇak ssour anya dor faro Yesus insa imarisen ido iso I.
41005019	Yesus iso marisen ḇyedi ḇaḇoi ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Wabur ḇe rum bedi ma kawasa ḇero mnu bedi ma ḇaryas faro si roi ḇeḇor Manseren Allah ifrur kwar faro au ma rariso Allah fyasna saswar ḇyedi faro au."
41005020	Snon anya ibur ma fyawar ro sup Dekapolis roi ḇeḇor Yesus ifrur kwar faro i ma si kam sikandor.
41005021	Yesus skokaḇer ker Gerasa skofyafer ro Kapernaum wer kawasa sibor srama sisrou i. Isya kaker ro danosen andir ya.
41005022	Mananir rum nadi oso ryama, snonsnon ḇyedi isoine Yairus. Fyor myam Yesus, ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi,
41005023	ma dor faro i ḇo doḇe: "Inai iyeja iduf marḇak ma fyanam imar, rwama kada insa pan ro i fa iprei ma ikenem wer."
41005024	Inja Yesus iso snon ani. Kawasa donek ḇefnak ḇa sakso i, ma sifyos epen Yesus.
41005025	Ro fandu kawasa ansya bin oso isya iduf dafduf rik taun samfur seser risuru kwar,
41005026	rarwan nabor kwar ifrauk dokter sibor fa ssḇuk aryawin ro dafduf ḇyedi isof nana ḇyena naḇro fama iprei ḇa ḇoi dafduf anya iba syadi wer ro randak ya.
41005027	Imnaf abar kwar ro naek ḇyesi ro Yesus fararur ḇyena inja ro fandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansya ryama fyanam Yesus kruri ma pyan ro sansun syatu Yesus ḇyena,
41005028	snar kyara ḇo doḇe: "Rofyor yapan monda ro sansun ḇyena nari yaprei."
41005029	Fafisu ya beri dafduf ḇyeja imnai ma ḇyaḇir baken ḇyeja iprei kwar.
41005030	Ro fafisu ya beri Yesus ḇyaḇir samambraḇ ono nasasyar bur i, inja isiḇer fa myam sewar ro fandu kawasa ansya ma ifuken: "Mansei ḇepan ro sansun syatu ayena?"
41005031	Manfamyan ḇyesya sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mam kawasa ḇeḇor sine sifyos apepen au ḇesya ḇo: wafuken mansei ḇepan ro aya?"
41005032	Ḇape Yesus myam yar-yar fa fyawi manseiso ḇepan ro i nya.
41005033	Bin anya imkak snar ifawi rosai ḇeḇe jadi kwar ro i, inja ḇyan suba ro Yesus ḇarpon ḇyedi ma kuker napnapes ikofen ḇadir faro Yesus.
41005034	Yesus ikofen faro bin anya ḇo doḇe: "Ne, inai Yedi, kakyar beja ḇyuk aski faro au. Wabur kuker aski ma waprei ro dafduf bedi!"
41005035	Rofyor Yesus dawawos kaker, snonkaku ono kina mananir rum nadi anya ḇyansya srama sikofen ḇadir ḇo soḇe: "Inai banya imar kwar inja wafrur susa awer mankorari I."
41005036	Ḇape Yesus ḇyefandun wos sena ḇa ḇoi ikofen faro mananir rum Ari anya ḇo doḇe: "Wamkak awer, wakyar monda!"
41005037	Raimnai Yesus damrer ono siso indi, ḇoi derer kuker Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes Yakobus ḇedari ḇyedi.
41005038	Skorama ro mananir rum nadi anya rum ḇyedi ma Yesus myam kawasa sya sembrus, skanes kuker mkarem ḇeba.
41005039	Yesus syun ro rum anya ma ikofen faro kawasa ansya ḇo doḇe: "Snaro mkoḇe mbrus ma mkokanes? Inai ine imar ḇa ḇoi denef!"
41005040	Ḇape simbrif i. Ma iyaw kawasa ansya raimnai dun inai anya snari ma kmari ma suiso ḇeso i randum ro sim inai anya ḇyedi.
41005041	Ma Yesus kyin inai anya ḇrasi ḇo ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Talita kum," isoine: "Ne inai aune, yakofen faro au, wakḇoke!"
41005042	Fyor ya beri inai anya ikḇok fa dores ma imbrane, snar ḇye umur taun samfur seser risuru kwar. Kawasa ḇero diya nansya kam sikandor fafaya ḇa.
41005043	Yesus danun pakrek kaku faro si insa oso ifawi awer roi nane ma iwan fa sfan inai ani.
41006001	Ḇarpur Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesya ssraḇe mnu marin ḇyedi.
41006002	Ro ras Mananai Yahudi, Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum Ari ḇero Nazaret ma kawasa Jemaat ḇeba anya sikandor snar simnaf farkarkor ḇyena, inja sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Moḇ saiso isma roi ḇeradine ro ya? Fawawi sanaiso ssḇuk faroi? Isof ifrur aḇyair ḇefrur kanandor ḇera dine kuker ḇramin ḇye suine?
41006003	Ko kam kofawi i ḇe sukan ai, Maria romawa ḇyedi, naek ḇyesi so Yakobus, Yoses, Yudas ma Simon? Ma kofawi kako srar ḇyesya sisya ro fadu ko?" Ro diya snar siwarki i mura siyaw i.
41006004	Inja Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Nabi oso se mafi ro moḇ na kam, ḇoi ro mnu ḇyedi ma fandu kawasa ḇyesi ma rum ḇyedi, sefandun mankuni ḇa."
41006005	Yesus Imewer ifrur aḇyair kanandor oso ro diya ri, imboi ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf ri ḇeso monda kuker pyan ro si.
41006006	(6a) Yesus Kyara si ma ikandor snar kakyar ḇa sena. (6b) Raimnai Yesus Imbran yar mnu ḇe mnu fa ḇyuk farkarkor.
41006007	Yesus dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansya ma iwan si fa se suru-suru. Ḇyuk samambraḇ faro si fa ssḇuki yau rur ḇemaḇak sya,
41006008	ma danun faro si insa ssun awer roino ro marandan sedi, ankyon na manda, mboi ssun awer mamami, ssun awer roi ḇeḇaryam, ssun awer kako pipi ma ḇeḇoḇek sena.
41006009	Mkowemna kada mkosower na mboi mkun sansun risuru ḇa.
41006010	Yesus dawos pdef faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorafa ro moḇ oso ra simarisen fa mkosun ro rum oso ido mkokain ro dia isof mkosasyar bur wer ro moḇ ani.
41006011	Imboi ro moḇ oso simarisen mko ḇa ma simewer srower mko ido ro moḇ anya mkokokef fafen ḇero mkowemna fa ne aḇyair faro si."
41006012	Inja sra ma ssḇaḇdas faro kawasa sya fa simbror,
41006013	ma siyaw rur ḇemaḇak sibor ma ssrem ḇeduf sibor kuker mani ma ssḇuk pararei faro si.
41006014	Wairek Herodes i kako dakmnaf Yesus snar Ḇye snonsnon ma kawasa sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Yohanes Ḇemasi diḇri ro fandu ḇemar sya ḇefnai samambraḇ-samambraḇ na nafararur roi."
41006015	Ono soḇe: "Elia i ri!" Ḇese sya wer soḇe: "Nabi sya oso irya ke imnis raris nabi ro ḇepon iwara."
41006016	Rofyor Herodes imnaf rarirya ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Roḇa, Yohanes yaperem uk sasukor anya irya, i so ḇeyiḇer wer i."
41006017	Snar kaku Herodes i ḇewan fa sfor Yohanes fa se wanka i ḇo ismai ro bui snar dun Herodias ḇedar ḇyeja Filipus swar i, fa fyakawini.
41006018	Snar fafisu oso Yohanes fyarkor Herodes ḇo doḇe: "Swasar snar wun ḇedar beja swa ḇyedi!"
41006019	Knam ḇeḇedar fa Herodias imsor famyun Yohanes ro sneri ḇo syewar nyan fa iḇe myun i fama jadi ḇa,
41006020	snar Herodes ḇyemaf Yohanes i snar ifawi Yohanes snonkaku ḇenapes ma ḇesren inja fyadiren i. Ḇape rofyor imnaf sap Yohanes sneri ḇyefisfyas, rarirya no imarisen imnaf i.
41006021	Herodias insape isma fafisu ḇepyum ya rofyor Herodes ifrur munara ya warek ras ḇyeja faro ḇebarara ḇyesi, mambri sya ma snonkaku ḇeḇe snonsnon ro sup Galilea sya.
41006022	Ro munara anya Herodias inai dojaru ḇyedi Salome ryarpon ifyer ro ḇebarara ansya ḇarpon sedi. Wairek ikofen faro inai anya ḇo doḇe: "Wor rosai wamarisen ya ro aya imba na yaḇuk na ḇe au!"
41006023	Ma ḇye syasi faro inai ḇyanya ḇo doḇe: "Rosai waḇe wor kaker ro aya, nari yaḇuk i faro au, ḇaḇesasoser ayeja ḇar ya iryano yaḇuk i kako!"
41006024	Inja inai anya rya ifuken snari ḇo doḇe: "Rosai nari yor ḇesyani?" Snari doḇe: "Wor Yohanes Ḇemasi ḇruri!"
41006025	Rarirya fasau kaku inai anya rya faro wairek ma dor ḇo doḇe: "Yamarisen insa ro knikine beri buk Yohanes Ḇemasi ḇruri ro ben oso ḇe aya!"
41006026	Fafisu anya wairek sneri ḇye susa namsin ḇa, ḇape snar syasi ḇyedi, ma snar ḇebarara sya fyadwer fararyor anya ḇa.
41006027	Wairek iwan fasau snon-mamun ya ḇe bui, kuker sasoser insa rya pyerem uk Yohanes ḇruri. Snon anya rya pyerem uk Yohanes ḇruri ro bui.
41006028	Snon anya dun Yohanes ḇruri ro ben ya ma ḇyuk i faro inai ani, ma inai anya dakun i faro snar i.
41006029	Rofyor Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesya simnaf marmar ḇyeja srama ssun baken ḇyeja fa serak i ro kubir.
41006030	Fyoro ḇa manfamyan Yesus ḇyansya sisiḇer ma siryur kuker Yesus wer ma sfarfyar faro i roi ḇeḇor sifrur ma sfarkor na.
41006031	Inja ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorama kosewar moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa insa kemir ma komnaisu ko resari!" Snar snonkaku ḇeramuma ma ḇeramura sibor kaku isof skosma fafisu ḇa kako fa skonan.
41006032	Inja skek wai ya ḇo skora ḇe moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa oso.
