41006033	Ḇape ro fyor skek wai ya kawasa sibor smam sko, ma sifawi moḇ skora yoḇ ya. Inja simbran ro nyan bera ḇande ya ma fasaw monda kawasa ḇera ker mnu ḇeba sibor spon sko raro moḇ skoḇe skora yoḇ ani.
41006034	Ro fyor Yesus isabu ro wai ya munde, myam kawasa dandonek ḇefnak ḇa ansya inja iswar si, ḇyuk simnis domba ḇena manfakwak ḇa. Inja fyarkor si ro roi nabor.
41006035	Snar fanam roḇ kwar manfamyan ḇyansya sra faro i ma sifuken ḇo soḇe: "Moḇ ine ḇyeursḇa ma fanam roḇ kwar.
41006036	Inja wawan si fa sibur insa sskoḇes roḇeyan ḇesi ro mnu-mnu ḇefanam-nam nane."
41006037	Ḇape Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkoiso nari ḇeḇuk nanan faro si!" Sikofen faro i ḇo soḇe: "Donek ḇeḇa ḇera dine koḇoḇ dinar utin risuru wer kako fa kofan si nari imnis ḇa kako."
41006038	Ḇape ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mamami rifisi mkun ya? Indo mkomam pan!" Rofyor smam kwar sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mamami ririm ma in risuru."
41006039	Rarirya Yesus iwan fa kawasa ansya skain fa se uk-ukem ro aḇris sya bonsi.
41006040	Ma uk-ukem anna ono ne utin oser ono wer ne samfur ririm.
41006041	Ma Yesus dun mamami ririm ma in risuru kwar, iwakwaker ḇe nanki ma isawar dofen roḇean anna posa, pyanasnis na ma ḇyuk na faro manfamyan ḇyansi, insa sirarwas na faro kawasa ansya kam; rarirya kako in risuru ansui.
41006042	Kawasa ansya sanan kam isof sarbor.
41006043	Raimnai siryur roḇeyan ḇedawer na ma sisma inawen samfur seser risuru nafo, in sya ḇeso.
41006044	Kawasa snon ḇeyan mamami ro ras anya sya si kam se syaran ririm.
41006045	Posa kwar Yesus iwan fasaw manfamyan Ḇyesya fa sek ro wai ḇo spon i ḇe danosen ya ḇar iwara ḇe Betsaida, ma iwan kawasa ḇeḇor ansya fa sibur.
41006046	Rofyor sibur ḇesisye kwar, Yesus dek urek ya fa ḇye nadi.
41006047	Roḇ kwar wa anya isya ro danosen ya faduri, ḇoi Yesus demir ro ḇande.
41006048	Rofyor ya myam doḇer ya myun manfamyan ḇyansi, simbrar ḇe moḇo ḇa snar wam ya iso ro wai rawer, ma indokada oras kior, imbran ro war ya bori fa rya warek si.
41006049	Snar imbran ro war ya bori, soḇeda faknik riri, inja simkak ḇo sar naba kam.
41006050	Snar smam kami eḇedari sikandor. Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkoknon! Ayairya, mkomkak awer!"
41006051	Rarirya dek ro wai ya fa isrow si ma wam anya iḇrin bos beri. Sisnesna ne fesfyas ma sikmom.
41006052	Snar nanan mamami ḇefrur kanandor anya isya ḇye karkara kaker faro si ma siwarki ro sisnesna.
41006053	Skofyafer kwar Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skorande skopyar ro Genesaret.
41006054	Fafisu ya skado bur wai ya, kawasa ansya smam bir Yesus I.
41006055	Inja sifrar sikofen ḇair faro kawasa sya kam ro sup ani, ma sun ḇeduf sesya ro waryar faro Yesus ro moḇ simnaf Yesus isya ryo ya.
41006056	Moḇ rya yoḇ na kam ḇe mnu-mnu ma mnuḇeba-mnuḇeba kawasa srir ḇeduf sesya ro nyan andir ma sor samsom faroi, insa imarisen fa span monda ro syatu Ḇyeja pusyom na. Ma kawasa kam ḇepan roi siprei.
41007001	Fyor oso snon Farisi ono ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ono ḇera ker Yerusalem srama faro Yesus.
41007002	Smam Yesus manfamyan ḇyesya ono sanan kuker ḇramin bemamas, isoine sḇan ssibras na ḇa.
41007003	Snar Yahudi Farisi ansya simnis Yahudi ḇesesya, sanan ḇa ro fyor sḇan ssibras na ḇaim, snar se user rari up sesi ro ḇepon.
41007004	Ma rofyor skaḇer ker pasar sipok sanan ḇa kako snar simasisren si ḇaim. Rari ḇeḇe waris ḇera dine nabor kaker, ḇeraris ḇan-ḇan sek, fyom, ma rosaser sifrur ro kansai.
41007005	Naiso ḇeḇe knam fa Farisi ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi sifuken Yesus ḇo soḇe: "Snaro manfamyan ḇesya sakḇe user kpu koḇesya rari sena ḇa, ḇoi sinan kuker ḇramin ḇemamas?"
41007006	Yesus Kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Kaku ra moḇ Nabi Yesaya ḇyardi mko ra ya, snonkaku ḇarḇor ḇekenem kuker rari ḇekaku ḇa! Snar fas-fas oso ryok ḇo doḇe: Kawasa sine ssom aya kuker sḇardip monda, ḇape sisnesna nnḇinkwan bur aya.
41007007	Fainda oso ḇa sḇe ari faro aya, snar farkarkor sḇukna sasoser snonkaku nairi.
41007008	Allah sasoser ḇyena mkoḇe rer na, ḇoi mkuf rari snonkaku."
41007009	Yesus ikofen faro si wer ḇo doḇe: "Mkofawi nananem kaku isof mkosaun Allah sasoser Ḇyena insa mkofaduru rari mankun mkoḇena."
41007010	Snar Moses dakkofen kako ḇo doḇe: "Be maf kmami ma snami! Imboi: mansei ḇefras kmari roḇa snari kada na imar.
41007011	Ḇape mkokofen ḇo mkoḇe: Rofyor oso ikofen faro kmari roḇa snari: rosai yana fa yaḇuki fyaduru mu, yaḇuk na nnfarser isoine samsom faro Allah,
41007012	imboi mkorir si ḇaḇeri fa sifrur roi oso faro kma sesi roba sna sesi.
41007013	Rariya Allah wos ḇye mkofarkor ya mkoso i ḇa, snar mkoso syadi rari mkoḇena. Ma roi ḇerarirya kaker naiso mkofrur na."
41007014	Raimnai Yesus dor kawasa ansya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko kam mkomnaf faro aya, ma mkokram pyum wos Yakofen nane.
41007015	Rosai rya wer ḇero ḇondi, ma ḇesun ro snonkaku sya oso, napok nafrur mamas si ḇa, ḇoi roi ḇesasyar ro snonkaku sya naiso ḇefrur mamas na. [
41007016	Mansei ḇeḇe knaram fa ḇyukrower iḇye ryower pyum!]"
41007017	Ro fyor Yesus syun ro rum oso fa ryir kawasa ḇeḇor ansya, manfamyan ḇyesya srama fa sifuken kankunes ḇero wos sarḇer ani.
41007018	Rarirya Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Inja mko kako mkakfawi kankunes ḇyeja ḇa ke? Mkofawi roi ḇeḇor ḇero ḇandi fa ḇesun ro snonkaku sya napok nafrur mamas snonkaku sya ḇa.
41007019	Snar roi ḇesun anna nnsun ro kakara sena ḇa ḇoi nnsun ro sasop sena posa sisawen na ro akyek!" Rarirya Yesus fyasna roḇean nakam nasren.
41007020	Ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Rosai ḇesasyar ro snonkaku sya na kada nafrur mamas si.
41007021	snar roi ḇero sne snonkaku nasasyar ro swaruser ḇarḇor, nafsu kraf, karau, mamun,
41007022	farḇakḇuk, rmomen, ḇarḇor, ankarkar, nafsu kraf, masasor anonef, kafkofen, marares, ḇaḇe dip.
41007023	Roi ḇeḇyeḇa ḇera dine nek ro sne karkara ma naiso ḇefrur mamas snonkaku sya."
41007024	Raimnai Yesus imbran ro dia ma ryaḇe sup Tirus. Rya ro Tirus syun ro rum oso ro mnu ifyafer ro ya kuker kankunes, insa kawasa sya sifawi awer raramuma Ḇyedi.
41007025	Imboi bin oso inai ḇyeja rur ḇemaḇak ya isawoḇer i, imnaf Yesus ryama, mura ryama ḇyansuba ro wessu.
41007026	Bin anya bin Yunani er Siria-Fenisia. Bin anya dor samsom faro Yesus insa Iyau rur ḇemaḇak ḇesawoḇer inai ḇyedi.
41007027	Ma Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Ipyum syadi romawa ḇena roḇean na sya sarbor resari, snar roḇean ḇefasos faro romawa sya kopok kosawen na faro naf sya ḇa."
41007028	Ḇape bin anya kyarem faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Kaku ḇaḇoi Manseren, ḇape naf ḇero meja ya baḇdi sya kako sakan roḇean mom romawa sya san ḇo ḇesapi na."
41007029	Inja Yesus ikofen faro bin anya ḇo doḇe: "Snar wos ḇena, rwamura beri, inari rur ḇemaḇak anya isasyar kwar bur inai bani."
41007030	Bin anya ibur ḇe rum ḇyedi, ma isrow inai ḇyeja ḇyarek ro anenef ḇyedi ḇoi rur ḇemaḇak ya ibur i kwar.
41007031	Raimnai Yesus ibur sup Tirus imbran uk Sidon fa ryaḇe danosen Galilea, dun uk sup Dekapolis faduri.
41007032	Ro diya kawasa sya ssun snon ḇepro ma ḇewos kir ḇa faro Yesus ma sor faro Yesus insa Isawar dofen snon ani.
41007033	Ma rofyor Yesus dun snon anya fa subur kawasa ḇeḇor ansya raimnai isu ḇrampinsi ro snon anya knaram ḇyeja ma daninef ro ḇrasi posa pyan ro ramar ḇyedi.
41007034	Raimnai Yesus myam ḇe nanki ma imnai ḇe do ma ikofen faro snon anya ḇo doḇe: "Efata!" isoine: Base!
41007035	Rofyor anya beri knasi ḇyas ma ramar ḇyeja kako imarmer ma dawos pyum.
41007036	Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇero moḇ ya insa sfarfyar awer faro manseirya wer kako. Ḇape rofyor Yesus myun warek si insape sḇaryas syadi wer.
41007037	Sikandor ma sikmom ma sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Ifrur roi ḇeḇor nakam napyum kaku, ḇepro sya srower, awer sya ḇyuk fa sawos wer."
41008001	Rofyor anya kawasa sya sibor kaku sisya ro moḇ ani, ma snar sisma nanan ḇa inja Yesus dor manfamyan ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe:
41008002	"Sneri iswar kuf kawasa ḇeḇor ansine. Ras rikior siso farma aya ḇape sisma nanan ḇa.
41008003	Ma rofyor Yawan fa sibur ḇe rum sena kuker basbiser ido nari ono sisapi snar ono sra ker moḇ ḇeḇinkwan."
41008004	Manfamyan ḇyesya skarem faro i ḇo soḇe: "Rariso ro moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa ine nari kofan si kuker mamami isof sarbor kam?"
41008005	Yesus ifuken faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkosma mamami rifis?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Mamami rifik."
41008006	Raimnai iwan kawasa ansya fa skain kame. Posa dun mamami rifik anna ma ḇye nadi kuker na ra posa pyanasnis na ḇo ḇyuk na faro manfamyan ḇyesya fa ssḇuk ḇerwas kawasa ansi.
41008007	Sisma kako in ono ma ssḇuk si faro Yesus fa ḇye nadi kuker si ra posa sirarwas si faro kawasa ansi.
41008008	Ma san kam isof sarbor. Posa siryur mamami ḇedawer na sisma inoken rifik nafo.
41008009	Kawasa ansya kam fanam syaran rifiak. Insape Yesus iwan si fa sibur.
41008010	Yesus dek fasau ro wai kuker manfamyan ḇyansya fa skoraḇe sup Dalmanuta.
41008011	Fafisu ya Farisi ono sra faro Yesus fa sifuken sye i. Mnuk ḇeḇe knam fakfuken sye ine faro Yesus, simarisen sor ro Yesus aḇyair oso ro nanki.
41008012	Inja ro fafisu anya fiafayaf ro sneri ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Snaro syos ine mkor aḇyair? Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko, faro syos ine jadi fa mkosma aḇyairo ḇa."
41008013	Posa Ibur si; dek ḇe wai anya wer ma sskobur ḇe danosen ya ḇar iwara.
41008014	Ro fafisu anya Yesus manfamyan ḇyesya se pro ssun mamami faro nanan sena. Smam rosaser seja mamami oser baken monda ro wai ya.
41008015	Yesus ḇyuk swarapepen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkowaren ma mkepen mko roi yar roi ḇefrurpis kawasa Farisi ma roi ḇefrurpis Herodes."
41008016	Inja skara ma sikofen yae faro si ḇo soḇe: "Dawos rarirya snar koḇe pro kokoḇes mamami faro ko."
41008017	Rofyor Yesus ifawi rosai ḇeḇe knam sawos yae ro mankun si, ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snaro mkawos yae mko ro mnuk mamami ḇa? Inja mkofawi ḇaim kaker ke? Mkosnemna napakrek kaker?
41008018	Mkoḇe mkamor ḇape mkomam ḇa, mkoḇe knaram fama mko mnaf ḇa kaker?
41008019	Mkoswar epen fafisu yapanasnis mamami ririm faro snonkaku syaran ririm ya ḇake, mkoryur ḇedawer na inawen riḇeso skofo?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Inawen samfur seser risuru."
41008020	"Ma rofyor mamami rifik faro snonkaku syaran rifiak, ḇedawer na mkoryur inawen rifis?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Inawen rifik."
41008021	Ma Yesus Ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Inja mkofawi ḇaim kaker?"
41008022	Ḇarpur Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skorama ro Betsaida. Ro Betsaida kawasasya ssun snon ḇepraf oso faro Yesus ma sor faro Yesus insa pyan ro i.
41008023	Yesus ikfin snon ḇepraf anya ḇo duni ḇe mnuya ḇondi. Surandi kwar Yesus daninef ro snon anya mkasi posa ryir ḇrasi ro snon anya ḇo ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Inja mam roino kwar ke?"
41008024	Snon anya myam ḇe ḇarpon ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Yamam snonkaku sya simbran farma, ḇape sisnai imnis aiknam bembran farma."
41008025	Yesus ryir ḇrasi wer ro snon anya mkasi ma myam bos beri ma iprei isof myam ḇaḇir roi ḇeḇor na kam.
41008026	Raimnai Yesus iwan i fa ibur ḇe rum ḇyedi ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Swun ḇe mnu ya awer!"
41008027	Raimnai Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skora wer ḇe mnu ḇefanam sup Kaisarea Filipi. Ro marandan anya Yesus ifuken manfamyan Ḇyesya ḇo doḇe: "Kawasa sya soḇe manseiso aya ine?"
41008028	Skarem faroi ḇo soḇe: "Ono soḇe Yohanes Ḇemasi, ono wer soḇe: Elia, ono wer kako soḇe: oso ro fandu nabi-nabisya."
41008029	Yesus ifuken wer faro si ḇo doḇe: "Imboi mko ido rosai mkakkofen ro aya?" Inja Petrus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Au ido Wairek!"
41008030	Raimnai Yesus myun warek si insa sikofen ḇair awer faro mansei rya wer.
41008031	Raimnai Yesus fyarkor randak faro si, nari Rumkun Snonkaku ya isma marindi nabor ro ḇebarara sya ma mananir Imam ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya simeweri ma smuni, ḇape nari diḇri ro ras ḇeḇe kiorya.
41008032	Marindi nari ḇekur i na ikofen bos na. Inja Petrus ismer Yesus ḇe ḇondi ma imsor I.
41008033	Raimnai Yesus iknenef fa myam yoḇ manfamyan Ḇyesya ma Imsor Petrus i ḇo doḇe: "Ne, Biris wabur aya, kwara roi Allah Kyara na ḇa ḇoi kwara karkara snonkaku."
41008034	Raimnai Yesus dor kawasa ḇeḇor ansya ma manfamyan Ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Snonkaku mansei ḇemarisen ḇeso aya iḇye kada ḇye pro mankundi ḇo ḇyar aprop ḇyedi ma duser aya.
41008035	Snar mansei ḇeyoḇe ḇefaspar kankenem ḇyedi nari kankenem ḇyedi ryo buri; ḇoi mansei kankenem ḇyeja ryo bur i snar aya ma snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya, nari isma kankenem ḇyedi.
41008036	Fainda rosai snonkaku oso nya ḇesiper supswan ḇoi, kankenem ḇyeja ryo buri?
41008037	Ma nari rosai isma fa ḇyuk farwe kankenem ḇyedi?
41008038	Snar mansei ḇemai aya ma wos ayena ro fandu syos babo ḇesapurnak ma ḇesasar mko ine, Rumkun Snonkaku ya kako nari dakmai snas rofyor ifyafer kuker payamyum Kmari ḇyena ma malaikat ḇesren sya siyakeri muma ya."
41009001	Ikofen wer faro si ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko, ro fandu snonkaku ḇeryur sine ono nari simar ḇa isof sakmam Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇerama kuker papok kwar."
41009002	Ras riwonem nawas ido Yesus dun Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes sko ḇo skek bon ḇekaki oso. Ro moḇ anya skerer monda. Rofyor anya Yesus Fyadwer mankundi ro ḇarpon mamam skoḇena,
41009003	ma syatu Ḇyena napioper bos ma nasnaper. Bepapap sansun ro supswan ine oso fa nari pyap saranden rarirya ḇa.
41009004	Skomam wer Elia ma Moses suyawawos kuker Yesus.
41009005	Petrus ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Raḇi, marisen ḇefnak ḇa koro moḇ ine. Iḇye kada nkofrur aḇdares rikior, oso ḇe au, oso ḇe Elia ma oso ḇe Moses."
41009006	Ikofen rarirya, snar ikmom rosaiso iḇe ikofenya, snar skomkak mankenem.
41009007	Fyor anya mandep oso ryama isawoḇ sko ma mkarem oso ryok ro mandep anya ḇo doḇe: "Ine ma Manfun saswar ayedirya, mkomnaf I."
41009008	Fyoro ḇa skomam snonkaku ono sisya sifnoḇek sko ḇa ḇoi Yesus derer.
41009009	Rofyor skado bur bon ani, Yesus ḇyeasas insa skofar awer faro snonkaku oso ro roi ḇeḇor skomam anna isof Rumkun Snonkaku diḇri ro kubir ro fandu ḇemar sya resari.
41009010	Skoswarepen asas ani ma skofuken yae sko ro rosai Yesus ikofen ḇe "aḇiḇer ro fandu ḇemar sya."
41009011	Inja skofuken Yesus ḇo skoḇe: "Snaro snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi sikofen ḇo soḇe, nari Nabi Elia pyonma resari?"
41009012	Yesus Kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Imboi Elia nari pyonma fa ḇye user roi ḇeḇor na kam resari. Imboi rariso kuker rakrok fasfas ḇekur Rumkun Snonkaku ḇeyoḇe: Nari Yesus isma marindi nabor ma sonefi?
41009013	Ḇape Yakofen ḇe mko: kaku Elia pyon ma kwar, ḇoi snonkaku sya sifrur marisen sena faro i raris moḇ nabisya ssfas kwar fa ḇekuri."
41009014	Ro fafisu Yesus, Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes skokaḇer faro manfamyan ḇese ansi, skomam kawasasya sibor siyaryar manfamyan ansya ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ono sisya sfamfaḇri roi oso kuker si.
41009015	Fyor kawasa ansya smam Yesus, sikandor ma srama sisrow I.
41009016	Ma Yesus ifuken si ḇo doḇe: "Rosai mkawos faro si?"
41009017	Snon oso ro fandu kawasa ansya ikofen faroi ḇo doḇe: "Mankor ari ye, yun romawa yedine faro au, snar rur ḇemaḇak ya isawoḇeri.
41009018	Ma rofyor rur anya isawoḇeri ipyas i ro saprop ya bori ma sbari kyaḇaḇus, darek fafais nasi ma ipadadorem. Yor kwar faro manfamyan Besya, fa siyau rur anya fama sipok ḇa."
41009019	Ma Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesya ḇo doḇe: "Ne syos ḇekyar ḇa mko ine, fafisu rosai nari yarous kaker mko? Fafisu rosai kaker yakbab mko? Mkun romawa anya muma!"
41009020	Ma ssun romawa anya faro Yesus. Rofyor rur ḇemaḇak anya myam Yesus, isasas romawani, ipyas i ro saprop ya bori ma isuwayafer ḇo ḇyai kaḇaḇus.
41009021	Raimnai Yesus Ifuken faro romawa anya kmari ḇo doḇe: "Inja iduf fyoro kwar ke?" Romawani kmari kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Ro fyor ibaḇa ya.
41009022	Indo rur ḇemaḇak ya ismeri fa ikuni ro for, isaweni ro war fa iḇe myuni. Inja au ma Wapok fa Wafrur roi ḇeḇorna kam, yor fa wafnoḇeki ma Waswar inko."
41009023	Yesus Kyarem faro i ḇo doḇe: "Inja woḇe: na wapok ido? Faro snonkaku ḇekyar sya roi ḇeḇor na kam nari ndarirya."
41009024	Romawa ani kmari dar naba ḇo doḇe: "Yakyare. Wafnoḇek snonkaku ḇekyar ḇa aya ine!"
41009025	Rofyor Yesus myam kawasa sya sibor siryur yoḇ sko, iyau rur ḇemaḇak ani: "Ne, au rur ḇemaḇak ḇefrur fa snonkaku sya seawer ma siproi, Yayau au wasasyar bur romawa ine, wapok wawer wer fa swun ro i ḇa!"
41009026	Ma rur ḇemaḇak anya isasyar ma dar naba ḇo kyakiker romawa ani namsin ḇaḇeri. Romawa ani isnai imnis ḇemar, inja kawasa sya sibor soḇe: "Imar kwar."
41009027	Ḇape Yesus kyin romawa anya ḇrasi ma ikḇok ro mankundi.
41009028	Rofyor Yesus syun ro rum oso, ma derer kuker manfamyan Ḇyesi, sifuken i ḇo soḇe: "Rosai ḇeḇe wari nkopok nkoyau rur ḇemaḇak anya ḇa ya?"
41009029	Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rur ḇeḇesneya koyaui kuker nyan ḇese ḇa, ḇoi kuker nadi monda."
41009030	Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya simbran ro dia ma ssunuk Galilea ma imewer oso ifawi marandan skoḇedine;
41009031	snar imarisen fyarkor manfamyan Ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rumkun Snonkaku nari sḇoḇi faro snonkaku sya fa smun i ma ro ras rikior nawas nari diḇri."
41009032	Sikmom roi Yesus ikofen ya, fama simkak sifuken faroi.
41009033	Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skorama wer ro Kapernaum. Ro fyor syun kwar ro rum oso, ifuken faro manfamyan Ḇyesya: "Rosaiso insandi mkofamfabri ro nyan ya?"
41009034	Ḇape sefasis snar insandi ro marandan seja sfamfabri mansei ḇeba syadi ro si.
41009035	Inja Yesus kyain ma dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko no doḇe fyabri fa iso ḇepon ya, iḇye syadi iso ḇepur kaku ya fa duf farmyan ḇese sya kam."
41009036	Raimnai Yesus dun romawa kasun oso fa dores fandu si, posa fyorepen romawa anya ma ikofen ḇo doḇe:
41009037	"Mansei ḇefaduru romawa ḇera dine snar snonsnon ayedi, i kada dakfaduru aya. Ma mansei ḇefaduru aya ido, ayaiso fyaduru ya ḇa ḇoi bewan ayanya iso fyaduru ya."
41009038	Yohanes ikofen faro Yesus I ḇo doḇe: "Mankorari ye, nkomam snon oso ḇeyakso ko ḇa ḇape iyaw rur ḇemaḇak kuker snonsnon ḇedi, inja nkomun warek i snar dakso ko ḇa."
41009039	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkomun warek awer i! Snar snonkaku oso ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor kuker snonsnon ayedi, ipok donef aya ro fafisu ya ḇa.
41009040	Mansei ḇesampum ko ḇa ikada ifnoḇek ko.
41009041	Yakofen wos ḇekaku faro mko, mansei ḇeḇuk war aninem sek oser faro mko snar mkuser faku Kristus i nari isma ḇaḇyak."
41009042	"Mansei ḇefarkor ninyan oso ro fandu romawa kasun ḇekyar aya sine, ipyum syadi sfes karui ḇeba ro sasuri ḇo simsaweri ro soren.
41009043	Ma ḇramin ḇe suiya oso daw ninyan au ido kwaruki, snar iḇye wer swun ro kankenem ya kuker ḇaramuk, imbude sisawen au rofor ḇembrer ḇa kuker ḇramin ḇesiper. [
41009044	Ro moḇ anya karom sya simar ḇa ma for anya ipok imbrer ḇa.]
41009045	Ma rofyor wemin besu suyau ninyan au kwaruk su, snar iḇye wer swun ro kankenem ya kuker wemuk, ipyum syadi ro sisawen au rofor ḇembrer ḇa kuker wemin besu; [
41009046	rofor anya karom sya sinanem ḇa ma for anya ipok imbrer ḇa.]
41009047	Ma rofyor mkamsu suyau ninyan au, wer oso, snar iḇye swun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah kuker mka oser ipyum syadi sisawen au ro for ḇembrer ḇa kuker mkamsu.
41009048	Ro moḇ anya karom sya simar ḇa ma for anya ipok imbrer ḇa.
41009049	Snar snonkaku oser-oser nari sḇuḇrei kuker karumasen for.
41009050	Fainda ro karumasen ipyum kaku ḇape rofyor ḇyuar, kuker rosai mkofruri fa miasen wer? Iḇye syadi mkomasmasen ma mkokenem kuker aski fandu min mkoḇesi."
41010001	Ro dia Yesus skora ḇe sup Yudea ma war Yordan ḇar iwara ma ro dia kako kawasa sibor srama spanjuḇer I, ma raris fararur Ḇyedi Yesus fyarkor si wer.
41010002	Snon Farisi ono sra faro Yesus fa sifrowes bir i ḇo soḇe: "Jadi fa snon oso fyaspar bur swari ke?"
41010003	Inja Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rariso kuker Moses sasoser ḇyena faro mko?"
41010004	Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Moses ḇyuk kwar fa ḇyeḇefaspar kuker syap ḇepampum."
41010005	Inja Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Imboi snar sne ḇepakrek mkoḇena ḇeḇewar Moses fyas sasoser ḇera dine.
41010006	Snar ro awar supswan Allah ifrur snonkaku snon ma bin,
41010007	inja snon oso nari ibur kmari ma snari su ma ḇye oser kuker swari,
41010008	isof suḇe kraf oser. Rarirya suḇe baken risuru wer ḇa ḇoi suḇe oser.
41010009	Inja rosai Allah fyesepen kwar, snonkaku sya sipok sfaspar awer."
41010010	Ro fafisu skorandum ro rum oso manfamyan ḇyensya sifuken Yesus ro yar ine.
41010011	Ma Yesus ikofen ḇe si ḇo doḇe: "Mansei ḇefaspar swar i, raimnai dun bin ḇese, irya ifrur far-ḇaḇuk faro swa ḇepon byedi.
41010012	Rarirya kako bin oso fyaspar swari ma fyakawin snon ḇese, i kako ifrur farḇuk."
41010013	Ma kawasa sya ssun romawa kapira ono faro Yesus insa ḇye barakas si, ḇape manfamyan ḇyesya sisonek kawasa ansi.
41010014	Rofyor Yesus myam rarirya, imsor ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkorir romawa ansya fa sra yoḇ aya, imboi mkomunwarek awer si, snar snonkaku ḇera dine sya siso ḇenai Ḇaḇesasoser Allah.
41010015	Yakofen kaku ḇe mko: Mansei ro mko imarisen daknai Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇape dakmnis romawa kapira ḇa na daksun ro i ḇa."
41010016	Raimnai fyoraḇen romawa kasun ansya ma pyan rosi ḇo ḇye barakas si.
41010017	Rofyor Yesus imbran pdef ro marandan ḇyedi, snon oso ifrar yoḇi ma ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ifukeni ḇo doḇe: "Mankorari ḇeḇye, na rosai yafrur fa yaksma kankenem ḇemnai ḇa ya?"
41010018	Yesus kyarem faroi ḇo doḇe: "Snaro wor ayaḇe ḇeḇye? Oso ro fandu snonkaku iḇye syadi Allah ḇa, Allah demir.
41010019	Wafawi Allah sasoser ḇeḇor ḇyena kwar: Nari mamun awer, nari wafrur farḇakḇuk awer, nari kwarau awer, nari be saksi ankarkar awer, nari wayaḇyoḇer snonkaku nana sena awer, ma ḇe maf kmami ma snami su!"
41010020	Ma snon anya ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Mankorari yo, roi wakofen nane kam yaḇe user na rofyor yaba ḇa ya."
41010021	Ḇape Yesus myam yoḇi ma sneri iswari mura ikofen faroi ḇo doḇe: "Imboi roi oser wer iso ḇemnis ḇaim ro au; wabur mura, boḇ kayan ḇena, bukna faro kawasa ḇesaḇarar sya, snar nari wasma kayan ro nanki, raimnai rwama waso aya."
41010022	Imnaf wos anna fyafayaf ḇo ibur kuker sne ḇefafardun snar kayan ḇyena nabor kaku.
41010023	Raimnai Yesus myam manfamyan ḇye ḇeyores yar i ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Syamswen kaku faro snon ḇenana sya saksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
41010024	Manfamyan ḇyesya sikmom rofyor simnaf wos ḇyena. Ma Yesus Ikofen wer ḇo doḇe: "Romawa yena mko, kosun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ya syamswen fafaya ḇa.
41010025	Onta oso syun ro wairus mkir ya ipyan ro snon benana oso daksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
41010026	Sikmom syadadi wer ma sawos yae ro mankun si ḇo soḇe: "Rarirya ido nari mansei ḇesma koreri ya?"
41010027	Yesus myam yoḇ si ḇo doḇe: "Faro snonkaku roi ḇera dine ndarirya ḇa, ḇape rarirya ḇa faro Allah. Snar roi nane ndarirya faro Allah."
41010028	Ḇarpur wer Petrus ikofen faro Yesus i ḇo doḇe: "Nkoine nkobur pres nana nkoḇena snar nkoso Au!"
41010029	Yesus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen kaku faro au, snonkaku oser-oser ḇebur rum ḇyedi, naek srar, sna roḇa ido kma, kina ḇyena roḇa ido yaf ḇyena snar aya ma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya,
41010030	snonkaku anya ro fafisu ine kako nari isma sadwer syadi ḇe utin, rum, naek srar, sna, kina ma yaf marindi ḇemun fnoḇek na, ma ro ras ḇarpur iyama isma kenem ḇemnai ḇa ya.
41010031	Imboi kawasa ḇeḇor ḇepon ansya nari spur ḇoi ḇepur ansya nari sakpon wer."
41010032	Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya sisya ro marandan ḇera ḇe Yerusalem ma Yesus pyon si. Manfamyan ansya se fesfyas ma kawasa ḇeso skonsya simkak. Yesus dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru Ḇyansya ma Ikofen fababa rosai nari ḇekur i ḇo doḇe:
41010033	"Insape kora ḇe Yerusalem ma Rumkun Snonkaku nari ssḇuki faro mananir imam-imam ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma nari se ukum i fa imar. Ma nari ssḇuki faro er-er ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa sya,
41010034	ma nari iser anonef, aninef, ayos ma smun, ḇape ro ras ḇeḇekior ya nari diḇri ro kubir."
41010035	Sebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesu Yakobus ma Yohanes susnefer Yesus ma sukofen faro i ḇo suyoḇe: "Mankorari yo, nukyar insama Kwarem fararyor nuḇedine!"
41010036	Yesus ifuken ḇo doḇe: "Rosaiso muyoḇe Yafrur faro mu?"
41010037	Inja sukofen ḇo suyoḇe: "Wamarisen kada nari ras kokain ro payamyum Bedi numindi nyaro ḇar raku Bedi ma numindi wer nyaro ḇar rasar Bedi."
41010038	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro su ḇo doḇe: "Mufawi ro muyor ya ḇa. Jadi fa muyakinem ro sek aninem Yaḇe Yinem ma muyakmasi masasi Yaḇe Yamasi ya ke?"
41010039	Sukarem ḇo suyoḇe: "Numarisen." Yesus ikofen faro su ḇo doḇe: "Imboi na muyakinem ro sek aninem Yaḇe Yinem ya ma nari muyakmasi masasi Yaḇe Yamasi ya.
41010040	Ḇoi mnuk kankain ro ḇar raku ma ḇar rasar yeja, mankun daya Yapok fa Yaḇuk i ḇa. Mnuk anya nari ḇyeḇe ḇuk faro snonkaku mansei Allah fyasos kwar sya."
41010041	Manfamyan samfur ḇese ansya simnaf rarirya simsor Yakobus ma Yohanes su.
41010042	Ḇape Yesus dor si ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkofawi, mansei sap ḇe ḇeḇe prenta er-er ḇeḇor sya, siso ḇeḇe prenta kawasa sesya kuker ḇramin mankarmomen, ma ḇebarara sesya prenta sena nambran kuker pakakrek faro kawasa sesi.
41010043	Mkoma rarirya ḇa. Mansei ḇemarisen ḇeba ro fandu mko ido i kada nari ḇye manfyan ḇe mko,
41010044	mansei ḇemarisen ḇeba syadi kaku ro fandu mko ido i kada ḇye manfyan ḇe mko kam.
41010045	Snar Rumkun Snonkaku kako ryama insa suf farmyan i ḇa, ḇoi insa duf farmyan ma ḇyuk nyawa ḇyedi fa ḇyak namuk snonkaku ḇeḇor sya kam."
41010046	Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesya srama ro Yeriko. Ma ro fafisu Yesus isasyar kuker manfamyan ḇyesya ro Yeriko, fnoḇek kawasa ḇeḇor kaku, snon ḇesaḇarar ma ḇepraf isoine Timeus mandaḇen ḇye ḇenir ḇe Bartimeus kyain ro nyan andir ya.
41010047	Rofyor imnaf Yesus snon Nazaret anya irya, dor naba ḇo doḇe: "Yesus Daud mandaḇen ḇyedi au, waswar aya!"
41010048	Kawasa sibor se wef i insa ḇye fasis, ḇape dor naba syadi wer ḇo doḇe: "Daud mandaḇen ḇyedi au waswar aya!"
41010049	Ma Yesus imnai ḇo ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkori ma!" Sor snon ḇepraf anya ma sikofen faroi ḇo soḇe: "Wepen snembri, ma wayor au, snar Yesus dor au."
41010050	Inja doḇes syatu ḇyeja ma iyori beri fa rya isrow Yesus.
41010051	Yesus Ifuken i ḇo doḇe: "Rosai wamarisen fa insa yafrur faro au?" Snon ḇepraf anya kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Rabuni, yor fa insa yakmam e!"
41010052	Inja Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Rwa mura, kakyar beja ḇyuk aski faro au!" Ro fafisu ya kako myam beri, ma iso Yesus ro marandan Ḇyedi.
41011001	Rofyor Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skofanam kwar ḇe mnu ḇeba Yerusalem, fanam mnu Betfage ma Betania ḇekain ro Urek Zaitun, Yesus Iwan manfamyan risuru rosi.
41011002	Kuker ananun ḇo doḇe: "Mura ḇe mnu ḇero ḇarpon muḇedi. Rofyor musun ro dia, nari musrow keledai babo oso isya sfesepen i, snonkaku sek i ro ras o ḇaim. Muperi ḇo muyuni muma.
41011003	Ma rofyor ono sifuken faro mu ḇo soḇe: snaro mufrur rarirya, mukofen faro si ḇo muyoḇe: Manseren ḇye fanduni. Nari Kyaḇer fasaui muma wer."
41011004	Inja sura mura beri, ma susrow keledai babo oso sfesepen i ro kedwai ḇero barpon ya ḇandi ro nyan andirya inja superi beri.
41011005	Ma snonkaku ono sifuken su ḇo soḇe: "Ne, muper keledai ya faro?"
41011006	Inja sukarem raris moḇ Yesus ikofen faro su rai. Inja snonkaku ansya smam monda su.
41011007	Ma suyun keledai anya faro Yesus ma sḇor dokor ya kuker sansun sena, raimnai Yesus dek roi.
41011008	Kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sḇor sansun sena ro nyanya, ma ono wer skek ai ram ssun ro yaf na.
41011009	Snonkaku ḇembran ro ḇarpon ma ḇeyuser ro ḇarpursya ssibras ḇo soḇe: "Hosana! Yesus ḇerama ro snonsnon Manseren, isma barakas,
41011010	Ḇaḇesasoser beramayan isma barakas, Ḇaḇesasoser kma koḇedi Daud, Hosana ro moḇ ḇekaki syadi!"
41011011	Sra kwar ro mnu ḇeba Yerusalem Yesus syun ro Rum Allah. Ro dia myam user na kam, ḇape snar fanam roḇ kwar Yesus kuker manfamyan samfur seser risuru Ḇyesya sisayar ḇe Betania.
41011012	Meserdi Yesus ma manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansya sskobur mnu Betania kwar, Yesus ibiser.
41011013	Skobinkwan kaker ḇo myam ara knam oso ḇye ram kwar. Inja imbran yoḇ i fa Myam pan ḇye bon ri. Ḇape rofyor isya ro fuar ya kwar myam fama ḇye bon ḇa ḇoi ḇye ram monda, snar mamarem ḇyedi sya ḇa.
41011014	Inja ifras ara knam anya ḇo doḇe: "Na isof fyoro-fyoro snonkaku oso dan bon ḇena wer ḇa!" Ma manfamyan Ḇyesya sakmnaf fras ani.
41011015	Raimnai Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skorama ro mnu ḇeba Yerusalem. Rofyor Yesus syun kwar ro Rum Allah, iḇyaḇer snonkaku ḇefarḇaḇyan sya bur buḇes Rum Allah. Meja ssḇuk sadadwer pipi ma banku ḇeḇaḇoḇ manjawa sya sena pyambar na,
41011016	ma ḇyuk ḇa beri fa snonkaku ḇeyun papus simbranuk ro buḇes Rum Allah.
41011017	Raimnai fyarkor si ḇo doḇe: "Mkofawi fas-fas ḇerok ḇo ḇeyoḇe: Rum ayedi na snir i ḇe rum Ari faro ersya kam? Ḇape mkoine mkofruri ḇe nas faro kawasa ḇeḇarḇor!"
41011018	Mananir imam-imamsya ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya simnaf roi ḇeḇe jadi ani, mura ssewar nyan fa siḇe smun i, snar smam kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sikandor farkarkor Ḇyena.
41011019	Fanam roḇ mura Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skosasyar bur mnu beba ani.
41011020	Ro arwo babo ya rofyor Yesus ma manfamyan Ḇyesya skombranuk wer ro moḇ ara knam ani, ssmam ara knam anya myas ro ḇidwom isof ro rares ḇyena.
41011021	Ro diya Petrus iswar epen roi ḇeḇe jadi kwar anya, inja ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Rabi ye, wakmam kada, ara knam wafras anya myas kwar."
41011022	Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkokyar faro Allah!
41011023	Yakofen faro mko: Oso ḇye kaku fa ikofen faro bon ine: Wakḇaken ma rwop randa wamsawer ro soren! Oso ḇe ḇirḇar ḇa ḇoi wakyar nako ido nari roi wakofen na nejadi rarirya.
41011024	Inja Yakofen ḇe mko: Rosairya wer mkor ma mkonadi wark na, mkokyar imnis raris mkosma na kwar, ma nari Allah Ḇyuk na faro mko.
41011025	Ma rofyor mkofasos fa mkoḇe nadi mkoswarepen insa mkoḇuk ampon faro snonkaku mkomsor sya ro mkosnemna resari, insa Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa dakḇuk ampon faro mko ro sasar mkoḇena. [
41011026	Mboi mkoḇuk ampon ḇa ido, Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa dakḇuk ampon ḇa kako ro sasar mkoḇena.]"
41011027	Raimnai Yesus kuker manfamyan ḇyesya sra wer ma ro mnu ḇeba Yerusalem. Rofyor Yesus imbran ro Rum Allah ya buḇes ya, mananir imam-imamsya ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi ma snon ḇebarara sya, srama sifuken Yesus ḇo soḇe:
41011028	"Kuker snopor rosai bukfrur roi ḇeḇor nane? Ma mansei ḇeḇuk snopor anya faro au, isof wafrur roi ḇeḇor nane?"
41011029	Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Na Yaḇuk fakfuken oser faro mko. Mkokarem ḇeponi ḇe aya insape na Yakofen ḇadir snopor saiso yakfrur roi nane kam ya faro mko.
41011030	Masisren Yohanes ryamuma ro boiyaswa ke snonkaku? Indo mkokarem ḇe aya pan!"
41011031	Sawos yae ro mankun si ḇo soḇe: "Na kokofen ḇo koḇe masi sren Yohanes ryama ker boiyaswa, na ikofen ḇo doḇe: rarirya ido snaro mkokyari ḇa?
41011032	Ḇape rariso na kokofen ḇo koḇe: Ryama ro snonkaku!" Snar simkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, snar snonkaku sya kam siwasen ḇo soḇe Yohanes nabi rirya kaku inja simkaki.
41011033	Mura skarem faro Yesus ḇo soḇe: "Nkofawi ḇa." Inja Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rarirya ido aya kako nari Yakkofen ḇair snopor saiso Yakfrur roi ḇeḇor nane faro mko ḇa."
41012001	Raimnai Yesus dawawos faro si kuker wos sarḇer ḇo doḇe: "Snon oso dom yaf anggur ya, posa dar warek i. Raimnai ḇyai ner ssḇuk kafos anggur ya, ma ifrur kako kaderen moḇ ssḇukwaren warek yaf ya. Neḇe fasos kam kwar ido ḇye asas yaf anya faro snonkaku ḇesma sasuref fa ḇewaren warek ma ḇefararur ḇoi ryaḇe sup ḇese.
41012002	Ma ro fafisu mamarem ya, iwan manfamyan ḇyesya oso faro ḇewaren ma ḇefararur ro yaf ani, insa dun rarwas ḇyeja ro si.
41012003	Ḇape sfor manfamyan anya ma siprer i, posa siyaw i fa ibur beidi.
41012004	Ḇarpur wer iwan manfamyan ḇyesya oso ḇese wer faro si. Manfamyan anya siprer kir ḇruri ma sonefi.
41012005	Ḇape iwan manfamyan ḇyesya oso ḇese wer, ma manfamyan anya smuni. Ma iwan snonkaku sibor syadi mura wer, ḇape siprer ono ma smun ono.
41012006	Snonkaku oser isya kaker, isoine Rumkun iswar kuf ya. Papupes ya iwani faro si, snar kyara ḇo doḇe: Romawa ayedine nari se maf i.
41012007	Ḇape snonkaku ḇewaren yaf ya ansya sikofen yae ḇe si ḇo soḇe: i ḇeḇe warisi, mkorama komuni, insa kona waris ḇyedi.
41012008	Rarirya sfori, ma smuni, ma sisaweni ro yaf ya ḇandi ri.
41012009	Inja nari rosai ḇena yafya ifrur faro si? Nari ryama myun snonkaku ḇewaren warek ma ḇye asas yaf anya faro kawasa ḇese.
41012010	Mkowasya mnuk ine ḇaim ke? Karui sukan ḇeḇawes rum sisawen ya iso ḇeḇe jadi karui dopir ro rum ya:
41012011	Roi ḇera dine ne jadi ro ḇar Manseren ya Ḇyedi, fararur ḇefrur kanandor faro snonkaku ko."
41012012	Rarirya esewar nyan fa sfor Yesus, snar sifawi, si Yesus Syarḇer yar sya. Ḇape simkak faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansya, inja sibur ḇesisyei.
41012013	Ḇarpur wer siwan snon Farisi ma Herodian ono faro Yesus kuker fakfuken wos peper oso.
41012014	Snonkaku ansi sra faro Yesus ma sifuken ḇo soḇe: "Mankor ari ye, nkofawi au snonkaku ḇenapes, ma wamkak mansei ḇa kaker, snar swewar snonsnon ḇa, ḇoi farkor napnapes Allah nyan Ḇyena. Jadi fa sḇak som faro kaisar ke roḇa? Inja nkakḇak ke roḇa?"
41012015	Ḇape Yesus ifawi ḇarḇor sena inja ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rosai ḇefnai fa mkoḇe mkofrowes ḇir aya? Mkun pipi dinar oso ma Yakmam!"
41012016	Inja ssḇuk pipi dinar ya faroi. Mura ifuken si ḇo doḇe: "Fanir ma fas-fas manseiso ine?" Skarem ḇo soḇe: "Fanir ma fas-fas kaisar."
41012017	Ro dia Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rarirya mkoḇak faro kaisar rosai mkoḇuk faro kaisar ma faro Allah rosai mkoḇuk faro Allah!" Fyor simnaf kankarem Ḇyedine sikandor fafaya ḇa.
41012018	Saduki ono sra faro Yesus fa sifuken i ro yar aḇiḇerya, snar sima sikyar aḇiḇerya ḇa. Sifuken Yesus I ḇo soḇe:
41012019	"Mankor ari ye, Moses fyas prenta ine faro inko: Rofyor snon oso imar bur swari ma suna romawaba, inja naek ḇyedi fyakawin i insa nya rumawa oso fa syadweri.
41012020	Mambekanaek rifik. Ḇeponya fyakawin bin oso ma ssuna romawa ḇa ḇo imar bur i.
41012021	Ḇeḇe suru ya dakfakawin bin anya wer, ssuna romawa ḇa ḇoi dakmar. Rarirya kako kuker snon ḇeḇe kiorya.
41012022	Rarirya kuker snon rifik ansya sfakawin kam bin ani, ḇape nya romawa oso fa syadwer skomindi ḇa. Ḇarpur bin anya dakmar kako.
41012023	Ro ras aḇiḇerya, mansei ro fandu mambekanaek ansya ḇeḇe swa faro bin ani? Snar skoḇuk kam bin anya kwar."
41012024	Yesus kyarem faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko ma mkoḇor bos beri, snar mkofawi wos ḇero refo ya ma papoik Allah ya ḇa.
41012025	Snar rofyor snonkaku sya siḇer si ro fandu ḇemar sya, nari sfakawin wer ḇa, imboi sikenem imnis malaikat ro boiyaswa.
41012026	Ma kako ro aḇiḇer ḇemar sya, mkowasya surat Moses ḇa ke, ḇekur farfyar aikus, rariso moḇ Allah dawos faro i ḇo doḇe: Aya ine Allah Abraham, Allah Isak ma Allah Yakup?
41012027	Manseren Allah ima ḇye Allah faro snonkaku ḇemar sya ḇa, ḇoi Allah faro snonkaku ḇekenem. Mkoḇor bos beri!"
41012028	Ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi oso, ḇeyakmnaf snon Saduki ḇefuken sye Yesus ma ḇefawi kako Yesus kyarem mnis kaku faro si, inja rya faro Yesus ma ifuken ḇo doḇe: "Sasoser saiso ḇeba syadadi ya?"
41012029	Yesus Kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Sasoser ḇeba syadadi isoine: Ne, kawasa Israel mkomnaf Allah mkoḇedi, i Manseren Mankundi.
41012030	Waswar Manseren Allah ḇedi kuker sne ḇesiper ma rur bedi ḇesiper ma karkara ḇena ḇesiper ma samambraḇ bena kam.
41012031	Ma sasoser ḇeḇe suru isoine: waswar snonkaku min besi imnis waswar mankundau. Sasoser ḇese oso iba syadi ro sasoser suine ḇa."
41012032	Raimnai snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi anya ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Imnis kaku ḇeri, Mankor ari, wos Bedi kyaku, Manseren Mankundi derer baken, oso ḇese ḇa ḇo derer Manseren Allah.
41012033	Kaku ḇeri koswar Manseren kuker sne ḇesiper ma kuker fawawi ḇesiper ma kuker samambraḇ ḇesiper ma koswar snonkaku min koḇesi imnis koswar mankun ko, iba syadadi farsarser ḇekun faro Allah ma farsarser aiwan bekaruk."
41012034	Yesus myam fawawi ḇero kankarem byana, inja ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Au kada binkwan bur Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇa!" Ma oso ḇye kir fa ifakfuken roi ḇese faro Yesus ḇa.
41012035	Ro fafisu oso rofyor Yesus Ḇyuk farkarkor ro Rum Allah, ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Rosai ḇeḇedari snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sikofen ḇo soḇe: Daud rumkun ḇyediso Wairek?
41012036	Daud mankundi ikofen kuker sḇayo rur ḇesren: Manseren ikofen kwar faro Manseren yedi: Kwainkada ro ḇar raku Yedi, isof Yaḇe fa mbroḇ besya kam sḇar wemsu.
41012037	Daud mankundi dap Yesus ḇe Manseren, snaro dap ḇe rumkun ḇyedi wer?" Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansya simarisen simnaf Yesus.
41012038	Ro farkarkor Yesus Ḇyena ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkoḇe sasor mko ḇur snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudi, ḇemarisen ḇembran kuker syatu ḇekwan ma ḇemarisen ḇesma samsom ro pasar,
41012039	ma ḇemarisen ḇekain ro ḇarpon kaku ro rum ari, ma moḇ ḇepyum ro munara na,
41012040	ma ḇeyoren kabom sya rum sena, ma ḇemun warek mamam snonkaku kuker nadi ḇekwan sena. Si ma nari sisma samamyai ḇemarḇak syadi."
41012041	Ro ras oso Yesus kyain fanam burua farsarser ma myamepen kawasasya rariso ro rarir pipi sena ro burua ani. Ma myam snon kayan ono ssḇuk pipi sya sibor kaku.
41012042	Myam kako bin kabom ḇesaḇarar oso ryama dakrir remis risuru, isoine sen oser.
41012043	Inja Yesus dor manfamyan Ḇyesya ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen faro mko, bin kabom ḇesaḇarar ine ḇyuk sibor syadi ro kawasa ḇerir pipi ro burua farsarser ine.
41012044	Snar si kam ssḇuk ro kayan sena, ḇape kabom ine ma ḇyuk ro ḇaḇe saḇarar ḇyedi, nana ma an ḇyena kam."
41013001	Fyor Yesus isasyar bur Rum Allah, manfamyan Ḇyesya oso ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Mankor ari ye, wakmam kada karui nane nadoser bos beri ma rum anna napduk fafaya ḇa!"
41013002	Inja Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Wakmam rum-rum ḇepduk nane? Na karui nane oso ḇyeḇe mam monda fa isyos ro oso bori ḇa, na kam nari skakok na."
41013003	Ro fafisu Yesus kyain ro urek Zaitun bori ḇo myam ḇe Rum Allah, Petrus, Yakobus, Yohanes ma Andreas skofuken fasis faro i ḇo skoḇe:
41013004	"Wakofen ḇair fafisu saiso roi ḇeḇor nane nari ne jadi ya faro inko, ma aḇyair saiso nari ḇefasna nakam ndama ro ras fawar ya."
41013005	Inja Yesus dawos faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkepen mko insa snonkaku ono sfarkor ninyan awer mko!
41013006	Snar nari snonkaku sibor srama kuker snori ma soḇe: Aya ine Yesus, ma nari sfarkor ninyan snonkaku sibor.
41013007	Ma ro fyor mkorower ruran mbroḇ roḇa abar ro mbroḇ, mkokoḇer awer. Nakam nari ndarirya, ḇape ras fawar isya ḇaim.
41013008	Snar nari er nefamfaḇri kuker er ma ḇaḇesasoser na nefamfaḇri kuker ḇaḇesasoser. Nari rim ḇeba na nmun ro moḇ-moḇ ono ma nari basbiser ya myun. Nakam nfasna randak marindi kam ḇeyun ḇe awar babo.
41013009	Ḇape mko ine mkepen pyum mko! Snar nari ssḇuk mko faro fananjur agama ma nari siprer mko ro rum ari, ma ssun mko ḇe ḇarpon besma papok wairek sya snar aya, insa ne saksi faro si.
41013010	Ḇape Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya kada nari ḇyeḇe ḇaryas faro er sya kam.
41013011	Ma ro fyor ssun mko ma sḇoḇ mko, mkokarsosen awer rosai nari mkokofen na ḇape mkokofen rosai Rur-ḇesren ya ikofen faro mko ro fafisu anya kako, snar mkoi ḇeyawawos ya ḇa, ḇoi Rur-ḇesren ya.
41013012	Naek oso nari ḇyoḇ naekri fa smuni ma rarirya kako kma oso kuker romawa ḇyedi, ma romawa sya nari srakrok kuker sinan sesi ma nari smun si.
41013013	Nari snonkaku sya kam sfafardun mko snar snonsnon ayedi. Ḇape mansei befarmku nako isof ro ras fawar ya i kada nari isma koreri."
41013014	"Rofyor mkomam fafardun ḇeyun raro ya dores ro moḇ napnapes ya iḇye kada ḇeḇe wasya mkoya mkokara naḇye --rarirya kawasa ro Yudea iḇye syadi sifrar sibur ḇe bon na.
41013015	Snonkaku ḇeyun wam ro rum ya bori iḇye isabu awer fa dun roi oso ro rum ḇyedi.
41013016	Mansei ḇero yaf ya na kyaḇer fa dun sansun ḇyena ḇa.
41013017	Susa marindi faro bin ḇemoḇes ḇa roḇaido ḇesasus sya ro fafisu ya.
41013018	Inja mkoḇe nadi insa susa marindi nakam na nanyanem awer rofyor pnunek ya myun.
41013019	Snar ro fafisu anya nari susa marindi myun, roi ḇera dine nmun ro ras no ḇaim ro randak Allah ifrur supswan ine isof babo ine ma nari ḇye jadi wer ḇa.
41013020	Ma Manseren Ḇyuk fa fafisu ya iknampu ḇa kada, nari roi ḇekenem nakam oso isma aski ḇa; ḇape snar snonkaku kyinfir kwarsya Manseren Ḇyuk fafisu ḇeknampu.
41013021	Ro fafisu anya oso ikofen faro mko ḇo doḇe: Mam kada Wairek isya ro dine, roba ido: Mam kada Wairek isya ro diwa, mkokyar awer.
41013022	Snar Wairek ḇekaku ḇa ma nabi ḇekaku ḇa sya nari sikḇawes ma sifrur aḇyair ḇefrur kanandor kuker karkara ya isoine imba kada se ḇirḇar snonkaku Allah Kyinfir sya.
41013023	Mkepen mko! Snar Yakofen ḇadir ḇepon roi nane kam faro mko kwar."
41013024	"Ḇape rofyor anya ḇarpur ro susa marindi, ori nari pyampan ma paiki isnai ḇa
41013025	ma mak sya kam nari skapaf bur nanki ma kuasa nanki na nari namarmer.
41013026	Ro fafisu anya nari kawasasya smam Rumkun Snonkaku ryama ro mandep kuker kuasa ḇeḇor kam ma payamyum Ḇyedi.
41013027	Ma ro fafisu anya kako nari iwan malaikat Ḇyesya fa sisasyar ma nari siryur snonkaku kankinfir Ḇyesi ro ḇar wambarek wamurem-wambraw ma wambrur ro dunya pember isof nanki pember.
41013028	Mkun farkarkor ro sarḇer ara knam. Rofyor snau-snau na nakpirew ma nkakyei randak mkofawi fafisu ryas ya fyanam kwar.
41013029	Rarirya kako rofyor mkomam roi ḇeḇor nane ne jadi mkofawi bos beri fafisu ḇyedi fyanam kaku kwar ro kedwa ya ḇarpondi.
41013030	Yakofen faro mko: Syos ine nari isyof ḇaim ḇoi nari roi nane kam ne jadi kaku ḇeri.
41013031	Nanki ma supya nari nasyof ḇape wos ayeja nari kyon fyoro.
41013032	Ḇape ras anya roḇa ido fafisu anya snonkaku yo ifawi ḇa, malaikat ḇero boiyaswa sya sifawi ḇa ma Rumkun ya kako roḇa, Sinan Kma ya derer monda."
41013033	"Mkosasor mko ma mkwaren! Snar mkofawi fafisu ya ryama nya ḇa.
41013034	Moḇ ine imnis bos kaku snon ḇewadwa, ḇebur rum ḇyedi ma ḇeḇe asas manfamyan ḇyesya oser-oser kuker fararur ḇyeja ma ḇeyanun faro ḇewaren kedwaya insa iwaren.
41013035	Rarirya mkowadwaren snar mkofawi fafisu rosai ḇena rum ya kyaberya ḇa, ifyafer ro mandira babo ke roḇa ido romfauru ke, roḇa ido ḇyarḇir meser muryas ke roḇa ido arwo babo,
41013036	inja rofyor ryama kanandor mko isrou awer mkoisya mkenef.
41013037	Rosai yakofen faro mko, yakofen na faro kawasa kam: Insa mkowaren!"
41014001	Ras ḇeḇa munara Paskah ma ras ḇeḇa Mamami ḇeḇe roi ḇefrurpis ḇa, ras risuru kaker insape sifrur su. Mananir imam-imamsya ma snon ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sesewar insa sfor ma smun Yesus kuker nyan ankar,
41014002	snar sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Ro fafisu munara awer, insa kawasa sya sifrur mbrus awer."
41014003	Ro fafisu Yesus isya ro Betania, ro rum Simon ḇeḇe pado ḇyedi ma sisya skain sanan, bin oso ryama faro Yesus dun paranai oso ḇese mani spum bekakur kaku. Ikob kar paranai anya kwar, isbawer mani anya ma ḇyukrem Yesus ḇruri.
41014004	Snonkaku ono simsor ma sikofen yae faro si ḇo soḇe: "Snar mani spum ine ḇyeḇe fnak fromo monda?
41014005	Snar mani ine sḇoḇi kada maeja ḇyedi dinar utin rikior isyadi ma pipi ansya koḇuk si faro kawasa ḇesaḇarar sya." Raimnai simsor bin ani.
41014006	Ḇape Yesus ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkomam mondai. Snaro mkosnuki? Ifrur fararur ḇepyum oso faro aya kwar.
41014007	Snar snonkaku ḇesaḇarar sisya faswef kuker mko ma mkofnoḇek si rofyor mkomarisen, ḇape aya ma nari Yabesya faswef kuker mko ḇa.
41014008	Ifrur roi jadi fa ifrur kwar. Baken ayeja ryemi kwar imnis fasasos faro kardir ayedi.
41014009	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri moḇ rosai Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya ssḇaḇdas i ro supswan ḇesiper, rosai ifrur ine nari sakapi kako fa ssḇukswarepen i."
41014010	Raimnai Yudas Iskariot oso ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi rya faro mananir imam-imamsya kuker kakara fa ḇyoḇ Yesus faro si.
41014011	Simarisen namsin baḇeri rofyor simnafi inja se asas ḇei nai ssḇuk pipi faro i. Ḇarpur Yudas syawar fafisu ḇepyum oso fa ḇyoḇ Yesus.
41014012	Ro ras randak ras ḇeba munara Mamami ḇepisen ḇa fafisu skaruk domba Paskah, Yesus manfamyan Ḇyesya sikofen faro i ḇo soḇe: "Moḇ sai Wawarisen nkora nkofasos meja sren Paskah ḇe au?"
41014013	Inja iwan manfamyan risuru ma danun faro su ḇo doḇe: "Mura ḇe mnu ḇeba iwa, ro diwa nari musrou snon ḇeyun war ro fyom Muso i.
41014014	Ma mukofen faro ḇena rum syun ro ya ḇo muyoḇe: Mankor ari danun: sim rosai fasos kwar faro aya insa Yan Paskah fnoḇek kuker manfamyan ayesi?
41014015	Ma snon anya nari fyasnai sim ḇeba oso ḇe mu ro ḇo ḇefasos kwar. Mufasos meja sren Paskah ḇe ko ro dia!"
41014016	Inja manfamyan ansuya sura ro mnu ḇeba ani, susrou rosai Yesus ikofen faro su anna. Ro diya sufasos Paskah ani.
41014017	Roḇ kwar ido Yesus ryama kuker manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansi.
41014018	Ro fafisu skokon skonan Yesus ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri ro fandu mko nari oso ḇyoḇ aya, isoine ḇeyanan kuker aya."
41014019	Inja se susa ma oser-oser ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Aya rya ke roḇa, sye Manseren?"
41014020	Yesus ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Snon anya isoine oso ro fandu mko samfur seser risuru ine, iso besowen mamami ro ben oser kuker aya.
41014021	Rumkun Snonkaku nari rya imnis kuker fas-fas ḇekur i, ḇape susa ḇefnak ḇa faro snonkaku ḇeḇoḇ Rumkun Snonkaku ani. Ipyum syadi snon anya ḇyeḇeyaḇen awer kada."
41014022	Ro fafisu Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skonan, Yesus dun mamami, ḇye barakas na raimnai pyanasnis na ma ḇyuk na faro si ḇo ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Mkun ma mkan, ine baken ayedirya."
41014023	Raimnai dun sek aninem ya, ma ikofen kasumasa raimnai Ḇyuki faro si, ma si kam sinem ro sek aninem ani.
41014024	Ma ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Ine rik ayedi, rik ḇeḇe asas esbawer faro kawasa kam.
41014025	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nari yinem wer ro anggur bon ḇa isof ro ras yinem wer ya, isoine ro anggur babo, ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
41014026	Raimnai skodisen dow sanandik ra posa, skora ḇe urek Zaitun.
41014027	Ma Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mko kam nari mkoḇe ḇirḇar ro kakyar mkoḇena. Snar fas-fas oso isya ro refo: Nari yaprer manfarandous ya ma domba sya skakek.
41014028	Ḇape nari yiber aya kwar ido, nari Yapon mko ḇe Galilea."
41014029	Petrus ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Naek ansine ma nari se ḇirḇar ro rakyar sena ḇoi aya ma oroḇa."
41014030	Inja Yesus ikofen faro i ḇo doḇe: "Yakofen faro au, kaku ḇeri ro roḇ ine beri nari mankoko sya sor ḇe suru baim, famyun epen aya ḇe kior kwar."
41014031	Ḇape Petrus fyaḇri syadi we ḇo doḇe: "Ne, nari yamar warpu au, yapok yafamyun au ḇa." Bese sya kako sakkofen rarirya.
41014032	Raimnai Yesus kuker manfamyan Ḇyesya skora ro moḇ ḇenir ḇe Getsemani. Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesya ḇo doḇe: "Mkokon ro dine, insa Yara Yaḇe nadi."
41014033	Ma dun Petrus, Yakobus ma Yohanes fa skoso i. Fafisu anya Yesus imkak ra ryadadai,
41014034	inja ikofen faro sko ḇo doḇe: "Sneri iswar fafaya ḇa, Yaḇaḇir imnis ra Yaḇe yamar. Mkokon ro dine ḇo mkowaren."
41014035	Imbran ḇe barpon knik ḇyan suba ro saprop ya bori ma Ḇye nadi insa jadi kada fafisu eḇesyanya isyonde bur i.
41014036	Ikofen b_o doḇe: "Sye Kamamo roi nakam naisya ro kwasa ḇedi, wun sek aninem ine bur Aya, ḇape jadi awer imnis marisen Ayedi imboi raris marisen ḇedi."
41014037	Raimnai kyaḇer ma, isrou manfamyan rikior ansko ya skenef. Ma Ikofen faro Petrus i ḇo doḇe: "Ne Simon, wenef ke? Jadifa mkowaren oras oser ḇa ke?
41014038	Mkowaren ma mkoḇe nadi, insa mkosapi awer ro fafrowes; rur iso user ḇape kraf ya ma ipok ḇa."
41014039	Raimnai rya wer ma inadi nadi insandi anya wer.
41014040	Ma rofyor kyaḇer wer isrou skenef wer snar skomkasna napok ḇa ma skofawi rosai skoḇe skokarem faro Yesus.
41014041	Ḇarpur kyaḇer ḇe ḇeḇekiorya ma ikofen faro sko ḇo doḇe: "Mkenef mura fa mkomnai su mko. Imnis kwar. Fafisuya ryama kwar, mkomam kada, sḇoḇ Rumkun Snonkaku ya faro snonkaku ḇesasar.
41014042	Mkokḇok e, mkorama kora. Ḇeḇoḇ aya nya fyanam kwar."
41014043	Ro fafisu Yesus dawos kaker, Yudas ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru Yesus ḇyansya, ryama kuker rak ḇeyun sumber ma karbere ḇesma wawan ro mananir imam-imamsya, ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya, ma snon ḇebarara.
41014044	Snon ḇeḇoḇ Yesus ḇyuk aḇyair faro si kwar, isoine: "Snon nari yasyum ya, irya, mkofori ma mkuni kuker ḇaḇye."
41014045	Ma rofyor ryama kwar ro dia, pyon fa isrou Yesus ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Rabi", raimnai isyumi.
41014046	Ro dia siserepen Yesus ma sfori.
41014047	Snon oso ro fandu sko ro moḇ anya, pyas sumber ḇyeja ma pyerem Imam Ḇeba ya manfamyan ḇyeja knasi fa imuk.
41014048	Yesus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkoḇe snon mamun ri aya ke, inja mkorama kuker sumber ma karbere fa mkofor aya?
41014049	Rasras na kam aya sya ro fandu mko ma Yaḇuk farkarkor ro rum Ari, ḇesya ḇo mkofor Aya ḇa. Ḇape rarirya kwar insa namnis fas-fas ḇero refo ya."
41014050	Ro dia manfamyan ansya sifrar siburi kam.
41014051	Ro fafisu ya snon kbor oso isya syabusuni kuker kruḇen ḇepioperya iso Yesus. Siḇe sfor i,
41014052	ḇape pyupes kruḇen anya ma ifrar ibur ḇaḇer.
41014053	Ḇarpur wer ssun Yesus I ḇe ḇarpon Imam Ḇeba sya. Ma mananir imam-imamsya, snon ḇebarara sya ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sfanjur kam.
41014054	Ma Petrus dakso Yesus ro ḇarpur kaku, isof dakrandum ro buḇes Imam Ḇeba ya ma kyon fandu ḇewaren sya ḇo dakdapen forya.
41014055	Mananir imam-imamsya, isyadi wer Kankain Kakara Agama ansya sesewar saksi ro sasar Yesus, insa nari smuni fa imar, ḇape sisma sasar oso ro i ḇa.
41014056	Snonkaku sya sibor sikofen saksi ankar ro Yesus, ḇape ḇaḇesaksi ro Yesus wos sena namnis ḇa snar nun ḇesisye.
41014057	Inja snonkaku ri ḇeso sek saksi fa se karak Yesus, kuker saksi ankar ḇera dine:
41014058	"Nkomnaf snon ine ikofen kwar ḇo doḇe: Nari Yakakok Rum Ḇesren snonkaku sya sifrur ine ma nari yaḇausi ro ras rikior wer, ḇyeḇe frur ro ḇramin snonkaku ḇa."
41014059	Ro yar ine kako ḇeḇesaksi sya wos sena namnis ḇa kaker.
41014060	Inja Imam Ḇeba ya dores ro fandu kankain anya ma ifuken Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Jadi fa kwarem roi oso ro saksi ḇeḇe karak Au sine ḇa ke?"
41014061	Ḇape ḇye fasis monda ma kyarem woso ḇa. Imam Ḇeba ya ifuken wer ḇo doḇe: "Wairek i so au ke, Rumkun Allah ḇesma sanandikya?"
41014062	Yesus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Ayai rya ḇaḇoi, ma nari mkomam Rumkun Snonkaku kyain ro ḇar raku Allah ḇepoik syadi ma ḇerama ker mandep ro nanki."
41014063	Mura Imam Ḇeḇa ani pyansawsawek mar ḇyena ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Fainda rosai kosewar saksi kaker ya?
41014064	Mkorower donef Allah kwar. Inja mkokara rariso?" Rarirya sawos namuk kuker mkarem oser, insa se ukumi fa Imar.
41014065	Randak ro dia beri ḇo snon ono saninefi, span warek mkasi skuki ma sikofen faroi ḇo soḇe: "Ne nabi, indo wakofen ḇaii pan!" Ma snon ḇewaren warek sya sakḇaseri kako.
41014066	Ro fafisu anya Petrus isya ro sop ro buḇes. Ma Imam Ḇeḇa infyan ḇyesya ia ryama,
41014067	ma rofyor infyan anya myam Petrus dakdapen for ya myam bos i, ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Au kako ḇeso sawawek Yesus, snon Nazaret ani."
41014068	Ḇape fyamyunepen ḇo doḇe: "Aya ine yafawi ḇa, ma yaḇor fnom roi wakofeni." Raimnai ryaḇe rum ya ḇarpondi [ma mankoko sya sor].
41014069	Rofyor infyan anya myam Petrus wer ikofen faro snonkaku ḇero diansya ḇo doḇe: "Snon ine oso ro fandu si."
41014070	Ḇape Petrus fyamyun epen wer. Fyoro ḇa wer kawasa ḇero diansya sikofen faro Petrus ḇo soḇe: "Kaku ḇeri au ine snon oso ro fandu si, snar snon Galilea ri sau!"
41014071	Fyor anya Petrus ifras ma fyores ḇo doḇe: "Yafawi snon mkokofen ine ḇa kaku!"
41014072	Ma rofyor ya mankoko sya sor ḇe suru. Insape Petrus iswar epen ro Yesus Ikofen kwar faroi ḇo doḇe: "Mankoko sya sor ḇe suru ḇaim, fyamyunepen aya ḇe kior kwar." Mura Petrus kyanes.
41015001	Arwo prim kaku mananir imam-imamsya fnoḇek sinan ḇeḇarara ma ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya ma Kankain Karkara Agama sya sna wos oser kam kwar. Se wanka Yesus raimnai ssuni ma ssḇuki faro Pilatus.
41015002	Pilatus ifuken Yesus ḇo doḇe: "Au ido wairek kawasa Yahudi ke?" Yesus kyarem ḇo doḇe: "Imnis wos bedi."
41015003	Ma mananir imam-imamsya se karak Yesus kuker roi nabor.
41015004	Pilatus ifuken wer faroi ḇo doḇe: "Kwarem ḇa? Wamnaf kada karak sena nabor kaku nkur au!"
41015005	Ḇape Yesus kyarem ḇa beri isof Pilatus ikandor.
41015006	Ro ras ḇeba na indo ssfaspar snonkaku ḇesmai sya oser raris fararyor kawasasya.
41015007	Ro fafisu anya snon oso snori Barabas ismai fnoḇek min ḇye ḇemamun ma ḇefrur mbrus.
41015008	Inja kawasa ḇeḇor ansya srama ma sor, insa sfaspar ḇesma oso imnis ḇepon kwar.
41015009	Pilatus kyarem ḇe si ma ifuken ḇo doḇe: "Mkomarisen fa yafaspar wairek kawasa Yahudi ine ke?"
41015010	Ifawi kwar mananir imam-imamsya sḇoḇ Yesus snar simsori.
41015011	Ḇape mananir imam-imamsya sfarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sor fa Barabas ḇyeḇe faspar faro si.
41015012	Pilatus kyarem wer ma ifuken faro si ḇo doḇe: "Rarirya ido rosai mkomarisen yafrur faro snon mkor ḇe wairek Yahudi ine?"
41015013	Inja siyiw naba wer ḇo soḇe: "Ḇyeḇe pai ro aprop!"
41015014	Raimnai Pilatus ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Ḇape sasar rosai ifrur kwar?" Ḇape ssibras naba syadi ḇo soḇe: "Ḇyeḇe pai ro aprop!"
41015015	Snar Pilatus iḇe ifrur sneprei kawasa ḇeḇor ansya sisnes na, inja fyaspar Barabas faro si. Ḇape Yesus sipreri, ma Pilatus ḇyuki fa spai i ro aprop.
41015016	Ḇarpur wer snonmamun sya ssun Yesus ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes, ma sor snonmamun ḇese sya kam fa sfanjur.
41015017	Ssansun i kuker syatu ḇefuk ma siyanem wower ḇeḇe borek ma srir i ro ḇruri.
41015018	Raimnai insape ssḇansuba faroi ḇo soḇe: "Jow suba, wairek kawasa Yahudi!"
41015019	Siprer ḇruri kuker doker fyor, ma saninefi ḇo sḇan suba ma ssomi.
41015020	(20a) Sonefi raimnai sper ssansun syatu ḇefuk anya buri ma ssansuni wer kuker sansun Ḇyena. (20b) Ḇarpur kaku ssun Yesus randi spai i ro aprop ya.
41015021	Fafisu ya snon oso snori Simon, snon Kirene Alexander ma Rufus suyor ḇe kma ḇebur ker yaf imbran uk, ma sidif snon anya fa ḇyar Yesus aporop Ḇyedi.
41015022	Ssun Yesus ḇe moḇ ḇenir ḇe Golgota, isoine: Moḇ ḇukor ḇei.
41015023	Raimnai ssḇuk anggur sfaunai kuker roi ḇefrurpis mamami faroi, ḇape imewer si.
41015024	Posa spai i ro aprop ma sirarwas sansun Ḇyena kuker sisawen onde fa sifawi oser-oser rarwas ḇyedi.
41015025	Ras anya oras siw arwo spai i ro aprop.
41015026	Ma sfas ḇair knam eḇedar se ukum i ro aprop ya pum ya isoine: "Wairek kawasa Yahudi."
41015027	Spai snonmamun risuru fnoḇek Yesus, oser ro ḇar raku Ḇyedi ma oser ro ḇar rasar Ḇyedi. [
41015028	Rarirya isrou bos rakrok refo isoine: "Nari skori ro fandu snonkaku ḇarḇor."]
41015029	Snonkaku ḇeyunuk ro diwa sya sonefi ma skakiker siḇrusna ma sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Ye, au ḇeyoḇe ḇekakok rum ḇesren ma nari Bawesi wer ro ras rikior,
41015030	faspar mankundau bur aprop ya ma Wasabu!"
41015031	Rarirya kako mananir imam-imamsya fnoḇek ḇefawi nananem Refo Yahudisya sonefi ro mankun si ḇo sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Fyaspar snonkaku ḇese sya, ḇape ipok fa Fyaspar mankundi ḇa!
41015032	Wairek, Wairek Israel iya iḇye kada isabu bur aprop insa nkomam ma nkokyar e." Ma snon risuru spai ro aprop fnoḇeki ansu ya suyakkofen kako.
41015033	Ro oras samfur seser suru orkok, pampan ya ikawef sup ya mnuk ani, isof oras kior.
41015034	Ma ro oras kior ya Yesus dor naba ḇo doḇe: "Eloi, Eloi lama sabakhtani?" isoine: Allah Yedi, Allah Yedi, snaro wabur Aya?
41015035	Simnaf rarirya snon diḇeso ḇeyores ro moḇ anya sikofen ḇo soḇe: "Mkomam kada, dor Elia."
41015036	Ma snon oso dun bunek ya ma syoweni ro anggur ḇemnir posa kyuki ro doker baken ya ma ḇye fa Yesus dinem ma ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Indo kowaf ma komampan Elia ryama isabu i."
41015037	Raimnai Yesus dor kuker mkarem ḇeba ma ryir nyawa Ḇyedi.
41015038	Ro fafisu ya eruk kruḇen ro rum ḇesren ya imsap ra ḇye suru ro ḇo isof ro sop.
41015039	Fyor mananir snonmamun ḇeyores ro Yesus ḇarpondi myam marmar Yesus Ḇyeja riarirya, ikofen ḇo doḇe: "Kaku ḇeri snon ine Rumkun Allah!"
41015040	Bin ono sisya sakmam ro swaf ḇeḇinkwan, ro fandu si Maria Magdalena, Maria snonkbor Yakobus i ma Yoses sna suḇedi, kuker Salome.
41015041	Si kam siso farma Yesus ma suf farmyani rofyor isya ro Galilea. Ma ro dia bin ḇerama kwar ro Yerusalem ḇembran so Yesus sibor kaku.
41015042	Ro fafisu anya fanam roḇ, ma ras anya ras fasasos isoine ras ḇeyuser mufa ro ras Mananai ya.
41015043	Eḇedari Yusuf, snon Arimatea, snon ḇebarara ro Kankain Karkara Agama, ḇewaf kako Ḇaḇesasoser Allah, imku fa rya dor Yesus baken Ḇyeja ro Pilatus.
41015044	Pilatus ikandor rofyor imnaf Yesus imar kwar. Inja dor mananir snonmamun ma ifuken faroi, kaku Yesus imar kwar ke?
41015045	Rofyor imnaf wos mananir snonmamunya ḇyena kwar, insape ḇyuk fa Yusuf dun Yesus baken Ḇyedi.
41015046	Inja Yusuf kyoḇes kruḇen bepioper ya raimnai, isabu Yesus baken Ḇyeja bur aprop ya, ma ryuren I kuker kruḇen ḇepioper ani. Posa bye kubiri ro ureren byai ro urek karui oso raimnai ikris karui oso fa isisen kubir ya kedwa i.
41015047	Maria Magdalena ma Maria Yoses snari, sumamepen moḇ se kubir Yesus ro ya.
41016001	Ras Mananai Yahudi isyonde kwar, Maria Magdalena ma Maria Yakobus snari, kuker Salome skokoḇes kefi-kefi insa skora ḇe kubir fa skoḇuk isfu Yesus.
41016002	Ma arwo babo kaku ro ras Ari ani ori dek kwar ido skora ḇe kubir.
41016003	Skokofen yae faro sko ḇo skoḇe: "Mansei nari ḇekris karui ḇeba anya bur kubir ya?"
41016004	Ḇape fyor skofanam ido skomam karui ḇeba ani ikris kwar.
41016005	Inja skosun randum ro kubir ya dori ma skomam snonkbor oso syansun syatu ḇepioper ḇo kyain ro ḇar raku. Skokandor fafaya ḇaḇeri,
41016006	ḇape snonkbor anya ikofen faro sko ḇo doḇe: "Mkomkak awer! Mkosewar Yesus snon Nazaret, spai ro aprop anya. Diḇri kwar. Isya ro dine ḇa. Mkomam e! Mob srir i fa Ḇyarek ro ya isoine.
41016007	Inja mkora mkokofen faro manfamyan Ḇyesya ma faro Petrus: Pyon mko ḇe Galilea; ro diwa nari mkomami, imnis ikofen faro mko kwar."
41016008	Raimnai skosasyar ma skofrar bur kubir, snar radadai ma kanandor ya isawob sko. Skokofen roi oso ḇa faro mansei rya kaker, snar skomkak.
41016009	Rofyor Yesus diḇri ro arwo babo ras Ari anya, fyasna mankundi bepon faro Maria Magdalena. Bin ine Yesus iyaw rur ḇemaḇak rifik buri kwar.
41016010	Raimnai bin anya rya, ma ikofen ḇair faro ḇeso sawawek Yesus ansi snar ro fafisu anya sisya ro mandak ma skanes.
41016011	Ḇape rofyor simnaf Yesus ikenem ma fyasnai i kwar faro bin ine sikyar ḇa.
41016012	Raimnai Yesus fyasnai mankundi wer kuker sananai ḇese faro skomin risuru ro marandan besasyar bur mnu ḇeba ya.
41016013	Inja sukaḇer wer fa sukofen ḇair faro min ḇese suḇesi ḇape sikyar su ḇa kako.
41016014	Ḇarpur ya fyasna mankundi faro snon samfur seser oser ansya ro fafisu sanan, ma Ikofen ḇaḇe kakyar ḇa ma sne ḇepakrek sena faro si, snar sikyar faro snonkaku ḇemam i kwar ro ḇarpur aḇiḇer Ḇyeja ḇa.
41016015	Raimnai ikofen faro si ḇo doḇe: "Mkora ḇe supswan ḇesiper, mkoḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya faro roi ḇekenem sya kam.
41016016	Mansei ḇekyar ma ḇesma masi sren nari isma koreri, ḇape mansei ḇekyar ḇa nari ismai ukum.
41016017	Aḇyair nane nari nafnoḇek snonkaku ḇekyar sya: nari siyau rur ḇemaḇak sya kuker Snori, ma nari sawos ro wos-wos ḇeḇaḇo faro si,
41016018	ma nari suf ikak ma sinem roi ḇeyinem mamur ḇeyun ḇe marmar ya, ḇape nari simar ḇa; nari sirir ssibras na ro ḇeduf sya ma nari siprei."
41016019	Fyor Yesus dawos rarirya yoḇ si raimnai, diryor ḇe boiyaswa ma Kyain ro Allah ḇar raku Ḇyedi.
41016020	Si kako sra sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro moḇ na kam, ma Manseren ifararur fnoḇek si ma syoser wos ya kuker aḇyair ḇefnoḇek si.
42001001	Teofilus ḇesmai syowi, Snonkaku sibor sḇesewar kwar fa sfasasuser ḇaryas oso ro roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar ro fanduko.
42001002	Imnis raris sḇaryas kwar maroko, ro randakya ro snonkaku ḇemam kuker mkamor ma ḇeyuffarmyan Wosya.
42001003	Eḇedari, yakukeḇ naḇye kaku roi ḇeḇesya anna kam kwar ro randak kakuya, rarirya yun karkara namuk fa yafrurna ḇesyap fa namnis faro au,
42001004	insa wafawi, roi ḇeḇor sḇukfarkor au na nkaku rarirya.
42001005	Ro awar Herodes, koranu fiak ro sup Yudea, imam oso isya snori Zakharia ro rarwas imam-imam Abia. Swari kako ḇyeknam ro kpu Harun, snori Elisabet.
42001006	Imbeswa suine sukenem nasren, ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ma sukenem kuker ḇaḇeuser sasoser nakam raris Manseren moḇ ḇyukraya ma suḇeyuk royoḇa.
42001007	Ḇape sukada suna romawaḇa, snar Elisabet pyansnasem ma suḇe insar mansar kwar.
42001008	Rofyor oso, ro fafisu rarwas skofararurya syuḇer Zakharia ifrur fararur ḇaḇeimam ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi.
42001009	Snar fafisu skinsor, imnis rari sedi, insa kinsorya fyasnai imam ḇefararur ya, iso sfasnai fa ḇesun ro Rum Ḇesrenya ma ḇekun mamboḇo ro dia.
42001010	Ro fafisu ani kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sfanjur ro ḇuḇes ma senadi. Rofyor anikada fyor kankun mamboḇo.
42001011	Zakharia myam Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso dores ro ḇar raku rokef kankun mamboḇo.
42001012	Myam roi ḇeḇesya ani ikandor ma imkak.
42001013	Ḇape malaikat ani ikofen faroi: "Ne, Zakharia, wamkak awer, snar nadi ḇena nasmai kankarem kwar ma swambri, Elisabet, nari daḇen romawa snon oso faro au ma nari nwir iḇe Yohanes.
42001014	Nari wamarisen ma waryaḇ, rarirya kawasa ḇeḇor nari sakmarisen snar ḇaḇeḇeyaḇen ḇyedi.
42001015	Snar nari iba ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ma nari dinem anggur roḇa aninem ḇeparek ḇa ma nari ifo kuker Rur Ḇesrenya randak ro snari sneuser ḇyena;
42001016	nari ikfin kawasa Israel sibor fa skaḇer faro Manseren, Allah sedi,
42001017	Ma nari imbran ḇepon Manseren kuker Rur ma papoik Elia fa dun kaḇer sinansya sisnesna faro romawa sesi ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor sisnesna faro karkara snonkaku ḇenapes ma rarirya fyasos sasrai ḇepyum oso faro Manseren."
42001018	Raimnai Zakharia ikofen faro malaikat ani: "Rariso nari yafawi, roi ḇeḇor nane moḇ ndamumaraya? Snar yaḇe mansar kwar ma swayedi kako dakḇe insar kwar."
42001019	Malaikat ani kyarem faroi: "Aya ine Gabriel ḇeyuf farmyan Allah ma Allah iwan aya kwar insa yawawos kuker au ma yun ankankinem ḇeḇye ine faro au.
42001020	Kaku ḇeri snar wakyar wos ayenaḇa, nari ḇeawer ma wawosḇa isof ro ras rosai, roi ḇeḇor nane kam ndarirya."
42001021	Rofyor ani kawasa ḇeḇor ansi siwaf Zakharia. Sikam sikmom, snar ḇyeuryar ro Rum Ḇesrenya dori.
42001022	Ro fafisu isasyar, iwawos kuker siḇa ma sifawi, mboi isya myam mamam oso ro Rum Ḇesren ani. Raimnai ḇyoi ḇramin ḇyedi farosi, snar ḇyeawer.
42001023	Ro fafisu fararur ḇyedi imnai kwar, ibur ḇerum ḇyedi.
42001024	Raimnai fyoroḇa swari Elisabet, imoḇesḇa paik ririm ma iyokef ḇinkundi, ḇo ikofen:
42001025	"Inekada, fararur oso ro Manseren maḇeaya, ma knikine imarisen ipyos mamyai ayena ro ḇarpon snonkaku."
42001026	Ro paik ḇeḇewonemya, Allah iwan malaikat Gabriel ifa ryaḇe mnu oso ro sup Galilea snoriso Nazaret,
42001027	faro inkbor oso snoriso Maria; inkbor ani ssḇuki dapsasor snonkbor oso snoriso Yusuf, ro kina Daud;
42001028	Rofyor malaikat ani syunro Maria rum ḇyedi, ikofen: "Aroo faro au, inkbor ḇesma fakamaman; Manseren ryous au."
42001029	Maria imnaf wos ani, ikandor ma kyara ro sneri, wos samsom ani knam ḇyedi moḇ ryaya.
42001030	Malaikat ani ikofenwer faroi: "Ne, Maria, wamkak awer! Snar wasma saswar ma fakamaman ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi.
42001031	Kaku ḇeri, nari wamoḇesḇa, ma nari waḇen rumkun snon oso, ma nwiriḇe Yesus.
42001032	Nari romawa ani iba ma nari sapiḇe Rumkun Allah ḇekaki syadi. Ma Manseren Allah nari ḇyuk faroi, karapesa nasan Daud, kpu ḇyedi,
42001033	ma nari ḇye wairek faro Yakub kpu ḇyesi, isof fyoro-fyoro, ma nasan ḇyedi ipok imnaiḇa."
42001034	Maria ikofen faro malaikat ani, "Roi wakofen ine nari ryamuma rariso, snar ayaine yafakawin ḇaim?"
42001035	Malaikat ani kyarem: "Rur ḇesrenya nari isabu faro au, ma papoik Allah ḇekaki syadi nari kyadiren au, inja Rumkun waḇen ani sapiḇe Rumkun Allah ḇesren.
42001036	Ma kaku ḇeri Elisabet, napirman bani soḇo ḇepasnanasem ani ma ḇeḇeinsar kwar, ikako imoḇesḇa kuker romawa snon oso, ḇye paikri wonem kwar.
42001037	Snar Allah isma papoik ro roiḇeḇor nakam."
42001038	Maria ikofen: "Kaku ḇeri, ayaine Manseren infamyan ḇyedi; roi wakofen anna ndarirya mura." Raimnai malaikat ani ipromes buri.
42001039	Fafisu ono nasyonde kwar, Maria imbranḇeri ḇebon, ipdefḇe mnu oso ro sup Yehuda.
42001040	Fyor ryakwar ro mnu ani, syun ro Zakharia rum ḇyedi, ma ikofen aroo faro Elisabet.
42001041	Ma rofyor Elisabet imnaf Maria aroo ḇyena, romawa dores ani dapoper ro sneyuser ḇyena, ma Elisabet ifo kuker Rur Ḇesren.
42001042	Rarirya ibras naba: "Au ḇesmai ḇokro fandu binsyakam, ma sneuser bedi ismai ḇok kako.
42001043	Manseiso ayaine, isof Manseren yedi snari ryakaki aya?
42001044	Snar kaku ḇeri, rofyor yamnaf aroo bena, romawa ḇekain ro sneuser yedi iryaḇ ma dapoper.
42001045	Ma aski faroi, snar rosai sikofen faroi ro Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi, ikyar nari ndarirya."
42001046	Raimnai Maria ikofen: "Ruryedi isandik Allah,
42001047	ma sneri iryaḇ snar Allah, knam korer ayedi,
42001048	snar myamepen kwar, ranrun snero manfamyan ḇyedi. Kaku ḇeri, randakro knikine er-er syakam nari sap ayaḇe bin ḇeḇe aski,
42001049	Snar Allah Ḇepoik syadi, ifrur kwar fararur ḇebasyadi faro aya, ma snonsnon ḇyediso besren.
42001050	Ma ḇaḇe naḇye ḇyedi kyonro syosḇe syos, faro snonkaku ḇemkak ḇeyararyofi.
42001051	Fyasnai papoik kuker ḇraurḇyena, ma dun ḇesisye snonkaku sneḇeḇemararessya;
42001052	Pyandun snonkaku ḇepoksyafa sisaburo karapesa nasan sena, ma ikanow snonkaku ḇerun snesya;
42001053	Ḇyuk faro snonkaku ḇebisersya, roi ḇeborkam, kuker farsbawer, ma iwan snonkaku ḇenanasyafa sibur beidi.
42001054	Ifnoḇek Israel, manfamyan ḇyedi, snar iswarepen ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyena,
42001055	imnis ḇyeasas kwar faro up koḇesi, faro Abraham ma syos-syos ḇepur ḇyesi isof fyoro-fyoro."
42001056	Ma Maria ryows Elisabet indokada paik rikior, raimnai ibur wer ḇerum ḇyedi.
42001057	Ḇarpurya Elisabet rasḇyena namnis inja daḇen romawa snon oso.
42001058	Rofyor snonkaku ḇero mnu ḇyedi ma naek srar ḇyesi simnaf, Manseren fyasnai ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyedi ḇeḇa kaku faroi, sikam simarisen kuker i.
42001059	Ma ras ḇeḇewarya srama fa sifrur sofakfuk faro romawa ani ma simarisen sniriḇe Zakharia imnis kmari snonsnon ḇyedi,
42001060	ḇape snari ikofen: "Roḇa, mkonir iḇe Yohanes."
42001061	Sikofen faroi: "Oso ro fandu naek besi daknir rarirya ḇa."
42001062	Raimnai spankai kmari fa sifuken snonsnon rosai imarisen ḇyuk faro romawa ḇyedi.
42001063	Dor karu fas oso, raimnai fyas: "Snonsnon ḇyedi isoine Yohanes." Ma sikam sikandor.
42001064	Ma ro fafisu ani beri sḇari ḇyas ma ramar ḇyedi pyer wer, ma iwawos ḇo isandik Allah.
42001065	Rarirya snonkaku ḇekain yar-yar i sya simkak kam, ma roi ḇeḇesya anna kam nefarfyar pampyam ro bran Yudea ḇesiper.
42001066	Ma snonkakusya kam, ḇemnaf nasya skara na ma sikofen: "Nari rosai ḇeḇesya kuker romawa ine?" Snar Manseren ryous i.
42001067	Ma Zakharia, romawa ani kmari, Rur ḇesrenya kyanosni ma ḇyardi ḇo doḇo:
42001068	"Sanandik faro Manseren, Allah Israel, snar ryakaki er ḇyesi, ma dun fasaspar farosi.
42001069	Ḇyuk aḇyair papoik oso kwar, ḇeḇuk koreri maḇeko, ro manfamyan ḇyedi Daud, kpu ḇyesi;
42001070	-- raris moḇ ikofenkwar ro awar madero, kuker sḇayoi nabi-nabi ḇesren ḇyesi --
42001071	insa fyaspar kobur mbroḇ koḇesi ma roḇramin snonkakukam ḇeyayin konsya,
42001072	fa fyasnai ḇaḇe naḇye ḇyena faro Up koḇesi ma swarapepen faro asas ḇesren ḇyena,
42001073	isoine soar ikofen kwar faro Abraham, kpu ḇepon koḇedi mboi ḇyuk fakamaman maḇeko,
42001074	insa kosma fasasparbur mbroḇ koḇesi ma kuker kakyar, koḇenadi faroi kuker makakakḇa,
42001075	kuker saranden ma napnapes ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ro kankenem koḇena ḇesiper.
42001076	Ma au, romawayedi, nari sap auḇe nabi Allah, Ḇekaki Syadi; snar auso nari ḇepon Manserenfa ḇefasos nyan faroi,
42001077	insa ḇyuk fawawi faro kawasa ḇyesi mboi nari sismai korer ḇekakuya, rofyor Allah ipyos nyaki sasar sena kwar,
42001078	snar ḇaḇenaḇye ma saswar ro Allah koḇedi, ma kuker nyan rosai ḇyuki ryakakiko, imnis ori ḇeyekro arwo,
42001079	fa isnai kawasa ḇekainro pampan, ma kadaun marmarsya, fa ikfin kowesna faro nyan ḇeḇeaski."
42001080	Ma romawa ani isur ma iba ma rur ḇyedi syambraḇ. Ma ikenem ro sup ḇeursḇa isof ro ras fyasnai mankundi faro er Israel.
42002001	Rofyor ani Kaisar Agustus ḇyuk sasoser oso, ḇewan fa sfasepen snonkakusya kam ro supswan ine.
42002002	Ine fas-fas sifrur randak kaku ro fafisu Kirenius ḇye gubernur ro mnu Siria.
42002003	Rarirya kawasa ansi kam sraḇe mnu marin sena oser-oser fa sfasepen si.
42002004	Rarirya kako Yusuf isasyar ro mnu Nazaret ro sup Galilea ḇesup Yudea, mnu Daud ḇenirḇe Betlehem, -- snar ḇyeknam ro keret ma up Daud --
42002005	insa ḇyeḇefasepen kuker Maria, bin sḇukapsasori ma ḇemoḇesḇa ro fafisu ani.
42002006	Ro fafisu sura kwar ro diwa Maria ras ḇyena namnis fa kyain,
42002007	ma daḇen romawa snon oso, roma rak ḇyedi, posa ḇyeḇepankun kuker kruḇen kinak ma ḇyeifa ḇyarek ro sayer dombasya sananroya, snar skosma moḇo ḇa ro rum seryar roya.
42002008	Ro supya fyor ani manfarandows ono sisya skain siwaren rofanfan sesi ro maper ro roḇ ani.
42002009	Knikoḇama Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso fyanamsi ma Manseren sasnai ḇyedi isnaiyar si isof simkak kaku.
42002010	Raimnai malaikat ani ikofen farosi: "Mkomkak awer, snar kaku ḇeri yaḇaryas faro mko marisen ḇeba faro ersyakam:
42002011	Ras ine Knam koreri ḇyeḇeaḇen kwar faro mko, isoine Kristus, Manseren, ro mnu Daud.
42002012	Ma aḇyairya isoine faro mko: Nari mkosrow wombrek oso ḇyeḇepankun kuker kruḇen kinak ma ḇyarek ro sayer rofanfansya sanan roya."
42002013	Ma knikoḇama smam fnoḇek malaikat ani, malaikat kankramo ro Boiyas sisandik Allahḇo soḇo:
42002014	"Sanandik faro Allah ro Boiyaswa, ro moḇ ḇekaki syadi! Ma askiro supswan, faro snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allahsya."
42002015	Malaikat ansi sibur kwar ma skaḇerḇe boiyas, ḇefarandows ansi sikofen yae farosi: "Mkorama koraḇe Betlehemfa komam rosai ḇeḇesya kwar ro diwa, imnis raris rosai Manseren ikofen maroko."
42002016	Rarirya srafasau kaku, ma sisrow Maria ma Yusuf ma wombrek ani ḇyarekro moḇ rofamfansya sanan roya.
42002017	Ma rofafisu smami, ma sikofen ḇadir rosai simnafkwarfa ḇekur wombrek ani.
42002018	Ma snonkaku ḇemnaf ansikam sikandor snar roiḇeḇor manfarandows ansi sikofen farosi anna.
42002019	Ḇape Maria ikram wos annaro sneri ma kyara asuserna.
42002020	Rarirya manfarandows ansi sibur kaḇer, ma sisandik Allah snar roi ḇeborkam simnaf ma smam anna, nakam namnis raris rosai sikofen kwar farosi.
42002021	Ma rofafisu wombrek ani ḇye rasri war kwar, sifrur sofakuk ḇyedi, ma sniriḇe Yesus, imnis snonsnon malaikatya ikofen kwar, rofyor snari fyadoresi ḇaim.
42002022	Ma fafisu fasasrenya imnis kwar, raris sasoser Refo Yahudi Moses ḇyena, suniḇe Yerusalemfa ssḇuki faro Manseren,
42002023	raris fas-fas ro Manseren sasoser ḇyena: "Romawa rakḇeḇe snonsyakam, nari sfasrensi faro Allah,"
42002024	ma ssḇuk farsarser kako, imnis wos Manseren ikofenro asas ḇyedi, isoine waimon mandu oser roḇaido manjawa manduoser.
42002025	Ro mnu Yerusalem, snon oso isya snori Simeon. I snonkaku ḇekyar faro Allah ma ḇenapes, ma ḇewaf Ḇeḇuk sneprei faro Israelsya.
42002026	Rur Ḇesrenya isyaroi, ma isma fasasnaikwar ro Rur Ḇesrenya, mboi nari imarḇa rao isof dakmam Wairek, isoine i ḇesma ramrem kwar ro Manseren.
42002027	Rur Ḇesrenya ḇyedifer i fa ryaḇe Allah Rum ḇyedi. Ro fafisu Yesus, Romawa ani, sinan ḇyesuya susun kuker i fa sifrur asuser faroi ro roi sikofen kwar ro sasoser Refo Yahudi,
42002028	dun Romawa ani ma fyoraḇen i ḇo isandik Allah, ḇo doḇo:
42002029	"Knikine, Manseren, iḇye manfamyan bedi imar mura kuker aski imnis raris wos bedi,
42002030	snar yamam kwar koreri ḇeramuma ro Au,
42002031	koreri fasos kwar faro ersya kam,
42002032	isoine isnai ḇesnaiser faro er ḇese ma payamyum faro er besi, Israel."
42002033	Ma snari kuker kmari sukandor kaku snar roi ḇeḇor kam ikofen fa ḇekur i.
42002034	Raimnai Simeon ḇyeḇok sko ma ikofen faro Maria, Romawa ani snari: "Kaku ḇeri Romawa ine ḇyebefasnai fa nari pyampum roḇa ḇyawes kawasa sibor ro Israel ma ḇyeaḇyair ḇefnai rakrakrok --
42002035	ma nari fafardunya imnis sumber esar ḇekukkir snembri, --insa fyasnai ḇair kawasa ḇeḇor karkara sena."
42002036	Ro moḇ ani Hana isya kako, nabi bin oso Fanuel ḇindaḇendi ro keret Asyer. Ḇyeinsar kwar. Fyakawin kwar ma ikenem kuker swari ḇewampasi wambarek rifik,
42002037	ma ro fafisuya ḇyekabom ma ikenem wampasi wambarek samfur riwar seser rifiak. Ma syun ḇesya kwar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, roḇ meser ikyar faro Allah ma ḇyenadi ḇo fyarfor.
42002038	Ma rofyor ani kako ryama ro dia ma ikofen kasumasa faro Allah ma dawawos ro Romawa ani faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇewaf ḇaḇefaspar faro Yerusalem.
42002039	Rarirya seasuser roi ḇeḇor kam ḇekur Manseren sasoser ḇyena posa kwar sisiḇerḇe mnu sedi, isoine Nazaret ro Galilea.
42002040	Romawa ani isur fasaw ma syambraḇ, ifo kuker fawawi nananem ma saswar fakamaman Allah naisya roi.
42002041	Ro wampasi wambarek nakam Yesus sinan ḇyesu suraḇe Yerusalem ro ras munara Paskah.
42002042	Fafisu Yesus ḇyewampasi wambarek samfur seser risuru skoraḇe Yerusalem imnis raris rari sedi ro ras munara ani.
42002043	Posa kwar ro ras-ras munara ani, fafisu sibur, Yesus kada kyain ro Yerusalem ḇoi sinan ḇyesuya sufawiḇa.
42002044	Snar sukara ḇo suyoḇo iso maran ḇepon na, inja skombran ras ḇesiper oser, insape susewar i ro fandu naek ma min suḇesi.
42002045	Snar susma iḇa, inja sukaḇerḇe Yerusalem fa susewar pdef i.
42002046	Ro ras ḇeḇekiorya insape susrow i ro Allah Rum ḇyedi; isya kyain fandu guru-guru agama Yahudi ḇeḇuk farkarkorsya fa dakrower si ma ḇyuk fakfuken faro si.
42002047	Ma snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇemnaf i sya kam sikandor kaku snar fawawi ḇyena ma kankarem ḇyukna kam.
42002048	Ma rofyor sinan ḇyesuya sumam i, sukandor raimnai snari ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Romawa yedi, snaro wafrur rarirya faro nu? Aya ma kmami nusewar Aw kuker sne ḇekarsosen."
42002049	Kyarem faro su: "Snaro musewar Aya? Mufawiḇake, ayaisya ro Mami Rum ḇyedi dori?"
42002050	Ḇape sufawiḇa rosaiso ikofen faro su.
42002051	Raimnai ibur fnoḇek su ḇe Nazaret; ma iso user fadaduru suḇena. Snari kada ikram roi ḇeḇor anna kam ro sne ḇyedi.
42002052	Ma Yesus imakma iba fasaw ma ifawi nanemkaku, inja Allah ma snonkaku sya siswar I.
42003001	Ro wampasi wambarek samfur seser ri rim ro Kaisar Tiberius ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, fafisu Pontius Pilatus ḇye gubernur ro sup Yudea, ma Herodes ḇyekoranu fiak ro sup Galilea, ma naek ḇyedi Filipus, ḇyekoranu fiak ro sup Iturea ma Trakhonitis, ma Lisanias ḇyekoranu fiak ro sup Abilene,
42003002	ro fafisu Hanas ma Kayafas suḇe Imam Ḇeba, Allah ikofen faro Yohanes, Zakharia mandaḇendi ro sup ḇeursba.
42003003	Inja Yohanes ryama ro supya mnuk Yordan ḇesiper ma ḇyaryas, ḇo doḇo: "Mkombror ma mkor masi sren ma nari Allah ipyos nyaki sasar mkoḇena kam,
42003004	Imnis fas-fas ro syap nabi Yesaya ḇardi ḇyena: Mkaren snonkaku oso isya ḇekaru ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa: Mkofasos nyan faro Manseren, mkofrur nyan ḇeaḇyoḇer faro i.
42003005	Dwas nakam nari neḇekupoi rarirya bon ma urkna nari neḇekar pyom, ḇekaparawer na neḇesye aḇyoḇer, ḇeḇe row-row na neḇekar pyom,
42003006	ma kawasa kam nari smam koreri ḇeramuma ro Manseren."
42003007	Raimnai ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ḇerama faroi fa ḇesma masi sren, ḇo doḇo: "Ne, ikak beknampu kpu ḇyena mko! Mansei ḇekofen faro mko fa mko frarbur masasor nari ḇeramuma ya?
42003008	Inja mko ḇuk bon-bon ḇemnis kuker marandor. Ma mkopok mkokara ḇaḇeri ro mkosnemna: Abraham kma nkoḇe dirya! Snar yakofen faro mko: Allah ipok kaku fa ifrur karui nane fa neromawa faro Abraham!
42003009	Mkanya fyasos kwar ro aya fuarya ma ai knam ḇemarem bon ḇepyun ba, nari ḇyeḇeroḇen ma ḇyeḇekun ro for."
42003010	Snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sifuken faroi: "Rofyor rariryanido, rosaiso nari nkofrurya?"
42003011	Kyarem farosi: "Mansei ḇena sansun risuru, irwas faro ḇeyaknaḇaya, ma mansei ḇena roḇean, dakfur rarirya kako."
42003012	Ḇeyor som ono kako, srama sorfa saksma masi sren ma sifuken faroi: "Guruyo, rosai nari nkofrurya?"
42003013	Yohanes kyarem: "Mkor syadi awer ro rosai sḇe asaskwar faro mko."
42003014	Ma sordade-sordadesya sifuken kako faroi: "Ma nkonido rosai nari nkakfrurya?" Yohanes kyarem farosi: "Mkofasyar ma mkoḇewayam awer snonkaku, mboi mkokenem mnis monda kuker ḇaḇyak mkoḇena."
42003015	Ḇape snar kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sifawi kuker kakyar, ma skara ḇo soḇo imbude Yohanes irya Wairek siwaf anike,
42003016	ḇape Yohanes kyarem faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam: "Ayakada yaḇuk masasisren faro mko kuker war monda, ḇape ḇepoik syadiro aya, nari ryama, ma yasyusḇafa yaper kaḇrai ḇefes roi ḇesowerḇyesi. Ikada nari ḇyuk masi sren faro mko, kuker Rur Ḇesren ma for.
42003017	Badeiḇerasya isyakwar ro ḇramin ḇyesuyafa ḇyuk ifrur sren sayar aḇrui ḇyesi ma iryur aḇrui ḇyesiro kron ḇyedi, ma pissya kada seḇekunro for ḇembrerḇa."
42003018	Kuker wos anun ḇese, Yohanes ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
42003019	Ḇape snar isonek Herodes ḇeḇe koranu fiak ro sup Galilea, snar fyakawin kuker Naek ḇyedi Herodias, ma snar ḇarḇor ḇese ifrur kakona,
42003020	koranu fiak ani ifrur syadi wer ro ḇarḇor ḇyena, kuker nyan ḇyuk samamyai faro Yohanes ro bui.
42003021	Ro fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sisma masi sren kwar ma ro fafisu Yesus kako isma masi sren ma Ḇyenadi, rofyor ani nanki ḇyas
42003022	ma Rur Ḇesrenya dado imnis manjawa faro i. Ma mkaren oso ryok ro nanki: "Aukada Romawa Yaswar kaku, Yaḇeḇare faro Au."
42003023	Fafisu Yesus irandak ifararurya indokada ḇyewampasi wambarek samfur rikior ma kawasa skarai ikada romawa ro Yusuf, ma kpuḇyesi siso sine: Eli,
42003024	Matat, Lewi, Malkhi, Yanai, Yusuf,
42003025	Matitya, Amos, Nahum, Hesli, Nagai,
42003026	Maat, Matitya, Simei, Yosekh, Yoda,
42003027	Yohanan, Resa, Zerubabel, Sealtiel, Neri,
42003028	Malkhi, Adi, Kosam, Elmadam, Er,
42003029	Yesua, Eliezer, Yorim, Matat, Lewi,
42003030	Simeon, Yehuda, Yusuf, Yonam, Elyakim,
42003031	Melea, Mina, Matata, Natan, Daud,
42003032	Isai, Obed, Boas, Salmon, Nahason,
42003033	Aminadap, Admin, Arni, Hesron, Peres, Yahuda,
42003034	Yakub, Isak, Abraham, Terah, Nahor,
42003035	Serug, Rehu, Peleg, Eber, Salmon,
42003036	Kenan, Arpaksad, Sem, Nuh, Lamekh,
42003037	Metusalah, Henokh, Yeret, Mahalaleel, Kenan,
42003038	Enos, Zet, Adam, Allah.
42004001	Yesus, ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren, kyaḇer ro war Yordan, raimnai Rur Ḇesrenya duniḇe sup ḇeḇeursḇa.
42004002	Kyain ro dia ras samfur rifiak ma Ibirisya ifrowes i. Fyor kyain ro dia dan royoḇa ma posa ro ras samfur rifiak ibiser.
42004003	Inja Ibiris ikofen faroi: "Kaku au Rumkun Allah, ido wawan fa karui nane nemamami."
42004004	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Fas-fas isya: Snonkaku sikenem kuker mamamiya dererḇa."
42004005	Ḇarpurya Ibiris dun Yesus ḇemoḇ ḇekaki oso ma kniko monda fyasnai faro i ḇaḇesasoser-ḇaḇesasoser kam ro supswan ine.
42004006	Ibiris ikofen faro i: "Papoik ḇeḇor nakam kuker payamyum ḇyena nari yaḇuk na faro Au, snar nakam neḇeḇuk kwar maro aya ma yakḇuk na faro manseirya wer yamarisen sya.
42004007	Inja rofyor bansuba ḇeaya, nakam nari nwana."
42004008	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faroi: "Fas-fas isya ryok: Aukada bansuba faro Manseren, Allah bedi, ma Demir monda iso wanadi faroi!"
42004009	Ḇarpurya wer dun Yesusbe Yerusalem ma ryir i ro Allah Rum ḇyedi bunemya, ma ikofen faro i: "Kaku au Rumkun Allah ido, wasawen mankundaw,
42004010	snar fas-fas isya: Ḇekur au, ikada nari ḇyuk sasoser faro malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi fa skansin
42004011	ma siser Au insa wemsi kyarkar awer ro karui."
42004012	Yesus kyarem ma ikofen: "Wos isya: Wafrowes Manseren, Allah bedi awer!"
42004013	Ibiris fafrowes ḇyena posa kwar isusu bur i ma iwaf fafisu ḇepyum faroi.
42004014	Kuker papoik Rurya Yesus kyaḇerḇe Galilea. Ma ḇyesno ro sup ani ḇesiper.
42004015	Ro fafisu ani ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum nadi ro dia ma snonkakusya kam sisandik i.
42004016	Ryama ro Nazaret moḇ sfaduru ma ibaroya, ma imnis rari ḇyedi ro ras Mananai Yahudi syun ḇerum nadi, raimnai iyori fa ḇyewasya Refo.
42004017	Ssḇuk faroi syap nabi Yesaya ma rofyor ḇyasi kwar, isma mnuk, ro moḇ sfas ḇo soḇo:
42004018	"Rur Manseren isya ryows aya, snar ikada ryem aya kwar, insa yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar; ma iwan aya kwar
42004019	fa yaḇaryas ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku ḇeḇemanfyansya, ma mamam faro ḇeprafsya, ma ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku sewayamsya insa yaḇaryas wampasi wambarek Manseren ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyena ḇerama kwar."
42004020	Raimnai isisen syap ani, ḇyuk kaḇeri faro ḇefararur, raimnai kyain; ma snonkaku sya kam ro rum nadi ani smamjoḇ i.
42004021	Raimnai irandak ḇyuk farkarkor faro si, ḇo ikofen: "Ro ras ine mnuk mkomnaf ine imnis."
42004022	Ma snonkaku ansi kam ssḇuk kaku roi ma sikandor snar wos ḇepyum dawosna, inja sikofen: "Inenido Yusuf romawa ḇyaniryake?"
42004023	Inja ikofen faro si: "Mboi nari mkokofen wos sarḇer ine maro aya: Ne, snon ḇena mon, buk pararei faro mankundaw. Wafrur kako ro dine, ro mankundaw mnu bedi, roi ḇeḇor nkomnaf wafrur kwar ro Kapernaum!"
42004024	Ma ikofen wer: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri nabi oso sesyowi i ro mnu ḇyedi ḇa.
42004025	Ma yakofen faro mko, ma wos Ayenane nkaku: Ro fafisu Elia kosmai bin kabom sibor ro Israel rofyor nanki isisen ḇewampasi wambarek rikior ma paik ri wonem ma rofyor andoḇa ḇeba myun sup ani ḇesiper.
42004026	Ḇape Elia ḇyeḇewan faro oso ro siḇa, mboi faro kabom oso ro Sarfat, ro sup Sidon.
42004027	Ma ro awar Nabi Elisa ḇeduf pado sibor ro Israel ma oso ro si isma fasasren ḇaḇeri, mboi Naaman derer ro sup Siria."
42004028	Simnaf kam rarirya kawasa kam ḇero rum nadi ani simsorbos kaku.
