42004029	Siyorsi, raimnai sfori ḇo suni ḇemnuya ḇondiri ḇebon moḇ mnuya kyain roya, insa sisawen i ro fofen ani.
42004030	Ḇape Yesus imbran uk ro fadu sedi ma ibur si.
42004031	Posa kwar Yesus ryaḇe Kapernaum, mnu oso ro Galilea, fa ḇyuk farkarkor ro dia ro ras-ras Mananai Yahudi.
42004032	Simnaf farkarkor ḇyena sikandor kaku, snar wos ḇyena nafo kuker papoik.
42004033	Ro rum nadi ani snon rur ḇemaḇaksyower oso ma snon ani dar naba:
42004034	"Ne, au Yesus snon Nazaret, rosai wafrur kuker inko? Rwama insa mun inko? Yafawi manseiso aw: au Saranden ro Allah."
42004035	Ḇape Yesus ḇyewefi, ḇo ikofen: "Befasis, wasasyarburi!" Ma rur ḇemaḇak ani ipyasbos snon ani ro fandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, raimnai isasyarbur snon ani ma ifrur dafdufi ḇaḇeri.
42004036	Ma snonkakusya kam sikandor, ma sikofen yae faro si, ḇo soḇo: "Rosaisoine? Snar ifo kuker baba ma papoikya ma ḇyuk sasoser faro rur-rur ḇemaḇaksya fa sisasyar."
42004037	Ma snonsnon ḇyedi ḇyesno ḇemoḇ nakam ro supya fyor ani.
42004038	Posa isasyarbur rum nadi ani ma ryaḇe Simon rum ḇyedi. Ro fafisu ani Simon imbanyori isam fafayaḇa ma sor faro Yesus insa ifnoḇek i.
42004039	Rarirya dores fanam bin ani, raimnai iyaw sam-sam ani, ma dafduf ani iburi. Bin ani ikḇok ḇeri ma duffarmyan si.
42004040	Ro fafisu ori isyun, kawasa ansi sun ḇeduf sesi faro Yesus, ḇeduf dafduf ḇeḇor kam. Ma isawardofen si ma ḇyuk pararei faro si.
42004041	Ro snonkaku sibor kako rur ḇemaḇaksya sisasyarbur si ma sfararar, ḇo soḇo: "Rumkun Allah risaw." Raimnai idwarek pakrek si ma imewerbos kaku sawawosri, snar sifawi ikada Wairek dirya.
42004042	Fafisu isnai kwar, Yesus imbran fa ryaḇe moḇ ḇeḇeusḇa oso. Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ssewar I, ma sisrow I ma soḇo skarwarek i insa ibur awer si.
42004043	Ḇape ikofen faro si: "Ro mnu-mnu ḇese kako yamarisen yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah snar i ḇeḇedari yaḇeḇewan muma."
42004044	Ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ro rum nadina ro sup Yudea.
42005001	Ro fafisu oso Yesus dores ro danosen andir Genesaret, ma kawasa sibor spanjuḇer i fa simnaf Allah wos ḇyena.
42005002	Myam wai risuru ro danosen andir ani. Mandaswan sya sido kwar fa sḇan pam sena.
42005003	Dek ro wai oso isoine Simon wai ḇyedi, ma iwan fa sri wai ani ḇeḇanda knik ḇyinkwan bur danosen andirya. Raimnai kyain ro waya ma ḇyuk farkarkor faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
42005004	Ḇyuk farkarkor posa kwar, ikofen faro Simon: "Mkoḇores ḇemoḇ ḇedok ma mkonap pam mkoḇena fa mkoḇukmun in."
42005005	Simon kyarem, doḇo: "Guru, roḇ ḇesiper nkoraswan kwar ḇape nkosmai inoḇa ḇeri, ḇape snar wawanja, nari yanap pamya mura."
42005006	Ma fyor skonap pamya posa, skomun in nai ḇebayo isof pam skoḇena namuk.
42005007	Inja skorar min skoḇesi ro wai ḇese ani insa srama sakfnoḇek sko. Ma srama sakfnoḇekḇo inkoser in ro wai ansuya rao fanam sumsar.
42005008	Ro fafisu Simon myam roi ḇeḇesya ani kyainwepur ma ḇyansuba ro Yesus ḇarpon ḇyedi, ḇo ikofen: "Manseren, wasusubur aya, snar ayaine snonkaku ḇesasar."
42005009	Snar i ma snonkaku ḇefnoḇek sya sikandor snar in ḇeḇor skofor ansi;
42005010	rarirya kako Yakobus ma Yohanes Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyansui ḇefnoḇek Simon. Yesus ikofen faro Simon: "Wamkak awer, randak ro knikine nari bemandaswan snonkaku."
42005011	Ma skosu wai skoḇena kwar, sskobur roi ḇeborna kam fa skoso Yesus.
42005012	Ro fafisu oso Yesus isya ro mnu oso. Ro dia snon oso iduf dafduf pado. Ro fafisu myam Yesus, kyainwepur ḇo syom, ḇo doḇo: "Tuan, wamarisen kada nari fasren aya."
42005013	Inja Yesus isawar ma pyan ro snon ani, ma ikofen: "Yamarisen insa wasren." Ro fafisu aniḇeri dafduf pado ani iburi beri.
42005014	Yesus idwarek snon ani insa ḇyaryas awer pararei ḇyani faro manseiryawer ma ikofen: "Rwa, fasnai mankundaw faro imam ma buk farsarser ro pararei bedi, farsarser ḇeraris Moses syoser kwar ḇefasasnai faro si."
42005015	Ḇape Yesus ḇyeḇeḇaryas ma ḇyesno ḇinkwan ma kawasa sibor semarani ma srayoḇ i, insa simnaf farkarkor ḇyena ma sisma pararei ro dafduf sena.
42005016	Ḇape Yesus isusu ḇemoḇ ḇeḇeusḇa fa ḇyenadi.
42005017	Ro ras oso fafisu Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor, snon Farisi ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ono skain sakrower i. Srama ker mnu-mnu nakam ro Galilea ma Yudea ma ro Yerusalem. Manseren papoik ḇyedi ifnoḇek i, isof ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf si.
42005018	Kniko snonkaku ono sḇar snon ḇepapipen oso kuker waryar ḇyedi; ma sḇesewar fa ssun kuker i insa srir i ro ḇarpon Yesus.
42005019	Snar sisma nyan osoḇa fa sun kuker i snar kawasa sya sibor mankenem ro dia, inja skek kuker i ḇerumya bori, ma skoḇas osna, ma skokyu snon ani kuker waryar ḇyedi rofandu kawasa ansi imnis bos ro Yesus ḇarpon ḇyedi.
42005020	Ro fafisu Yesus myam kakyar sena, ikofen: "Ne, naeko, sasar bena neḇeampun kwar."
42005021	Ḇape ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi skara ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku mansei ḇeyonef Allah ine? Mansei nari ḇebuk ampun ro sasar imbude Allah derer?"
42005022	Ḇape Yesus ifawi swaruser sena, inja ikofen faro si: "Rosai mkokara ro mkosnemna?
42005023	Rosai ḇepyan syadiya, yakofen: Sasar bena neḇeampun kwar, roḇaido yakofen: Wakḇok, ma wambran?
42005024	Ḇape insa mkofawi, ro supswan ine Rumkun Snonkaku isma papoik fa ḇyuk ampun ro sasarna" -- raimnai ikofen faro snon ḇepapipen ani --: "Yakofen faro au, wakḇok, wakanow waryar bedi ma waburḇe rum bedi!"
42005025	Ma ro fafisu ani beri ikḇok, ro ḇarpon sedi, raimnai ikanow waryar ḇyedi ma iburḇe rum byedi ḇo sisandik Allah.
42005026	Snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sikandor, ma sisandik Allah, ma simkak kaku, ma sikofen: "Ras ine nkomam kwar roi ḇefrur kanandor ḇeba."
42005027	Ḇarpurya, ro fafisu Yesus isasyar, myam snon ḇeyor som oso, snori Lewi, isya kyain ro rum ḇeyor som. Yesus ikofen faroi: "Waso Aya!"
42005028	Rarirya Lewi iyori beri fa ibur roi ḇeḇor nakam, ma iso Yesus.
42005029	Ma Lewi ifrur munara ḇeba faro Yesus ro rum ḇyedi ma ḇeyor som sibor ma snonkaku ḇese sakanan fnoḇek i.
42005030	Snon Farisi ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi surem Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi, ḇo soḇo: "Snaro mkanan fnoḇek snonkaku ḇeyor som ma kawasa sasar?"
42005031	Rarirya Yesus kyarem faro si ma ikofen: "Snonkaku ḇeprei sya sefandun ḇena monsya ḇa, mboi ḇedof sya kada;
42005032	Yaramuma insa yor snonkaku ḇenapes sya ḇa, mboi snonkaku ḇesasar, insa simbror."
42005033	Snon Farisi ansi sikofen faro Yesus wer, ḇo soḇo: "Manfamyan Yohanes ḇyesi nabor sfarfor ma sḇenadi, rarirya kako manfamyan Farisi sya sesi, ḇape manfamyan besi kada sanan ma sinem."
42005034	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Inja snon manfakawin ya ḇati ḇyesi nari kowansi fa sfarfor, rofyor manfakawin ani isya kaker fnoḇek si?
42005035	Mboi fafisuya nari ryama, rofyor manfakawinya ḇyeḇeyun bur si, ro fafisu ani kada insape sakḇe farfor."
42005036	Ikofen kako wos peper oso faro si: "Snonkaku osoḇa nari pyansawek kruḇen ker ro sansun ḇebabo fa ḇyuki syokop sansun wai oso. Rofyor rarirya ido, sansun ḇebabo ani nari imuk, rosai wer kuker kruḇen ḇesokop sun ro sansun ḇebabo ani nari imnisḇa kuker sansun ḇekwar ani.
42005037	Rarirya kako snonkaku osoḇa fa nari iser swan ḇebabo ro kibonḇeḇerere, snar rofyor rarirya ido, swan ḇeḇabo ansi nari sisaipef kibon ḇeḇerere ani ma swan sya sisbawer ma kibon ani kako imbriwer.
42005038	Inja swan ḇebabo sya ipyum syadi seḇeser ro kibon ḇebabo kako.
42005039	Ma snonkaku osoḇa ḇeyinem sawawek swan ḇekwar kwar nari imarisen ḇa fa dinem swan ḇebabo, snar nari ikofen: Swan ḇekwarya kada ipyumkaku."
42006001	Ro ras Mananai Yahudi oso, fafisu Yesus imbran ro yaf fasibu oso, manfamyan ḇyesi sinek fasibu yorem ono siswir diwer si kuker siḇrasna ma san si.
42006002	Ḇape snon Farisi ono sikofen: "Snaro mkofrur roi kopok kofrurḇa ro ras Mananai Yahudi?"
42006003	Rarirya Yesus kyarem faro si: "Mkowasya ḇake ro rosai Daud ifrur, ro fafisu i ma ḇesoisya sibiser,
42006004	eḇedari syun ro Rum Allah ma dun mamami farsarser, fa dan ma ḇyuk kako faro ḇesoisya, mamami rosai snonkaku ḇese sipok sakanḇa derer monda imam-imamsya?"
42006005	Yesus ikofen wer faro si: "Rumkun Snonkaku irya Manseren faro ras Mananai Yahudi."
42006006	Ro ras Mananai Yahudi ḇese wer, Yesus syunḇe Rum nadi, fa ḇyuk farkarkor. Ro dia snon ḇramin ḇar raku ḇemar oso isya.
42006007	Ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi sḇair Yesus, fa smampan imbude Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snon ani ro ras Mananai Yahudi, insa sisma knam fa ssḇuk sasar faroi.
42006008	Ḇape ifawi swaruser sena, inja ikofen faro snon ḇramin ḇar ḇemar ani: "Wayor au ma wores ro faduine!" Inja snon ani iyori fa dores.
42006009	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro si: "Yafuken faro mko: Rosaiso sefakofrur ro ras Mananai Yahudi, kofrur roi ḇeḇyeke roḇaido kofrur ḇarḇor, kofnoḇek nyawa snonkaku roḇaido komun si?"
42006010	Raimnai myam yar-yar sikam, ma ikofen faro snon ḇeduf ani: "Fos ḇramin bedi!" Snon ani ifrur rarirya ma ḇramin ḇyedi iprei beri.
42006011	Inja masasor sena nasber, inja sawos yae faro si, rosaiso nari sifrur faro Yesus.
42006012	Ro fafisu ani Yesus ryaḇe urek fa ḇyenadi ma ro roḇ ḇesiper ani ḇyenadi faro Allah.
42006013	Fafisu meser kwar, ma dor manfamyan ḇyesi fa srama faroi ma kyinfir ro fandu si snon samfur seser risuru, siso dapḇe manwawan:
42006014	Snonsnon sena naiso nane, Simon nyiriḇe Petrus, ma Andreas Simon ḇedar ḇyedi, Yakobus ma Yohanes, Filipus ma Bartolomeus,
42006015	Matius ma Tomas, Yakobus Alfeus mandaḇendi, ma Simon sapḇe snon Zelot,
42006016	Yudas Yakobus mandaḇendi, ma Yudas Iskariot iso ḇarpurya ḇeḇoḇ Yesus.
42006017	Raimnai isabu kuker si ma simnai ro moḇ ḇepyom oso: ro dia manfamyan ḇyesi sibor kaku siryur ma snonkaku ḇese kako ḇerama ker Yudea ḇesiper ma ro Yerusalem ma ḇerama ker supya mnuk swanandir Tirus ma Sidon.
42006018	Srama insa simnaf farkarkor ḇyena ma insa ḇyuk pararei ro dafduf sena; ma kako rur ḇemaḇak siswoḇer sya.
42006019	Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam sesewar fa span roi, snar papoik ḇesasyar roi ma kawasa ansi kam ḇyuk pararei faro si.
42006020	Raimnai Yesus myam faro manfamyan ḇyesi ma ikofen: "Askifaro, ne, ḇesaḇararmkoya, snar mkokada nari mko na Ḇaḇesasoser Allah,
42006021	Aski faro, ne, knikine ḇeḇisermkoya, snar mkokada nari mkosyopen. Aski faro, ne, ḇekanes mkoya, snar mkokada nari mkombrif.
42006022	Aski faro, mko rofyor snonkaku sya sayin mko ma simewer mko, skoryae mko ma rofyor spampum snonsnon mkoḇena imnis roi ḇeḇarḇor oso, snar Rumkun Snonkaku.
42006023	Mkoryaḇ ma mko marisen ro fafisu ani, snar kaku ḇeri, ḇaḇyak mkoḇedi iba ro boiyas; snar kpu sesi sifrur rarirya kako faro nabi sya.
42006024	Ḇape nari mkoroë, ne, ḇenana mkoya, snar ro nana mkoḇena mkosma kwar sneprei mkoḇena.
42006025	Nari mkoroë, snonkaku ḇeyarbor ro knikine mkoya, snar nari mkobiser. Nari mkoroë, snonkaku knike ḇembrif mkoya, snar nari mkoḇe kandera ma mko kanes.
42006026	Nari mkoroë, rofyor snonkaku sya sisandik mko; snar kpu mkoḇesi sifrur rarirya kako kwar faro nabi sararer sya."
42006027	"Ḇape faro mko, ḇemnaf aya, Yakofen: Mkoswar mbroḇ mkoḇesi, mkofrur pyum faro snonkaku ḇeyain mko sya;
42006028	mkor ḇok faro snonkaku befras mko; mkonadi warek snonkaku ḇeyonef mko.
42006029	Mansei ḇeḇaser fofer besya oso, buk fofer besi ḇarya wer, ma mansei ḇeyun syatu bedi, buk sansun baken bedi fa dun iwer kako.
42006030	Buk faro snonkaku mansei ḇeor faro au; ma wor siḇer awer faro snonkaku ḇeyun roi nwana.
42006031	Ma raris wamarisen insa snonkaku sifrur faro au, wakfrur rarirya kako faro si.
42006032	Ma rofyor mkoswar snonkaku ḇeswar mko, rosai fainda faro au? Snar snonkaku ḇesasar sya kako sakswar faro snonkaku ḇeswar si sya.
42006033	Snar rofyor mkofrur pyum faro snonkaku ḇefrur pyum faro mko sya, rosai fainda faro mko? Snonkaku ḇesasar sya kako sakfrur rarirya.
42006034	Ma rofyor mkor resari roi oso faro snonkaku oso, snar mkokyar nari mkosma kaḇer roi oso roi, fainda rosai faro au? Snonkaku ḇesasar sya kako sakḇuk resari faro snonkaku ḇesasar sya, insa sisma munsu nabor namnis.
42006035	Ḇape mko kada, mkoswar mbroḇ mkoḇesi ma mkofrur pyum faro si ma mkoḇuk resari ma mkokyar awer nari mkosma munsu, rarirya ḇaḇyak mkoḇedi nari iba ma nari mkoḇeromawa Allah Ḇekaki Syadi, snar ikada ipyum faro snonkaku ḇekofen kasumasa ḇa ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor sya.
42006036	Iḇyekada mkoḇesnemura, imnis raris Kma mkoḇedi kako ḇyesnemura."
42006037	"Mkoḇe mankara awer, rarirya mko kako nari sakḇemankara mkoḇa. Ma mkoḇuk samamyai awer, rarirya mko kako nari sakḇuk samamyai faro mkoḇa; mkoḇuk ampun rarirya mko kako nari sḇeampun mko.
42006038	Mkoḇuk kada nari smunsu faro mko: warnkyara ḇeḇye oso, skukira ifyos, ma sisas i isof isbawer ma ḇesbawer anna nari sisbawer na ro farandan bedi. Snar warnkyara mkoḇuki kyaraya, nari ssḇuki kyara mko kako."
42006039	Yesus ikofen wos peper oso wer faro si: "Rariso snon ḇepraf oso ikfin snon ḇepraf ḇeseya? Mkofawiḇake nari sukam susapi ro der?
42006040	Romawa farkor oso nari isyadi ro guru ḇyediḇa, ḇape rofyor fyarkor posa kwar ro farkarkor ḇyena nari imnis guru ḇyedi.
42006041	Snaro mam faro papoi ḇero naek bedi mkamor ḇyesuya, ḇoi ai fyor ḇeba ḇeḇeayuḇ ro mkamor besuya wafawiḇake?
42006042	Rariso nari wakofen faro naek bedi: Naeko iḇye yapyos papoi ḇero mkamor besuya, mboi ai baken ḇeba ḇeḇeayuḇ ro mkamor besuya kada mam i ḇake? Ne, snonkaku ḇeankarkar, wasasyar ḇepon ai baken ḇeba ḇeḇeayuḇ ro mkamor besuya resari insape mam pyum fa wapyos papoi-papoi anna ro naek bedi mkamor ḇyesu ya."
42006043	"Snar ai knam ḇeḇye oso nari imarem bon ḇeḇyeḇayo ḇa, ma rarirya kako ai knam ḇeḇyeḇa oso nari imarem bon ḇepyumo ḇa.
42006044	Snar ai knam oser-oser ḇyeḇemambir ro bon ḇyena. Snar korokem ara bonḇa ro aikus borek ma anggur bon ro kaḇrai borekḇa.
42006045	Snonkaku ḇeḇye ifrur roi ḇeḇye ro sne karambram ḇeḇye ḇyedi ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ifrur roi ḇeḇarḇor ro sne karamḇram ḇeḇarḇor ḇyedi. Snar roi ikofen na nakḇairo sne ḇyedi."
42006046	"Snaro mkor aya: Manseren, Manseren, mboi mkofrur roi yakofen naḇa?
42006047	Mansesi ḇerama faro aya ma ḇemnaf wos ayena ḇo ḇefruruser na -- nari yafasnai faro i kuker mansei yaḇuki imnisya, --
42006048	imnis raris snon oso ḇeḇawes rum: Snon ani ḇyai woni ḇekaki ma ryir araref ḇyedi ro karuna bo. Ro fafisu faḇruḇ ma dafya myun rum ani, rum ani imararerḇa, snar rum ani sifrur i fa idworen.
42006049	Ḇape mansei ḇemnaf wos ayena, mboi ḇefrur userna ḇa, imnis raris snon oso ḇefrur rumro saprop ḇeḇeararef ḇa. Rofyor dafya myun i, rum ani fasaw kaku kyarḇaken ma imkokbos beri."
42007001	Rofyor Yesus dawawosra posa kwar ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi, ryasyun ro Kapernaum.
42007002	Rodia, snon mambri Roma oso ro Kapernaum manfyan ḇyesi oso iduf marḇak ma fanam imar kwar isof iswari kaku.
42007003	Rofyor mambri ani imnaf Yesus, iwan ḇebarara Yahudi onofa sor Yesus, insa ryama ḇyuk pararei faro manfyan ḇyani.
42007004	Rofyor sisrow Yesus kwar, sor famfnoḇek ro Yesus ma sikofen: "Wafnoḇek snon ine,
42007005	snar ikada iswar er koḇesi ma iso ḇeḇawes rum ari nkoḇedi."
42007006	Inja Yesus isosi ma srakam. Fafisu sfanam mambri ani rum ḇyedi, iwan bati ḇyesi onofa sikofen faro Yesus: "Tuan, bekandera awer snar aya ine yasyusḇa fa swun ro rum ayedi;
42007007	knam ine eḇedarfa mankundaya yaramufa ḇe auḇa. Ḇape wakofen monda wos oser, nari manfyan ayani iprei.
42007008	Snar ayaine ḇardi yaro baḇ, ma robaḇ ayedi kako sordade sisya. Rofyor yakofen faro sordade oso: Rwa, ma nari rya, ma faro oso wer: Rwama ma nari ryama, oroḇa ido faro manfyan ayedi: Wafrur roi ine ma nari ifruri."
42007009	Rofyor Yesus imnaf wos ani, ikandori, ma iknenef faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇesoisya, ma ikofen: "Yakofen faro mko, rofandu kawasa Israel syakam, yasma kakyar ḇebayo rya dine ḇaim!"
42007010	Ma rofyor snonkaku iwan ansi skaḇer ḇe rum, sisma manfyan ani iprei kwar.
42007011	Ḇarpurya Yesus ryaḇe mnu oso ḇenirḇe Nain. Manfamyan ḇyesi sifnoḇek i, ma snonkaku ḇeḇor ono semarani bo saksoi.
42007012	Rofyor fyanam kedwai ḇeba ro mnu ani, sḇar snonkaku ḇemar oso ḇo sisasyar ro mnuya, romawa snon, kabom oso romawa ḇyedi ma kawasa sibor ro mnu ani sakfnoḇek kabom ani.
42007013	Ma rofyor Manseren Yesus myam kabom ani, saswarya dek ro sne ḇyedi, ma ikofen faroi: "Kwanes awer!"
42007014	Raimnai fyanam waryar ani ma pyan roi, inja ḇeḇar waryar ansi sores, ma Yesus ikofen: "Ne, snonkbor yakofen faro aw, wiḇer aw!"
42007015	Ma snonkbor ani ikḇok ma kyain ma irandak dawawos, ma Yesus ḇyuki faro snari.
42007016	Snonkaku ansikam simkak ma sisandik Allah, ma sikofen: "Nabi ḇeba oso syaye rofandu koḇedi," ma "Allah ryakaki kawasa ḇyesi."
42007017	Rarirya Yesus ḇyeabar yar sup Yudea ḇesiper ma supya mnuk ani kam.
42007018	Rofyor Yohanes imnaf roi ḇeḇor anna kam ro manfamyan ḇyesi,
42007019	inja dor rofandusi snon risuru fa sufuken Manseren: "Inja aw nari ḇeramayake, roḇa nari nkowaf snonkakuyo ḇeseke?"
42007020	Rofyor manfamyan ansuya sura faro Yesus kwar, sukofen: "Yohanes Ḇemasi iwan numa nufuken au: Inja aw nari ḇeramayake, roḇa nari nkowaf snonkakuyo ḇeseke?"
42007021	Rofyor ani Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snonkaku sibor ro dafduf ma kandera sena kam ma iyaw rurḇemaḇak, ma ḇyuk mamam faro ḇepraf sya.
42007022	Ma Yesus kyarem faro su: "Mura ma mukofen faro Yohanes rosai mumam ma mumnaf: Snonkaku ḇepraf smam, snonkaku ḇepapipen simbran, snon ḇeduf pado seḇefasren, snon ḇepro simnaf, snon ḇemar sḇeḇeḇawes, ma snon ḇesaḇarar sisma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye.
42007023	Ma aski faro snonkaku ḇefafayaf ma ḇepampum ayaḇa."
42007024	Yohanes wawan ḇyansuya sura kwar, Yesus irandak dawawos faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ro Yohanes: "Rosai ḇeḇewar mkora ḇe sup ḇeursḇa? Mkomam doker wamya iso ḇo ḇewai mura muma?
42007025	Roḇaido fandun rosai mkoraya? Mkomam snonkaku ḇesansun sansun ḇepyumke? Snonkaku ḇesansun sansun ḇepyum ma ḇekenem manminsya, moḇ sena naisya ro rum wairek.
42007026	Inja fandun rosai mkoraya? Mkomam nabike? Kuker kaku, yakofen faro mko, mboi isyadi ro nabi.
42007027	Snar sfas ḇadiri kwar: Mam, yawan wawan ayedi fa pyon au, nari fyasos nyan bedi ro ḇarpon bedi.
42007028	Yakofen faro mko: Rofandu snonkaku saḇensya, oso iba syadi Yohanes ḇa, mboi ḇebaḇa ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah iso ḇeba syadi roi."
42007029	Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇemnaf wos ḇyena, ma ḇeyor som, ssḇuk kaku ro ḇaḇenapnapes Allah, snar Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren farosi kwar.
42007030	Ḇape snon Farisi ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi spampum Allah kakara ḇyena faro si, snar simewer Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren faro si.
42007031	Yesus ikofen: "Kuker rosai nari yaḇuk karai syos ine ma kuker rosai yaḇuk imnis si?
42007032	Snar simnis romawa ḇekain ro buḇes ma ḇeyor yae: Nkowuf sonker faro mko, ḇape mkomas ḇa, nkodisen dow-ḇarop, ḇape mkokanes ḇa.
42007033	Snar Yohanes Ḇemasi ryama ma dan mamami ḇa ma dinem anggur ḇa, ma mkokofen: Rur ḇemaḇak isawoḇi.
42007034	Ḇarpurya Rumkun Snonkaku ryama, danan ma dinem, mkokofen ḇo mkoḇo: Mkomam, ima snon oso ḇenambri ma ḇefarandinem, bati ro ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasar.
42007035	Ḇape fawawi Allah ya snonkaku ḇesouser ssḇuk kaku roi."
42007036	Snon Farisi oso dor Yesus fa ryama dakanan ro rum ḇyedi. Yesus ryama ro rum Farisi ani, ma kyain danan.
42007037	Ro mnu ani bin oso isya sifawi kami ḇe bin ḇesasar. Rofyor bin ani imnaf Yesus isya danan ro rum Farisi ani, ryama ma dun parana sabarom ḇeser mani spum.
42007038	Rofyor dores ro Yesus dokor ḇyedi fanam wemin ḇyesuya ma kyanes, ma ḇyan Yesus wemin ḇyesuya kuker mkaru ḇyena ma ipyos na kuker snonburyam ḇyena, raimnai isyum Yesus wemin ḇyesuya ma ryemi kuker mani spum ani.
42007039	Rofyor snon Farisi ḇepos Yesus ani myam roi ḇeḇesya ani, ikofen ro sne ḇyedi: "Nabi riso ine kada nari ifawi, mansei ma bin sai ḇepan roi; nari ifawi bin ine bin ḇesasar rirya."
42007040	Inja Yesus ikofen faroi: "Simon, yamarisen yakofen roi oso faro aw." Simon kyarem: "Guru, wakofen mura."
42007041	"Snon risuru suḇenyaki pipi ro snon ḇeḇuk pipi oso. Snon ḇeponya ḇyenyaki dinar utin ririm, suminya samfur ririm.
42007042	Snar supok suḇak naḇa, inja ipyos nyaki suḇan na. Mansei rofandu su, nari ḇeswar syadi i?"
42007043	Simon kyarem: "Yakara snon sipyos nyaki ḇeḇor ḇyenanya." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Kaku ro kakara bedi."
42007044	Ma isiḇer faro bin ani ḇo ikofen faro Simon: "Mam bin ine? Yasun ro rum bedi, ḇesyaḇo buk waro ḇyan wemin ayesuya ḇa, ḇape imasi wemin ayesu kuker mkaru ma ipyos wemin ayesuya kuker snonburyam ḇyena.
42007045	Wasyum ayaḇa, ḇape rofyor yasun isyum wemin ayesuya ḇesya kwar.
42007046	Rwem bukor ayedi kuker maniḇa, ḇape ikada ryem wemin ayesuya kuker mani spum.
42007047	Inja yakofen faro au: Sasar ḇeḇor ḇyena neḇepyos kwar, snar ifrur kwar saswar nabor kaku. Ḇape snonkaku ḇesma payasyos kermkun, ifrur saswar kermkun monda kako."
42007048	Raimnai ikofen faro bin ani: "Sasar bena neḇepyos kwar."
42007049	Ma ḇekain ḇeyananus Yesus ansya, skara ro sisnesna: "Manseiso ine, isof ipyos sasar na?"
42007050	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro bin ani: "Kayar bedi ḇyuk koreri faro au kwar, wabur kuker aski!"
42008001	Posa kwar fyoroba Yesus imbran yar ro mnu ḇe mnu ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇya ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah. Ma manfamyan samfur seser risuru sifnoḇek i,
42008002	ma bin ono kako ḇyuk pararei ro rur ḇeḇarḇor ma dafduf ḇeḇor, isoine Maria sap ḇe Magdalena, ḇesma ḇaḇemkei kwar ro rur ḇeḇarḇor rifik,
42008003	Yohana Khuza swari ḇefararur ro rum Herodes, Susana ma bin ḇeḇor ḇese. Bin-bin sine suf farmyan maran ani kuker nana sena.
42008004	Fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor semarani ḇo srama, isoine kawasa ro mnu ḇe mnu ḇerama ḇeḇeoser kuker Yesus, ikofen sarḇer oso:
42008005	"Snon ḇekekef mor oso isasyar fa kyekef rokaker ḇyena. Rofyor kyekef, rokaker anna ono nasapi ro nyan andir, inja snonkaku saref apepen na mansya ro farsyos san na rao isof naḇro.
42008006	Ono nasapi ro saprop ḇeḇe karui, nasur kwar ḇape nmas snar nasma warḇa.
42008007	Ono wer nasapi ro manuk borek, ma manuk borek anna nasur fnoḇek nparek na isof nmas.
42008008	Ma ono nasapi ro saprop ḇeḇye, ma nasur kwar namarem ḇe rarwan utin oser." Iwawos rarirya kwar Yesus ikofen: "Mansei ḇena knaram fa ḇerower, iḇye kada ryower!"
42008009	Manfamyan ḇyesi sifuken faroi, sarḇer ani ikofen rosai.
42008010	Inja kyarem: "Faro mko kada mkosma fakamaman fa mkofawi kankunes ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah, ḇape faro snonkaku ḇese roi ḇeḇesya ani ḇyeḇeḇuk kuker sarḇer, insa smam ḇoi seknaḇa ma srower ḇoi sifawi naḇa.
42008011	Kankunes sarḇer ani isoine: Rokaker anna irya Allah wos ḇyena.
42008012	Ḇesapi ro nyan andir anna isoine snonkaku ḇemnaf wos anna kwar; ḇarpurya Ibirisya ryama ma dun wos anna bur sisnesna, insa sikyar awer ma sisma koreriḇa.
42008013	Ḇesapi ro saprop ḇeḇe karui isoine snonkaku, ḇemnaf wos anna, sisma na kuker raryaḇ, ḇape wos anna nerares ḇa, sikyar knik monda ma rofafisu faraurowes sisusubur kakyar sena.
42008014	Ḇesapi ro manuk borek isoine snonkaku ḇemnaf wos anna, ma nasur pdef ḇape ḇaḇeḇirḇar ma ḇaḇekayan ma kankenem ḇaḇe marares, nepen na isof nbuk bon ḇembrai ḇa.
42008015	Ḇesapi ro saprop ḇeḇye isoine snonkaku, ḇemnaf wos anna kwar, ḇekram na ro sne kuker ḇaḇye ma nasasyar bon ro ḇaḇefarmkuya."
42008016	"Snonkakuyo pyam padamara posa ikawefi kuker fyomba roḇa ryiri ro kamboyo baḇdi, imboi ryiri ro adadu, insa snonkaku kam ḇesun ro rumya smam sanana ḇyedi.
42008017	Snar roi oso nari iyokef ḇa nari sfasna na, ma sḇekankunes roi osoḇa nari sifawina ma sfababa na.
42008018	Inja, mkokara nyan manafnaf mkoḇena. Snar mansei ḇesma, faroi nari ssḇuk, ḇape mansei ḇesmaḇa, nari sunburi rosai kyara nasya faroi."
42008019	Yesus snari ma naek ḇyesi srama faroi, ḇape sisrowi ḇa snar kawasasya sibor.
42008020	Snonkaku sikofen ḇadir faroi: "Snami ma naek bansi sisya ro ḇandi ma simarisen sisrow au."
42008021	Ḇape kyarem faro si: "Awini ma naek ayesya siso, ḇemnaf Allah wos ḇyena ma ḇefrur na."
42008022	Ro ras oso Yesus dek ro wai fnoḇek manfamyan ḇyesi, ma ikofen farosi: "Mkorama kokaḇorḇe danosenya ḇariwara." Rarirya skokaḇor.
42008023	Ma rofyor skayun kaker, Yesus ḇyarek ma denef. Kniko ḇama wamdoḇer iso ro danosen ani, isof ḇakna nekro wai ma fyanam imsar.
42008024	Inja manfamyan ḇyesi srama sḇani ma sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Guru, Guru, koroë!" Inja ikḇok, raimnai ifyow wam ma ḇak anna. Rofyor aniḇeri wam ma ḇak namnai ma danosen ani iḇrin.
42008025	Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Kakyar mkoḇena naisya ro?" Rarirya simkak ma sikandor, ma sikofen yae farosi: "Manseso snonkaku ine, isof ḇyuk sasoser faro wam ma sorenya ma nasouseri?"
42008026	Raimnai Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi sko fyafer ro sup kawasa Gerasa ḇekar ḇe sup Galilea ḇariwara.
42008027	Rofyor Yesus dado rande kwar, snon oso ro mnu ani ryama isrow Yesus; snon ani rur ḇemaḇaksya sisawoḇi ma fyoro kwar syansuni ḇa ma ikenem ro rum ba, mboi ikenem ro rusna monda.
42008028	Rofyor myam Yesus, fyararar ma kyain wepur ḇyansuba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ikofen kuker mkaren ḇeba: "Rosai wafrur kuker aya, ne, Yesus Rumkun Allah Ḇekaki Syadi? Yor ro au, insa wafrur kandera awer aya."
42008029	Ikofen rarirya snar Yesus ḇyuk sasoser fa rur ḇemaḇak ansi sisasyar bur snon ani. Snar fyor ono ido rur ḇemaḇak ansi sisasmeri, isof sewanka i ma seapyaur i, ḇape imerakuk roi ḇeḇor sikfesi na rur ansi suni ḇe moḇ-moḇ ḇeḇeusḇa.
42008030	Ma Yesus ikofen faroi: "Snonsnon beja iso?" Kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Legion," (snonkaku syaran) snar rur ḇemaḇak sya sibor sisawoḇi.
42008031	Raimnai rur ḇemaḇak ansi sor faro Yesus, insa ḇyuk sasoser awer fa ssun ro der marmari.
42008032	Ro dia randip nai ḇeḇor ono ssewar sanan ro urek bam, ma rur ḇemaḇak ansi sor faro Yesus, insa imarisen fa ssun ro randip ansi. Inja Yesus ḇyuk raris fararyor sedi.
42008033	Rarirya rur ḇemaḇak ansi sisasyar bur snon ani ma ssun ro randip ansi. Randip nai ansi soper ro fofen andirya ma ssun ro danosen ma simar kam.
42008034	Ḇewaren randip ansi smam roi ḇeḇesya anna kwar, sifrar ḇe mnuya ma sfar faro mnu-mnu nakam roi ḇeḇesya ani ro dia.
42008035	Ma kawasa-kawasa sya sisasyar fa smam rosai ḇeḇesya ani. Rofyor srama faro Yesus ma sisrow snon rur ḇemaḇak sya sibur ani kyain fanam Yesus wemin ḇyesuya; ma syansuni kwar ma iknon dam. Ma kawasa ansi simkak.
42008036	Snonkaku ḇemam kwar roi ḇeḇesya ani mankunsi sikofen ḇadir farosi, rariso snonkaku rur ḇemaḇaksya sisawoḇ ani isma faspar kwar.
42008037	Raimnai kawasa ḇekain ro sup Gerasa sor faro Yesus, insa ibursi, snar simkak mankenem. Inja Yesus dek ro waiya, ma skayun kaḇer.
42008038	Ma snon rur ḇemaḇaksya sibur ani dor faro Yesus insa imarisen ido isoi. Ḇape Yesus iwani fa rya, doḇo:
42008039	"Wabur ḇe rum bedi ma farfyar roi ḇeḇor kam Allah ifrur faro au kwar." Snon ani rya iyar mnu ani ḇesiper ma ikofen ḇadir roi ḇeborkam Yesus ifrur faro mankundi na.
42008040	Rofyor Yesus kyaḇer, kawasa sibor srafa sisrowi snar sikam siwafi.
42008041	Inja snon oso snonsnon ḇyedi Yairus ryama. Ikada mananir ro rum-ari. Kyain wepur ma ḇyansuba ro ḇarpon Yesus wemin ḇyesuya ma dor faroi, insa Yesus ryaḇe rum ḇyedi,
42008042	snar inai binjos ḇyedi ḇeḇe wampasi wambarek samfur seser risuruya, fyanam imar. Ro marandan ḇe Yairus rum ḇyedi kawasa sibor sifyosepen Yesus.
42008043	Bin oso iduf dafduf rik ḇe wampasi wambarek samfur seser risuru kwar ma mansei ryawer kako ḇyuk pararei faroiḇa.
42008044	Imbran fa fyanam Yesus ro dokor ḇyedi ma duf Yesus syatu ḇyedi pusyom na, ma rofyor ani kako dafduf rik ani imnai beri.
42008045	Raimnai Yesus ikofen: "Mansei ḇepan ro aya?" Ma snar oso kyaremba, Petrus ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Guru, kawasa ḇeḇor spanjuḇer ma sifyos apepen au."
42008046	Ḇape Yesus ikofen: "Snon oso isya pyan ro aya, snar yaḇaḇir papoik isya isasyar ro baken yedi."
42008047	Rofyor bin ani myam, mboi fararur ḇyedi ḇyeḇefawi, inja ryadai ḇo ryama, kyain wepur ḇo ḇyansuba ro Yesus ḇarpon ḇyedi ma fyarfyar faro kawasa ḇeḇor rosai ḇefnai fa pyan ro Yesus ma rofafisu ani iprei beri.
42008048	Inja Yesus ikofen faro bin ani: "Ne, inai yedi, kakyar bedi ḇyuk aski faro aw kwar, wabur kuker aski!"
42008049	Rofyor Yesus iwawos kaker, snon oso ro kina mananir rum ari ani ryama ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Romawa bani imar kwar, inja wafrur kandera awer Gurui."
42008050	Ḇape Yesus imnaf rarirya ikofen faro Yairus: "Wamkak awer, wakyar monda, snar romawa ḇani nari ikenem."
42008051	Rofyor sra ro Yairus rum ḇyedi, Yesus ḇyuk fa Petrus, Yohanes ma Yakobus ma inai ani snari fnoḇek kmari skosun skoso Yesus ma snon oso ḇaḇeri dakso.
42008052	Snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi skanes inai ani. Ḇape Yesus ikofen: "Mkokanes awer; imarḇa, ḇape denef."
42008053	Simbrif Yesus, snar sifawi romawa ani imar kwar.
42008054	Raimnai Yesus duf romawa ani ḇramin ḇyedi ma dorḇo ikofen: "Ne, romawa wakḇok."
42008055	Ma romawa ani rur ḇyedi kyaḇer ma rofafisu ani kako ikḇok ma dores. Raimnai Yesus iwan fa sfan romawa ani.
42008056	Ma romawa ani sinan ḇyansu sukandor, ḇape Yesus myunwareksi insa sikofen ḇadir awer faro manseryawer kako rosai ḇerarirya ani.
42009001	Inja Yesus dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyesi, raimnai ḇyuk samambraḇ ma papoik farosifa insa sipoik syadi rur ḇemaḇak ma ssḇuk pararei ro dafduf na.
42009002	Ma iwansifa sḇaryas Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ma ssḇuk pararei faro snonkaku,
42009003	ikofen farosi: "Mkun awer roi ono ro mararan, mkun awer ankyon roḇa roi ḇeḇaryam, mamami roḇa pipi, roḇa sansun risuru.
42009004	Ma rofyor mkosun ro rum oso kwar, mkoḇeryar rodia isof mkosasyar ma mkombran pdef mararan mkoḇedi rodia.
42009005	Ma rofyor snonkaku simewer mko ido, mkosasyar ro mnu sedi ma mkokokef oref ḇero mnu ani bur mkowemna insa neswarapepen farosi."
42009006	Raimnai sra simbran yar mnu nakam ḇo sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ma ssḇuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇeduf ro moḇ nakam.
42009007	Herodes, wairek ro sup Galilea, imnaf roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya anna ḇyaḇir ḇyefesfyas, snar snonkaku ono sikofen, mboi Yohanes diḇri rofandu ḇemarsya kwar.
42009008	Ono sikofen wer, mboi Elia kyaḇer kwar, ma ono kako sikofen, mboi snon oso ro nabi-nabi ḇepon ansi ikḇawes kwar.
42009009	Ḇape Herodes ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Yohanes yaperemuk ḇukor ḇyedi kwar. Mboi manseiso ine, ḇyesno ifrur roi ḇeḇesya rarirya?" Raimnai ḇyesewar insa daksruw Yesus.
42009010	Rofyor wawan ansi skaḇer sfarfyar faro Yesus rosai sifrur kwar na. Raimnai Yesus dunsi ma sraḇe mnu oso ḇenirḇe Betsaida, isof semir monda fnoḇek Yesus.
42009011	Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor sifawi i, inja siso i. Ismasi ma dawawos farosi ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ma ḇyuk pararei faro kawasa ḇeḇefandun pararesya.
42009012	Fafisu mandiraya manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansi srama faroi ma sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Wawan kawasa ḇeḇor ansifa sibur, insa sraḇe mnu-mnu ḇefanam nane fa ssewar moḇ seryar ro ma roḇean, snar koisya ro moḇ ḇeḇeusḇa."
42009013	Ḇape Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkoiso nari ḇefansi!" Ḇape skarem ḇo soḇo: "Nkosma syadiḇa ro mamami ririm ma in risuru, ḇesyanja nkora nkokoḇes roḇean faro kawasa ḇeḇor sinekada."
42009014	Snar indokada snon syaran ririm sisya ro diwa. Raimnai ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mkowansi fa skain ḇewuk-wukem, wukem oser indokada snon samfur ririm."
42009015	Manfamyan ansi sifrur rarirya ma siwan kawasa ḇeḇor ansifa skain.
42009016	Ma Yesus dun mamami ririm ma in risuru ansuya kwar, iwakwaker ḇe nanki, ma ikofen kasumasa faro Allah, raimnai pyapef mamami ma in ansuya ma ḇyukna faro manfamyan ḇyesi insa sakḇerarwasna faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
42009017	Ma sikam san isof sarbor. Ḇarpurya siryur mamami ker-ker ḇedawerna barborya inoken samfur seser risuru.
42009018	Ro rarwan oso rofyor Yesus demir ḇo ḇyenadi, manfamyan ḇyesi sra sfanami. Raimnai ifukensi: "Kawasa ḇeborsya soḇo, manseiso aya ine?"
42009019	Skarem ḇo soḇo: "Yohanes Ḇemasi, ono ḇese kako soḇo: Elia, ono ḇese wer soḇo, snon oso ro nabi-nabi ḇepon ansi ikḇawes kwar."
42009020	Yesus ifuken farosi: "Mboi mko ido mkokara manseiso aya?" Petrus kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Wairek ḇerama ro Allah."
42009021	Raimnai Yesus idwarek kaku, insa sikofen ḇair awer roi ḇeḇesya ani faro manseirya kako.
42009022	Ma Yesus ikofen: "Rumkun Snonkakuya nari ḇyekandera nabor ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara, mananir imam-imam ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi, nari spampumi ma smuni ma ḇyeḇeḇawes ro ras ḇeḇekiorya."
42009023	Ikofen faro sikam: "Snonkaku oser-oser ḇemarisen ḇeso aya, ikada nari fyamyun mankundi, ma ḇyar aprop ḇyedi ro ras-ras ma iso aya.
42009024	Snar mansei ḇemarisen ḇeḇriwarek kankenem ḇyedi, nari kankenem ḇyedi ryoburi; ḇape mansei kankenem ḇyedi ryoburi snar aya, ikada nari isma kankenem ḇyedi.
42009025	Fainda rosai snon oso nya siper supswan ine, ma myun roḇa ḇyefromo mankundi ḇardi?
42009026	Snar mansei ḇemai aya ma wos ayena, Rumkun Snonkakuya kako nari imai snon ani, rofyor ifyafer kuker papoik ḇyedi ma papoik Kmaya ma papoik malaikat-malaikat ḇesren sya.
42009027	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri rofandu snonkaku ḇerama mkoine nari ono simar ḇaim isof sakmam Ḇaḇesasoser Allah."
42009028	Indokada ras riwar ro farkarkor anna kwar, Yesus dun Petrus, Yohanes ma Yakobus, raimnai skek raryas ro bonya insa skoḇenadi.
42009029	Rofyor Yesus ḇyenadi, ḇarpon ḇyedi syadwer ma sansun ḇyena napyoper karḇas.
42009030	Ma kniko monda snon risuru suyawawos kuker Yesus, isoine Moses ma Elia.
42009031	Sufasna mankunsu ro sananai ro boiyaswa ma suyawawos kuker Yesus ro marmar ḇyedi nari fyoroḇa wer ḇyeimnis na ro Yerusalem.
42009032	Rofafisu ani Petrus ma min ḇyesi senef ma rofyor skokḇok ma skomam Yesus sanana ḇyedi: ma snon risuru suyores kuker Yesus.
42009033	Ma rofyor snonkaku ansu suḇe subur Yesus, Petrus ikofen faro Yesus: "Guru, aski bos kaku koisya ro moḇ ine. Iḇye kada nkofrur aḇdares rikior, oso faro au, oso faro Moses ma oso faro Elia." Ḇape Petrus ifawi roi ikofen naḇa.
42009034	Rofafisu ikofen rarirya, mandep oso ryama ikawef sko. Ma rofyor skosun ro mandep ani, skomkak kaku.
42009035	Ḇarpurya skomnaf mkaren ḇerok ro mandep ani ḇekofen: "Inekada Rumkun ayedi yakinfir kwar, mkomnaf i."
42009036	Rofyor mkaren ani imnai kwar, skomam Yesus demir dores. Ma manfamyan ansi sḇekankunes roi ḇeḇor smam anna, ma sfarfyar na faro manseiryawer ḇaḇeri ro fafisu ani.
42009037	Ro mesrdi skodoro bon ani, snonkaku ḇeḇor semarani ḇo srama sisrow Yesus.
42009038	Snon oso ro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi dor, ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Guru, wafnoḇek wakmam romawa ayedi, snar ikada romawa mandos ayedirya.
42009039	Rofafisu rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇeri, rurḇemaḇak ani ifruri fa fyararar ma ryadaudower isof sḇadon ḇyedi kyaḇaḇus. Rurḇemaḇak ani ḇyewayami pdef ma imewer isasyar burindi.
42009040	Ma yor kwar faro manfamyan bansi insa siyaw rurḇemaḇak ani, ḇape sipokḇa."
42009041	Inja Yesus ikofen: "Ne, mko syos ḇekyarḇa ma ḇeḇor, fafisu rosai nari yakainso mko ma yakḇaḇ mko? Wun romawa banya muma!"
42009042	Rofyor romawa ani fyanam Yesus, rurḇemaḇak ani ipyasi ro saprop ma kyakikeri. Ḇape Yesus ḇyewef rurḇemaḇak ani ma ḇyuk pararei faro romawa ani, ma kyaḇeri faro kmari.
42009043	(43a) Kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sikandor snar smam Allah papoik ḇyedi iba kaku. (43b) Fafisu kawasa ansikam sikandor kaker snar roi ḇeḇor ifrur anna, Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi:
42009044	"Mkomnaf ma mkokara naḇye wos ayenane: Rumkun Snonkaku nari sḇoḇi faro papoik snonkaku."
42009045	Ḇape sifawi wos aniḇa, snar kankunes ḇyedi iyokef bursi, isof sifawi ḇa. Ma simkak sifuken kankunes ḇyedi faroi.
42009046	Rofandu Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sfamfaḇri mansei rosi nari ḇeba syadiya.
42009047	Ḇape Yesus ifawi kakara sena. Eḇedari dun romawa kasun oso ma iwanfa dores ro risḇyedi,
42009048	ma ikofen farosi: "Mansei ḇefaduru romawa ine snar snonsnon ayedi, ikada fyaduru aya; ma mansei ḇefaduru aya, ikada fyaduru ḇewan ayanya. Snar ḇebaḇa syadi rofandu mkokam, iso ḇeba syadiya."
42009049	Yohanes ikofen: "Guru, nkomam snon oso iyau rurḇemaḇak kuker snonsnon bedi, inja nkodwarek snon ani, ima dakso koḇa."
42009050	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Mkodwarek aweri, snar mansei ḇesampum mkoḇa, ikada isyaro mun mkoḇedi."
42009051	Fafisu fyanam kwar fa Yesus ḇyeḇekano ḇe boiyaswa, kyara namuk fa ryaḇe Yerusalem.
42009052	Inja iwan wawan onofa sponi. Sra ssun ro mnu oso ro Samaria insa sfasos roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇefandun faro Yesus.
42009053	Ḇape kawasa ro mnu ani simewer Yesus, snar marandan ḇyedi ryaḇe Yerusalem.
42009054	Rofyor manfamyan ḇyansuya, isoine Yakobus ma Yohanes, sufawi roi ḇeḇesya ani, sukofen: "Manseren, wamarisen ido, nkor foro isabu ro nankifes myun kawasa sine?"
42009055	Ḇape isiḇer ma isoneksi.
42009056	Raimnai sraḇe mnu ḇesena.
42009057	Fafisu Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi simbran pdef marandan sedi, snon oso ikofen faro Yesus: "Nari yaso au, ḇemoḇ rosai waḇe rwayoḇna."
42009058	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Nafsup sisma der ma man sisma narem, ḇape Rumkun Snonkaku isma moḇofa ḇyarek roḇa."
42009059	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro snon oso ḇese: "Waso aya!" Ḇape snon ani ikofen: "Wamarisen ido yarafa yakrir kamami resari."
42009060	Ḇape Yesus kyarem faroi: "Iḇye snonkaku ḇemar sikrir snonkaku ḇemar sesi; ḇape au, rwa ḇaryas Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ro moḇ-moḇ nakam."
42009061	Ma snon oso ḇese dakkofen wer: "Yamarisen yaso au, Manseren, ḇape wamarisen ido yara yakofen aroo faro kina ayesi ḇepon resari."
42009062	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro snon ani: "Snonkaku ḇerandak ḇeḇebajak kwar, raimnai myamḇe dokor, isyusḇa fa ḇyekina ro Allah kawasa ḇyesi."
42010001	Raimnai Yesus kyinfir manfamyan samfur rifik wer, ma iwansi fasḇe suru-suru ḇo sponi ḇe mnu ma moḇ iḇe ryayoḇ na.
42010002	Ikofen farosi: "Yafna nadufen kwar, ḇape ḇefararursya siborḇa. Eḇedari nkor faro amber ḇena yafya, insa fyarem ḇefararur ono fa srabar roḇean anna.
42010003	Mkora, yawan mko imnis domba mkun ro fandu naf supsya.
42010004	Mkun awer kamon roḇa roi ḇeḇaryam, roḇa roi ḇesower wemin, ma mkoḇe aroo awer faro manseiryawer, rofyor mkoisya kaker ro mararanya.
42010005	Ma mkosun ro rum oso, mkofen ḇepon farosi: Aski faro mko ro rum ine.
42010006	Ma rum ani ono sisya sefandun faro aroo mkoḇena, nari askiya kyainso si. Ḇape ono sḇefandun aroo mkoḇenaḇa ido, nasiḇer faro mko.
42010007	Mkokain ro rum oso ido, mkonan ma mkinem rosai sḇukna, snar mansei ḇefararurya, nari isma sasuref; inja mkobur awer rum ani ḇe rum-rum ḇese.
42010008	Ma rofyor mkosun ro mnu oso rawo simarisen mko ido, mkan rosai sfasos faro mko.
42010009	Ma mkoḇuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇeduf ro mnu ani, ma mkokofen farosi: Ḇaḇesasoser Allah fyanam kwar faro mko!
42010010	Ḇape rofyor mkosun ro mnu ani ma simarisen mko ro mnu aniḇa ido, mkoraḇe sampak ḇero mnu ani ma mkor farma:
42010011	Rarirya kako oref ro mnu ani ḇekrof ro mkowemna, mkokokefna ro ḇarpon mkoḇedi, insa mkofawi roi ine: Ḇaḇesasoser Allah fyanam kwar.
42010012	Ḇape yakofen faro mko, nari ro ras mankaraya, Sodom myanan syadi ro kamnam mnu ani."
42010013	"Au Khorazim, rwoë! Au Betsaida, rwoë! Snar kanandor mkomam nane neḇefasna ro Tirus ma Sidon rarirya kada, nari smandak ma simbror fyoro kwar.
42010014	Rarirya rofyor ras mankaraya, kamnam Tirus ma Sidon nari nasrawen syadi kamnam mkoḇena.
42010015	Ma au Kapernaum, woḇo nari be ḇekanow raryas ro nankike? Oroḇa! mboi nari skekef au ḇemun aiḇui.
42010016	Mansei ḇemnaf mko ido, ikada imnaf aya. Ma mansei ḇesampum mko ido, imnis isampum aya, ma mansei ḇesampum aya ido, imnis raris isampum ḇewan ayanya."
42010017	Ḇarpurya manfamyan samfur rifik ansi skaḇer kuker raryaḇ ma sikofen: "Manseren, rur ḇemaḇaksya kako skunem faro nko, snar snonsnon bedi."
42010018	Raimnai Yesus ikofen: "Yamam Ibiris isapi imnis arḇeḇer ro nanki.
42010019	Kaku ḇeri yaḇuk kwar faro mko papoik, insa mkaref epen ikakya ma manora ḇeyarek, ma papoik fa mkobuki pyankar samambraḇ ro mbroḇ mkoḇesya, isof nari royo myun mkoḇa beri.
42010020	Rarirya ido, mkoryaḇ awer snar rur ḇemaḇak ansi skunem faro mko, mboi mkoryaḇ snar snonsnon mkoḇena neḇefas epen ro syap ḇero boiyaswaya."
42010021	Rofyor ani kako Yesus iryaḇ rodo Rur Ḇesrenya ma ikofen: "Yakofen kasumasa faro au Mami, Manseren nanki ma supswan, snar wayokef roi nanebur snonkaku ḇefawi ma beswaruser nananem sya, ḇape fasna na faro snon ḇefawi royo ḇaimsya. Mami, roi ḇeradine naiso ḇefrur fa wamarisen na.
42010022	Nakam Mami ḇyuk na kwar faro aya. Snon oseroḇa beri fa ifawi manseiso Rumkunya, demir monda Kmaya. Ma manseiso ḇemambir Kmaya, demir monda Rumkunya. Ma faro snonkaku mansei Rumkunya imarisen fyasna Kmaya farosya."
42010023	Raimnai Yesus iknenef faro manfamyan ḇyesi serer ḇardi ma ikofen: "Aski faro mkamor ḇemam rosai mkomam nane.
42010024	Snar yakofen faro mko: Nabi ma wairek sibor simarisen fa sakmam ma sakmnaf roi mkomam ma mkomnaf nane, ḇape sakmnaf naḇa."
42010025	Rofafisu oso snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi oso iyori fa ikofen faro Yesus ḇo doḇo: "Guru, rosai nari yafrur insa yaksma kankenem ḇemna ḇaya?"
42010026	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rosai sfas ro Refo sasoser Yahudi? Rosai wawasya ro dia?"
42010027	Snon ani kyarem: "Waswar Manseren Allah bedi kuker snembri ḇesiper ma kuker rur bedi ḇesiper ma samambraḇ ma kakara bena kam ḇesiper ma waswar min besi imnis waswar mankundaw." Yesus ikofen faroi:
42010028	"Kankarem bedi kyaku, wafrur rarirya ido, nari wasma kankenemya."
42010029	Ḇape snon ani iḇe ḇyuk kaku ḇe mankundi, inja ikofen faro Yesus: "Rarirya ido min ayesya siso?"
42010030	Yesus kyarem: "Snon oso isya dado ro Yerusalem ḇe Yerikho: Ro nyanya bori, isapi ro manfasyar ono siḇrasna ma sfasyar pres roi ḇeḇor ḇyena, nererḇa ḇoi smuni kako isof iḇe imar, raimnai siburi.
42010031	Rofafisu ani, imam oso imbranuk ro nyan ani; myam snon ani, ḇape iburi.
42010032	Rarirya kuker snon Lewi oso dakbur aryari ro moḇ ani, rofyor myam snon ani.
42010033	Raimnai snon Samaria oso dakmbranuk ro moḇ ani; rofafisu myam snon ani, saswarya dek ro sne ḇyedi.
42010034	Inja isnefer snon ani ma isbawer mani ma anggur ro par ḇyena ma pyarek apepen na. Posa dun snon ani ma ryiri ro keledai mankundi ḇyedi, ma duni ḇe rum seryar roya ma fyadurui.
42010035	Meser ḇyuk dinar risuru faro ḇena rum seryar ro ani ḇo doḇo: 'Fadurui ma mamwarek naḇye i. Kwoḇes rawo nasyadi ro pipi sine ido nari yafadwer si, rofyor yarer wermaya.' "
42010036	Rariso kakara bedi, rofandu snon rikior anskoine manseiso snon sfasyar ani dorḇe min ḇyedi?
42010037	Snon ani kyarem: "Snon ḇefasna saswar faroi." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wabur ma wafrur rarirya kako."
42010038	Fafisu Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi ro marandan sedi, ssuḇer ro mnu oso. Bin ḇenirḇe Marta dorfa Yesus syun ro rum ḇyedi.
42010039	Bin ani ḇeknik ḇyedi snonsnon ḇyedi Maria. Maria kyain fanam Yesus wemin ḇyesuya ma imnaf naḇye farkarkor ḇyena.
42010040	Mboi Marta syombirek kaku kuker afuffarmyanya. Inja fyanam Yesus ma ikofen: "Manseren, ḇefandun ḇake, mboi ḇeknik ayedi myam monda ayaḇo yemir yuffarmyanya? Wawan ima ifnoḇek aya."
42010041	Ḇape Manseren ikofen faroi: "Marta, Marta, wamkak warek ma wafrur kandera ḇinkundaw kuker roi nabor,
42010042	ḇape oser monda iso ḇeḇefandunya: Maria kyinfir kwar rarwas ḇeḇye syadi, isoine roi oso ipok duni buriḇa."
42011001	Rofyor Yesus isya ḇyenadi ro moḇ oso. Fafisu ḇyenadi raimnai, manfamyan ḇyesi oso ikofen faroi: "Manseren, farkor nko ro ḇaḇenadi, imnis raris Yohanes fyarkor manfamyan ḇyesi."
42011002	Yesus kyarem faro si: "Rofyor mkobenadi ido, mkokofen radine: Mami, nko fasren snonsnon bedi kada; Ḇaḇesasoser bedi ryama kada.
42011003	Buk maḇe inko fandun ḇeḇor ḇemnis ro ras-ras
42011004	ma wapyos sasar nkoḇena, snar nko kako nko ḇuk maf faro snonkaku ḇefrur sasar maro nko; ma wun nkoḇe fafrowes na awer."
42011005	Raimnai ikofen faro si: "Rofyor snon oso rofandu mko ryaḇe bati ḇyedi rum ḇyedi ro romfawru ma ikofen faroi: Naeko, yorfa bukma ḇeaya mamami rikior,
42011006	snar bati ayesi oso ro marandan ḇyedi ḇyeryar ro rum ayedi, ḇape yasma roḇeyan kernofa yafasos faroi ḇa;
42011007	yakara ḇoi ḇero rumya nari kyarem faroi: Wakyaren awer aya, kedwaya kyanken kwar ma aya kuker romawa ayesi nkenef kwar; inja nari yakḇok ma yaḇuk roi wor anna faro naek auḇa.
42011008	Yakofen faro mko: Snar bati ḇyedirya inja imewer kaku ikḇok fa ḇyuk faroi roi dor ani, ḇape snar ifawi imaiḇa ḇo dor yayayu ḇesya kwar eḇedari ikḇok ma ḇyuk faroi roi ḇye fandun ani.
42011009	Eḇedari yakofen faro mko: Mkore, nari neḇeḇuk faro mko; mko sewar, snar nari mkosma; mkonuk snar nari kedwaya syeḇen fabe mko.
42011010	Snar mansei ḇeyorya, nari ssḇuk faroi ma mansei ḇesewarya, nari isma ma mansei ḇenuk kedwaya, nari kedwaya syeḇen faroi.
42011011	Kma mansei rofandu mko, rofyor romawa ḇyedi dor in roi ḇesyaḇo, ḇyuk ikak faro romawa ḇyedi fa fyadwer inya?
42011012	Roḇaido, rofyor dor man pnor, nari ḇyuk faroi manora ḇeyarek sayaryurya?
42011013	Inja rofyor ḇeḇarḇor mkoya mkofawi mkoḇuk roi ḇeḇye faro romawa mkoḇesi, rosai wer kuker Kma mkoḇedi ro boiyaswa! Nari ḇyuk Rur Ḇesrenya faro mansei ḇeyor faroiya."
42011014	Ro rarwan oso Yesus iyaw rurḇemak ḇefrur awer ro snon oso. Rofyor rurḇemaḇak ani isasyarbur snon awer ani, dawawos wer. Inja snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sikandor.
42011015	Ḇape rofandu si ono sikofen: "Iyaw rurḇemaḇaksya kuker papoik ro Beelzebul, mananir ro Ibirisya."
42011016	Ono kako sor aḇyair oso ro boiyaswa faro Yesus, fa sifrowespan i.
42011017	Ḇape Yesus ifawi swaruser sena inja ikofen: "Ḇaḇesasoser ḇefarmafmef nari imkok, ma kina ḇefarmafmef, nari imkok.
42011018	Rofyor Ibirisya kako irarwas ma isampum mankundi, rariso ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi nari dores nadworen? Snar mkoḇo, yayaw Ibirisya kuker papoik ro Beelzebul.
42011019	Inja rofyor yayaw Ibirisya kuker papoik Beelzebul, kuker papoik rosaiso ḇesoi mkonsya ssḇuki iyawiya? Snar rarirya siso nari ḇeḇemankara faro mko.
42011020	Ḇape rofyor yayaw Ibirisya kuker papoik Allah, inja kaku ḇeri Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ryama faro mko kwar.
42011021	Rofyor snonkaku ḇesambraḇ oso fyasos fa ḇyuk ḇri warek rum ḇyedi, inja roi ḇeḇor ḇyena kam neḇekadiren.
42011022	Ḇape rofyor snon ḇesambraḇ syadi snon ani, oso ryama doper ma ifrur kafyoi kwar, nari snon ani dun romamun ḇyena buri kwar insape irarwas fasyar ḇyena.
42011023	Mansei ḇefnoḇek ayaḇa, isampum aya ma mansei ḇeryur fnoḇek ayaḇa, snonkaku ani fyasasye."
42011024	"Rofyor rur ḇemaḇakya isasyarbur snonkaku oso, ikada imbran ḇyediwai ro moḇ ḇeḇemarires fa syewar mananai, ḇape snar isma moḇoḇa, inja ikofen: Nari yakaḇer ḇerum yabur kwar ani.
42011025	Inja ryama isma rum ani ḇye ḇeyariref sren ma ḇye ḇefasos naḇye kaku.
42011026	Inja isasyar ma ḇyeḇuk rurḇemaḇak rifik ḇese ḇesawo syadi wer roi, ma ssun fa sikenem ro dia. Rarirya ro ḇarpurya snon ani kankenem ḇyedi iḇyeḇa syadi wer ro kankenem ḇepon ḇyani."
42011027	Fafisu Yesus dawawos kaker, bin oso rofandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi dor ma ikofen faroi: "Aski faro bin ḇeyores au ma ḇesus au."
42011028	Ḇape Yesus ikofen: "Ḇeḇe askiya siso ḇemnaf Allah wos ḇyena ma ḇeḇeuserna."
42011029	Fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi spanjuḇer Yesus, inja ikofen: "Syos ine syos ḇeḇarḇor. Simarisen aḇyair oso, ḇape faro si nari yaḇuk aḇyair osoḇa derer aḇyair nabi Yunus.
42011030	Snar imnis Yunus ḇeḇe aḇyair faro kawasa Niniwe, rarirya kako Rumkun Snonkaku nari ḇyeaḇyair faro syos babo ine.
42011031	Rofyor ḇaḇemankaraya, wairek ḇeraker ḇar wambraw ani nari ikḇawes fnoḇek syos ine ma nari ḇyuk samamyai faro si. Snar wairek ani ryamaker sup pember insa dakrower mamkarkir Salomo, mboi kaku ḇeri oso isya ro dine isyadi ro Salomo.
42011032	Rofyor ḇaḇemankaraya, kawasa Niniwesya nari siḇersi fnoḇek syos ine ma nari ssḇuk samamyai farosi. Snar kawasa Niniwesya simbror rofyor simnaf Yunus ḇaryas ḇyena, mboi kaku ḇeri oso isya ro dine isyadi ro Yunus!"
42011033	"Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ḇepam paramrom raimnai ryiri ro rumbaḇ roḇaido ikawefi kuker badei, mboi ryiri ro adaduya, insa snonkaku ḇesun syakam, smam sananai ḇyedi.
42011034	Mkamor besuya suḇe paramrom faro baken ḇesiper bedi. Rofyor mkamor besuya suḇye, baken ḇesiper bedi isnai, ḇape rofyor mkamor besuya suyas baken bedi pyampan.
42011035	Eḇedari mamepen naḇye insa sasnai ḇero auya pyampan awer.
42011036	Rofyor baken ḇesiper bedi isnai ma moḇo pyampan ḇa, nari baken ḇesiper bedi isnai imnis raris paramromya ḇyeisna au kuker sananai ḇyedi."
42011037	Fafisu Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor raposa, snon Farisi oso dor fa dakanan ro rum ḇyedi. Inja syun ro rum ani ma kyain danan.
42011038	Snon Farisi ani myam rarirya ikandor snar Yesus danan ḇoi ḇyan ḇramin ḇyesuya baim.
42011039	Inja Yesus ikofen faroi: "Snon Farisi mkoya mko fasren sek aninem ma bensya ḇandisi, mboi mkosnemna nafo kuker fasyar ma ḇarḇor.
42011040	Ne, snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa, mkofawi ḇake ḇefrur ḇar ḇandiya, iḇefrur kako ḇar ḇeradoya?
42011041	Ḇape roḇean sek aninem ma bensya siser na buknaḇe farsarser ido kaku ḇeri ḇese nakam nari nasren faro au.
42011042	Ḇape nari mkoroë, ne snon Farisi, snar mkoḇak ḇar ḇeḇesamfurya ro konsop, kandefun ma rofaran ḇese na kam, ḇape mko fandun Allah napnapes ma saswar ḇyediḇa. Mkofrur oser ḇoi ḇesena neḇemamkyof awer.
42011043	Farisi mkoyane, mkoroë, snar mko marisen mko kon ro ḇarpon kaku ro rum ari ma mko marisen mko sma syom ro buḇes.
42011044	Mkoroë, snar mkomnis rus ḇeḇe aḇyairḇa; snonkaku simbran ro bo na ḇoi, sifawi naḇa."
42011045	Rofandu ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ansi oso kyarem ma ikofen faro Yesus: "Guru, wakofen radianya, kworyae inko kako."
42011046	Ḇape kyarem: "Ne, snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi, mko kako mkoroë, snar mkorir kamnam ḇemarḇak faro snonkaku ḇesambraḇ fa ḇeḇar naḇasya, ḇape mankun mko kada mko ḇyunek ro kamnam ani kuker ḇrampin osero ḇaḇeri.
42011047	Mkoroë, snar nabi-nabi mkoḇawes rus ro ansya, kpu mkoḇesi aipyokem smun sirya.
42011048	Kuker fararur ḇerarirya, mkoḇuk kaku, ro fararur ḇeḇyeḇa up mkoḇesi sifrur kwar na, snar smun nabi-nabi ansi kwar ma mkoḇawes rus sena.
42011049	Eḇedari mamkarkir Allahya ikofen: Nari yawan faro si nabi-nabi ma manwawan ayesi ma ono ro nabi-nabi ma manwawan ansi nari sḇeḇemun ma sewayam si.
42011050	Inja ro supswan ine ḇyeḇefrurya rik ḇesbawer ro nabi-nabi ansya kam nari nek ro syos ine mko.
42011051	Randak ro Habil rik ḇyena isof ro Zakharia rik ḇyena smun kwar ro farswaf rokef farsarser ma Allah Rum ḇyedi. Mboi, yakofen faro mko: Sikam nari sḇuksi sisof syos ine mko.
42011052	Mkoroë, ne ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi, snar mkun kwar asyopder ro fawawiya, ma mankun mko kada mkaksunḇa ma snonkaku ḇeḇesewar fa ḇesunsya mkodwarek si."
42011053	Ma rofyor Yesus ibur moḇ ani, ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma Farisisya sḇair pdef ma sifuken ḇesya kwar kuker roi nabor.
42011054	Kuker nyan berarirya sḇesewar insa sisma wos ḇesasar oso roi ḇeḇe knam fa sḇukfori.
42012001	Rofafisu ani snonkaku syaran-syaran spanjuḇer kwar, isof sifyosapepen. Rarirya Yesus ikofen ḇepon faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mkoḇesasor mko ro ragi isoine ḇaḇeankarkar ro kawasa Farisisya.
42012002	Rosai ḇesisenya nari ḇyeḇeḇas ma rosai ḇeyokef nari ḇyeḇefawi.
42012003	Inja rosai mkokofen ro pampan nari neḇemnaf ro isnaya, ma rosai mkofarararum ro simna nari neḇefadwaren."
42012004	Ne, batiyena mko, mkokmkak awer faro ḇemun bakenya, ḇape ḇepok ḇefrur royo ro ḇarpurya werḇa.
42012005	Iḇye yafasna faro mko mansei nari mkomkakya. Mkomkak faro Allah, ḇemun raposa, ḇena papoik fa ḇesawen rofor ḇembrerḇaya. Mkokyare, iso mkomkak faroya!
42012006	Manesu ririm seḇeḇoḇ kuker maeja pipi risuru. Rariryano Allah ḇyefanander osero ḇaḇeri,
42012007	rarirya kako snonburyam ro ḇukor bedi neḇekor kwar. Eḇedari mkomkak awer, snar mkoḇe maeja syadi ro manesusya.
42012008	Mkoswarepen naḇye: Mansei ḇekarem aya roḇarpon snonkaku, Rumkun Snonkakuya nari dakkaremi roḇarpon Allah malaikat ḇyesi kako.
42012009	Ḇape mansei ḇefamyun aya roḇarpon snonkaku, nari Rumkun Snonkaku dakfamyuni roḇarpon Allah malaikat ḇyesi kako.
42012010	Rofyor snonkakuyo isampum Rumkun Snonkakuya, nari isma payasyosro sasar; ḇape mansei ḇeyonef Rur Ḇesrenya, nari isma payasyos ro sasar ḇyenaḇaḇeri.
42012011	Rofyor sun mko faro kankain karkara jemaat roḇa faro ḇesasoser ma ḇena papoiksya, mkomkak awer rosai nari mkokofen fa mkoḇesano warek mko.
42012012	Snar rofafisu ani beri Rur Ḇesren fyarkor mko ro rosai nari mkawosna.
42012013	Snon oso ro snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Guru, wakofen faro naek ayedi insa irwas pusaka mami imarbur na fa namamnis."
42012014	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faroi: "Naeko, mansei ḇekanow aya fa yaḇe mankara roḇa manfandu faromu?"
42012015	Ikofen wer farosi: "Mkowaren ma mkosasor mko ro mnuk rmomenya, snar snonkaku oso nana ḇyena nabor rariso wer kankenem ḇyedi ḇyeknam ro nana ḇyenaḇa."
42012016	Posa kwar ikofen farosi sarḇer oso: "Snon ḇenana oso isya saprop ḇyena nbuk an ḇeḇor kaku.
42012017	Inja kyara ro sneḇyedi, ḇo doḇo: 'Rosai nari yafrurya, snar yasma moḇ fa yabuki ikram an ḇeḇor ayenaneḇa.'
42012018	Raimnai kyara romankundi, ḇo doḇo: 'Iḇye yafrur radine; nari yakakok sayar ayena ma yaḇawes ḇeba syadi wer fa yaḇuki ikram an ma roi ḇeḇor ayena.'
42012019	Raimnai nari yakofen faro rur ayedi: 'Rur yedi au, roi ḇeḇor nakam namawes kwar ma nari naḇroḇa ḇewampasi wambarek nabor; wamnaisu au, wan winem ma wamarisen!'
42012020	Ḇape Allah ikofen faroi: Ne, snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa, ro roḇ ineḇeri rur bedi nari ḇyeḇeyun bur aw, ma rosai fasos kwar na, mansei nkain faroya?
42012021	Rarirya kuker snonkaku ḇeryur nana faro mankundi, mboi syewar fa dakna nana ro Allah mamam byenaba."
42012022	Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Eḇedari yakofen faro mko, 'Mkoḇeḇirḇar awer snar kankenem mkoḇena, rosai nari mkanya, ma ro baken mkoḇena, rosai nari mkofmarya.'
42012023	Snar kankenemya ḇyemaeja syadi ro roḇean ma bakenya ḇyemaeja syadi ro famamarya.
42012024	Mkomamepen ro manwawa ḇeyakkakerḇa ma ḇerabarḇa ma sakna kron roḇa sayarḇa, rariryano Allah fyansi kuker roḇean. Rosai wer kuker mko snonkaku ḇesyadibur man ansi!
42012025	Mansei rofandu mko snar ḇirḇar ḇyena, inja pyam pinkyur oser ro kankenem ḇyedi?
42012026	Inja, rofyor mkosambraḇ fa mkofrur roi kasun osoḇa, rosai ḇeḇewar mkoḇeḇirḇar ro roi ḇeḇor ḇese?
42012027	Mkomamepen ro mampyoper ḇefawi ḇerorenḇa ma ḇeyanyanemḇa, ḇape yakofen faro mko: Wairek Salomo kuker kamayai ḇeḇor ḇyenakam, ḇape syansun sansun ḇepyum rariso wer namnis kuker payamyum pampen mampyoper aniḇa.
42012028	Inja, aḇris ḇesur ro ras ine raimnai meser sisawen ro forya Allah fyamankorsi, rosai wer kuker mko snonkaku ḇekyar mnisḇa!
42012029	Inja, mkowos awer rosai nari mkan roḇa rosai nari mkinem, ma mkoḇeḇirḇar awer.
42012030	Snar nanekam er-er ro supswan ine ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇasya siso ḇesewar na. Ḇape kma mkoḇedi ifawi fandun mkoḇenakam.
42012031	Ḇape mkosewar ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi resari insape nari ḇyukna faro mko kako.
42012032	Ne, naek ḇeborḇa mko, mkomkak awer! Snar Kma mkoḇedi imarisen ḇyuk faro mko ḇaḇesasoser ani.
42012033	Mkobob nana mkoḇenakam fa mkobuk farsarser! Mko sip faro mko mansrip ḇedauḇa, isoine nana oso ro boiyaswa nari ḇeḇroba, ma ḇekarawsya nari skarawḇa ma as sya nari san naḇa.
42012034	Snar romoḇ nana bena naisya, rodia kako snebedi isya."
42012035	"Iḇyekada mkofasos mkoḇoḇek sifer mkoḇena ḇesya kwar ma paramrom mkoḇena kako nasnai ḇesya kwar.
42012036	Ma iḇyekada mkomnis snonkaku ḇewaf tuan sedi ḇeburker ḇaḇefakawawin, insa ryama nyuk kedwaya fasaw kedwaya ḇyeḇeseḇen faroi.
42012037	Aski faro manfamyan ḇewaren isof tuan ḇyedi ryama. Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nari ḇyoḇek sifer ḇyedi ma nari dor si fa skain sanan ma mankundi ryama duffarmyansi.
42012038	Ma rofyor ryama ro roḇya faduri roḇa ikamadui meser ma isrow sifrur rarirya aski farosi.
42012039	Ḇape insa mkofawi: Rofyor tuan ḇena rumya ifawi oras rosai ḇekarawya ryama nari myam monda rum ḇyediḇo skakokiḇa.
42012040	Iḇye mkokako mkepen mkokada ma mkofasos snar Rumkun Snonkakuya nari ryama rofafisu mkofawiḇa."
42012041	Petrus ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Manseren inkoiso swarḇer ḇaryar inkoyake roḇaḇo wakofen faro snonkakusya kamke?"
42012042	Manseren kyarem: "Inja, manfamyan mansei ḇeḇeaunos ma ḇefawinananem nari tuan ḇyedi ikanowi fa ḇyemananir faro manfamyan ḇyesikam fa ḇeḇuk roḇean farosi ro fafisuya?
42012043	Aski faro manfamyan ani rofyor tuan ḇyedi ryama ma isrow isya ro fararur ḇyena.
42012044	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri nari tuan ḇyedi ikanowi fa myamwarek nana ḇyenakam.
42012045	Ḇape rofyor manfamyan ani iḇarḇor ma ikofen: Tuan ayedi nari isamberen mumaḇa, inja iprer manfamyan snon ma bin, ma dan dinem isof imser.
42012046	Ḇape manfamyan ani tuan ḇyedi nari ryama ro ras manfamyan ani ifawiḇa ma nari myuni ma ifrur faroi imnis raris snonkaku ḇeḇeawnosḇasya.
42012047	Mboi manfamyan ḇefawi tuan ḇyedi marisen ḇyedi ḇape ḇefasosḇa roḇa ḇeḇeuser tuan ḇyedi marisen ḇyediḇa, nari isma aprer nabor.
42012048	Ḇape mansei ḇefawi marisen tuan ḇyediḇa ma ifrur roi ḇesasar ḇefnai ayos, nari isma ayos ḇemanan. Snonkaku mansei, ssḇuk nabor faroya nari sor nabor syadi roi, ma faro mansei sikyar nabor faroya, nari sor nabor syadi wer roi."
42012049	"Yarama insa yaso for ḇe supswan ine ma yakyar kako for ani isak kwar!
42012050	Nari yasma kandera ḇefnakḇa ma sne yedi ḇyefesfyas, rofyor roi ḇeḇesya ani ryama ḇaim!
42012051	Mkokara ḇo mkoḇo, mboi yarama yun aski faro supswan ine? Roḇa, yakofen kaku ḇeri faro mko yun askiḇa mboi famfaḇri.
42012052	Snar randak ro ras ine famfaḇri naisya fandu snonkaku ririm ro rum oso, kyor skosampum kuker suru ma suru susampum kuker kior.
42012053	Kmaya isampum romawaya ma romawaya isampum sinan ḇyedi, snaya isampum inai ḇyedi, ma inai isampum snari, imbanyoya isampum imbikin ḇyedi ma imbikin ḇyedi isampum imbanyoya."
42012054	Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi wer: "Rofyor mkomam mandepna nker ro ḇar wambarek ido mkokofen, ḇo mkoḇo: Nari mekemya imyun ma imyun rarirya.
42012055	Ma rofyor wambrawya iso, mkokofen ḇo mkoḇo: Rasya nari isam, ma isam kaku rarirya.
42012056	Ne, snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, rosai mkomam ro supswan ine ma nankiya mkofawi mkokara ḇaḇir na, rosai eḇedari mkokara ḇaḇir awar ineba?
42012057	Ma snaro mko kako mkawos namuk ro mankun mko ro rosai ḇenapes naḇa?
42012058	Snar, rofyor mko kuker mbroḇ mko ḇesi mkora ḇeḇarpon ḇesasosersya ḇaim mkoḇesewar fa mkoḇedasi kuker si rofafisu mkoisya ro nyandibo, insa dun awer aw ḇeḇarpon mankaraya ma mankaraya dakḇuk aw faro ḇefnoḇeki ma ḇefnoḇekisya sisawen au ro bui.
42012059	Yakofen faro mko: Mkopok mkosasyar ro diwaḇa, isof mkoḇak pres njaki mkoḇena resari."
42013001	Rofyor snonkaku ono sfar faro Yesus ro snon Galilea, Pilatus myunsya rik sena fyawawas na kuker rik farsarser ssḇuki fyarser na.
42013002	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Inja mkoḇo snon Galilea ḇemar sine sasar sena naba syadi snonkaku Galilea ḇesesya kamke, snar sisma roi ḇeradine na?
42013003	Roḇa! yakofen faro mko. Ḇape rofyor mkombrorḇa, nari mkokam mkoro kuker nyan ḇerarirya.
42013004	Roḇaido mkoḇo snonkaku samfur seser riwar kaderen syosya imbriwer fa myunbos ro Siloam ansi, sasar sena naba syadi ro sasar snonkaku ḇena mnu ro Yerusalem?
42013005	Yakofen faro mko. Roḇa! Ḇape rofyor mkombrorḇa, mkokam nari mkoro kuker nyan berarirya."
42013006	Raimnai Yesus ikofen sarḇer ine: "Snonkaku oso nya ara knam oser ro yaf anggur ḇyedi, ma rya syewar bon ro ara knam ani, ḇape isma bono ḇaḇeri.
42013007	Inja ikofen faro ḇefararur ro yaf anggur ani: Wampasi wambarek rikior kwar yarama yasewar bon ro ara knam ine ḇape yasma bonoḇa. Iḇye rwoḇen ara knam ani! Isur farfyos monda sapropya!
42013008	Snon ani kyarem: Tuan, yor fa kyain ro wampasi wambarek ine wer ari, nari yasofer saprop ro fuarya ma yarir fafen roi,
42013009	imbude wampasi wambarek iyama imaremri; mboi roḇaido, insape ḇyeḇeroḇen!"
42013010	Rofyor Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum ari oso ro ras Mananai Yahudi.
42013011	Rodia bin oso isya rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇeri ḇewampasi wambarek samfur seser riwar kwar isof iduf rao dokor ḇyedi iyar ḇo dores aḇyoḇer werḇa.
42013012	Fafisu Yesus myam bin ani, dori ma ikofen: "Ne awine waprei ro dafduf ḇedi."
42013013	Raimnai pyan ro bin ani ḇukor ḇyedi ma fafisu ani beri bin ani dores aḇyobber, ma isandik Allah.
42013014	Ḇape mananir rum ari imsor snar Yesus ḇyuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇeduf ro ras Mananai Yahudi, ma ikofen faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi ḇo doḇo: "Ras riwonem naisya faro kofararur. Inja mkorama mkosewar pararei ro ras anna oso, mboi ro ras arina awer."
42013015	Ḇape Yesus kyarem faroi ma ikofen: "Ne, snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor mkofawiḇake rofandu mko ono sisasyar sapi ma keledai sesi ro padwar sena ro ras Mananai Yahudi ma sunsi ḇemoḇ saninem war roya?
42013016	Mboi bin ine ibirisya pyarari ḇewampasi wambarek samfur seser riwar kwar ine, Abraham kpu ḇyedirya inja koperi ro ras Mananai Yahudi ḇake?"
42013017	Ma fyor ikofen rarirya, mbroḇ ḇyesikam simai ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi simarisen snar smam roi ḇeba ifrur nane.
42013018	Raimnai Yesus ikofen: "Rosai yaḇuki syarḇer Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ma kuker rosai nari yaḇuki imnisya?
42013019	Imnis sesawi mor snon oso dun ma ḇyuḇer ro yaf ḇyedi; mor ani isur ma ḇyebaken ma man ro farsyos sifrur narem ro snaw ḇyena."
42013020	Ma ikofen wer: "Kuker rosai yaḇuki syarḇer Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi?
42013021	Imnis mur bin oso dun fa ḇyuki irḇaren kuker terigu amek rikior isof namnir kam."
42013022	Rofyor oso Yesus imbran ḇe Yerusalem, dunuk ro mnu ḇe mnu ḇo ḇyuk farkarkor.
42013023	Ma snonkaku oso ikofen faroi: "Manseren, snonkaku ḇesma korerisya sibor ḇake?"
42013024	Yesus kyarem faro kawasa ansi: "Mkobesewar fa mkosun ro kedwai ḇefyosya! Snar yakofen faro mko: Snonkaku sibor sesewar fa siḇe ssun fama sismaḇa.
42013025	Rofyor tuan ḇena rumya ikḇok ma kyen kedwaiya nari mkores ro ḇondi ma mkonuk kedwaiya ḇo mko kofen: Tuan, sweḇen kedwaiya maḇe inko! Ma nari kyarem ma ikofen faro mko: Yafawi moḇ mkoramuma royaḇa.
42013026	Ma nari mko kofen: Nkoiso ḇeyan ma ḇeyinem kwar ro ḇarpon ḇedi ma aw ḇeḇuk farkarkor kwar ro nyan-nyan ro mnu nkoḇedi.
42013027	Ḇape nari ikofen faro mko: Yafawi moḇ rosai mkoramuma royaḇa, mkobur ḇarpon ayedi mko snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor!
42013028	Rodiwa nari mkosma kankanes ma arkfafais nakor, rofyor nari mkomam Abraham ma Isak ma Yakub ma nabisyakam ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, ḇape mko ḇardi sisawen mko bebandi.
42013029	Ma nari snonkaku srama ker Wamurem, Wambarek, Wambrur ma Wambraw ma nari skain sanan ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
42013030	Ma kaku ḇeri snonkaku ḇepursya nari spon, ma snonkaku ḇeponsya nari spur."
42013031	Rofyor ani snon farisi ono sramura faro Yesus ma sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Snar Herodes iḇe myun aw inja rwa wabur moḇ ine."
42013032	Yesus kyarem: "Mkora mko kofen faro makei sup ani: Yayaw setan, ma yaḇuk pararei faro snonkaku ro ras ine ma meser, ma ro ras ḇeḇekior nari yamnai ro fararur ayena.
42013033	Ḇape ras ine ma meser yawer yambran pdef mararan ayedi, snar nabi oso nari ḇyeḇemun ro Yerusalem ḇandiriḇa.
42013034	Yerusalem, Yerusalem aw ḇemun nabi-nabisya ma manwawan Allah iwansya swosi kuker karui! Rarwan ono yaswarkuf fa yaryur romawa mkoḇesi, imnis mankoko sinan ḇeryur mkun ḇyesi ro prer ḇyedi baḇsi, ḇape mkomewer.
42013035	Kaku ḇeri rum bedi nari ḇyeḇebur ma ḇyeursḇa. Ḇape yakofen faro mko: Nari mkomam aya werḇa isof rofafisu mkokofen: Bok faroi ḇerama kuker snonsnon Manseren!"
42014001	Ro ras Mananai Yahudi oso, Yesus rya fa dakanan ro rum manfarkin kawasa Farisi oso rodia. Inja snonkaku ḇerama rodiasyakam smamepen kaku Yesus.
42014002	Kniko snon ḇeduf dafduf ḇefo oso ryama dores ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
42014003	Riamnai Yesus ikofen faro snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi ansi: "Ro ras Mananai Yahudi, fandun fa koḇuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇedufsyake, roḇa?"
42014004	Sikam sefasis. Raimnai iserepen snon ḇeduf ani ḇramin ḇyedi, ma ḇyuk pararei faroi ma iwani fa ibur.
42014005	Posa ikofen farosi: "Mansei rofandu mko, ḇena romawa, roḇa sapiyo fa isapi ro war ḇeyer oso ro ras Mananai Yahudi, ma nari isasyari ḇaḇeri ro ras ani?"
42014006	Ḇape snonkaku osero isampum ḇaḇeri.
42014007	Snar Yesus myam snonkaku dakam ansi skinfir moḇ ḇepyum syadi, inja ikofen wos sarḇer ine farosi:
42014008	"Rofyor snonkaku oso pyos mko fa mkan munara fakawawin, mkokain awer ro mob ḇekaki, snar imbude snon ani dor snonkaku ḇeba syadi onori,
42014009	nari snon ḇeyor mko ani ryama ikofen faro mko: Mkoḇuk moḇ ine faro snon iwa. Nari kuker mamyai, mkora mkokain ro moḇ ḇekakiḇa syadi.
42014010	Ḇape rofyor sor mko, mkora mkokain ro ḇarpur kaku. Insa tuan ḇena rumya ryamaido ikofen faro mko: Bati, yor kuker syowi, insa rwamura kwain ro ḇarpon kaku iwa. Rariryaido, nari wasma ḇaḇesyowi ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor sor ansi.
42014011	Snar mansei ḇeyow mankundi ido, nari ḇyeḇerun, ma mansei ḇerun mankundi ido, nari ḇyeḇekanow fa ikaki."
42014012	Ma Yesus ikofen faro snon ḇeposi ani kako: "Rofyor wafrur munara ro isnake roḇke, pos awer bati ḇesi roḇa naek srar besi roḇa kina ḇesi roḇa min ḇefanam aw ma ḇenanasya, snar nari smunsu na faro aw, rofyor sakor aw wer.
42014013	Ḇape rofyor wafrur munara ido, pos snonkaku ḇesaḇarar, ma ḇeḇeroro, ḇepapipen ma snonkaku ḇeprafsya.
42014014	Nari wasma aski, snar snonkaku ansya sisma roi ono fa sḇukḇak frurpyum benaḇa. Snar nari wasma sasuref, ro ras aḇiḇer snonkaku ḇenapessya."
42014015	Simnaf Yesus wos ḇyena, snonkaku oso rofandu ḇenan ansya ikofen faro Yesus: "Aski faro mansei ḇeyananso Allah, rofyor Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ryamaya."
42014016	Ḇape Yesus ikofen faro snon ani: "Snonkaku oso isya ifrur munara ḇeba, ma pyos snonkaku sibor kaku.
42014017	Rofyor anan munara ani siḇe sraki, iwan manfamyan ḇyesi fa sikofen ḇadir faro snonkaku pyos ansi: 'Mkoramuma, snar roi ḇeḇor nakam nfasos kwar.'
42014018	Ḇape sikam sun sano wareksi. Ḇeponya ikofen: 'Yor maf snar insape yakoḇes babo saprop mnuk oso, ma yaḇe yara fa yamami.'
42014019	Suminya dakkofen: 'Yor maf snar insape yakoḇes sapi mandu ririm ma skarsi kwar, inja yaḇe yara yamnasenpan si.'
42014020	Minya wer kako ikofen: 'Yor maf, snar insape yafakawin baḇo inja nari yarafa ḇa.'
42014021	Inja manfamyan ani kyaḇer ma ḇyuk nakam faro tuan ḇyani. Rarirya tuan ḇena rumya imsor ma ikofen: 'Mkora fasaw ḇe sampak ma rumbines swaf na ma mkun snonkaku ḇesaḇarar ma ḇeḇeroro ma ḇeprafsya, ma snonkaku ḇepapipensya.
42014022	Posa manfamyan ansi sikofen ḇadir faroi: Tuan, rosai swoser kwar ani, nkofruri kwar. Ḇape rariryano moḇ naisya kaker.
42014023	Raimnai tuan ani ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: Mkoramura ḇe sampak ma nyan dayuk, ma mkoḇedifer snonkaku ḇero diansya fa saksun, snar yamarisen rum ayedi ifo.
42014024	Snar yakofen faro mko: Osoḇaḇeri rofandu snonkaku yapos kwar ansi, nari sakkain ro munara ayedi.' "
42014025	Rofyor ani kawasa sibor semarani ma siso Yesus ro marandan ḇyedi. Yesus isiḇer ma ikofen farosi:
42014026	"Snonkaku oso iḇe iso aya ido, dayin kmari, snari, swari ma romawa ḇyesi, naek ma srar ḇyesi, ma kenem ḇyedi kako, insape nari ḇyemanfamyan maro aya.
42014027	Mansei ḇeḇar aprop ḇyedi ḇo iso ayaḇa, nari ḇyemanfamyan maro ayaḇa.
42014028	Snar rofandu mko oso iḇe ifrur kaderen ḇeḇesyos ido, nari dawof fasasos kumpan ḇefrur ḇaḇawes ani fa namniske, namnisḇaim?
42014029	Snar ryir ararefya raimnai ifrur fararur ani fa iḇroḇa ido snonkaku ḇemam fararur ani, nari skoryayei,
42014030	ma sikofen: Snonkaku ani ryak ḇaḇawes ani raimnai, syambraḇ fa ifrur posa iḇa.
42014031	Roḇa, wairek oso nya sordade syaran samfur ma iḇe ḇyembroḇ wairek ḇese ḇena sordade syaran samfur risuru ido, nari kyain fa kyara ḇepon resari ro samambraḇ ḇyedi, rofyor myamun kuker mbroḇ ḇyedi ḇaim?
42014032	Inja ifawi syambraḇ ḇarya, iwan wawan ono fa sor dasi, rofyor mbroḇ ḇyedi ḇyinkwan kaker.
42014033	Rarirya kako kuker snonkaku oser-oser rofandu mko, ḇemewer ḇerir roi ḇeḇor ḇyenandi, nari ḇye manfyan maro ayaḇa.
42014034	Karumasenya iḇye, ḇape karumasen ani ḇyuar ido, nari rosai koḇukfruri fa myasmasen werya?
42014035	Nari sefanduni faro yaf werḇa, ma snai ḇe pupuk werḇa, mboi sisawen waworek monda si. Mkoḇe knaram ido mkorower!"
42015001	Ro ras oso, snon ḇeyor som ma snonkaku ḇesasar sibor kaku sra fa sakmnaf Yesus.
42015002	Inja snon Farisi ma snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi sikofen: "Inja snonkaku ḇesasarsya nyasi ma danan fnoḇeksi."
42015003	Rarirya Yesus ikofen sarḇer ine farosi:
42015004	"Mansei rofandu mko, ḇesma domba utin oser, ma oso rofandu domba ansi iḇor ido, rosai nari ifrurya? Nari ryir domba samfur risiw seser risiw ansi ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa, ma rya fa syewar domba ḇeḇor ani isof isrowi?
42015005	Ma rofyor isrowi kwar, dowi ma ikamari kuker raryaḇ;
42015006	ma rofyor rya ro rum kwar, dor maniḇoḇ ḇyesi ma snonkaku ḇefanami sya, ma ikofen farosi, 'Mko marisen fnoḇek aya, snar domba ḇeḇor ayedi yasrowi kwar!'
42015007	Yakofen faro mko: Rarirya kako nari raryaḇ syadi ro boiyaswa, snar snonkaku ḇesasar oser imbror, isyadi wer ro raryaḇ snar snonkaku samfur risiw seser risiw ḇenapes, ḇeḇefandun marandor ḇa."
42015008	"Roḇa bin mansei ḇena kumpan sarak samfur, ma rofyor oso ryo, rosai nari ifrurya? Nari pyam padamara ma syewar kuker aunos isof isrowi.
42015009	Ma rofyor isrowi kwar, dor bati ḇyesi ma snonkaku ḇefanam rum ḇyedi ma ikofen farosi, 'Mkomarisen fnoḇek aya, snar kumpan ḇero ayani yasmai kwar.'
42015010	Yakofen faro mko: Rarirya kako nari raryaḇ isyadi fandu Allah malaikat ḇyesi, snar snonkaku ḇesasar oso imbror."
42015011	Yesus ikofen wer: "Snon oso nya romawa risuru.
42015012	Ḇedarya ikofen faro kmari: 'Mami, bukma ḇe aya rarwas ro nana koḇena ayena maḇe aya.' Inja kmari irarwas nana anna rofandu sko.
42015013	Ḇarpurya ro ras riḇeso romawa ḇedar ani ḇyoḇ rarwas ḇyan nakam, raimnai ryaḇe sup ḇeḇinkwan. Rodiwa ḇyoḇ farfnak nana ḇyena kuker kankenem ḇeḇe fromo monda.
42015014	Rofyor nana ḇyena naḇro kwar, basbiser ḇebaya myun mnu ani ma ikako syaḇarar.
42015015	Inja rya fa ifararur faro tuan oso ro mnu ani. Snon ani iwani ḇe yaf ḇyedi fa iwaren randip ḇyesi.
42015016	Ma imarisen iser snewar ḇyedi kuker roḇean randip anna, ḇape snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri fa ḇyuk roi oso faroi.
42015017	Insape iwasen ma ifawi kankenem ḇyedi, ma ikofen: 'Snonkaku ḇefararur faro kamami san kamayai, ḇape aya rodine, yaḇe yamar kuker basbiser.
42015018	Nari yayor aya ma yabur ḇe kamami ma yakofen faroi: Mami, yaḇesasar faro Allah ma faro mami,
42015019	inja wor awer aya ḇe romawa bedi mboi wafrur aya imnis snonkaku ḇeyan sasuref faro mami.'
42015020	Rarirya iyori ma ibur faro kmari. Fafisu ḇyinkwan kaker, kmari myam ḇeponi kwar ma saswarya dek ro sne ḇyedi. Inja kmari ifrar ma dawer epeni ma isyumi.
42015021	Ḇape romawa ani ikofen faro kmari: Mami yaḇesasar faro Allah ma faro mami. Inja yasyus fa wor aya ḇe romawa bediḇa.
42015022	Ḇape kmari ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: 'Mkun fasaw syatu ḇepyum kakuyo ma mkoḇe fa syansun ma mkopanai kawin oso ro ḇrampin ḇyedi, ma mkoḇuk roi ḇesower ro wemin ḇyesuya.
42015023	Ma mkun sapi kuḇ ḇeḇebaken ani, ma mkomuni raimnai mkorama kan komarisen.
42015024	Snar romawa ayedi imar ḇape ikenem kaḇer, iḇor kwar ḇape kosmai wer.' Rarirya sirandak marisen ani kuker raryaḇ.
42015025	Ḇape romawa rakya isya ro yaf, ma rofyor ibur fa fyanam rumya, imnaf rakrok sonker, doya mas-mas ma fayaryer anna.
42015026	Inja dor manfyan oso ma ifuken faroi: 'Rosai eḇesya ro rumya?'
42015027	Manfyan ani ikofen: 'Ḇedar bani kyaḇer kwar ma kmami myun sapi kuḇ ḇeḇebaken ani, snar isma kaḇer romawa ḇyedi kuker ḇaḇye.'
42015028	Rarirya romawa rak ani imsor ma imewer daksunri. Inja kmari isasyar fa dakawos sneprei.
42015029	Ḇape kyarem faro kmari ma ikofen: Wampasi wambarek nabor kaku, yuffarmyan mami, ma yaḇeyuk sasoser bena oso ḇaim, ḇape wakḇuk nek-nek mkun oso fa yaḇuki dakmarisen kuker maniḇoḇ ayesiḇa.
42015030	Insape romawa ḇefnak mami nana bena faro bin ḇesasar ine ryama, kwaruk sapi kuḇ ḇeḇebaken ani faroi.
42015031	Ḇape kmari ikofen faroi: Romawa yedi, awma ras nakam awsya kuker aya ḇesya kwar, ma roi ḇeḇor ayena, roi ḇeḇor ḇenairya.
42015032	Iḇyekada rwama komarisen ma koryaḇ, snar ḇedar bani imar kwar ḇape ikenem kaber, ibor kwar fama kosma kaḇeri wer."
42016001	Yesus ikofen kako faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Snon ḇenana oso isya nya snon ḇekram kumpan oso. Snon ḇenana ani imnaf manwarwaren ḇyani ḇyoḇ afafer nana ḇyena.
42016002	Inja dor manwarwaren ani ma ifuken: Kaku ro roi yamnaf ro aw na? Buk kankarem ḇenapes ro fararur bedi, snar nari wafararur ro fararur ani werḇa.
42016003	Manwarwaren ani kyara fasis ḇo doḇo: Rosai nari yafrurya? Tuan ayedi ḇyuk fa yamnai ro fararur manwarwarenya. Fama nari yaḇekir fa yuf adafyaḇa, ma yafararyor yan nari yamai.
42016004	Yafawi rosai nari yafrurya, insa rofyor yamnai ro fararur manwarwarenya, yasma snonkaku ono fa yaḇeryarus ro rum sena.
42016005	Raimnai dor snonkaku ḇeḇe nyaki kwar faro tuan ḇyedi, oser ḇe oser, ma ikofen faro ḇeponya: Nyaki ḇena faro tuan ayedi ḇeso irya."
42016006	Snon ani kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Mani fyom utin oser. Raimnai ikofen faro snon ani: Syap nyaki bedi isoine, kwain ma wafrur syap nyaki oso ḇese, ro knikine beri: Fas fyom samfur ririm.
42016007	Posa ikofen faro ḇeḇesuruya: Awkako, wasma nyaki riḇeso? Snon ani kyarem: Gandum kadu utin oser. Ikofen faro snon ani: Syap nyaki ḇedi isoine, wafrur syap nyaki oso ḇese; fas ḇayir kadu samfur riwar.
42016008	Inja tuan ani isandik manwarwaren ḇeḇye ba ani, snar ḇyerarirya kuker kakara ḇeḇye. Snar romawa supswan senaḇye faro min sesi, ro romawa isnasya.
42016009	Ma yakofen faro mko: Mkoseref ḇaḇebati kuker arasai ḇeḇyeḇa na, insa rofyor arasai anna nafnoḇek mkoḇa kwar ido, mkoiso ḇesma mob ro rum ḇekain fyoroya."
42016010	"Mansei ḇenapes ro roi kasun na, nari inapes kako ro roi ḇeba na. Mboi mansei ḇenapesḇa ro roi kasun na, nari inapesḇa kako ro roi ḇeba na.
42016011	Inja, mkonapes faro arasai ḇeḇyeḇa na, mansei nari ḇekyar mko ro nana ḇekakuna?
42016012	Ma mkonapes faro snon ono ḇese nana senaḇa, mansei nari ḇeḇuk nana mkoḇena faro mko?
42016013	Manfamyan oso duffarmyan faro tuan risuruḇa. Snar rofyor rarirya ido, nari dayin oso ma iswar ḇeseya, roḇa nari ḇyeuser faro oso ma fyandun ḇeseyaḇa. Mko fararur faro Allah ma faro arasai awer."
42016014	Farisisya simnaf wos anna kam ma simbrifi snar sikada sewomen faro pipiya.
42016015	Raimnai Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkoḇuk kaku ro mankun mko, ro ḇarpon snonkaku, ḇape Allah ifawi sne mkoḇena. Snar roi snonkaku semanmin na, Allah dayin na.
42016016	Sasoser ro Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi-nabi sena nambran isof fafisu Yohanes; ma rofyor ani Ankankinem Ḇeḇye Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ḇyeḇeḇaryas, ma snonkaku oser-oser sfamfaḇri fa siḇe saksun roi.
42016017	Snar nanki ma sup na nari napromes, ḇape kakop oso ro Refo Yahudi nari ryoḇa.
42016018	Snonkaku oso fyaspar swari, raimnai fyakawin oso ḇese, ifrur farbuk; ma mansei bebekawin bin ani ifrur farbuk kako."
42016019	"Snon ḇenana oso syansun mararesi kuker syatu ḇeyafuk kaku ma ras nakam ikenem kuker kamayai.
42016020	Ma snon ḇesaḇarar oso isya snonsnon ḇyedi Lazarus; baken ḇyedi ifo kuker armaker, ma ḇyarek ro kedwai snon ḇenana ani ḇyedi,
42016021	ma imarisen iser snewar ḇyedi kuker roḇean mir-mir ḇesapi ro meja snon ḇenana ani. Isyadi wer naf ḇyesi srama sreḇ par ma armaker ḇyesi.
42016022	Fyoroḇa snon ḇesaḇarar ani ipsur, ma malaikatsya suni ma sriri ro Abraham wesop ḇyesuya.
42016023	Snon ḇenana anya kako dakpsur, ma seraki ma rofafisu isma kandera ro mun aibui myam ḇinkwan raryas ro Abraham ifran Lazarus.
42016024	Inja kyaru muryas ma ikofen: 'Mami Abraham, waswar aya; wawan Lazarus, syowen ḇrampin ḇyesi ro war kenoma ipnunek ramar yedine, snar yaḇekandera mankenem ro for ine saksak ḇyedi.'
42016025	Ḇape Abraham ikofen: 'Rumkun yedi, waswarepen, awma wasma ḇaḇye bena kwar rofyor wakenemya. Mboi Lazarus isma kandera ḇefnakḇa. Baboine isma sneprei ma waksma kandera ḇefnakḇa.
42016026	Oso wer ido, rofandu inko ma aw, ḇron ḇeba oso isya pyandwas ko, inja mansei ḇero dine ryaḇe ḇar iyafaḇa, ma mansei ḇero dia, dunuk mumaḇa.'
42016027	Ḇape snon ḇenana ani ikofen: 'Rarirya ido yor faro aw, mami, insa wawan Lazarus ḇe rum kamam ḇyedi,
42016028	snar yana ḇedar ririm, insa ḇyuk swarepen kaku farosi, insa ssun awer beri ḇe moḇ ḇeḇekandera ine.'
42016029	Ḇape Abraham ikofen: 'Syap Moses ma syap nabi-nabisya sisma na kwar. Iḇye simnaf ḇaḇesaksi anna.'
42016030	Ḇape snon ḇenana ani kyarem: 'Roḇa, mami Abraham, snar oso rofandu ḇemarsya kyaḇer farosi, nari simbror.'
42016031	Abraham ikofen faroi: 'Rofyor simnaf Moses ma nabi-nabisya wos senaḇa, nari simnaf snonkaku ḇemar ma beyiber rofandu ḇemarsya wos senaba kako.' "
42017001	Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Farkarkor ninyan naisya, ḇape kandera faro snonkaku ḇefrur rariryasya.
42017002	Iḇye syadi snonkaku ḇerariryasya kofes karui ḇeyas-yas ro sisasusna, ma komsawer si ro soren, imbude sfarkor ninyan ono rofandu snonkaku ḇepokḇa sinendi.
42017003	Mkosasor mankun mko! Rofyor naek bedi ḇyesasar, wasoneki ma rofyor imbror kwar, buk maf faroi.
42017004	Mboi rofyor ḇyesasar ḇe rarwan rifik ro ras oser faro aw ma rarwan rifik kyaḇer faro aw ma ikofen: Yambror kwar, rarirya buk ampun faroi."
42017005	Inja wawan ansi sikofen faro Manseren: "Manseren, buk sambraḇ maḇe nko ro kakyarya!"
42017006	Manseren kyarem: "Rofyor mkona kakyar iba imnis sesawi mor, nari mkokofen faro ara knam ine: Kwapas ma wasur ro soren, ma nari byeyuser sasoser mkoḇena."
42017007	"Mansei rofandu mko, ḇena manfamyan oso fa kyaker, roḇa ḇyemanfarandows rofanfan, nari ikofen faroi, rofyor manfamyan ḇyani ibur ker yaf ḇyedi: Rwama fasaw fa wanan!
42017008	Nari roḇa! Imboi nari ikofen faro manfamyan ani: Fes sifer ḇedi ma wuf faryan aya, isof yanan ma yinem ḇepon resari. Posa kwar insape wakanan ma wakinem.
42017009	Nari ikofen kasumasake faro manfyan ani snar ḇyeyuser roi ḇeḇor ḇyuk fa ifrur kwar anna?
42017010	Rarirya kako mko. Rofyor mkofrur roi ḇeḇor sefa mkofrur anna kam kwar, iḇye mkokofen: Nko ine manfyan ḇeḇe faindaba; ma nkofrur monda rosai nari nkofrur na."
42017011	Ro Yesus mararan ḇyedi ḇe Yerusalem, imbrasye yawek ḇeyawas Samaria ma Galilea.
42017012	Fafisu syun ro mnu oso, snon pado samfur srama sisrowi. Sores ḇinkwan
42017013	ma siyiw: "Yesus, Guru, waswar inko!"
42017014	Rofyor Yesus myamsi, ma ikofen: "Mkora mkofasna mko faro imam." Ma fafisu sisya kaker ro nyanya faduri, smam sisren ro dafduf sena.
42017015	Inja oso rofandusi myam iprei kwar, kyaḇer ma isandik Allah kuker mkaren ḇeba,
42017016	raimnai kyain wepur ro ḇarpon Yesus ma ikofen kasumasa faroi. Snon ani snon Samaria rirya.
42017017	Ḇarpurya Yesus ikofen: "Insaja snon samfur iso ḇesma parareya? Moḇ rosai snon risiw sisya roya?
42017018	Snaro snon mandaman ine monda kyaḇer ikofen kasumasa faro Allah?"
42017019	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro snon ani: "Wores ma wabur. Snar kakyar bedi ḇyuk aski faro aw kwar."
42017020	Farisi ono sifuken faro Yesus, fafisu rosai Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi nari ryamaya, Yesus kyarem, ma ikofen: "Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ryama kuker aḇyair ro snonkakuḇa,
42017021	isof snonkaku sikofen, 'Mkorama mkomam, isoine!' roḇa, 'isya rodiwa!' Snar kaku ḇeri Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi isya rofandu mko."
42017022	Posa kwar Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Nari fafisuya ryama, mkomarisen mkomam ras oso rofandu ras Rumkun Snonkakuya ḇyena, ḇape nari mkomam iba.
42017023	Ma nari snonkakusya sikofen faro mko: 'Mkomam, isya rodiwa!' roḇa, 'Mkomam, isya rodine!' Ḇape mkoramura awer, ma mkoso awer.
42017024	Snar imnis raris arḇeḇer, isamar ro madepya pember ine ḇe mandepya pember iwara, rarirya kuker ras raramuma ro Rumkun Snonkakuya ḇyedi.
42017025	Ḇape nari isma kandera nabor ḇepon resari ma nari syos ine simeweri.
42017026	Ro ras imnis raris roi ḇeḇesya ro awar ḇepon ro Nuh, rarirya kuker roi ḇeḇesya ro ras Rumkun Snonkakuya.
42017027	Nari sanan ma sinem, sfakawin ma siwafwofer, isof ras Nuh syun ro jawasiya, raimnai faḇruḇya ryama myunsi rao siḇro.
42017028	Rarirya kako kuker roi ḇeḇesya ro awar Lot: sanan ma sinem, sḇaḇoḇ ma skaḇkoḇes, skaker ma sḇaḇawes.
42017029	Ḇape ro ras Lot isasyarbur Sodom, mekem for ma mekem karui for ḇesabu ker nankiya myun presi.
42017030	Rarirya kako kuker roi ḇeḇesya ro ras Rumkun Snonkakuya fyasna mankundia.
42017031	Ro ras ani mansei isya ro rumya bori, ma roi ḇeḇor ḇyena naisya ro rumya dori, dado fa dun naba. Rarirya kuker snonkaku ḇekaker ro yaf, kyaḇer faro rum ḇyediḇa.
42017032	Mkoswarepen Lot swari!
42017033	Mansei ḇeḇesewar ḇemyof kenem ḇyedi, nari kenem ḇyedi ryoburi. Mboi mansei kenem ḇyedi ryoburi, ikada nari isma aski.
42017034	Yakofen faro mko: Ro roḇ ani snon risuru suyenef kam ro kamboi anenef oser, nari sun oser ma sibur suminya.
42017035	Bin risuru suisya suso pokem, nari sun oser ma sibur suminya." [
42017036	Ma rofyor snon risuru suisya ro yaf, nari sun oser ma sibur suminya.]
42017037	Manfamyan ansi sifuken faro Yesus: "Moḇ rosai nari ndarirya, Manseren?" Yesus kyarem farosi: "Ro moḇ rosai aipyokem sisya, rodiwa manwawasya spanjuḇer kako."
42018001	Posa kwar, Yesus ḇyuk sarḇer oso fa ḇyefarkarkor faro manfamyan ḇyesi, insa simyaren senadi ḇesya kwar ma sfafayaf awer.
42018002	Yesus ikofen: "Ro mnu oso, Mankara oso imkak Allah ḇa, ma ipok ḇyefandun snonkaku syaḇa.
42018003	Ma ro mnu ani, bin kabom oso isya ryama ḇesya kwar faro mankara ani ma ikofen: Wafnoḇek aya fa wasrow kuker mbroḇ ayedi.
42018004	Fafisu riḇeso kwar mankara ani imewer. Ḇape rofafisu oso, ikofen ro sne ḇyedi: Aya ine yamkak Allah ḇa ma yaḇesyowi snonkaku ḇesesyaḇa.
42018005	Ḇape bin kabom ine ḇyeyayayu aya ḇesya kwar, inja iḇye kada yaḇuk kaku roi, insa ryamuma kaker awer, snar ifrur marmor aya mankenem."
