42018006	Posa Manseren ikofen: "Mkokara rosai mankara ḇeḇarḇor ani ikofenya!
42018007	Nari Allah ḇyuk nanapes faro snonkaku kyinfir kwarsya, ma ḇeyori, ro roḇ meser syaḇake? Ma nari ḇyeuryar fafisu naḇo ifnoḇeksi ḇake?
42018008	Yakofen faro mko: Nari isamberen fa ḇyuk kaku farosi. Ḇape, rofyor Rumkun Snonkakuya ryama ido, nari isma kakyaro ro supswan ine kakerke?"
42018009	Yesus fyawar kako sarḇer ḇekur snonkaku ḇerun min sesya ma soḇo semir sinapes, Yesus ikofen sarḇer ine:
42018010	"Snonkaku risuru suraḇe Allah Rum ḇyedi fa suḇenadi; snon ansuya oso snon Farisi rirya, ma suminya snon ḇeyor som rirya.
42018011	Snon farisi ani dores ma ḇyenadi ro sne ḇyedi radine: O, Allah, yakofen kasumasa faro au, snar yamnis kuker snonkaku ḇese siyafa ḇa, snonkaku ḇefasyarḇa, ḇeḇarḇor ḇa, ḇefrur farbuk ḇa ma yamnis snonkaku ḇeyor som ine ḇa;
42018012	Yafyorḇe suru ro ari swaf oser, ma yaḇuk rarwas ḇar ḇeḇe samfur ro roi ḇeḇor ayena kam.
42018013	Ḇape snon ḇeyor som ani dores ḇinkwan ma kyankunem, posa pyanepen ander ḇyedi ma ikofen: O, Allah, waswar snonkaku ḇesasar aya ine.
42018014	Yakofen faro mko: Snon anine iburḇe rum ḇyedi kuker napnapes isma ro Allah, ḇape snon Farisi anyama roḇa. Snar mansei ḇeyow mankundi ido, nari ḇyeḇerun ma mansei ḇerun mankundi ido, nari ḇyeḇekanow."
42018015	Sinan ono sun romawa kapirare sesya faro Yesus, insa ḇyeḇoksi. Ḇape manfamyan ḇyesi smam mura ido, sisonek snonkaku ansi.
42018016	Fama Yesus dorsi ma ikofen: "Mkorir romawa ansi insa srama ḇe aya, mkodwarek awersi, snar snonkaku ḇera dinesya siso ḇena Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedisya.
42018017	Yakofen faro mko: Kuker kaku ḇeri mansei ḇeseref Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi imnis romawa kapirareḇa ido, nari ipok fa daksun roiḇa."
42018018	Snon manfarkin oso ifuken faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Guru ḇeḇye, rosai nari yafrur insa yaksma kankenem fyoro-fyoroya?"
42018019	Yesus kyarem: "Rosai ḇeḇewar wor ayaḇe ḇeḇyeya? Snonkako osero fa iḇye ḇaḇeri, demir monda Allah.
42018020	Wafawi Allah sasoser ḇyena kam kwar: 'Wafrur farbuk awer, wasararer awer, mamun awer, besyowi snami ma kmam su.' "
42018021	Snon ani ikofen: "Nane kam yaḇeuser na kwar, rofyor yababoya isof ras ine."
42018022	Yesus imnaf rarirya ikofen faroi: "Ḇape roi oser isya kaker fa nari wafrurya: boḇ pres nana benakada ma warwas na faro ḇesaḇararsya, rarirya nari wakna nana ḇero boiyaswa, posa rwama waso aya."
42018023	Rofyor snon ani imnaf wos ani, iwarai snar snon ḇenana rirya.
42018024	Raimnai Yesus myami ma ikofen: "Syamswen fafayaḇa, faro snon ḇenanasya saksun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
42018025	Snar ipyan syadi faro onta oso syun ro mbraifun mkir ḇebaḇa, ro snon ḇenana ḇesewar fa ḇesun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi."
42018026	Ma ḇemnaf ansi sikofen: "Rarirya ido, mansei nari ḇesma koreriya?"
42018027	Yesus ikofen: "Rosai snonkaku sipok ḇaḇeri fa sifrur na, Allah kada ifrur na."
42018028	Petrus ikofen: "Nkoine nkobur roi ḇeḇor inkoḇena kam ma nkoso au."
42018029	Ḇape Yesus ikofen farosi: "Kaku ḇeri, yakofen faro mko, snonkaku mansei ḇebur rum ḇyedi, swari, roḇa naek srar ḇyesi, sinan ḇyesi roḇa romawa ḇyesi, snar Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi,
42018030	nari isma kaḇer sasuref pararyur, rofafisu ine beri kako ma ro awar ḇeramumaya nari isma kankenem fyoroya."
42018031	Yesus dor manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyesya, ma ikofen farosi: "Insape koraḇe Yerusalem ma roi ḇeḇor nabisya sfas fa ḇekur Rumkun Snonkaku ani nari namnis.
42018032	Snar nari sḇoḇi faro er-er ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa, ma skoryaye i, sonef i ma saninef i,
42018033	ma siprer i ma smun i, ma ro ras ḇeḇe kiorya nari diḇeri wer."
42018034	Ḇape roi ikofen anna, sifawi osero ḇaḇeri, snar kankunes ro wos anna nayokef farosi ma sifawi roi kyara ḇesyan naḇa.
42018035	Rofyor Yesus fyanam fa syuḇer ro Yerikho, snon ḇepraf oso kyain ro sampak andirya ma fyararyor.
42018036	Rofyor snon ani imnaf kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sunuk, inja ifuken: "Rosai sifrurya?"
42018037	Snonkaku sikofen faroi: "Yesus snon Nazaret ani ḇeyunukya."
42018038	Inja dor: "Yesus, Rumkun Daud, waswar aya!"
42018039	Inja ḇembran ro ḇarponsya sewefi, insa ḇyefasis. Ḇape dor naba syadi wer: "Rumkun Daud, waswar aya!"
42018040	Inja Yesus imnai ma iwan fa sun snon ani faroi. Ma rofafisu fyanam faroi kwar, Yesus ifuken i:
42018041	"Rosai wamarisen insa yafrur faro aw?" Snon ani kyarem: "Manseren, yamarisen kaku yamam wer!"
42018042	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rarirya ido mame, snar kakyar bedi ḇyuk aski faro aw kwar!"
42018043	Ma rofafisu ani beri myame, inja iso Yesus ḇo isandik Allah. Kawasa ḇemam roi ḇeḇesya ani kako sisandik Allah.
42019001	Yesus syun ro mnu Yerikho ma imbran pdef fa dunuk mnu ani.
42019002	Rodia snon oso isya snonsnon ḇyedi Zakheus, mananir ḇeyor som, ma snon ḇenana rirya.
42019003	Ḇyesewar kaku insama dakmam snon sapḇe Yesus ani, ḇape snar snonkakusya sibor siyari isof ipok dakmamiḇa, snar ḇaken ḇyedi ikakiḇa.
42019004	Inja ifrar ḇepon bur snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi, raimnai dek ro ara knam oso insa dakmam Yesus, nari ḇeyunuk rodia.
42019005	Fafisu Yesus dunuk ro moḇ ani, myamḇe bo ma ikofen: "Zakheus, wasabu fasaw, snar ras ine yaḇeryar ro rum bedi."
42019006	Rarirya Zakheus isabu fasaw ma isrow Yesus kuker raryaḇ ḇefnakḇa.
42019007	Ḇape snonkaku ḇemam roi ḇeḇesya ani sikam sisuremi ma sikofen: "Ḇyeryar ro snonkaku ḇesasarsya rum sena."
42019008	Ḇape Zakheus iyori ma ikofen faro Manseren: "Manseren, rarwas ro nana ayena, nari yaḇuk na faro snonkaku ḇesaḇararsya ma rofyor yun syadi roi ono ro snonkaku onoido nari yakaḇer na ḇe rarwan rifiak."
42019009	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Ras ine askiya isya kwar faro rum ine, snar snon ine kako romawa Abraham ḇyedirya.
42019010	Snar Rumkun Snonkakuya ryama insa syewar ma ḇyuk koreri faro snonkaku ḇeborsya."
42019011	Yesus dawos pdef wos ḇyena faro ḇemnafi ro diansya, kuker wos sarḇer oso, snar fyanam kwar ḇe Yerusalem ma kawasa ansi skara ḇo soḇo nari Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ifyafer fasaw.
42019012	Inja ikofen: "Snonkaku ḇena mnu oso ryaḇe mnu ḇeḇinkwan insa sisiḇeri fa ḇye wairek ro diya, posa kyaḇer.
42019013	Inja dor manfamyan ḇyesi snon samfur, ma ḇyuk pipi brawen samfur farosi ma ikofen: 'Mkoḇuk pipi sine sfarḇaḇyan rawo isof yakaḇer.'
42019014	Ḇape snonkaku er ḇyesi sayin i, inja siwan wawan ono fa siyawuseri ma sikofen: 'Nkomewer snonkaku ine ḇye wairek faro nko.'
42019015	Inja sisiḇeri ḇe wairek raposa kyaḇer ma ḇye wairek, iwan fa sor manfyan ḇyesi, ḇesma pipi kwar ansi, insa sikofen ḇayir barbor ro pipi sisma ro farḇyan sedi oser-oser fa dakfawi.
42019016	Inja snon ḇeponya ikofen: 'Tuan, pipi brawen oser yasma ro aw kwar ani, ḇyuk barbor pipi brawen samfur.'
42019017	Ikofen faro snon ani: 'Iḇye kaku ro fararur bedi, aw manfyan ḇeḇye; wanapes ro roi kasun, inja wasma nasan fa wuf sasoser ro mnu samfur.'
42019018	Snon ḇeḇe suruya ryama ma ikofen: 'Tuan, pipi brawen yasma ro aw kwar ani, ssḇuk barbor pipi brawen ririm.'
42019019	Ikofen faro snon ani: 'Ma aw kako, wuf nasan ro mnu ririm.'
42019020	Ma manfyan ḇeḇe kiorya ryama ikofen: 'Tuan, pipi brawen banya isine, yakrami ro marḇunya.
42019021	Snar yamkak tuan aw, snar yafawi tuan snonkaku ḇepakrek; inja wun roi ḇeḇor wapok rwirḇa ma tuan wuf rosai kwerḇa.'
42019022	Inja ikofen faro snon ani: 'Aw manfyan ḇeḇarḇor, nari yaḇe mankara aw, raris mankundaw wos ḇena. Wafawi kaku aya ine snon ḇepakrek, ma ḇeyun roi ḇeḇor yapok yarirḇa, ma ḇeyuf rosai yakerḇa.
42019023	Rarirya ido, rosai ḇeḇewari rwir pipi ayedi ro snonkaku ḇefarḇyan pipi insa yakaḇer ido, yun pampen ḇyediḇa kukerya?'
42019024	Raimnai ikofen faro snonkaku ḇeyores ro diansya: 'Mkun pipi brawen oser ani buri ma mkoḇuki faro snon ḇena pipi brawen samfur ani.'
42019025	Inja sikofen: 'Tuan, nya pipi brawen samfur kwar.'
42019026	Ḇape kyarem: 'Yakofen faro mko: Snonkaku mansei ḇesma ido, faroi nari ssḇuk wer, ḇape mansei ḇesmaḇa ido, nari sun rosai ismana buri.
42019027	Mboi faro ḇemsor aya ma ḇemewer yaḇe waireksya, mkunsi muma ma mkomunsi ro ḇarpon ayedi.' "
42019028	Yesus dawos raposa, pyonsi ro maran ḇyedi ḇe Yerusalem.
42019029	Fafisu fyanam ḇe Betfage ma Betania, ḇekain ro bon ḇenirḇe urek Zaitun, iwan manfamyan ḇyesi snon risuru.
42019030	Kuker ananun: "Muraḇe mnu ḇero ḇarpon muḇediwanya: 'Ma rofyor musun ro diwa, nari musrow keledai kuḇ babo oso sfesi, ma snonkakuyo deki ḇayim. Muper keledai ani ma muyuni muma.'
42019031	Ma rofyor snonkaku oso ifuken faro mu rosai ḇeḇewari muperiya? Nari mukarem radine: 'Manseren ḇyefanduni.' "
42019032	Inja manfamyan ansuya sura ma susrow roi ḇeḇor anna raris moḇ Yesus ikofen raya.
42019033	Fafisu super keledai ani, snonkaku ḇena keledai ani ifuken: "Rosai ḇeḇewari muper keledai iya kukerya?"
42019034	Sukarem: "Manseren ḇyefanduni."
42019035	Inja suyun keledai ani faro Yesus, raima sḇori kuker sansun sena ma sifnoḇek Yesus fa dek roi.
42019036	Ma fafisu Yesus dek ro keledai ani, sḇor sansun sena ro nyanya.
42019037	Fafisu fyanam Yerusalem, ro nyan ḇeyado ro urek Zaitun, manfamyan ḇyesi ma ḇeyakeri ansya kam simarisen ma sisandik Allah kuker mkaren ḇeba snar aḇyair kanandor smam kwar na.
42019038	Sibras ma sikofen: "Ḇaḇeḇok faroi ḇeramuma imnis Wairek kuker snonsnon Manseren, aski ro boiyaswa ma syom faro Allah ro moḇ ḇekaki syadi!"
42019039	Farisi ḇeyakso kuker snonkaku ḇeḇor ansya sikofen faro Yesus: "Guru, wasonek manfamyan besine."
42019040	Yesus kyarem: "Yakofen faro mko: Rofyor sefasis ido, nari karui nane nabras."
42019041	Ma fafisu fyanam kwar ma myam mnu ani, kyanesi,
42019042	ḇo doḇo: "Sye iḇye syadi ro ras ine kako wafawi rosai ḇeyun aski faro aw. Ḇape insape roi ḇeḇesya ani iyokef ro mkomkamna.
42019043	Snar rasya ryama ido, nari mbroḇ besi siyar warek aw kuker ayar mamun ma soper aw ma sfasyar aw,
42019044	ma nari simkok aw fnoḇek kawasa besi ma arsen bedi karui oso kyon ro karui oso boriḇa, snar wafawiḇa fafisu rosai Allah ryakaki awya."
42019045	Raimnai Yesus syun ḇe Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma iyaw kawasa ḇefarḇaḇyan ro diansya,
42019046	ma ikofen farosi: "Sfar kwar ḇo soḇo: Rum ayeja ma rum nadi rirya. Ḇape mkofruri raris narem ḇefasyar monda."
42019047	Ro ras nakam, ḇyuk farkarkor ro rum ariya dori. Inja mananir-mananir Imam ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snonkaku ḇeḇe snonsnon ro er Israelsya sḇesewar fa smuni
42019048	ḇape sifawiḇa, nyan rosai ssḇuki myuni, snar kawasasya kam siryaḇi, ma simarisen simnafi.
42020001	Ro ras oso Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor faro kawasa ḇeḇor ro Allah Rum byedi ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, mananir imam-imam ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi fnoḇek ḇebararasya srama,
42020002	ma sikofen faro Yesus: "Wakofen ḇadir papoik rosai buki ifrur roi ḇeḇor anna ma mansei ḇeḇuk papoik ani faro aw!"
42020003	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Aya kako nari yaḇuk fakfuken oso faro mko. Mkokofen maro aya:
42020004	Masasi Yohanes ḇyani, ryama ker boiyaswake ryamaker snonkaku?"
42020005	Inja skara ro mankunsi ma sikofen: Rofyor koḇe: Ryamuma ro boiyaswa, nari ikofen: Rosai ḇeḇewari mkokyarḇa?
42020006	Oroḇaido koḇe: Ryamaker snonkaku, nari kawasa sine sfarmun ko kuker karui, snar sifawi kaku, Yohanes nabi rirya.
42020007	Raimnai skarem, nkofawi moḇ masasi ani ryamuma royaḇa.
42020008	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Rarirya ido, aya kako yakofen faro mkoḇa kuker papoik rosai yaḇuki ifrur roi ḇeḇor annaya."
42020009	Raimnai Yesus ikofen sarḇer ine faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi: "Snon oso isya ḇyas yaf anggur oso; posa ḇyuk yaf ani faro snon ḇefararursya raimnai ryaḇe sup ḇese rofafisu fyoro kaku.
42020010	Ma rofafisu mamaremya ryama, iwan manfyan ḇyesi oso faro ḇefararur ansya, insa ssḇuk rarwas ro anggur bon anna faroi. Ḇape ḇefararur ansi siprer manfyan ani ma siwani fa ibur beidi.
42020011	Inja iwan manfyan oso ḇese wer, ḇape manfyan ani sipreri ma skoryayei, raimnai siwani fa ibur beidi kako.
42020012	Inja iwan manfyan ḇeḇe kiorya, ḇape smuni isof ḇyeparpar, posa sisaweni ro yafya ḇandiri.
42020013	Inja tuan ḇena yaf anggur anine ikofen: Rosai nari yafrurya? Nari yawan romawa yaswar ani; snar ikada nari sesyowi i.
42020014	Ḇape fafisu ḇefararur ro yaf ansi smam romawa ḇyani, sna wosi, ma sikofen: I ḇeḇeknam yaf anggur ine, mkorama komuni, insama yaf anggur ḇyedine konai.
42020015	Inja smuni ma sisawen i ḇe yaf anggur ani ḇandiri, insape rosai nari tuan ḇena yaf anggur ani ifrur faro siya?
42020016	Nari ryama ma myun pres si, ma ḇyuk yaf anggur ani faro ono ḇese." Simnaf raririrya inja sikofen: "Rarirya awer!"
42020017	Ḇape Yesus myamsi ma ikofen: "Rarirya ido, kankunes rosai ḇero mnuk ineya: Karui kamasan ḇeḇaḇawes ansi sisawen kwar, iso nari ḇeḇe karui kakyarya.
42020018	Mansei ḇesapi ro karui ani, nari ḇyekiskis, ma mansei karui ani kyamepenya ido, nari ḇyefafen."
42020019	Inja ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma mananir imam sḇesewar fa sfor Yesus ro fafisu ani kako, snar sifawi, mboi siso ikofen ro sarḇer ani, ḇape simkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
42020020	Ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma mananir imam-imam sḇayir Yesus. Siwan manpan ono faro Yesus ma sifrur mankunsi ḇe snonkaku ḇenapes, insa sidenem i kuker fakfuken oso ma ssḇuki faro Gubernuri.
42020021	Snonkaku ansi sifuken: "Guru, nkofawi wos ma farkarkor ḇena kam nanapes, ma mamkaryerḇa, mboi buk farkarkor ḇenapes ro Allah nyan ḇyena.
42020022	Inja nari nkoḇak som faro Kaisarke, roḇa?"
42020023	Ḇape Yesus ifawi swaruser mandaw sena, inja ikofen farosi:
42020024	"Mkofasna dinar osoma ro aya: fanir ma fasfas mansei ḇeroiya?" Skarem: "Kaisar."
42020025	Raimnai Yesus kyarem farosi: "Rarirya ido mkoḇuk faro Kaisar rosai nari mkoḇuk faro Kaisar ma faro Allah rosai nari mkoḇuk faro Allah!"
42020026	Inja sipok fa sidenem iba snar sikandor kankarem ḇyena ro ḇarpon kawasa ansi, inja sefasis.
42020027	Snon Saduki ono sra fa sisrow Yesus, snar sima sikyar faro ḇaḇawesya ḇa. Inja sifuken faroi:
42020028	"Guru, Moses fyas sasoser ine maḇe inko, ḇo doḇo: Rofyor snon oso, imar ma isma romawaḇa ido, nari naek ḇyeja ḇyekawin swari insa ḇyuk romawayo faro naek ḇyani.
42020029	Manbekanaek rifik sisya. Ḇeponya ḇyekawin kuker bin oso raimnai imar ḇape isma romawaḇa.
42020030	Inja ḇeḇesuruya ḇyekawin bin ani,
42020031	ma ḇeḇekiorya rarirya pdef isof ḇeḇefikya, simar kam ma sna romawaḇa.
42020032	Ḇarpurya bin ani kako dakmar.
42020033	Rariso kuker bin ani, mansei rofandu snon ansi ḇeḇeswa faroi ro ras aḇiḇerya? Snar skoḇe fik skofakawin kam kukeri kwar."
42020034	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Snonkaku rofafisu ine ro supswan inesya sḇekawin ma sfakawin si,
42020035	ḇape faro snonkaku skara ḇesyus fa ḇesma rarwas ro supswan ḇese ani ma ro aḇiḇer fandu snonkaku ḇemarsya, sḇekawin ḇa ma sfakawin siḇa.
42020036	Snar nari simar werḇa; imboi simnis kuker malaikat-malaikat ma seromawa Allah, snar sḇeḇeḇawes kwar.
42020037	Ro mnuk snonkaku ḇemarsya siḇer si, Moses ikofen ḇadir kwar ro mnuk manuk borek, ro moḇ rosai sap Manseren ḇe Allah Abraham, Allah Ishak ma Allah Yakub.
42020038	Inja Allah ḇye Allah faro snonkaku bemarsya ḇa, ḇape ḇye Allah faro snonkaku ḇekenemsya, snar snonkaku syakam nari sikenem ro ḇarpon ḇyedi."
42020039	Simnaf rarirya snonkaku ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ono sikofen: "Guru, kankarem bedi imnis kaku."
42020040	Rarirya simku fa sifuken roi ono ro Yesus wer ḇa.
42020041	Ḇape Yesus ikofen farosi: "Rariso snonkakusya soḇo, Wairek ḇeḇuk koreri (Mesias) ikada Daud romawa ḇyedirya?
42020042	Snar Daud mankundi ikofen ro syap Mazmur ḇo doḇo: Manseren ikofen faro Manseren yedi; kwainkada ro ḇar raku yedi;
42020043	isof yaḇe mbroḇ besi fa seararef ro wemsu.
42020044	Inja Daud dapiḇe Manseren ḇyedi, rariso nari ḇye romawa faroi wer?"
42020045	Fafisu snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi simnaf Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi:
42020046	"Mkoḇe sasor mko ro ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ḇesansun syatu ḇekwan ḇo ḇemarisen ḇembran ḇeḇesewar syom ro buḇes (pasar) ḇemarisen ḇekain ro ḇarpon ro rum ari ma moḇ sisma syom ro munara,
42020047	ma ḇeyoren pekwam kabomsya rum sena, ḇepanwarek kawasa simkasna kuker nadi ḇekwan sena. Nari sisma samamyai ḇemarḇak syadi."
42021001	Rofafisu Yesus isya ro Allah Rum ḇyedi myam snonkaku ḇenanasya srir farsarser sena ro burua farsarserya.
42021002	Myam kako bin kabom ḇesaḇarar oso dakrir remis risuru ro burua farsaser ani dori.
42021003	Inja ikofen: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri bin ḇesaḇarar ine ḇyuk farsarser sibor syadi ro kawasa ansine kam.
42021004	Snar sikam ssḇuk ro farsbawer sena, ḇape kabom ine syaḇarar rariso kako ḇyuk ro nana ḇyena kam, ḇeḇefandun ro kankenem ḇyedi."
42021005	Ro fafisu snonkaku ono sawawos ro roi ḇekur Allah Rum ḇyedi ma smander ḇaḇaus ḇeḇesya ani, ḇyeḇefrur kuker karui ḇepyum ma roi ḇeḇor ssḇuki fyarser faro Allah, inja Yesus ikofen farosi:
42021006	"Rosai mkomam ḇesya ro dia -- nari rasya isyama, karui oso ipok ḇyarek ro karuiyo boriḇa; nakam nari neḇekakok."
42021007	Ma manfamyan ḇyesi sifuken faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Guru, rofafisu saiso nari roi ḇeḇor nane nesyanya? Ma abyair saiso, ḇefasna rofafisu ndariryana?"
42021008	Yesus kyarem: "Mkofasos insa seankar mko awer. Snar snonkaku sibor nari srama sap snonsnon ayedi ma sikofen: Ayai rya, ma fafisuya fyanam kwar. Mkoso awersi.
42021009	Ma rofyor mkomnaf roi sawos ro mbroḇ ma mbriwer mko kandor awer. Snar nakam nari ndarirya ḇepon ḇape nfasna ras ḇepupesya nari ryama fasawya isya ḇaim."
42021010	Ikofen farosi: "Er oso nari ḇyembroḇ ma isampum er ḇese ma ḇaḇesasoser oso nari ḇyembroḇ ḇaḇesasoser ḇeseya,
42021011	ma rim ḇeba kaku nari myun ma ro moḇ nabor dafduf kapyowi ma basbiser isya, ma nari roi ḇefrur kanandor naisya kako ma aḇyair-aḇyair ḇeyun nyawa nari nfasna ro nanki.
42021012	Ḇape roi ḇeḇor nane naisya ḇaim nari sfor mko ma sewayammko; nari skukeḇ mko ro rum nadina ma mkosun ro bui, ma nari sun mkoḇe ḇarpon kankain wairek-wairek ma ḇesma papoik sya snar snonsnon ayedi.
42021013	Inja roi nane nefafisu faro mko fa mkoḇuk ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah.
42021014	Inja mkoswarepen naḇye ro mkosnemna insa mkokara ḇepon awer sano faro mko.
42021015	Snar mankundaya nari yaḇuk faro mko fawawi ro wos, isof mbroḇ mkoḇesi sipok sisampum mkoḇa.
42021016	Ma sinan mkoḇesi, ma naek, kina, ma bati mkoḇesi sḇoḇ mko isof ono rofandu mko nari seḇemun,
42021017	ma snonkakusya kam sayin mko snar snonsnon ayedi.
42021018	Ḇape snonburyam osero ro mkoḇrumna ipok nari ryoḇa.
42021019	Rofyor mkores nako, nari mkosma kankenem mkoḇena."
42021020	"Rofyor mkomam sordade-sordadesya saiwarek Yerusalem ido, irya mkofawi beri, makakok ḇyedi fyanam kwar.
42021021	Rofyor ani snonkaku ro Yudea sifrar sibur be bon, ma snonkaku ro Yerusalemsya kako iḇye sfaryane, ma snonkaku ro mnuya ḇandirisya ssun awer ḇe Yerusalem,
42021022	snar irya fafisu mamunsuya imnis kwar ro roi ḇeḇor kam sfas kwar ro Refo.
42021023	Ras ani ifrur kandera fafayaḇa faro bin ḇemoḇesḇa ma ḇesasus sya! Mnu ine nari isma kandera ḇeba kaku ma Manseren nari ḇyuk samamyai faro er ine,
42021024	ma nari seḇemun kuker sumber ma er ansi sunsi ḇe women faro er ḇeḇor kam ma er ḇefawi Allah ḇasya nari saref apepen Yerusalem, isof fafisu er ansi sedi imnis."
42021025	"Ma nari aḇyair-aḇyair ono naisya ro ori, paiki ma maksya, ma er-er ḇero supswan inesya kam nari simkak ma sikmom rakrok maum ma raryoi ro sorenya.
42021026	Snonkakusya nari skarsosen rawo siḇe simar, snar makakakya ro roi ḇeḇor ḇemun supswan ine, snar samambraḇ ro nanki nari namarmer.
42021027	Rofafisu ani snonkakusya smam Rumkun Snonkakuya nari ryama ro mandep kuker papoik ma payamyum ḇyena.
42021028	Rofyor roi nanekam ndarirya, mkokanaw mkoḇrumna, snar kniko monda mkosma koreri."
42021029	Raimnai Yesus ikofen sarḇer ine farosi: "Mkomam epen ara knam roḇa ai knam rosairyawer.
42021030	Rofyor mkomam ai knam anna nkakyei kwar, mkofawi ro mankun mko irya wampasi samsamya fyanam kwar.
42021031	Rarirya kako, rofyor mkomam roi ḇeḇor anna ndarirya ido, irya mkofawi Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi fyanam kwar.
42021032	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri syos ine nari simar kam baim rofyor roi ḇeḇesya nane ndarirya.
42021033	Nanki ma supswan ine nari napromes, ḇape wos ayena nkain nako isof fyoro-fyoro."
42021034	"Mkowaren mankun mko, insa mkosnemna nafo awer kuker swaruser munara ma masaser ma fandun-fandun ro kankenem mkoḇena, imbude Manseren ras ḇyedi ifyafer kanandor mko imnis denem oso.
42021035	Snar ras ani imnis denem ḇefor snonkaku ḇekain ro supswan ine.
42021036	Mkowaren ma mkoḇenadi ḇesya kwar, insa mkosma sambraḇ fa mkoḇukfaspar mko ro roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya anna, ma mkores nako ro ḇarpon Rumkun Snonkakuya."
42021037	Ro meser na Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma ro roḇ na isasyar fa denef ro urek Zaitun.
42021038	Ma arwo na snonkaku ḇeḇor ansya kam sraḇe Allah Rum ḇyedi fa simnaf Yesus farkarkor ḇyena.
42022001	Ras ḇeba Mamami Ḇepisenḇa, snirḇe Paskah ani fyanam kwar.
42022002	Mananir-mananir imam ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ssewar nyan rosai sisma fa smun Yesus, snar simkak kawasa ḇeḇor ansi.
42022003	Ḇarpurya Ibirisya syun ro Yudas ḇenir kakoḇe Iskariot, snon oso ro Yesus manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyesi.
42022004	Raimnai Yudas ryafa isrow mananir-mananir imam ma mananir-mananir ḇewaren Allah Rum ḇyedi fa sna awi, rariso nari ḇyoḇ Yesus farosi.
42022005	Simarisen fafayaḇa ma sna sne oser fa ssḇuk pipi faroi.
42022006	Yudas imarisen inja syewar fafisu ḇeḇye fa ḇyoḇ Yesus farosi insa kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sifawi awer.
42022007	Ma ras ḇeba Mamami Ḇepisenḇa, (mamami ḇefawnai kuker murḇa) isoine ras rosai snonkakusya skaruk domba faro munara Paskahya.
42022008	Raimnai Yesus iwan Petrus ma Yohanes, ḇo ikofen: "Mura mufasos nanan Paskah faro ko."
42022009	Sufuken faroi: "Moḇ rosaiso wamarisen nkofasos roya?"
42022010	Kyarem, doḇo: "Rofyor musun ro mnuya nari musrow snonkaku ḇeyun war ro fyom oso musoi ḇerum syun roya,
42022011	ma mufuken faro ḇena rumya: Guru ifuken aw: sim rosaiso nari yan Paskah kuker manfamyan ayesi roya?
42022012	Raimnai snon ani nari fyasnai faro mu sim ḇeba oso ro syos ḇero bo ḇefasos kwar, inja mufasos roi ḇeḇor kam ro dia."
42022013	Inja sura kwar ma susma roi Yesus ikofen faro su anna kam. Raimnai sufasos Paskahya.
42022014	Fafisuya ryama kwar, ma Yesus danan kuker manwawan ḇyesi.
42022015	Ikofen farosi: "Yaswar kuf kaku yan Paskah fnoḇek mko, rofyor yasun ḇaim ro ḇaḇewayamya.
42022016	Snar yakofen faro mko: mko kyare, nari yakani werḇa isof fafisu Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ifyafer."
42022017	Ḇarpurya dun sek aninem ma ikofen kasumasa posa, ikofen: "Mkuni ma mkorarwas fandu mko.
42022018	Snar yakofen faro mko: randak ro knikine, nari yinem anggur werḇa isof Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ifyafer."
42022019	Raimnai dun mamami, ma ikofen kasumasa posa pyanasnis na ma ḇyukna farosi, ḇo ikofen: "Inekada kraf ayedi ḇyeḇeḇoḇ kwar faro mko; mkofrur radine fa mkoswarepen aya."
42022020	Rarirya kako ifrur kuker sek aninem ani rofyor sanan kwar; raimnai ikofen: "Sek aninem inekada asas babo ro rik ayena ḇesbawer kwar snar mko.
42022021	Ḇape mkomame, ḇramin ḇeḇoḇ ayanya isya kuker aya ro meja ine.
42022022	Snar Rumkun Snonkaku nari rya imnis raris asasya moḇ ryaya, mboi kandera ḇeba faro snonkaku ḇeḇoḇ ayanya."
42022023	Raimnai sifuken yaesi mansei rofandusi nari ḇefrur rarirya.
42022024	Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sfamfaḇri, mansei ro si ḇeba syadiya.
42022025	Rarirya Yesus ikofen farosi: "Wairek-wairek ro ersya ssḇuk sasoser faro kawasa sesi ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara sya ssḇuk papoik sena nsoser si sapsi ḇemanfadiren.
42022026	Ḇape mkoma rariryaḇa, mboi ḇeba syadi ro mko ryun mankundi fa ibaḇa syadi ma manfarkinya imnis ḇeyuffarmyan.
42022027	Snar mansei ḇeba syadiya: ḇekain ḇeyananke, roḇaido ḇeyuffarmyanyake? Mboi ḇekain ḇeyananya? Ḇape ayaisya fandu mko imnis ḇeyuffarmyan.
42022028	Mkoiso ḇekain fnoḇek aya ḇesya kwar ro fafrowes ḇeḇor yasma kwar.
42022029	Ma yafasna Papoik Ḇaḇesasoser Allah faro mko, imnis Mami fyasna Papoik ani faro aya,
42022030	mboi nari mkanan ma mkinem ro meja oser kuker aya ro Ḇaḇesasoser ayedi, ma nari mko kain ro karapesa nasan fa mkokara keret samfur seser risuru ro er Israel.
42022031	Simon, Simon, mame, Ibirisya imarisen ryas mko imnis fasibu,
42022032	ḇape yaḇenadi kuker aw kwar, insa kakyar bedi isapi awer. Ma aw, rofyor mambir kwarido, swambraḇser naek besi."
42022033	Petrus kyarem: "Manseren, yafasos fa yasun bui ma yamar fnoḇek au!"
42022034	Ḇape Yesus ikofen: "Yakofen faro aw, Petrus, ras ine mankokosya sor ḇaim, famyun ayaḇe kior kwar."
42022035	Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Fafisu yawan mko ani, mkun mansripḇa, roi ḇeḇaryamḇa ma roiḇesower weminḇa, rofafisu ani mkananjar royoke?"
42022036	Skarem: "Nkananjar royoḇa." Yesus ikofen farosi: "Ḇape baboine mansei ḇesma mansripo duni, rarirya kako kuker ḇesma roi ḇeḇaryam; ma mansei ḇesma sumberḇa ḇyoḇ syatu ḇyedi fa ḇyuki kyoḇes sumber.
42022037	Snar yakofen faro mko, mboi mnuk ro Refo ine imnis fa kyur aya: Nari ḇyeḇekor fnoḇek snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya. Snar rosai ḇefas kwar fa ḇekur aya nabe namnis."
42022038	Sikofen: "Manseren, sumber risuru suisne." Kyarem: "Imnis kwar."
42022039	Raimnai isasyar ro Yerusalem ma ryaḇe urek Zaitun. Manfamyan ḇyesi sisoi kako.
42022040	Skora kwar ro moḇ ani ikofen farosi: "Mko ḇenadi insa mkosapi awer ro fafrowes."
42022041	Raimnai imbran swaf bursi, posa kyain wepur ma ḇyenadi, doḇo:
42022042	"O Mami, rofyor wamarisen ido, kandera ḇekur aya ine wuni bur aya, ḇape Mami waso marisen ayedi awer, mboi marisen bedi ryarirya mura."
42022043	Ma malaikat oso ro nanki fyasnai faro Yesus ma ḇyuk samambraḇ faroi.
42022044	Imkak mankenem inja ḇyenadi kuker sneri ḇesiper. Sayan ḇyena namnis rik paporem ma nadaf ḇesaprop.
42022045	Ḇyenadi posa kwar iyori ma kyaḇer faro manfamyan ḇyesi, ḇape isrow sisya senef snar siswar mankenem Yesus.
42022046	Ikofen farosi: "Mkenef snaro? Mkokḇoke ma mkoḇenadi, insa mkosapi awer ro fafrowesya."
42022047	Rofyor Yesus dawawos kaker rak oso ryama, ma manfamyan ḇyesi ḇenir ḇe Yudas, oso rofandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyansi pyon rak ani. Yudas isnefer Yesus fa isyumi.
42022048	Ma Yesus ikofen faroi: "Yudas, boḇ Rumkun Snonkakuya kuker syumke?"
42022049	Rofyor ḇeso Yesus insya, smam rosai nari ḇeḇesyanya ma sikofen: "Manseren, iḇye komunsi kuker sumberke?"
42022050	Ma oso rosi doper ma pyapekbas Imam Ḇeba manfyan ḇyesi oso knaram ḇar raku kuker sumber.
42022051	Ḇape Yesus ikofen: "Iḇye kwar mura." Raimnai duf snon ani knaram ḇyani ma pyom iwer.
42022052	Ma Yesus ikofen faro mananir-mananir imam ma mananir ḇewaren Allah Rum ḇyedi ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara Yahudi ḇerama ḇeforisya, doḇo: "Kakara mkoḇena aya ine yaḇarḇorke, indiriso mkorama kuker sumber ma karbere fa mkofor aya?
42022053	Mboi mkofawi ras-ras nakam ayaisya rofandu mkoḇena ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, mboi mkofor ayaḇa. Ḇape ine fafisu mkoḇeirya, ma ineido papoik ro pampanya."
42022054	Raimnai Yesus ḇyeḇefor ma suni ro moḇ ani ma siyakeri ḇe Imam Ḇebaya rum ḇyedi. Ma Petrus iyomuser ro ḇarpur.
42022055	Ro buḇes ro rum ani snonkaku sikaḇen for ma skain yar-yari. Petrus ikako kyain fandusi.
42022056	Infyan oso myam Petrus kyain fanam forya; iknoweri raimnai ikofen: "Snon ine kako dakfnoḇeki."
42022057	Ḇape Petrus fyamyun ḇo ikofen: "Roḇa, aya ine yafawi snon ani ḇa!"
42022058	Fyoro werḇa snonkaku oso ḇese myami ma ikofen: "Au kako oso rosi!" Ḇape Petrus ikofen: "Roḇa, ayama roḇa!"
42022059	Ma indokada oras ḇesiper oser posa, snon oso ḇese ikofenbos faroi: "Kaku ḇeri, snon ine kako dakfnoḇeki, snar ikako snon Galilea."
42022060	Ḇape Petrus ikofen: "Roḇa, aya ine yafawi roi wakofenya ḇa." Rofafisu ani kako, rofyor isya dawos kaker, mankoko rawersya sore.
42022061	Raimnai Yesus iknenef ma myam Petrus. Inja Petrus iswarepen snar Manseren ikofen faroi: "Rofyor mankoko rawersya sor ḇaim ro ras ine famyun epen aya ḇekior kwar."
42022062	Raimnai syaye randi ma kyanes fafayaḇa.
42022063	Ma snonkaku ḇefor Yesus ansi, skoryayei ma sipreri.
42022064	Sisisen warek mka ḇyesya ma sifuken: "Indo wakofen mansei ḇeprer awya?"
42022065	Ma wos anonef sikofen faroi nabor.
42022066	Ma rofyor meser kwar ḇebarara-ḇebarara er Yahudi ma mananir-mananir imamsya ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi skara posa kwar, sun Yesus ḇeḇarpon mankukeḇ Agama sedi,
42022067	ma sikofen: "Rofyor aw Wairek, wakofen maro nko." Yesus kyarem: "Yakofen kako ḇe mko wero, nari mkokyarḇa;
42022068	ma rofyor yafuken roi oso faro mko, nari mkopok fa mkokaremi ḇa.
42022069	Randak ro knikine Rumkun Snonkaku kyain kwar ro ḇar raku Allah ḇepok syadiya."
42022070	Sikofen kam: "Rarirya ido, awne Rumkun Allahke?" Yesus kyarem: "Iso mankun mkokofenya, mboi aya ine Rumkun Allah."
42022071	Raimnai sikofen: "Fainda rosai kosewar ḇaḇesaksi wer? Koine komnaf kwar ro mankundi sḇadon ḇyedi."
42023001	Raimnai kina mankukeḇ ansi siyorsi fa sun Yesus ḇeḇarpon Pilatus.
42023002	Ro dia sirandak ssḇuk safsof, ḇo soḇo: "Isna kwar maro nko, mboi snon ine fyarkor ninyan er nkoḇesi fa siḇor, ma myun warek nkoḇak som faro Kaisar, ma mankundi ḇardi ikofen ḇo doḇo, mboi ikada Kristus isoine Wairek."
42023003	Pilatus ifuken faroi: "Aukada wairek kawasa Yahudike?" Yesus kyarem: "Iso mankundaw wakofenya."
42023004	Pilatus ikofen faro mananir-mananir imamsya ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansya kam: "Yasma sasar oso ḇaḇeri ro snonkaku ine."
42023005	Ḇape seyayu besya kwar, ḇo soḇo: "Fyarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor kuker farkarkor ḇyena ro Yudea ḇesiper, ḇyerandak ro Galilea ma ryama kwar kako rodine."
42023006	Rofyor Pilatus ryower rarirya ifuken, inja snon ine snon Galilea riryake?
42023007	Ma rofafisu Pilatus ifawi, mboi Yesus snonkaku ḇero sup mnuk Herodes, fyaremi fa suni ḇeḇarpon Herodes, snar ro fafisu ani isya kako ro Yerusalem.
42023008	Rofyor Herodes myam Yesus, Herodes iryaḇ kaku. Snar fyoro kwar imarisen dakmam Yesus, snar fyoro kwar imnaf roi ono ro Yesus, ma ikyar nari Yesus ifrur aḇyair kanandor oso fa dakmam.
42023009	Ḇyuk fakfuken nabor faro Yesus, ḇape Yesus kyarem royoḇaḇeri.
42023010	Rofafisu mananir-mananir imam ḇeḇeḇukorsya ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi srarpon ma ssḇuk safsof ḇemarḇak faroi.
42023011	Fafisu ani Herodes kuker sarar ḇyesi sefarfnak ma skoryayei, skosansuni kuker syatu nasan raimnai skofarem kaḇeri wer faro Pilatus.
42023012	Ma ro ras ani beri, Herodes ma Pilatus, ḇeḇembroḇ ansuya suḇe bati wer.
42023013	Raimnai Pilatus fyanjur mananir-mananir imamsya ma manfarkin-manfarkin fnoḇek kawasasya,
42023014	ma ikofen farosi: "Mkun snonkaku ine maro aya imnis snonkaku ḇefarkor ninyan kawasa. Mankun mkomam mboi yakukeḇi kwar, ma sasar rosai mkoḇuksof i na yasma ono roiḇa.
42023015	Ma Herodes ikako isma sasar oso roiḇa, inja fyarem kaḇeri maro nko. Kaku ḇeri ifrur sasar roḇa fa ḇemnis kuker samamyai marmari.
42023016	Inja nari yapreri raimnai yafaspari." [
42023017	Snar ro ras munara Paskah, Pilatus fyaspar snonkaku besmai oso faro kawasasya.]
42023018	Ḇape sibras kam: "Ḇyeḇemun! Faspar Barabas maḇe nko!"
42023019	Barabas ine ḇyeḇesun ro bui snar skofrur mbriwer ḇeba ro mnu ḇebaya, ma snar myamun.
42023020	Pilatus ikofen wer kuker mkaren ḇeba farosi, snar imarisen fa fyaspar Yesus.
42023021	Ḇape sibras wer, ḇo soḇo: "Ḇyeḇepai ro aprop! Ḇyeḇepai ro aprop!"
42023022	Pilatus dawos wer ḇerarwan ḇeḇekiorya farosi: "Inja ḇarḇor rosai snonkaku ine ifrur kwarya? Yasma sasar oso roi ḇaḇeri, bemnis kuker samamyai marmari. Inja nari yapreri ma yafaspari."
42023023	Ḇape sibras naba ḇo sedafdifer ḇesya kwar insa ḇyeḇepai ro aprop ma papupesya sefainda.
42023024	Pilatus iwai rasi. Raimnai dawos namuk insa fararyor sedi ḇyeḇeḇuk farosi.
42023025	Ma fyaspar snonkaku ḇesun ro bui snar ḇefrur mbriwer mamun ani imnis raris fararyor sedi, mboi ḇyuk Yesus farosi fa sifrur faroi imnis marisen sedi.
42023026	Rofyor Yesus ḇyeḇeyun ani, siserepen snon oso ḇenirḇe Simon ḇeraker Kireni, ḇeḇe ḇesun ḇe Yerusalem, srir apropya ro erda ḇyesuya, fa ḇyari ḇo iso Yesus.
42023027	Kawasa sibor kaku siso Yesus; rofandu si binsya sibor skanesi.
42023028	Yesus iknenef farosi ma ikofen: "Bin-bin Yerusalem mkoyane, mkokanes awer aya, mboi mkokanes ḇinkun mko, ma romawa mkoḇesi!
42023029	Snar mkomame, nari fafisuya ryama ma sikofen: Aski faro bin ḇepansnasem sya ma ḇeyaḇen romawaḇa ma ḇeyaksasusḇa sya.
42023030	Ma snonkakusya nari sikofen faro bon na; kwamsiser epen inko! ma faro bon na: Kwupoi inko!
42023031	Snar rofyor sifrur rarirya faro ai ḇepek, rosai wer kuker ai ḇemas?"
42023032	Ma sun kako snon ḇese risuru wer, isoine snon ḇarḇor fa susma samamyai marmar fnoḇek Yesus.
42023033	Fafisu srakwar ro moḇ ḇenirḇe Ḇukorbei (Golgota), spai Yesus ro moḇ ani fnoḇek snon ḇarḇor risuru ansu, oso ro ḇar raku ḇyedi ma suminya ro ḇar rasar ḇyedi.
42023034	Yesus ikofen: "O, Mami, buk ampun farosi, snar sifawi rosai sifrur ineḇa." Ma skinsor fa sḇerarwas sansun ḇyena.
42023035	Kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sores rodia ma smam nakam. Manfarkin-manfarkin sya skoryayei, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku ḇesesya fyasparsi, mboi knikine komampan fyaspar mankundiri, rofyor i Wairek ḇekaku Allah kyinfir kwar."
42023036	Rarirya kako sordade-sordadesya skoryayei, ssḇuk anggur ḇemnir faroi
42023037	ma sikofen: "Yahudisya wairek sedi awido, faspar mankundaw!"
42023038	Sfas ro apropya pumya radine: "Ine Yahudisya wairek sedirya."
42023039	Snon ḇarḇor oso spai fnoḇek Yesus, dakonefi, doḇo: "Kristus iso awke? Rarirya ido faspar mankundaw ma nu kako!"
42023040	Ḇape suminya isonek i, ḇo doḇo: "Inja wamkak faro Allah ḇake, mboi kokam kosma samamyai marmari?
42023041	Kukada kusma samamyai snar sasar kufrur na, ḇape snon ine dakfrur sasarḇa."
42023042	Raimnai ikofen: "Yesus, nari waswarepen aya, rofyor wafyafer imnis wairek."
42023043	Yesus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Yakofen kaku faro aw, kaku ḇeri ras ine nari awsya kuker aya ro Firdaus."
42023044	Fafisu ro ras ani indokada oras samfur seser risuru orkok pandaf, ma pampanya ikawef supya fyor ani ḇesiper isof oras kior mandira,
42023045	snar ori isnaiḇa. Ma kruḇen eruk Sim Ḇesren imsawekra ḇyesuru.
42023046	Ma Yesus dor naba: "O, Mami, ro ḇramsu yarir rur ayedi." Ma ikofen rarirya posa, insape imar.
42023047	Rofyor mambri sararya myam roi ḇeḇesya anna, isandik Allah, doḇo: "Kaku, snon ine irya snon ḇenapes!"
42023048	Ma posa kwar ro kawasa ḇeḇor ḇepanjuḇer rodia fa ḇeyakmami, smam rosai ḇeḇesya anna, sibur sfafko mankunsi.
42023049	Snonkakusya kam ḇefawi Yesus fanam sya, ma kako bin-bin ḇesoi ker Galilea, sores ḇinkwan ma smam roi ḇeḇesya anna kam.
42023050	Snon oso snonsnon ḇyedi Yusuf. Snon anine ḇyekina ro Kankain Karkara Ḇeba, kako snon ḇeḇye ma ḇenapes rirya.
42023051	Ḇyesne oserḇa kuker fararur Kankain Karkara sawos namukya. I snon Arimatea ro mnu Yahudi oso ma ikako dakwaf-waf Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
42023052	Rya faro Pilatus ma dor Yesus baken ḇyedi.
42023053	Ma isabu baken ani kwar pyankuni kuker kruḇen mansek (lenan), raimnai ikriri ro ureren spaikir ro urek karui, ro moḇ sikrir ḇemar osoro ḇaim.
42023054	Ras ani ras jumaat, ras Mananai Yahudi fyanam kwar.
42023055	Ma bin-bin ḇeso Yesus ro Galilea mumansya, sakso kako fa sakmam ureren ani fa sifawi moḇ rosai Yesus baken ḇyedi sikriri roya.
42023056	(56a) Ma rofyor sibur kwar, sfasos kefi-kefi ma mani ḇespum. (56b) Ma ras Mananai Yahudi sikam simnai snar sasoser Refo Yahudi,
42024001	ḇape ro ras ari arwo prim kakuya bin ansi sun kefi-kefi sfasos kwar na ḇo sraḇe rus Yesus ḇyani.
42024002	Ma sisma karui ḇesisen rus ani ikris kwar,
42024003	ma ssun kwar ro ureren ani ḇape sisrow Yesus baken ḇyediḇa.
42024004	Fafisu sores sikmom snar roi ḇeḇesya ani, kniko beri snon risuru susansun-sansun ḇesnaper ma suyores fandusi.
42024005	Simkak kaku ma skankunem, ḇape snonkaku ansuya sukofen farosi, ḇo suyoḇo: "Snaro mkosewar ḇekenemya rofandu ḇemarsya?
42024006	Isya ro dineḇa, diḇri kwar. Mkoswarepen rosai ikofen faro mko, rofafisu isya kaker ro Galilea,
42024007	isoine Rumkun Snonkakuya nari sḇoḇi faro snonkaku ḇesasar ma spai ro aprop, ḇape nari diḇri ro ras ḇeḇekiorya."
42024008	Inja siswarepen Yesus wos ikofen ani.
42024009	Ma skaḇer kwar ro rus, sfar nakam faro manfamyan sanfur seser oser ansi ma faro naek ḇesesya kam.
42024010	Bin-bin ansi sisosine Maria, ḇerama ro Magdala, ma Yohana, ma Maria Yakobus snari. Ma bin-bin ḇese ono kako ḇeyaksosi, sḇaryas faro manwawan ansi.
42024011	Ḇape faro manwawan ansi soḇo bin ansi seḇindawsi ma sikyar wos senaḇa.
42024012	Rarirya inja Petrus iyori ma ifrar fasaw ḇerus ani. Fafisu kyankunem ma ikiki mundum, myam kruḇen ḇepankun monda. Raimnai ibur ma iwasen ro sne ḇyedi rosai ḇeḇesya kwarya.
42024013	Ro ras ani kako snon risuru ro Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi suraḇe mnu ḇenirḇe Emaus, swafya indokada mil rifik ro Yerusalem,
42024014	ma sufarfyar ro roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar anna.
42024015	Fafisu suisya suyawawos ma sufuken yayesu, Yesus mankundi ryama isnefer su, ma imbran fnoḇek su.
42024016	Ḇape roi oso isya idwarek sumkasna, isof supok sumamḇaḇir iba.
42024017	Yesus ikofen farosu ḇo doḇo: "Rosai mumbran muyawosya?" Inja sumnai kuker sne ḇefafardun.
42024018	Oso ro su snonsnon ḇyedi Kleopas, kyarem faroi, doḇo: "Awne werer snonkaku amber ḇeramuma babo ḇe Yerusalemke, indiri wakfawi rosai ḇeḇesya rodia ro ras ḇepupes naneḇa?"
42024019	Ifuken su ḇo doḇo: "Rosai ḇeḇesyaya?" Sukarem: "Rosai ḇeḇesya kuker Yesus snon Nazaret. Ima nabi rirya, ḇepoik ro fararur ma wos ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ro ḇarpon er nkoḇesi kam.
42024020	Ḇape mananir-mananir imam ma manfarkin-manfarkin nkoḇesi sḇoḇi fa smuni, isoine spai kwar ro aprop isof imar.
42024021	Mboi ro randakya nkokyar iso nari ḇerama fa ḇefaspar er Israel. Ḇape ras rikior nawas kwar, fafisuya roi ḇeḇesya nane ndarirya.
42024022	Mboi bin ono rofandu nko sifrur kanandor nko: Isnai karkir sraḇe rus ma sisrow Yesus baken ḇyediḇa.
42024023	Raimnai skaḇer ma sikofen ḇo soḇo, mboi smam kwar malaikat ono sikofen farosi, mboi ikenem.
42024024	Ma min nkoḇesi ono sra kwar ḇerus ani, ma sisma kaku raris wos binsya sikofen na, ḇape sakmami ḇa."
42024025	Raimnai Yesus ikofen faro su: "Ne, mko snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa, rariso mkosnemna npakrek, isof mkokyar ḇaḇeri roi ḇeḇor kam nabisya sikofen kwar na!
42024026	Mboi Wairek nari ḇyekandera nabor resari insape syun ro payamyum ḇyedi?"
42024027	Raimnai ikofen fasna faro su rosai sfas kwar ro Refoya, randak ro syap Moses isof syap nabi-nabi syakam.
42024028	Skofanam mnu skorayoḇ ani ma iḇe imbran pdef mararan ḇyedi.
42024029	Ḇape suyembuki, ḇo suyoḇo: "Kwainus nu, snar mandira kwar ma ori fyanam syun." Inja kyainus su.
42024030	Rofyor kyain dananus su, dun mamami ma ikofen kasumasa, raimnai pyefi ma ḇyukna faro su.
42024031	Rofafisu ani sumkasna nbas ma sumam ḇaḇiri, ḇape ipromes bur su.
42024032	Sufuken yaye su: "Mboi kusnesna naryaḇ kaku rofafisu iwawos kuker ku ro nyanya faduri ma rofyor ikofen fasna Refoya maro ku?"
42024033	Inja suyor su ma sukaḇer beri ḇe Yerusalem. Ro diwa susrow manfamyan samfur seser oser ansi. Sisya siryur kam kuker minmin sesi.
42024034	Sikofen: "Kaku ḇeri Manseren diḇri kwar ma fyasna mankundi kwar faro Simon."
42024035	Raimnai snon ansuya kako suyakfarfyar rosai ḇeḇesya kuker su ro nyanya faduri ma rariso sumam ḇaḇiri rofyor pyef mamamiya.
42024036	Ma rofyor sawawos roi ḇeḇesya ani, knikoḇama Yesus dores rofandu sedi ma ikofen farosi: "Aski faro mko!"
42024037	Sikandor ma simkak snar siwarki, soḇo smam rodur oso.
42024038	Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Snaro mkomkak ma rosai eḇedari mkokormararu ro mkosnemna?
42024039	Mkomam ro ḇramin ayesuine ma wemin ayesuine: Mankundayairi; mkopan ro aya insa mkofawi, imnis mkomam ro aya ine, snar rodurya ḇyekraf ma korḇa."
42024040	Ikofen rarirya, ma fyasna ḇramin ḇyesuya ma wemin ḇyesuya farosi.
42024041	Ma fafisu sikyar ḇakaker snar raryaḇ ma kanandor sedi, ikofen farosi: "Roḇean ono naisyake?"
42024042	Inja ssḇuk faroi in ḇesorep ker oser.
42024043	Duni ma dani ḇo smam kam.
42024044	Ikofen farosi: "Ine wos ayedi, yakofen kwar faro mko rofafisu ayaisya fnoḇek mko, isoine mboi roi ḇekur aya na nari namnis kam raris fasfas syap Moses ma syap nabi-nabi ma syap mazmur."
42024045	Raimnai ḇyas swaruser sena, isof sifawi wos Refoya.
42024046	Ikofen farosi: "Fasfas isya radine: Wairek nari ḇyekandera ma nari diḇri fandu ḇemarsya ro ras ḇekiorya.
42024047	Ma kuker snonsnon ḇyedi ḇaryas ḇekur marmar ma ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar nari sḇaryas na faro er-ersya kam, randak ro Yerusalem ine.
42024048	Mko ḇeḇesaksi roi ḇeḇor nane kam.
42024049	Ma nari yafarem faro mko rosai Mami ḇyeasas kwar faro aya. Ḇape nari mko kain waf ro mnu ine isof mkoḇe ḇefasos kuker papoik ro Allah."
42024050	Raimnai Yesus dunsi ḇe mnuya ḇandiri isof sfanam Betania, rodia ḇyeḇoksi.
42024051	Ma fafisu ḇyeḇoksi, ḇyeḇekanow ḇe boiyaswa ma ibursi.
42024052	Skankunem ma sḇansuba faroi, raimnai sibur ḇe Yerusalem kuker raryaḇ ḇeba kaku.
42024053	Sisya ḇesya kwar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma sisandiki.
43001001	Wosya isya ro randakya; Wos ani isya kuker Allah ma Wos ani Allah dirya.
43001002	Wos ani isya kuker Allah ro randakya.
43001003	Roi ḇeḇor nakam i ḇefrur nanya ma rofyor isyaḇa, roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar anna kam napok ndariryaḇa kako.
43001004	Ro i kankenemya isya ma kankenemya ḇyesasna snonkaku.
43001005	Sasna ani isnai ro pampanya, ma pampanya ipokiḇa.
43001006	Allah iwan snonkaku oso fa ryama, snonsnon ḇyedi Yohanes;
43001007	Yohanes ryama imnis saksi fa ḇyesaksi sasna ani, insa snonkakusya kam sikyar.
43001008	Yohanes iso ḇeḇe isnaiyaḇa, ḇape ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ro sasna ani.
43001009	Sasna kakuya, iso ḇeḇeisnai snonkaku oser-oser, ryama ḇe supswan ine.
43001010	Isya kwar ro supswan ine ma iso ḇefrur supswan ine, ḇape supswan ine ssmambaḇiriḇa.
43001011	Ryama faro kawasa ḇyesi, ḇape kawasa ḇyesi simeweri.
43001012	Ḇape snonkaku ḇemarisen ma ḇekyari syakam ḇyuk papoik farosi, insa seromawa Allah ḇyesi.
43001013	Seḇeyaḇen kuker ḇaḇesnonkakuḇa, snar kankenem ḇebaboya ryamuma ro Allah.
43001014	Wosya ḇyesnonkaku kwar, ma ikenem fandu ko, ma komam baba ḇyedi, isoine baba ssḇuk faroi imnis Kmaya Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi, ifo kuker saswar fakamaman ma napnapes.
43001015	Yohanes ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur i ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Snon ine iso yakofen ḇadir ḇo yoḇo: Ḇarpurya ro aya nari oso ryama, ḇape ryama ḇepon kwar ro aya, snar isya kwar rofyor ayaisya ḇaimya."
43001016	Snar ifo kuker saswarya, ma saswar ḇyedi imnaiḇa ma ḇyeḇok ko.
43001017	Snar sasoser Refo Yahudi Moses iso ḇeḇuk nani, ḇape saswar fakamaman ma napnapes ndama ro Yesus Kristus.
43001018	Snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri fa ḇemam Allah kwar; ḇape Allah Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi, ḇemnis kuker kmari ma ḇeroyusi ḇesya kwar, iso ḇefasna Kmaya maḇeko.
43001019	Ma ine ḇaḇesaksi ro Yohanes, fafisu snon Yahudisya ro Yerusalem siwan imam ma snon Lewi ono faroi ma sifukeni: "Manseiso aw?"
43001020	Kyarem ma fyamyun epenḇa, ḇo doḇo: "Aya ine Wairek ḇa."
43001021	Raimnai sifuken faroi: "Au rya ke nabi beramaya?" Kyarem: "Roba!"
43001022	Inja sikofen faroi: "Manseiso aw? Snar nari nkoḇuk kankarem faro ḇewan inkosya. Rosai wakofen fa ḇekur mankundwaya?"
43001023	Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Aya iso nabi Yesaya ikofen kwarya, snonkaku ḇekaru ro sup ḇeursḇa: Mkokarpyom nyan faro Manseren!"
43001024	Ma rofandu snonkaku siwan ansi, snon Farisi ono sisya.
43001025	Sifuken faroi ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor wairek ḇeḇuk koreriya iso awḇa, Elia iso awḇa, ma nabi risawḇa ido, snaro buk masi sren?"
43001026	Yohanes kyarem farosi ḇo doḇo: "Yaḇuk masasi kuker war; ḇape rofandu mko snon oso isya dores ḇo mkofawiḇa,
43001027	isoine i, ḇerapapur ro aya. Yaper kaḇrai ḇefes roi ḇesower ḇyesi, yasyusḇa.
43001028	Roi ḇeḇesya nane ndarirya ro Betania, ro Yordan, ḇar wamurem moḇ Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren roya.
43001029	Ro meserdi Yohanes myam Yesus ryayoḇi ma ikofen: "Mkomam kada Allah Domba Mkun ḇyedi, ḇepyos sasar supswan ine.
43001030	Iso yakofen ani: Nari ḇerapapur aya, ikada pyon aya kwar snar isya kwar rofyor ayaisya ḇaim.
43001031	Ma ayaḇardi randakya yamam ḇaḇiriḇa, ḇape snar i ḇeḇedari yarama yaḇuk masasi kuker war, insa ḇyeḇeḇadir faro Israel."
43001032	Ma Yohanes ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇo doḇo: "Yamam kwar Rurya dado ro nanki imnis manjawa, ma kyain roi.
43001033	Ma aya ine kako yamam ḇaḇiriḇa, ḇape i ḇewan aya fa yaḇuk masi sren kuker war, dawos kwar faro aya: Rofyor mam Rurya dado faro snon oso ma kyain roi, irya nari ḇeḇuk masi sren kuker Rur Ḇesrenya.
43001034	Ma yamami kwar ma yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi: Inekada Allah Rumkun ḇyedirya."
43001035	Ro meserdi Yohanes dores wer rodia kuker manfamyan risuru ḇyesui.
43001036	Ma fafisu myam Yesus dunuk, ikofen: "Mkomamkada Allah domba Mkun ḇyedi!"
43001037	Manfamyan ansuya sumnaf rosai ikofen kwar, inja sura suso Yesus.
43001038	Ḇape Yesus iknenef ḇe ḇarpur, myam susoi inja ikofen faro su, ḇo doḇo: "Rosai musewarya?" Sukofen faroi: "Rabi (isoine guru), moḇ rosai kwain roya?"
43001039	Ikofen faro su: "Muramuma nari mankun mumame." Susoi ma suyakmam moḇ rosai kyon roya, ma ro ras ani sukain fnoḇeki; fafisu ani indokada oras fiak mandira.
43001040	Oso rofandu su ḇemnaf Yohanes wos ḇyedi ma ḇeso Yesus snonsnon ḇyedi Andreas, Simon Petrus ḇedar ḇyedirya.
43001041	Andreas isrow Simon, naek ḇyedi ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Nkosrow kwar Wairek ḇeyun koreri." (Wairek) isoine Kristus.
43001042	Duni faro Yesus, Yesus myami ma ikofen: "Au Simon, Yohanes romawa ḇyedi, nari snir awḇe Kefas (isoine Petrus = Karui bosen)."
43001043	Ro meserdi, Yesus kyara namuk fa ryaḇe Galilea, isrow kuker Filipus ma ikofen faroi: "Waso aya!"
43001044	Filipus mnu ḇyedi Betsaida, Andreas ma Petrus mnu suḇedi.
43001045	Filipus isrow Natanael ma ikofen faroi: "Nkosrow i kwar, Moses ikofen ro Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi-nabi ansya isoine Yesus, Yusuf romawa ḇyedi ro Nazaret."
43001046	Natanael ikofen faroi: "Inja roi ḇeḇye oso nari ryama ro Nazaretke?"
43001047	Filipus ikofen faroi: "Rwama ma wakmam!" Yesus myam Natanael ryamuma yoḇi, inja ikofen: "Mkomam inekada snon Israel kraf oso, kosma ankarkar roiḇa!"
43001048	Natanael ikofen faroi: "Mambaḇir aya rariso?" Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor Filipus dor aw ḇaim, yamam kwain ro ara knamya baḇdi."
43001049	Natanael ikofen faroi: "Guru, Allah Rumkun ḇyedi iso au, ma kawasa Israel wairek sediso au!"
43001050	Yesus kyarem: "Snar yakofen faro au; yamam aw ro ara knamya fuarya eḇedari wakyar ya? Nari mam roi ḇeḇor ḇesyadi wer ro ine."
43001051	Raimnai Yesus ikofen wer faroi: "Yakofen faro aw, kaku ḇeri nari mam nanki ḇyas ma Allah malaikat-malaikat ḇyesi sado sek faro Rumkun Snonkakuya."
43002001	Ro ras ḇeḇekiorya munara fakawiwin oso isya ḇyeḇefrur ro mnu Kana sup Galilea, ma Yesus snari isya rodia;
43002002	Yesus ma manfamyan ḇyesi sakposi kako ro munara fakawawin ani.
43002003	Rofyor anggur sesi siḇro, Yesus snari ikofen faroi: "Anggur sesya siḇro."
43002004	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Awine rosai wamarisen ro aya? Fafisu yedi ryama ḇaim."
43002005	Inja snari ikofen faro ḇeyuffarmyansya: "Rosai ikofen faro mko, mko frurna!"
43002006	Rodia babewu riwonem naisya sfasos na faro ḇanḇan imnis rari kawasa Yahudi, oser-oser iser fyom risuru oroḇa kior.
43002007	Yesus ikofen faro ḇeyuffarmyan ansi: "Mkoser babewu nane rao nafo kuker war." Ma siser narao nafo.
43002008	Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Knikine mko nawna ma mkun faro manfarkin munaraya."
43002009	Manfarkin munara ani ryepen war ani kwar, ḇefawnai kwar ḇe anggur ani ma ifawiḇa anggur ansi srama kero, ḇape ḇeyuffarmyan, ḇenaw war ani, ḇefawiya dor manfakawin snonya,
43002010	ma ikofen faroi: "Imnis raris rari Yahudi, snonkakusya ssḇuk anggur ḇeḇye resari isof kawasasya sinem rao sisyopen, insape ssḇuk anggur ḇeḇye mankunba; ḇape wakram anggur ḇeḇesya isof knikine."
43002011	Ine aḇyair kanandor ḇepon Yesus ifrur ro Kana sup Galilea, ma kuker aḇyair ine fyasna baba ḇyedi. Inja manfamyan ḇyesi sikyar faroi.
43002012	Raimnai Yesus ryaḇe Kapernaum fnoḇek snari ma naek ḇyesi ma manfamyan ḇyesi, ma skain rodia ḇe ras riḇeso monda.
43002013	Fafisu ras munara Paskah kawasa Yahudi fyanam kwar, Yesus dekḇe Yerusalem.
43002014	Ro Allah Rum ḇyedi manfarḇyan sapi, kambing, domba ma manjawa, ma ḇesadwer pipi skain rodia.
43002015	Inja pyar kaḇrai baken osoḇe ayos, raimnai ḇyuki iyaw sikam ro Allah Rum ḇyedi kuker kambing-domba ma sapi sesi; pipi ḇesadwer isbawer si ḇo pyambar meja-meja sena.
43002016	Faro manfarḇyan manjawasya ikofen: "Mkun roi ḇeḇor nanekam bur moḇ ine, mkofrur Mami rum ḇyedi awer ḇe moḇ ḇefarḇyan."
43002017	Inja manfamyan ḇyesi siswar smai fasfas ḇeyoḇo: "Saswar ayedi faro rum bedi, O Allah, ifrur dosam imnis for ḇekun."
43002018	Kawasa Yahudi sisampum Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Aḇyair rosai fasna maro nko, mboi wasma papoik fa wafrur rarirya?"
43002019	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mkokakok Allah Rum ḇyedine kada, ma ro ras rikior nari yaḇawes i wer."
43002020	Raimnai kawasa Yahudi sikofen faroi: "Wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak seser riwonem Allah Rum ḇyedine snonkaku sḇawesi ma au nari ḇeḇawesi ro ras rikioryake?"
43002021	Ḇape roi dawos sarḇer kuker Allah Rum ḇyedi, isoine mankundi baken ḇyedi.
43002022	Ḇarpurya, rofafisu diḇri ro fandu ḇemarsya, insape manfamyan ḇyesi siswarepen roi ḇeḇesya ani ikofeni kwar, ma sikyar fasfas Refo ma Yesus wos ikofen ani kwar.
43002023	Ma fafisu isya ro Yerusalem, fyor munara ḇeba Paskahya, kawasa sibor sikyar faroi snar smam aḇyair ifrur kwar na.
43002024	Ḇape Yesus mankundi ikyar siḇa, snar myamkir sikam,
43002025	ma fandun fa snonkaku oso ikofen faroi, ro manseirya wer kako snar myamkir rosai isya ro snonkaku sisnes na.
43003001	Snon farisi oso snonsnon ḇyedi Nikodemus, snon manfarkin ro agama Yahudi.
43003002	Roḇ oso ryama faro Yesus ma ikofen: "Rabi, nkofawi, mboi rwama imnis Guru Allah wawan ḇyedi; snar snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri fa ifrur aḇyair-aḇyair wafrur nane, rofyor Allah ifnoḇeki ḇa."
43003003	Yesus kyarem, doḇo: "Yakofen faro aw, kaku ḇeri rofyor snonkakuyo ḇyeḇeyaḇen kaḇer werḇa, ipok myam Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyediḇa."
43003004	Nikodemus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Rariso nari saḇen snon oso, rofyor ḇyemansar kwar? Inja, nari syun wer ro snari sneyuser ḇyena ma ḇyeḇeyaḇen werke?"
43003005	Yesus kyarem: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro au, rofyor snon oso ḇyeḇeyaḇen kuker war ma Rurya ḇa ipok daksun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyediḇa.
43003006	Rosai saḇen ro krafya, kraf rirya, ma rosai saḇen ro Rurya, Rur rirya.
43003007	Wakandor awer, snar yakofen faro aw: Nari mkoḇe ḇeyaḇen wer.
43003008	Wamya iso ḇemoḇ imarisen, ma wamnaf rakrokya, ḇape wafawi moḇ ryamuma royaḇa, roḇaido moḇ iḇe isoyoḇya ḇa. Rarirya kuker snonkaku ḇeyaḇen ro Allah Rur ḇyedi."
43003009	Nikodemus kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Rariso nari roi ḇeḇesya ani ryarirya?"
43003010	Yesus kyarem, doḇo: "Aw guru ro Israel, insape woḇe wafawiḇa?
43003011	Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro aw, nkowawos ro roi inkofawi ma nkoḇe saksi ro roi nkomam, ḇape mkomewer ḇaḇesaksi nkoḇena.
43003012	Mkokyarḇa, rofyor yawawos kuker mko ro roi ḇero supswan ine, rariso nari mkokyar, rofyor yawawos kuker mko ro roi ḇero boiyaswa?
43003013	Snon oso ḇaḇeri ḇeyek kwar ḇe boiyaswa, mboi i ḇeyado kwar ro boiyaswa, isoine Rumkun Snonkakuya.
43003014	Ma imnis kuker Moses kyaf ikak kansai ro ai oso ro sup ḇeursḇa, rarirya kako Rumkun Snonkakuya nari skafi ro apropya,
43003015	insa snonkaku ḇekyar faroi sisma koreri ḇekain fyoroya.
43003016	Snar Allah saswar ḇyedi ibabos faro supswan ine, isof ḇyuk kwar Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi, insa snonkaku ḇekyar faroi sya sroḇa, mboi sisma koreri.
43003017	Snar Allah iwan Rumkun ḇyedi fa ḇyuk samamyai faro supswan ineḇa, mboi insa fyaspari.
43003018	Mansei ḇekyar faroi, nari sisma samamyaiḇa; ḇape mansei ḇekyarḇa, isya ro samamyaiya kwar, snar ikyar faro Allah Rumkun Mandos ḇyedi snonsnon ḇyediḇa.
43003019	Ma samamyaiya isoine: Isnaya ryafes kwar ḇe supswan ine, ḇape snonkakusya simarisen syadi pampanya ro isnaya, snar fararur sena naḇarḇor.
43003020	Snar mansei ḇefrur ḇarḇor, dayin isna ani ma rya faro isnai aniḇa, insa fararur ḇarḇor ḇyena nbayir awer;
43003021	ḇape mansei ḇefrur roi ḇenapes, rya faro isnaya, insa ḇyeḇefasna ḇayir, mboi rosai ifrur na namnis kuker Allah marisen ḇyedi."
43003022	Raimnai Yesus rya kuker manfamyan ḇyesi ḇe sup Yudea ma kyain rodiwa fnoḇeksi ma ḇyuk masi sren.
43003023	Ḇape Yohanes kako dakḇuk masi sren ro Ainon, fanam Salim, snar rodia war na nabor, ma snonkaku sibor sisrow ro dia fa ḇyuk masi sren farosi,
43003024	snar rofyor ani Yohanes ḇyeḇesun ro bui ḇaim.
43003025	Mboi rofafisu ani Yohanes manfamyan ḇyesi sfamfaḇri kuker snon Yahudi oso kuker mnuk fasasren.
43003026	Inja sra faro Yohanes ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rabi, snon ḇefnoḇek kuker aw ro war Yordan ḇariwara ma faroi buk ḇaḇesaksi kwar, dakḇuk masi sren kako ma kawasa syakam sra faroi."
43003027	Yohanes kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ḇeyun faro mankundi, rofyor neḇeḇuk faroi ro boiyaswaḇa.
43003028	Mankun mko mkoḇesaksi, mboi yakofen kwar: Aya ine Wairek ḇa, ḇape siwan aya fa yaponi.
43003029	Ḇena ḇinfakawinya, isoine manfakawinya; ḇape manfakawinya bati ḇyesi ḇeyores fanami ma ḇemnafi, siryaḇ fafayaḇa, snar simnaf mkaren ro manfakawin ani. Irya raryaḇ ayedi iba.
43003030	Ikada nari iba syadi, ḇape ayakada nari yabaḇa syadi.
43003031	Mansei ḇeraker boiyaswa isyadi ro nakam; mansei ḇeḇe knam ro supswan ine, i snonkaku ro supswan ine ma dawawos ro wos supswan. Mansei ḇeraker boiyaswa, ikada isyadi ro nakam.
43003032	Ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ro roi myam na ma roi imnaf na, ḇape snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri ikyar ḇaḇesaksi ḇyena.
43003033	Mansei ḇekyar ḇaḇesaksi ḇyena, ikada kyarem, mboi Allah inapes.
43003034	Snar mansei Allah iwan ani, iso ḇeḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, snar Allah ḇyuk Rur ḇyedi ḇesiper faroi.
43003035	Kmaya iswar Rumkunya ma ḇyuk roi ḇeḇor nakam faroi kwar.
43003036	Mansei ḇekyar faro Rumkunya, isma kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, ḇape mansei ḇeḇeuser Rumkunya ḇa, ipok isma koreriḇa, mboi Allah masasor ḇyedi kyuri ḇesya kwar."
43004001	Rofyor Manseren Yesus ifawi, snon Farisisya simnaf kwar, mboi Yesus isma ma ḇyuk masi sren faro manfamyan sibor syadi wer ro Yohanes --
43004002	mboi Yesus mankundi ḇeḇuk masi sren yaḇa, mboi manfamyan ḇyesi, --
43004003	Inja ibur Yudea ma kyaḇer ḇe Galilea.
43004004	Nari iḇe dunuk ro sup Samaria.
43004005	Ma ryama ro mnu oso ro Samaria, ḇenirḇe Sikhar fanam saprop ḇepon iwara Yakub ḇyuk faro romawa ḇyedi, Yusuf.
43004006	War ḇeyer Yakub isya rodia. Yesus imor kaku ro mararan ani, inja kyain ro war ḇeyer ani andiirya. Ras ani indokada oras samfur seser risuru.
43004007	Snar manfamyan ḇyesi sra kwar ḇe mnuya fa skoḇes roḇean.
43004008	Ḇarpurya bin Samaria oso ryama dukeḇ war. Yesus ikofen faroi: "Buk waroma yinem kada."
43004009	Ma bin Samaria ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Inja aw, snon Yahudi, ḇesyaḇo wor war ro aya, bin Samaria?" (snar kawasa Yahudi sikenemso Samariasya ḇa.)
43004010	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor wafawi Allah fakamama ḇyedi ma mansei ḇeyor faro aw: Buk waroma yinem! Nari wor kwar roi fa ḇyuk kwar faro aw war ḇekenemya."
43004011	Bin ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, wasma papos osoḇa ma war ḇeyer ine ikakibos; ro moḇ rosai wasma war ḇekenemya roya?
43004012	Inja waba syadi ro kma nkoḇedi Yakub, ḇeḇuk war ḇeyer ine maro nko ma mankundi dakinem roi kako, kuker romawa ḇyesi ma rofanfan ḇyesi?"
43004013	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Mansei ḇeyinem war ine, nari imbrow wer,
43004014	ḇape mansei ḇeyinem ro war nari yaḇuk faroi, ipok imbrow wer ḇa isof fyoro. Isyadi wer war nari yaḇuk faroi, nari ḇyewar ḇeryuḇer ro kankenem ḇyedi, ma isof kankenem ḇekain fyoroya."
43004015	Bin ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, bukma ḇe aya war ani, insa yambrow werḇa ma yarama yukeḇ war ro dine werḇa."
43004016	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rwamura, wor swambri ḇo mukaḇer muma rodine."
43004017	Bin ani ikofen faroi ḇo doḇo: "Ayama yana swa osoḇa." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wos bedi kyakubos beri, mboi wasma swayoḇa,
43004018	snar nwa swari rim kwar ma ḇeroyus aw ro baboine, ikada swabediryaḇa."
43004019	Bin ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, insape yafawi aw nabi oso.
43004020	Kpu nkoḇesi sisyom Allah ro bon ine bori, ḇape er besi sikofen ḇo soḇo, kosyom Allah monda ro Yerusalem."
43004021	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Bin awne wakyar faro aya, fafisuya nari ryama, mboi nari mkosyom Allah ro bon ineḇa, ma ro Yerusalemḇa kako.
43004022	Mkosyom rosai mkomam ḇaḇirḇa, nkokada nkosyom rosai nkomam ḇaḇir, snar korerya ryama ro er Yahudi.
43004023	Ḇape fafisuya nari ryama ma ryama kwar, mboi ḇesyom kuker napnapes nari siyom Kmaya kuker Rur ma napnapes; snar Kmaya imarisen samsyom ḇerarirya.
43004024	Allah Rur rirya ma mansei ḇesyomi nari, sisyomi kuker Rur ma napnapes."
43004025	Bin ani kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawi, nari Wairek ryama, sniri kako ḇe Kristus; rofyor ryama kwar, nari ḇyaryas roi ḇeḇor nanekam maro nko."
43004026	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Aya iso wawos kukerya."
43004027	Rofyor ani manfamyan ḇyesi srama ma sikandor, mboi isya dawawos kuker bin oso. Ḇape oso rofandusi ifuken ḇaḇeri faro bin ani: "Rosai wamarisenya? Roḇaido: Ḇefuken Yesus, snaro wawawos kuker bin ani?"
43004028	Rarirya bin ani ibur babewu ḇyedi rodia ma ryaḇe mnu ma ikofen faro snonkaku ḇero mnuya ansi:
43004029	"Mkorama, mkakmam snonkaku oser isya ikofen ḇadir faro aya ro roi ḇeḇor yafrur kwar nakam. Imbude Kristus iryake?"
43004030	Inja snonkakusya sisasyarbur mnu ani fa sisrow Yesus.
43004031	Ro fafisu ani manfamyan ḇyesi sidifi, ḇo soḇo: "Guru, wanan."
43004032	Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Faro aya roḇean naisya mkomambaḇir naba."
43004033	Inja manfamyan ansi sawos yaye farosi: "Imbude snonkaku ono sun roḇean ono fa dan kwarke?"
43004034	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Roḇean ayena isoine yafrur marisen ḇewan ayanya ma yaḇeimnis fararur ḇyuk ḇe ayanya.
43004035	Mboi mkokofen ḇo mkoḇo: Paik rifiak wer fafisu afufyake? Ḇape yakofen faro mko: Mkomam kada yaf na nambrai kwar fa neḇeyuf.
43004036	Snonkaku ḇeyufsya sisma sasuref sedi kwar ma sfanjur bon faro kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, isof ḇekekef ma ḇeyufsya sikam simarisen.
43004037	Wos sarḇer ine kyaku isoine: Ono sḇuḇer mboi ono ḇese suf.
43004038	Yawan mko fa mkuf roi mkoker ḇa; snonkaku ḇese sesasewar mboi mkorama mkuf bon ro sasewar sena."
43004039	Ma kawasa Samaria sibor ro mnu ani sikyar kwar faroi snar bin ani wos ḇyena, ḇeḇesaksi: "Ikofen ḇadir faro aya roi ḇeḇor yafrur kwar nakam."
43004040	Fafisu snonkaku Samaria ansi srafa sisrow Yesus, sor faroi insa ryowus si; ma ryowus si rodia ḇe ras risuru.
43004041	Ma snonkaku sibor syadi wer ḇekyar snar wos ḇyena,
43004042	ma sikofen faro bin ani: "Nkokyar, snar wos ḇena wer ḇa mboi snar mankun inko, nkomnaf kwar roi ma nkofawi, mboi kaku ḇeri i ḇeḇuk koreri faro supswan ine."
43004043	Ma ras risuru susyonde ro Sikhar, Yesus ryaḇe Galilea,
43004044	snar Yesus mankundi myam kwar, mboi nabi oso sesyowi i ḇa ro mankundi mnu ḇyedi.
43004045	Ma rofyor ryama kwar ro Galilea, kawasa Galilea siwafi, snar smam roi ḇeḇor kam ifrur kwar ro Yerusalem ro munara ani, snar sikako sakso munara ani.
43004046	Inja Yesus kyaḇer wer ḇe Kana ro Galilea, ro moḇ ifrur warna fa neanggur ani. Ma ro Kapernaum manfyan wairek oso romawa ḇyedi iduf.
43004047	Fafisu imnaf, mboi Yesus ryama ker Yudea kwar ro Galilea, rya isrowi ma dor, insa ryama ma ḇyuk pararei faro romawa ḇyedi, snar romawa ḇyedi iduf marḇak.
43004048	Inja Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rofyor mkomam aḇyair kanandor ḇa, nari mkokyarḇa.
43004049	Manfyan warek ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rwama rofyor romawa ayedi imar ḇaim kada."
43004050	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rwamura, romawa bani ikenem!" Snon ani ikyar wos Yesus ikofen faroi ani, inja ryaḇeri.
43004051	Fafisu isya kaker ro nyanya faduri manfyan ḇyesi srama sisrowi ma sikofen faroi, mboi romawa ḇyedi iprei.
43004052	Ikofen farosi oras rifis romawa ani ipreiya. Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Mandoḇinja orkokya oras oser samsam ḇyedi imnai."
43004053	Rarirya sinan ani iswarepen, mboi rofafisu aniso Yesus ikofen faroi: "Romawa bani iprei." Rarirya i kuker kina ḇyesi sikyar faro Yesus.
43004054	Ine aḇyair kanandor ḇeḇesuru Yesus ifrur ro fafisu iburker Yudea ḇe Galilea.
43005001	Raimnai Yahudisya ras ḇeba sedi fyanam, inja Yesus dekḇe Yerusalem.
43005002	Ro Yerusalem fanam "Kedwai Ḇeba Domba" sawon oso isya, ro wos Ibrani sniriḇe Betesda; ḇye aḇdares ririm
43005003	ma ro abdares anna kawasa ḇeduf sibor kaku sḇarek ro na: isoine snonkaku ḇepraf, ḇeyapaper ma snonkaku ḇepapipen, ḇewaf sawon ani irḇaren.
43005004	Snar rofafisu ono Manseren malaikat ḇyedi dado ro sawon ani fa irḇaren war ani; ma mansei ḇesabu ḇepon ro war ani ro fafisu irḇaren kwarya, ikada iprei ro dafduf rosairya wer.
43005005	Rodia snon oso isya iduf ḇewampasi wambarek samfur rikior seser war kwar.
43005006	Rofyor Yesus myam snon ani ḇyarek rodia ma snar Yesus ifawi, mboi iduf fyoro kwar, inja Yesus ifuken faroi: "Wamarisen fa wapreike?"
43005007	Snon ḇeduf ani ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, yana snonkakuyo rodineḇa fa ḇesabu aya ḇe sawon ani rofyor warya irḇarenya, ma rofyor yara ḇe sawon ani, snonkaku ḇese sisabu ḇepon aya kwar."
43005008	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wakḇoke, wakanow yar ḇena ma wambrane."
43005009	Ma rofafisu ani beri snon ani iprei inja ikanow yar ḇyena ma imbrane. Fafisu ani ras Mananai Yahudi rirya.
43005010	Inja snonkaku Yahudisya sikofen faro snon ḇeprei babo ani: "Ras ine ras Mananai Yahudi inja wapok ḇar yar benaḇa."
43005011	Ḇape kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ḇeḇuk pararei maro aya kwarya, iso ḇekofen maro aya: wakanow yar ḇena ḇo wambrane."
43005012	Sifuken faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Snon manseiso ḇekofen faro aw: Wakanow yar ḇena ma wambranya?"
43005013	Ḇape snon ḇeprei babo ani ifawi mansei ḇeḇesyan yaba, snar Yesus syun ro fadu snonkaku ḇeḇor ro mob ani.
43005014	Ḇarpurya Yesus isrowi ro Allah Rum ḇyedi dori inja ikofen faroi: "Waprei kwar; wafrur sasar wer awer, imbude roi ḇeḇyeḇa syadi nkur aw wer ri."
43005015	Snon ani isasyar ma fyar faro kawasa Yahudisya, mboi Yesus iso ḇeḇuk pararei faroi kwarya.
43005016	Ma eḇedari kawasa Yahudisya sesasewar fa siḇe sewayam Yesus, snar ifrur roi ḇeḇor anna ro ras Mananai Yahudi.
43005017	Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Mami ifararur isof ras ine, inja aya kako yakfararur."
43005018	Inja kawasa Yahudisya sesasewar syadi wer insa smuni, snar ifararur ro ras Mananai Yahudiya derer ḇa, ḇape snar dap Allah ḇe kma ḇyedi, rarirya dow mankundi fa imnis kuker Allah.
43005019	Inja Yesus kyarem farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, Rumkunya nari ifrur royo ro mankundi ḇa, ikada ifrur monda rosai myam ro Kmari ifrur na; snar rosai Kmaya ifrurna, naiso Rumkunya dakfrurna.
43005020	Snar Kmaya iswar Rumkunya inja fyasna faroi roi ḇeḇor kam ifrur ro mankundi, mboi nari fyasna faroi fararur-fararur ḇeba syadi wer ro fararur-fararur anna, isof mkokandor.
43005021	Snar imnis raris Kmaya ḇyawes snonkaku ḇemarsya ma ḇyuk fa sikenem, rarirya kako Rumkunya dakḇuk kankenem faro mansei imarisenya.
43005022	Kmaya ḇyemankara oso ḇaḇeri, mboi ḇyuk kwar ḇaḇemankara ani ḇesiper faro Rumkunya,
43005023	insa kawasa kam sesyowi Rumkunya imnis raris moḇ sesyowi faro Kmaya. Mansei ḇeḇesyowi Rumkunya ḇa, ikako ḇyesyowi Kma ḇewani yaḇa.
43005024	Yakofen faro mko: "Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇerower wos ayena ma ikyar faro ḇewan ayanya, isma kankenem ḇemnaiḇa ma dakso samamyaiya ḇa, snar ikfisbur marmarya kwar ḇe kankenemya.
43005025	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri fafisuya nari isyama ma ryama kwar, mboi snonkaku ḇemarsya simnaf Allah Rumkun ḇyedi mkarenya, ma ḇemnafi sya, nari sikenem.
43005026	Snar imnis raris Mami isma kankenemya ro mankundi, rarirya ḇyuk faro Rumkunya fa daksma kankenemya ro mankundi kako.
43005027	Ma ḇyuk kwar papoik faroi fa ḇyuk mankara, snar i Rumkun Snonkaku rirya.
43005028	Mkokandor awer roi ḇeḇesya nane, snar fafisu ḇyedi nari ryama, mboi snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇero ureren na dona nari simnaf mkaren ḇyedi,
43005029	ma faro ḇefrur mnis sya nari siḇersi ro ureren na faro kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, ḇape faro ḇeḇarḇorsya nari siḇersi fa sisma samamyai."
43005030	"Mankundaya ḇardi yafrur royoḇa; yaḇe mankara imnis kuker rosai yamnaf na, ma ḇaḇemankara yena nanapes, snar yaso marisen ayena ḇa, mboi marisen ro Kma bewan ayanya.
43005031	Rofyor yaḇe saksi ro roi ḇekur mankundaya, rarirya ḇaḇesaksi yena nanapesḇa;
43005032	ono ḇese sisya sesaksi ro roi ḇekur aya ma yafawi ḇaḇesaksi ssḇuk fa ḇekur aya mboi nanapes.
43005033	Mkofarem wawansya kwar faro Yohanes ma ḇyesaksi kwar ro nanapes;
43005034	ḇape yaḇefandun ḇaḇesaksi ro snonkakuḇa, mboi yakofen roi ḇeḇesya ani, insa mkosma koreri.
43005035	Yohanes imnis paramrom ḇesak ma ḇesnai ma mkokada mkomarisen knik monda sasnai ḇyedi.
43005036	Ḇape ḇaḇesaksi ayedi iba syadi ro ḇaḇesaksi Yohanes, isoine fararur ḇeḇor Mami ḇyuk maḇe Aya, insa yafrur na. Fararur ani kako iso yafrur kwar ine, ma iso ḇefasnai aya, mboi Mami iso ḇewan Aya.
43005037	Mami ḇewan Aya, iso ḇeḇuk saksi ro Aya. Mkopok mkomnaf mkaren ḇyediḇa, moḇ isnai raya kako mkopok fa mkomami ḇa,
43005038	ma wos ḇyena mkadu na ro mkosnemna ḇa, snar mkokyar faro wawan ani ḇa isoine ayaḇa.
43005039	Mkokukeḇ Refo, snar mkokara mkoḇe, mboi kuker i nari mkosma kankenem ḇemnaiḇa, ḇape Refoya ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ro Aya,
43005040	rarirya mkomewer mkorama faro aya fa mkosma kankenem ani.
43005041	Yafandun ḇa kuker samsyom ro snonkaku.
43005042	Ḇape faro mko, yafawi mboi ro mkosnemna mkona saswar faro Allah ḇa.
43005043	Yarama kuker snonsnon ro Mami ḇape mkofandun ayaḇa; rofyor snonkaku ḇese srama kuker snonsnon sena, nari mkomarisen si.
43005044	Nari mkokyar rariso, ne, mko ḇesewar sanandik ro snonkaku ḇese ma ḇesewar syom ḇerama ker Allah oser bakenya ḇa?
43005045	Mkokara awer nari yaḇuk sof mko ro ḇarpon Mami; ḇeḇuksof faro mkoya iso Moses, mkokyar ani.
43005046	Snar rofyor mkokyar faro Moses, rarirya nari mkokyar faro Aya, snar roi fyasna nkur Aya.
43005047	Ḇape rofyor mkokyar roi fyasna ḇa rariso nari mkokyar rosai yakofen na?"
43006001	Raimnai Yesus imbran ḇe danosen Galilea ḇar iwara, isoine danosen Tiberias.
43006002	Kawasa ḇeḇor semarani ḇo sisoi, snar smam aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor ḇeḇuk parare, ifrur faro snonkaku ḇedufsi.
43006003	Ma Yesus dek urek oso ma kyain rodia kuker manfamyan ḇyesi.
43006004	Ma Paskah, ras ḇeba kawasa Yahudi, fyanam kwar.
43006005	Fafisu Yesus myam yaryari, myam snonkaku sibor semarani ḇo srama yoḇi, inja ikofen faro Filipus: "Romoḇ rosai nari kokoḇes mamami roya, insa kawasa sine san?"
43006006	Yesus ikofen rarirya snar imarisen imnasen Filipus, snar mankundi ifawi kwar, rosai nari ifrurya.
43006007	Filipus kyaren ḇo doḇo: "Mamami ḇeḇemaeja kumpan sarak utin risuru kakoyo, nari namnis farosi ḇa."
43006008	Snon oso ro manfamyan ḇyesi, isoine Andreas, Simon Petrus naek ḇyedi, ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo:
43006009	"Rodine romawa oso isya, nya mamami ririm ma in risuru; ḇape ndarirya ḇo nari namnis snonkaku ḇeḇor sine?"
43006010	Yesus ikofen: "Mkowansi fa skain." Ro moḇ ani aḇris sibor, inja snonkaku ansi skain, barbor sedi indokada snon syaran ririm.
43006011	Raimnai Yesus dun mamami anna, ma ikofen kasumasa faro Allah. Posa kwar ḇyerarwas na farosi, rarirya kako in ansuya, ma san rao isof sisyopen.
43006012	Ma rofyor sarbor kwar ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mkoryur mamami kerker ḇesyadi na, insa sisawen awer na."
43006013	Inja siryur inoken samfur seser risuru nafo kuker roḇean ḇesyadi ro mamami ririm snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi san na.
43006014	Fafisu snonkaku ansi smam aḇyair kanandor ifrur kwar ani, sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Kaku ḇeri inekada nabi nari ḇerama ḇe supswan ine."
43006015	Snar Yesus ifawi, siḇe srama fa sidifi insa ḇye wairek farosi. Inja isusu bursi ḇe urek.
43006016	Ma fafisu fyanam roḇ kwar, Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sraḇe danosen, ma sek ro wai
43006017	ma sunuk ḇe Kapernaum. Fafisu pyampan kwar Yesus ryama ḇaim kaker fa isrowsi,
43006018	mboi sorenya ikroḇ snar wamya ipok.
43006019	Skoḇores indokada kilometer risuru kior kwar, skomam Yesus imbran ro warya bori muma fanam wai ani. Inja skomkak kaku.
43006020	Ḇape ikofen farosi: "Aya irya, mkomkak awer!"
43006021	Simarisen fa dek ro waiya, ma rofafisu ani beri kako wai ani ifyafer ro moḇ skorayoḇya.
43006022	Ro meserdi kawasa ḇeḇor ḇekain ro danosenya ḇar iwara ansi, sifawi insanja wai oser monda rodia ma Yesus iso manfamyan ḇyesi ḇa, ḇoi serer siso ḇesyoḇsya.
43006023	Ḇape rofafisu ani wai ono ndama ker Tiberias napyar fanam moḇ san mamami ro ani, posa ro Yesus ikofen kasumasa kuker roḇean anna.
43006024	Fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi smam, mboi Yesus isya ro diaḇa ma manfamyan ḇyesi kako roḇa, sek ro wai anyaḇo sisyoḇ ḇe Kapernaum fa ssewar Yesus.
43006025	Fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sisrow Yesus ro danosenya ḇar iwara, sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rabi, fafisu rosai rwama ro dineya?"
43006026	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, mkosewar aya, snar mkomam aḇyair kanandor yafrur naba ḇoi snar mkan mamami rao mkosyopen.
43006027	Mkofararur, faro roḇean nari ḇero na awer, mboi faro roḇean ḇekain fyoro faro kenkenem ḇemnai ḇaya kada, nari Rumkun Snonkaku ḇyuk faro mko; snar iso Mami ḇyeasas kwar, isoine Allah."
43006028	Raimnai sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rosaiso nari nkofrurya, insa nkofrur Allah roi imarisen na?"
43006029	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Allah fararur imarisenya, isoine iḇye syadi mkokyar faro Allah wawan iwan kwarya."
43006030	Inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Aḇyair rosai wafrurya, insa nkomami ma nkokyar faro au? Fararur rosai nari wafrurya?
43006031	Kpu nkoḇesi san manna kwar ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa, imnis fasfas oso isya ro Refo: ssḇuk farosi fa san mamami ḇeraker boiyaswa."
43006032	Inja Yesus ikofen farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, Moses i ḇeḇuk mamami faro mko ro boiyaswa yaḇa, mboi Kma yedi ḇeḇuk faro mko mamami ḇekaku ro boiyaswa.
43006033	Snar mamami ḇeraker Allah irya mamami ḇesabu ro boiyaswa ma ḇeḇuk kankenem faro supswan."
43006034	Inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Manseren, buk maḇe nko ḇesya kwar mamami ani."
43006035	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Aya ine mamami ḇeḇuk kankenem; mansei ḇerama faro aya, nari ipok ibiser werḇa, ma mansei ḇekyar faro aya, ipok imbruw werḇa.
43006036	Ḇape yakofen faro mko kwar: Kaku ḇeri mkomam aya kwar, ḇape mkokyar ḇa.
43006037	Roi ḇeḇor kam Mami ḇyuk faro aya, nakam nari ndama faro aya, ma mansei nari ḇerama faro aya, nari yasaweni ḇa.
43006038	Snar ayai ḇesabu kwar ro boiyaswa, insa yafrur marisen ayena ḇa, ḇape yaḇeuser Allah marisen ḇyena ḇewan aya kwar.
43006039	Ma Allah ḇewan aya marisen ḇyedi, isoine insa snonkaku ḇeḇor kam ḇyuk faro aya kwar ono sro awer, ḇape insa yaḇawes si wer ro ras ḇepupesya.
43006040	Snar Mami marisen ḇyedi ryadine, isoine insa snonkaku oser-oser ḇemam Rumkunya, ma ḇekyar faroi, sisma kankenem ḇekain fyoro, ma insa yaḇawes si ro ras ḇepupesya."
43006041	Inja kawasa Yahudisya suremi snar ikofen kwar: "Aya ine mamami ḇesabu ro boiyaswa."
43006042	Sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Mboi inenido Yesus iryake, Yusuf mandaḇendi, snar kma ma sna ḇyesu kofawi su? Rariso ikofen, ḇo doḇo: Aya ine yasabu ker boiyaswa?"
43006043	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mkurem awer."
43006044	Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ryama faro aya, rofyor Mami ḇewan aya duni maro aya, ma nari yaḇawesi ro ras papupesya.
43006045	Fasfas isya ro syap nabi-nabi ḇerok radine: Ma sikam nari Allah fyarkorsi. Ma snonkaku oser-oser ḇemnaf kwar, ma ḇemarisen farkarkor ro Mami, srama faro aya.
43006046	Fasfas ani ikofen ḇa mboi ono sisya smam Mami. Demir i ḇerama ro Allah, iso ḇemam kwar Kmari.
43006047	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇekyarya, isma kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
43006048	Aya ine kada mamami ḇeḇuk kankenemya.
43006049	Kpu mkoḇesi san kwar manna ro sup ḇeursḇa ma simar kwar.
43006050	Ine mamami ḇesabu ro boiyaswa: Mansei ḇeyan mamami ine ido, ikada nari imar ḇa.
43006051	Aya ine mamami ḇekenem ḇesabu kwar ro boiyaswa. Rofyor oso dan ro mamami ine ido, ikada ikenem fyoro-fyoro ma mamami yaḇuk ani irya kraf ayedi, yaḇuk faro kankenem supswan."
43006052	Kawasa Yahudi sfamfaḇri rofandu mankunsi ma sikofen: "Rariso nari ḇyuk kraf ḇyedi fa ḇyeroḇean fa kani?"
43006053	Inja Yesus ikofen farosi: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko rofyor mkan kraf Rumkun Snonkakuya ḇa ma mkinem rik ḇyedi ḇa, nari mkosma kankenemya ro mankun mko ḇa.
43006054	Mansei ḇeyan kraf ayedi ma ḇeyinem rik ayedi, ikada isma kankenem ḇekain fyoro ma nari yaḇuk fa diḇri ro awar ḇepupesya.
43006055	Snar kraf ayedi irya roḇean ḇekaku ma rik ayedi aninem ḇekaku.
43006056	Mansei ḇeyan kraf ayedi ma ḇeyinem ro rik ayadi kada ḇyeoser kuker aya ma yaḇe oser kukeri.
43006057	Imnis raris Mami ḇekenem ḇewan aya ma yakenem snar Mami, rarirya kako mansei ḇeyan aya, nari ikenem snar aya.
43006058	Ine kada mamami ḇesabu kwar ro boiyaswa, mamami ḇemnis kuker mamami kpu mkoḇesi san raimnai simar kwar aniḇa. Mansei ḇeyan mamami ine ikada isma kankenem fyoro-fyoroya."
43006059	Roi ḇeḇor nanekam Yesus ikofen na ro Kapernaum rofyor ḇyuk farkarkor ro Rum nadi.
43006060	Rofyor simnaf wos anna kam sibor ro manfamyan Yesus ḇyesi sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Wos nane npakrek, mansei nari ḇekḇaḇ ḇemnaf naya?"
43006061	Yesus ifawi, mboi manfamyan ḇyesi sisurem snar wos anna, ikofen farosi: "Inja wos anna neḇirḇar kakyar mkoḇena?
43006062	Ma rariso rofyor mkomam Rumkun Snonkakuya dekḇe moḇ randakya isya roya?
43006063	Rurya iso ḇeḇuk kankenem, krafya ḇyefainda oso ḇaḇeri. Wos yawos faro mko nane irya Rur ma kankenem.
43006064	Ḇape rofandu mko ono sisya sikyarḇa." Snar Yesus ifawi ro randakya, mansei ḇekyarḇa ma mansei nari ḇeḇoḇiya.
43006065	Raimnai ikofen: "Eḇedari yakofen faro mko: Snonkaku oseroḇaḇeri nari ryama faro aya ido, Mami nari ḇyuk na faroi ḇa."
43006066	Randak ro ras ani manfamyan ḇyesi sisusu buri ma sisoi werḇa.
43006067	Inja Yesus ikofen faro manfamyan samfur seser risuru ḇyesi: "Inja mko kako mkomarisen mkobur ayake?"
43006068	Simon Petrus kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, faro mansei nari nkobur faroya? Manseren wos ḇena nbuk kankenem ḇekain fyoro;
43006069	ma nkokyar kwar ma nkofawi au Manseren wawan ḇesren ro Allah."
43006070	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mboi aya iso ḇekinfir mko snon samfur seser risuru ine? Mboi oso rofandu mko ḇyeibiris."
43006071	Ikofen fa kyurya isoine Yudas, Simon Iskariot mandaḇendi; snar iso nari ḇeḇoḇ Yesus, oso ro fandu manfamyan samfur seser risuru ansi.
43007001	Raimnai Yesus imbran yaryar Galilea, snar imewer kyain faswef ro Yudea, snar kawasa Yahudi sesewar fa siḇe smuni.
43007002	Fafisu ani ras munara kawasa Yahudi, isoine ras munara Soyai Undam fyanam kwar.
43007003	Rarirya Yesus naek ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Mkombran rodine ma mkora ḇe Yudea, insa manfamyan-manfamyan besi sakmam fararur wafrur na.
43007004	Snar snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri iyokef rosai ifrur na rofyor imarisen ḇye snonsnon ro ḇarpon kawasa. Rofyor wafrur roi ḇerarirya, fasnai mankundaw faro supswan ine."
43007005	Snar naek ma srar ḇyesi kako sakkyari ḇa.
43007006	Inja Yesus kyarem farosi: "Fafisu ayedi ryama ḇaim, ḇape faro mko fafisu na naisya ḇesya kwar.
43007007	Supswan ipok dayin mkoḇa, ḇape aya kada dayin aya, snar yakofen ḇesya kwar faro supswan ine roi ifrur na nḇarḇor.
43007008	Mkoramura ḇemunara ani. Aya kada yakra ḇaim, snar fafisu ayedi imnis ḇaim."
43007009	Rarirya wos ḇyena farosi, ma ikada kyain ro Galilea.
43007010	Ḇape rofyor naek srar ḇyesi sra kwar ḇe munara ani, insape ikako dakra, ḇape kuker kankunes.
43007011	Kawasa Yahudi ssasewar i ro munara ani ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Isya ro?"
43007012	Ma kawasa sibor sawos fasasis roi. Ono sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "I, snon ḇeḇye rirya." Ono wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Roḇa, fyarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor."
43007013	Ḇape snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ḇemku fa ḇeyawos fababa roi snar simkak kawasa Yahudisya.
43007014	Fafisu munara ani ḇyedodo, Yesus syun ro Allah Rum byedi ma ḇyuk farkarkor.
43007015	Inja kawasa Yahudisya sikandor ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rariso, snon ine daksun farkarkorḇa ḇesyaḇo isma fawawi ḇeradine!"
43007016	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Farkarkor yaḇuk nane neknam ro mankundaya ḇa, ḇape neknam ro Allah ḇewan aya kwarya.
43007017	Mansei ḇemarisen ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyedi, nari ifawi farkarkor ayena ndamuma ro Allah, roḇaido yawawos ro mankundaya ḇardi.
43007018	Mansei ḇeyawawos ro mankundi ḇardi, syewar sanandik faro mankundi, ḇape mansei ḇesewar syom faro Allah ḇewaniya, ikada inapes ma dankar ḇa.
43007019	Moses iso ḇeḇuk sasoser Refo Yahudi faro mkoke? Ḇape oso ḇaḇeri rofandu mko ifrur sasoser anna. Snaro mkosewar fa mkomun aya?"
43007020	Snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Setansya siswoḇer aw; mansei ḇeḇesewar fa ḇemun awya?"
43007021	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Fararur oser monda iso yafrur ro ras Mananai Yahudi ma mkokam mkokandor.
43007022	Inja: Moses ḇyuk fa insa mkofrur sofakfuk ḇape sofakfuk ani ḇyeknam ro Moses ḇa ḇoi ḇyeknam ro up mkoḇesi --mkomarisen sofakfuk ro ras Mananai Yahudi!
43007023	Rofyor snon oso isma sofakfuk ro ras Mananai Yahudi, insa seyuk awer Moses sasoser ḇyena, snaro mkomsor aya, snar yaḇuk pararei faro baken ḇesiper ro snonkaku oso ro ras Mananai Yahudi.
43007024	Mkoḇe mankara awer imnis rosai ḇeḇair, ḇape mkoḇe mankara kuker napnapes."
43007025	Snon Yerusalem ono sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku ine iso simarisen smunya?
43007026	Ma mkomam kada, dawawos kuker fababa ma sipok sawos roi oso faroi ḇa. Imbude manfarkin koḇesi sifawi kaku kwar, mboi i Wairek ḇeḇuk koreri?
43007027	Ḇape snon inekada kofawi moḇsai ryamuma roya, ḇape rofyor Wairek ḇeḇuk koreri ryama, snon osero ḇaḇeri ifawi moḇsai ryamuma roya."
43007028	Rofyor Yesus ḇyuk farkarkor ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, dor naba: "Mboi ayakada mkomambaḇir ma mko fawi moḇ yaramuma roya; ḇape yarama ro mankundaya marisen ayediḇa, ḇape aya ine yaser wawan ro ḇenapesya ikada mkomamḇaḇiri ḇa.
43007029	Ayakada yamambaḇiri, snar yaramuma roi ma iso ḇewan aya."
43007030	Sesewar fa sfor Yesus, ḇape snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri fa iserepen i, snar fafisu ḇyedi ryama ḇaim.
43007031	Ḇape rofandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ono sibor sikyar faroi ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor Kristus ryama, nari ifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor syadi ro snonkaku ine ifrurnake?"
43007032	Snon Farisi simnaf snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi roi sfararum fa ḇekur Yesus, inja mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi siwan fa ḇewaren Allah Rum ḇyedi sfor Yesus.
43007033	Inja Yesus ikofen: "Fafisu kermkun monda aya isya kuker mko ma ḇarpurya nari yakaḇer faro ḇewan ayanya.
43007034	Nari mkosewar aya, ḇape nari mkosrow ayaḇa, snar nari mkopok mkoramuma ro moḇ ayaisya royaḇa."
43007035	Snon Yahudi ansi sikofen yae farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Moḇ rosai iḇe ryaḇeya, isof kopok kosrowi ḇa? Imbude iḇe ryaḇe moḇ kawasa Yahudi ḇekon imnis ambersya rofandu kawasa Yunanisya fa ḇyuk farkar farosike?
43007036	Rosaiso kyara ḇesya ro wos iwos nane: Nari mkosewar aya, ḇape nari mkosrow ayaḇa, ma: mkopok mkora faro moḇ rosai aya isya royaḇa?"
43007037	Ma ro ras ḇepupes ro munara ani ḇyedodo Yesus dores ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma dor naba: "Mansei ḇembrowya, iḇye ryama faro aya ma dinem!
43007038	Mansei ḇekyar faro aya, imnis raris Refo moḇ ikofen raya: Rosne ḇyedi nari war ḇeryuḇerya idaf fa ḇyuk kankenem."
43007039	Roi kyaraya isoine ḇekyar faroisya nari sisma Rur ḇesrenya; snar rurya ryama ḇaim, snar Yesus isma payamyum ḇaim ro marmar ḇyedi.
43007040	Snonkaku ono rofandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, ḇemnaf wos anna, sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Snon ine nabi rirya."
43007041	Ono wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Ineido Wairek." Ḇape ono wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Roḇa, Wairekya ryama ro Galilea ḇa!
43007042	Snar Refoya ikofen, mboi Wairek ḇyeḇarpur ro Daud ma ro mnu Betlehem, moḇ Daud kyon ḇepon roya."
43007043	Inja rofandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sfamfaḇri snar Yesus.
43007044	Snonkaku ono rofandusi simarisen sfori, ḇape snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri iserepeni.
43007045	Inja manwarwaren-manwarwaren ansi sra faro mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi ansi sikofen farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Snaro mkuni ḇa?"
43007046	Manwarwaren-manwarwaren ansi skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku oso ḇaim dawos imnis snon ani!"
43007047	Snon Farisi ansi skarem farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Inja ḇyeninyan mko kwarke?
43007048	Inja snon ono fandu manfarkin-manfarkin ma Farisisya sakyar faroike?
43007049	Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor sine ḇeyakfawi Refo Yahudiḇa, frasya kyursi!"
43007050	Nikodemus, snon oso ro si, ḇerama yoḇ Yesus kwar ani ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo:
43007051	"Inja sasoser Refo Yahudi koḇedi ḇyuk samamyai faro snonkaku ḇesasar oso, rofafisu ḇyeḇemnaf ma ḇyeḇekukeḇ ḇaim?"
43007052	Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Inja aw kako snon Galileake? Kwukeḇ Refo ma nari wafawi mboi nabi oso isya ryama ro Galilea ḇa."
43007053	Raimnai sibur ḇerum sena,
43008001	ḇape Yesus ryaḇe urek Zaitun.
43008002	Meserdi arwo prim kaku Yesus isya wer ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, ma kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam srama yoḇi. Kyain ma ḇyuk farkarkor farosi.
43008003	Mboi ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ma snon Farisi sun faro Yesus bin oso sisrow ḇefrur farbuk. Siwan bin ani fa dores rofadu,
43008004	raimnai sikofen faro Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Guru, bin ine nkosrow ro fafisu isya ifrur farbuk.
43008005	Ro sasoser Refo Yahudi Moses doḇo bin ḇeradine sḇeḇeso kuker karui isof simar. Rosai wakkara ro mnuk ine?"
43008006	Sikofen rarirya fa sifrowes biri, insa sisma roi oso fa ssḇuk sofi. Ḇape Yesus kyankunem ma fyas kuker ḇrampin ḇyesi ro sapropya.
43008007	Ma snar sifuken yayayu ḇesya kwar, inja ikḇawes ma dores, raimnai ikofen farosi: "Mansei rofandu mko ḇeyaksasar ḇa, iḇye syadi iso ḇeso ḇepon karui faro bin ine."
