43008008	Raimnai kyankunem wer ma fyas ro sapropya.
43008009	Ḇape rofyor simnaf wos ani, sibur ḇesisye kam, randak ro ḇeḇesinansya. Papupesya Yesus derer dores kuker bin ani, ḇeyores faswef ro moḇ ḇyedi.
43008010	Raimnai Yesus iyori ma ikofen faro bin ani: "Kawasa ansi sraiso? Snonkaku oso isyaḇake fa ḇyuk samamyai faro aw?"
43008011	Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Oroḇa, Manseren." Raimnai Yesus ikofen: "Aya kako yaḇuk samamyai faro awḇa. Wabur ma randak ro knikine wafrur sasar wer awer."
43008012	Inja Yesus ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi: "Aya ine isnai supswan ine; mansei ḇeso aya, ikada nari imbrain ro pampan ḇa, mboi nari isma isnai ḇekenemya."
43008013	Kawasa Farisi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Mankundaw buk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur aw, inja ḇaḇesaksi bedi kyakuḇa."
43008014	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur mankundayano, mboi ḇaḇesaksi ayena nkaku, snar yafawi, moḇ yarama roya ma moḇ yarayoḇya. Ḇape mkokada mkofawiḇa, moḇsai yaramuma roya ma moḇsai yarayoḇya.
43008015	Mkokada mkoḇuk samamyai imnis warnkyara snonkaku, ayakada yaḇuk samamyai faro snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri,
43008016	ma rofyor yaḇuk samamyai mboi samamyai yaḇuk na nkaku, snar yerer ro mankundaya ḇa, mboi yafnoḇek kuker Kma yedi ḇewan ayanya.
43008017	Ma ro Refo Yahudi mkoḇedi fasfas isya, mboi ḇaḇesaksi ro snonkaku risuru irya kyaku.
43008018	Aya ine yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur mankundaya ḇardi, ma Mami, ḇewan ayanya, dakḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇekur aya."
43008019	Ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Kma bedi isyaro?" Yesus kyarem: "Iḇye aya, ma Kma yedi mkomambaḇir nuḇa. Rofyor mkomambaḇir ayakada, mkomambaḇir Mami kako."
43008020	Wos nane Yesus ikofen na fanam burua pipi rofyor ḇyuk farkarkor ro Allah Rum ḇyedi. Ma snonkaku oso fyoriḇa snar fafisu ḇyedi ryama ḇaim.
43008021	Raimnai Yesus ikofen wer faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi: "Nari yara ma nari mkosewar aya, ḇape nari mkomar snar sasar mkoḇena. Moḇ yara ḇeya nari mkorama ro iba."
43008022	Inja kawasa Yahudi ansi sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Inja iḇe myun mankundike eḇedari ikofen, ḇo doḇo: Ḇemoḇ yaraḇeya, mkopok mkora faroi ḇa?"
43008023	Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Mkoine mkoḇe knam ro supswan ine, ayakada yarama ro boiyaswa; mkokada mkoraker supswan ine, aya yaraker supswan ineḇa.
43008024	Eḇedari insanja yakofen faro mko, mboi nari mkomar snar sasar mkoḇena; rofyor mkokyarḇa, mboi aya irya nari mkomar rodo sasar mkoḇena."
43008025	Inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Manseiso aw?" Yesus kyarem farosi: "Fainda rosai yawawos kuker mko kaker?
43008026	Nabor kaku roi yamarisen yawos ma yaḇemankara fa ḇekur mko; ḇape i ḇewan aya, ikada inapes ma rosai yarower roi, naiso yakofen faro supswan ine."
43008027	Sifawiḇa, mboi dawawos farosi ro Kmari.
43008028	Inja Yesus ikofen: "Rofyor mkoyer nakaki Rumkun Snonkaku kwar, insape mkofawi mboi aya ine Aya Isya, ma rarirya yafrur roi oso ro mankundaya ḇardiḇa, ḇape yawawos monda, imnis raris Mami fyarkor maro aya.
43008029	Ma i ḇewan aya kwar, ifnoḇek aya. Ipok ryir ayaḇa, snar yafrur ḇesya kwar rosai ḇefrur i marisen na."
43008030	Yesus ikofen roi anna kam kwar, snonkaku sibor sikyar faroi.
43008031	Rarirya ikofen faro kawasa Yahudi ḇekyar faroisya: "Kaku ḇeri rofyor mkokin nako wos ayena, rarirya mkoḇe manfamyan kaku ḇe aya
43008032	ma nari mkofawi napnapesya ma napnapesya nari ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro mko."
43008033	Skarem ḇo soḇo: "Nkoine nkoḇe ḇarpur ro Abraham ma nkoḇe manfyan ḇaim faro manseiryawer. Rosai wakofen, ḇo woḇo: "Nari mkosma ḇaḇemkei?"
43008034	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Kaku ḇeri snonkaku ḇefrur sasarsya, nari semanfyan faro sasarya.
43008035	Ma manfyan oso kyain faswef ro rumya doriḇa, ḇape romawaya kada kyain faswef ro rumya dori.
43008036	Inja rofyor Rumkunya ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro mko, kaku ḇeri nari mkoḇe mkei."
43008037	"Yafawi, mboi mkoḇe ḇarpur ro Abraham, ḇape mkosewar fa mkomun aya snar mkomewer mkoso farkarkor ayenari.
43008038	Rosai yamam ro Mami, naiso yakofen na ma rarirya kako mkofrur rosai mkomnaf ro kma mkoḇesi."
43008039	Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Kma nkoḇedi isoine Abraham." Yesus ikofen farosi: "Rofyor mkokofen kaku mko romawa Abraham, rarirya ido nari mkofrur fararur Abraham ifrur na.
43008040	Ḇape roi mkofrur na isoine mkoḇesewar fa mko mun aya, aya ine, snonkaku ḇekofen napnapes faro mko, isoine napnapes yamnaf ro Allah; fararur ḇerarirya Abraham dakfrur naba.
43008041	Mboi kma mkoḇesi roi sifrur naiso mkakfrur na." Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Nkoine romawa soneiḇa. Kma nkoḇedi isoine Allah."
43008042	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Rofyor Kma mkoḇedi Allah, nari mkoswar aya, snar yarama ro Allah. Ma yarama kuker marisen ro mankundayaḇa, mboi iso ḇewan ayanya.
43008043	Rosai ḇeḇewar fa mkofawi roi yakofen naba? Snar mkosambraḇ fa mkomnaf farkarkor ayenaḇa.
43008044	Kma mkoḇedi Ibirisya inja mko marisen mkoso marisen ḇyena. Ro randakya Ibirisya myamun, ikada iso napnapes yaḇa, snar napnapesya isya roiḇa. Rofyor ḇyeankar, ima kaku snar rari ḇyedi moḇ ryairi, snar ḇyeankarkar ma ḇye kma ro ankarkar na kam.
43008045	Ḇape snar yawos ro napnapesya, faro mko snaro mkokyar ayaḇa.
43008046	Mansei rofandu mko ḇeḇuk fasasna mboi yafrur sasar? Rofyor yawos ro napnapesya, snaro mkokyar ayaḇa?
43008047	Mansei ḇeḇeknam ro Allah ikada, imnaf Allah wos ḇyena; snar mkoḇe knam ro Allah ḇa, eḇedari mkomewer mkomnafi."
43008048	Kawasa Yahudi skarem faro Yesus, ḇo soḇo: "Kaku ḇake rofyor nkokofen mboi aw snon Samaria ma rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇer aw?"
43008049	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇer ayaḇa, ḇape yaḇe syowi Mami yedi ma mkokada mkoḇe syowi ayaḇa.
43008050	Ḇape yasewar syowi faro ayaḇa: Oser isya ḇesewar syowiya ma ikako ḇye mankara.
43008051	Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇeḇeuser wos ayena, ima nari daksma marmariḇa isof fyoro-fyoro."
43008052	Yahudisya sikofen faroi wer, soḇo: "Insape nkofawi, rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇer aw. Snar Abraham imar kwar ma rarirya kako nabi-nabisya, ḇesyaḇo woḇo: mansei ḇeḇeuser wos ayena, ima nari daksma marmariḇa isof fyoro-fyoro.
43008053	Inja waba syadike ro kma nkoḇedi Abraham, ḇemar kwarya! Nabi-nabisya kako simar kwar; kuker mansei bukmnis aw?"
43008054	Yesus kyarem: "Rofyor yasandik mankundaya, rarirya ido sanandik ayedi ḇyemaeja kermkuno ḇaḇeri. Kma ayedi ḇeḇuk sanandik ḇe aya, iso mkofen ḇo mkoḇo: Ikada Allah nkoḇedi,
43008055	ḇesyaḇo mkomambaḇiri ḇa, ḇape ayakada yamambaḇiri. Ma rofyor yakofen: Yamambaḇiri ḇa, rarirya aya ine manankarkar, imnis raris mko, ḇape yafawi i ma yaḇeuser wos ḇyena.
43008056	Abraham kma mkoḇedi iryaḇ kaku mboi nari myam ras ayedi ma myami kwar ma iryaḇ kaku."
43008057	Inja kawasa Yahudi ansi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Umur bedi ḇyewampasi wambarek samfur ririm ḇaim ḇesyaḇo wamam Abraham kwarke?"
43008058	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri Abraham ḇyeḇeaḇen ḇaim, aya isya kwar."
43008059	Raimnai sun karui fa siḇe ssḇuk soi; ḇape Yesus smamiḇa ma ibur Allah Rum ḇyedi.
43009001	Rofyor Yesus imbranuk, myam snon ḇepraf oso ro fafisu ḇyeḇeaḇenya.
43009002	Manfamyan ḇyesi sifuken faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Guru, snaro snon ine ipraf rofyor ḇyeḇeaḇenya, snar mankundi sasar ḇyena roḇa ido snari ma kmari sasar suḇenake?"
43009003	Yesus kyarem: "Snon ine sasar ḇyenaḇa ma sinan ḇyesuyaḇa kako, ḇape snar fararur-fararur Allah nari neḇefasna roi.
43009004	Nari kofrur ḇewan ayanya fararur ḇyena rofyor isnaya isya kaker; mboi roḇya ryama, snonkaku oso ipok ifararur werḇa.
43009005	Fyor aya isya ro supswan ine, aya ine isna supswan ine."
43009006	Rofyor ikofen wos nane kam kwar, ininef ḇe sapropya, ma irḇaren aninef ḇyena ro sapropya, raimnai ipyos na ro snon ḇepraf ani mkamor ḇyesuya
43009007	ma ikofen faroi: "Rwamura, ban mkamsu ro sawon Siloam." Siloam isoine: "Manwawan". Inja snon ani rya ḇyan mkamor ḇyesuya, raimnai kyaḇer muma ma myam kwar.
43009008	Ḇape min ḇyesi ma ḇese ḇefawi i ḇefararyor ani, inja soḇo: "Inja snon ḇefararyor ani iso ineke?"
43009009	Ono ḇese sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Kaku, irya ḇaḇoi." Ono ḇese wer sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Isyaḇa ḇoi, imnisbos kakui." Snon ani mankundi ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Kaku aya irya."
43009010	Sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rariso mkamsu suḇas wer?"
43009011	Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ḇenirḇe Yesus irḇaren saprop na ma ḇyuki isfu mkamor ayesuya ma ikofen maro aya: 'Rwamura ma ban mkamor besuya ro sawon Siloam. Inja yara, ma rofyor yaḇan mkamor ayesuya, ma yamam beri.' "
43009012	Raimnai sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Snon ani isyaro?" Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawiḇa."
43009013	Raimnai ssun snon ḇepraf ani faro kawasa Farisisya.
43009014	Ras Yesus irḇaren sapropya ma aninef fa ḇyuki isfu snon ani mkamor ḇyesuya, irya ras Mananai Yahudi rirya.
43009015	Eḇedari kawasa Farisi ansi sifuken faroi, rariso mkamor besuya suḇas wer. Kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Isfu saprop irḇaren kwar ro mkamor ayesuya, raimnai yaḇan mkamor ayesuya ma insape yamam."
43009016	Ma ono ro Farisi ansi sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Snon ine ḇyeknam ro Allah ḇa, snar ḇyefandun ras Mananai Yahudiya ḇa." Ono kada sobo: "Rariso snon ḇesasar oso ipok ifrur aḇyair kanandor radine?" Rarirya sfamfaḇri ro fandusi.
43009017	Raimnai sikofen wer faro snon ḇepraf ani, ḇo soḇo: "Mboi awne ido, rosai wakofen roi, snar ifrur mkamor ḇesuya fa mam kwar?" Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Inido nabi rirya."
43009018	Ḇape kawasa Yahudi ansi sikyarḇa, snon ani insandi ipraf ma myam wer, isof sor sinan ḇyesuya
43009019	ma sifuken su, ḇo soḇo: "Romawa muḇedisine, iso mukofen, ḇo muyoḇo, ipraf ro ḇyeḇeaḇenya? Rariryaido, rariso knikine myam wer?"
43009020	Sinan ansu sukarem, ḇo suyoḇo: "Roi nufawiya isoine, mboi i romawa nuḇedirya ma fafisu ḇyeḇeaḇenya ipraf.
43009021	Ḇape rariso knikine myam werya, nufawiḇa, ma mansei ḇeḇas mkamor ḇyesuya, nufawiḇa kako. Mkofuken ro mankundi, snar ḇyesnonkbor kwar, ifawi kyarem ro mankundi."
43009022	Sinan ḇyansu suwos rarirya snar sumkak kawasa Yahudisya, snar kawasa Yahudisya sna sne oser kwar, mboi snonkaku mansei ḇekaremi ḇe Wairek, nari spampumi.
43009023	Eḇedari sinan ḇyesu sukofen, ḇo suyoḇo: "Ḇyesnonkbor kwar, inja mkofuken faro mankundi."
43009024	Raimnai sorḇe oser wer snon insanja ḇepraf ani ma sikofen faroi: "Wawos kuker napnapes ro ḇarpon Allah; nkofawi mboi snon ani snon ḇesasar."
43009025	Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Snon ani snon ḇesasar rirya, yafawiḇa; ḇape roi oser yafawiya, mboi isoine insandi yapraf ma knikine yamam wer."
43009026	Sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rosai ifrur faro aw? Rariso ḇyuk mkamor besuya fa suḇas wer?"
43009027	Kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yakofen faro mko kwar, ma mkomnafḇa; snaro mkomarisen mko mnaf wer? Imbude mkomarisen mkakḇe manfamyan faroi kako?"
43009028	Rarirya skoryaei ḇo sikofen faroi: "Awkada ḇe manfamyan faro snon ani mboi nkokada manfamyan ro Moses.
43009029	Nkofawi, mboi Allah iwawos faro Moses, ḇape faroi nkofawiḇa moḇsai ryama roya."
43009030	Snon ani kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Kokandor kaku snar mkofawi moḇ ryamuma royaḇa, ḇape ḇyas mkamor ayesuya kwar fa yamam wer.
43009031	Kofawi, mboi Allah imnaf snonkaku ḇesasarsya ḇa, mboi snonkaku ḇesren ma ḇeḇeuser marisen ḇyedi.
43009032	Ro ḇepon isof babo ine komnaf ḇaḇeri, mboi snonkaku oso isya ḇyas mkamor snonkaku ḇepraf ro fafisu ḇyeḇeaḇenya ḇaim.
43009033	Rofyor snonkaku ani ryamuma ro Allah ḇa, ipok ifrur royoḇa."
43009034	Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Aw ine beḇeaḇen ro sasar ḇesyaḇo woḇe farkor nko?" Raimnai siyawi ḇe ḇondibur rum nadi.
43009035	Yesus imnaf mboi siyawi kwar ḇeḇondi. Ḇarpurya isrowi ma ikofen: "Wakyar faro Rumkun Snonkakuyake?"
43009036	Kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Manseren manseirya? Insa yakyar faroi."
43009037	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Aw mami mondaḇa; ḇape iso ḇeyawawos faro aw ine!"
43009038	Ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Manseren yakyar!" Raimnai ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
43009039	Yesus ikofen: "Yarama ḇe supswan ine insa yaḇe mankara, insa mansei ḇemamba smame, ma mansei ḇemamsya siprafe."
43009040	Wos anna Farisi ono sakmnaf na, inja sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Inja woḇe nkokako nkoprafke?"
43009041	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mboi mkopraf kada, mkoḇe sasarḇa, ḇape snar mkoḇo: Nko kada nkomam, rarirya sasar mkoḇena naisya faswef."
43010001	"Yakofen faro mko: Kaku ḇeri mansei ḇesun ro kedwai padwar dombayaḇa, ma dek ro ayaryaido, ḇekaraw ma ḇefasyar rirya;
43010002	ḇape mansei ḇesun ro kedwaiya, ikada manfarandows domba rirya.
43010003	Faroi ḇewarenya ḇyas kedwai padwarya ma dombasya simnaf mkaren ḇyedi ma dor domba ḇyesi oser-oser kuker snonsnon sena ma fyarkin sifa sisasyar.
43010004	Rofyor domba ḇyesi kam dunsi ḇe ḇondi kwar, pyonsi ma domba-domba ansi sisoi, snar simnaf ḇaḇir mkaren ḇyedi.
43010005	Simewer siso snonkaku ḇesesyandi, ḇape sifrar sibursi, snar simnaf ḇaḇir mkaren ḇyediḇa."
43010006	Yesus ikofen sarḇer ani farosi, ḇape sifawi rosai ikofen ḇesyanya ḇa.
43010007	Ma Yesus ikofen wer: "Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko, aya ine kedwai ḇe domba-dombasya.
43010008	Snonkaku ḇerama ḇepon ro aya, sikada mankaraw ma manfasyar, ma domba-domba ansi simnaf siḇa.
43010009	Aya ine kedwai; mansei ḇesun ḇeyunuk ro aya, nari isma aski ma ikada nari syun syae ma isma maper aḇris.
43010010	Mankarawya ryama fa kyaraw ma myamun ma kyakok monda; ḇape yarama insa snonkakusya sisma kankenem fyoroya.
43010011	Aya ine manfarandows ḇeḇye. Manfarandows ḇeḇye ḇyuk kankenem ḇyedi faro domba-domba ḇyesi;
43010012	mboi snonkaku besma sasuref manfarandows risyaḇa, ma snar domba-domba ḇyesisya ḇa, rofyor myam naf supya ryama, ifrar ibur domba-domba ansi, isof naf sup ani doper ma fyasasye domba-domba ansi.
43010013	Ibur snar snon ḇesma sasuref rirya ma fyandun domba-domba ansiḇa.
43010014	Aya ine manfarandows ḇeḇye ma yamamḇaḇir domba-domba ayesi ma domba-domba ayesi simnaf ḇaḇir aya
43010015	imnis raris Mami ifawi aya ma ayano yafawi Mami, ma yaḇuk kankenem ayedi faro domba-domba ayesi.
43010016	Yasma domba-domba ono ḇese kako fa sisya, ḇeyaksun ro padwar ine ḇa; domba ansi nari yunsi kako ma nari simnaf mkaren ayedi ma sikam senai oser kuker manfarandows oser.
43010017	Mami iswar aya, snar yaḇuk kwar kankenem ayedi faro yasma kaḇeri wer.
43010018	Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri duni bur ayaḇa, mboi yaḇuki raris mankundaya marisen ayedi. Yasma papoik fa yaḇuki ma papoik fa yun kaberi kako. Inekada fararur yasma ro Kma yedi."
43010019	Rarirya kawasa Yahudi ansi sfamfaḇri ro mankunsi snar wos anna. Sibor rofandusi soḇo:
43010020	"Rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇeri ma syawo; snaro mkoroweri?"
43010021	Ḇesesya soḇo: "Snonkaku rur ḇemaḇakya iswoḇersya sawos rariryaḇa; rur ḇemaḇaksya nari sifrur fa ḇeprafsya smame?"
43010022	Fyoroḇa Ras Saḇseḇen Allah Rum byedi ro Yerusalem; fafisu ani supya ipnunek.
43010023	Ma Yesus imbran ro Allah Rum byedi ro sim Salomo.
43010024	Inja kawasa Yahudi sores yari ma sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Fyor rosai ryakaker wafrur fa nkokenem kuker ḇirḇar? Rofyor Wairek isawido, wakofen maḇe inko."
43010025	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Yakofen faro mko kwar, ḇape mko kyarḇa; fararur-fararur yafrur kuker Mami snonsnon ḇyedi, naiso ḇefasna ḇadir ro aya,
43010026	ḇape mko kyarḇa, snar mkaksun ro domba-domba ayesi ḇa.
43010027	Domba-domba ayesi simnaf mkaren ayedi ma ayano yafawisi ma siso aya,
43010028	ma yaḇuk kankenem ḇekain fyoro farosi ma sikada nari sroḇa fyoro-fyoro ma snonkaku osoḇaḇeri nari pyosersi ro ḇramin ayedi.
43010029	Mami, ḇeḇuksi maro aya, iba syadi ro mansei ryawer, ma snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri pyosersi ro Mami ḇramin ḇyesuya.
43010030	Aya ma Mami nuḇe oser."
43010031	Kawasa Yahudi ssun karui fa siḇe sḇukso Yesus wer.
43010032	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkomam yafrur fararur ḇeḇye nabor kwar, Mami ḇyuk maro aya; ro fararur ḇeḇor anna, fararur rosai ḇefnai fa mkoḇe mkoso aya kuker karui?"
43010033	Yahudi ansi skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Snar fararur ḇeḇye oso eḇedari nkoḇe nkoso aw kuker karuiyaḇa, mboi snar wonef Allah, ma snar aw snonkaku monda, ḇesyaḇo woḇo wamnis kuker Allah."
43010034	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Ro Refo Yahudi mkoḇedi fasfas oso isyaḇake doḇo: Yakofen kwar: Mkoine Allahke?
43010035	Kofawi mboi rosai ḇefas ro Refo, isya rofyoro. Rofyor Allah ḇyuk aror "Allah" faro snonkaku ḇena wos ḇyedisya,
43010036	snaro mko kofen yonef Allah, snar yakofen aya ine Allah Rumkun ḇyedi? Mboi Mami kyinfir aya ma iwan ayaḇe supswan ine.
43010037	Rofyor yafrur fararur-fararur Mami ḇyenaḇa, mkokyar awer aya,
43010038	ḇape rofyor yafrur na ma mkomewer mkokyar aya, mkokyar fararur-fararur anna, insa mkofawi mkomambir ma mkofawi mboi Mami ḇye oser kuker aya ma ayano yeḇe oser kuker Mami."
43010039	Ḇerarwan oser wer ssewar fa sfori, ḇape ikfis ro siḇrasna.
43010040	Ḇarpurya Yesus ryaḇe war Yordan ḇariwara, ḇemoḇ ḇepon Yohanes ḇyuk masasi ro ani, ma kyain ro dia.
43010041	Ma kawasa sibor srama faroi ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Yohanes kada dakfrur aḇyair kanandor osoḇa, ḇape wos ḇeḇor ikofen nakam ḇekur snon ine nkaku kam."
43010042	Ma kawasa ḇeḇor ro dia sikyar faro Yesus.
43011001	Snon oso snonsnon ḇyedi Lazarus isya ro dafduf. Kyain ro Betania fnoḇek srar ḇyesuya Maria ma ḇedar ḇyedi Marta.
43011002	Maria ine bin ḇerem Manseren wemin ḇyesuya kwar kuker mani ḇespum ma ḇepyos wemin ansu kuker snonḇuryam ḇyena.
43011003	Ma Lazarus ḇeduf ani Maria srar ḇyedirya. Bin ansuya suyankinem faro Yesus, ḇo suyoḇo: "Manseren, snonkaku waswar ani iduf."
43011004	Fafisu Yesus imnaf ankinem anna, ikofen: "Dafduf ani nari dunḇe marmarḇa, ḇape nari fyasna Allah baba ḇyena, snar kuker dafduf ani Allah Rumkun ḇyedi nari isma baba kako."
43011005	Mboi Yesus iswar kaku Marta, Maria ma Lazarus.
43011006	Yesus imnaf kwar Lazarus iduf, ḇesyaḇo kyain ras risuru wer ro moḇsai isya roya;
43011007	ḇape ḇarpurya ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyesi: "Mko rama kokaḇer wer ḇe Yudea."
43011008	Manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Rabi, babo ine kawasa Yahudi sesewar fa sso aw, ḇesyaḇo wamarisen kaker fa kwaḇer ḇe diwara?"
43011009	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Mkofawi ḇake oras samfur seser risuru ro ras oser? Mansei ḇembran ro meserya wemin ḇyesu sukarkarḇa, snar myam isna supswan ine.
43011010	Ḇape rofyor snon oso imbran ro roḇ, wemin ḇyesu sukarkar, snar isnaya isya roiḇa."
43011011	Raimnai Yesus ikofen wer farosi: "Lazarus, naek koḇani denef kwar, ḇape yara fa yaḇani ro anenef ḇyedi."
43011012	Irya manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Manseren, rofyor denef, nari ikḇok ro mankundi."
43011013	Yesus dawos ro Lazarus marmar ḇyedi, ḇape skara ḇo soḇo: Yesus ikofen ro anenef monda.
43011014	Eḇedari Yesus ikofenbos farosi: "Lazarus imar kwar;
43011015	ḇape kasumasa snar aya isya rofafisu aniḇa, rarirya iḇye syadi faro mko, insa mkosma farkarkor kakyar. Knikine mkorama koramura faroi."
43011016	Inja Tomas sapḇe Didimus, ikofen faro min ḇyesi, isoine manfamyan ḇesesya, ḇo doḇo: "Mkorama kosoi, insa kakmar fnoḇeki."
43011017	Ma rofyor Yesus rya kwar ro Betania, isma Lazarus sikriri ras rifiak kwar.
43011018	Betania kyain fanam Yerusalem, indokada swafya mil risuru.
43011019	Rodia kawasa Yahudi sibor srama kwar faro Marta ma Maria fa ssḇuk sneprei faro su snar srar suḇedi marmar ḇyedi.
43011020	Ma fafisu Marta imnaf mboi Yesus ryama, inja rya fa isrowi. Ḇape Maria kyain ro rum.
43011021	Mboi Marta ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren rofyor awsya ro dinekada, srar ayedi nari imar ḇa.
43011022	Ḇape knikine kako yafawi mboi Allah nari ḇyuk faro aw roi ḇeḇor wor faroi na."
43011023	Yesus ikofen faro Marta: "Srar bani nari diḇeri."
43011024	Marta ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Yafawi mboi nari diḇri rofyor ḇemarsya siḇersi ro ras fawarya."
43011025	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Aya ine aḇiḇer ma kankenem; mansei ḇekyar faro aya, imar kwaro nari ikenem wer,
43011026	ma snonkaku ḇemar ma ḇekyar faro aya nari simar ḇa isof fyoro-fyoro. Wakyar roi ḇeḇesne ani?"
43011027	Marta kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren, yakyar mboi aw Wairek Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, awso nari ḇerama ḇe supswan ine."
43011028	Ma ikofen rarirya kwar raposa, rya dor ḇeba ḇyedi Maria ma fyararum faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Guru isya rodiwa ma dor aw."
43011029	Maria imnaf rarirya iyori fasau fa isrow Yesus.
43011030	Ḇape rofyor ani Yesus syun ro mnu ani ḇaim. Isya kaker ro moḇ Marta isrowi ro ani.
43011031	Fafisu kawasa Yahudi ḇefnoḇek Maria ro rumsya fa ḇeḇuk sneprei faroi, smam mboi Maria iyori fasau ma ryaḇe ḇondi, inja sisoi, snar skara soḇo mboi ryaḇe rus fa kyanes ro diwa.
43011032	Maria rya kwar ro moḇ Yesus isya ro ani ma isrow Yesus, ma kyain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rofyor awsya ro dinekada, srar ayedi nari imarḇa."
43011033	Fafisu Yesus myam Maria kyanes ma kawasa Yahudi ḇerama ḇefnoḇekisya kako sakkanes, inja Yesus sneri isosi ma ikofen:
43011034	"Moḇ saiso mko kriri roya?" Skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Manseren, rwamura fa wakmam!"
43011035	Fyor ani Yesus kyanes.
43011036	Kawasa Yahudisya sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Mkomam kada, iswarbos faroi!"
43011037	Ḇape snonkaku ono fandusi, soḇo: "I ḇeḇuk mamam faro ḇeprafsi, ipok ḇake fa ifrur isof snon ine imarḇa?"
43011038	Yesus iswarsi wer, inja ryaḇe rus ani. Rus ani aḇyaḇ rirya, ma sisiseni kuker karui.
43011039	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkokris karui ine!" Lazarus ḇemar ani srar ḇyedi Marta ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, ras rifiak kwar ro rusya, inja nari isnarem."
43011040	Yesus kyarem: "Yakofen ḇeaw; rofyor wakyar nari wakmam Allah papoik ḇyena!"
43011041	Inja sikris karui ani raimnai Yesus myam ḇebo ma ikofen: "Mami, yakofen kasumasa faro aw, snar wamnaf aya kwar.
43011042	Yafawi wamnaf aya ḇesya kwar, ḇape snar snonkaku ḇeyores yar aya rodine, yakofen na insa sikyar, mboi Mami ḇewan aya kwarya."
43011043	Ma ikofen rarirya kwar, ma dor naba: "Lazarus, wasasyar!"
43011044	Snonkaku ḇemar ani isasyar ro rus ani, wemin ma ḇramin ḇyesuya neḇeparek kuker kruḇen ḇeruren ma mkamor ḇyesuya suḇe ḇekawef kuker marḇun. Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkoper kruḇen anna insa imbran ḇe mkei."
43011045	Kawasa ḇeḇor ḇerama ḇeḇuk sneprei faro Maria ansi smam rosai Yesus ifrur na inja sikam sikyar Yesus.
43011046	Ḇape onokada sra faro snon Farisisya ma sfarfyar farosi ro rosai Yesus ifrur kwar na.
43011047	Inja mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi sor Kankain Karkara Agama fa siryur ma sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rosai nari kofrurya? Snar snon ani ifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor.
43011048	Rofyor komam mondai, nari kawasa kam sikyar faroi, ma kawasa Roma nari srama ma skakok Allah Rum ḇyedi ma er koḇansine ḇesiper."
43011049	Ḇape oso rofandusi isoine Kayafas, imam ḇeba ro wampasi wambarek ani, ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkofawi royoḇa,
43011050	ma mkokara ḇake, mboi iḇye syadi faro mko, rofyor snonkaku oser imar fadwer er ḇesiper koḇedi, ro er ḇesiper koḇedi ryoe."
43011051	Kayafas ikofen rarirya ro mankundi ḇa, ḇape snar ḇye imam ro wampasi wambarek ani, inja ḇyardi mboi Yesus nari imar sadwer er ansi,
43011052	ma faro er Yahudi sererḇa, ḇape insa fyanjur Allah romawa ḇyesi ḇekakek sya fa seoser kako.
43011053	Randak ro ras ani sḇesneoser fa smun Yesus.
43011054	Snar rarirya Yesus imbran fababa wer ḇa ro ḇarpon kawasa Yahudi imbran rodia ḇe sup mnuk ḇefanam sup ḇeḇeursḇa, ḇe mnu oso snonsnon ḇyedi Efraim, ma kyain fnoḇek manfamyan ḇyesi rodia.
43011055	Rofafisu ani ras ḇeba munara Paskah Yahudi sedi fyanam kwar ma kawasa ḇeḇor ro mnu ani sraḇe Yerusalem insa sfasren mankunsi ḇepon ro munara Paskah ani.
43011056	Ssewar Yesus ma sores ro Allah Rum ḇyedi dori, sikofen yae farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Rariso kakara mkoḇena? Nari ryama kako ḇe munara ineke?"
43011057	Rofafisu ani mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisi ssḇuk sasoser kwar insa snonkaku mansei ḇefawi Yesus ro moḇsai isya, sikofen ḇadir insa sfori.
43012001	Ras riwonem ḇepon ro Paskahya Yesus ryama ro Betania, ro moḇsai Yesus ḇyuk aḇiḇer faro Lazarus fandu ḇemarsya ro ani.
43012002	Rodia sfasos roḇean faro Yesus, ḇeyanan fnoḇek Yesus sya oso snonsnon ḇyedi Lazarus, Marta ḇeyuf farmyan si.
43012003	Ma Maria dun mani ḇespum ḇekakur kaku, kati mun ono fa ḇyuki ryem Yesus wemin ḇyesuya ma ipyos su kuker snonburyam ḇyena; ma rum ani ḇesiper isnarem apan ḇemani spum.
43012004	Ḇape Yudas Iskariot snon oso fandu Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi, nari ḇeḇoḇ fasawi, ikofen ḇo doḇo:
43012005	"Snaro mani ḇespum ine ḇyeḇeḇoḇ ḇa kuker maeja kumpan sarak utin rikior ma pipisya seḇeḇerwas faro ḇesaḇararsya?"
43012006	Wos ikofen ine, ikofen rarirya snar iswar kawasa ḇesaḇarar syaḇa mboi snar i snon ḇekaraw-raw rirya; snar ikada dun ḇesya kwar pipi ḇekram ro rosaser dufya.
43012007	Inja Yesus ikofen: "Mkomam monda bin ine ifrur rarirya fa ḇyeswarapepen ro ras kardir ayedi.
43012008	Snar snonkaku ḇesaḇararsya sisya ro fandu mko ḇesya kwar, ḇape ayama roḇa."
43012009	Kawasa Yahudi sibor simnaf, mboi Yesus isya ro Betania ma srama snar Yesus mondaḇa, mboi srama insa sakmam kako Lazarus ḇesma aḇiḇer kwar rofandu snonkaku ḇemarsya.
43012010	Raimnai mananir imam-imam sna awi fa smun Lazarus kako,
43012011	snar kukeri kawasa Yahudi sibor sibursi ma sikyar faro Yesus.
43012012	Meserdi fafisu snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇerama ḇeyakso munara simnaf, mboi Yesus isya ro nyanya faduri fa ryama ḇe Yerusalem,
43012013	sun yar ram ono, ma sra sisrowi kuker bararas, ḇo soḇo: "Hosana! (Wakenem!) Ḇerama kuker snonsnon Manseren isma ḇok, Wairek Israel!"
43012014	Yesus isma keledai kuḇ oso raimnai dekroi, imnis fasfas ro Refo:
43012015	"Mkomkak awer inai infun Sion, mkomame Wairek mkoḇedi ryama, dek keledai mkun oso!"
43012016	Randakya Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi sifawi roi ḇeḇesya ineḇa, ḇape rofyor Yesus isma baba ḇyedi, si swarepen mboi mnuk ani kyuri, ma sifrur rarirya faroi.
43012017	Snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇefnoḇek i ro fafisu dor Lazarus fa isasyar ro rus ma ḇeḇuk aḇiḇer faroi rofandu ḇemarsya si ḇeḇesaksi ro Yesus.
43012018	Eḇedari snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sra sisrowi, snar simnaf, mboi i ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor ani.
43012019	Inja snon Farisi ansi sikofen yae faro mankunsi, ḇo soḇo: "Kopok kofrur royoḇa mboi mkomam kada, supswan ḇesiper siwayan kam fa sisoi."
43012020	Rofandu snonkaku ḇeyakḇe nadisya ro ras munara ani, snon Yunani ono sisya.
43012021	Snonkaku ansi sra faro Filipus, ḇeḇeknam ro Betsaida ro Galilea, ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Naeko mkomarisen ido nkomarisen nkosrow Yesus."
43012022	Filipus rya ikofen ḇadir faro Andreas; Andreas ma Filipus sukofen ḇadir wer faro Yesus.
43012023	Ḇape Yesus kyarem faro su: "Fafisu Rumkun Snonkaku isma babaya ryama kwar.
43012024	Yakofen faro mko: Rofyor fas morya isapi ro sapropya ma imarḇa ido, nari ḇyemor oser faswef monda; ḇape rofyor imar nari ḇyuk bon nabor.
43012025	Mansei ḇeswar kankenem ḇyedi, nari kankenem ḇyedi ryoburi, mboi mansei ḇeswar kankenem ḇyediḇa ro supswan ine nari fyadurui faro kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
43012026	Mansei ḇeyuf farmyan aya, nari iso aya ma moḇsai aya isya roya, rodia kako ḇeyuf farmyan ayasya sisya. Mansei ḇeyuf farmyan aya nari Mami ḇyesyowi i.
43012027	Knikine sneri fyafardun ma rosai yaḇe yakofenya? Inja nari yor ro Mami fa fyaspar aya ro fafisu ine? Ḇape insa yasma kandera ine eḇedari yarama kwar ine.
43012028	Mami snombri isma baba!" Rarirya simnaf mkaren ro boiyaswa: "Yaḇuk baba faroi kwar, ma nari yaḇuk baba faroi wer!"
43012029	Snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇeyores ro moḇ ani ma ḇerower sikofen, mboi ine rakrok karadu. Ono wer sikofen: "Malaikat oso iso ḇeyawawos kuker i kwar."
43012030	Yesus kyarem: "Mkaren ani ḇyeḇerower kwar snar ayaḇa, mboi snar mko.
43012031	Knikine samamyai imbran ro supswan ine: knikine kako papoik supswan ine ḇyeḇesawen ḇe ḇondi;
43012032	ma aya, rofyor mkoyer nakaki aya ro supswan ine, nari yun snonkaku syakam fa srayoḇ aya."
43012033	Ikofen radine fa fyasna moḇsai nari imar raya.
43012034	Raimnai snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi skarem: "Nkomnaf ro sasoser Refo Yahudi mboi Wairek ikenem faswef fyoro-fyoro; inja rariso wakofen Rumkun Snonkaku nari siyer nakaki i? Mansei Rumkun Snonkakuya?"
43012035	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Fafisu kermkun monda wer isna isya fandu mko, fafisu rosai isnaya isya ro mko, mkokyar faroi, insa papoik pampanya ikawef awer mko; mansei ḇembran ro pampanya dori, ifawi moḇ iḇe ryayoḇyaḇa.
43012036	Mkokyar faro isnaya, rofyor isnaya isya faro mko, insa mkoḇe romawa-romawa isna." Yesus ikofen rarirya kwar, rya dofbursi.
43012037	Ma Yesus ifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor kako kwar, ḇape sikyar faroi ḇa,
43012038	insa nabi Yesaya wos ikofenya imnis: "Manseren, mansei ḇekyar faro ḇaryas nkoḇena? Ma faro mansei Manseren papoik bedi ḇyeḇefasna farosya?"
43012039	Eḇedari sikyarḇa, snar Yesaya ikofen kako kwar:
43012040	"Yafrur mkamor sena fa napraf, Yafrur sisnesna fa nedip; insa mkamor sena nmam awer, kakara sena nafawi awer. Insa skaḇer awer faro aya, fa yaḇuk parare farosi."
43012041	Yesaya ikofen rarirya snar myam Yesus baba ḇyedi kwar ma iwawos roi kwar.
43012042	Rariryano manfarkinsya sibor kaku sikyar faroi, ḇape snar snon Farisi simewer skarem i rofababa, insa spampum awer si ro rum ari.
43012043	Snar simarisen syadi faro sanandik snonkaku ro ḇaḇesyowi Allah.
43012044	Ḇape Yesus iyiw ḇo ikofen: "Mansei ḇekyar faro aya, ikyar faro Allah ḇewan aya kwarya;
43012045	ma mansei ḇemam aya, myam kako Allah ḇewan aya kwarya.
43012046	Yarama ḇe supswan ine kwar imnis isna, insa snonkaku ḇekyar aya sya, skain awer ro pampanya.
43012047	Ma rofyor oso ryower wos ayena, ḇape ifrur naba, yaḇe mankara faroi ḇa, snar yarama yeḇe mankara supswan ineḇa, mboi yaḇuk koreri.
43012048	Mansei ḇemewer aya, ma ḇemnaf wos ayenaḇa sya, mankaraya isya kwar farosi, isoine wos yakofen kwar na, naiso nari ḇeḇemankara farosi ro awar ḇepupesya.
43012049	Snar yawawos ro mankundayaḇa ḇape Mami ḇewan ayanya, iso ḇeḇuk sasoser faro aya insa yakofen rosai nari yakofen na ma yaḇuk mufa.
43012050	Ma yafawi, mboi sasoser ḇyena irya kankenem ḇekain fyoro. Inja rosai yakofenya, yaḇuk na raris Mami ikofen maro aya kwar."
43013001	Ras oser wer munara Paskahya ḇyeḇefrur, Yesus ifawi kwar, mboi fafisu ḇyedi ryama kwar fa ibur supswan ine faro kmari. Imnis raris iswar manfamyan ḇyesi rarirya baboine iswarsi isof papupesya.
43013002	Rofyor sisya sanan kam, ma Ibiris fyararum kwar ro Yudas Iskariot, Simon mandaḇendi sne ḇyedi ro nyan rosai nari ḇyuki ḇyoḇ Yesus.
43013003	Yesus ifawi, mboi Kmari ḇyuk roi ḇeḇor nakam faroi kwar ma ifawi ryama ker Allah ma nari kyaḇer faro Allah.
43013004	Raimnai Yesus iyori ma pyer syatu ḇyedi. Dun marḇun oso ma fyesi ro sifer ḇyedi,
43013005	raimnai iwek war ro sayer oso, ma ḇyuki ḇyan manfamyan ḇyesi wemin sena ma ḇyunek kuker marḇun ḇefes ro sifer ḇyedi ani.
43013006	Rofyor ryama faro Simon Petrus, Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, inja waḇe ban wemin ayesuya?"
43013007	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rosai yafrur ro knikineya wafawi ḇaim, ḇape ras ḇarpurya nari wafawi."
43013008	Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Roḇa Manseren, wapok ban wemin ayesuyaḇa." Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor yaḇan wemin besuyaḇa, nari wasma rarwas kuker ayaḇa."
43013009	Simon Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren rarirya ido, ban wemin ayesuya monda ḇa, mboi ḇramin ma ḇukor ayedi kako!"
43013010	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Mansei ḇemasi kwar, ipok imasi wer ḇa, mboi koḇan wemin ḇyesya, snar isren kwar. Mko kako mkosren kwar mboi mkosren kam ba."
43013011	[Snar ifawi kwar, nari mansei ḇeḇoḇiya. Eḇedari ikofen: "Mkosren kwar ḇape mkosren kam baim."]
43013012	Ḇyan wemin sena kwar, syansun sansun ḇyena wer raimnai kyain. Raimnai ikofen farosi: "Mkofawi kwarke rosai yafrur faro mkoya?
43013013	Mkap ayaḇe Guru ma Manseren ma kaku ro wos mkoḇena, snar kaku aya ine Guru ma Manseren.
43013014	Inja rofyor yaḇe Manseren ma Guru mkoḇedi ḇape yaḇan wemin mkoḇena, rarirya mko kako mkakḇan yae wemin mkoḇena.
43013015	Snar yaḇuk nyan oso kwar faro mko, insa mko kako mkakfrur raris moḇ rosai yafrur faro mko kwar raya.
43013016	Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Manfyan oso ikaki syadibur tuan ḇyedi ḇa, roḇaido wawan oso iba syadi ḇewani yaḇa.
43013017	Rofyor mkofawi roi nane kam kwar, ma rofyor mkofrur na ido, aski faro mko.
43013018	Yakofen faro mko kam ḇa, snar yafawi, mansei yakinfir kwar. Ḇape imnis rosai sfas kwar ro Refo isoine: Snonkaku ḇeyanan fnoḇek aya nari isampum aya.
43013019	Yakofen na rarirya faro mko rofafisu ine kako rofyor roi yakofen nane ndama ḇaim, insa roi ḇeḇesya ani ryama kwar, rarirya mkokyar mboi aya irya.
43013020	Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko; mansei ḇena snonkaku yawansya, nya aya, ma mansei ḇena ayansya sakna kako ḇewan ayanya."
43013021	Yesus ikofen rarirya kwar iswar fafayaḇa inja ḇyesaksi: "Yakofen faro mko, kaku ḇeri rofandu mko nari oso ḇyoḇ aya."
43013022	Manfamyan ansi smam yaesi, ma sikmom snar sifawi mansei Yesus ikofenya ḇa.
43013023	Oso rofandu Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi, isoine manfamyan iswar ani ma ḇekain fanami, ro ḇar raku ḇyedi.
43013024	Simon Petrus pyanir manfamyan ani ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Wafuken manseiso ikofen ḇesyanya!"
43013025	Manfamyan ḇekain fanam Yesus ani iknenef ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, manseiso eḇesyani?"
43013026	Yesus kyarem: "Snonkaku yasowen mamami ma yaḇuk faroya ido irya." Ikofen rarirya posa dun mamami ma syoweni posa ḇyuki faro Yudas, Simon Iskariot mandaḇendi.
43013027	Ma Yudas duf mamami ani kwar, Ibirisya isawoḇi. Ma Yesus ikofen faroi: "Rosai waḇe wafrurya, iḇye wafrur fasaw."
43013028	Ḇape snon osero ḇaḇeri ro ḇekain ḇeyanan ansi ifawiḇa, rosai Yesus ikofen rarirya faro Yudas.
43013029	Snar Yudas iso ḇeyuf mansrip ḇeser pipiya inja skara, mboi Yesus iwani fa kyoḇes roi ḇeḇefandun faro munara ani, roḇaido ḇyuk roi ono faro ḇesaḇararsya.
43013030	Yudas dun mamami raimnai rya fasau. Ma rofyor ani roḇ kwar.
43013031	Rofyor rya kwar, Yesus ikofen: "Insape Rumkun Snonkaku isma baba ma Allah isma baba kukeri.
43013032	Rofyor Allah isma baba snar i, ma Allah nari ḇyuk faḇei baba kako, baba ro Allah mankundi ḇardi ma nari ḇyuk baba fasaw faroi.
43013033	Ne, romawa ayena mko, fafisu kermkun monda kaker, aya isya fnoḇek mko. Ma nari mkosewar aya, ḇape raris yakofen faro kawasa Yahudisya: Ḇemoḇ yara yoḇya, mkopok mkorama roiḇa, rarirya kako knikine yakofen faro mko.
43013034	Yaḇuk sasoser ḇaḇo faro mko, insa mko swar yae mko; imnis raris moḇ yaswar mko kwar raya, rarirya mko kako mko swar yae mko.
43013035	Rofyor mko swar yae mko ido snonkakusya kam nari sifawi mboi manfamyan ayesi mko, rofyor mko swar yae mko kada."
43013036	Simon Petrus ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, waḇe rwaḇeso?" Yesus kyarem: "Moḇ yarayoḇya, nari wapok waso ayaḇeri ro knikine ḇa, ḇape insape nari waso aya."
43013037	Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, snaro yaso beri au ro knikine ḇa? Yamarisen yamar sadwer aw!"
43013038	Yesus kyarem: "Kakuke wamarisen fa wamar sadwer aya? Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro aw: Mankokosya sor ḇaim, famyun aya ḇe rarwan rikior kwar."
43014001	"Mkosnemna neḇirḇar awer; mkokyar faro Allah, mkokyar maro aya kako.
43014002	Ro Mami rum ḇyedi moḇ kankain nasya nabor. Rofyor rariryaḇa, nari yakofen na faro mko. Snar yaramura ḇediwa insa yafasos moḇ faro mko.
43014003	Ma rofyor yara ro diwa kwar ma yafasos moḇ faro mko kwar, nari yakaḇer muma wer ma yun mkoḇe moḇ ayedi, insa moḇ rosai aya isya roya, mko kako mkoisya ro moḇ ani.
43014004	Ma moḇ yaraḇeya, mkofawi nyan ḇeraḇe moḇ ani."
43014005	Raimnai Tomas ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, nkofawi moḇsai rwaḇeyaḇa; inja rariso nari nkofawi nyanya?"
43014006	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Aya ine kada nyanya ma napnapes ma kankenem. Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ḇerama faro Mami, rofyor imbranuk ro ayaḇa.
43014007	Rofyor mkomambaḇir aya, nari mkomambaḇir kaku mami kako. Knikine mkomam baḇiri ma mkomami kwar."
43014008	Filipus ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, fasna Kmaya maro nko, rarirya imnis maro nko kwar."
43014009	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Fyoro kaku aya isya fnoḇek mko, Filipus, ḇesyaḇo mambaḇir ayaḇa? Mansei ḇemam aya kwar ido, myam Kmaya kwar kako; rariso wakofen: Fasna Kmaya maro nko.
43014010	Wakyarḇake, yaḇe oser kuker Kmaya ma Kmaya ḇyeoser kuker aya? Rosai yakofen faro aw, yakofen na ro mankundaya ḇardiḇa, ḇape Kmaya ḇaḇeoser nuḇedi, iso ḇefrur nakamya.
43014011	Mkokyar faro aya mboi yaḇe oser kuker Kmaya ma Kmaya ḇye oser kuker aya, mboi roḇaido mkokyar snar rosai yafrur kwar na.
43014012	Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Mansei ḇekyar faro aya, nari dakfrur kako fararur-fararur yafrur nane, mboi nari ifrur roi ḇeba syadi wer. Snar yara faro Kmaya;
43014013	ma rosai mkor kuker snonsnon ayedi, nari yafrur na faro mko, insa Kmaya isma baba ro Rumkunya.
43014014	Rofyor mkor roi ono kuker snonsnon ayedi, nari yafrur na."
43014015	"Rofyor mkoswar aya ido, nari mkoḇeuser sasoser ayena kam kada.
43014016	Nari yor faro Kmaya, ma nari ḇyuk faro mko snon ḇesaramper oso ḇese, insa ifnoḇek mko,
43014017	isoine Rur Napnapesya. Supswan ine dakna iba, snar supswan ine dakmam iba ma ssmambaḇir iba. Ḇape mko kada mkomamḇaḇiri, snar ifnoḇek mko ma ḇyeoser kuker mko.
43014018	Nari yabur mkoḇa imnis awak param. Nari yakaḇer maro mko wer.
43014019	Fyoroḇa wer supswan ine nari smam aya werḇa, ḇape mkoma nari mkomam aya, snar yakenem ma mko kako nari mkakkenem.
43014020	Rofyor ani nari mkofawi, mboi yaḇeoser kuker Mami, ma mkoḇe oser kuker aya ma ayano yaḇe oser kuker mko.
43014021	Mansei ḇeyuf sasoser ayena ma ḇeḇeuser na, iso ḇeswar ayanya. Ma mansei ḇeswar aya, ikada nari Mami dakswari ma aya kako nari yakswari ma nari yafasna aya ḇardi faroi."
43014022	Yudas ḇekofen ine Iskariot isyaḇa, ifuken faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rosai eḇedari woḇo fasna au maḇe nko, mboi faro supswan ineḇa?"
43014023	Yesus kyarem: "Rofyor oso iswar aya, ikada nari ḇyeuser farkarkor ayena, ma Mami nari iswari ma nari nko rama faroi ma nko kainusi.
43014024	Mansei ḇeswar ayaḇa, nari ḇyeuser farkarkor ayenaḇa; ma farkarkor mkomnaf anna ndama ro ayaḇa, mboi ndama ro Kmaya ḇewan aya.
43014025	Yakofen roi ḇeḇor annane kam faro mko, rofyor aya isya kaker kuker mko;
43014026	ḇape Rur Ḇesren, isoine Rur Ḇeḇuk snepreiya nari Kmaya iwani kuker snonsnon ayedi, iso nari ḇefarkor fa ḇemko ma ḇeḇuk swarepen ro roi ḇeḇor yakofen kwar faro mko anna kam.
43014027	Askiya yaḇeifa kyainus mko. Aski ayena yaḇuk na faro mko, ma rosai yaḇuk faro mko namnis kuker roi supswan ine ḇyuk faro mko naba. Mkosnemna neḇirḇar ma mkomkak awer.
43014028	Mkomnaf mboi yakofen faro mko kwar: 'Yara, ḇape nari yakaḇer faro mko wer.' Rofyor mko swar aya kada, nari mko marisen kaku snar yara faro Mami, snar Mami ḇeba syadi ro aya.
43014029	Ma knikine yakofen na kako faro mko rofyor ndama ḇaimya, insa mko kyare, rofyor ndama kwarya.
43014030	Yawos nabor wer faro mkoḇa, snar papoik supswan ine ryama ma ipok ayaḇa.
43014031	Ḇape insa supswan ine sifawi, mboi yaswar Mami ma yafrur roi ḇeḇor kam Mami syoser faro ayana kwar. Mkoyor mko kora kobur moḇ ine."
43015001	Yesus ikofen wer, "Aya ine anggur knam ḇenapesya ma Mamiso ḇefrur yaf ani.
43015002	Snaw ayena ḇeḇuk bon ḇana kyaruk na mboi snaw ḇeḇuk bon na ifron sren na, insa namarem syadi wer.
43015003	Mkokada mkosren kwar snar farkarkor yaḇuk faro mko kwarna.
43015004	Mkoḇe oser faswef kuker aya, ma ayano nari yaḇe oser faswef kuker mko. Imnis snawya imarem ro mankundiḇa, rofyor ḇyeoser faswef kuker knamyaḇa, rarirya ido nari mko maremba, rofyor mkoḇe oser faswef kuker ayaḇa.
43015005	Aya ine anggur knam ma mkoḇe snaw ro aya. Mansei ḇeḇeoser kuker aya nari ayano yaḇe oser kukeri, ikada ḇyuk bon nabor, snar roḇondibur aya mkopok mkofrur royoḇa.
43015006	Mansei ḇeḇeoser kuker ayaḇa, nari ḇyeḇesawen imnis snaw ma nari myas, ḇarpurya snonkakusya siryur na ma sisawen na ro forya fa nananem.
43015007	Rofyor mkoḇe oser kuker aya ma farkarkor ayena nkain ro mkosnemna, mkor rosai mko marisen na ro Mami, nari mkosma na.
43015008	Rofyor mkoḇuk bon nabor, Mami isma baba, rarirya mko fasna mkoḇe manfamyan ḇeaya."
43015009	"Raris Mami iswar aya kwar, rarirya kako yakswar mko; mko kain ro saswar ayedi kada.
43015010	Rofyor mkoḇeuser sasoser ayena ido, nari mko kain ro saswar ayena, imnis raris yaḇeuser Mami sasoser ḇyena rarirya yakain ro saswar ḇyedi.
43015011	Roi ḇeḇor nane kam yakofen na faro mko, insa raryaḇ ayena naisya ro mkosnemna ma marisen mkoḇena namnis.
43015012	Sasoser ayena naiso nane, insa mkoswar yae mko, raris moḇ yaswar mko raya.
43015013	Snonkaku ḇeswar syadi bati ḇyesi isoine, snonkaku ḇeḇuk kankenem ḇyedi faro bati ansi.
43015014	Bati ayesiso mko, rofyor mko frur rosai yasoser faro mko.
43015015	Yor mkoḇe manfyan wer ḇa, snar manfyanya ifawi roi tuan ḇyedi ifrur naba, ḇape yor mkoḇe bati, snar yakofen ḇadir faro mko kwar roi ḇeḇor nakam yamnaf kwar ro Mami na.
43015016	Mkoi ḇekimfir ayaḇa ḇape ayaiso ḇekimfir mko. Ma yaḇeasas faro mko kwar, insa mkora ma mkoḇuk bon ma bon mkoḇena nako, insa rosai mkor ro Kmaya kuker snonsnon ayedi, Mami ḇyuk na faro mko.
43015017	Sasoser ayena naiso nane faro mko: Mkoswar yae mko."
43015018	"Rofyor supswan ine dayin mko, mko swarepen mboi dayin ḇepon aya kwar ro mko.
43015019	Rofyor supswan ine i ḇena mkonya, nari iswar mko imnis snonkaku ḇyesi. Ḇape snar supswan ine i ḇena mkonyaḇa, mboi yakimfir mko kwar ro supswan ine, eḇedari supswan ine dayin mko.
43015020	Mko swarepen rosai yakofen faro mko kwar: manfamyan oso ikaki syadi tuan ḇyediḇa. Rofyor sewayam aya kwar, rarirya nari sewayam mko kako; rofyor siso farkarkor ayena, nari siso farkarkor mkoḇena kako.
43015021	Ḇape roi ḇeḇor nakam nari sifrur na faro mko snar aya, snar ssmambaḇir ḇewan ayanyaḇa.
43015022	Rofyor yarama ḇaim ma yawawos faro siḇa, nari sesasar ḇa. Ḇape baboine sisma sanoḇa faro sasar sena!
43015023	Mansei ḇeyayin aya, ikako dayin Mami.
43015024	Rofyor yafrur fararur nane ro fadu senaḇa imnis raris snonkaku ḇesesya moḇ sifararur ḇaḇeri raya nari sesasarḇa. Ḇape baboine smam roi ḇeḇor yafrur nakam kwar ḇesyaḇo sayin faro aya ma Mami kako.
43015025	Ḇape fasfas ro Refo Yahudi sedi nari seimnisi: Sayin aya kuker knamoḇa.
43015026	Nari yawan faro mko Rur Ḇeḇuk sneprei ḇeḇeknam ro Kmaya iso nari ḇafasna napnapes ro Allah ya. Rofyor ryama kwar, nari ḇyesaksi ro aya.
43015027	Ma mko kako nari mkoḇe saksi ro aya, snar mko kada ro randakya mko fnoḇek aya kwar."
43016001	"Yakofen roi ḇeḇor nane kam faro mko, insa mkoḇe ḇirḇar awer.
43016002	Nari spampum mkobur rum nadi na, ma nari fafisuya ryama nari snonkaku ḇemun mko skara ḇo soḇo: sesyowi faro Allah.
43016003	Nari sifrur rarirya faro mko, snar ssmambaḇir faro Mami ma ayaḇa.
43016004	(4a) Ḇape yakofen roi ḇeḇor nane kam faro mko, insa rofyor fafisuya ryama ido mko swarepen mboi yakofen na kwar faro mko." (4b) "Roi nane kam yakofen na faro mko ro randakyaḇa, snar fyor ine aya isya fnoḇek mko,
43016005	ḇape baboine nari yakaḇer faro ḇewan aya kwarya ma mkono osero ḇaḇeri ḇefuken maro aya: Waḇe rwa ḇeso?
43016006	Ḇape snar yakofen roi ḇeḇor nane faro mko, eḇedari mkosnemna nfafardun.
43016007	Rarirya roi yakofen faro mko nane nkaku: Iḇye syadi faro mko, fa yara. Snar rofyor yaraḇa, nari yawan Rur Ḇeḇuk snepreiya faro mkoḇa. Ḇape rofyor yara, nari yawani faro mko.
43016008	Ma rofyor ryama ido, iso nari ḇeḇuk fa supswan ine ssmambaḇir sasarna, napnapes ma ḇaḇesamamyaiya;
43016009	ro sasarna, snar sikyar faswef faro ayaḇa;
43016010	faro napnapesya, snar yara faro Mami ma mkomam aya werḇa;
43016011	ro ḇaḇesamamyaiya, snar samambraḇ supswan ine isma samamyai kwar.
43016012	Roi ono naisya nabor kaker fa yakofen faro mko wer, ḇape baboine mko sambraḇ ḇaim fa mko kamar na.
43016013	Ḇape rofyor Rur ḇenapesya ryama, ikada nari dun mko faro napnapesya; snar nari iwos ro roi ḇekur mankundi ḇardiḇa, ḇape dawos roi ḇeḇor kam imnaf na naiso ikofen na ma nari ḇyaryas faro mko ro roi nari ḇerama na.
43016014	Ikada nari ḇyuk baba maḇe aya, snar nari ḇyaryas faro mko rosai isma ro aya.
43016015	Roi ḇeḇor kam Mami ḇyena, roi yana nairya, eḇedari yakofen: Rur ani nari ḇyaryas faro mko rosai isma ro aya."
43016016	"Fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya werḇa ma fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya wer."
43016017	Simnaf rarirya manfamyan ḇyesi ono sifuken yae farosi: "Rosai ikofen ḇesyani: Fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya werḇa, ma fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam aya wer? Ma: Yara faro Kmaya?"
43016018	Inja sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Rosai ikofen ḇesya maroko: Fafisu kermkun monda wer? Kofawi rosai ikofenyaḇa."
43016019	Yesus ifawi, mboi simarisen sifuken roi oso faroi, inja ikofen farosi: "Inja roi yakofen ro insanja anna naiso mko fuken yae mko kuker na, isoine: Fafisu kermkun monda nari mkomam ayaḇa ma fafisu kermkun monda wer kako nari mkomam aya?
43016020	Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Nari mko kanes mboi supswan ine nari siryaḇ; mko kada nari mkomandak, ḇape mandak mkoḇena nari nfarwe ḇe raryaḇ.
43016021	Bin oso fyafardun rofafisu fanam iḇe daḇenya, ḇape rofafisu daḇen romawa ḇyedi kwar, bin ani ḇyepro kandera ḇyena, snar wombrek mkun oso ḇyeḇeaḇen kwar ḇe supswan ine.
43016022	Rarirya kako fafisu ine mkoḇe mandak, ḇape nari yasrow mko wer ma nari mkoryaḇ ma snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri fa dun raryaḇ mkoḇena burmko.
43016023	Ma ro ras ani mkono nari ifuken roi ono faro aya ḇa. Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro mko: Roi ḇeḇor kam mkor faro Mami kuker snonsnon ayedi nari ḇyukna faro mko.
43016024	Isof ro ras ine mkor roi oso ḇaim kuker snonsnon ayedi. Mkor nari mkosma, insa raryaḇ mkoḇedi imnis.
43016025	Roi ḇeḇor nane kam yakofen na faro mko kuker sarḇer. Mboi fafisuya nari ryama yawos faro mko kuker sarḇer wer ḇa, ḇape yawos isnabos beri ro Mami faro mko.
43016026	Ro ras ani nari mkonadi kuker snonsnon ayedi. Ma yakofen faro mkoḇa mboi yor ro Mami faro mko;
43016027	snar Mami mankundi iswar mko, snar mkoswar aya kwar ma mkokyar mboi yarama ro Allah.
43016028	Yarama ro Mami ma yarama ḇe supswan ine; yabur supswan ine wer ma yara faro Mami wer."
43016029	Manfamyan ḇyesi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Babo ine Manseren wawos isna bosḇeri ma swarḇer werḇa.
43016030	Insape nkofawi, mboi wafawi roi ḇeḇor nane kam ma fandun fa snonkaku sifuken wer ro awḇa. Eḇedari nkokyar mboi rwama ro Allah."
43016031	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Inja insape mkokyare?
43016032	Mkomam, fafisuya ryama ma ryama kwar, mboi mkoḇe ḇekakek oser-oser ḇe moḇ ḇyedi ma mkobur ayaḇo yerer ro mankundaya. Mboi yemir ḇardiḇa, snar Mami ryous aya.
43016033	Yakofen faro mko, roi ḇeḇor nane, insa mkosma aski snar mkoḇe oser kuker aya. Ro supswan ine sewayam mko ma mkoḇe kandera ḇape mkosambraḇser mkosnemna, snar yakafyo supswan ine kwar."
43017001	Yesus ikofen rarirya. Raimnai iwakwaker ḇe nanki ma ikofen: "Mami, fafisuya ryama kwar; buk baba faro Rumkun bedi, insa Rumkun bedi dakfrur baba faro aw.
43017002	Imnis raris buk faroi kwar papoik robo kawasasya kam, rarirya nari ḇyuk kako kankenem ḇekain fyoroya faro snonkakusya kam buk faroi kwarsya.
43017003	Kankenem ḇekain fyoroya, isoine mboi ssmambaḇir aw werer Allah ḇenapes, ma ssmambaḇir Yesus Kristus wawan kwar ani.
43017004	Yafrur wasma baba kwar ro supswan ine kuker nyan yafrur posa fararur buk maro aya fa yafrur na.
43017005	Inja knikine, o Mami, buk baba ḇe aya ro aw ḇardi, kuker baba yasma ro ḇarpon bedi rofyor supswan ine isya ḇaim.
43017006	Yafasna Mami kwar faro snonkaku ḇeḇor buk kwar maro aya ro supswan ine. Sikada aw ḇenasi ma buksi maro aya kwar ma siso wos ḇena kwar.
43017007	Insape sifawi, mboi snonkaku buk ḇe ayansya kam seknam ro aw.
43017008	Snar roi ḇeḇor buk maro aya kwar yaḇuk na kwar farosi ma sakna na kwar. Sifawibos kaku, yaḇe knam ro aw ma sikyar aw ḇewan ayanya.
43017009	Yaḇe nadi warek si. Yaḇe nadi faro supswan ineḇa, ḇape faro snonkaku buk kwar maro aya, snar aw ḇenasi,
43017010	ma roi ḇeḇor ayena kam aw ḇenananya ma roi nwana ayai ḇenananya, ma yasma baba kukersi kwar.
43017011	Ma aya isya ro supswan ine werḇa, ḇape sikada sisya kaker ro supswan ine, ma yara mufaḇe aw. O Mami ḇesren, fadurusi ro snonsnon ḇedi, isoine snonsnon bedi bema ḇe aya kwar; insa sḇeoser imnis raris Ko.
43017012	Rofyor aya isya fnoḇek si, yafadurusi ro snonsnon bedi, isoine snonsnon bedi buk kwar maḇe aya; yawarensi kwar, ma oso rosi ryoḇa derer faroi sfasna kwar fa ḇeroe, insa fasfas Refoya imnis.
43017013	Insape yara mufaḇe aw ma yakofen nakam ine rofyor aya isya kaker ro supswan ine, insa raryaḇ ayena rofandusi.
43017014	Yaḇuk wos ḇena farosi kwar, inja supswan ine sayinsi, snar sikada supswan ine nyasiḇa, imnis raris aya ine kako sup-swan ine nya ayaḇa.
43017015	Yor fa wunsi bur supswan ineḇa, imboi insa fadirensi ro ḇarḇorya.
43017016	Supswan ine nyasiḇa, imnis aya kako supswan ine nya ayaḇa.
43017017	Fasren si ro napnapesya; wos bedi kada napnapes rirya.
43017018	Imnis raris wawan aya kwar ḇe supswan ine, rarirya yawansi ḇe supswan ine kako;
43017019	ma yafasren mankundaya farosi, insa seḇeyakfasren ro napnapesya.
43017020	Ma yaḇenadi warek serer mondaḇa, ma yaḇenadi warek kako snonkaku ḇekyar faro ayasya snar ḇararyas sena;
43017021	insa sikam seoser, imnis raris Mami, ḇyeoser kuker aya ma aya yaḇeoser kuker Mami, insa sikako sakḇe oser kuker Ko, insa supswan ine sikyar, mboi Mami ḇewan ayanya.
43017022	Yaḇuk farosi baba, buk kwar maḇe ayana, insa sḇeoser, imnis raris moḇ Ko ḇeoser raya.
43017023	Aya yaḇe oser kukersi ma aw beoser kuker aya insa simnis sḇeoser, insa supswan ine sifawi, mboi aw ḇewan aya kwar ma waswarsi, imnis raris waswar aya.
43017024	O Mami ḇenapes, mboi supswan ine dakmam baḇir awḇa, ḇape aya kada yamambaḇir aw ma naek ansine kada sifawi, mboi aw ḇewan ayanya.
43017025	O Mami, yamarisen insa, moḇ rosai aya isya roya, sisya fnoḇek aya, snonkaku buk kwar maḇe aya, insa smam baba ayena buk kwar maḇe aya, snar waswar aya kwar rofyor supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya.
43017026	Ma yakofen ḇadir snonsnon bedi farosi kwar ma nari yakofen ḇadir wer, insa saswar buk faro aya ḇyeoser kuker si ma ayano yaḇe oser kukersi."
43018001	Yesus ḇyenadi rarirya kwar isasyar ro moḇ ani kuker manfamyan ḇyesi skunuk war Kidron. Rodia yaf oso isya ma Yesus syun ro yaf ani fnoḇek manfamyan ḇyesi.
43018002	Yudas ḇeḇoḇ Yesus, dakfawi moḇ ani kako, snar fafisu ono Yesus fyananjur kuker manfamyan ḇyesi ro moḇ ani.
43018003	Inja mananir imam-imam ma snon Farisisya siwan Yudas fa dun sarar sordade Romawi ma manwarwaren Allah Rum ḇyedi, ssun romamun ma ambar, ḇo sakrama ro moḇ ani.
43018004	Yesus ifawi kwar rosai nari ḇekuri, inja imbran fa isrowsi ma ikofen farosi: "Manseiso mko sewarya?"
43018005	Skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Yesus ro Nazaret." Ikofen farosi: "Aya isoine." Yudas ḇeḇoḇi ani isya kako rodia fnoḇeksi.
43018006	Rofafisu ikofen farosi: "Aya isoine," sisusu ma sisapi kam.
43018007	Raimnai ifuken wer: "Manseiso mko sewarya?" Sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Yesus ro Nazaret."
43018008	Yesus kyarem: "Yakofen kwar faro mko, aya isoine. Rofyor ayai mkosewarya ido, mkorir ḇese sine fa sibur."
43018009	Rarirya insa Yesus wos ikofen kwar imnis: "Mami manseiso buk kwar maro aya, yamam mondasi ḇo oso ryoḇa."
43018010	Inja Simon Petrus, ḇeyun sumber oso, pyas sumber ani ro sowerya ma pyapek bas imam ḇeba manfyan ḇyedi knaram byedi ḇar rakuya. Manfyan ani snonsnon ḇyedi Malkus.
43018011	Yesus ikofen faro Petrus: "Swower sumber bedi; kwara woḇo yamewer yinem ro sekaninem kandera Mami ḇyuk kwar maro aya?"
43018012	Inja sarar sordade Romawi mananir sedi ma Yahudisya manwarwaren siwansya sfor Yesus ma sewankai.
43018013	Raimnai suni ḇepon faro Hanas, Kayafas manbanyori, Kayafas ine iso ḇeḇe Imam Ḇeba ro wampasi wambarek ani.
43018014	Kayafas ine iso ḇeḇuk swarepen kwar faro kawasa Yahudisya: "Iḇye syadi snonkaku oser imar sadwer er ḇeḇor kam."
43018015	Simon Petrus ma manfamyan ḇese ani suso Yesus. Manfamyan ḇese anikada ifawi Imam Ḇebaya, inja daksun fnoḇek Yesus ḇe buḇes Imam Ḇeba rum ḇyedi,
43018016	mboi Petrus iwaf ro ḇondi fanam kedwaya. Manfamyan ḇese ḇefawi Imam Ḇeba ani, kyaḇer randi, dawawos faro ḇinfyan ḇewaren kedwaya, raimnai dun Petrus fa syun.
43018017	Ḇinfyan ḇewaren kadwai ani ikofen faro Petrus, ḇo doḇo: "Awne kako manfamyan oso ro snon iwa?" Petrus kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Roḇa!"
43018018	Rofafisu ani manfyan manwarwaren Allah Rum ḇyedi ono sikaḇen for oso kwar, snar pnunek iba ro fafisu ani, ma sores sidapen rodia. Petrus kako dores dakdapen fnoḇeksi.
43018019	Ma Imam Ḇebaya irandak ifuken Yesus ro manfamyan ḇyesi ma farkarkor ḇyena kako.
43018020	Yesus kyarem farosi: "Yawos isna ro fababa faro supswan ine: Yaḇuk farkarkor ḇesya kwar ro rum nadi ma Allah Rum ḇyedi moḇ kawasa Yahudisya siryur ro na; yawos roi ono kuker kankunes ḇaim.
43018021	Snaro wafuken aya? Wafukensi rosai yakofen kwar farosi; kaku ḇeri sifawi rosai yafarkor kwar farosi."
43018022	Rofafisu ikofen rarirya, snon ḇewaren oso ḇeyores ro dia, ḇyaser Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Kwarem rarirya faro Imam Ḇeba?"
43018023	Yesus kyarem faroi: "Rofyor wos ayedi syasar ido, fasna sasarya, ḇape rofyor wos ayedi kyaku ido, snaro baser aya?"
43018024	Ma Hanas fyaremi kuker ḇramin ḇeḇewanka faro Imam Ḇeba Kayafas.
43018025	Simon Petrus dores dakdapen for kaker rodia. Snonkaku ḇeyores rodia sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Aw kako manfamyan oso roi?"
43018026	Fyamyuni ḇo doḇo: "Roḇa." Manfyan oso ro Imam Ḇeba isoine kina ro snon Petrus pyapekbas knaram ani ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Insanja yamam aw kako ro yaf ani fnoḇek snon ani?"
43018027	Ma Petrus fyamyun wer ma rofyorya mankokosya sor.
43018028	Ma arwo prim kaku Yesus ḇyeḇeyun ro Kayafas rum ḇyedi ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes. Sikada saksun ro rum karkara ḇenapesḇa snar simkak ḇude sifrur mamas mankunsi, snar siḇe san Paskah.
43018029	Eḇedari Pilatus isasyar fa isrowsi ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Rosai mkoḇuksof snon ineya?"
43018030	Skarem faroi ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor snon ḇeḇarḇor risyaḇa kada nari nkuni fa nkoḇuki faro awḇa!"
43018031	Pilatus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkuni ma mkoḇe mankarai raris sasoser Refo Yahudi mkoḇedi." Yahudi ansi soḇo: "Nkopok nkoḇuk samamyai marmari faro snonkakuḇa."
43018032	Rarirya insa imnis Yesus wos ikofen, fa ḇekur marmar ḇyedi.
43018033	Raimnai Pilatus syun kaḇer ḇerum karkara ḇenapesya, raimnai dor Yesus ma ifukeni, ḇo doḇo: "Aw ine wairek Yahudisya sediso awke?"
43018034	Yesus kyarem: "Inja fakfuken ḇedine dekro snembrike roḇaido ono ḇese ḇekofen faro aw ro aya?"
43018035	Pilatus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Inja aya ine snon Yahudike? Er ḇesi ḇardi ma mananir imam-imam siso ḇeḇuk aw faro aya kwar; rosai wafrur kwarya?"
43018036	Yesus kyarem: "Ḇaḇesasoser ayedi isya ro supswan ineḇa; rofyor Ḇaḇesasoser ayadi isya ro supswan inekada, nari manfamyan ayesi sisampum, ma siḇri warek aya insa ssḇuk aya faro Yahudisya ḇa, ḇape Ḇaḇesasoser ayedi ro dineḇa."
43018037	Inja Pilatus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Inja wairek risawke?" Yesus kyarem: "Imnis raris moḇ wakofen raya, kaku aya ine wairek. Iso eḇedari yaḇe ḇeaḇen ma iso eḇedari yarama ḇe supswan ine, insa yaḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ro ḇaḇenapnapesya; snonkaku oser-oser ḇeḇeknam ro napnapesya simnaf mkaren ayedi."
43018038	(38a) Pilatus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Rosai ḇaḇenapnapes ani?" (38b) Raimnai Pilatus isasyar ro rum karkara ḇenapes wer faro kawasa ansi ma ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yasma sasar oso ḇaḇeri ro snon ine.
43018039	Ḇape faro mko ro ras Paskah yasasyar snon oso ro ḇesmaisya faro mko. Mko marisenke yasasyar wairek Yahudi faro mko?"
43018040	Skarem kuker ḇararas, ḇo soḇo: "Roḇa, iba ḇoi Barabas!" Barabas ikada snon oso ḇefasyar.
43019001	Raimnai Pilatus duni ma iwan fa sipreri.
43019002	Sordadesya siyanem wower borek oso ro kaḇrai borek posa sriri ro ḇukor ḇyedi. Ma ssansuni kuker syatuḇefuk,
43019003	Ma sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Jow suba, ne wairek Yahudi!" Raimnai sḇaseri.
43019004	Raimnai Pilatus isasyar wer ma ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkomam, yuni fa isasyar faro mko, insa mkofawi, yasma sasar oso roi ḇaḇeri."
43019005	Raimnai Yesus isasyar, isaswo wower borek ma syansun syatu ḇefuk. Ma Pilatus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkomam snonkaku ine!"
43019006	Rofyor mananir imam-imam ma manwarwaren ansi smami, sibras kam ḇo soḇo: "Ḇye ḇepai ro aprop, ḇye ḇepai ro aprop!" Pilatus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Mkuni ma mkopai ro mankun mko; snar yasma sasar oso roi ḇaḇeri."
43019007	Kawasa Yahudi skarem faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Nkona sasoser ma sasoser ani doḇo nari imar snar kyarem mankundi ḇe Allah Rumkun ḇyedi."
43019008	Rofafisu Pilatus imnaf wos ḇerarirya imkak syadi wer,
43019009	raimnai syun kaḇer wer ḇe rum karkara ḇenapes ma ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Aw ido beknam roriso?" Ḇape Yesus kyaremba.
43019010	Inja Pilatus ikofen faroi wer, ḇo doḇo: "Inja wamewer wawos kuker ayake? Wafawi ḇake yasma papoik fa yafaspar aw, ma papoik kako fa yawan ḇo spai aw ro aprop?"
43019011	Yesus kyarem: "Wasma papoik oḇa beri kako faro aya, rofyor papoik ani ḇyeḇeḇuk faro aw ro boiyaswaḇa. Eḇedari: ḇeḇuk aya faro awsya sasar sena naba syadi ro aw."
43019012	Rofyor ani Pilatus ḇyesewar fa fyaspar Yesus, ḇape kawasa Yahudisya sibras, ḇo soḇo: "Rofyor faspari ido Kaisar bati ḇyediso awḇa. Snonkaku oso ḇekara mankundi ḇe wairek ikada isampum Kaisar."
43019013	Rofyor Pilatus imnaf wos anna, iwan fa ssun Yesus ḇe ḇondi, ma kyain ro karapesa napnapesya, ro moḇ ḇenirḇe Litostrotos, (ansan karui) ro wos Ibrani Gabata.
43019014	Ras ani kada ras fasasos Paskah, indokada oras samfur seser risuru. Pilatus ikofen faro kawasa Yahudi ansi; ḇo doḇo: "Inekada wairek mkoḇedi!"
43019015	Inja sibras ḇo soḇo: "Mkomuni! Mkomuni! Mko pai ro aprop!" Pilatus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Inja mkomarisen ḇoyapai wairek mkoḇedi ro aprop?" Mananir imam-imam ansi skarem, ḇo soḇo: "Nkona wairek oso ḇese ḇa mboi Kaisar ikada wairek nkoḇedirya!"
43019016	(16a) Ḇarpurya Pilatus ḇyuk Yesus farosi fa spai ro aprop. (16b) Ssun Yesus raimnai sra.
43019017	Yesus mankundi ḇyar aprop ḇyedi ḇo isasyar ḇe moḇ ḇenirḇe Ḇukorbei, ro wos Ibrani: Golgota.
43019018	Ma rodia spai ro aprop ma spai fnoḇeki kako snon risuru oso ro ḇar raku ma oso ro ḇar rasar ḇoi Yesus ro fadu.
43019019	Ma Pilatus iwan fa sfas ro Yesus aprop ḇyedi: "Yesus ro Nazaret, wairek kawasa Yahudi."
43019020	Kawasa Yahudi sibor siwasya fasfas ani, snar moḇ spai Yesus ro ani fyanam mnuya ma fasfas anna neḇefas ro wos Ibrani, Latin (Roma) ma wos Yunani.
43019021	Inja mananir imam-imamsya sikofen faro Pilatus, ḇo soḇo: "Fas awer: 'Yahudisya wairek sedi,' mboi fas radine: 'Snon ine ikofen, Aya Wairek kawasa Yahudi.' "
43019022	Pilatus kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Rosai yafas kwar, kyain raririrya."
43019023	Sordade ansi spai Yesus kwar, ssun sansun ḇyena ma serwas na ḇefiak: Oser-oser isma rarwas oser ma syatu ḇyedi suni kako. Syatu ani ḇyeḇesipḇa mboi ḇyeḇesnai robo ḇe sop monda.
43019024	Eḇedari sikofen yae farosi, ḇo soḇo: "Korwas iḇe mnuk-mnuk awer, mboi iḇye kokinsor fa kofawi mansei ḇenaiya. Sifrur rarirya insa seimnis fas-fas ro Refo: "Sḇerarwas sansun ayena, ma skinsor faro syatu ayedi." Ma sordade ansi sifrur rarirya.
43019025	Ma ro fanam Yesus aprop ḇyedi, snari dores ma sna ḇedar ḇyedi Maria, Kleopas swari ma Maria Magdalena.
43019026	Fafisu Yesus myam snari ma manfamyan iswar ani dores fanami, inja ikofen faro snari: "Awine, inekada romawa bedi!"
43019027	Raimnai ikofen faro manfamyan ḇyedi: "Inekada sna bedi!" Randak ro ras ani beri manfamyan ani dun Yesus snari ḇe rum ḇyedi.
43019028	Raimnai, Yesus ifawi, mboi roi ḇeḇor kam namnis kwar, ma insa rosai sfas ro Refo ndarirya, inja ikofen: "Yambrow!"
43019029	Rodia isya sek oso ifo kuker anggur ḇemnir. Inja skokukser bunek ḇesowen kwar ro anggur ḇemnir ansi ro amfriwen oso ma skosui ro Yesus sḇardip ḇyedi.
43019030	Yesus dinem anggur ḇemnir ani kwar, ikofen: "Imnis kwar." Raimnai kyankunem ma imar.
43019031	Snar ras ani ras fasasos ma insa ro ras Mananai Yahudi ani kekḇa ansi skaf awer ro aprop-snar ras Mananai Yahudi ani ras ḇeba rirya-inja kawasa Yahudi sra faro Pilatus ma sor faroi insa snonkaku spai ansi wemin sena neḇepankar ma kekḇa ansi seḇesabu.
43019032	Inja sordade ansi sra ma spankar ḇepon snon risuru spai fnoḇek Yesus ansuya wemin suḇesi;
43019033	ḇape rofyor srama faro Yesus ma smam imar kwar, inja sakpankar wemin ḇyesuya ḇa,
43019034	ḇape snon oso ro sordade ansi iwankir pe ḇyedi kuker bom, ma rik kuker war nasar beri.
43019035	Ma snonkaku ḇemam roi ḇeḇesya ani iso ḇeḇuk ḇaḇesaksi kako ma ifawi ḇaḇesaksi ḇyedi kyaku, ma ifawi, mboi ikofen roi ḇenapes, insa mkokyar kako.
43019036	Roi ḇeradine ndarirya, insa fasfas ro Refo imnis isoine: "Kor ḇyesi oso nari ḇyeḇepankarḇa."
43019037	Ro Refo sfas kako radine: "Nari smam Yesus siwankir ani."
43019038	Posa kwar Yusuf ro Arimatea rya faro Pilatus ma dor insa dun Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi ro apropya. (Yusuf manfamyan ro Yesus ḇeso fasis, snar imkak kawasa Yahudisya.) Ma Pilatus ḇyuk raris fararyor ani. Inja rya dun Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi.
43019039	Nikodemus, ro randakya ḇera faro Yesus rofafisu roḇ, dakso Yusuf kako. Nikodemus dun mani mur ḇefawas mampasa marḇakḇakya indokada kati samfur ririm.
43019040	Snon ansuine suyun Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi, suparek epeni kuker kruḇen ḇepyoper ma supyosi kuker kefi-kefi imnis rari kawasa Yahudi rofyor sikrir ḇemarsya.
43019041	Fanam moḇ spai Yesus ro ani yaf pampen oso isya, ma ro yaf ani ureren babo oso isya, ḇape sikrir snon oso roi ḇaim.
43019042	Snar ras ani ras fasasos kawasa Yahudi ma ureren ani ḇyinkwanḇa, inja sfaryaker Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi ro dia.
43020001	Ro ras ari arwo prim kaku, fafisu isnai karkir, Maria Magdalena ryaḇe rus ani ma myam mboi karui ḇesisen urerenya ḇyeḇekris kwar bur urerenya.
43020002	Ifrar fa syewar Simon Petrus ma manfamyan Yesus iswar ani, ma ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ono ssun Manseren bur ureren ḇyani ma nkofawi moḇ sikrami wer royaḇa."
43020003	Inja Petrus ma manfamyan ḇese ani sura ḇe rus ani.
43020004	Sufrar kam ḇape manfamyan ḇese ani ifrar samberen syadi Petrus inja pyonra ro rus ani.
43020005	Kyankunem ma ikiki myam ro urerenya, kruḇen ḇeparek Yesusya ḇyarek ro moḇ ani, ḇape syun ro ureren aniḇa.
43020006	Simon Petrus iyauser ma syun pdef ro ureren ani. Myam kruḇen ḇeparek Yesus ani ḇyarek rodia,
43020007	ma marḇun ḇefes Yesus bukor ḇyedi ḇyarek fanam kruḇen ḇeparekiya ḇa, mboi ḇyeḇeyaper ḇo ḇyarek ḇese.
43020008	Inja manfamyan ḇese ḇefrar ḇepon maro rus ani, dakkiki kako ma myam rarirya inja ikyar.
43020009	Snar rofyor ani kada sifawi ḇaim rosai sfas ro Refo mboi nari diḇeri bur marmarya.
43020010	Raimnai manfamyan ansuya subur ḇe rum.
43020011	Ḇape Maria dores fanam ureren ani ḇo kyanes. Fafisu kyanes ḇo ikiki fa myam ro ureren ani,
43020012	ma myam malaikat risuru susansun sansun ḇepyoper ḇo sukain ro moḇ Yesus kekḇa ḇyedi ḇyarek ro ani, suminya ro mun ḇukorya ma suminya ro mun weminya.
43020013	Malaikat ansuya sukofen faroi: "Awine, rosai kwanes kukerya?" Maria kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku ono ssun Manseren ayedi kwar ma yafawi moḇ sriri royaḇa."
43020014	Ikofen rarirya kwar iknenef ḇeḇarpur ma myam Yesus dores, ḇape ifawiḇa, mboi Yesus irya.
43020015	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Awine, rosai kwanes kukerya? Mansei swewarya?" Maria kyara ḇo doḇo snon ḇewaren yaf rirya inja ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Tuan rofyor awi ḇeyuni ido wakofen ḇadiri ḇe aya, moḇ rosai rwiri roya, insa yara yuni."
43020016	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Maria!" Maria iknenef ma ikofen faroi kuker wos Ibrani: "Rabuni!" isoine, "Guru".
43020017	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Pan awer ro aya, snar yara faro Mami ḇaim, mboi rwa wakofen faro naek ayansi, mboi insape yaḇe yara faro Mami ma Kma mko ḇedi, faro Allah ayedi ma Allah mkoḇedi."
43020018	Maria Magdalena rya ma ikofen faro manfamyan ansi: "Yamam Manseren kwar!" ma Manseren iso ḇekofen roi ḇeḇor anna faroi.
43020019	Ro ras ari ani kako fafisu roḇ kwar, Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi siryur ro rum oso ma kedwana neḇesopder, snar simkak kawasa Yahudisya. Rofafisu ani Yesus ryama dores fandusi, ma ikofen: "Aski faro mko!"
43020020	Ma ikofen rarirya kwar, fyasna ḇramin ḇyesu ma pe ḇyedi farosi. Manfamyan ansi simarisen kaku rofafisu smam Manseren.
43020021	Ma Yesus ikofen wer: "Aski faro mko! Imnis raris Mami iwan aya, rarirya knikine yakwan mko kako."
43020022	Ma rofyor dawawos rarirya kwar, iwuf yoi ḇyedi farosi ma ikofen: "Mkosma Rur Ḇesrenya.
43020023	Rofyor mkopyos snonkaku oso sasar ḇyena, Allah kako dakpyos sasar ḇyena. Mboi rofyor mkopyos oso sasar ḇyenaḇa, Allah kako dakpyos sasar ḇyenaḇa."
43020024	Tomas, snon oso ro manfamyan samfur seser risuru, ḇyansi sap i kako ḇe Didimus, isya fnoḇek min ḇyesiḇa rofafisu Yesus ryama farosi ani.
43020025	Inja manfamyan ḇese ansi sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Nko mam Manseren kwar!" Ḇape Tomas kyarem farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Rofyor yamam apurwan paku ro ḇramin ḇyesuyaḇa, ma yasyun ḇrampin ayesi ro apurwan paku ani ma yasyun ḇramin ayesi ro pe ḇyediḇa, yakyar ḇaim."
43020026	Ras riwar nawas kwar Yesus manfamyan ḇyesi siryur wer ro rum ani ma Tomas ifnoḇeksi kako. Fafisu ani kedwana neḇesopder kam, ḇesyaḇo Yesus ryama dores fanandusi, ma ikofen: "Aski faro mko!"
43020027	Ḇarpurya Yesus ikofen faro Tomas: "Wasyun ḇrampin besi rodine, ma mam ḇramin ayesuine, fos ḇramsu ma wasyun ro pe ayedine ma wakyarḇa kaker awer, mboi wakyar beri."
43020028	Tomas kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren yedi ma Allah yedi!"
43020029	Yesus ikofen faroi: "Snar mam aya kwar eḇedari wakyarya. Aski faro ḇemamḇa, mboi ḇekyarsya."
43020030	Aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor naisya nabor kaker Yesus ifrur ro ḇarpon manfamyan ḇyesi mamam sena, ḇape neḇefas kamba ro syap ine,
43020031	ḇape roi ḇeḇor nane neḇefas kwar insa mko kyar, mboi Yesus Wairek ḇeḇuk koreri, Allah Rumkun ḇyedirya, ma snar mko kyar faroi, inja mkosma kankenemya.
43021001	Ḇarpurya Yesus fyasna mankundi wer faro manfamyan ḇyesi ro danosen Tiberias andirya ma fyasna mankundi farosi radine.
43021002	Ro danosen andir ani manfamyan ḇyesi ono sisya siryur isoine: Simon Petrus, Tomas sap kako ḇe Didimus, Natanael ro Kana ro Galilea, Zebedeus mandaḇen ḇyesuya ma manfamyan ḇyesi suru wer.
43021003	Simon Petrus ikofen farosi, ḇo doḇo: "Yaḇe yaraswan." Sikofen faroi, ḇo soḇo: "Nkoso aw!" Sra sek ro waya, ḇape roḇ ani smun ino ḇaḇeri.
43021004	Fafisu fanam meser, Yesus dores ro danosen andirya; ḇape manfamyan ansi sifawiḇa, mboi ḇeyores ani Yesus irya.
43021005	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Ne, romawa yesi, mkosma manfna onoke?" Skarem ḇo soḇo: "Oroḇa beri."
43021006	Inja Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mko nap pam mkoḇedi ro waya ḇar rakuya, ma nari mkosma in ono." Raimnai snap pam ani ma ssambraḇ fa spaw pam aniḇa snar insya sibor mankenem.
43021007	Inja manfamyan Yesus iswar ani ikofen faro Petrus: "Manseren irya." Fafisu Petrus imnaf mboi Manseren irya, inja syansun sansun ḇyena, snar syansuni ḇa, raimnai doper ro danosenya.
43021008	Manfamyan ḇesesya siyauser kuker waya ma spaw pam ḇefo kuker in ani ḇe ḇonde snar sḇinkwan ro ḇondeyaḇa, indokada rof utin oser monda.
43021009	Fafisu srande kwar smam fondesna kuker in ma mamami.
43021010	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Indo mkun in mko mun babo ansi ono muma."
43021011	Simon Petrus dek ro waya raimnai skopaw pam ani ḇe ḇonde, ifo kuker in ḇeba-ḇeba monda: Utin oser samfur ririm seser rikior, sibor rarirya ḇesyaḇo pam ani imuk ḇaḇeri.
43021012	Yesus ikofen farosi: "Mkorama kanan." Manfamyan ansi oso ḇaḇeri ḇefuken faroi: "Inja manseso aw?" Snar sifawi, mboi Manseren irya.
43021013	Ḇarpurya Yesus fyanamsi, ma dun mamami ani fa ḇyukḇoḇ si. Ifrur rarirya kuker in ansi.
43021014	Ine rarwan ḇeḇe kior Yesus fyasna mankundi faro manfamyan ḇyesi posa ro aḇiḇer ḇyedi ro fandu ḇemarsya.
43021015	Sanan posa kwar Yesus ikofen faro Simon Petrus: "Simon, Yohanes mandaḇen ḇyedi, waswar syadi ayake ro min besine?" Petrus kyarem faroi, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren, wafawi, mboi yaswar aw." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wafarandows domba-domba ayesi."
43021016	Yesus ikofen faroi ḇerarwan ḇeḇe suruya: "Simon, Yohanes mandaḇen ḇyedi, waswar syadi ayake?" Petrus kyarem faroi; ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren wafawi, mboi yaswar aw." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wafarandows domba-domba ayesi."
43021017	Yesus ikofen faroi wer ḇerarwan ḇeḇekiorya: "Simon, Yohanes mandaḇen ḇyedi, waswar syadi ayake?" Inja Petrus sne ḇyedi fyafardun snar Yesus ifuken ḇerarwan rikior: "Waswar syadi ayake?" Ma ikofen faroi: "Manseren, Manseren wafawi roi ḇeḇor kam, wafawi, mboi yaswar aw." Yesus ikofen faroi: "Wafarandows domba-domba ayesi.
43021018	Kaku ḇeri yakofen faro aw: Fafisu besnonkborya mankundaw fes sifer bedi kuker ḇeḇoḇek ma wambran ḇe moḇ rosai wamarisenya, ḇape rofyor bemansar kwar, nari fos ḇramsu ma snonkaku ḇese siyaḇek aw ma sun awḇe moḇ mankundaw wamarisenḇa."
43021019	Wos nane ikofen na rarirya fa nfasna Petrus marmar ḇyedi ḇeḇuk baba faro Allah. Posa kwar Yesus ikofen faro Petrus: "Waso aya."
43021020	Fafisu Petrus iknenef, myam mboi manfamyan Yesus iswar ani isoine manfamyan ro fafisu skanan kam ma ḇekain fanam Yesus ma ḇefuken, ḇo ḇeyoḇo: "Manseren, manseiso nari ḇeḇoḇ awya?"
43021021	Rofyor Petrus myam manfamyan ani, ikofen faro Yesus, ḇo doḇo: "Manseren, rariso kuker snon ine?"
43021022	Yesus kyarem: "Rofyor yamarisen, nari ikenem rao isof yakaḇer werma, ine fararur bedisyaḇa. Mboi awkada waso aya."
43021023	Inja wos ani ḇyesno ro fandu manfamyan Yesus ḇyansi mankunsi, mboi manfamyan ani nari imarḇa. Ḇape Yesus ikofen rariryaḇa, mboi doḇo: "Rofyor yamarisen nari ikenem rao isof yakaḇerma wer, ine fararur bedisyaḇa."
43021024	Manfamyan ani iso, ḇeḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ro roi ḇeḇor nane kamya. Iso ḇefas epen na kako, insa kofawi rosai ikofen na nkaku.
43021025	Yesus roi ifrurna naisya nabor kaker, ḇape rofyor neḇefas kam oser ḇe oser ido, yakara ḇoi moḇ ono ro supswan ine fa naser syap ḇeḇor nari sfas naba.
44001001	Ne, Teofilus, ro syap ḇepon ayedi yafas kwar ro Yesus, roi ḇeḇor I frur ma fyarkor na,
44001002	isof ro ras ḇyeḇekanow ya. Fafisu ḇyeḇekanow ḇaim ḇyuk sasoser kwar kuker papoik Rur Ḇesren faro manwawan kyimfir kwar ansi.
44001003	Faro manwawan ansi Yesus fyasna mankundi ro fyor marindi ḇekur i nasyof kwar, ma kuker aḇyair nabor ḇyuk fasasnai mboi i kenem. Snar ro ras samfur rifiak, fyasnai mankundi ḇe rarwan ono ma dawawos faro si ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ya.
44001004	Ro ras oso fafisu dananus si, danunyoḇ si insa sibur awer Yerusalem, ḇoi skain ro dia fa siwaf Mami asas ḇyedi, raris i kofen kwar: "Imnis raris mkomnaf kwar ro aya.
44001005	Snar Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren kuker war, ḇape mkokada fyoroḇa nari mkosma masi sren kuker Rur Ḇesren."
44001006	Inja kawasa ḇeryur ro dia sifuken: "Manseren, wamarisenke ro fafisu ine, bawes Ḇaḇesasoser faro kawasa Israel?"
44001007	Yesus kyarem: "Fandunba fa mkofawi fafisu Mami mankundi ḇyuk kwar raris papoik ḇyedi.
44001008	Mboi nari mkosma papoik, rofyor Rur Ḇesren dadofes ḇemko, ma nari mkoḇesaksi ḇe aya ro Yerusalem ma sup Yudea ḇesiper, Samaria isof supswan pember ya."
44001009	Yesus dawos rarirya posa, ḇyeḇekanowḇo sesaksi kam, ma mandifna nakawef i bur mamam sena.
44001010	Rofyor smam asuser ḇe nanki, fafisu ḇyeḇekanow ani, kniko snon risuru ḇesansun sansun ḇepyoper suyores fanam si,
44001011	ma sukofen faro si: "Ne, snon Galilea, snaro mkores ma mkomam ḇenanki? Yesus ine, ḇyeḇekanow benanki ḇebur mko, nari kyaḇer wer kuker nyan ḇeraris mkomambo ḇyeḇekanow ḇe boiyaswa."
44001012	Ma manwawan ansi skaḇer ro urk sapḇe urk Zaitun ḇe Yerusalem, swaf ya imnis mararan ro ras Ari ro Yerusalem.
44001013	Fyor sra kwar ro mnu ya, sekḇe sim ḇero bo, moḇ seryar roya. Manwawan ansi isoine Petrus ma Yohanes, Yakobus ma Andreas, Filipus ma Tomas, Bartolomeus ma Matius, Yakobus Alfeus mandaḇendi, Simon snon Zelot ma Yudas Yakobus mandaḇendi.
44001014	Sikam sesne oser ro nadi kayam, kuker bin ono ma Maria Yesus snari ma Yesus ḇedar ḇyesi.
44001015	Ro ras anna Petrus dores fandu naek ḇeryur ansi, barbor sedi indokada utin oser samfur risuru, ma ikofen:
44001016	"Ne, naek ayena mko, imnis fas-fas ro Refo, Daud ikofen kwar kuker famfnoḇek Rur Ḇesren ro roi ḇekur Yudas, ḇefarkin snonkaku ḇefor Yesus ansi.
44001017	Snar randak ya Yudas daksun kako ro dandonek koḇedi ma daksmai rarwas ro fararur ine."
44001018	Yudas ani kyoḇes kwar saprop mnuk oso kuker ḇaḇyak ro ḇarḇor ḇyena, ma isapi fa doḇer bosi, isof sneri imef ma snewar ḇyesi skakyai.
44001019	Roi ḇeḇesya ine kawasa kam ḇekain ro Yerusalem sifawiyi, isof saprop ani sap i ro wos sedi "Hakal-Dama", isoine "Saprop Rik".
44001020	"Snar fas-fas oso isya ro syap Mazmur: 'Iḇyesyadi aḇdares kankain ḇyedi ḇyeursḇa, ma iḇyesyadi ono skain awer ro moḇ ani;' ma: 'Iḇyesyadi oso ḇeso syadwer i ro nasan ḇyedi.'
44001021	Inja nari oso i fnoḇek ko isoine oso ro kawasa ḇerama ḇesoko ḇesya kwar ro fafisu Manseren Yesus i sya ro fandu ko,
44001022	isoine randak ro fafisu Yohanes ḇyuk masi sren isof ro Yesus ḇyeḇekanow ḇeboiyaswa bur ko, insa dakḇe saksi fnoḇek ko ro Yesus aḇiḇer ḇyedi."
44001023	Inja sfasnai snon risuru isoine: Yusuf sapḇe Barsabas roḇa Yustus ma Matias.
44001024	Sikam senadiḇo soḇo: "O Manseren, au ḇefawi snonkaku sya kam sisnesna, fasnaikada ro fandu snonkaku ansuine,
44001025	insa dakuf farmyan nasan ḇaḇemanwawan Yudas ibur ani, ḇesapi kwar faro moḇ ḇemnis kuker frur ḇyedi."
44001026	Raimnai skinsor snon ansui ma syor ro Matias ma rarirya i fnoḇek barbor ro manwawan samfur seser oser ansi.
44002001	Ro ras Sababu Rur Ḇesren, snonkaku ḇekyar sya si ryur kam ro moḇ oso.
44002002	Kniko rakrok oso dado ro nanki imnis wam doḇer ma kyain nosen rum, skain ro ya;
44002003	ma smam sak-sak ono namnis ramar, nasber ma nkain ro siḇrusna.
44002004	Ma sifo kuker Rur Ḇesren, mboi sirandak sawos ro wos-wos ḇeso, raris moḇ Rur ya ḇyuk fa sawos raya.
44002005	Rofyor ya snon Yahudi ḇekyar ono si sya ro Yerusalem ro er nakam ro supswan pember.
44002006	Fafisu rakrok ani dado ya, kawasa ḇeḇor ansi spanjuḇer. Ma sikmom snar oso-oso ro si imnaf manwawan ansi sawos ro wos sena.
44002007	Sikam sikandor ḇo sefesfyas ma sifuken: "Inja rariso snar ḇeyawawos sine kam snon Galilea inke?
44002008	Rariso indiri kokam komnaf sawawos ro wos koḇena oser-oser, isoine wos kawos ro mnu marin koḇena:
44002009	koine snon Partia, Media, Elam, ḇekain ro Mesopotamia, Yudea ma Kapadokia, Pontus ma Asia, Frigia ma Pamfilia,
44002010	Masir ma sup-sup Libia ḇefanam Kirene, snonkaku ḇerama ker Roma,
44002011	iḇye snon Yahudi ma ḇeyakso kako agama Yahudi, snon Kreta ma snon Arab, komnaf siwawos ro wos koḇena oser-oser ro fararur ḇeba Allah ifrurna."
44002012	Sikam sefesfyas ma sikmom ḇo sikofen yae faro si: "Rosaisoine?"
44002013	Ḇape snonkaku ḇeso ono skoryae ḇo soḇo: "Simser."
44002014	Inja Petrus iyori fnoḇek manwawan samfur seser oser ansi ma kuker mkaren ḇeba ikofen besi: "Ne, kawasa Yahudi ma mkokam ḇekain ro mnu Yerusalem, mkofawi ma mkokara wos ayena ne.
44002015	Snonkaku ansine simser raris moḇ mkokara raya ḇa, snar insape arwo babo oras siw,
44002016	ḇape raris Allah ikofen kwar kuker sḇayo Nabi Yoel:
44002017	Roi ḇeḇor nane ro ras ḇepupes nari ndama imnis Allah wos ḇyena nari yawan Rur Yedi faro kawasa kam; ma nari Rur ya fyarkor romawa-inai mkoḇesi fa sawos roi ono, ma snonkbor-inkbor mkoḇesi nari smam mamam ono, ma kawasa mansar mkoḇesi nari smafu mafu ono.
44002018	Ma manfamyan ayesi kako snon ma bin nari yawan Rur Yedi faro si ro ras-ras anna ma nari sawos roi ono.
44002019	Ma nari yafrur aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor ro nanki yaswa ma fasasnai kanandor ro supswan ine: isoine rik ma for kamayow ma paw.
44002020	Ma ori nari syadwer fa pyampanbos ma paikya irik ḇepon ro ras Manseren ifyafer ya, ras payamyum ḇeba ani.
44002021	Ma mansei ḇefararyor kuker snonsnon Manseren nari isma aski.
44002022	Ne, kawasa Israel, mkorower wos nane: Roi yakofen kuker ya isoine, Yesus ro Nazaret, snonkaku Allah kyimfir kwar ma fyasnai faro mko kuker samambraḇ ma aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor Allah ifrurna kuker Yesus ro fandu mko raris mkofawi.
44002023	Iso Allah ḇyuk, imnis marisen ḇyedi, ma mkopai i kwar ḇo mkomun i kuker ḇramin ro er-er ḇeḇarḇor.
44002024	Ḇape Allah ḇyawes i ma fyaspar i bur marindi marmar ya, snar papok marmar ya ipok fa kyarwarek i ḇa.
44002025	Snar Daud ikofen ro i doḇo: 'Yamam ḇesya kwar faro Manseren, snar dores fanam aya isof yapok yamarmer ḇa.
44002026	Eḇedari sneri marisen syadi ma rur yedi sandik Manseren, ma kraf yedi kenem kuker aski,
44002027	snar rwir aya faro munaiḇui ḇa, ma mam monda Manfamyan ḇesren bedi i pokem ḇa.
44002028	Wakofen ḇadir faro aya nyan kankenem ya; yamarisen syadi ro ḇarpon bedi snar au sya fanam aya.'
44002029	Naek ma srar, ryani yakofen ḇayirbos faro mko ro Daud, er koḇedi kpusedi. Imar kwar ma seraki ma rus ḇyedi, isya kaker ro fanduko isof ras ine.
44002030	Ḇape ikada nabi dirya ma ifawi, Allah ḇyeasas ḇe i kwar kuker soar, nari isiḇer oso ro Daud kpu ḇyesi fa ḇye wairek.
44002031	Eḇedari myam rarpon kwar ma ikofen ro Wairek aḇiḇer ḇyedi, rofyor ikofen, nari yamam monda au ro munaiḇui ḇa, ma kraf bedi ipokem ḇa.
44002032	Yesus ine kada iso Allah ḇyawes ya, ma ro aḇiḇer ḇyedi nkoine kam nko ḇesaksi.
44002033	Ma Allah ikanow i kwar ro ḇar raku ḇyedi ma isma Rur Ḇesren ḇyeasas ani, i sabui fa iso mkomam ma mkorower ine.
44002034	Snar Daud kada, dekḇe boiyaswa ḇa, mboi mankundi ikofen: Manseren ikofen kwar faro Manseren yedi:
44002035	Kwain ro ḇar raku yedi, isof yafrur mbroḇ besi fa seararef ro wemssu.
44002036	Inja er Israel syakam ipyum syadi si fawibos, isoine Allah isiḇer Yesus kwar, mkopai ro aprop ani, fa ḇye Manseren ma Kristus."
44002037	Rofyor simnaf rarirya sisnesna nkarsosen, isof sifuken faro Petrus ma manwawan ḇeso ansi: "O naek nkoḇesi mko, rosaiso nari nkofrur ya?"
44002038	Inja Petrus kyarem faro si: "Mkombror ma iḇye kada mkor fa mkosma masi sren kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus ḇeḇuk ampun ro sasar mkobena, ma nari mkosma Rur Ḇesren.
44002039	Snar mkoiso ḇeḇeknam asas ani ma faro romawa mkoḇesi ma faro kawasa ḇeḇinkwan kaker sya, isoine dandonek nari ḇesma fararyor ro Manseren Allah koḇedi."
44002040	Ma kuker wos ḇeso nabor wer Petrus ḇyesaksibos beri, ma imsorḇo danun si ma ikofen: "Mko faspar mankun mko bur syos ḇeḇarḇor sine."
44002041	Kawasa ḇekyar Petrus wos ḇyena sor fa sisma masi sren ma ro ras ani dandonek ḇefnoḇek sya indokada syaran rikior.
44002042	Sikam si souser manwawan ansi farkarkor sena kuker ḇaḇeoser. Ma sikam siraryur ḇesyakwar fa spanasnis mamami ma senadi.
44002043	Kawasa ansi simkak kam, snar manwawan ansi sifrur aḇyair kanandor nabor.
44002044	Ma kawasa ḇekyar kwar syakada sḇeoser ma nana sena snakam na,
44002045	ma ro fandu si, ono sisya sḇoḇ ḇesya kwar nana sena ma sirarwasna faro kawasa ansi imnis ananjar sena oser-oser.
44002046	Kuker ḇaḇeuser ma kuker sne oser siryur ro ras-ras kam ro Rum Allah. Spanasnis mamami ro rum sena oser-oser ro rum ḇe rum ma sanan kam kuker raryaḇ ma kuker sne ḇenapes,
44002047	mboi sisandik Allah. Ma kawasa kam simarisen si. Ma ras-ras nakam Manseren ḇyuk kawasa sibor fa sifnoḇek kuker snonkaku ḇesma aski.
44003001	Ro ras oso fanam oras nadi, isoine oras kior fafisu ori ikren, Petrus ma Yohanes suyek ḇe Rum Allah.
44003002	Ro dia snon oso isya ḇyemanis rofyor snari daḇen i isof sunfarma i kuker waryar. Ras-ras kam snon ani sriri fanam kedwai ḇeba ro Rum Allah, ḇenirḇe kedwai Ḇepyum, insa dor farsarser faro snonkaku ḇesun ro Rum Allah sya.
44003003	Rofyor snon ani myam, Petrus ma Yohanes suḇe susun ro Rum Allah, inja dor farsarser ro su.
44003004	Sumam bosi ma Petrus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Mambe nurori."
44003005	Inja snon ani iknower su kuker kakyar nari isma roi oso ro su.
44003006	Ḇape Petrus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Sarak ma brawen yana onoḇa, ḇape rosai yasma ya, yaḇuki faro au: Kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus, snon Nazaret ani, wambran!"
44003007	Raimnai ikin snon ani ḇrasi ḇar rakuya ma iyeri fa dores. Rofyor aniḇeri fasfisew ro wemin ḇyesu nsambraḇ.
44003008	Snon ani dores, ma doper ma imbran mura-muma ma iso su randum ro Rum Allah, imbran dapoper ma isandik Allah.
44003009	Kawasa ansi kam smam imbranḇo isandik Allah,
44003010	raimnai kawasa ansi smamḇaḇir iso ḇekainḇo ḇefararyor farsarser ro kedwai Ḇepyum ro Rum Allah, isof sikam sikandor ma sikmom rosai ḇeḇesya kukeri.
44003011	Snar snon ani iso wanan Petrus ma Yohanes su, inja kawasa ḇeḇor ḇekandor ansi srama spanjuḇer sko ro rumbrawer snirḇe Salomo.
44003012	Petrus myam kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ḇo ikofen: "Ne, kawasa Israel, snaro mko kandor kuker roi ḇeḇesyanine ma rosai mko knower inko imnis inkoiso ḇefrur snonkaku ine fa imbran snar samambraḇ roḇa souser inko ḇena nerer?
44003013	Allah Abraham, Ishak ma Yakub, Allah kpu koḇesi ḇyuk payamyum faro Manfamyan Ḇyedi kwar, isoine Yesus mkoḇoḇ ma mkopampum ro ḇarpon Pilatus, rofyor Pilatus kyara fa doḇo fyaspar i.
44003014	Ḇape mkopampum kwar, Ḇesren ma Ḇenapes ya, ma mkomarisen snon mamun oso ḇe sasuref ḇemko.
44003015	Rarirya Ḇye Manfarkin kankenem ya, mkomun i kwar, ḇape Allah ḇyawes i ro munaiḇui; ma roi ḇeḇesya nane inkoiso ḇeḇesaksi.
44003016	Ma snar kakyar faro snonsnon Yesus, rarirya snonsnon ani iso ḇeḇuk sambraḇ kwar faro snonkaku mkomam ma mkofawi ine; ma kakyar ani ḇeḇuk pararei kwar faro snon ine, ro ḇarpon mkoḇena kam.
44003017	Ne, naek ma srar mko, yafaw mkofrur rarirya snar fawawi ḇa mkoḇena, imnisbos kaku manfarkin mkoḇesi.
44003018	Ḇape kuker nyan ine Allah ifrur mnis rosai ikofen kwar ro ḇepon kuker sḇayo nabi-nabi Ḇyesi, isoine Wairek iwan ani nari isma marindi.
44003019	Inja mko mbror kada ma mkokaḇer insa sasar mkoḇena neḇepyos.
44003020	Insa Manseren ḇyuk fafisu marisen ma iwan Yesus Kristus, ḇyuk ḇemko ro randak ya.
