44003021	Kristus ani kyain ro boiyas isof fafisu roi ḇeḇor nakam namnis raris moḇ Allah ikofen kwar kuker sḇayo nabi-nabi ḇesren ḇyesi ro awar madero.
44003022	Imboi Moses ikofen kwar, ḇodoḇo: 'Manseren Allah nari ḇyawes faro mko nabi oso ro fandu naek mkoḇesi imnis i wan aya: Mko mnaf i ro roi ḇeḇor nari ikofen faro mko.
44003023	Ma nari ro fafisu iyama mansei ḇemnaf pyum nabi ani ḇa ikada nari ḇyeḇemun ro fandu er koḇesi.
44003024	Ma nabi sibor ḇekofen kwar randak ro Semuel ma ḇepon roi, sawos kwar ro fafisu ine.'
44003025	Mkokada mko ḇeknam wos nane ma mkosma rarwas ro asas Manseren Allah ḇyuk kwar faro up koḇesi, rofyor ikofen faro Abraham: Kuker kpu besi er kam ro supswan nari sisma ḇok.
44003026	Ma faro mko kada eḇedari Allah ḇyawes Manfamyan Ḇyedi ma iwan i faro mko insa ḇyeḇok mko ma fyarkin mko oser-oser fa imbror ro sasar ḇarbor ḇeḇor ḇyena."
44004001	Rofyor Petrus ma Yohanes su yawawos kaker kuker kawasa ḇebor ansi, mananir ḇewaren Rum Allah kuker kawasa Saduki srama fasaw faro su.
44004002	Snon ansi simsorbos kaku snar sufarkor kawasa ḇebor ansi ma suḇaryas, Yesus ḇyeknam ro aḇiḇer fandu snonkaku ḇemar sya.
44004003	Inja sfor su ma ssun suḇe bui snar roḇ kwar, inja siwaf meserdi.
44004004	Ḇape rofandu snonkaku ḇemnaf farkarkor ansi sibor sikyar, isof dandonek sedi indokada sesnon syaran ririm.
44004005	Ro meserdi manfarkin-manfarkin Yahudi ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara kuker ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi sfananjur ro Yerusalem
44004006	kuker Imam Ḇeba Hanas ma Kayafas, Yohanes ma Aleksander ma snonkaku ḇeso kam ḇesun ro keret Imam Ḇeba.
44004007	Rarirya ssun Petrus ma Yohanes ḇe ḇarpon kankain ani ma sirandak sifuken su, ḇo soḇo: "Kuker papok rosai roḇaido kuker snonsnon mansei mufrur rarirya?"
44004008	Inja Petrus kyarem, kuker papok Rur Ḇesren: "Ne, manfarkin-manfarkin er ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara,
44004009	rofyor knikine mko kukeḇ nu snar fararur pyum faro snonkaku ḇeduf oso ma mkoḇo nu kofen ḇadir kuker papok rosai snon anine isma pararei,
44004010	inja mko kam ma er Israel ḇesiper mkofawi kwar, isoine kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus, snon Nazaret, mkopai kwar ani, ḇape Allah ḇyawes i kwar ro fandu snonkaku ḇemar sya -- ma kuker papoik Yesus ani snon ine dores kuker pararei ro ḇarpon mkoḇedi.
44004011	Yesus ani irya karui ḇefawi ḇeḇawes rum sya sisawen ya -- isoine mankun mko, -- ḇape i ḇeḇe karui dopir ya.
44004012	Ma koreri isya ro snonkaku oso ḇeseḇa demir kuker Yesus, snar ro supswan ḇesiper ine snonsnon oso ḇeso isya ḇa ḇesma kwar papoik ro Allah fa ḇeḇuk koreriya maḇeko."
44004013	Rofyor fananjur ani smam Petrus ma Yohanes ḇri suḇena ma sifawi, sukada snonkaku waworek befarkorḇa, inja sikam sikandor; ma smamḇaḇir su imnis snonkaku ḇeso Yesus.
44004014	Ḇape rofyor smam snon ḇeprei ani dores kuker su, inja sawos royo ḇa fa siksampum su.
44004015	Ma rofyor siwan sufa susasyarbur fananjur ani, insape skara, ma soḇo:
44004016	"Nyan rosai nari kun faro snonkaku sine? Snar kawasa kam ro Yerusalem ḇesiper, sifawi kam kwar, sufrur aḇyair kanandor oso kwar ro fababa ma kopok kofamyun iba.
44004017	Ḇape insa roi ḇeḇesya ine imbran awer ro fandu kawasa ḇebor ansi, ipyum syadi kodwarek si, insa sawos kaker awer ro snonsnon ani faro manseirya kaker."
44004018	Rofyor siwan kwar fa susun wer, ssoser faro su insa sawawos roḇa sfarkor kaker awer snonsnon Yesus.
44004019	Ḇape Petrus ma Yohanes sukarem faro si: "Mankun mkokara, rosai ḇenapes ro ḇarpon Allah: koso mkoke roḇa koso syadi faro Allah.
44004020	Snar nari inkomnai ḇaḇeri fa inkawawos ro roi inko mam ma inko mnaf kwar."
44004021	Ḇape sḇaḇekwef manwawan ansi syadi wer, fama ḇarpur ya srir si snar kankain ani sisma nyano ḇa fa ssḇuk samamyai faro su, snar simkak kawasa ḇebor ansi, ḇeḇuk sanandik faro Allah snori snar roi ḇeḇesya kwar ani.
44004022	Snar snon ḇeprei kuker aḇyair kanandor ani umur ḇyedi isyadi kwar ro wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak.
44004023	Rofyor sfaspar su kwar Petrus ma Yohanes sura faro min suḇesi; ma sufarfyar ro roi ḇebor mananir imam-imamsya ma ḇebarara Yahudisya sikofen faro su anna.
44004024	Fafisu min suḇesi simnaf wos anna, sikam sinadi faro Allah, soḇo: "O Manseren, au ḇefrur nanki, supswan ma roi ḇebor kam ḇero ina.
44004025	Ma kuker famfnoḇek Rur Ḇesren ro manfyan bedi Daud, kma inkoḇedi, wakofen kwar: Snaro er-er sya sembrus, snaro keret-keret ro er-er sya skakara ro roi ḇeḇefromo?
44004026	Wairek-wairek supswan sfasasos ma ḇebarara sya sfananjur fa sisampum Manseren ma Kristus.
44004027	Snar kaku ḇeri Herodes ma Pontius Pilatus kuker er-er ma keret-keret ro er Israel siraryur kwar ro mnu ine fa sisampum Yesus, Manfyan Ḇesren bedi rwem kwar,
44004028	fa ifrur roi ḇebor kam fasnai kwar ro randak ya kuker papoik ma marisen bedi.
44004029	Ma fafisu ine, o Manseren, mamkada rariso sfamfaḇri kuker inko inja buk faro manfyan besi ḇri fa inkoḇuk ḇaryas wos bedi.
44004030	Wasu bramsu fa buk pararei faro snonkaku, ma wafrur aḇyair-aḇyair ma fasasnai kanandor kuker snonsnon Yesus, Manfyan Ḇesren bedi."
44004031	Ma ro fafisu sisya senadi, moḇ siryur ro ani imararer ma sikam sifo kuker Rur Ḇesren, ma sbaryas wos Allah kuker ḇri.
44004032	Rarirya raryur snonkaku ḇekyar kwar, sikam sesne oser ma serur oser, ma oso ikofen ḇa, nana ḇyena faro mankundi, ḇape roi ḇebor anna faro sikam.
44004033	Ma kuker papoik ḇeba manwawan ansi ssḇuk kesaksian ro aḇiḇer Manseren Yesus, ma sikam sikenem ro saswar ma fakamaman Allah.
44004034	Rarirya oso ro si dananjar ḇa; snar sikam ḇena saprop roḇa rum, sḇoḇ nana sena ma maeja ro roi sḇoḇ anna ssun na
44004035	ma srir na ro ḇarpon manwawan ansi siwesna; raimnai sirwas na faro snonkaku ansi oser-oser imnis fandun ḇyena.
44004036	Rarirya kako kuker Yusuf manwawan sya sap kako iḇe Barnabas, isoine romawa sneprei, snon Lewi ḇeraker Siprus.
44004037	Ḇyoḇ yaf ḇyedi, ma pipi sya dunsi faro manwawan ansi.
44005001	Snon oso ḇeso snori Ananias. I kuker swari snori Safira suḇoḇ saprop mnuk oso.
44005002	Kuker fawawi ro swari Safira sukram maeja saprop ani ḇarya ma ḇaryakada Ananias duni fa ryiri ro ḇarpon manwawan ansi siwesna.
44005003	Ḇape Petrus ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Ananias, rosai ḇeḇewari ibiris ḇyewayam snembri, isof wafrowes Rur Ḇesren ya ma wakram maeja ro yaf boḇ ani ḇarya?
44005004	Rofyor boḇ saprop ani ḇaim, saprop beirya, ma rofyor boḇi kwar, maeja ya kako isya ro ḇramsi? Snaro kwara ro snembri fa wafrur roi ḇeradine? Wafrowes snonkaku ḇa, ḇoi wafrowes Allah."
44005005	Rofyor Ananias imnaf wos ani isapi ma imarbos beri. Inja kawasa kam ḇemnaf roi ḇeḇesya anine simkak fafayaḇa.
44005006	Ma romawa babo ono srama; spankun ḇemar ani, ma ssuni ro waryar randi, fa sikriri.
44005007	Indokada oras rikior nawas wer, Ananias swari syun ḇoi ifawi roi ḇeḇesya kwar ya ḇa.
44005008	Petrus ikofen faroi, ḇo doḇo: "Wakofen kaku faro aya, maeja ḇero saprop muḇoḇ ani irya kamke?" Bin ani kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Kaku rarirya."
44005009	Petrus ikofen: "Snaro muḇe oser fa mufrowes bir Manseren Rur Ḇyedi? Mame, snonkaku insandi ḇekrir swambri sya, si ḇeyores ro ḇarpon kedwa ya ma nari sakun au kako ro waryar ḇeḇondi."
44005010	Rofyor ani beri bin ani isapi ro ḇarpon Petrus wemin ḇyesu ya ma imarbos beri. Rofyor ani snonkbor ansi ssun, sisma bin ani imar kwar, inja ssuni ro waryar ya randi ma sikriri fanam swari.
44005011	Inja jemaat ani ḇesiper ma kawasa ḇemnaf roi ḇeḇesya ine simkak fafaya ḇa.
44005012	Ma manwawan ansi sifrur aḇyair nabor ma fasasnai kanandor ro fandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi. Kawasa ḇekyarsya kam siryur ḇesya kwar ro rumbrawer Salomo kuker ḇaḇeoser.
44005013	Snonkaku ḇeso sya simku ḇa fa seoser kuker si. Rariryano kawasa ḇeḇor ansi kam semaf si.
44005014	Ma faḇaḇye muma snonkaku ḇefnoḇek fa ḇekyar Manseren sibor kaku iḇye snon ma bin,
44005015	rarirya ssun ḇeduf ono ḇeḇondi, ḇenyan ḇeba, ma srir si fa sḇarek ro kamboi ro yar sena, insa Petrus rofyor imbrainuk, nin ḇyedi dunuk ro si.
44005016	Ma snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇeraker mnu-mnu fanam Yerusalem kako semaraniḇo srama ssun ḇeduf sesi ma snonkaku rurḇemaḇak iswoḇer sya. Ma sikam ḇyuk pararei faro si.
44005017	Ḇarpurya Imam Ḇeba kuker ḇeso isya, isoine snonkaku ro rarwas Saduki sirandak fa smunwarek si, snar sisnesna namsor kaku ḇeri,
44005018	inja sfor manwawan ansi fa sismai ro bui ro mnu ya.
44005019	Ḇape rofyor roḇ kwar Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso syeḇen kedwai ḇeḇor ro bui ma dunsi ḇeḇondi ma ikofen:
44005020	"Mkora, mkores ro Rum Allah ma mko ḇaryas wos ḇekenem ya faro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi."
44005021	Seuser anun ani, ma fyor arwo babo sra ssun ro Rum Allah ma sirandak ssḇuk farkarkor ro dia. Rofyor ani Imam Ḇeba ma ḇeso isya siwan Kankain Karkara Agama fa siryur, isoine ḇebarara kankain er Israel sya kam, posa siwan fa ssun manwawan ansi ro bui.
44005022	Ḇape rofyor snonkaku siwan ansi sra ro bui, fama sisrow manwawan ansi ro dia ḇa. Inja skaḇer fa sikofen ḇayir,
44005023	ḇo soḇo: "Inkora ḇoi bui isisen pyum kaku ma manwadwaren sya kam sisya ro moḇ sena ro ḇarpon kedwaya, ḇape rofyor inkoseḇen kwar, inkosrow snonkaku osero ḇa ro bui."
44005024	Rofyor mananir ḇewaren Rum Allah ma mananir imam-imamsya simnaf wos anna, seḇirḇar ma sifuken inja rosai ḇeḇesya kwar kuker manwawan ansi.
44005025	Ḇape snon oso ryama faro si ma ikofen: "Mkomame, snonkaku mkoḇefa ḇesun ro bui, sisya ro Rum Allah ma ssḇuk farkarkor faro kawasa ḇeḇor."
44005026	Inja mananir ḇewaren Rum Allah kuker min ḇyesi sra ssun manwawan ansi, ḇape kuker aḇaḇen, snar simkak nari kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ssosi kuker karui.
44005027	Ssun manwawan ansi ḇeḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama. Imam Ḇeba ifuken si,
44005028	doḇo: "Inkodwarek pakrek mko kwar insa mkoḇuk farkarkor kaker awer. Ḇape mko ḇaryas farkarkor mkoḇena, ro Yerusalem ḇesiper, ma mkomarisen mkorir Snon ani rik ḇyedi fa nek inko."
44005029	Ḇape Petrus ma manwawan ḇeso ansi skarem, soḇo: "Inkoso syadi faro Allah ro inkoso snonkaku.
44005030	Up koḇesi Allah sedi ḇyaus Yesus kwar, mkomun i ma mkopai ro aprop.
44005031	I kada isma saḇsiḇer ro Allah mankundi ḇar raku ḇyedi fa ḇyemanfarkin ḇeḇeknam koreri, insa Israel simbror ma sisma ampun ro sasar sena.
44005032	Ma inkoine inkoḇe saksi ro roi ḇeḇor annane, inko ma Rur Ḇesren, Allah ḇyuk faro kawasa sya kam ḇeḇeuser Yesus."
44005033	Simnaf wos anna sisnesna nfafardun ma skara fa siḇe smun manwawan ansi.
44005034	Ḇape snon Farisi oso ro fandu kankain ani snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi snori Gamaliel, kawasa sibor semafi, iyori ma dor, insa siwan snonkaku ansi fa sisasyar resari.
44005035	Raimnai ikofen faro kankain ani: "Ne, kawasa Israel, mkokara naḇye resari, rosai mkomarisen mkofrur faro snonkaku sine.
44005036	Snar ro ḇepon Teudas ikḇawes kwar ma dow mankundi ḇesnon ḇeba, ma snonkaku ḇesoi sya indokada utin rifiak; ḇape smun i ma ḇesoi sya kam sibur ḇesisye ma roi ḇeḇesya ani imnai.
44005037	Posa kwar roi, ro fafisu fasfas epen ḇarbor snonkaku sya, Yudas snon Galilea oso ikḇawes. Dun kawasa sibor kaku fa siso i ro mbrus ḇyedi, ḇape ikako imar, ma ḇesoi sya kam siḇesisye.
44005038	Eḇedari yakofen faro mko: Mkopok mkofrur roi oso ḇaḇeri faro snonkaku ansine. Mkorir si, snar rofyor roi sifrur ine ḇyeknam ro snonkaku nari ipromes,
44005039	ḇape rofyor ḇyeknam ro Allah nari mkopok mkodwarek snonkaku sine ḇa; snar imbude mkosampum Allah."
44005040	Rarirya siso farkarkor ani. Ma sor manwawan ansi fa siprer si ma sidwarek si insa ssḇuk farkarkor kaker awer kuker snonsnon Yesus. Raimnai siwan si fa sibur.
44005041	Manwawan ansi sibur kankain ani kuker raryaḇ ḇeba, snar skara kwar sikako sakḇe kandera ma san anonef snar snonsnon Yesus.
44005042	Rarirya ras-ras kam ssḇuk farkarkor pdef ro Rum Allah ma ro kawasa rum sena ma sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekur Wairek.
44006001	Ro fafisu ani, kawasa Kristen ḇesun babo sya sibor syadi wer, isof ro fandu kawasa Yahudi ḇeyawosḇe Yunani sya surem kawasa Ibrani sya, snar rarwas faro kabom sesi sefandun siḇa ro afuf farmyan ḇero ras-ras.
44006002	Snar roi ḇeḇesya nine manwawan samfur seser risuru ansi sor kawasa Kristen sya kam fa sfanjur ma sikofen: "Inko kara imnisḇa, snar inko myaren ḇa fa inkoḇaryas Allah wos ya, snar afuffarmyan meja ya.
44006003	Inja naek ma srar mko iḇye mko kinfir snon rifik ro fandu mko. Snonkaku kofawi kam kankenem ḇepyum ma ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren ma ḇefawinananem, insa ko kanow si fa suf fararur ine,
44006004	insa mankun inko inkomam ker nadi ma afuffarmyan wos ya."
44006005	Karkara ani jemaat ḇesiper simarisen i, inja skinfir Stefanus snon oso ḇefo kuker kakyar ma Rur Ḇesren, ma Filipus, Prokhorus, Nikanor, Timon, Permenas ma Nikolaus, snon oso ḇeso agama Yahudi ro Antiokhia.
44006006	Raimnai ssun si ḇeḇarpon manwawan ansi, ma manwawan ansi srir siḇrasna ro siḇrusna ma senadi.
44006007	Allah wos ḇyedi iryer syadi wer, ma dandonek kawasa Kristen ro Yerusalem sibor syadi wer, ma imam sya sibor sakkyar ma sakso kako.
44006008	Ma Stefanus, ḇefo kuker fakamaman ma papoik, ifrur fasasnai kanandor ma aḇyair-aḇyair ro fandu kawasa.
44006009	Ḇape naek ono sikḇawes ro fandu jemaat Yahudi, sap siḇe kina jemaat Libertini -- kina jemaat ansi ido snonkaku ro Kirene ma ro Aleksandria -- fnoḇek snon Yahudi ono ḇeraker Kilikia ma Asia. Snon ansi sfamfaḇri kuker Stefanus,
44006010	ḇape sipok sisampum Stefanus fawawinananem ḇyena ḇa ma Rur ḇedifi fa dawos ya ḇa.
44006011	Inja sna wosi kuker snonkaku ono ma sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Inkomnaf kwar ikofen wos anonef faro Moses ma Allah."
44006012	Kuker nyan ḇeradine sfarkor ninyan kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ma ḇebarara ma ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi; fa soper Stefanus, sismeri ma ssuni ḇeḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama.
44006013	Ma siwan saksi ankarkar ono fa sikofen: "Snon ine dawos ḇesya kwar wos anonef ḇekur moḇ ḇesren ine ma sasoser Refo Yahudi,
44006014	snar inkomnaf kwar ikofen, Yesus snon Nazaret ine, nari kyakok Rum Allah ine ma syadwer rari Moses ḇyefa ḇeḇewaris ḇeko."
44006015	Kawasa ḇeryur ro Kankain Karkara Agama ine siknower Stefanus, ma smam Stefanus ḇarpon ḇyedi isnai imnis ḇarpon malaikat oso.
44007001	Imam Ḇeba ikofen: "Kaku rariryake?"
44007002	Stefanus kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Ne, naek ma sinan-sinan, mkomnaf naḇye! Allah ḇeḇye syadi fyasnai ḇayir mankundi kwar faro sinan up ḇepon koḇedi Abraham, rofyor isya kaker ro sup Mesopotamia, fafisu kyain faswef ḇaim ro Haran,
44007003	ma dawos faroi: Wasasyar bur mnu bedi ma naek srar besi ma rwaḇe mnu nari Yafasnai faro au.
44007004	Inja isasyar ro mnu kawasa Kasdim, ma ryama kyain faswef ro Haran. Ma rofyor kmari imar kwar, Allah iwan i fa ibur sup ani ḇesup ine, moḇ babo ine, mko kain ro ine;
44007005	ma ro dia Allah ḇyuk pusaka faroi ḇa, ma saprop mnuk ono roḇa, ḇape Allah ḇyeasas nari ḇyuk sup ani faroi ma kpu ma up ḇyesi, ḇape ro fafisu ani isma romawa ḇaim.
44007006	Ma Allah ikofen radine, nari kpu ḇyesi semandaman ro sup amber ma nari sewayam si ḇemanfyan ma sifrur kandera si ḇewampasi wambarek utin rifiak."
44007007	Ḇape Allah ikofen: "Nari er ḇeḇewayam ansi yaḇuk samamyai faro si, ma nari sisasyar kwar ro dia ma seari faro aya ro moḇ ine.
44007008	Raimnai Allah ḇyuk faroi asas sofuk; ma rarirya Abraham daḇen Ishak, ma ifrur sofakfuk ḇyedi ro ras ḇeḇewar ya; ma Ishak daḇen Yakub, ma Yakub daḇen kpu samfur seser risuru koḇan si.
44007009	Snar sne masasor, ro kpu koḇesi inja sḇoḇ Yusuf ḇesup Masir, ḇape Allah ryowusi,
44007010	ma fyaspari ro kandera ḇyena kam ma ḇyuk faroi saswar-fakamaman ma fawawi nanem ro fafisu dores ro ḇarpon Firaon, wairek Masir. Firaon isiḇer i fa ḇyefaker ro sup Masir ma rum wairek ḇesiper.
44007011	Ma ro fafisu ani andoḇa myun sup Masir ḇesiper ma sup Kanaan, ma sekandera naba, isof kpu koḇesi sisma nanan ḇa.
44007012	Ḇape rofyor Yakub imnaf, ro sup Masir gandum sisya inja iwan up koḇesi ḇe Masir. Ine kada rara ḇepon ya iri.
44007013	Ma ro rara ḇeḇesuru ya Yusuf fyasnai ḇadir mankundi faro naek ḇyesi, isof Firaon ifawi Yusuf er ma ḇarpur ḇyesi.
44007014	Ḇarpur ya Yusuf iwan fa sfaryan kmari Yakub ma naek ḇyesi kina senakam ḇarbor sedi sesamfur rifik seser ririm.
44007015	Rarirya Yakub fyaryan ḇesup Masir. Ro dia Yakub imar, i ma kpu koḇesi;
44007016	kor sesi ssunsi ḇe Sikhem ma sikramsi ro rus Abraham kyoḇes kwar kuker pipi sarak ono ro Hemor romawa ḇyesi ro Sikhem.
44007017	Ḇape asas Allah ḇyuk faro Abraham fyanam imnis kwar, ma er ani iryewen ma sibor ro sup Masir,
44007018	isof wairek babo oso ikḇawes ma ikif sasoser ro sup Masir, snon ani dakfawi Yusuf ḇa.
44007019	Wairek ani syewar nyan ankar ma sararer faro er koḇedi ma ifrur kandera kpu koḇesi, ma iwanbo sisawen romawa kasun sesi, insa er koḇedi ipromes.
44007020	Ro fafisu ani Moses ḇyeḇeaḇen ma ipyum ro mamam Allah. Paik rikior ḇyeḇefaduru ro kmari rum ḇyedi.
44007021	Raimnai si sawen i, ḇape imboki Firaon duni ma iwan fa sfadurui imnis ḇinkundi romawa ḇyedirya.
44007022	Ma Moses ḇyeḇefarkor kuker fawawi ḇeḇor ro kawasa Masir, ma ipok ro wos ma fararur ḇyena.
44007023	Fafisu byeumur wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak, iswaruser ro sneri fa ryakaki naek ḇyesi, isoine kawasa Israel.
44007024	Rofyor ani myam snon Masir ya, iprer naek ḇyesi oso, inja ifnoḇek i ma myun snon Masir ani.
44007025	Kyara doḇo naek ḇyesi nari sifawi, Allah ḇyuki fa fyaspar si, ḇape sikada sifawiḇa.
44007026	Ro meserdi ryakaki si wer ma fyor ani, snon Israel risuru sumunsu, ma syewar fa ḇyedasisu doḇo: Naek mko! Mkofawiḇake mkoḇe manbekanaek? Snaro mkomun yae mko?
44007027	Ḇape snon ḇefrur sasar faro min ḇyedi ani isampum Moses ma ikofen doḇo:
44007028	Mansei ḇekanow au fa bemanfarkin ma mankara faro inko? Inja woḇo wakmun aya imnis mandoḇindi mun snon Masir ani?
44007029	Moses imnaf wos ani, ifrar ibur ma ikenem imnis mandaman ro sup Midian. Ro diwa daḇen romawa snon risuru.
44007030	Ma wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak nawas myam malaikat oso ro sup ḇeursḇa fanam bon Sinai rofor ḇesber ḇesasyar ro manuk.
44007031	Moses ikandor snar mamam ani, ma fafisu ryaḇe moḇ ani fa myam fanam, Manseren dawos faroi:
44007032	Aya ine Allah up besi, Allah Abraham, Isak ma Yakub, inja Moses ryadai ma imkuḇa beri rofyor myam roi ḇeḇesya ani.
44007033	Manseren Allah ikofen faroi: Per roi ḇesower wemsi, snar moḇ, wores ro ani, saprop ḇesren dirya.
44007034	Ya mamepen kwar kuker kaku ḇeri ḇaḇekandera ḇekur er ayesi ro sup Masir, ma yamnaf kwar fafafko sena, ma yado kwar insa yafaspar si; inja rwama, insa yawan au ḇesup Masir.
44007035	Moses ine iso simewer kwar ani, ma sikofen: Mansei ḇekanow au ḇemanfarkin ma mankara? -- Moses ani iso Allah iwan fa ḇeḇemanfarkin ma ḇeyun aski kuker fafnoḇek malaikat, befasna mankundi kwar faroi ro manuk.
44007036	Iso ḇeyunsi fa sisasyar kuker frur fasasnai kanandor ma aḇyair-aḇyair ro sup Masir, ro soren ḇerik ma sup ḇeursḇa, wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak.
44007037	Moses anine kaker iso ḇekofen faro kawasa Israel: Nabi oso ḇemnis raris aya ine nari Allah ḇyausi faro mko ro fandu naek mkoḇesi.
44007038	Moses anine iso ḇeyores fanandu jemaat ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa fandu malaikat ḇekofen faroi ro bon Sinai ma up koḇesi; ma iso ḇemnaf wos-wos ḇekenem, raimnai ḇeyakḇuk wos anna wer faro mko.
44007039	Ḇape kpu koḇesi simewer siso useri, ḇoi spampumi. Ro sisnesna simarisen skaḇer ḇesup Masir.
44007040	Inja sikofen faro Haruni: Wafrur amfyanir ono faro inko, ḇembran ro ḇarpon inkoḇedi, snar Moses ḇeyun inko fa inko sasyar bur sup Masir ani -- inko fawiḇa rosai ḇeḇesya kwar kukeri.
44007041	Ma rofyor ani sifrur sapi mkun oso ma sikun farsarser faro amfyanir ani ma simarisen kuker rosai sifrur ro mankunsi ani.
44007042	Inja Allah myambur si ḇo ryirsi fa seari faro roi ḇeḇor ḇero nanki imnis fasfas ḇero syap nabi-nabi: 'Inja rosai mko bukfarser faro aya ma aiwan rosai mko karuk ḇesamsom fafisu wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa ani, ne, er Israel?
44007043	Royo ḇaim, mboi mkoḇar aḇdares Molokh ma mak amfyanir Refan, amfyanir-amfyanir mko frur ani faro mko syom. Rarirya nari Yun mko ma Yasawen mko isof ro Babel ḇar iwara.'
44007044	Rum ḇeḇesaksi faro kpu koḇesi ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa, imnis Allah syoser kwar faro Moses insa ifrur raris rum myam kwar ya.
44007045	Rum ani kpu koḇesi sisma i ma kuker farkankin ro Yosua suni ḇo ssun ro sup ine, isoine fafisu sup ine ḇyeḇeyun bur er-er ḇeso, Allah iyaw ro ḇarpon kpu koḇesi; rarirya isof fafisu Daud.
44007046	Daud isma saswar ma fakamaman ro ḇarpon Allah ma dor insa Allah imarisen ido ifrur rum oso faro Allah Yakub kyain ro.
44007047	Ḇape Salomo kada iso ḇeḇawes rum oso faro Allah.
44007048	Ḇape Allah ḇekaki syadi ipok fa kyain ro rosai snonkaku sifrur kuker ḇramin ḇa, imnis rosai nabi sya sikofen:
44007049	'Nanki irya karapesa nasan ayedi, ma supswan irya araref ayedi. Rum rosai nari mko frur faro aya, rarirya Allah ikofen, moḇ rosai nari ḇeḇemananai faro aya?
44007050	Mkofawi ḇake nanefakam ḇrawr ḇero ḇrassu?'
44007051	Ne, snonkaku ḇukor ḇepakrek ma sne ḇesouser ḇa ma knaram ḇeproi, mko kada mkosampum Rur Ḇesren, imnis kpu mko ḇesi rarirya mko kako.
44007052	Mansei si ro nabi-nabi sya ḇeyaksma kandera ro kpu mkoḇesi ḇa? Mboi smun snonkaku ḇepon sya ḇeḇaryas raramuma ro snon ḇenapes, ro baboine mko famyun ma mkomun kwar ani.
44007053	Mkosma kwar sasoser ro Refo Yahudi ma malaikat-malaikatsya ssḇukḇe mko ḇape mkoso naba."
44007054	Rofyor Kankain Karkara Agama simnaf wos anna sisnesna nasam kaku ma sark fafais sinasna.
44007055	Ḇape Stefanus ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren iwakwaker ḇe nanki ma myam payamyum Allah ma Yesus dores ro ḇar raku Ḇyedi.
44007056	Inja ikofen: "Kaku ḇeri yamam nanki ḇyas ma Rumkun Snonkaku dores ro Allah ḇarpon Ḇyedi."
44007057	Rarirya sar naba ma snos siknasna ḇo sopri ma sfori.
44007058	Sismeri ḇe mnuya ḇandiri, ma ssoi kuker karui. Ma saksi-saksi sya srir syatu sena ro ḇarpon snonkbor ḇenir Saulus.
44007059	Fafisu ssoi, Stefanus ḇyenadi, ḇo doḇo: "O Manseren Yesus, wun rur ayedi."
44007060	Kyain wepur ma dor naba: "Manseren befa sḇar awer sasar ine!" Ikofen rarirya posa imar.
44008001	(1a) Paulus kako dakmarisen fa Stefanus smuni. (1b) Ro fafisu ani randak ro kandera ḇeba ḇekur jemaat ro Yerusalem. Sikam sibur sfamok sup Yudea ḇesiper ma Samaria, demir manwawan ansi si ḇekainepen.
44008002	Kawasa ḇekyar sya skanes Stefanus ma sikriri.
44008003	Ḇape Saulus syewar nyan fa fyasasye jemaat ani inja syun-syaye rum ḇe rum ma ismer snon ma bin ḇeḇandi ma ḇyesi fa ssun ro bui.
44008004	Kawasa Kristen ḇebur famok ansi simbran ro sup ḇesiper ma sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye.
44008005	Ma Filipus ryaḇe mnu oso ro Samaria ma ḇyaryas Wairek faro snonkaku ḇero dia.
44008006	Rofyor kawasa ḇeḇor ansi simnaf Filipus ḇaryas ḇyena ma smam fasasnai kanandor ma aḇyair-aḇyair ifrurna, sikam sesne oser simarisen rosai ḇyaryasna.
44008007	Snar kawasa ḇeḇor rur ḇemaḇak siwoḇer sya, rur ḇemaḇak ansi si sasyarḇo siyiw naba, ma snonkaku sibor ḇepapipen ma ḇeḇemanis ono ifrursi fa siprei.
44008008	Rarirya raryaḇ ḇeba kaku ro mnu ani.
44008009	Snon oso snori Simon fyoro kwar nya mon ro mnu ani ma ifrur kanandor kawasa Samaria, ma dow mankundi ḇe snon ḇeba.
44008010	Snonkaku sya kam kasun ḇeba sisoi ma sikofen: "Snon ine isma papoik ro Allah, sorḇe Papoik Ḇeba."
44008011	Ma sikam sisoi snar fyoro kwar ifrur fa sikandor kuker fararur mon ḇyesi.
44008012	Ḇape baboine sikyar faro Filipus ḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah ma snonsnon Yesus Kristus, ma sor fa sisma masi sren, iḇye snon ma bin.
44008013	Simon mankundi kako dakkyar, ma rofyor isma masi sren kwar, iso wanan Filipus, ma ikandor rofyor myam aḇyair-aḇyair ma fasasnai kanandor ḇeba ḇeḇesya na.
44008014	Rofyor manwawan ḇero Yerusalem simnaf, sup Samaria kawasa ansi sisma wos Allah kwar, inja siwan Petrus ma Yohanes suraḇe Samaria.
44008015	Sura kwar ro dia manwawan ansu suḇenadi, insa kawasa Samaria saksma Rur Ḇesren.
44008016	Snar Rur Ḇesren ya dado faro snon oso ḇaim ro fandu si, snar sisma masi sren monda kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus.
44008017	Raimnai susawar dofensi, posa sisma Rur Ḇesren.
44008018	Rofyor Simon myam Rur Ḇesren ya dado faro kawasa ansi snar manwawan ansu ya susawar dofen si, inja ḇyuk pipi ono faro su, ma ikofen:
44008019	"Muḇuk ḇe aya kako papoik ani, insa rofyor yaksawar dofen snonkaku ono, sikako saksma Rur Ḇesren."
44008020	Ḇape Petrus ikofen faroi: "Mboi pipi besi nari sro kuker au, snar woḇoda, fakamaman Allah kwoḇes i kuker pipi.
44008021	Wasma rarwas osoḇa ro mnuk ine, snar snembri inapes ḇa ro ḇarpon Allah.
44008022	Iḇyekada wambror ro ḇarḇor benane ma benadi faro Manseren, insa ḇyuk ampon ro swaruser ḇero snembri;
44008023	snar yamam snembri ḇyepus kwar ma syarmar ma ḇarḇor ḇena newayam au."
44008024	Simon kyarem: "Iḇyekada mkonadi kuker aya faro Manseren, insa roi ḇeḇor mko kofen kwar nane nkur awer aya."
44008025	Suḇe saksi ma suḇaryas Manseren wos ḇyedi kwar sukaḇer ḇe Yerusalem ma ro mararan suḇedi suḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro mnu-mnu nabor ro sup Samaria.
44008026	Ḇarpur ya malaikat Manseren ḇyesi oso ikofen faro Filipus, doḇo: "Wayor au ma rwaḇe ḇar wambraw waso nyan ḇesabu ro Yerusalem ḇe Gasa." Nyan ani ḇyeusḇa. Inja Filipus rya.
44008027	Snon Etiopia oso, wairek Kandake, wairek bin ro sup Etiopia faker ḇyedi, ḇebarara mananir ḇemamwark wairek ani nana ḇyena, ryaker sup Etiopia ḇe Yerusalem fa daksun ari.
44008028	Snon ani ro mararan barbur ḇyedi kyain ro kereta ḇyedi ma ḇyewasya syap Nabi Yesaya.
44008029	Ma Rur ya ikofen faro Filipus: "Rwamura fanam kereta ya!"
44008030	Filipus rya fasaw ma imnaf faker ani ḇyewasya syap Nabi Yesaya. Filipus doḇo: "Tuan wafawi roi wawasya nake?"
44008031	Kyarem: "Yafawi rariso rofyor oso fyarkin aya ḇa?" Raimnai dor Filipus fa dek ma kyainusi.
44008032	Mnuk ḇyewasya ani ryok radine: "Raris domba oso suni ḇemoḇ skarakruk ro ya; ma imnis domba mkun ḇeḇeawer ro ḇarpon snon ḇekapnik bur ḇyesi, rarirya ipok ḇyas sḇari ḇa.
44008033	Ro ḇaḇemanfyan ḇyena kandera ya deki; manseiso nari ḇefarfyar ḇarpur ḇyedi? Snar nyawa ḇyedi sunibur supswan."
44008034	Inja faker ani ifuken Filipus: "Yafuken au manseiso nabiya ikofen ḇesyan ya? Ikofen mankundike roḇa snon oso ḇeso?"
44008035	Inja Filipus dawos randak kuker mnuk ani ma ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Yesus faroi.
44008036	Skombran pdef mararan skoḇedi isof ro moḇ ḇeḇewar oso. Raimnai faker ani ikofen: "Mamkada war ya iso iya; rosai ḇedwarek aya fa yasma masi sren?" [
44008037	Filipus kyarem: "Rofyor tuan wakyar kuker snembri ḇesiper, ido." Faker ani kyarem: "Mboi yakyar, Yesus Kristus Rumkun Allah."]
44008038	Inja snon Etiopia ani iwan fa kereta ani imnai, ma sudoḇe war ya ma Filipus ḇyuk masi sren faroi.
44008039	Rofyor susasyar bur war ya kwar Rur Manseren dun Filipus ma faker ani myami werḇa. Imbran pdef mararan ḇyedi kuker raryaḇ.
44008040	Ḇape Filipus kada isya ro Asdod. Imbranuk sup aniḇo ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro mnu nakam isof ryama ro Kaisarea.
44009001	Fafisu ani Saulus dosam ḇyedi isber ma daw fa iḇemyun Manseren kawasa ḇyesi. Rya faro Imam Ḇeba,
44009002	ma dor syap kuasa roi fa dun faro majelis Yahudi ro Damsyik, insa, rofyor isrow snon ma bin ḇeso Manseren Nyan ḇyedi, fyor si ma dunsi ḇe Yerusalem.
44009003	Ro mararan ḇyedi ḇe Damsyik, fafisu fyanam mnu ani kwar kniko sananai oso syoker nanki ma isnai yari.
44009004	Isapi ma imnaf mkaren oso ikofen faroi: "Saulus, Saulus, snaro bewayam aya?"
44009005	Saulus kyarem: "Manseiso au, Manseren?" Inja Ikofen: "Aya ine Yesus, bewayam ya.
44009006	Indo wakḇok ma rwaḇe mnu ya, ro diwa nari sikofen faro au, rosai nari wafrur ya."
44009007	Kawasa ḇesoi ro mararan ani sikmom, snar simnaf mkaren ani, ḇape smam snonkaku oso ḇa.
44009008	Saulus ikḇok ma dores, raimnai ḇyas mkasu, ḇape myam royoḇa; inja sikfin i fa syun ro Damsyik.
44009009	Ras rikior dafafare ma dananba dinemba.
44009010	Ro Damsyik Manseren kawasa Kristen ḇyesi oso isya snori Ananias. Manseren ikofen faroi ro mamam oso: "Ananias!" Kyarem: "Ayaisine Manseren!"
44009011	Manseren ikofen: "Rwama rwaḇe nyan ḇenir Nyan Ḇeyaḇyoḇer, ma swewar ro Yudas rum ḇyedi snon oso ḇeraker Tarsus benir Saulus isya fafisu ine ḇyenadi,
44009012	ma ro mamam oso myam, snonkaku ḇenir Ananias syun randum isawar dofeni, insa myam wer."
44009013	Ananias kyarem: "Manseren ro snonkaku sibor yamnaf kwar ro snon ani ifrur ḇarḇor nabor kwar faro snonkaku ḇesren besi ro Yerusalem.
44009014	Ma ryama ro dine kuker papoik ḇeba ro mananir imam, insa fyor snonkaku syakam ḇeyap snombri."
44009015	Ḇape Manseren ikofen faroi: "Rwamura snar snon ani dera yakimfir kwar faro aya fa ḇyaryas snonsnon Yedi faro er ḇeso kako ma faro wairek-wairek ma kawasa Israel.
44009016	Mankundaya nari yafasna faroi, kandera nabor nari nkuri snar snonsnon ayedi."
44009017	Inja Ananias rya ma syun ro rum ani. Isawar dofen Saulus ma ikofen: "Saulus, naek yedi, Manseren Yesus, ḇefasnai mankundi faro au ro nyan wambrar ro ani, iwan aya kwar faro au insa mam wer ma wafo kuker Rur Ḇesren."
44009018	Ma ro fafisuya beri, arpar ro mkassu noḇes isof myam wer. Ikḇok ma isma masi sren.
44009019	(19a) Ma rofyor danan kwar syamḇraḇ wer. (19b) Saulus kyain ras ono kuker kawasa Kristen ro Damsyik.
44009020	Fafisu ani beri ḇyaryas Yesus ro rum nadi, ma ikofen Yesus irya Rumkun Allah.
44009021	Kawasa Kristen ḇeḇor ḇemnafi sya sikmom ma sikofen: "Inja snonkaku ineke, iso ḇemarisen ḇemun mansei-mansei ḇeyap snonsnon Yesus ro Yerusalem? Ma ryama kuker swaruser ani kako insa fyor ma dunsi ḇeḇarpon mananir imam-imam?"
44009022	Ḇape Saulus fararur ḇyedi iba syadi wer isof kawasa Yahudi ro Damsyik sikmom, snar fyasnaibos, Yesus i Wairek.
44009023	Ḇarpur ro ras ono kawasa Yahudi ssewar nyan oso insa smun Saulus.
44009024	Ḇape nyan ḇeḇyeḇa ani Saulus ifawiyi. Ras-roḇ kawasa Yahudi siwaren wark kedwai nakam ro mnu ani insa smuni.
44009025	Rarirya ro roḇ oso kawasa Kristen ḇyesi ono suni fa sikyui ro aram oso ro ayar mamun mnuya ḇandiri.
44009026	Saulus rofyor ryama kwar ro Yerusalem syewar fa isnefer kawasa Kristen sya ḇape simkak i kam, ma sikyarḇa beri, ikako daksun kwar ḇe Kristen.
44009027	Ḇape Barnabas ikada duni faro manwawan sya ma fyar faro si, rariso Saulus myam Manseren ro nyan ya faduri ma moḇsaiso Manseren dakawawos faroi ma rariso ḇri ḇyedi fa ḇyuk farkarkor ro Damsyik ro snonsnon Yesus.
44009028	Ma Saulus ryowus si ro Yerusalem, ma kuker ḇri ḇyuk farkarkor ro snonsnon Manseren.
44009029	Ikako dawawos ma fyaḇaḇri kuker kawasa Yahudi ḇeyawos ḇe Yunani, ḇape ssewar nyan insa smuni.
44009030	Ḇape rofyor naek Kristen ro jemaat sifawi awine kwar inja ssun Saulus be Kaisarea ma siwani fa iburḇe Tarsus.
44009031	Fyoro kaku jemaat ro Yudea ḇesiper, Galilea ma Samaria skain kuker aski. Jemaat ani sḇawsi ma sikenem kuker araryof faro Manseren. Dandonek sedi sibor syadi wer kuker fafnoḇek ro Rur Ḇesren ya.
44009032	Rofyor ani Petrus imbran yar fa ryakaki ḇe moḇna kam. Ro mararan ani dakrama kako faro kawasa ḇesren ro Lida.
44009033	Ro dia isrow snon oso snori Eneas, ḇeduf papipen ma ḇeḇarek ro kamboi ḇyedi ḇewampasi wambarek riwar kwar.
44009034	Petrus ikofen faroi: "Eneas, Yesus Kristus ḇyuk pararei faro au; wakḇok ma fasos kamboi bedi!" Fafisu ani beri snon ani ikḇok.
44009035	Kawasa kam ḇero Lida ma Saron smami, inja skaḇer faro Manseren.
44009036	Ro Yope bin Kristen oso snori Tabita -- ro wos Yunani Dorkas. Bin ine nabor kaku ḇyesyowi ma ḇyuk farsarser.
44009037	Ḇape ro fafisu ani iduf rao isof imar. Ma rofyor si masi i posa, suni fa ḇyarek ro sim ḇero bo.
44009038	Lida fyanam Yope. Rofyor kawasa Kristen simnaf Petrus isya ro Lida, siwan naek risuru faroi kuker fararyor: "Rwama fasaw ḇe inko."
44009039	Inja Petrus fyasos fa iso si. Sra kwar ro Yope, ssun pdefi ḇesim ḇero bo ma kabom sya kam srama sores fanam i ma skanesḇo sfasnai faroi sansun ma rofmar, Dorkas isip faro si ro fafisu isya iḇye ya.
44009040	Ḇape Petrus iwan fa sisasyar kam, posa kyain wepur ma ḇyenadi. Raimnai myam ḇemar ani ma ikofen: "Tabita, wakḇok kada!" Inja Tabita ḇyas mkasu ma fyor myam Petrus, ikḇok fa kyain.
44009041	Petrus ikin ḇrasu ma ifnoḇek i fa dores. Raimnai dor kawasa ḇesren ansi fnoḇek kabom sya ma fyasnai faro si, bin ani ikenem.
44009042	Roi ḇeḇesya anine imbran yar Yope ḇesiper ma kawasa sibor kaku sikyar faro Manseren.
44009043	Ḇarpur ro roi ḇeḇesya ani Petrus kyain ras ono ro Yope ro rum snon ḇenir Simon, ḇeyak aiwan kif.
44010001	Ro Kaisarea snon oso isya snori Kornelius, mambri sarar sor ḇe sarar Italia.
44010002	I kuker kina ro rum ḇyedi sikyar ma sararyof faro Allah ma ḇyuk farsarser nabor faro er Yahudi ma ḇyenadi ḇesya kwar faro Allah.
44010003	Indokada fanam oras kior mandira, myambos Manseren malaikat ḇyesi oso ryama syun ro rum ḇyedi ma ikofen: "Kornelius!"
44010004	Myambos malaikat ani kuker makakak ma ikofen: "Rariso ine o Manseren?" Malaikat ani kyarem: "Nadi ma farsarser ḇena kam nek kwar faro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ma Allah iswarepen au.
44010005	Inja knikine, wawan snonkaku onoḇe Yope fa ssun snon ḇenir Simon sapi kakoḇe Petrus.
44010006	Isya ro rum Simon snon ḇeyak aiwan kif, ḇekain ro swan andir."
44010007	Malaikat ḇeyawos faroi ani i buri kwar, raimnai dor snon risuru ro manfamyan ḇyesi fnoḇek sordade ḇekyar oso ro snonkaku ḇefnoḇek i ḇesya kwar si.
44010008	Rofyor ikofen ḇayir roi ḇeḇor anna kam faro si posa iwan siḇe Yope.
44010009	Meserdi rofyor snon rikior ansi sisya kaker ro mararan ma sfanam mnu Yope kwar, indokada fanam oras samfur seser risuru arkok, Petrus dekḇe rum ya bori fa ḇyenadi.
44010010	Petrus iḇe danan snar ibiser, ḇape insape sfasos roḇean na, fafisu ani papoik Allah iswoḇer i.
44010011	Myam nanki ḇyas ma roi oso imnis kruḇen ḇeba ḇyedopir rifiak ma sikyui isof ro saprop ya.
44010012	Ro dori iser aiwan syoso-syoso kam ḇeḇewemin rifiak, ḇeanawer ma mansya.
44010013	Imnaf mkaren oso ikofen: "Ne, Petrus wayor au, kwaruksi ma wansi!"
44010014	Ḇape Petrus kyarem: "Roḇa, o Manseren rariryaḇa snar aya yakan ḇaim roi ḇefor ma ḇemamas."
44010015	Mkaren ani ryokḇe eḇesuru ya faroi: "Rosai Allah fyasren, wapok fa befor naba."
44010016	Roi ḇeḇesya ani ryamaḇe rarwan rikior posa kruḇen ani ḇyeḇeyer fasau ḇe nanki.
44010017	Petrus kyara ro sneri, fasasnai rosai ḇero mamam myam kwar ine. Fafisu ani Kornelius snonkaku iwan ansi sisya ro kedwai ya ḇarpondi ma sifuken Petrus rum ḇyedi.
44010018	Skor snon oso fa skofuken, imbude Simon sapḇe Petrus isya ro rum ani.
44010019	Fyor ani Petrus kyara kaker ro mamam ani, ma Rur ya ikofen faroi: "Snon risuru suisya susewar au.
44010020	Wayor au wado ma waso si, beḇirḇar awer, snar ayaiso ḇewan si muma."
44010021	Inja Petrus dado rarḇaḇ ikofen faro si: "Ayaiso mkossewar ya; rosaiso ḇeḇedari mkoramuma ya?"
44010022	Skarem faro i: "Kornelius snon mambri sne ḇenapes ma ḇeyararyof Allah ro fandu er Yahudisya kam si fawiyi, isma kwar fasasnai ro Allah ma mam malaikat ḇesren oso ḇekofen faroi insa dor au ḇe rum ḇyedi fa imnaf rosai nari wakofen faroi."
44010023	Ma Petrus ikofen fa skenef ro dia. Mesrdi ikḇok fa iso si fnoḇek naek ono ro Yope.
44010024	Ro arwori skorama ro Kaisarea. Kornelius isya iwafsi ma dor naek ma bati ḇyesi fa siryur kwar.
44010025	Rofyor Petrus syun, Kornelius rya isrow i ma ḇyan suba ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
44010026	Ḇape Petrus idwarki doḇo: "Wores, aya ine snonkaku monda."
44010027	Ma dawawos kukeri, ḇo syun ma isrow kawasa sibor sisya siryur.
44010028	Ikofen faro si: "Mkofawi kam kwar, rari Yahudi ḇyuk ḇaḇeri fa snon Yahudi oso ikenem fawas snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudi ḇa, roḇa syun ro rum sena. Ḇape Allah fyasnai kwar faro aya insa yapok yakofen awer snonkaku osoḇe ḇemamas.
44010029	Snar rarirya yaḇerer fararyor mkoḇena ḇa mboi yara muma beri. Insape yamarisen yafawi rosai ḇeḇedari mkor aya."
44010030	Kornelius kyarem: "Ras rifiak ḇesyof kwar indokada fanam oras kior ro fafisu ḇeradine, yaḇenadi ro rum ayedi."
44010031	Kniko snonkaku oso dores ro ḇarpon ayedi, ma sansun ḇyena nasnaper ma ikofen: "Kornelius nadi ḇena Allah imnaf na kwar ma farsarser ḇena kam Allah iswarepen na ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
44010032	Inja wawan snon onoḇe Yope fa ssun Simon sap kakoḇe Petrus; isya ro Simon snon ḇeyak aiwan kif rum ḇyedi, ḇekain ro swan andir.
44010033	Eḇedari yawan fasaw snon ono faro au, ma kuker sne ḇeryaḇ rwama kwar ine. Knikine inko ryur kam kwar ro ḇarpon Allah ro dine, insa inko mnaf rosai Allah ḇyeasas faro au."
44010034	Raimnai Petrus irandak dawawos doḇo: "Kaku ḇeri yafawi kwar, Allah myam rarwas snonkaku ḇa.
44010035	Snonkaku oser-oser ro er rosairya kaker, ḇeyararyof ma ḇeḇesyowi Allah kuker napnapes imarisen si.
44010036	Wos ani iso Allah iwan fa sḇaryas faro er Israel isoine wos ḇeḇaryas aski ro Yesus Kristus i Manseren faro kawasa kam.
44010037	Mkofawi roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇesya kwar ro sup Yudea ḇesiper randak ro Galilea posa ro masasisren Yohanes ḇyaryas, isoine Yesus ro Nazaret.
44010038	Rariso Allah ryemi kuker Rur Ḇesren ma papoik, iso, ḇembran yar-yar ma ḇefrur pyum ma ḇeḇuk pararei faro snonkaku kam rur ibiris iswoḇer si, snar Allah ifnoḇeki.
44010039	Ma inkoine saksi-saksi ro roi ḇeḇor ifrur kwar ro Yudea ma Yerusalem kako; ḇape smuni ma skafi ro aprop.
44010040	Yesus ani Allah ḇyawesi kwar ro ras ḇeḇekior ya, ma Allah imarisen insa fyasnai ḇayir mankundi,
44010041	faro kawasa er sya kam ḇa, ḇoi faro saksi-saksi, Allah fyasnai kwar ro ḇepon, isoine faro inko ḇeyan ma ḇeyinem kuker i, rofyor diḇri ro munaiḇui.
44010042	Ma isiḇer inko kwar fa inko ḇaryas faro er-er sya kam, ma inkoḇe saksi, iso Allah kyur fasnai fa ḇaḇemankara faro snonkaku ḇekenem ma ḇemar sya."
44010043	Iso nabisya kam sḇardi kwar isoine mansei ḇekyar faroi nari ismai ampon ro sasar kuker snonsnon ḇyedi.
44010044	Fafisu Petrus dawos rarirya, Rur Ḇesren ya dado faro snonkaku kam ḇemnaf ḇaryas ani.
44010045	Ma kawasa ḇekyar kwar ro rarwas ḇesofuk ḇeso Petrus, sikandor, snar smam, mboi fakamaman Rur Ḇesren ḇyeḇesbawer faro er-er ḇeso kako,
44010046	snar simnaf kawasa ansi sawawos ro wos Rur ya ma sisandik Allah. Inja Petrus ikofen:
44010047	"Inja nari snonkaku sidwarekke masi sren kuker war, faro snonkaku sine, snar sikada sisma Rur Ḇesren kwar imnis ko?"
44010048	Raimnai iwan fa sismai masi sren kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus. Posa kwar sor ro Petrus insa kyainus si ras ono wer.
44011001	Manwawan ansi ma naek srar ro sup Yudea simnaf, er-er ḇese sya saksma kako Allah wos ya.
44011002	Fafisu Petrus ryama kwar ro Yerusalem, kawasa ro rari sofakfuk sfamfaḇri swaruser kukeri.
44011003	Sikofen, ḇo soḇo: "Au ine swun kwar ro rum snonkaku ḇesofuk ḇaim, ma wanan fnoḇek si."
44011004	Ḇape Petrus fyar asuser farosi roi ḇeḇesya anna kam, doḇo:
44011005	"Aya isya yaḇenadi ro mnu Yope, kniko rur yedi kyanosen kuker samambraḇ Allah ma yamam mamam oso: roi oso kyaf imnis kruḇen ḇeḇam ḇyeḇefes ro dopir rifiak, ikyu ro nanki isof ro ḇarpon ayedi.
44011006	Yaknower i ma yamam ro dori aiwan syoso-syoso ḇeḇewemin rifiak ma ḇerafdi ma ḇeyanawer ma man sya.
44011007	Raimnai yamnaf mkaren ḇekofen ḇeaya: Ne, Petrus, wakḇok ma kwawuk si ḇo wansi!
44011008	Ḇape yakofen: Roḇa Manseren, rariryaḇa, snar roi ḇefor ma ḇemamas naksun ro sbari ḇaim.
44011009	Ḇape ro rarwan ḇeḇesuru ya mkaren ḇeraker nanki ani ikofen wer faro aya: Rosai Manseren fyasren kwar, wapok befornaḇa!
44011010	Mamam ani imbran rarwan rikior, insape ḇyeḇeyer kaḇer ḇe nanki.
44011011	Ro fafisu ya kako snon rikior skores ro ḇarpon rum, inkenef roya; siwan si ker Kaisarea yoḇ aya.
44011012	Ma rurya ikofen faro aya: Rwa wasosi ḇo beḇirḇar awer! Ma naek riwonem skoine skoso aya. Nkosun ro snon ani rum ḇyedi,
44011013	ma fyawar faro inko, rariso myam malaikat oso, dores ro rum ḇyedi ma ikofen faroi: Wawan snon ono ḇe Yope fa ssun Simon sniri kako ḇe Petrus.
44011014	Iso nari ḇeyun ḇaryas faro mko, nari ḇeḇuk aski faro au ma faro kina ḇero rum bedi ḇesiper.
44011015	Ma ro fafisu yarandak yawawos, Rur Ḇesren ya dado faro si, imnis raris dado ḇepon kwar faro ko.
44011016	Inja yaswarepen Manseren ikofen kwar: 'Yohanes ḇyuk masasi kuker war, ḇape mko nari mkokada mkosma masi sren kuker Rur Ḇesren.'
44011017	Inja rofyor Allah ḇyuk kwar saswar ḇyedi farosi raris ḇyuk faro ko ro fafisu korandak ko kyar Yesus Kristus, raris si nari yamrer Allah marisen ḇyedi?"
44011018	Ro fafisu simnaf roi ḇeḇesya anna kam, inja sikam siknon, ma sisandik Allah, soḇo: "Inja faro er-er ḇese kako Allah ḇyuk farosi marandor ḇefarkin si faro kankenem ya."
44011019	Ro fafisu ya naek srar sibor skakek snar marindi ḇekur si rofyor sḇuk samamyai marmar faro Stefanus kwar. Sibur skakek isof ro Fenisia, Siprus ma Antiokhia; fama sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ya monda faro snonkaku Yahudisya serer.
44011020	Mboi ro fandusi snonkaku Siprus ma Kirene ono ḇerama ro Antiokhia ma ḇewawos kako faro snonkaku Yunani ma ḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, isoine Yesus irya Manseren.
44011021	Ma Manseren ifnoḇek si inja snonkaku sibor kaku sikyar ma skaḇer faro Manseren.
44011022	Rarirya sḇesno faro jemaat Yerusalem, inja jemaat ani siwan Barnabas ḇe Antiokhia.
44011023	Rofyor Barnabas ryama kwar ma myam saswar ma fakamaman Allah, imarisen naba kaku. Ḇyuk swarepen farosi insa skain nadworen faro Manseren,
44011024	snar Barnabas snonkaku ḇepyum, ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren ma ḇekyar. Dun snonkaku sibor faro Manseren.
44011025	Raimnai Barnabas ryaḇe Tarsus fa syewar Saulus; ma isrowi kwar, duni ḇe Antiokhia.
44011026	Sukain kuker jemaat ani ḇewampasi wambarek oser, ma suḇuk farkarkor faro kawasa sibor. Ro Antiokhia manfamyan ansi sap randak siḇe Kristen.
44011027	Rofyor ani nabi ono srama ker Yerusalem ḇe Antiokhia.
44011028	Snonkaku oso ro si ḇenir Agabus iyori ma kuker papoik Rur Ḇesren ikofen, nari andoḇa ḇebayo myun supswan ḇesiper. Roi ḇeḇesya ani myun kako ro fafisu Klaudius.
44011029	Inja kawasa Kristen ansi sawfa siryur fafnoḇek ono raris oser-oser mankundi samambraḇ ḇyedi ma sfarem na faro naek srar ḇekain ro Yudea si.
44011030	Inja sifrur rarirya kako ma sfarem nafa Barnabas ma Saulus suyun na faro penatua-penatua sya.
44012001	Indokada ro fafisu ani Wairek Herodes ryak kuker frur ḇepakrek faro snonkaku ono ro jemaat.
44012002	Iwan fa smun Yakobus, Yohanes ḇeba ḇyedi, kuker sumber.
44012003	Fafisu myam, mamun ani ifrur raryaḇ snonkaku Yahudi si sisnesna, inja ifrur pdef nyan ani ma iwan fa sfor Petrus. Fafisu ani ras ḇeba munara Mamami Ḇepisenba.
44012004	Petrus ḇyeḇefor kwar, Herodes iwan fa suni ro bui ma sordade syos rifiak siwaren i, syos oser sordade rifiak. Doḇo insa, munara Paskah isyof kwar duni ḇeḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor.
44012005	Rarirya Petrus ismai ro bui. Ḇape kuker sneḇesiper jemaat ani sinadi kuker i faro Allah.
44012006	Ro fafisu Herodes imarisen duni ḇeḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi ro meserdi ḇayim, ro roḇ ani kako Petrus denef ro fandu sordade risuru, sfes i kuker wanka risuru. Sordade ḇeso sya sisya siwaren ro kedwa ya ḇarpondi.
44012007	Kniko malaikat Allah ḇyesi oso dores fanam Petrus ma sasnai ḇyedi iyar sim ani. Malaikat ani ḇyan Petrus, ma ikofen: "Wakḇok fasaw!" Rarirya wanka ansi soḇes ro Petrus ḇrasi.
44012008	Raimnai malaikat ani ikofen faroi: "Fes sifer bedi ma swower roḇesower besi!" Petrus ifrur rarirya. Raimnai malaikat ani ikofen faroi: "Swansun syatu ḇena ma waso aya!"
44012009	Raimnai iso malaikat ani ḇo susasyar ḇape ifawiḇa, rosai malaikat ani ifrur faroi nkaku rarirya, snar kyara doḇoda myam mamam oso.
44012010	Fafisu sumbranuk manwadwaren ḇepon si ma moḇ wadwaren ḇeḇesuru, sura ro ḇarpon kedwai ḇeba mankarmomen ḇewaiḇe mnu. Kedwai ani ḇyas ro mankundi faro su. Surandi kwar, sumbran isof ro nyan ḇaḇar ya, ma kniko malaikat ani iburi.
44012011	Rofyor Petrus ḇyaḇir mankundi kwar, ma ikofen: "Insape yafawi kaku Manseren iwan kwar malaikat ḇyedi fa fyaspar aya ro Herodes ḇrasi ma snonkaku Yahudisya karkara sena."
44012012	Ma kyara knik fasaw kwar, ryaḇe Maria, Yohanes snari rum ḇyedi, Yohanes ine sapi kako ḇe Markus. Ro dia kawasa sibor siryur ma senadi.
44012013	Ma rofyor nyuk kedwai ḇebaya, imfamyan ḇenirḇe Rode ryama imnafpan mansei ḇenuk ya.
44012014	Ryower bir beri Petrus mkaren ḇyedi, ḇape snar raryaḇ ḇyedi inja syeḇen kedwai ḇeba aniḇa ḇoi syun randum fasau fa ikofen bayir, Petrus isya ro ḇarpon kedwai ḇebaya.
44012015	Sikofen faro bin ani: "Swawo!" Ḇape fyaḇri ḇo doḇo, kaku ḇeri rarirya. Ma sikofen: "Rur ḇyediri."
44012016	Ḇape Petrus nyuk yayayu ḇesya kwar isof fafisu seḇen kedwai ya ma smami, skarsosen.
44012017	Inja Petrus pyankai epen si insa sefasis, raimnai fyawar rariso Manseren fyarkini fa isasyar ro bui. Ikofen: "Mko kofen ḇayir roi ḇeḇesya nane faro Yakobus ma naek srar koḇansi." Raimnai isasyar ma ryaḇe moḇ ḇeso.
44012018	Meserdi sordade ansi searubiru. Sifuken yaesi rosai ḇeḇesya kwar kuker Petrus.
44012019	Herodes iwan fa ssewar Petrus, ḇape sismai iba. Inja Herodes iwan fa skukeḇ sordade ansi ma smun si fa simar. Raimnai fyaryan ro Yudea ḇe Kaisarea ma kyain ro dia.
44012020	Herodes imsor fafayaḇa faro snonkaku Tirus ma Sidon. Inja sesne oser ḇo sra faro Herodes. Sisma nyan oso fa seḇaḇyuk Blastus, wairek faker ḇyesi oso, fa ifnoḇek si, insa sor aski, snar mnu sedi sisma roḇean ro supya mnuk wairek ḇyedi.
44012021	Ma ro ras sap kwar ya, Herodes syansun sansun ḇaḇesasoser ḇyena, ma kyain ro karapesa nasan ya ḇo dawos faro si.
44012022	Ma kawasa ḇyesi ssibras: "Ine Allah mkaren ḇyedi ma mkaren snonkaku ḇa!"
44012023	Ma ro fafisu aniḇeri malaikat oso ḇyaserbosi snar ḇyesyowi Allah ḇa. Inja karom sya sani isof imar.
44012024	Manseren wosya iryer ma snonkaku sibor simnafi.
44012025	Barnabas ma Saulus sukaḇer ro Yerusalem rofyor sufrur posa fararur afuffarmyan suḇedi. Suyun Yohanes, sap kakobe Markus.
44013001	Ro fafisu ani ro jemaat Antiokhia nabi ma guru ono sisya, isoine: Barnabas ma Simeon sapi kako ḇe Niger, ma Lukius snon Kirene, ma Menahem romawa fan sfan fnoḇek Wairek Herodes, ma Saulus.
44013002	Ro ras oso rofyor seari faro Manseren ma sfarfor, Rur Ḇesren ya ikofen: "Mkoḇuk ḇardi Barnabas ma Saulus faro aya, insa sufrur fararur yaḇuk kwar faro su."
44013003	Inja sfarfor ma senadi, ma sisawar dofen su kwar, siwan su fa sura.
44013004	Snar Rur Ḇesren ya iwan su, Barnabas ma Saulus surandak ro Seleukia, ma ro dia suyayun ḇe Siprus.
44013005	Sko fyafer ro Salamis suḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi ro rum ari snonkaku Yahudi sya sena. Ma Yohanes iso su fa ifnoḇek su.
44013006	Skombran yar myos ani kasiper isof skora ro Pafos. Ro dia sko srow snon Yahudi oso snori Baryesus. I snon ḇena mon ma nabi sararer.
44013007	Gubernur ro myos ani min ḇyedirya, Gubernur ani snori Sergius Paulus, snonkaku ḇefawi nanem. Gubernur ani dor Barnabas ma Saulus, snar imarisen dakmnaf Allah wos ḇyena.
44013008	Ḇape Elimas -- rarirya snonsnon ro wos Yunani, -- snon ḇena mon ani, idwarek su ma syewar fa pyambar Gubernur ani kakyar ḇyedi.
44013009	Ḇape Saulus, sapi kako ḇe Paulus, ḇefo kuker Rur Ḇesren, iknoweri, ma ikofen:
44013010	"Ne, romawa Ibiris, ḇefo kuker ankar sararer ma ḇarḇor, au mbroḇ ro napnapes, nari wamnai ḇake pambar Manseren Nyan ḇenapes ḇyena?
44013011	Knikine, mam, Manseren ḇrasi myun au, ma wapraf, ras ono wapok mam oriḇa." Ma ro fafisuya beri snonkaku ani ḇyaḇir afyo ma pampan ya ikawefi, ma pyanfafyai syewar snonkaku ḇekfin i.
44013012	Gubernur ani myam roi ḇeḇesya ani, ikyar; ma ikandor kaku farkarkor Manseren ḇyena.
44013013	Raimnai Paulus ma min ḇyesi sibur Pafos ma sayun ḇe Perga ro Pamfilia; ḇape Yohanes ibur si ma kyaḇer ḇe Yerusalem.
44013014	Ro Perga skombran pdef mararanya ma skorama ro Antiokhia ro Pisidia. Ro ras Mananai Yahudi skoraḇe rum ari, ma skokain ro dia.
44013015	Siwasya sasoser Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi-nabi posa kwar, mananir-mananir ro rum ari ansi siwan fa sifuken su: "Naek mko, rofyor wos anun ḇeḇawes ma ḇeḇuk sneprei faro er sine naisya, iḇye mkawos na farosi!"
44013016	Inja Paulus iyori. Ma ryasepen si, ḇo doḇo: "Ne, snonkaku Israel ma mko ḇeyararyof faro Allah, mko mnafkada!
44013017	Allah er Israel ani kyinfir kwar up koḇesi ma ifrur er ani fa idonek, fafisu skain ro Masir imnis mandaman. Kuker sambraḇ ma papoik Allah dunsi kwar fa sisasyar bur mnu ani.
44013018	Wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak i kḇaḇ si ro rari sena ro sup ḇeursḇa.
44013019	Ma rofyor Allah myun er rifik ro sup Kanaan kwar, i rarwas sup ani faro si fa snaḇe pusaka,
44013020	indokada wampasi wambarek utin rifiak samfur ririm. Posa kwar ḇyuk faro si hakim-hakim isof ro awar Nabi Semuel.
44013021	Ḇarpur ya sor wairek oso inja Allah ḇyuk farosi Saul Kis mandaḇendi ro keret Benyamin, ḇe wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak.
44013022	Saul ḇyeḇesawen kwar, Allah ikanow Daud ḇe wairek faro si. Faro Daud Allah fyasnai kwar: Yasma kwar Daud Isai mandaḇendi, snon oso ḇefrur sneprei ma ḇefrur marisen ḇeḇor ayena.
44013023	Ma ro up ḇyesi, imnis raris moḇ ḇyeasas kwar. Allah ḇyawes kwar Ḇeḇuk koreri faro snonkaku Israel, isoine Yesus.
44013024	Fafisu siwaf rarama ḇyedi Yohanes ḇyaryas kwar faro er Israel ḇesiper insa simbror ma sor masi sren.
44013025	Ma ro fafisu Yohanes fanam ifrur posa fararur ḇyedi ikofen: Ro karkara mkoḇena mkoḇo Yesus iso aya, ḇape ikada nari pyur aya. Faro yaper roi ḇesower ḇyesi monda yasyus ḇa.
44013026	Ne, naek srar yesi, iḇye Abraham kpu ḇyesi, ma ḇeyararyof Allah, ḇaryas koreri ani sḇaryas i kwar faro ko.
44013027	Snar kawasa ḇekain ro Yerusalem ma manfarkin-manfarkin sesi skarem Yesus ḇa. Inja ssḇuk samamyai faro i, fa sifrur mnis nabi-nabi sya wos sena si wasya ro ras-ras Mananai Yahudi.
44013028	Ma sisma roi osoḇa fa snaḇe knam samamyai marmari, ḇesyaḇo sor kwar faro Pilatus insa smuni.
44013029	Ma rofyor sifrur mnis kwar roi ḇeḇor sfasḇair ro i, raimnai sisabu i ro aprop, ma sikriri.
44013030	Ḇape Allah ḇyawesi ro fandu ḇemar sya.
44013031	Ma fyor ono fyasnai mankundi faro ḇesoi, ro Galilea ḇe Yerusalem sya. Siso baboine ḇeḇesaksi i faro er ine.
44013032	Ma knikine inko ḇaryas ankankinem ḇeḇye ine faro mko, isoine asas ssḇuk kwar faro up koḇesi,
44013033	Allah ḇye imnis kwar faro ko, kpu sesi, kuker ḇaḇawes Yesus, imnis fas-fas ro mazmur ḇeḇesuru: Rumkun yedi au! Yaḇen au kwar ro ras ine.
44013034	Allah ḇyawes i kwar fandu ḇemar sya ma ipok ḇyuki faro munaiḇui wer ḇa. Roi ḇeḇesya ine Manseren fyasnai ro wos ine: Aya nari yafrur mnis faro mko asas-asas ḇesren nari mko kyar na, yaḇuk na kwar faro Daud.
44013035	Eḇedari ikofen ro mazmur ḇeso: Nari wapok mam mundaḇa snonkaku Ḇesren bedi ro mun aiḇui.
44013036	Snar Daud ifrur Allah marisen ḇyena ro awar ḇyedi, raimnai imar ma sikriri fanam kpu ḇyesi, ma ikada ssḇuki faro munaiḇui.
44013037	Ḇape Yesus Allah ḇyawes ya, i kada rarirya ḇa.
44013038	Inja mkofawi, ne naek srar, snar Iso ḇeḇedar sḇaryas faro mko nyan ḇaḇeampun ro sasar.
44013039	Ma i ḇeḇedar snonkaku ḇekyar sya sisma faspar ro sasar ḇeḇor sena, mboi mkopok mkosma naba, kuker Moses sasoser ḇyena.
44013040	Inja, mkepen mko, insa mkosma awer rosai sikofen kwar ro syap nabi-nabi:
44013041	Mko swarepen, ne ḇenankoryae mko, mko karsosen ma mkomar, snar yafrur fararur oso ro awar mkoḇedi, Fararur oso nari mkokyari ḇa, rofyor sḇaryasi faro mko."
44013042	Ro fafisu Paulus ma Barnabas susasyar, sor ro su insa suwawos ro mnuk ani wer ro ras Mananai Yahudi iyama.
44013043	Seari posa kwar, snonkaku Yahudi sibor ma ḇeyakso agama Yahudi ḇeyararyof faro Allah, siso Paulus ma Barnabas; manwawan ansu suḇuk farkarkor ma suyanun si insa skain nako ro Allah saswar ma fakamaman ḇyena.
44013044	Ro ras Mananai Yahudi ḇepur ani indokada mnu ani ḇesiper srama fa simnaf Allah wos ḇyena.
44013045	Ḇape, rofyor snonkaku Yahudi smam snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi, sifo kuker masasor ma sawos anonef, ma sisampum rosai Paulus ikofen na.
44013046	Ḇape Paulus ma Barnabas sumku ḇo sukofen: "Kaku ḇaḇoi mkoiso nari ḇesma ḇepon ḇaryas ro Allah wos ḇyedi, ḇape mko pampumi ma mkokara mkoḇe mkosyusḇa fa mkosma kankenem ḇemanaiḇa ya. Eḇedari inko kaḇer faro er-er ḇeso.
44013047	Snar ineiso sasoser faro inko: Ya fasnai au kwar insa beisnai faro er-er ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa sya, insa wun aski isof ro supswan pember."
44013048	Snonkaku ḇeyakfawi Allahḇa sya kam simnaf rarirya siryaḇ ḇo sisandik wos Allah; ma snonkaku sya kam Allah fyasnai fa ḇesma kankenem ḇemnaiḇa sya, sikyar.
44013049	Raimnai Manseren wos ya ḇyeḇeḇaryas ro sup ya fyor ani ḇesiper.
44013050	Snonkaku Yahudi sya sfarkor ninyan bin-bin ḇeḇesnonsnon ma ḇeyararyof Allah, ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara ro mnu ani, fa sifrur kandera faro Paulus ma Barnabas ma siyaw subur supya fyor ani.
44013051	Inja Paulus ma Barnabas sukokef fafen ḇero suwesna imnis swarapepen faro snonkaku ansi, raimnai suraḇe Ikonium.
44013052	Ma kawasa Kristen ḇero Antiokhia si ryaḇ ma sifo kuker Rur Ḇesren.
44014001	Ro Ikonium kako manwawan ansuya susun ro Yahudi sya rum ari sedi, ma suḇuk farkarkor faro snonkaku kuker sne ḇesiper, isof snonkaku Yahudi ma Yunani sibor sikyar.
44014002	Ḇape kawasa Yahudi ḇepampum ḇaryas suḇena sya, sawos snesam kawasa ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa sya isof simsor faro naek ansuya.
44014003	Paulus ma Barnabas sukain ras ono ro dia. Suḇuk farkarkor kuker makaku, snar sukyar faro Manseren. Ma Manseren ḇyuk sambraḇ ro ḇaryas saswar ma fakamaman Ḇyena ma ḇyuk faro su papoik fa sufrur aḇyair-aḇyair ma aḇyair kanandor.
44014004	Ḇape kawasa ḇeḇor ro mnu ani sirwas ḇesuru: ono siwaira kawasa Yahudi sya, ono wer siwaira manwawan ansu.
44014005	Inja kawasa ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa sya kuker kawasa Yahudi sifnoḇek manfarkin-manfarkin sesi kam sirandak sifrur kandera manwawan ansu ma soḇo ssosu kuker karui.
44014006	Rofyor manwawan ansu sufawi auw sedi kwar, inja sufrar ḇe mnu-mnu ro Likaonia, isoine Listera ma Derbe ro sup ya fyor ani.
44014007	Ro dia suḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye.
44014008	Ro Listra snon oso isya kyain faswef, snar wesi ipokḇa ma pyapipen ro fafisu snari daḇeni ipok imbranḇa.
44014009	Kyain imnaf ro fafisu Paulus dawawos. Ma Paulus iknoweri ma myam, kakyar ḇyedi, inja ifruri fa iprei.
44014010	Rarirya Paulus dawos kuker mkaren ḇeba: "Wores afuf ro wemssu!" Ma snon ani iyori fa dores, ma imbran mura muma.
44014011	Rofyor kawasa ḇeḇor ansi smam rosai Paulus ifrur ani, sikam ssibras ḇo sawos ro wos Likaonia: "Karwar-karwar ansi sado kwar ro fandu ko kuker sower snonkaku."
44014012	Barnabas sori ḇe Zeus ma Paulus sori ḇe Hermes, snar i ḇeyawawos ya.
44014013	Inja karwar Zeus, ḇena rum karwar ro mnuya ḇandiri, imam ḇyedi ryama ḇo dun sapi snoman ma pampen-pampen bos ono ḇe kedwai ḇeba ro mnu kuker kawasa ḇeḇor fa ssḇuk farsarser samsom faro manwawan ansu.
44014014	Barnabas ma Paulus sumnaf rarirya susap sansun suḇena, ma suyoper ro fandu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ma suyiw ḇo sukofen:
44014015	"Ne, kawasa mkoine kam, snaro mkofrur rarirya? Inko ine snonkaku monda raris mko. Inko isya ro dine fa inko ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro mko, insa mkosawen fararur fromo ine, ma mkokaḇer faro Allah ḇekenem, ḇefrur kwar nanki ma supswan, soren ma roi ḇeḇor ḇero ina kam.
44014016	Ro awar ḇesyof Allah myam monda er-er kam ḇo siso nyan mankunsi sena,
44014017	rariryano i mewerḇa fa fyasnai mankundi kuker frur pyum nabor, isoine ḇyuk mekem ro nanki ma wampasi wambarek ḇeḇuksur pyum rokaker ḇe mko. Ḇyuk sneprei faro mko kuker nanan ma raryaḇ."
44014018	Manwawan ansu suyawos rarirya, fa sudwarek kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ḇape saser suba mboi indokada ssḇuk samsom farsarser faro su.
44014019	Ḇape kawasa Yahudi ḇerama ker Antiokhia ma Ikonium sembuk kawasa ḇeḇor ansi fa siso si. Raimnai sso Paulus kuker karui ma sismeri ḇe mnuya ḇandiri, snar skara ḇo soḇo imar kwar.
44014020	Ḇape rofyor kawasa Kristen ansi sores yari-yari, inja ikḇawes ma syun ḇe mnuya. Meserdi i kuker Barnabas sura kam ḇe Derbe.
44014021	Paulus ma Barnabas suḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro mnu ani ma susma kawasa Kristen sibor. Raimnai sukaḇer ḇe Listra, Ikonium ma Antiokhia.
44014022	Ro mnu-mnu anna suḇuk samambraḇ faro kawasa Kristen sisnesna ma suyanun si insa sidworen ro kakyar sena, ma sukofen, kosun ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah nari kosmai kandera nabor.
44014023	Ro jemaat oser-oser manwawan ansuya sukanow penatua-penatua faro jemaat ani ma sunadi ma sefarfor posa suḇuk penatua-penatua ansi faro Manseren, ḇeḇeknam ro kakyar sena.
44014024	Skombran kasiper sup Pisidia ma skosaye ro Pamfilia.
44014025	Ro dia suḇaryas wos ya ro Perga, raimnai suraḇe Atalia, ro swan andir.
44014026	Ro dia suyayun wer ḇe Antiokhia; ro sup Syam; ro moḇ anine iso randak ya ssḇuk su faro saswar ma fakamaman Allah insa surandak fararur, sufrur kwar ya.
44014027	Sura kwar ro dia suyor fa jemaat ani siryur, posa sufarfyar faro si roi ḇeḇor kam Allah ifrur kwar kuker ḇramin suḇena, ma Allah ḇyas kedwai ya faro er-er ḇeso sya faro kakyar.
44014028	Ro dia sukain fyoro kaku kuker kawasa Kristen ansi.
44015001	Snonkaku ono sraker Yudea ḇe Antiokhia ma ssḇuk farkarkor faro naek srar ḇero dia: "Rofyor mko ḇeḇesofuk ḇaim imnis, rari Moses ḇyefa ḇeḇepusaka, nari mkopok ḇa fa mkosma koreri."
44015002	Ḇape Paulus ma Barnabas susampum karkara sena. Ḇarpurya sfasnai, Paulus ma Barnabas kuker snonkaku ono ḇeso wer ro jemaat ani insa sraḇe Yerusalem faro manwawan-manwawan ma penatua-penatua sya fa sawawos ro mnuk ani.
44015003	Jemaat ani siyaker si isof ro mnu ya ḇandiri, raimnai simbrainuk Fenisia ma Samaria, ma ro moḇ anna sfarfyar ro marandor kawasa ḇeyakfawi Allah ḇa sya. Farfyar anna nafrur raryaḇ naek ansi sisnesna.
44015004	Skora kwar ro Yerusalem jemaat ma manwawan sya kuker penatua-penatua, sisrow si ma sfarfyar faro si ro roi ḇeḇor kam Allah ifrur kuker si.
44015005	Ḇape snonkaku ono ro rarwas Farisi, ḇekyar kwar sya, srama ma sikofen: "Snonkaku ro er ḇeso ḇekyar kwar sya nari seḇesofuk ma seuser Moses sasoser ḇyena."
44015006	Inja manwawan ansi ma penatua-penatua skankain fa sawawos ro mnuk ine.
44015007	Skara fyoro kwar ro mnuk ani, ḇarpur ya Petrus iyori ma ikofen faro si: "Ne, naek ma srar mko, mkofawi, ro randakya Allah kyinfir aya ro fandu mko, insa kuker sḇadon yedi er-er ḇeso sakmnaf ḇaryas ankankinem ḇeḇye ma sikyar.
44015008	Ma Allah, ḇefawi snonkaku sisnesna, fyasnai marisen ḇyedi kwar insa daknasi snar byuk Rur Ḇesren ya kako faro si imnis ḇyuk faro ko,
44015009	ma ipok ifrur rarwas osoḇa ro fandu ko kuker si, rofyor fyasren sisnesna kwar snar kakyar sena.
44015010	Rariryaido, snaro mko marisen mko frowsbir Allah kuker mkorir ro erdai kawasa Kristen ansi kamnam oso, kpu koḇesi sipok sḇarḇa, isof baboine kokako?
44015011	Rarirya, ko kyar, saswar-fakamaman Manseren Yesus Kristus nari kosma koreri imnis si kako."
44015012	Inja er ansi kam sefasis, ḇo simnaf Paulus ma Barnabas sufarfyar aḇyair ma fasasnai kanandor nakam Allah ifrur kwar kuker su fandu er-er ḇeso sya.
44015013	Paulus ma Barnabas sumnai ro wawos suḇena kwar, Yakobus ikofen: "Ne, naek ma srar, mkomnaf aya:
44015014	"Simon fyarfyar kwar, ro randak ya Allah fyasnai fakamaman ḇyedi faro er-er ḇese, isoine kuker kankinfir er oso ro fandu si faro snonsnon ḇyedi.
44015015	Mnuk ani imnis kuker fasfas ro nabi-nabi sya wos sena:
44015016	'Ḇarpur nari yakaḇer ma yaḇawes wer aḇdares Daud ḇekarḇaken kwar, ma bemkokna nari yaḇawesna wer ma nari yaḇefa nadworen,
44015017	Insa kawasa ḇeso sya kam ssewar Manseren ma er-er kam ḇefawi Allah ḇa sya, yorsi ḇekawasa yesi rarirya Manseren ḇefrur nakam wos ḇyedi,'
44015018	ma neḇefawi ḇepon kwar ro awar madero."
44015019	Inja yakara, imnis ḇa fa kofrur kandera faro er-er ḇeso ḇekaḇer faro Allah.
44015020	Mboi kofas syap farosi, insa sḇinkwan bur roḇean sḇukfarser kwar faro amfyanir sya fa ḇearwarem, ma farbuk, ma aiwan ḇemaruk ma rik.
44015021	Snar ro awar ḇepon iwara Moses sasoser ḇyena sḇaryasna ro mnu oser-oser, ma isof baboine sasoser anna siwasyana ro ras-ras Mananai Yahudi ro rum-rum nadi."
44015022	Inja manwawan ansi ma penatua-penatua kuker jemaat ḇesiper ansi sawos namuk fa skinfir ro fandusi snon ono fa nari siwan siḇe Antiokhia fnoḇek Paulus ma Barnabas, isoine Yudas sap i kakoḇe Barsabas ma Silas. Snonkaku ansuine semaf su ro fandu naek ma srar ansi.
44015023	Ssḇuk syap oso farosi ḇerok radine: "Aski ro manwawan-manwawan ma penatua-penatua, ro naek srar mkoḇesi faro naek srar ro Antiokhia, Siria ma Kilikia ḇeḇeknam ro er-er ḇeso.
44015024	Inko mnaf kwar, naek ono ro fandu inko, ḇesmai ankinem ro inkoḇa, mboi ḇerafa ḇefrur ḇirḇar mkosnemna kuker farkarkor sena.
44015025	Eḇedari kuker sne ḇesiper inkawos namuk kwar fa inko kinfir ma inkowan snonkaku ono faro mko fnoḇek Barnabas ma Paulus inko swar ansu,
44015026	isoine snonkaku risuru ḇeḇuk nyawa kwar snar snonsnon Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus.
44015027	Inja inkowan Yudas ma Silas, insa suwos asuser anun ḇefas ro syap ine faro mko kako.
44015028	Snar Rur Ḇesren ya imarisen ma inko kako inko marisen, insa korir awer faro mko kamnam ḇeḇor ro roi ḇeḇefandun nane:
44015029	inja iḇye mko ḇinkwan bur roḇean ḇefarsarser faro karwar, ma rik, aiwan ḇemaruk ma farbuk. Rofyor mko sasor mko ro roi ḇeḇesya nane, mkoso pyum kwar. Irya kwar, aski ḇemko."
44015030	Siser siḇrasna kwar, Yudas ma Silas sumbran ḇe Antiokhia. Ro diwa sor jemaat ḇesiper fa siryur, raimnai skoḇuk syap ani farosi.
44015031	Sewasya syap ani kwar, jemaat simarisen kaku snar rakrok ya ḇyuk sneprei.
44015032	Yudas ma Silas, nabi suirya kako, inja fyoro kaku suḇuk swarepen faro naek srar ansya ma susonem sisnesna.
44015033	Ma sukain fyoro knik ro dia, raimnai naek srar ansi srir su kuker aski fa sukaḇer faro ḇewan susya. [
44015034	Ḇape Silas kada imarisen kyain ro dia.]
44015035	Paulus ma Barnabas sukain fyoro knik ro Antiokhia. Sufnoḇek kawasa ḇeso sibor, suḇuk farkarkor ma suḇaryas Manseren wosya.
44015036	Ḇape ḇarpur ya ro fafisu ono Paulus ikofen faro Barnabas: "Iḇye ko kaḇer faro naek srar koḇesi ro mnu-mnu, moḇ ko ḇaryas Manseren wos ḇyena, insa komam rariso kankenem sena."
44015037	Barnabas imarisen dun kako Yohanes sap iḇe Markus;
44015038	ḇape Paulus ikofen bos, ipyumba fa kun snonkaku ḇebur ko kwar ro Pamfilia ma ḇemewer ḇefararur fnoḇek ko.
44015039	Mnuk ani ḇyeknam famfaḇri ḇefnakḇa isof suḇe sisye ma Barnabas dun Markus kako fa isoi ḇo suyayun ḇe Siprus.
44015040	Ḇape Paulus kyifir Silas, ma naek srar ansi srir sko faro saswar ma fakamaman Manseren.
44015041	Ma skombran yar Siria ma Kilikia ḇo suḇuk sambraḇ faro jemaat-jemaat ro dia.
44016001	Paulus ryama kako be Derbe ma ḇe Listra. Ro dia snon Kristen oso isya snori Timotius; snari bin Yahudi ḇekyar kwar, ḇoi kmari kada snon Yunani.
44016002	Timotius ine naek srar ḇero Listra ma Ikonium siwafi kam,
44016003	ma Paulus imarisen insa ifnoḇek i ro mararan ḇyedi. Paulus iwan fa sisofuk i snar kawasa Yahudi ro sup ani, snar sikam oser-oser ifawi kmari snon Yunani rirya.
44016004	Ro mararan yar mnu ḇe mnu Paulus ma Silas sukofen ḇadir mnuk rosai manwawan sya ma penatua-penatua ro Yerusalem sawos namuk kwar kuker ananun, insa jemaat-jemaat siso na.
44016005	Rarirya jemaat-jemaat sisma samambraḇ ro kakyar, ma fyoromuma kawasa ḇekyar sya sibor syadi wer.
44016006	Skombranuk sup Frigia ma sup Galatia, snar Rur Ḇesren ya idwarek sko ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Asia.
44016007	Ma skorama ro Misia ma sko karabir fa skosun ro supya mnuk Bitinia, ḇape Rur Yesus ḇyuk ḇa.
44016008	Skunuk Misia kwar, skoranda ro Troas.
44016009	Ro roḇya Paulus myam mamam oso; snon Makedonia oso dores ro dia ma dori, ḇo doḇo: "Kwaḇor muma insa wafnoḇek inko!"
44016010	Rofyor Paulus myam mamam ani kwar, inkosewar fasaw fafisu fa inko kaḇor ḇe Makedonia, snar ro mamam ani inkun karkara, irya Allah dor inko insa inko ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro snonkaku sya ro diwa.
44016011	Inja inkopaw ro Troas ma inkayun pdef ḇe Samotrake, ma meserdi inkorande ro Neapolis,
44016012	ro dia inkora ḇe Filipi, mnu ḇepon ro supya mnuk Makedonia ine, mnu dakam faro kawasa Roma. Ro mnu ani inko kain ras ono.
44016013	Ro ras Mananai Yahudi inko sasyar ro kadwai ḇeba ro mnuya. Inko mbran sye war andir ma inko srow moḇ Yahudi sya senadi roya, ro karkara inkoḇena isya ro dia; inko kain kwar, inkawawos faro bin-bin ḇeryur ro dia.
44016014	Oso ro fandu bin ansi benirḇe Lidia dakmnaf kako. I bin oso ḇeḇoḇ kruḇen ḇefuk ro mnu Tiatira, ḇesyom faro Allah. Manseren ḇyas sneri, isof kyarkara roi Paulus dawos na.
44016015	Isma masi sren kuker kawasa ro rum ḇyedi ḇesiper kwar, dor inko, ḇo doḇo: "Rofyor mko kara, ayaḇe bin ḇekyar faro Manseren, mkorama mkoḇe ryar ro rum ayedi." Ḇyedifer inko isof inkoso i.
44016016	Ro fafisu oso rofyor inkora wer ḇe moḇ nadi ani, inko srow infyan oso ḇena rur ḇemamkarkir; kuker mamam karkir ḇyena tuan ḇyesi sisma nana nabor.
44016017	Iyom user Paulus ma inko ma dorḇo doḇo: "Snonkaku sine ido Allah ro Moḇ ḇekaki manfamyan ḇyesirya. Sḇaryas faro mko nyan aski."
44016018	Infyan ani ifrur rarirya ḇe ras ono. Ḇape rofyor Paulus fyafayaf kayaryaren ani, inja isiḇer ma ikofen faro rur ani: "Kuker snonsnon Yesus Kristus yawan au fa wasasyarbur bin ine." Ro fafisu ani beri rur ani isasyarbur i.
44016019	Rofyor tuan-tuan ḇena infyan ani smam, kakyar sena insa sisma nana nefromo, inja sfor Paulus ma Silas, ma sismer su ḇebarpon ḇeḇenasan ro pasar.
44016020	Rofyor ssun su kwar ḇeḇarpon ḇebarara-ḇebarara ro mnu ani, ma sikofen: "Snonkaku sine sifrur aru biru mnu koḇanine, snar sikada snon Yahudi,
44016021	ma ssḇuk farkarkor ro rari, kawasa Roma koya kopok koso naba."
44016022	Rarirya kawasa ḇeḇor ansi sikḇawes ma sisampum su. Inja ḇebarara-ḇebarara ḇero mnu ani siwan fa spansawek sansun ḇero baken suḇena ma siprer su.
44016023	Siprer suḇe rarwan ono kwar, raimnai sḇesu fa susun bui. Mananir ro bui isma sasoser ḇepakrek insa iwaren pyum su.
44016024	Imnis sasoser ani mananir ro bui ḇyuk fa susun ro sim ḇero fadu ma sewanka suwesna kuker apyawur ḇedworen.
44016025	Ḇape indokada romfawru Paulus ma Silas suḇenadi ma sudisen dow sanandik faro Allah ma snonkaku ḇeyaksmai ḇeso ansi simnaf user su.
44016026	Fyoroḇa rim ḇeba oso myun, isof bui dopir-dopir ḇyena namarmer; ma rofyor ya kako kedwai ḇeḇor nakam nbase ma wanka sya saibur su.
44016027	Rofyor mananir bui ḇyir ro anenef ḇyedi ma myam kedwai ḇeḇor anna nbas kam pyas sumber ḇyedi fa iḇe ḇyukmun mankundi, snar kyara, snonkaku ḇesmai ansi sifrar sibur kwar.
44016028	Ḇape Paulus dor naba kaku, ḇo doḇo: "Mun mankundaw awer, snar inko isya kam ro dine!"
44016029	Mananir bui iwan fa sun paramrom, raimnai ifrar fa syun kuker radadai ḇyansuba ro ḇarpon Paulus ma Silas.
44016030	Dunsu ḇeḇondi, ma ikofen: "Tuan-tuan rosai nari yafrur, insa yasma aski?"
44016031	Sukarem: "Wakyar faro Manseren Yesus Kristus ma nari wasma koreri, au ma kawasa ro rum bedi ḇesiper."
44016032	Posa suḇaryas Manseren wosya faroi ma kawasa kam ro rum ḇyedi.
44016033	Ro oras ani beri mananir bui dunsu fa ḇyan sren amborew suḇena. Ro fafisuya i kuker kawasa ḇyesi sor fa sismai masi sren.
44016034	Posa dunsu ḇe rum ḇyedi ma ikankun fa suyan. Ma iryaḇ fafayaḇa snar i ma kawasa ro rum ḇyedi ḇesiper sikyar kwar faro Allah.
44016035	Meser kwar ḇebarara ro mnuya siwan ḇefararur ro mnuya fa sra faro mananir bui kuker anun: "Wasasyar snonkaku ansuya!"
44016036	Mananir bui dakkofen anun ani faro Paulus, ḇo doḇo: "Ḇebarara ro mnu siwan kwar fa mko sasyar; inja mko sasyar ro knikine ma mkora kuker ḇaḇye!"
44016037	Ḇape Paulus ikofen faro snonkaku ansi: "Skara nanapes ḇayim siprer inko kwar, kawasa Roma, ro ḇarpon kawasa ḇeḇor, raimnai inkosun bui. Insape siḇe sisasyar famyun inko? Rariryaḇa! Ḇoi mankunsi srama siyaker nu fa nusasyar."
44016038	Ḇefararur ro mnu ansi sikofen ḇadir wos anna faro ḇebarara-ḇebarara ro mnu ani. Rofyor simnaf Paulus ma Silas snon Roma suirya, inja simkak kaku.
44016039	Srama ma sor maaf raimnai siyaker manwawan ansuya fa susasyar ma sor ro su insa subur mnu ani.
44016040	Raimnai subur bui ma sura ḇe Lidia rum ḇyedi; ma su srow naek ansi kwar ro dia ma suḇuk sneprei faro si, posa manwawan ansuya subur.
44017001	Paulus ma Silas suso nyan ḇeyunuk Amfipolis ma Apolonia isof sura ro Tesalonika. Ro dia rum ari Yahudi oso isya.
44017002	Raris fararur ḇyedi Paulus syun ro rum ari ani. Ro ras Mananai Yahudi rikior iwawos kuker si ro mnuk oso ro Refo.
44017003	Ikofen asuser faro si ma kyur fasnai, nari Wairek isma marindi ma diḇri fandu ḇemar sya, raimnai ikofen: "Ine Wairek, isoine Yesus, yaḇaryas faro mko."
44017004	Ono ro si sikyar ma seoser kuker Paulus ma Silas ma kawasa Yunani sibor kako ḇeyararyof faro Allah ma bin-bin ḇefawi ono sibor kaku.
44017005	Ḇape kawasa Yahudi sya simsor ma sisma famfnoḇek ro snon ḇarḇor ono ro fandu ḇeḇekirḇa ro pasar, fa sifrur mbrus ma searubiru mnu ani. Soper Yason rum ḇyedi kuker swaruser fa ssun Paulus ma Silas ḇe ḇarpon fananjur kawasa ḇeḇor.
44017006	Ḇape rofyor sisma su ḇa, sismer Yason kuker naek ono ḇe ḇarpon ḇebarara ro mnuya, ḇo ssibras, ḇo soḇo: "Snonkaku ḇefrur aru biru ro supswan ḇesiper srama kwar kako rodine,
44017007	ma Yason dun si fa seryar ro rum ḇyedi. Sikam sisampum Kaisar sasoser ḇyena ma sikofen, wairek ḇeso oso isya, isoine Yesus."
44017008	Rofyor kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ma ḇebarara ro mnu simnaf wos anna kam, sikam sefesfyas.
44017009	Ḇape sisma ḇaḇyak kwar ro Yason ma naek srar ono ḇeso inja srir si.
44017010	Ḇape ro roḇya beri naek srar ḇero dia siwan fasaw Paulus ma Silas fa suraḇe Berea. Sura kwar ro dia suraḇe Yahudi sya rum ari sedi.
44017011	Kawasa Yahudi ro mnu ani sisnesna nfafir syadi kawasa Yahudi ro Tesalonika, snar sikada simnaf wosya kuker sne ḇemarisen syadi ma ras-ras kam sewasya Refoya fa ssḇuk karkara farkarkor simnaf na nkaku rariryake roḇa.
44017012	Sibor kaku ro fandu si sikyar; ma bin-bin ḇefawi ono sibor kaku ma snon Yunani ono kako.
44017013	Ḇape rofyor kawasa Yahudi ro Tesalonika sifawi, ro Berea kako Paulus ḇyaryas Allah wosya kwar, srama kako ro dia fa sfarkor ninyan ma searu biru snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sisnesna.
44017014	Ḇape naek srar ansi siwan fasaw kaku Paulus fa ryaḇe swan andir, ḇoi Silas ma Timotius sukada sukain kaker ro Berea.
44017015	Kawasa ḇeyaker Paulus sya sisoi isof ro Atena, raimnai skaḇer kuker ankinem faro Silas ma Timotius, insa susamberen snari.
44017016	Fafisu Paulus iwaf su ro Atena, sneri fyafayaf kaku snar myam mnu ani ifo kuker amfyanir-amfyanir karwar.
44017017	Eḇedari i kuker kawasa Yahudi ma kawasa ḇeyararyof Allah sya skarkara ro rum ari, ma kuker snonkaku ras-ras kam isrow ro pasar sya.
44017018	Ma kuker ḇefawinananem swaruser ono kako ro rarwas Epikuros ma Stoa sfamfaḇri swaruser kuker i ma ono sikofen: "Inja rosaiso mandaw ine imarisen ikofen ine?" Ḇape ḇeso sya sikofen: "Imbude ḇaryas farkarkor ro karwar mandaman." Snar ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Yesus ma aḇiḇer ya.
44017019	Inja ssuni ḇe ḇarpon kankain Areopagus ma sikofen: "Inko marisen fa inkakfawi farkarkor babo rosaiso farkor ine?
44017020	Snar roi wakofen faro inko nane nafrur kanandor. Inja inko marisen inko fawi, rosai ḇeḇesya nakam."
44017021	Kawasa Atena ma kawasa mandaman ḇekain ro dia sisma mnis fafisuḇa faro roi ono mboi simarisen sawawos ma simnaf ro roi ḇeḇor ḇebabo.
44017022	Paulus rya dores ro Areopagus ma ikofen: "Ne, kawasa Atena, yamam, ḇoi ro roi ḇeḇor kam mko myaren kaku mkoḇe ari faro karwar-karwar.
44017023	Snar rofyor yambran mura-muma ro mnu mko ḇedi ma yamam roi mko sandik na, yasrow kako rokef farsarser oso kuker fas-fas: Faro Allah inko fawiḇa. Rosai mkofawiḇa ḇoi mko syom, iso yaḇaryas faro mko.
44017024	Allah ḇefrur kwar supswan kuker roi ḇeḇor ḇeroina kam, i rya, Manseren ro nanki ma supswan, kyain ro rum karwar snonkaku sya sifrur kuker siḇrasna ḇa,
44017025	ma kako suf farmyan kuker ḇramin snonkaku ḇa, imnis raris nyamnis roi onoḇa, snar iso ḇeḇuk kenem ma knaref ma roi ḇeḇor kam faro snonkaku sya.
44017026	Ro snonkaku oser baken ifrur kwar er-er kam ma snonkaku fa skain ro supswan ḇesiper ma ryir kwar faro si wampasi wambarek ma yawek na ro kankain sena,
44017027	insa ssewar i ma span ma sisrow i, mboi ḇyinkwan koḇa.
44017028	Snar ro i kokenem, komararer, koisya, imnis raris moḇ manwarwor mko ḇesi sikofen kwar: Snar koine koḇekpu ro Allah kako.
44017029	Snar koine koḇeknam ro kpu Allah, rarirya kopok kokara awer, isoine ḇaḇe Manseren imnis raris brawen roḇa sarak roḇa karui, fararur kamasan ma fawawi snonkaku.
44017030	Inja Allah myam werḇa faro awar fawawiḇa, mboi baboine Allah ḇyaryas faro snonkaku sya, ro moḇ nakam fa simbror.
44017031	Snar fyasnai kwar ras oso, fafisu rosai kuker napnapes nari ḇyemankara supswan kuker snonkaku oser fyasnai kwar posa ḇyuk faro kawasa kam fasasnai oso kuker ḇyaws i bur ḇemar sya."
44017032	Rofyor simnaf aḇiḇer ro snonkaku ḇemar sya, ono skoryaye, ma ono ḇeso sikofen: "Fafisu ḇeso resari inko mnaf wawos wer ro mnuk ani."
44017033	Raimnai Paulus ibur si.
44017034	Ḇape snon ono seoser kukeri ma sikyar, ro fandusi Dionisius, oso ro kankain Areopagus ma bin oso snori Damaris, ma snonkaku ono kako si fnoḇek sko.
44018001	Raimnai Paulus ibur Atena, ma ryaḇe Korintus.
44018002	Ro Korintus isrow snon Yahudi oso snori Akwila, mnu ḇyedi Pontus. Insape ryama ker Italia kuker swari, Priskila, snar Kaisar Klaudius ḇyuk sasoser kwar, insa kawasa Yahudi kam sisasyar bur Roma. Paulus rya isrow su ro rum suḇedi.
44018003	Snar fararur skoḇena namnis inja ryowus su. Skofararur kayam, snar fararur skoḇena skofrur rum kruḇen.
44018004	Ma ro ras Mananai Yahudi Paulus dawawos ro rum ari ma ḇyesewar insa dun snonkaku Yahudi ma Yunani fa sikyar.
44018005	Rofyor Silas ma Timotius surama ker Makedonia Paulus kuker sne ḇesiper ḇyaryas wosya, ma ḇyuk kesaksian faro kawasa Yahudi, insa sifawi Yesus i Wairek.
44018006	Ḇape rofyor kawasa ansi si sampum ma sonefi, inja kyokef fafen ḇero sansun ḇyena ma ikofen faro si: "Iḇye rik mkoḇena nek ro mankun mko ḇrumna; yasren, yasasar ḇa. Randak ro knikine yara faro er-er ḇeso."
44018007	Inja isasyar ro dia, fa ryaḇe rum snon oso ḇenir Titus Yustus, ḇeḇeari faro Allah, ma rum ḇyedi fyanam kuker rum ari.
44018008	Ḇape Krispus, mananir rum ari ani, ikada ikyar faro Manseren kuker kawasa ḇero rum ḇyedi ḇesiper, ma kawasa Korintus ḇemnaf ḇaryas Paulus ḇyena, sibor sikyar ma sor fa sisma masi sren.
44018009	Ro roḇ oso Manseren ikofen faro Paulus ro mamam oso: "Wamkak awer! Ḇaryas pdef wosya ḇo befasis awer!
44018010	Snar yarowus au ma snonkaku oso nari pyan ma ḇyewayam auḇa, snar kawasa yesi sibor ro mnu ine."
44018011	Inja Paulus kyain ro dia ḇe wampasi wambarek oser ma paik riwonem ma ḇyuk farkarkor ro Allah wos ya rofandu si.
44018012	Ḇape rofyor Galio ḇye Gubernur kwar ro Akhaya, kawasa Yahudi sikḇawes kam fa sisampum Paulus, ma ssuni ḇe ḇarpon kankain karkara ḇenapes.
44018013	Sikofen: "Snon ine ḇyesewar fa dun kawasa kam ḇeḇeari faro Allah sisnesna ro nyan ḇeso ḇemnisḇa kuker sasoser Refo Yahudi."
44018014	Rofyor Paulus iḇe dakawawos, Galio ikofen faro kawasa Yahudi sya: "Ne, kawasa Yahudi mko, rofyor mko ḇuksof roi ḇesasar roḇa ḇarḇor oso, nari yaḇeaḇaḇen ma yamnaf mko,
44018015	ḇape roi ḇeḇesya ani irya snar masasor ḇekur wawos roḇa snonsnon roḇa wer sasoser ḇero fandu mko, ipyum syadi mkawos na ro mankun mko; yamarisen ḇa yaḇe mankara faro roi ḇeradine."
44018016	Raimnai iyaw si ro sim karkara ḇenapes.
44018017	Rarirya snonkaku ansi soper Sostenes, mananir rum ari, ma siprer i ro ḇarpon rum karkara ḇenapes ani; ḇape Galio ḇyefandun roi ḇeḇesya aniḇa.
44018018	Paulus kyain ras ono wer ro Korintus. Raimnai ikofen ḇayir faro naek srar ro dia, ma dayunḇe Siria, posa ro ikapnik snonburyam ḇyena ro Kenkerea, snar ḇyeamar kwar. Priskila ma Akwila suso i.
44018019	Ma skorande ro Efesus. Paulus ibur Priskila ma Akwila ro diya. Derer ssyun ro rum ari ma dawawos kuker kawasa Yahudi sya.
44018020	Sor fa insa kyain fyoro knik ro dia, ḇape ḇyuk ḇa.
44018021	Ma ikofen ḇadir faro si: "Rofyor Allah imarisen nari yakaḇer faro mko." Raimnai pyaw ro Efesus.
44018022	Rya kwar ro Kaisarea ma fyor dek rande kwar ma ḇyuk aroo faro jemaat, posa ryaḇe Antiokhia.
44018023	Kyain ras ono ro dia kwar, imbran wer, ma imbran yar sup Galatia ma Frigia ḇesiper fa isonem kawasa Kristen sisnesna kam.
44018024	Ro fafisu ani snon Yahudi ḇenir Apolos ryama ro Efesus, mnu ḇyedi Aleksandria. I snon ḇefawi ḇewawos ma ifawinananem kaku ro Refo.
44018025	Isma farkarkor kwar ro Nyan Manseren ḇyena. Kuker sne ḇesiper dawawos ma kuker aunos ḇyuk farkarkor ro Yesus, ḇape ifawi monda masi sren Yohanes.
44018026	Ḇyuk farkarkor randak ro rum ari Yahudi kuker makaku. Ḇape rofyor Priskila ma Akwila sumnafi kwar, suyuni ḇe rum suḇedi ma kuker ḇaḇeaunos sukofen fasnai faroi Allah Nyan ḇyena.
44018027	Snar Apolos imarisen kyaḇor ḇe Akhaya, inja naek srar ro Efesus sfarem syap faro kawasa Kristen ro dia insa si srowi. Ro fyor rya kwar ro Akhaya, kuker saswar ma fakamaman ro Allah, ḇyesnonkaku ḇefandun kaku faro kawasa ḇekyar sya.
44018028	Snar kuker fawawi ḇyena fyamfaḇri kuker kawasa Yahudi ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor ma fyasnai ḇayir ro Refo Yesus ikada Wairek.
44019001	Fafisu Apolos isya kaker ro Korintus, Paulus imbranuk ro sup ya dori isof syuḇer ro Efesus. Ro dia isrow snonkaku ḇeḇe Kristen ono.
44019002	Ikofen faro si: "Inja mkosma Rur Ḇesren ya kwar, rofyor mko kyar ya?" Ḇape skarem faroi: "Roḇayim, ma inkakmnaf ḇayim kako ro Rur Ḇesren ya isya."
44019003	Raimnai Paulus ikofen faro si: "Rarirya ido masasi rosai mko smaya?" Skarem: "Kuker masasi Yohanes."
44019004	Paulus ikofen: "Masasi Yohanes ikada masasi snonkaku ḇembror kwar, ma ikofen faro kawasa ḇeḇorsya mboi nari sikyar faro i ḇerama papuri, isoine Yesus."
44019005	Rofyor simnaf rarirya, sor fa sisma masi kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus.
44019006	Ma ro fafisu Paulus ḇyeḇok si, Rur Ḇesren ya isabu faro si, ma sirandak sawawos kuker wos-wos ono ma sḇardi.
44019007	Ḇarḇor sedi indokada sesnonkaku samfur seser risuru.
44019008	Paulus rya sawawek ḇe rum ari Yahudi ro dia ma ḇyuk farkarkor kuker masasik isof paik rikior. Ro ḇaryas ḇyena ḇyesewar fa sikyar Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
44019009	Ḇape ono sisya sisnesna npakrek. Simewer sikyar, imboi sonef Allah Nyan ḇyedi ro ḇarpon kawasa ḇeḇor. Inja Paulus dun kawasa Kristen ḇyesi ḇo ibur si, ma ras-ras kam ḇyuk farkarkor faro si ro Tiranus rum farkor ḇyedi.
44019010	Wampasi wambarek risuru ḇyuk farkarkor, isof kawasa ḇekain ro Asia kam simnaf Manseren wos ya, iḇye snon Yahudi ma Yunani kako.
44019011	Allah ifrur fasasnai-fasasnai kanandor ḇeba kaku, kuker Paulus ḇrasi.
44019012	Inja kawasa ssun marḇun ma kruḇen rosai Paulus syansun kwar fa srir na ro ḇeduf si, rarirya dafduf sena namnai ma rur ḇemaḇak sya sisasyar.
44019013	Snon Yahudi ḇena mon ono, simbran yar mnu ya, sapbir sas Manseren Yesus snori fa sḇukyaw rur ḇemaḇak ḇesower snonkaku sya ma sor, ḇo sikofen: "Yafores was mko kuker snonsnon Yesus Paulus fyarkor ani."
44019014	Romawa rifik ro mananir imam Yahudi oso snori Skewa siso ḇefrur rarirya.
44019015	Ḇape rur ḇemaḇak ani kyarem: "Yesus yamam biri, ma Paulus yafawiyi, ḇape mko, mansesiso mko?"
44019016	Ma snon rur ḇemaḇak ani iswoḇerya doper si ma myamunmun kuker sikam rao separpar ḇo sḇaḇer ma sifrar sibur snonkaku ani rum ḇyedi.
44019017	Kawasa kam ḇekain ro Efesus, iḇye Yahudi ma Yunani ḇefawi roi ḇeḇesya ine sikam simkak ma snonsnon Manseren Yesus ḇyesno syadi wer.
44019018	Sibor ro fandu si sikyar kwar, inja srama ma skarem ro ḇarpon, mboi si kako sakfrur frur ḇeradine.
44019019	Sibor kaku ro fandu si, ḇeyakfrur mon kako, siryur syap-syap rawan sena fa sikun na ro ḇarpon kawasa ḇeḇor. Maeja ro syap-syap rawan anna indokada nekumpan sarak syaran samfur ririm.
44019020	Kuker nyan ine Manseren wos ya ryer ḇo syambraḇ syadi wer.
44019021	Ḇarpur ro roi ḇeḇesya anna kam, Paulus kyara fa iḇe ryaḇe Yerusalem dunuk Makedonia ma Akhaya. Ikofen: "Rofyor yara kaki moḇ nane kwar ma nari yakmam Roma kako."
44019022	Inja iwan snon risuru ḇefnoḇeki, isoine Timotius ma Erastus, supon iḇe Makedonia, ḇoi mankundi kyain ras ono kaker ro Asia.
44019023	Ro fafisu ani aru biru ḇeba oso ryok fa kyur Manseren Nyan ḇyedi.
44019024	Snar snon oso snori Demetrius, kamasan sarak, ḇefrur rum-rum kasun ḇemnis rum karwar Artemis ro sarak. Sasewar ḇyedi ḇyuk nana nabor faro kamasan-kamasan ḇyesi.
44019025	Inja iryur sikam kuker ḇefararur ḇeso i sya ro sasewar ani ma ikofen: "Naek srar, mkofawi, nana koḇena kosma na ro sasewar ine!
44019026	Insape mankun mkomam ma mkorower, rariso ro Efesus dererḇa ḇoi Asia ḇesiper Paulus dembuk ma ḇyeninyan kawasa ḇeḇor ma ikofen, roi snonkaku sifrur kuker ḇramin anna karwar naisya ḇa.
44019027	Kuker nyan beradine nari sasewar koḇedi derer ryoḇa mboi nari iser koryae ro snonkaku isyadi wer rum Artemis, karwar ḇeba ani kako nari kawasa sefandun iba ma nari ryo. Ma Artemis, mankundi, Artemis, Asia ma supswan ḇesiper si syom ani baba ḇyedi nari ryo."
44019028	Kawasa ansi simnaf rarirya simsor namsinba beri, ma sar naba soḇo: "Artemis karwar kawasa Efesus iba!"
44019029	Mnu ani ḇesiper ḇyearu biru ma sikam semarani ḇe rum ḇeba oso ma sismer Gayus kuker Aristarkhus, snon Makedonia suirya ḇeso Paulus ro maran ḇyedi.
44019030	Paulus imarisen rya faro kawasa ansi fama kawasa Kristen simarisen ḇa.
44019031	Ma ḇebarara ono ro Asia ḇeḇebati Paulus, sfarem swarepen faro i, insa syun awer ḇe rum ḇeba ani.
