44019032	Ro fafisu ani kawasa ḇeryur ro rum ani si bras; ono sikofen radine ma ono wer sikofen radiyi, snar kawasa ansi searu biru ma sibor kaku sifawiḇa rosai spanjuḇer kuker ya.
44019033	Ma kawasa Yahudi spampum snon oso snori Aleksander ḇe ḇarpon. Snar isma wos kwar ro kawasa ḇeḇor ansi ro rosai ḇeḇesya kwar. Dow ḇrasi fasau ma ḇyoi ḇrasi fa kawasa ansi simnai insa ḇyuk wos ḇeḇekuker si ro ḇarpon kawasa ansi.
44019034	Ḇape rofyor sifawi i snon Yahudi mura, ssibras kam rao indokada oras risuru: "Artemis karwar kawasa Efesus iba!"
44019035	Ḇape snon ḇefas-fas ro mnu ani ḇyuk wos faro kawasa ḇeḇor ma ikofen: "Ne, kawasa Efesus! Mansei ro sup ma swan ine ḇefawiḇa, mko kawasa Efesus, mkoi ḇefaduru iḇye rum karwar Artemis, ḇeba syadi, ma amfyanir ḇyedi ḇesabu ro nanki?
44019036	Roi ḇeḇesya ine nari ḇyeḇesampum ḇa, inja mkoknon ma mkosau-sau awer.
44019037	Snar mkun kwar snonkaku sine maro dine ḇoi sfasar rum karwar koḇedi ḇa ma sonef snonsnon ḇyedi ḇa.
44019038	Inja rofyor Demetrius kuker kamasan-kamasan ḇyesi roi oso ifnai fa soḇo siksof snonkaku oso ido kankain karkara ma gubernur isya, inja ipyum syadi ḇemasasor ansi ssun safsof sena faro dia.
44019039	Ma rofyor mkomarisen roi ono ḇeso ipyum syadi mkawos na ro kankain karkara.
44019040	Snar koisya ro kandera nari sḇuksof ko, soḇo kofrur mbrus ro ras ine, snar knam oso isya ḇa fa koḇuki ḇyesano wark raryur ḇefrur aru biru ine." Rarirya kuker wos nane iwan raryur ani fa sibur ḇesisye.
44020001	Aru biru ani imnai kwar, Paulus dor kawasa Kristen ma danun si. Ma ḇyearoo si kwar, imbran ḇe Makedonia.
44020002	Imbran yar sup ya mnuk ani ma kuker ananun nabor ḇyuk sambraḇ faro naek srar ro dia.
44020003	Kyain paik rikior kwar ro dia imarisen dayunḇe Siria. Ḇape ro fafisu ani kawasa Yahudi sna awi fa siḇe smuni. Rarirya kyara wer fa kyaḇer ma dunuk sup Makedonia.
44020004	Ḇesoi sya isoine Sopater Pirus mandaḇendi, ro Berea, ma Aristarkhus ma Sekondus, ro Tesalonika, ma Gayus ro Derbe, ma Timotius ma snon risuru wer ro Asia, isoine Tikhikus ma Trofimus.
44020005	Sayun ḇepon ma siwaf inko ro Troas.
44020006	Mboi rofyor munara Mamami Napisenḇa isyof kwar inkayun ro Filipi ma ras rifiak inko fyafer ro Troas ma inko srow si. Ro dia inko kain ras rifiak.
44020007	Ras ḇepon ro ari swaf ani, rofyor inko ryur fa inkan mamami, Paulus dawawos kuker naek srar ro dia, snar kyara fa meserdi iḇe pyaw. Dawawos rawo isof romfawru.
44020008	Ro sim ḇoryas moḇ inko fananjur roya, spam padamara nabor.
44020009	Snonkbor oso snori Eutikhus kyain ro koḇkir ya. Snar Paulus dawawos fyoro, isof snonkbor ani ipok anenef ya ḇa. Rarirya denef moser ma isapi ro sim ḇoryas syos ḇeḇekior ḇesop. Ro fyor sikanow i, imar kwar.
44020010	Inja Paulus isabu rarḇaḇ. Doḇerepen snonkbor ani, ḇo dawrepeni, ma ikofen: "Mko mbrus awer, snar isya ikenem."
44020011	Sek wer raryas ro sim ḇoryas ani, Paulus payanasnis mamami ma sanan; sanan posa Paulus dawawos fyoro kaku wer isof dorek na nek. Posa kwar pyaw.
44020012	Rofyor ani ssun snonkbor ani ḇe rum ḇyedi, ma sisnesna naprei kam.
44020013	Inkek ḇepon ḇe kapal ma inkayun ḇe Asos, kuker karkara insa inkun Paulus ro Asos imnis danun kwar faro inko, snar ikada doḇo imbran ra ḇande.
44020014	Fafisu isrow inko ro Asos, inko yakeri ḇe kapal, raimnai inkayun pdef ḇe Metilene.
44020015	Ro dia inkayun pdef ma meserdi inko mamnis kuker myos Khios. Ro meserdi wer inkayun ḇe Samos ma ras oser dawas inko sun ro Miletus.
44020016	Paulus kyara kwar fa ryande ro Efesus ḇa, insa fafisu ḇyena nabro awer ro Asia. I saw-saw snar, insa isya ro Yerusalem kwar, ro ras Munara ḇeba Pentakosta.
44020017	Snar rarirya, inja iwan snon oser ro Miletus ḇe Efesus kuker anun insa penatua-penatua jemaat srama ḇe Miletus.
44020018	Rofyor srama kwar, Paulus ikofen faro si: "Mkofawi, kankenem ayedi ro fandu mko, ro ras randak yafyafer ro Asia ine:
44020019	Kuker sne ḇekakiḇa yuffarmyan Manseren. Ro afuffarmyan ani mkaru ayena nabor namis ma nabor yasma farawrowes ro kawasa Yahudi ḇeḇe ḇemun aya.
44020020	Rariryano yapok yamam mondaḇa ḇoi yafrur rosai ḇepyum faro mko. Nakam yaḇaryas ma yaḇuk farkor mko, iḇye ro fababa ma ro fananjur-fananjur ro rum mkoḇena;
44020021	ma yaḇe saksi ḇesyakwar faro kawasa Yahudi ma Yunani, insa simbror faro Allah ma sikyar faro Manseren koḇedi, Yesus Kristus.
44020022	Ḇape knikine raris women faro Rur ya yara ḇe Yerusalem ma yafawiḇa rosai nari ḇekur aya ro diwa
44020023	derer rosai Rur Ḇesren ya ḇyair kwar ro mnu ḇe mnu faro aya, mboi bui ma kandera naiso ḇewaf aya.
44020024	Ḇape yafandun nyawa yediḇa beri, mboi yasowar fa yasma knam ḇepupes fa yafrur posa afuffarmyan Manseren Yesus ḇyeasas faro aya insa yaḇe saksi Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro saswar ma fakamaman Allah.
44020025	Ma insape yafawi, mko kam yarama yasrow ma yaḇuk farkarkor ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah, nari mko mam mkasi wer ḇa.
44020026	Inja ras ine yakofen ḇayir ḇe mko aya ine yasren, yaḇe sasarḇa faro mansei ryawer nari ḇero ya.
44020027	Snar yamyaren kaku yaḇaryas Allah marisen ḇyena kam faro mko.
44020028	Inja mkowaren mankun mko ma mkowaren nai ḇesiper ani kam, snar mko iso Rur Ḇesren ya fyasnai kwar fa ḇemamepen ma ḇefakwak Allah jemaat ḇyedi, ismai si kwar kuker rik ro mankundi Romawa Ḇyedi.
44020029	Yafawi, rofyor yara, nafsup ḇermomen nari ssun fandu mko ma nari siswar nai ansine ḇa.
44020030	Mboi ro fandu mankun mko nari snonkaku ono sikḇawes, kuker farkarkor ninyan ma sesewar insa sismer kawasa Kristen bur nyan ḇenapes fa siso si.
44020031	Inja mkowaren ma mko swarepen, aya ine wampasi wambarek rikior, roḇ meser, yamnaiḇa ro yaḇuk farkarkor ḇe mko oser-oser kuker mkarui.
44020032	Ma knikine yarir mko faro Manseren ma ro wos saswar ma fakamaman Ḇyena, ḇepok ḇeḇawes mko ma ḇeḇuk faro mko rarwas mankundi ḇyuk kwar faro snonkaku kam fyasren kwar sya.
44020033	Sarak roḇa brawen roḇa sansun yapok yarmomen na ro manseiḇa kako.
44020034	Ma mankun mkofawi, kuker ḇramin ayesu yafararur kwar fa yasma mnis rosai yaḇe fandun ma min ḇeso aya sya fandun sena kako."
44020035	Ro roi ḇeḇor nakam yafasnai faro mko kwar, mboi rofyor ko fararur rarirya insa ko fnoḇek snonkaku ḇepokḇa ma ko swarepen Manseren Yesus wos ḇyedi, doḇo: "Ipyum syadi ro koḇuk ya ro kosma ya."
44020036	Rofyor ikofen wos nane kwar Paulus kyain wepur ma ḇyenadi kuker sikam.
44020037	Sikam skanes rao sekyu-kyu ma sfor Paulus, ḇo snas ma sisyumi ḇesya kwar.
44020038	Sikam siswar fafaya iba, isyadadi kaku snar ikofen, nari smam mkasi wer ḇa. Raimnai siyakeri ḇe kapal.
44021001	Fafisu ḇaḇesisye ḇeposer sne ani posa, nkopaw ma nkayun beri ḇe Kos. Meserdi nkayun snefer ro Rodos ma rodia nkora ḇe Patara.
44021002	Ro Patara nkosma kapal, ḇeyayun uk ḇe Fenesia. Nkek wer ro kapal aniḇo nkopaw.
44021003	Fyoroḇa nkomam Siprus ro ḇar rasar, ḇape nkopdefi ma nkayun ḇe Siria. Ḇarpur ya nkofyafer ro Tirus, snar papus ḇero kapal ya siḇe siḇyawen na ro mnu ine.
44021004	Ro dia nkorakaki kawasa Kristen ma nkokain ro dia beras ri fik. Rur Ḇesren ikofen faro kawasa Kristen ansi inja ssḇuk wos faro Paulus, insa ryaḇe Yerusalem awer.
44021005	Ḇape fafisuya isyof kwar, inja nkombran pdef mararan nkoḇedi. Kawasa Kristen kuker bin romawa sesi siyaker nko isof ro mnuya ḇandiri; ma ro swan andir nkokain wepurḇo nkonadi.
44021006	Rofyor nkoḇe aroo sikwar, nkek kapal, ma sibur ḇe rum sena.
44021007	Ro Tirus nkayun ma nkofyafer ro Ptolemais ma rodia ayayun inkoḇedi isyonde. Inkokofen aroo faro naek srar ansi, ma nkokain rodia ḇe ras oser kuker si.
44021008	Ro meserdi nkombran ro dia ma nkorama ro Kaisarea. Inkosun ro Filipus, manbaryas ankankinem ḇeḇye ani rum ḇyedi, isoine oso ro fandu snon rifik skinfir kwar ro Yerusalem, ma inkokain ro rum ḇyedi.
44021009	Filipus isma inai inkbor rifiak besma fakamaman ḇaryar.
44021010	Inkokain ras ono kwar ro dia, nabi oso snori Agabus ryaker Yudea.
44021011	Ryama faro inko, raimnai dun Paulus ḇeḇoḇek ḇyedi. Ma byukfes mankundi wessu ma ḇrassu, ḇo ikofen: "Rur Ḇesrenya ḇyardi kwar radine: Snonkaku ḇena ḇeḇoḇek ine nari Yahudisya sfesi radine ro Yerusalem ma sḇoḇ i faro er ḇeso."
44021012	Inko mnaf rarirya, inja inkofnoḇek kawasa Kristen ḇero dia syaḇo inkor, insa Paulus ryaḇe Yerusalem awer.
44021013	Ḇape Paulus kyarem faro inko, ḇo doḇo: "Snaro mkokanes, ma kuker nyan ḇeradine mkoḇo mkofrur sneri ḇyeḇirḇar? Snar yafasos kwar fa sfes aya monda ḇa, mboi isof yamar kako ro Yerusalem kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus."
44021014	Snar ḇyerer wos anun nkoḇena, inja inkomnai ḇo inkokofen: "Manseren marisen ḇyedi ndarirya monda!"
44021015	Inkokain ras ono nawas ro Kaisarea kwar, inko fasasos, ma inkomḇran ḇe Yerusalem.
44021016	Kawasa Kristen Kaisarea ono sakso inko. Naek ansi ssun nkoḇe snon oso ḇenirḇe Manason rum ḇyedi. Ikada snon Siprus ḇeḇe Kristen ḇepon kwar. Nari nkoḇeryar ro rum ḇyedi.
44021017	Fafisu nkora nkosuḇer ro Yerusalem naek ḇero dia sya sisrow nko kuker sne ḇemarisen.
44021018	Ro meserdi nko fnoḇek Paulus ḇo nkora nkosrow Yakobus; penatua-penatua sya kam siryur kwar rodia.
44021019	Paulus byearoo faro si, posa fyar-fyar asuser moḇsai Allah ifararur ro fandu er-er ḇeso ro afuffarmyan ḇyedi.
44021020	Simnaf rarirya sikam sisandik Allah. Raimnai sikofen faro Paulus, ḇo soḇo: "Naek mamkada, Yahudi syaran-syaran sikyar kwar ma simyaren sisouser sasoser Refo Yahudi.
44021021	Ḇape sikam simnaf aukada, farkor kawasa Yahudi ḇekain fandu er ḇeso sya insa sisawen sasoser Moses ḇyena, snar woḇo, insa sifrur ma sikenem awer ro rari sofakfuk koḇena faro romawa sesi.
44021022	Inja knikine rariso? Snar nari simnaf rwama kwar ine.
44021023	Iḇye, wafrur rosai inkokofen nane: Ro fandu nko naek rifiak sisya seasas.
44021024	Wunsi fa sifnoḇek au, wafrur fasasren mankundaw fnoḇek si ma bakwarek si, isof sikapnik siḇrusna; rarirya nari snonkaku syakam sifawi, wawos simnaf ro au nkakuḇa, snar smam ausya ḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudi.
44021025	Mboi faro er-er ḇeso, ḇekyar kwar sya, nkofas kwar faro si mnuk nkawos namuk kwar, isoine sḇefor roḇeyan sḇukfarser faro karwar sya, ma rik, ma aiwan bemaruk sya, ma farbuk."
44021026	Ro meserdi Paulus dun snonkaku ansi fnoḇek i, ma fyasren mankundi fnoḇek si, raimnai ssun ro Rum Allah fa sikofen ḇayir fafisu rosai nari fasasren ya nari imnai ma farsarser ssun fa sḇukfarser warek mankunsi oser-oser.
44021027	Fafisu ras rifik anna fanam nasyonde, kawasa Yahudi ḇeraker Asia, smam smai Paulus ro Rum Allah, inja searu biru kawasa sya fa sfori,
44021028	ma ssibras ḇo soḇo: "Ne, kawasa Israel, mkofnoḇek! Ine snonkaku ḇefarkor kawasa ro moḇ nakam insa sisampum er koḇedi ma sasoser Refo Yahudi ma moḇ ine! Ma knikine dun snon Yunani ono fa ssun ro Rum Allah fa sifrur mamas moḇ ḇesren ine!"
44021029	Snar ro ras oso smam smai kwar Trofimus ro Efesus imbranus Paulus ro mnu ya, inja siwarki ḇo soḇo Paulus duni randum ro Rum Allah.
44021030	Rarirya mnu ḇesiper simbrus, ma kawasa sya spanjuḇer, ma sfor Paulus ma sismer i ḇebandi bur Rum Allah ma ro fafisu ani beri kedwai ro Rum Allah nbe ḇesisen.
44021031	Rofyor saw fa siḇe smuni, ḇyesno faro mananir sarar, fa ifawi Yerusalem ḇesiper simbrus.
44021032	Mananir sarar ani dun fasaw sordade-sordade ma ḇukor sesi fa sra sisrow kawasa ḇeḇor ansi. Fasisu smam mananir sarar ani ma sordade-sordade ansi, inja simnai ro siprer Paulus.
44021033	Mananir sarar ani fyanam Paulus fyori ma iwan fa sfesi kuker wanka, ma ifuken manseiso ine ma rosaiso ifrur ya.
44021034	Ḇape kawasa ansi ono ssibras radine ono ssibras radia. Snar mbrus ani mananir ani ifawi mnisḇa rosai ḇeḇesya ani. Inja iwan fa ssun Paulus ḇe ayar mamun.
44021035	Fafisu sra ro kakarya sordade ansi sforaḇen Paulus snar kawasa ḇeḇor ansi skamapepen,
44021036	semarani ḇo sisoi, ma ssibras ḇo soḇo: "Idawer mura!"
44021037	Ro fafisu Paulus ssuni fa syun ḇe ayar mamun, ikofen faro mananir sarar ani: "Wamarisenke yakofen roi ono faro au?" Kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Wafawi wos Yunani?
44021038	Yakara au snon Masir ḇefrur mbrus ro ras suine, kuker snon ḇarḇor ḇeyuf romamun raimnai ḇefrar ḇebur ḇe sup ḇeḇeursḇa kuker snon ḇarḇor syaran rifiak?"
44021039	Paulus kyarem doḇo: "Aya ine snon Yahudi, ro Tarsus, romawa ḇena mnu ḇeḇesnonsnon ro sup Kilikia; yor insa wamarisen ido, yawawos faro kawasa ḇeḇor sine."
44021040	Fafisu mananir sarar ani kyarem faro Paulus kwar, rya dores ro kakar bunem ya ma pyankai epensi fa sefasis; rofyor siknon kwar, irandak dawawos faro si kuker wos Ibrani doḇo:
44022001	"Ne, naek ma sinan anmkoya mkomnaf naḇye rosai yamarisen yakofen faro mko fa yaḇesano wark mankundaya."
44022002	Ro fafisu kawasa ḇeḇor ansi simnaf dawos ro wos Ibrani, sefasis syadi wer. Ikofen ḇo doḇo:
44022003	"Aya ine snon Yahudi, saḇen aya ro Tarsus ro sup Kilikia, ḇape yaba ro mnu ine; befarkor aya isoine Gamaliel ḇyeaunos pyum kaku ḇe aya ro sasoser kpu koḇesi, isof aya ine yamyaren kaku yafararur faro Allah imnis raris mkokam ro fafisu ine.
44022004	Aya ine yaḇewayam naek ḇeso Manseren Nyan ḇyedi sya isof ono simar; snon ma bin yafor si ma yasun si ro bui.
44022005	Roi nane iḇye Imam Ḇeba ma Kankain Karkara Ḇebarara-Ḇebarara sya mankunsi smame. Si ḇeḇuk syap ḇeaya fa yun faro naik syaro Damsyik ma yara kwar ro diwa yafor ḇeso Manseren Nyan ḇyedi ḇero diwa sya, insa yun si ḇe Yerusalem fa sismai.
44022006	Ḇape ro maran ayedi ḇe diwara, ma fafisu yafanam Damsyik, ro arkok pandaf, kniko ḇama isnai ḇesokarares ryaker nanki iyar aya.
44022007	Ro fafisuya yasapira yaḇarek ma yamnaf mkaren oso ḇeyakawos aya: Saulus, Saulus, snaro wafrur kandera aya?
44022008	Yakarem ḇo yoḇo: Manseiso au, Manseren? Kyarem ḇo doḇo: Aya ine Yesus snon Nazaret, wafrur kandera ya.
44022009	Ma kawasa ḇeso ayasya, sakmam isnai ani, ḇape mkaren Yesus ḇekofen faro ayanya kada sakmnaf iba.
44022010	Yakofen wer: Manseren rosaiso nari yafrur ya? Manseren ikofen faro aya: Wakḇawes ma rwaḇe Damsyik. Rodiwa nari sikofen ḇadir faro au roi ḇeḇor kam wafrur na.
44022011	Snar mkasi ifafar, inja min ḇeso ro mararan yedi sikfin aya ḇe Damsyik.
44022012	Rodia snon oso snonsnon ḇyedi Ananias, snon ḇekyar ma ḇeso mnis sasoser Refo Yahudi ma kawasa Yahudi ḇero dia sya sifawi kami.
44022013	Ryama dores fanam aya ma ikofen: Saulus, naek ayedi, mam wer! Ma ro fafisu ani beri yamam wer ma yaknoweri.
44022014	Raimnai ikofen ḇo doḇo: Kpu koḇansi Allah sedi ḇyeasas au kwar fa wafawi marisen ḇyedi, insa mam napnapes ya ma wamnaf mkaren ḇesasyar ro sḇayo ḇyena.
44022015	Snar au nari wakofen rosai mam ro i faro kawasa sya kam rosai mam ma wamnaf na.
44022016	Ma knikine rosai beḇirḇar kaker? Wayor au, fa wor ro Manseren ma wasma masi sren ḇefasren au ro sasar ḇena!
44022017	Fafisu yakaḇerma ro Yerusalem kwar ma ro fafisu yaḇenadi ro Rum Allah, papoik Allah, nyakasiper rur ayedi.
44022018	Yamam Manseren, ḇekofen faro aya: Wasasyar fasaw bur Yerusalem, snar nari ḇaḇemamam ḇena ro aya sefandun naba.
44022019	Yakarem: Manseren, si fawi ayaiso, ḇera ḇesun ḇesaye ro rum nadi sena ma ḇefor snonkaku ḇekyar au sya ḇo ḇesun si ro bui, ma ḇeprer si.
44022020	Ma ro fafisu Stefanus saksi ḇedi rik ḇyena nasbawer aya isya ro moḇ ani ma yamarisen kuker frur ani ma ayaiso ḇemamwarek kawasa ḇemun i sya sansun sena.
44022021	Ḇape Manseren ikofen faro aya: Rwa, snar nari Yawan au binkwan kaku rodine faro er-er ḇeso."
44022022	Kawasa ansi simnaf Paulus isof ro wos ine; ro fafisu ani sikam ssibras, soḇo: "Mkoyaw snonkaku ine bur supswan ine bori! Ipok fa ikenem ḇaḇeri!"
44022023	Rarirya ssibras ḇesya kwar ma sso syatu ma fafen ḇebo.
44022024	Inja mananir sarar ani ḇyuk sasoser fa ssun Paulus ḇe ayar mamun ma iwan fa skukeḇi ma sipreri, insa sifawi rosai ḇeḇeknam, isof kawasa ansi ssibras mankenem faroi rarirya.
44022025	Fafisu Paulus siyaḇeki ma siḇe sipreri, ikofen faro mananir sordade ḇewaren i: "Mkoḇrike mkoprer snon ḇena sup Roma rofyor ḇyeḇekukeḇ ḇaim?"
44022026	Rofyor mananir sordade ani imnaf rarirya rya ikofen ḇayir faro mananir sarar ani, ḇo doḇo: "Rosai waḇe wafrur ya? Snon ani snon ḇena sup Roma rirya."
44022027	Inja mananir sarar rya faro Paulus ma ikofen: "Wakofen kakuke, au snon ḇena sup Roma?" Paulus kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Kaku."
44022028	Inja mananir sarar ani ikofen: "Ḇaḇe snonsnon ḇena sup Roma ani yakoḇes i kuker maeja ḇekakur." Paulus kyarem, ḇo doḇo: "Aya kada saḇen aya ḇeromawa ro sup Roma."
44022029	Inja siwan fa ḇeḇeḇepreri sya sisusu fasaw; ma mananir sarar ani kako imkak, rofyor ifawi kwar, mboi Paulus, doḇo iwan fa sfes ani snon Roma rirya.
44022030	Rariryano mananir sarar ani imarisen fa ifawi kuker aunos rosai kawasa Yahudi sḇuksof Paulus. Inja meserdi iwan fa sper wanka sya buri ma ḇyuk sasoser insa mananir imam-imam ma Kankain Karkara Agama siryur kam. Raimnai dun Paulus ro ayar mamun ani ḇeḇarpon sedi.
44023001	Paulus iknower ḇebarara Kankain Karkara Agama ansi, posa ikofen: "Ne, naek srar ayesi, isof ro ras ine yakenem kuker sneuser ḇesren ro ḇarpon Allah.
44023002	Ḇape Imam Ḇeba Ananias iwan fa snonkaku ḇeyores fanam Paulus ḇyaser Paulus sḇari.
44023003	Paulus ikofen faro i: "Allah nari ḇyaser au, ne, arsen kamara ḇepyoper! Kwain ro dine fa kwukeḇ aya raris sasoser Refo Yahudi, ḇesyaḇo ḇeyuk sasoser Refo Yahudi kwar ḇo swoser fa sḇaser aya."
44023004	Inja snonkaku ro dia sikofen: "Kworyae Allah Imam Ḇeba ḇyedi?"
44023005	Paulus kyarem: "Ne, naek srar ayesi, yafawiḇa i kada Imam Ḇeba. Kaku fas-fas isya: Wonef awer oso ro ḇebarara manfarkin er mkoḇesi!"
44023006	Ma snar ifawi, ro fandu si ono ssun ro rarwas Saduki ma ono ssun ro rarwas Farisi, inja dor naba ro Kankain Karkara Agama ani, ḇo doḇo: Ne, naek srar ayesi, aya ine snon Farisi, ḇeḇeḇarpur ro snon Farisi; mkun aya ḇe ḇarpon Kankain Karkara ine, snar yakyar nari aḇiḇer ro snonkaku ḇemar sya."
44023007	Rofyor dawos rarirya, serwas ḇesuru ro fandu kawasa Farisi ma Saduki ma snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sirarwas si.
44023008	Snar Saduki soḇo, aḇiḇer ḇa ma malaikat ḇa roḇaido rur ḇa, mboi Farisi sya kada skarem nakam.
44023009	Rarirya sembrus ḇeba. Snon ḇefawinananem Refo Yahudi ro rarwas Farisi ono siyor si ḇebarpon ma sfamfaḇri, soḇo: "Nkosma sasar osoḇa ro snonkaku ine! Imbude rur roḇa malaikat oso ḇeyawawos faroi kwar."
44023010	Isof sifrur rakrok ḇeba, inja mananir sarar imkak, imbude spawakuk Paulus. Rarirya ḇyuk sasoser faro sarar ansi insa sado fa ssun Paulus ro fandu si ḇe ayar mamun.
44023011	Ro roḇ riwer Manseren ryama dores fanami ma ikofen faro i: "Swambraḇser snembri, snar raris waḇri kuker aya ro Yerusalem, rarirya kako nari rwa besaksi ro Roma."
44023012	Ro fafisu isnai kwar, snon Yahudi ono saw ma ssowar ḇo sifras mankundi soḇo, nkomun Paulus ḇayim nkopok nkonan ba ma nkinem ba.
44023013	Kawasa ḇeaw kwar fa ḇeḇe ḇemun Paulus ansi ḇarbor sedi isyadi ro snon samfur rifiak.
44023014	Sra faro mananir-mananir imam-imam ma ḇebarara er Yahudi ma sikofen: "Nkosowar kwar, ma nkofras mankun nko, rofyor nkomun Paulus ḇayim, nkopok nkanan ba ma nkinem ba.
44023015	Inja mkofnoḇek Kankain Karkara Agama ma mkor faro mananir sarar ani, ḇyuk Paulus faro mko wer farari mkoḇe mkokukeḇi, kuker aunos, ma rofyor ani nko kada nkofasos fa nkomun Paulus ro fyor ssuni faro mko ḇaim."
44023016	Ḇape Paulus fnori (sradi romawa ḇyedi), imnaf smai sansin ani. Inja ryaḇe ayar mamun ma fyor simarisen kwar fa syun, ikofen ḇadir faro Paulus.
44023017	Rarirya Paulus dor mananir sordade oso ma ikofen faroi: "Wun romawa ine faro mananir sarar, snar ḇyefandun ikofen ḇadir roi oso faro mananir sarar ani."
44023018	Mananir sordade ani duni faro mananir sarar ani ma ikofen: "Paulus snon ḇesmai ani dor ro aya ma ikofen insa yun snonkbor ine faro au, snar ḇyefandun ikofen roi oso faro au."
44023019	Rarirya mananir sarar ani ikfin romawa snonkbor ani ḇeḇandi fa suyerer ma ifuken: "Rosaiso woḇo wakofen ḇadir faro aya?"
44023020	Kyarem: "Snon Yahudi ono sna awi kwar fa sor ro au, insa meser buk Paulus wer ḇe ḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama, Kankain Karkara ine imnis raris siḇe ssewar sananai fa sifawi kaku kuker aunos roi.
44023021	Ḇape rwower awer si, snar isyadi ro snon samfur rifiak sfasos kwar fa sisin Paulus. Sowar kwar ma sifras mankunsi soḇo, smun Paulus ḇayim sipok sanan ma sinem ba; sisya sfasos kwar ḇoi si waf monda wos ḇepupes ro au."
44023022	Rarirya mananir sarar ani iwan romawa snonkbor ani fa ibur ma danun faro i: "Wakofen awer faro manseirya kaker, mboi auso ḇerama kwar fa ḇekofen ḇadir faro aya."
44023023	Ḇarpur ya mananir sarar ani dor mananir sordade-sordade risuru ma ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Mufasos sordade utin risuru fa sraḇe Kaisarea fnoḇek snon ḇeyek kuda samfur rifik ma snon ḇeyuf bom, utin risuru indokada ro oras siw ro roḇ ine.
44023024	Mufasos kako keledai snonkaku sakek ro ono faro Paulus ma mkun payamyumi faro gubernur Feliks."
44023025	Ma fyas syap oso, moḇ ryok raiso ine:
44023026	"Aroo ro Klaudius Lisias faro gubernur Feliks ḇepyum.
44023027	Snon ine Yahudi sya sfori ma fafisu siḇe smuni, yara kuker sarar ayesi nkodwarek ma nkofaspari, snar yamnaf snon anine ikada snon Roma rirya.
44023028	Insa yafawi roi ḇefnai fa sḇuksofi, inja yuni ḇeḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama sedi.
44023029	Isnai faro aya fa yafawi roi sḇuksofi kuker ya, isoine mnuk ḇekur sasoser Refo Yahudi sedi, ḇape yasmaiḇa roi sḇuksofi fa ismai samamyai marmar roḇa samamyai bui.
44023030	Snar sikofen ḇadir fa yafawi kwar, ono sna awi kwar fa siḇe smuni. Inja fasaw kaku yawan fa suni faro au, ma yakofen ḇadir faro ḇeḇuksof isya kwar, insa ssun wawos sena faro au."
44023031	Raimnai sordade ansi ssun Paulus imnis raris sasoser sisma ya, ma simbran ro roḇ ḇe Antipatris.
44023032	Ro meserdi srir snon ḇeyek kuda ansi kuker Paulus fa simbran pdef, ḇoi sikada skaḇer ḇe ayar mamun.
44023033	Sra kwar ro Kaisarea ssḇuk syap ani ma Paulus kako faro gubernur.
44023034	Ma rofyor syap ani ḇyeḇewasya kwar, gubernur ani ifuken Paulus beknam ro propinsi rosai. Ma rofyor imnaf, Paulus ryaker Kilikia,
44023035	inja ikofen: "Nari yakara wawos ḇena rofyor ḇeḇuksof au sya srama kwar ro dine." Raimnai iwan fa siwaren Paulus ro Herodes rum ḇyedi.
44024001	Ḇarpur ro ras ririm Imam Ḇeba Ananias fnoḇek ḇebarara ono ma mansḇaḇye oso snori Tertulus. Sra faro gubernur ma sfarfyar roi sḇuksof Paulus.
44024002	Paulus ḇyeḇeyor ḇeḇarpon ma Tertulus ryak kuker ḇaḇesof ḇyena, doḇo: "Feliks ḇepyum, snar kakara ḇepyum ḇena nko kada nkosma ḇaḇeaski ḇesya kwar, snar fawawi ḇena roi ono nabor kaku neḇefadwer ma neḇefrur kwar faro er nkoḇedine.
44024003	Roi ḇeḇor anna naisya kwar ma ro moḇo-moḇo nkoryaḇ ma nkokofen kasumasa.
44024004	Ḇape insama kofnak awer fafisu ḇena, inja yor insa wamnaf fasau nko kuker ḇaḇenaḇye ro au.
44024005	Nkofawi au wafawi kwar, snon ine imnis kaku dafduf kapyow, snonkaku ḇefrur aru biru fandu kawasa Yahudi ro supswan ḇesiper ḇekenem, pyum ma i snonkaku ḇeḇeḇukor ro farkarkor ninyan kawasa Nasarani.
44024006	Rarirya syewar fa ḇyeuk saranden Rum Allah. Eḇedari nkofor i ma nkomarisen nko kakara kuker i farari sasoser Refo Yahudi nkoḇedi.
44024007	Ḇape mananir sarar Lisias ryama idwareki ma pyoseri kuker ḇri ro nkoḇras na,
44024008	raimnai iwan fa ḇeḇuksofi sya srama faro au. Rofyor mankundaw kwukeḇ i, nari wafawi roi ḇeḇor inkoḇuki isofi na."
44024009	Ma kawasa Yahudi ansi kako sakkofen fanuk safsof anna ḇo soḇo, wawos anna kam nkaku rarirya.
44024010	Raimnai gubernur ani ḇyuk faro Paulus fa dakawos. Inja Paulus dawos ḇo doḇo: "Yafawi wampasi wambarek nabor kwar bemankara faro er ine. Rarirya kuker ḇirbarḇa yawos fa yaper roi ḇekur aya ine ro ḇarpon bedi:
44024011	Mankundaw nari wafawi, snar isyadi ḇa ro ras samfur seser risuru ḇesyof kwar yarama ro Yerusalem fa yakḇenadi.
44024012	Ma ras oso ḇa fa snonkaku oso myam smai yafamfaḇri kuker snonkaku oso, roḇa yafrur mbrus, iḇye ro Rum Allah roḇa wer ro rum nadi, roḇa wer ro moḇ ḇeso ro mnu.
44024013	Ma sipok sfasnai royo fa ḇyeknam faro au ḇa, ro rosaiso sḇuksof aya.
44024014	Ḇape yakarem faro au, insa wafawi yaḇenadi faro kpu nkoḇesi Allah sedi, kuker yaso user Nyan Manseren, isoine Nyan sorḇe farkor ninyan. Yakyar faro roi ḇeḇor sfas ro sasoser Refo Yahudi ma syap nabi-nabi.
44024015	Yana kakyar faro Allah raris si kako, mboi nari aḇiḇer ya isya faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇemar sya, iḇye snonkaku ḇenapes sya ma ḇenapes ḇa sya.
44024016	Inja yasewar ḇesya kwar insa yakenem kuker sneuser ḇesren ro ḇarpon Allah ma snonkaku.
44024017	Ma ro ḇarpur ro wampasi wambarek ono, yakaḇer ma wer ro Yerusalem ma yun farem faro er yesi ma yaḇuk farsarser.
44024018	Rofyor yafrur roi anna nekam, snon Yahudi ono ḇeraker Asia sisma aya ro Rum Allah, posa ro fafisu yafrur fasasren mankundaya, ma ro fafisu ani snonkaku ḇeḇor ono ḇa ma mbrusḇa kako.
44024019	Siso ḇerama faro au kada ma si ḇeḇuk safsof sena rofyor sisma roino ro aya.
44024020	Rariryano iḇye snonkaku ḇerama sine knikine sikofen ḇarḇor rosai sisma ro aya, ro fafisu ssun aya ḇeḇarpon Kankain Karkara Agama.
44024021	Roḇaido imbude wos yaḇaryas ro fandu si rofyor yores ro ḇarpon sedi, isoine: Snar aḇiḇer fandu ḇemar sya eḇedari ssun aya ḇeḇarpon bedi ro ras ine."
44024022	Ḇape Feliks ḇefawi mnis kaku Manseren Nyan Ḇyedi, damsu wawos sedi, ḇo doḇo: "Nari mananir sarar Lisias isya kwar ro dine insape yakaruk wawos mkoḇanine."
44024023	Raimnai iwan mananir sordade ani iwaren Paulus, ma sipok sidwarek awer bati ḇyesi ḇeyuf farmyan i.
44024024	Ma ras ono nawas Feliks ma swari Drusila, bin Yahudi; iwan fa sor Paulus, ma surower farkarkor roi ro kakyar faro Yesus Kristus.
44024025	Ḇape rofyor Paulus dawos ro napnapes ya, apepen mankun ma ḇaḇemankara nari ḇerama, Feliks imkak ḇo doḇo: "Imnis kwar ḇo rwamura resari; fafisu ḇepyum isya nari yawan fa sor au."
44024026	Rofyor ya Feliks ikyar, nari Paulus ḇyuk pipi ono faroi. Inja ro ras ono dori fa dawawos kukeri.
44024027	Ḇape wampasi wambarek risuru kwar Feliks ḇyeḇesadwer kuker Perkius Festus, ma insa kawasa Yahudi simariseni, myam monda Paulus ḇo ismai ro bui.
44025001	Festus ryama byeras rikior ro propinsi ine kwar, raimnai imbran ro Kaisarea ḇe Yerusalem.
44025002	Ro dia mananir-mananir imam ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara Yahudi srama faroi fa sikofen ḇadir Paulus ro roi sḇuksofi na.
44025003	Ssewar nyan ḇefrur fromo Paulus inja sor ro Festus isoine, iwan Paulus fa ryaḇe Yerusalem. Snar sna awi kwar insa smun Paulus ro nyan ya faduri.
44025004	Ḇape Festus kyarem faro si, Paulus kada ismai ro Kaisarea snar mankundi kyara kwar fa kyaḇer fasau ḇe Kaisarea.
44025005	Doḇo: "Inja iḇye snonkaku ḇeḇeḇukor fandu mko siso kam aya ḇediwara insa ssḇuk safsof ḇekur Paulus rofyor sasar oso kyuri."
44025006	Festus kyain syadi ro Yerusalem ḇa ḇoi ḇyeras ri war roḇa samfur. Posa kwar ibur kaḇer ḇe Kaisarea. Ro meserdi iryur kankain karkara, ma iwan fa ssun Paulus ḇeḇarpon kankain ani.
44025007	Rofyor Paulus ryama kwar ro dia, kawasa Yahudi ḇeraker Yerusalem sores yari ma ssḇuk safsof ḇemarḇak nabor kaku ḇekur i ḇoi sfasnai knam sasar oso ḇa.
44025008	Paulus ḇyesano wark mankundi, doḇo: "Aya ine yasasar ḇa beri iḇye faro sasoser Refo Yahudi iḇye faro Rum Allah roḇaido faro Kaisar."
44025009	Ḇape Festus imarisen ifrur sneprei kawasa Yahudi inja kyarem faro Paulus doḇo: "Fasoske fa rwabe Yerusalem, insa beḇekara ro diwa ro ḇarpon ayedi ro wawos ine?"
44025010	Ḇape Paulus ikofen: "Aya ine knikine yores ro dine ro ḇarpon mankukeḇ Kaisar ma ro dine derer yasmai kakukeḇ. Raris mankundaw wafawi kaku, yafrur sasar kermkun oso ḇa beri faro kawasa Yahudi.
44025011	Inja, rofyor yaḇe sasar kaku ma yafrur ḇarḇor oso ḇemnis samamyai marmar, yamarisen fa yamar, ḇape, rofyor roi sḇuksof aya nkaku ḇa, snonkaku osoḇa beri ḇepok fa ḇeḇuk aya imnis samsom oso faro si. Inja yek mankara faro Kaisar!"
44025012	Rarirya kina karkara, sawos yae faro si kwar, Festus kyarem faro Paulus: "Wek mankara kwar faro Kaisar, inja nari rwaḇe ḇarpon Kaisar."
44025013	Ras ri ḇeso nawas wairek Agripa kuker Bernike suraḇe Kaisarea fa sufrur farsrow ḇaḇesyowi kuker Festus.
44025014	Snar sukain ras ono ro dia, Festus ikofen ḇadir roi ḇekur Paulus faro wairek ani, ḇo doḇo: "Ro dine snon ḇesmai oso isya ro fafisu Feliks ibur ya.
44025015	Rofyor aya isya ro Yerusalem, mananir imam-imam ma ḇebarara-ḇebarara Yahudi ssḇuk safsof ḇekur snon ani ma sor insa ismai.
44025016	Yakarem faro si, kawasa Roma sya sipok ḇa fa ssḇuk snon siksof oso ḇesamsom ro fafisu i kuker ḇeḇuksofi sya skarkara kukeri ḇaim ro ḇarpon ḇeḇuksof i. Ma isma fafisu fa ḇyesano warek mankundi ro safsof anna.
44025017	Eḇedari siso aya fa nkora kam muma. Ro meserdi yaryur fasaw kankain markara ma yawan fa snon ani ryama.
44025018	Ḇape rofyor ḇeḇuksofi sya sores yari sipok ssḇuk fasasnai ḇaḇeri ro fararur ḇarḇor raris moḇ yaḇaḇir kwar.
44025019	Ḇape sikada sisma karkara ḇeso kukeri ro mnuk ḇekur agama sedi, ma kako kuker snonkaku ḇenir Yesus, ḇe mar kwar, ḇape Paulus kada ikofen kaku, mboi ikenem.
44025020	Snar yaḇeḇirḇar nari yakara wawos ḇera dine, inja yafuken insa imarisen ido rya ḇe Yerusalem, insa roi ḇekuri ḇyeḇekara ro diwa.
44025021	Ḇape Paulus dek mankara. Dor insa iwaf ro bui, isof wawos ḇyena Kaisar mankundi ḇekara na. Rarirya yawan fa siwaren i isof yasmai fafisu fa yafarem i faro Kaisar."
44025022	Agripa ikofen faro Festus, ḇo doḇo: "Yamarisen yakmnaf snon ani mankundi." Festus kyarem ḇo doḇo: "Meser nari wakmnaf i."
44025023	Ro meserdi Agripa ma Bernike sura kuker fasasnai nasan ma rofyor ssun kwar ro sim markara fnoḇek mananir-mananir sarar ma snonkaku ḇeḇe snonsnon ro mnu ani, Festus ḇyuk sasoser, insa ssun Paulus ḇeḇarpon.
44025024	Festus ikofen: "O wairek Agripa ma ḇekain kam ro dine ḇefnoḇek inko. Mkomam snon ine, ḇesma safsof ro kawasa Yahudi sya kam, iḇye ro Yerusalem, iḇye kako ro dine. Srama kwar faro aya kuker bararas ma sikofen, imboi ipok ikenem kawan wer ḇa.
44025025	Ḇape yasma sasar osoḇa roi, fa yaḇuk samamyai marmar ma snar dek mankara faro Kaisar, inja yun karkara fa yafarem i faro Kaisar.
44025026	Ḇape yasma royo ḇa ḇeḇeknam fa yafas faro Kaisar. Knam ine iso eḇedari yuni ḇeḇarpon mkoḇena kam, isyadi ro ḇarpon bedi wairek Agripa, insa, posa kwar ro kakukeḇ ine, yafas knam oso.
44025027	Snar raris karkara yedi imnis ḇa fa kokarem snon ḇesmai oso ḇape kofasnai knam sḇuksofi na ḇa."
44026001	Agripa ikofen faro Paulus: "Wasma fafisu fa ḇesano warek mankundaw." Paulus pyankai epen si, raimnai ḇyesano warek mankundi radine:
44026002	"O wairek Agripa, yamarisen naba kaku, snar ro ras ine yasma fafisu ro au insa yaḇuk kankarem ro ḇarpon bedi ro safsof ḇeḇor Yahudi sya ssḇuki isof aya,
44026003	syadi wer snar au wafawi mnis kaku rari ma kankenem kawasa Yahudi nkoḇena. Inja yor ro au, insa wakḇaḇ ḇo wamnaf aya.
44026004	Kawasa Yahudi sya kam sifawi nyan kankenem ayedi ro fafisu yaḇe snonkbor ya, snar randak ya yakenem fandu kawasa yesi ro Yerusalem.
44026005	Fyoro kwar sifawi aya ma simarisen kada, nari ssḇuk ḇaḇesaksi snar yakenem imnis snon Farisi ḇeḇeuser ḇar ḇepakrek syadi ro agama nkoḇedi.
44026006	Knikine yores ro ḇarpon mankara, snar yakyar ḇardadi, ḇemnis kwar, Allah Ḇyuk faro kpu koḇesi,
44026007	ma keret samfur seser risuru nkoḇesi, siwafya eḇedari ras roḇ sinadi kuker sne ḇesiper. Ma snar kakyar ani, iso ḇeḇedari kawasa Yahudi sya sḇuksof aya o wairek Agripa.
44026008	Snaro mkokara Allah ipok ḇa fa ḇyaws snonkaku ḇemar sya?
44026009	Yar aḇiḇer ani kyaku rariso wer ḇape aya kada yakara, fa yasampum bos beri snonsnon Yesus ro Nazaret.
44026010	Sasampum anine yafruri kako ro Yerusalem. Yun kawasa ḇesren ansi kwar fa sismai ro bui monda ḇa, ḇoi rofyor yasma samambraḇ ro mananir imam-imam, yamarisen kako insa sismai samamyai marmar.
44026011	Ro rum nadi sena yaprer si ma yaḇeyaw-yaw insa sfamyun kakyar sena ma kuker masasor mankenem yayom si isof mnu-mnu ro sup amber."
44026012	"Kuker roi ḇeradine, fafisu yasma papoik ḇemnis ma fararur ro mananir imam-imamsya fa yara ḇe Damsyik,
44026013	ro nyan ya faduri knikoḇama, o wairek Agripa, ro orkok pandaf yamam sasnai ḇeba oso isnai syadi sasnai ori, dado ker nanki fa iyar aya ma min ḇeso ro mararan ayedi sya.
44026014	Inkosapi kam ma yamnaf mkaren oso ikofen faro aya ro wos Ibrani: 'Saulus, Saulus, snaro bewayam aya? Kandera faro au fa rwos ro mankarmomen.'
44026015	Ḇape yakarem: 'Manseiso au, o Manseren?' Manseren ikofen: 'Aya ine Yesus bewayam ya.
44026016	Ḇape knikine, wakḇok ma wores. Yafasnai mankundaya faro au insa yaḇeasas au fa bemanfamyan ma besaksi ro roi ḇeḇor mam kwar ro aya ma roi ḇeḇor nari yafasnai wer faro au.
44026017	Nari yakimfir au ro fandu er ine ma er-er ḇeso si. Ma nari yawan au faro si,
44026018	insa simkasna nbas ma skaḇer ro panpanya ḇe isnai ya ma ro samambraḇ Ibiris faro Allah, insa kuker kakyar sena faro aya sisma ampon ro sasar ma saksma rarwas ro rosai ḇefasos faro snonkaku ḇesren kwar.' "
44026019	"Inja, o wairek Agripa, ro mamam ḇeraker nanki ani eḇedari nari yamnai ḇa.
44026020	Ro randak ya yaḇaryas faro kawasa Yahudi ro Damsyik, ro Yerusalem ma sup Yudea ḇesiper, ma kako faro er-er ḇeso insa simbror ma skaḇer faro Allah ma sifrur fararur ḇemnis kuker marandor sena.
44026021	Snar roi yakofen nane naiso ḇefnai fa kawasa Yahudi sfor aya ro rum Allah ma siḇe smun aya.
44026022	Ḇape snar fafnoḇek ro Allah, yakenem isof knikine ma yaḇesaksi faro snonkaku kasun ma ḇeba. Ma rosai yaḇaryas na naḇese ḇa bur rosai ḇepon iwara nabi sya ma Moses sḇaryas kwar,
44026023	isoine, mboi Wairek nari isma kandera ma iso ḇeyiḇer ḇepon ro ḇemar sya, ma nari iso ḇeḇaryas isnai ya faro er ine ma faro er-er ḇeso."
44026024	Rofyor Paulus ikofen wos anna kam fa ḇyuk karem fararur ḇyedi, Festus dawos kuker mkaren ḇeba: "Paulus, swawo! Wawasya fas-fas nabor nafrur fa swawo."
44026025	Ḇape Paulus kyarem: "Yasawo ḇa, o Festus ḇepyum! Yawos napnapes ya kuker swaruser ḇeknon.
44026026	Wairek ikako ifawi roi ḇeḇor nane kam, rarirya yamku ḇo yawos pdef kuker sananai faroi. Yafawi kaku roi oseroḇa fa wairek dakfawiḇa snar roi ḇeḇor nane neḇefrur ro moḇ ḇeḇeursḇa ḇa.
44026027	Agripa wakyarke faro nabi-nabisya? Yafawi kaku wakyar faro si."
44026028	Wairek Agripa kyarem: "Kero kada wun sneri fa yakḇe Kristen!"
44026029	Paulus kyarem: "Yamarisen yanadi faro Allah, insa fasaw roḇa fyoro muma werer ḇa ḇoi, kawasa ḇeryur kam ro dine ḇo ḇemnaf wos yakofen nane simnis kam kuker aya ḇoi wanka sine sidawer."
44026030	Raimnai wairek iyori ma gubernur Feliks kuker Bernike ma kawasa ḇeso kankain ansi.
44026031	Fafisu sisasyar ya sikofen yae faro si ḇo soḇo: "Snon ani ifrur sasar oso ḇa fa ifnai faro samamyai marmar roḇa samamyai bui."
44026032	Agripa ikofen faro Festus ḇo doḇo: "Snon ani dor mankara Kaiser ḇa kada iḇye ḇyeḇesasyar."
44027001	Rofyor sawos namuk kwar, nari nkayun ḇe Italia, inja Paulus fnoḇek ḇesmai ono ḇeso sḇeḇeḇuk faro mananir sordade ḇenir Yulius ro sarar Kaisar.
44027002	Nkek kapal oso beraker Adramitium ḇeyayun ḇesaw ḇeḇor kam ro siser Asia, ma nkosyoḇ. Aristakhus, snon oso ro Makedonia ḇeraker Tesalonika, iso nko.
44027003	Ro meserdi nkorande ro Sidon, Yulius ḇyeaḇaḇen faro Paulus ma ḇyuk fa Paulus isrow bati ḇyesi, insa sifnoḇek i ro fandun ḇyena.
44027004	Snar nkosor wam ya inja nkayun ro dia nkosye siser Siprus.
44027005	Ma rofyor nkunuk soren ro ḇarḇun Kilikia ma Pamfilia, nkofyafer ro Mira, ro supya fyor Likia.
44027006	Ro dia mananir sordade nkoḇedi isrow kapal oso beraker Aleksandria ḇeḇe ḇeyayun ḇe Italia. Inja nkek ro kapal ani.
44027007	Nkayun ras ono kwar, ḇape nkorurenḇa ma kuker kandera nabor nkosnefer ro Knidus. Snar nkosor wam ya ḇesya kwar, nkosye siser Kreta ma nkunuk irew Salmone.
44027008	Kuker kandera nabor nkarḇai irew ani, nkofyafer ro moḇ oso ḇenirḇe Saw Ḇeḇye, fanam mnu Lasea.
44027009	Rarirya fafisu nabor nasyof kwar. Fafisu farfor ya kako isyonde kwar ma kandera kaku rofyor kayun pdef. Rarirya Paulus ḇyuk swarepen faro si, ḇo doḇo:
44027010	"Naek srar, yamam, ayayun koḇedine nari dun kandera ma fromo ḇeba, faro papus ma kapal ya dererḇa ḇoi faro nyawa koḇesi kako."
44027011	Ḇape mananir sordade ikyar syadi faro manfara ma manwadwa ro Paulus wos ḇyena.
44027012	Snar saw ani ipyum ba fa nkopyar ro dia ro fafisu prim ya, inja ḇeḇor sya simarisen fa nkayun pdef ma nkoḇesewar fa nkosun ro mnu Feniks fa nkopyar ro diwa ro fafisu prim ya. Mnu Feniks irya saw oso ro myos Kreta, ḇekarḇe ḇar wambarek-wambrei.
44027013	Ro fafisu ani wam ḇeso mararai ikḇun ker ḇar wambraw. Skara ḇo soḇo, marisen sedi nari sisma. Spaw yor ya, ma nkayun fanam kaku ma nkosye siser Kreta.
44027014	Ḇape fyoro ḇa wam ḇeso munbun ro myos ani ḇyewam doḇer, sorḇe "Wamurem-wambrei."
44027015	Kapal ani wamya myuni ma syambraḇ fa syor wamya ḇa. Rarirya nkomam monda kapal ani ḇo ikren-ikḇar.
44027016	Ḇarpur nkoki isof ro myos mkun ḇenirḇe Kauda, ma ro dia kuker kandera nabor nkopaw wai bewaduren ro kapal ani.
44027017	Ma rofyor wai ḇewaduren ani ḇyeḇepaw kwar ḇe kapalya bori, raimnai sfasos dera ḇefnoḇek ma sparar kapal ani kuker kaḇrai. Ma nkomkak nkoder ro ureḇ Sirtis, inja skokyu sarwir na ma kapal iki idamdamen.
44027018	Snar nkokren-nkokḇar fafayaḇa ro doḇer ani, inja ro meserdi sisawen papus ḇero kapal ani ḇesoren.
44027019	Ma ro ras ḇeḇekior ya sisawen dera-dera kapal ya.
44027020	Ma ro ras ri ḇeso kwar iḇye ori ma mak sya sḇayir ḇa, ma wam doḇer ḇeba ani myun nko ḇesya kwar, isof kakyar nkoḇena namuk ma nkosma nyan faspar oso ḇa kwar.
44027021	Snar sinan ḇa ro fafisu ono kwar, inja Paulus dores ro fandu si ma ikofen: "Naek srar rofyor mkoso wos ayena kada, insa kayun bur awer Kreta, nari kosma kandera ma fromo ḇera dine ḇa!
44027022	Ḇape knikine, yaḇuk swarepen faro mko kako ro kandera ine, insa mkosnemna nako, snar oso ro mko nari ryoḇa derer kapal ine.
44027023	Snar roḇandi Allah malaikat ḇyedi oso, isoine Allah yasyom ma ḇena aya, dores fanam aya,
44027024	ma ikofen: Paulus, wamkak awer! Nari wores ro ḇarpon Kaisar; ma kaku ḇeri snar Allah ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyedi, inja snonkaku ḇefnoḇek au ro kapal ine sya kam nari sisma faspar.
44027025	Inja yakyar mkosnemna naknon snar nari roi malaikat ya ikofen faro aya nari ndarirya.
44027026	Rariryano ḇape kapal ine nari koḇei fa iryor ro myos oso."
44027027	Ro roḇ ḇeḇesamfur seser rifiak nkoisya inkoki nkoraryoi kaker ro soren Adria. Ḇape indokada ro romfawru ḇefararur ro kapal sya sḇaḇir nkofanam ḇeḇande.
44027028	Inja sikyu karui kara ma sisma rof samfur risuru. Siki swaf wer sikyu kara wer ma sisma rof samfur seser rim.
44027029	Ma simkak ḇude, nkoder ro irbor oso inja sikyu yor rifiak ro kapal ya urndi, ma nkosaw kaku meser fasaw.
44027030	Ḇape ḇefararur ro kapal sya ssewar nyan fa sibur kapal ya. Sisabu wai bewaduren sifrur farari siḇe sisawen yor ono ro kapal ya rawndi.
44027031	Inja Paulus ikofen faro mananir sordade ma sordade ḇyesi: "Rofyor skain ro kapal ineḇa nari mkosma faspar ḇa."
44027032	Rarirya sordade ansi siwapuk kabrai wai ḇewaduren ani fa ipyar iki.
44027033	Ro fafisu isnai karkir Paulus dembuk si kam fa sanan, ḇo doḇo: "Ras samfur seser rifiak kwar mko waf-waf monda ma mko farmku basbiser ma mkonan ba.
44027034	Inja yaḇuk swarepen faro mko, insa mkaknan resari. Nanan ani ḇyefandun kaku ro faspar mkoḇedi. Snonkaku oser ro fandu mko snonburyam ḇyena oser ipok kyapas bur ḇruriḇa."
44027035	Dawos rarirya kwar dun mamami, ikofen kasumasa faro Allah ro ḇarpon sedi kam, pyanasnis na raimnai dan ḇepon.
44027036	Rarirya kawasa ansi sisma sambraḇ ma sakan kako.
44027037	Dandonek nkoḇedi kam ro kapal ya utin risuru samfur rifik seser ri wonem.
44027038	Sanan isof sarbor kwar, sisawen roḇean gandum ḇesoren insa kapal ani myanan.
44027039	Rofyor isnai kam kwar, smam dorei ḇepyom oso. Sifawi pyum sup aniḇa ḇape skara kwar fa siryor kapal ani ro dia.
44027040	Rarirya sper kaḇrai yor anna, ma sibur na ro soren. Ro fafisu ani sper kaḇrai ro remis ya ma sbawes sarwir ḇeba ya insa wamya dun kapal ani ḇeḇande.
44027041	Ḇape kapal ani dunuk ro ureḇ oso, ma kapal ani ider. Rawndi ssyun ro ureḇ ani isof imarmer ḇa ḇoi urendi risen ḇeba nbaser i rao fyarmambriwer.
44027042	Rofyor ani sordade-sordade ansi skara fa soḇo smun besmai ansi, insa oso das ibur awer.
44027043	Ḇape mananir ani imarisen fyaspar Paulus. Inja damrer swaruser sordade ansi sena, ma ḇyuk sasoser, insa ḇefawi ḇeas sya snur ḇeḇande,
44027044	insa ḇeso sya snur user kuker kambafen ma kapal ya ker-ker na. Rarirya sikam srande kuker ḇayaye.
44028001	Rofyor nkorande kwar kuker ḇayaye, insape nkofawi, sup ani kada myos Malta.
44028002	Kawasa ḇekain ro myos ani senaḇye faro nko. Sikaḇen for ḇeba oso ma sembuk nko fa nkodapen for ani snar mekem ya iḇe imyun ma pnunek ya iba.
44028003	Fafisu Paulus iryur ai snaw-snaw ono fa ḇyuk kaḇen for ya, ikak ḇeknampu oso isasyar ro moḇ ani ma darek Paulus ḇrasi.
44028004	Rofyor snonkaku ansi smam ikak ḇekur ro Paulus ḇrasi ani, sawos yae si ḇo soḇo: "Snon ine snon mamun dirya, snar, isma faspar kwar ro soren, ḇape Karwar Napnapes ḇyuk fa ikenem ḇa."
44028005	Ḇape Paulus kyekef ikak ani ḇefor ya dori, ḇoi isyur ikak ani ḇa.
44028006	Rarirya skara ḇo soḇo, nari ḇrasi iḇyar roḇaido nari imar ḇo isapi ro fafisu ani beri. Ḇape siwaf fyoro kwar, ma smam royo ḇa ḇekuri, inja skara wer ḇo soḇo karwar oso irya.
44028007	Swafoḇa ro moḇ ani kosma gubernur ro myos ani saprop ḇyedi. Gubernur ani snori Publius. Isrow nko ma fyan nko pyum kaku ḇeras rikior.
44028008	Ro fafisu ani Publius kmari isam ma isar. Paulus syun ro sim ḇyedi; Paulus ḇyenadi ma isawar dofen i ma ḇyuk pararei faro i.
44028009	Snar roi ḇeḇesya ani ifnai fa ḇeduf ḇeso ro myos ani sra faro Paulus ma ifrur si fa siprei kako.
44028010	Kawasa ansi semaf nko ma rofyor nko syoḇ ro dia, sfasos roi ḇeḇaryam faro nko.
44028011	Ḇarpur ro paik rikior nko syoḇ ro dia nkek kapal beraker Aleksandria ro fafisu primya ḇepyar ro myos ani. Kapal ani ḇyekakop Dioskuri.
44028012	Nkosma rande ro Sirakusa ma nkokain ro dia beras rikior.
44028013	Ro dia nko sye siser, ma nkorande ro Regium. Ras oser posa wambraw ya iso ma ro ras ḇeḇesuru ya nko rande ro Putioli.
44028014	Ro dia nko srow kina-kina jemaat, ma raris fararyor sedi nkokain nus si ḇeras rifik. Posa kwar nkosyoḇ ḇe Roma.
44028015	Naek srar ḇekain ro diwa simnaf nko kwar ro roi ḇekur nko inja srama sisrow nko isof ro Forum Apius ma Tres Taberne. Rofyor Paulus myam si, ikofen kasumasa faro Allah ma isma samambraḇ ro sneri.
44028016	Nkora kwar ro Roma, ssḇuk faro Paulus fa kyain ro rum mankundi ḇyedi kuker sordade oser ḇewareni.
44028017	Ḇarpur ro ras rikior Paulus dor snonkaku ḇebarara er Yahudi ma rofyor siryur kwar, Paulus ikofen ḇo doḇo: "Naek srar, yafawi yafrur sasar oso faro er koḇesi ḇa roḇaido rari kpu koḇesi sena ḇa, ḇesyaḇo sfor aya ro Yerusalem ma sḇoḇ aya faro kawasa Roma.
44028018	Rofyor skukeḇ aya kwar, simarisen sisasyar aya, snar sisma sasar oso ḇaḇeri ro aya ḇefasnai yasmai samamyai marmar.
44028019	Ḇape kawasa Yahudi sisampum si inja yakarai ipyum syadi yek mankara faro Kaisar, ḇape kuker karkara ḇa fa yaḇuksof er ayedi.
44028020	Knam ine iso yor mko muma, insa yamam mko ma yawawos kuker mko, snar kakyar kawasa Israel eḇedari sfes aya kuker wanka ine."
44028021	Ḇape sikofen faro i soḇo: "Nkosma syap ono ro Yudea ḇa ḇekofen ḇadir au ma naek oso ryama ikofen ḇadir roi ḇesasar ro au faro nko ḇa.
44028022	Ḇape nko marisen nkomnaf ro au, rariso swaruser ḇena, snar nko fawi ro ḇar ine, ro moḇ nakam kako ifnai famfaḇri."
44028023	Raimnai sap ras oso faro Paulus. Ras sap ani srama kuker dandonek ḇeba ḇemoḇ Paulus ḇyeryar roya. Ḇyuk fasasnai ma kesaksian faro si ḇekur Ḇaḇesasoser Allah; ma knam ro Moses sasoser ḇyena ma syap ro nabi-nabi ḇyesewar fa insa sifawi ro Yesus. Wawos ani ro arwo isof mandira.
44028024	Ono sikyar wos ḇyena ḇoi ono kada sikyar ḇa.
44028025	Fananjur ani sibur ḇesisye kuker sna swaruser oser ḇa ro fandu si. Ḇape Paulus ikofen kako wos ine ḇo doḇo: "Kyurbos beri Rur Ḇesren ya wos ikofen faro kpu koḇesi kuker sḇayo Nabi Yesaya:
44028026	Mkora faro er ine, ma mkokofen: 'Nari mkomnaf kuker knaram mkoḇesi, ḇesyaḇo mkokara ḇa, nari mkomam kuker mkamor mkoḇesi, ḇesyaḇo mkofawi ḇa.
44028027	Snar er ine sisnesna nedip kwar, ma siknasna nadiw, ma simkasna nenef; insa smam awer kuker simkasna ma simnaf awer kuker siknasna ma sifawi awer kuker sisnesna, isof skaḇer ma yaḇuk pararei faro si.' "
44028028	"Inja insa mkofawi, korer ḇeraker Allah ani nari ḇyeḇeḇaryas faro er-er ḇeso ma nari simnaf i." [
44028029	Ma Paulus dawos rarirya faro si kwar, kawasa Yahudi ansi sibur ḇesisye kuker sna swaruser oser ḇa ro fandu si.]
44028030	Ma Paulus kyain wampasi wambarek risuru ro rum mankundi ḇyakwarek ya; snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇerama faro i sya isrow si.
44028031	Kuker isnai kaku ma royo idwarek ḇa ḇyaryas Allah Ḇaḇesasoser Ḇyedi ma ḇyuk farkarkor ḇekur Manseren Yesus Kristus.
45001001	Naek srar ayesi, Allah iswar ma dorkwar fa ḇeḇe kawasa ḇyesi ro Roma. Allah kyinfir aya ma ikanow ḇardi aya kwar fa yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi.
45001002	Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani, Allah ḇyeasasi kwar ro awar ḇeponya faro nabi-nabi ḇyesi, ma sfasepeni kwar ro Refo.
45001003	Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekur Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, isoine Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, mboi roḇaḇe snonkaku ḇyedi, ḇyeḇarpur ro Daud,
45001004	ḇape roḇaḇe Manseren ḇyedi fyasna ḇadir i Allah Rumkun ḇyediri. Ine ḇyeḇefasna ḇadir kuker papoik ḇesyadadi, aḇiḇer ḇyedi rofandu marmarya.
45001005	Kuker i kako, Allah ḇyuk saswar ma fakamamanḇe aya fa yaḇe manwawan, insa yakfin snonkaku ro er-er -- syakam fa sesyowi Kristus, ma sikyar faro snonsnon ḇyedi.
45001006	Wos ḇekur er-ersyakam ma naek ayesi mkokako ro Roma isoine; naek srar mkoḇe ḇeyor kwar fa mkoḇe kawasa faro Yesus Kristus.
45001007	Iso eḇedari yafas faro naek srar ayesimko, iḇyekada Allah kma koḇeja ma Manseren Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok ma ḇyuk aski mufaḇe naek srar mkokam.
45001008	Ḇepon kaku, kuker snonsnon ro Yesus Kristus, yakofen kasumasa faro Allah snar naek srar mkokaem, snar sup swan ine ḇesiper simnaf kwar, mboi mkokyar kaku faro Yesus Kristus.
45001009	Mboi Allah yuffarmyan kuker sne ḇesiper ro ḇaḇe ḇararyas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, kuker Rumkun ḇyedi, iso ḇeḇesaksi maro aya, mboi rofyor yabe yanadi ido, yaswarepen mko besyakwar;
45001010	yabenadi kuker kaku ḇeri faro Allah insa ḇyuk fa yasma fafisu fa yarakaki mko.
45001011	Yamarisen yasrow naek ma srar mko, insama yarwas fakamaman yasma ro Allah Rur ḇyeja fa syambraḇ ser mko.
45001012	Kakara yedi isoine, snar kokam kokyar faro Yesus Kristus, inja ibye kosonemyaeko.
45001013	Naek srar mko, yamarisen insama mkofawi, mboi nabor kaku kwar yamarisen fa yarakaki naek srar mko, ḇape roi ḇedwarek aya naisya ḇesya kwar. Yamarisen insa rofandu naek ma srar mko kako mkofararur insa fararur ayeja ḇyebon, raris moḇ fararur ayeja ḇyebon rofandu er-er ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya ro moḇ ḇese.
45001014	Snar yasma wawan faro er ḇesesyakam, ḇesma farkarkor kwar ma ḇesma farkarkor ḇaim, iḇye ḇefawisya ma ḇefawi ḇaimsya.
45001015	I eḇedar fa yamarisen kaku yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro naek ma srar ḇekain ro Roma mkoya kako.
45001016	Yakyar kaku faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, snar ikada Allah papoik ḇyedirya snar ḇyuk koreri faro snonkaku ḇekyarsya, ḇepon kaku faro kawasa Yahudisya ma er ḇesesya kako.
45001017	Snar kuker Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani, Allah fyasna rariso nyan ḇaḇeoser snonkaku kuker Allah iḇye kaḇer wer; isoine kakyar faro Allah, ro randakya isof papupesya. Imnis fas-fas ro Refo, "Snonkaku ḇekyar faro Allah isof ḇaḇeoser ḇyedi kuker Allah iḇye kaḇer wer, snonkaku ani nari ikenem!"
45001018	Ro boiyaswa Allah fyasna masasor ḇyeja faro sasar ma ḇarḇor snonkakusya sena, snar sasar ma ḇarḇor annakam nadwarek snonkakusya fa sifawi farkarkor ḇenapes Allah ḇyenaḇa.
45001019	Snar rosai snonkakusya sifawiḇa ḇekur Allah sḇaḇirna ro sisnesna ma kakara sena, snar Allah mankundi fyasna nakwar.
45001020	Rofyor Allah ifrur supswan ine, Allah rari ḇyena komam ro komkasna ḇana, isoine ḇaḇe Manseren ḇyena ma papoik ḇekain fyoro-fyoro ḇyena, snonkakusya sifawina kwar ro roi ḇeḇor Allah ifrur kwarna. Inja snonkakusya sisma sanoyo ḇaḇeri fa sbuki ḇyesano wareksi.
45001021	Snonkakusya sifawi Allah ḇesyaḇoi, snonkaku ansi sesyowi Allahḇa ma sikofen kasumasa faroiḇa. Imboi snonkakusya skara roi famfnom munda; snar sisnesna npanpan kwar.
45001022	Skara ḇo soḇo sifawi nananem, fama smamkir royoḇaḇeri.
45001023	Sisyom faro Allah ḇekenem fyoroya ḇaḇoi, sisyom faro amfyanir ḇesnai farari roi nari ḇemarna; isoine snonkaku, mansya, ma aiwan ḇeḇe wemin rifiaksya ma aiwan ḇeyanawersya.
45001024	Eḇedari Allah myam monda siḇo ḇyuk fa sifrur raris marisen sena fa sifrur roi ḇeyarwarem rofandusi.
45001025	Allah ḇekakuya, sfadweri kuker roi ḇekakuḇa. Isoine roi sifrur ro ḇramin naiso sisyom farona. Mboi ḇefrursiya iso sisyom ma sḇansuba rofyoro-fyoro faroyakada! Amin.
45001026	Snar snonkaku ansya sifrur rariryanja eḇedari Allah myam mondasiḇo siso mankunsi rmomen ḇefrur mamyai sena. Bin sesya kako sfarḇuk kuker snonsya werḇa; imnis rari ḇaḇekawin ro snonkakuḇa ḇoi, sfarḇuk kuker bin ḇesesya.
45001027	Snonsya kako sakḇerarirya; sfarḇuk kuker binsyaḇa ḇoi, sfarḇuk kuker snon ḇesesya, isof snon ansi sifrur roi ḇefrur anonef faro snonsya, isof mankunsi sikamar fararur ḇeḇyeḇa sena.
45001028	Ma snar snonkakusya sḇaḇir fa skarem Allah ḇa, inja Allah ḇyuksi faro kakara ḇeyun fras farosi, isof sifrur roi ḇeḇarḇor na:
45001029	Sisnesna nafo kuker ḇarḇor ḇeḇor kam ḇenapesḇa ma roi ḇekakuḇa, isoine sasewar nana, arwarem, masasor, sifo kuker swaruser mamun, rakrakrok ma ankarkar.
45001030	Simarisen sifrur fanor snonkaku ḇese; simewer sḇeuser sinan, semararesi, sifawi rariḇa, ma sayin faro Allah, ma simarisen semandaw. Simarisen sḇesewar fawawinanem ḇebabo fa sḇukifrur roi ḇeḇarḇor,
45001031	simewer skara snonkaku ḇesesyandi, sisaswarḇa ma sisoasuserḇa.
45001032	Mboi sifawi kaku Allah sasoser ḇyena isoine mansei ḇefrur rariryaido nari isma samamyai marmari. Rariryano sifrur roi ḇeḇyeḇa anna ḇesyakwar kako, ma ssḇuk kaku faro snonkaku ḇefrur rariryasya.
45002001	Inja snonkaku awne, woḇo buk samamyai faro snonkakuyo ḇese? Ḇape mankundaw ḇardi wakfis ro sasaryaḇa. Snar rofyor buk samamyai faro snonkaku ḇese anya, rarirya buk samamyai ḇardi kako, faro mankundaw snar aw kako wakfrur rarirya.
45002002	Ḇape kofawi mboi rofyor Allah ḇyuk samamyai faro snonkaku ḇefrur rariryansya wos ḇyena nanapes.
45002003	Inja snonkakuyo buk samamyai faro snonkaku ḇese ḇesasarsya, ḇape awḇardi wakfrur sasar kako, inja kwara ḇo woḇo, nari wakfisbur Allah samamyai ḇyukya?
45002004	Oroḇaido woḇo mamkyof Allah saswar ma kaḇaḇaḇ ḇyenake? Mkokam nari mkofawi mboi Allah saswar kaḇaḇ fyasna faro mko kwarya, doḇo insama mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena.
45002005	Ḇape mkoḇrumna npakrek ma mkomewer mkosadwer kenem ḇeḇarḇor mkoḇenandi. Inja mankunmkoiso ḇefanfon samamyai mkoḇena fa nmarḇak syadi wer, rofyor masasor ma samamyai ḇenapes ro Allah ḇyeḇefasnai ro ras ḇepupesya.
45002006	Snar Allah nari myunsu faro snonkaku oser-oser raris fararur ḇyena.
45002007	Kankenem ḇekain fyoroya ro Allah ḇyuk faro mansei ḇeḇeuser ma ḇeḇenaḇye, sisma syowi ma sanandik ḇekain fyoro-fyoro.
45002008	Snonkaku ḇewasen mankunsi ma ḇemewer ḇeḇeyuser Allah ma ḇefrur ḇarḇorsya, Allah imsor fafaya siḇa.
45002009	Mansei ḇemarisen ḇefrur roi ḇeḇarḇorsya, nari sḇekandera; ḇepon faro kawasa Yahudisya ma er ḇesesya kako.
45002010	Ḇape faro snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇefrur roi ḇeḇyesya, nari sisma sanandik ma ḇaḇesyowi ma aski ro Allah; ḇepon kaku faro kawasa Yahudisya, ma faro er besesya kako.
45002011	Snar Allah ifrur faro snonkakusyakam fa namnis.
45002012	Inja snonkaku ro er-er ḇese ḇeyakfawi sasoser agama Yahudiḇasya sasar sena nari sisma samamyai ro ḇandibur sasoser anna. Ḇape Yahudisya sḇesasar snar sifawi sasoser anna; rarirya sasoser anna naiso nari sḇukisof sina.
45002013	Snar snonkaku ḇemnaf sasoser Refo Yahudi ansya siso Allah ḇyuk napnapes farosyaba, mboi snonkaku ḇeḇeyuser sasoser Refo Yahudi siso Allah ḇyuk napnapes farosya.
45002014	Snonkaku er ḇese ḇefawi sasoser agama Yahudiḇa. Ḇape rofyor mankunsi simarisen sifrur rosai sasoser anna nakofen, rariryaido mankunsi sisnesna naiso ḇeḇesasoser farosi.
45002015	Snar kuker rari sena, nfasna ḇadir mboi rosai sasoser anna nakofen, neḇefas ro sisnesna. Ma sneuser sena kako nfasna sasoser anna, snar fyornoido nbuk sasar faro mankunsi, ma fyornoido nbuk kaku faro mankunsi.
45002016	Rarirya roi nari ḇerarirya ro ras sikofen ani. Ro ras ani-imnis Ankankinem Ḇeḇye yaḇaryas-kuker Yesus Kristus Allah nari ḇyuk samamyai faro roi ḇeborkam ḇeyokef ro sne ma kakara snonkaku.
45002017	Ḇape, rariso kuker naek srar mko ro baboine? Naek srar mkokarem mankunmkoḇe snonkaku Yahudi ma mkokaf ro sasoser agama Yahudi, ma mkomarares kuker ḇaḇesasoser anna kuker Allah,
45002018	naek srar mkosma fasasna ro sasoser anna, isof naek srar mkofawi Allah marisen ḇyena ma mkofawi rosai ḇeḇyeya.
45002019	Naek srar mkofawi kaku mboi mkoḇe manfarkin faro snonkaku ḇeprafsya ma mkoḇe isna faro snonkaku ḇekain ro pampansya.
45002020	Naek srar mkofarkor snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇasya, ma mkoḇe guru faro romawasya. Naek srar mkofawi kaku, mboi ro sasoser Refo Yahudi anna, mkosma fawawi ma farkarkor ḇenapesya.
45002021	Naek srar, mkoḇuk farkarkor faro snonkaku ḇesesya; inja, snaro naek srar mkofarkor mankunmkoḇa? Naek srar mkofarkor snonkaku besesya insa skaraw awer, ḇape mankun mkoido mkokarawke?
45002022	Naek farkor snonkaku ḇesesya fa sifrur farbuk awer, ḇape mankundaw ido wafrur farbukke? Naek wayin faro karwarsya, ḇape mankundaw ido fasyar papus ḇero rum karwarsya sena fa nwanake?
45002023	Naek waryaḇ snar nwa Allah sasoser ḇyena Musa ḇyuk kwarna, ḇape mankundaw ido wonef Allah ma wamewer waso sasoser ḇyenake?
45002024	Ro Refo sfas radine, "Snar mko snonkaku Yahudi Allah snonsnon ḇyedi ḇyeḇeyonef rofandu er-er ḇesenakam."
45002025	Rofyor naek srar mkoḇeyuser sasoser ro agama Yahudina ido, sofakfuk mkoḇani ḇyefandun kako. Ḇape rofyor naek srar mkoḇeyuser ḇaḇesasoser aniḇaido, sofakfuk mkoḇena nefromo munda.
45002026	Rofyor snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa oso sisofukiḇa, mboi ḇyeuser sasoser agama Yahudi anna ido, nari Allah kyoriḇe snonkaku ḇesofukḇake?
45002027	Rarirya, snonkaku ḇeyaksofukḇasya nari ssḇuk samamyai faro kawasa Yahudi ḇesma sasoser ma ḇesofuksya, snar sikada sisma sasoser agamaḇa ma sisofukḇa, fama siso naḇye sasoser agama anna.
45002028	Snar snonkaku Yahudi kakusya, snonsnon Yahudi mundaḇa; ma snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk ro baken mundaba.
45002029	Ḇape snonkaku Yahudi ḇekakusya siso ḇesma sofakfuk sne ro Allah Rur ḇyeja ma ḇesma fasapepen munda ro syap snonkaku senaḇa. Snonkaku ḇerarirya ansya sisma sanandik ro snonkaku ḇesesyaḇa, mboi sisma sanandik ro Allah.
45003001	Rarirya ido, fainda rosai koḇe snonkaku Yahudiya ma fandun rosai koḇeuser ḇaḇe sofakfukya?
45003002	Mboi fandun ḇyena nabor kaku! Ḇeponya, snar Allah ikyar wos ḇyeja faro kawasa Yahudisya.
45003003	Ḇape rariso rofyor ono rofandu snonkaku Yahudi sḇeyuk sasoser Allah ḇyena? Snar rarirya ido nari sidwarek Allah saswar ḇyedike?
45003004	Kaku ḇeri rariryaḇa! Snar Allah inapes ḇesya kwar faro snonkaku ḇeyankarkarsya. Imnis sfas kwar ro Refo radine: "Rofyor wawawos ido, wawos roi ḇenapes, irya ḇefainda rofafisu semankara aw."
45003005	Ḇape rofyor Allah nanapes ḇyedi fyasnai snar kofrur roi ḇeḇarḇor ido rosai nari kokofenya? Snar Allah inapesḇa rofyor ḇyuk samamyai faro ko? [Yawos imnis snonkakusya moḇ sawos raya.]
45003006	Oroḇaḇeri! Snar rofyor Allah inapesḇa ido, rariso nari ḇyemankara supswan ine?
45003007	Ḇape snar fararur ḇenapesḇana nfasna, ḇaḇenapnapes Allah ḇyair syadi wer isof isma sanandik; snaro snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya sḇemankara siḇe snonkaku ḇesasar?
45003008	Ma rosai eḇedari kokofen awer ḇo koḇo: "Iḇye syadi kofrur ḇarḇor insa kosma ḇaḇyeya?" Mboi snonkaku ono sisya sonef aya ḇo soḇo ayaiso bekofen kwar rarirya. Snonkaku berariryasya Allah byuk samamyai farosikada.
45003009	Inja Yahudi koya kankain koḇena inaḇye syadi wer ro er-er ḇesesyake? Oroḇaḇeri! Yakofen kwar ḇo yoḇo, iḇye snon Yahudi ma snonkaku ro er-er ḇese, sikam sifrur sasar kwar.
45003010	Imnis fasfas ḇero Refo, "Snonkaku oseroḇaḇeri fa inapes.
45003011	Snonkaku oseroḇaḇeri fa myamkir ma snonkaku oseroḇaḇeri fa isyom Allah.
45003012	Snar snonkakusyakam sḇinkwanbur Allah; isof sikam sibor kwar. Snonkakuyo ifrur roi ḇenapesḇa; mboi snonkakuyoḇaḇeri!
45003013	Aroren sena namnis ureren ḇeḇas. Ankar ma sararer nadaf ro ramar sena, ma sḇardip sena nkup anonef, imnis sayaryur ikak ḇeyarek.
45003014	Sḇadon sena nafo kuker fras ma rarmomen.
45003015	Simbran samberen kaku rofyor siḇe smamun kuker snonkaku.
45003016	Farmambriwer ma ḇaḇekandera, sḇuḇer na ro moḇnakam.
45003017	Simkasna napraf faro nyan ḇaḇeaskiya;
45003018	ma sesyowi faro Allahḇa."
45003019	Insape kofawi roi ḇeḇor sfas kwar ro sasoser agama Yahudi anna, irya faro snonkaku ḇekenem ro sasoser anna. Irya snonkaku osero fa dun sanowarekiḇa, ma Allah ḇyuk samamyai faro supswan ine ḇesiper.
45003020	Snar snonkaku oseroḇaḇeri fa iḇye kaḇer faro Allah, snar snonkaku ansya sifrur roi ḇeḇor ḇero sasoser agama anna. Ḇape sasoser anna nfasna munda snonkakusya sasar sena farosi.
45003021	Ḇape baboine Allah fyasna kwar nyan rosai ḇefrur fa snonkakusya siḇye kaḇer kuker Allah; ma nyan ḇeḇesya ani nari iwawik sasoser agama Yahudi annaḇa. Nyan ani kosma ro Musa syap ḇyena ma nabi-nabisya syap senaba,
45003022	isoine Allah ḇyuk fa snonkakusya siḇye kaḇer kukeri, rofyor snonkakusya sikyar faro Yesus Kristus; Allah ifrur rarirya faro snonkakusyakam ḇekyar faro Yesus; snar rarwaso isyaḇa:
45003023	snonkakusya sḇesasar kwar ma sḇinkwanbur Allah ḇeḇuk koreri ḇesia.
45003024	Inja Allah saswar ḇyeja munda snonkakusya ḇaḇe oser sedi kuker Allah iḇye kaḇer; nyan ḇyedi isoine: Snonkakusya sisma ḇaḇemkei snar Yesus Kristus.
45003025	Allah ḇyuk Yesus Kristus fa ḇye farsarser, insa kuker marmar ḇyeja, snonkakusya sisma ḇaḇemkei ro sasar sena, rofyor sikyar faro Yesus Kristus. Snar rofafisu ḇesyof kwar Allah ikḇaḇ snonkakusya ro sasar sena, isof ḇyuk samamyai farosiḇa. Allah ifrur rarirya fa fyasna napnapes ḇyedi.
45003026	Ḇape baboine imewer sasar anna, insa fyasna napnapes ḇyedi. Kuker nyan ine, fyasna napnapes ḇyedi; ma snonkaku oser-oser ḇekyar faro Yesus, siso ḇeḇye kaḇer kuker Allah.
45003027	Inja sanoyo isya faro snonkaku koyaba kwar fa koḇuki imarares. Snaro rarirya? Snar kofruruser roi ḇeḇor sfas ro sasoser agama Yahudinake? Roḇa! Mboi snar kakyar koḇena.
45003028	Snar knam kakuya ryadine: Snonkaku Allah fyasna fa ḇesma ḇaḇemkei ro sasar sena, sisma ḇaḇemkei ani, snar sifrur rosai sfas ro sasoser agama Yahudinaḇa, mboi snar kakyar sena.
45003029	Oroḇaido Allah ḇye Allah faro Yahudisya sererke? Inja dakḇe Allah faro er-er ḇesesyaḇake? Mboi, er ḇesesya Allah sedirya kako!
45003030	Inja Allah oserbaken ido, iso ḇeḇuk ḇaḇye kaḇer faro Yahudisya faro Allah snar kakyar sena; ma iso ḇeḇuk ḇaḇye kaḇer faro Allah ro er ḇesesya snar kakyar sena kako.
45003031	Rariryaido kosawen sasoser agama Yahudina snar kokyar faro Yesus Kristuske? Oroḇaḇeri! Mboi kuker kakyar koḇena, koḇeyuser naḇye syadi sasoser anna.
45004001	Rariryaido, rosai nari kokofen fa ḇekur Abraham, up ro er koḇejanya? Rosai isma ro fawawi ḇyeja?
45004002	Rofyor Abraham fararur ḇeḇye ḇyena nai ḇeḇewar fa Allah nyai imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah ido, isma knam fa fyakḇuni. Ḇape fyakḇuni ro ḇarpon Allah ḇyediḇa.
45004003	Fasfas ro Refoya ryok radine: "Abraham ikyar faro Allah, ma snar kakyar ḇyedi, Allah nyai imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah."
45004004	Snonkaku ḇefararursya, sisma sasuref; ma sasuref ḇyedi isma munda ḇesamsomḇa, snar iso ḇenaiya.
45004005	Ḇape snonkaku ono sisya sifararur ro mankunsiḇa; mboi sikyar faro Allah ḇefasna snonkaku ḇesasar sisma ḇaḇemkei ro sasar. Snar kakyar sena, Allah nyasi imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah.
45004006	Daud dakkara rarirya kako; iso eḇedari ikofen; aski faro snonkaku Allah nyasya imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah, rarirya Allah kyara fararur senaḇa. Daud ikofen kako radine ḇo doḇo:
45004007	"Aski faro snonkaku Allah ipyos sasar sena, ma sasar sena Allah ikrirna!
45004008	Aski faro snonkaku Allah kyor sasar senaḇasya!"
45004009	Inja wos aski ani kyur faro snonkaku ḇeḇeuser sofakfuksya serer mundake? Roḇaido faro snonkaku ḇeyakḇeuser sofakfukḇasya kakoke? Nkokofen ḇepon kwar, mboi Allah nya Abrahami, imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah, snar Abraham ikyar faro Allah.
45004010	Inja, fafisu rosai Allah fyasna roi ḇeḇesya ani? Rofyor Abraham ḇyeḇesofukyake, oroḇaido ḇyeḇesofuk ḇaimyake? Mboi rofyor ḇyeḇesofuk ḇaimya.
45004011	Ḇyeḇesofuk ro ḇarpurya, ma sofakfuk ḇyeja imnis aḇyair munda mboi Allah nyai kwar imnis raris snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah, snar kakyar ḇyeja faro Allah. Allah nyai rofyor ḇyeuser sofakfukya ḇaimya. Ma nari Abraham ḇye kma ro ḇar rurya faro snonkakusyakam ḇekyar faro Allah, ma snar Abraham Allah nyaiḇe snonkaku befrur sneprei Allah, ma sikada sakso ḇaḇe sofakfukyaḇa.
45004012	Abraham ḇye kma ro ḇar rurya faro snonkaku ḇeḇeuser sofakfukya kako. Abraham kako kma ro ḇar rurya farosi, snar seuser ḇaḇe sofakfukya mondaḇa, ḇape snar sikako sikenem kuker kakyar faro Allah, imnis raris Abraham ro fafisu dakḇeuser ḇaḇe sofakfukya ḇaimya.
45004013	Allah ḇyardi kwar faro Abraham ma kpu ḇyesi nari Abraham nya supswan ine. Allah ḇyardi rarirya maroḇa snar Abraham ḇyeuser agama Yahudi naḇa, ḇape snar ikyar faro Allah, isof Allah nyai imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah.
45004014	Snar rofyor snonkaku ḇeḇeuser agama Yahudi siso ḇesma rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar ido, kakyar faro Allah ḇyefandun ḇaḇeri, ma Allah asas ḇyena kako nefromo monda.
45004015	Snar sasoser Yahudina nor samamyai Allah. Ḇape sasoser anna naisyaḇa kada, nari sasarno naisyaḇa kako.
45004016	Inja asas Allah ḇyena neknam ro kakyar snonkaku sena faro Allah, imnis raris Abraham ikyar Allah, snar Abraham ḇye kma faro kokam ro ḇar rurya; mnuk ine kyain faro snonkaku ḇeḇeuser agama Yahudi semirḇa, mboi kyain kako faro snonkaku ḇekyar Allah raris mob Abraham ikyar Allah raya.
45004017	Snar Allah ikofen radine faro Abraham, "Yakimfir aw kwar fa bekma faro er-er ḇeḇor kam." Rarirya Allah ḇyuk asas ani faro Abraham. Ma Abraham ikyar faroi, snar irya Allah ḇeḇuk kankenem faro snonkaku ḇemarsya. Ikada Allah ḇefrur roi ḇeḇesya ḇaimna fa naisya kuker wos monda.
45004018	Inja Abraham myam roi ono ro kakyar ḇyejaḇa, ḇape ikyar ḇesya kwar, isof isma asas fa ḇyekma faro er ḇeḇor nakam. Imnis sfas kwar ro Refo, "Up besi nari sibor kaku."
45004019	Rofyor ani Abraham ifawi, mboi nari isma kpu ono werḇa kwar, snar ḇyemansar kaku kwar, ma kankenem ḇyedi fyanamḇe wampasi wambarek utin oser kwar, isyadi wer swari Sara pyansnasem. Rariryano Abraham kakyar ḇyedi iko ḇesya kwar.
45004020	Kakyar ḇyedi iko ḇesya kwar ma kyormararu asas Allah ḇyejaḇa isof syambraḇ syadi wer ro kakyarya ma isandik Allah ḇesya kwar.
45004021	Ikyar kaku nari Allah ifrurmnis rosai ḇyeasas kwarna.
45004022	Iso eḇedari Allah nya Abraham, imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah.
45004023	Wos "Allah nyai imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah" ḇyeḇefas fa kyur Abraham dererḇa,
45004024	ḇape faro kokako. Allah nari dakna ko imnis snonkaku ḇefrur sneprei Allah, snar kokyar faro Allah ḇeḇuk aḇiḇer faro Yesus Manseren koḇedi ro marmarya.
45004025	Yesus anine ssḇuki kwar insa smuni snar sasar koḇena, raimnai Allah ḇyawes i wer insa Allah ḇyuk napnapes maḇeko.
45005001	Baboine kosma kankenem ḇeḇye kaḇer kuker Allah snar kakyar koḇena. Ma eḇedari kokenem ro aski kuker Allah snar Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi.
45005002	Snar kokyar Yesus ḇyuk fa kosma Allah saswar ḇyedi, eḇedari kokenem isof baboine. Rarirya komarisen snar kokyar kaku nari koḇaḇir baba Allah ḇyuk maḇekonya.
45005003	Ma isyadi wer, kokako koryaḇ rofandu kandera koḇena snar kofawi nafrur fa kofarmku,
45005004	ma ḇaḇe farmku ani ḇyuk fa kodworen ro manasnasen; mnuk ine iso ḇeḇuk saneraroya.
45005005	Saneraro ḇeradineya nari ḇyefromo faro koba, snar kosnesna neḇeser kwar kuker Allah saswar ḇyena. Allah ifrur roi nanekam kuker fafnoḇek Rur ḇyedi, ḇyukmabeko kwar ani.
45005006	Rofyor kosambraḇ ḇa kwar, Kristus imarwarek ko, rofafisu ḇemnis, Allah ḇyardi kwarya; snar rorandakya koḇinkwan kakubur Allah.
45005007	Syamswen kaku faro snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇemar sadwer snonkaku ḇenapes oso, mboi faro snonkaku ḇeḇye ono sisya simarisen fa simar sadwer snon ani rofyor snon ani kyaku.
45005008	Ḇape Allah fyasna saswar ḇyedi maroko rofyor Yesus imar warek ko, rofyor koisya roi sasarya kaker!
45005009	Baboine kosma kankenem ḇeḇye kaḇer kuker Allah snar Kristus marmar ḇyedi, inja nari kosma fasparbur Allah masasor ḇyedi snar Yesus Kristus.
45005010	Ma rofafisu koḇembroḇ kuker Allah, kosma ḇaḇedasi kuker marmar ro Rumkun ḇyedi, isyadi wer baboine koḇye kaḇer kuker Allah kwar inja kokako nari kosma koreri snar kankenem Yesus Kristus.
45005011	Ma isyadi wer ro roi ḇeḇesya ani, koryaḇ kako snar Allah ḇaḇye ḇyedi fyasna maḇeko ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus. Snar kuker Kristus, ro baboine kosma ḇaḇeoser koḇedi kuker Allah.
45005012	Sasarya ssyunḇe supswan ine snar snonkaku oser, ma snar sasar ani, ifnai marmarya. Eḇedari marmarya iduḇ faro snonkakusyakam, snar snonkakusyakam sifrur sasar kwar.
45005013	Rofyor sasoser agama Yahudi neḇeḇuk ḇaim, sasarya isya kwar ro supswan ine. Ḇape sasar anna neḇeyawḇa, snar sasoser ono naisya fa neḇeḇeyuk ḇaim.
45005014	Rarirya, marmarya daḇen snonkakusyakam ro awar Adam isof ro Moses. Ḇape snonkaku ḇeyakḇeyuk roi Adam ḇyeyuknaḇasya kako marmarya deksi. Snar Adam ḇyefarari snonkaku nari ḇeramumaya.
45005015	Ḇape snonkaku ansuya sumamnisḇa; snar Allah saswar ḇyedi iba syadi wer ro Adam sasar ḇyena. Ḇaḇeyuk ro snonkaku oser ifnai fa snonkakusyakam simar. Ḇape saswar ma aski Allah ḇyena naba syadi wer snar snonkaku sne ḇeḇye oser, isoine Yesus Kristus, faro snonkakusyakam.
45005016	Fakamaman ma ḇaḇenaḇye Allah ḇyedi kako ibasyadi wer faro sasar snonkaku oser ani. Snar rofyor snonkaku oser ḇyeyuk ido, skara "iḇe ḇesasar". Ḇape rofyor snonkakusya sibor sifrur sasar kwar, saswar Allah ryama fyasna ḇadir, "sasaro isyaḇa kwar".
45005017	Snar ḇaḇeyuk ro snonkaku oser, marmar iduḇ ḇemoḇ nakam snar snonkaku oser ani. Rarirya kosma fararwe snar fararur ro snonkaku oser ḇese, isoine Yesus Kristus, faro snonkakusyakam. Nari Allah ḇyuk farsbawer monda fakamaman ḇyedi waworek farosi insa siḇye kaḇer wer faro Allah; ma nari sisma papoik ro supswan ine snar Yesus Kristus.
45005018	Inja, raris ḇaḇeyuk snonkaku oser ifnai fa snonkaku ḇeborsyakam sisma samamyai, rarirya kako fararur snonkaku oser ḇeḇeyuser Allah marisen ḇyena, ḇyedar fa snonkakusyakam sisma fasaspar ro sasar sena ma sisma kankenemya.
45005019	Ma raris snonkaku sibor sḇesasar snar snonkaku oser ḇaḇeyuk ḇyena, rarirya kako nari snonkaku sibor sikenem imnis Allah marisen ḇyedi, snar snonkaku oser ḇeḇeyuser Allah marisen ḇyena.
45005020	Ḇeḇuk sasoser agama Yahudina isoine Allah mankundi. Ḇape rofyor snonkakusya sḇesewar fa sḇeuser sasoser anna, rofyor ani kako sḇeyuk syadi wer ro sasoser anna ma sḇesasar faro Allah. Rofyor snonkaku ansi sḇesasar syadi wer, Allah fyasna iswar syadisi wer.
45005021	Inja, imnis komar snar kofrur sasar, rarirya kako Allah ḇyuk nyan maḇeko insa koḇye kaḇer wer kuker Allah snar saswar ḇyeja ḇeko. Ma snar ḇaḇeoser koḇedi kuker Allah, iḇye kaḇer kwar ma ḇyuk kako kankenem fyoro-fyoroya maḇeko snar Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus.
45006001	Rariryaido nari rosai koḇe kokofenya? Iḇye kofrur sasar ḇesya kwar, insa Allah iswar syadi koke?
45006002	Roḇa kaku ḇeri! Sasarya nyako werḇa snar imar kwar ro kosnesna, inja kopok ḇaḇeri fa kofrur pdef sasar ro kankenem koḇena werḇa.
45006003	Mkofawi ḇake mboi rofyor kosma masasi ḇesrenya, fyasna ḇadir koḇeoser kwar kuker Yesus Kristus? Ine fyasna koḇeoser kuker Yesus ro marmar ḇyedi.
45006004	Kuker masasisren ani, sikrirko kuker Yesus ma komar fnoḇeki, insa raris Yesus diḇri rofandu ḇemarsya snar papoik ma ḇaḇye ro Kmari, rarirya kako nari kokenem ro kankenem ḇebaboya.
45006005	Rofyor koḇeoser kwar kuker Kristus snar komar fnoḇeki kwar, inja nari koḇeoser kuker i kako ro aḇiḇer ḇyedi.
45006006	Kokam kofawi mboi rari snonkaku ḇekwar koḇena namar kwar fnoḇek Kristus ro apropya, insa papoik rari ḇesasar koḇena neḇepyos; rarirya sasarya nyakoḇe women werḇa kwar.
45006007	Snar snon oso imar ido, snon ani isma ḇaḇemkei ro papoik sasarya.
45006008	Inja rofyor komar kwar fnoḇek Kristus ido, kokyar nari kokenem fnoḇeki ro kankenem ḇyedi.
45006009	Snar kofawi mboi Kristus diḇri kwar ro marmarya, inja nari imar werḇa; marmarya dufepen kankenem ḇyeja werḇa.
45006010	Kristus marmar ismaya, isma snar sasarya. Rarirya imar ḇeoser monda isof fyoro-fyoro. Ma kankenem ro baboineya, irya kankenem faro Allah.
45006011	Naek srar mko kako mkokara mboi mkomar faro sasarya, ḇape mkokenem ro ḇaḇeoser ḇedworen kuker Allah snar Kristus Yesus.
45006012	Inja mkoḇuk fa sasarya ḇyewayam kaker awer mko ro supswan ine, insa mkoso marisen ḇeḇarḇor ḇyena kaker awer.
45006013	Rarirya kako naek buk awer kina ro baken bedi faro papoik sasarya fa ifrur roi ḇeḇarḇor kaker awer. Mboi buk baken beja faro Allah, raris snonkaku ḇebur marmarya faro kankenemya. Naek buk baken bedi ḇesiper faro Allah, insa Allah nya aw fa ifrur marisen ḇyena.
45006014	Sasar anya ḇyewayam kaker awer naek aw, snar wakenem kaker ro sasoser agama Yahudi ḇakwar, mboi awsya kwar ro Allah saswar ḇyedi.
45006015	Inja rariso? Kofrur sasar murake snar koisya roi papoik sasoser agama Yahudi ḇakwar, mboi koisya roi Allah papoik fakamaman ḇyedi? Oroḇaḇeri!
45006016	Naek wafawiḇake mboi rofyor naek buk mankundaw faro snonkaku oso insa wafrur marisen ḇyena ido irya bewomen faro snonkaku ani, inja beuser marisen ḇyena ma bewomen faro sasar ḇeyunḇe marmarya, oroḇaido bemanfyan ḇesouser Allah, ma rarirya naek waḇye kaḇer kuker Allah.
45006017	Ḇape kasumasa faro Allah! Snar randakya naek bewomen faro sasari, ḇape baboine kuker sne ḇesiper naek beyuser farkarkor ḇenapes ssḇuk kwar faro aw na.
45006018	Naek beḇeḇemkei kwar ro sasar, ma baboine bemanfyan faro Allah marisen ḇyena.
45006019	Snar swaruser mkoḇena nsambraḇ ḇa, inja yaḇuk fasasna ro ḇaḇewomen ine, insa ipyan ḇemko fa mkofawi. Randakya mkoḇuk mankunmko fa mkoḇe women faro roi ḇemamas ma roi ḇeḇarḇor fa nafrur roi ḇeḇarḇor. Rarirya kako babine, iḇye naek srar mkoḇuk mankunmko ḇesiper raris manfyan faro Allah, insa ḇyukfrur ḇardi marisen ḇyena.
45006020	Rofyor naek srar mkoḇe women faro sasarya, inja papoik ma marisen Allah isya faro mkoḇa.
45006021	Rofafisu ani, fainda rosai naek srar mkosma ro roi ḇeḇor baboine mkomai mkofrur na? Fararur anna nun mko faro marmar monda!
45006022	Ḇape baboine mkosma ḇaḇemkei ro sasarna kwar, ma mkoḇe manfyan faro Allah. Fainda mkoḇedi isoine, naek srar mkokenem ḇardi faro Allah ma roi ḇeḇesya ani dun kankenem ḇekaku ma ḇekain fyoro-fyoro.
45006023	Snar marmar irya sasuref ro sasarya; ḇape kankenem ḇekain fyoro-fyoro fnoḇek Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi irya fakamaman Allah ḇyuk waworek monda maḇeko.
45007001	Naek srar ayesi mko! Mkokam mkofawi sasoserya kwar. Inja mkofawi papoik ro sasoserya isya faro snonkaku oso, rofyor snonkaku ani isya ikenem kaker?
45007002	Imnis bin oso isma yaḇyaḇek kuker sasoser faro swari rofyor swari isya ikenem kaker. Rofyor swari imar kwar bin ani imkeibur sasoser ḇefesepeni faro swa ḇyani.
45007003	Rofyor bin ani ikenem kuker snon oso ḇese rofyor swa ḇyedi isya ikenem kaker, bin ani skoriḇe ḇefrur farbuk. Ḇape rofyor swari imar, raris sasoseryanido, bin ani imkei kwar. Ma rofyor fyakawin kuker snon oso ḇese werido, skoriḇe ḇefrur farbukḇa.
45007004	Rarirya kuker mko, naek srar ayesi. Faro sasoser agama Yahudi naek srar mkomar kwar, snar mkoḇe oser kwar kuker Kristus baken ḇyedi snar marmar ḇyedi, ma nya mko kwar. Ḇyeḇeḇawes ro marmarya insa koḇe fainda faro Allah ro kankenem koḇena.
45007005	Snar ro randakya, kokenem imnis rari snonkaku. Rofyor ani rmomen ḇesasar, naiso ḇeyek ro kosnesna snar sasoser agamaya iso ḇeyufepenko. I ḇeḇewar fa kofrur roi ḇeyun faro marmarya.
45007006	Ḇape baboine koḇe ḇefesepen kuker sasoser agama Yahudi anna werḇa. Komarbur papoik ro sasoser randakya ḇeyaḇek ko kwar. Inja koḇe manfyan faro rari ḇekwarnaḇa kwar, imnis sasoser ḇeser fasfasna. Inja baboine koḇe manfyan koso rari babo Allah Rur ḇyedi fyasna maḇe konya.
45007007	Rarirya ido, rosai koḇe kokofenya? Sasoser Refo Yahudi nbarḇorke? Roḇa kaku! Ḇape sasoser anna naiso ḇefarkor aya ro sasarya. Yafawiḇaḇeri rosaiso rmomenya, rofyor sasoser Refo Yahudi anna nakofen pyan iḇa, "Warmomen awer."
45007008	Imnis raris sasoser Refo Yahudi anna, sasarya isma nyan fa ḇyawes marisen famfnom ḇeyek ro sneri; snar rofyor sasoser anna naisyaḇa, sasarya kako nari imar.
45007009	Ro randakya, yakenem kuker sasoser agamayaḇa. Ḇape rofyor sasoser agamaya isya kwar sasarya kako isya ḇeri
45007010	ma yamar. Inja sasoser agama ro randakya kokara nari ḇeḇuk kankenem, ḇesyaḇo nbuk marmar maḇe aya.
45007011	Snar sasoser agama anna, sasarya kako isma nyan fa ifrowes aya ma myun aya.
45007012	Sasoser agama anna neknam ro Allah, ma sasoser anna ndama ro Allah, inja nanapes ma naḇye.
45007013	Inja, rarirya ido roi ḇeḇye anna nun marmar maḇe ayake? Oroḇaḇeri! Mboi sasarya iso ḇeyun marmarya. Kuker roi ḇeḇye anna, sasarya dun marmar maḇe aya, insa rari ḇesasarna nfasna bos kaku. Kuker sasoser Allah ḇyena sasarya ḇarḇor ḇyena nasna bos kaku.
45007014	Kofawi sasoser agama Yahudi anna neknam ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, ḇape aya inekada snonkaku ḇesamḇraḇ ḇa. Yaḇe ḇeḇoḇ kwar fa yaḇe women faro sasarya.
45007015	Snar aya ḇardi yafawi roi yafrurnaḇa. Snar roi yamarisen na yafrur naḇa, ḇape rosai yayin na, naiso yafrur na.
45007016	Inja, rofyor yafrur rosai ḇefasasye marisen ayena ido, irya yakarem mboi sasoser agama Yahudi nanapes.
45007017	Rarirya ayai ḇefrur nayaḇa ḇoi, papoik sasar ḇero baken ayejaya.
45007018	Yafawi kaku, mboi roi ḇeḇye oso isya roi baken ayejaḇa; isoine ro rari ḇaḇesnonkaku ayedi. Snar yamarisen fa yafrur roi ḇeḇye, ḇape yasambraḇ fa yafrur naḇa.
45007019	Roi ḇeḇye yamarisen fa yafrurna yafrur naḇa; mboi roi ḇeḇarḇor yamewer naiso yafrur na.
45007020	Inja rofyor yafrur roi yamewer naido, irya fyasna ḇadir ayaiso ḇefrur nanyaḇa ḇoi, papoik sasar ḇero baken ayejaya.
45007021	Inja, yun kakara ro mankundaya ḇo yoḇo, sasoser ine iso ḇefasnaya; isoine rofyor yamarisen yafrur roi ḇeḇyeido, roi ḇeḇarḇor naiso ḇeyek ro aya na.
45007022	Sneri kada imarisen faro Allah sasoser ḇyena,
45007023	ḇape yafawi kaku ro baken ayeja sasoser oso ḇese isya ḇeyufepen aya -- isoine sasoser ḇesampum kuker sasoser raris kakara fawawi ayena. Iso ebedari sasoser sasarya iyabek aya.
45007024	-
45007025	Inja, yakenem radine: Yasouser Allah sasoser ḇyena kuker fawawi ayena, ḇape kuker rari ḇaḇesnonkaku ayeja, yakenem faro sasarya. Aya ine snonkaku ḇeroë! Mansei nari ḇemarisen ḇefaspar ayabur baken ine ḇeyun aya faro marmarya? Kasumasa faro Allah! Snar imarisen fyaspar aya kuker Yesus Kristus.
45008001	Baboine samamyai isya werḇa faro snonkaku ḇekenem ro ḇaḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus.
45008002	Snar sasoser ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, ḇyuk fa kokenem ro ḇaḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus ḇefaspar aya kwarbur sasoser sasar ḇeyun faro sasarya.
45008003	Rosai sasoser agamaya ifrurḇa, snar snonkaku koya kosambraḇ ḇa Allah ifrurna kwar. Allah ifrur kafyo papoik sasarya ro rari snonkakuya, isof iwan Rumkun ḇyedi fa ryama kuker ḇaḇesnonkaku ḇesasar, insa ipyos sasar na.
45008004	Allah ifrur rarirya insa marisen ḇyedi ḇefasna ro sasoser agama Yahudi koḇena fa nambran ro kenem koḇena raris kankenem ro Allah Rur ḇyedi ma koso awer kankenem ro ḇaḇesnonkakuya.
45008005	Snonkaku ḇekenem imnis rari snonkaku, siwasen monda roi simarisen ro rari snonkaku. Ḇape snonkaku ḇekenem kuker Allah Rur ḇyedi, siwasen monda rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi imarisen.
45008006	Naek srar rofyor kakara koḇena papoik rari snonkakuya nyana, nari ḇarpurya dunḇe marmar. Ḇape rofyor kakara koḇena papoik Allah Rur ḇyedi nyana, nari ḇarpurya isoine kankenem ma ḇaḇeaski kuker Allah.
45008007	Mansei papoik rari snonkakuya nyaya, snonkaku ani ḇyemḇroḇ Allah; snar snonkaku ani kyunem faro Allah sasoser ḇyena ḇa; ma imewer kyunem faro Allah sasoser ḇyena.
45008008	Snonkaku ḇekenem imnis rari snonkaku sifrur sneprei Allah ḇa.
45008009	Ḇape naek ma srar mkokada mkokenem imnis rari snonkaku senaḇa. Naek srar mkokenem imnis Allah Rur ḇyedi rofyor, kaku ḇeri Allah Rur ḇyedi ifararur ro mko. Mansei ḇesma Kristus Rur ḇyediḇa, snonkaku ani Kristus dakna iḇa.
45008010	Ḇape rofyor Kristus ikenem ro naek srar kankenem mkoḇena, nari baken mkoḇena namar snar sasarna, ḇape Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk kankenem faro mko, snar ḇaḇeoser mkoḇedi kuker Allah iḇye kwar.
45008011	Inja Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇeḇawes Kristus ro marmar, isya roi naek srar kankenem mkoḇena, iso ḇeḇuk aḇiḇer faro Kristus ro marmarya, inja nari ḇyuk kankenem faro baken mkoḇena ro marmarya. Ifruri rarirya kuker Rur ḇyedi ḇekenem ro naek srar mkoya.
45008012	Naek ma srar ayesimko, koine snonkaku ḇeḇenyaki, ḇape koḇenyaki faro rari snonkakuyaḇa; inja fandun fa kokenem imnis marisen ḇyenaḇa.
45008013	Snar rofyor naek srar mkokenem imnis rari snonkakuya nari naek srar mkomar; ḇape rofyor kuker papoik ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, naek srar mkomun ḇesya kwar fararur ḇesasar mkoḇena, irya nari naek srar mkokenem.
45008014	Snonkaku ḇesma farkankin ro Allah Rur ḇyeja, sikam Allah romawa ḇyesirya.
45008015	Snar Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk faro mko fa mkoḇe manfyanḇa, isof mkokenem kuker makakakḇa kwar. Snar Allah Rur ḇyedi ifrur fa mkoḇe rumkun faro Allah. Ma kuker papoik ro Allah Rur ḇyedi kor Allah ḇe "Kma, o Mami."
45008016	Allah Rur ḇyedi fnoḇek rur koḇesi skarem mboi koine Allah romawa ḇyesi.
45008017	Inja, rofyor koine koḇe romawa Allah, kokako koḇe romawa pusaka faro Allah nari ḇeyaksma ḇok fyasos kwar faro romawa ḇyesya. Nari kowarpu Yesus ma kosma rosai fyasos kwar faroiya; snar rofyor koḇe kandera fnoḇek Yesus kwar, inja kokako nari kosma payamyum fnoḇek Yesus kako.
45008018	Kandera ḇeḇor kosma ro baboine na, raris fawawi ayedi, namnis kuker payamyum nari ḇefasna maḇe konyaḇa.
45008019	Farsyos sansoren ḇesiper siryaḇ ma siwaf fafisu Allah iḇe fyasna payamyumya faro romawa ḇyesi.
45008020	Snar farsyos sansorenya ḇyeḇemam monda ḇo ḇyerere snar mankundi marisen ḇyediḇa, ḇape snar Allah iso ḇemam monda ḇo ryariryaya. Rariryano ḇape ḇareya isya isoine,
45008021	snar rofafisu oso farsyos sansoren nari isma faspar ro papoik ḇemuni fa ḇyemomprafya ma nari isma ḇaḇemkei fnoḇek Allah romawa ḇyesi ro baba siḇe sismaya.
45008022	Kofawi, ḇape isof ro fafisu ine farsyos sansoren ḇye kandera imnis bin oso ḇyekandera ro fafisu iḇe daḇen wombrek ḇyedi.
45008023	Ma farsyos sansoren derer fyafayafḇa, mboi kokako kakfafayaf ro kosnesna. Kosma Allah Rur ḇyedi kwar imnis raris roi ḇyuk ḇepon maḇeko, ḇape koisne kowaf kaker Allah ḇyuk fasaspar faro baken koḇena ḇesiper ma nya koḇe romawa ḇyesi.
45008024	Snar kuker ḇaḇeḇare, kosma koreri. Ḇape roi koḇe ḇareya komami kwar nari koḇeḇareiḇa kwar. Snar mansei ḇeḇe ḇare faro rosai myam kwar?
45008025	Ḇape koḇe ḇare faro rosai komam ḇaimya, nari kowaf kuker kaḇaḇaḇ.
45008026	Rarirya kako Allah Rur ḇyedi ryama isaramper ko rofyor kosambraḇ ḇa. Snar kofawi moḇ koḇenadi rayaḇa; Rur ani mankundi inadi warek ko faro Allah, kuker marisen ḇefnakḇa isof indokada dapnaḇa.
45008027	Ḇape Allah ḇefawi snonkaku sisnesna, ifawi Rurya marisen ḇyedi; Snar Rur ani dor ro Allah faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi, ma fararyor ḇyena namnis kuker Allah marisen ḇyedi.
45008028	Kofawi Allah ifrur roi ḇeborkam isof ro nbuk roi ḇeḇye faro snonkaku ḇeswarisya ma ḇesma fararyor ro i raris auw ḇyena.
45008029	Snonkaku Allah kyinfir kwar, Allah kyinfirsi ro randakya fa simnis kuker Rumkun ḇyedi, isoine Yesus Kristus. Rarirya Rumkun ani ḇye romawa rak rofandu naek srar.
45008030	Rarirya kako Allah dorsi ma kyinfirsi ro ḇepon kwar; ma snonkaku ḇesma fararyor ansi ḇyuk fa siḇye kaḇer kuker Allah. Ma snonkaku ḇyuk fa ḇeḇye kaḇer wer kuker Allah, sisma rarwas ro Allah mankundi kankenem ḇyedi.
45008031	Rosai koḇe kokofen werya ro baboine ro roi ḇeḇor annakamya? Rofyor Allah iwaira ko, mansei nari ḇesampum koya?
45008032	Mankundi Rumkun ḇyedi iswariḇa, mboi ḇyuki faro fandun koḇenakam; insape nari ḇyuk roi ḇesena maḇe koḇake?
45008033	Mansei nari ḇefasasye Allah kawasa kyinfir kwar koya, rofyor Allah mankundi fyasna mboi kosasarḇa?
45008034	Inja snonkaku ono sisya simarisen ssḇuk sasar ḇekoke? Yesus Kristus iso nari ḇeḇriwarek konya! Iso ḇemar kwarya, oroḇaido iso Allah ḇyawes kaḇer wer rofandu marmarya ma isya ro Allah ro moḇ papoikya.
45008035	Mansei nari ḇedwarek Kristus saswar ḇyuk maḇe konya? Kandera naiso ḇedwareknake, roḇaido mandakyake, roḇaido basbiseryake, roḇaido saḇararyake, roḇaido raroyake, roḇaido marmarya kakoke?
45008036	Ro Refoya fasfasya ryok radine, "Ras nakam nkokenem ro raro marmari snar auw. Sifrur inkoḇe domba siḇe skarukya."
