45008037	Roba! Mboi ro roi ḇeḇor anna nekam, kosma fainda ḇemnis snar Yesus Kristus ḇeswar koya.
45008038	Snar yakyar kaku ro sup-swan ine ḇesiper, iḇye marmari ma kankenemya kako; iḇye malaikat ma iḇye ḇesma papoiksya kako; iḇye ro baboine, iḇye ro fafisu nari ḇeramumaya kako, oroḇaido samambraḇ ḇesena;
45008039	iḇye roi ḇero nanki, roi ḇero sup ine dori nakako, oroḇaido roi ḇese wer, nakam nadwarek Allah saswar ḇyuk mabekonyaḇa, imnis fyasna kwar ro Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi.
45009001	Rosai nari yaḇe yakofen ine kyaku snar Kristus i ḇena ayanya. Yaḇe ankarḇa. Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇefarkin sne ayeja, ḇyuk kakyar ḇeaya kako mboi wos yakofen nane nkaku.
45009002	Sneri fyafardun ma yaḇe kandera,
45009003	snar naek srar ayesi ḇeḇe er oser kuker ayasya. Mankundaya ḇardi yamarisen Allah ifras aya snar si, ma yaḇe ḇefasparbur Kristus.
45009004	Sikada kawasa ḇesma kankinfir kwar, ma Allah nyasi ḇeromawa ḇyesi, ma fyasna papoik ḇyedi farosi. Iso ḇefrur asas kuker si ma ḇyuk farosi sasoser agama. Allah ikofen farosi moḇ rosai nari sḇeari raya ma sisma kako ḇaḇeasas ḇyena kwar.
45009005	Siso ḇeḇeknam ro up koḇesi. Ma Kristus ro ḇaḇe snonkaku ḇyeknam ro er sedi. Ikada ikaki syadibur ḇesesyakam. Sanandik faro Allah rofyoro isof fyoro! Amin.
45009006	Yakara ma yakofenḇa ḇo yoḇo Allah asas ḇyena nari ndarirya werḇa; ḇape kawasa Israel Allah kyinfir sikamba.
45009007	Abraham kpu ḇyesi seromawa Allah kamba. Snar Allah ikofen faro Abraham: "Ishak kpu ḇyesya semir siso sorḇe kpu besi."
45009008	Irya Abraham kpu ḇyesi siso sorḇe Rumkun Allah, isoine kpu ḇyesi saḇen kwar kuker Allah asas ḇyedi; mboi kpu ḇyesikamba.
45009009	Snar Allah asas ḇyedi ryadine: "Rofafisu sfasnaikwarya, nari yakaḇer, ma Sara nari daḇen romawa snon oso."
45009010	Ma ine kako: Ribka daḇen wombrek risuru ro kma oser, isoine Ishak, up koḇedi.
45009011	Rofyor wombrek ansuya suḇe ḇeyaḇen ḇaim, Allah fyasna kankimfir ḇyeja ḇepon kwar. Allah kankinfir ḇyedi ḇyeknam ro fararur snonkaku senaḇa, mboi ḇyeknam ro Allah mankundi fararyor ḇyedi. Snar rofafisu ani Ribka romawa ḇyansuya sufrur roi ḇeḇye oso ḇaim ma roi ḇeḇarḇor oso ḇaim.
45009012	Allah ikofen kwar faro Ribka, "Ḇebaya nari duffarmyan faro ḇedarya."
45009013	Sfas kwar ro Refo mboi Allah ikofen radine, "Yaswar Yakub, ḇape yayin Esau."
45009014	Rarirya rosai koḇe kokofenya? Inja Allah inapesḇake? Mboi kaku ḇeri, Allah inapes!
45009015	Snar Allah ikofen faro Moses, "Yamarisen yafasna fakamaman faro mansei yaḇe yafasna fakamaman faroya, ma yamarisen yafasna saswar faro mansei yaḇe yafasna saswarya farosya."
45009016	Inja, rosai Allah dawos namuk kwar neknam ro marisen snonkakusya senaḇa roḇa ḇaḇesewar snonkakuḇa, mboi neknam ro Allah ḇaḇesyowi ḇyeja monda faro snonkaku kyinfirsya.
45009017	Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Allah ikofen faro Wairek Masir, 'Yakanouw aw fa bewairek faro kakara ine monda, isoine insa kuker aw, yafasna papoik ayedi ma yafrur snonsnon ayedi fa ḇyesno-sno ro sup-swan ḇesiper.' "
45009018	Inja Allah iswar faro snonkaku oser-oser, rofyor Allah imarisen rarirya. Ma Allah ḇyuk fa snonkakusya siḇrusna npakrek, rofyor Allah imarisen rarirya kako.
45009019	Inja, nari naek srar mkokofen ḇeaya, "Rofyor rarirya, snaro Allah imarisen kaker fa ḇyuk safsof faro snonkaku? Mboi snonkaku mansei nari ḇedwarek Allah marisen ḇyena?"
45009020	Ḇape naek srar! Naek srar mkokada snonkaku monda. Inja naek srar mkomsik fa mkokarem faro Allah ḇa! Rariso nari uren sapropya ikofen faro ḇefruriya ḇo doḇo, "Snaro wafrur aya fa yaradine?"
45009021	Mkofawiḇake snonkaku ḇefrur uren saprop ani ifrur saprop ḇerik ḇyena, raris mankundi marisen ḇyedi? Ro saprop ḇerik anna, snonkaku ani imarisen ifrur uren saprop risuru ḇemnis, uren saprop oso faro fandun ḇepyum ma ḇeseya faro fandun famfnom.
45009022	Rarirya kako kuker rosai Allah ifrurna. Imarisen fyasna masasor ḇyedi ma fyasna papoik ḇyedi. Ḇape ikḇaḇ faro mansei iḇe ḇyuk samamyai farosya snar sifrur fa imsor kaku.
45009023	Allah kako imarisen fyasna maḇeko kamayai nabor kaku faro snonkaku iswar koya. Snar koḇe ḇefasos kwar fa kosma ḇaḇe askiya.
45009024	Koiso ḇesma fararyor kwar, mboi faro er Yahudi semirḇa, ḇape faro er ḇesesya kako.
45009025	Snar ro syap nabi Hosea Allah ikofen: "Snonkaku yanaḇasya, nari yorsiḇe 'Kawasa ayesi'. Er yaswarḇasya, nari yorsiḇe 'er saswar ayesi'.
45009026	Ma ro moḇsai sikofen faro snonkakusya, 'Mkokada kawasa ayesi mkoḇa,' rodia snonkaku ansi nari sorsiḇe Allah romawa ḇyesi ḇekenem."
45009027	Nabi Yesaya ikofenbos faro er Israel, "Kaku ḇeri er Israel sibor simnis karyen ro swan, ḇape kermkun monda nari ḇesma koreri.
45009028	Snar nari fasaw Manseren ḇyuk samamyai faro supswan ine ḇesiper."
45009029	Yesaya ikofen radine kako, "Rofyor Allah Ḇepoik syadi ḇyuk kpu maḇe koḇakada, nari kokam komnis raris Sodom ma Gomora kwar."
45009030	Inja, rarirya: Er-er ḇese ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇa sḇesewar awer insama ḇaḇeoser sedi kuker Allah iḇye kaḇer wer. Ḇape snar sikyar Allah, inja Allah ifrur fa ḇaḇeoser sedi kukeri iḇyekaḇer wer.
45009031	Mboi, kawasa Yahudi sḇesewar ḇesya kwar, insa sḇeuser sasoserna insa ḇaḇeoser sedi kuker Allah iḇye kaḇer wer. Ḇape ḇaḇesewar sedi ḇyuk bon farosiḇa.
45009032	Rosai ḇefnai fa ḇaḇesewar sedi ḇyebon farosiḇa? Snar sifrur roi ḇerarirya kuker kakyar faro Allahḇa, mboi sikyar monda ḇaḇesewar ro mankunsi. Inja skarkar ma sisapi ro "Karui Karkarya."
45009033	Karui ani sfasi ro Refo radine, "Mkoswarepen wos ine: Ro Sion yarir kwar karui oso nari ḇefrur fa snonkakusyakam skarkar; isoine karui ḇeba oso nari ḇefrur fa snonkaku sisapi. Ḇape snonkaku ḇekyar faroisya nari sfafkoḇa."
45010001	Naek srar! Yaswarkuf kaku insa er ayesi sḇesi fa sisma koreri. Ma kaku ḇeri yaḇenadi faro Allah, snar si.
45010002	Yakofen kaku mboi sikada simyaren kaku sḇeyuser Allah. Ḇape mayaryaren sena neknam ro swaruser ḇeramaker Allahḇa.
45010003	Smamkarkirḇa rariso Allah ifrur fa ḇaḇeoser snonkaku sedi kuker Allah iḇyekaḇer wer. Ma snar simarisen sifrur raris mankunsi marisen sena, rarirya simewer skunem faro Allah fasasna ḇyena.
45010004	Sasoser agama Yesus ifrurmnis nakwar. Inja snonkaku mansei ḇekyar faro Kristus, ḇaḇeoser ḇyedi kuker Allah iḇye kaḇer wer.
45010005	Moses fyas mboi snonkaku ḇeḇye kaḇer kuker Allah snar sasoser agama nari sikenem snar sḇeuser sasoser anna.
45010006	Ḇape faro snonkaku ḇeḇye kaḇer kuker Allah, ḇyeknam ro kakyar sena faro Allah. Refoya ikofen radine, "Wakofen awer ro snembri, 'Mansei nari ḇeyekḇe boiyaswaya?' (isoine ḇeyun Kristus fa isabuya,)
45010007	oroḇaido 'Mansei nari ḇesabu ḇemun aiḇuiya?' (isoine ḇekanow Kristus fa dekbur marmarya.)"
45010008	Kakara ani ryadine, "Ḇararyas ro Allah fyanam kaku faro naek srar; isya roi naek srar sḇadon mkoḇena, ma isya roi naek srar sne mkoḇena." Inja wos nkoḇaryas, wos ḇekur kakyarya.
45010009	Snar rofyor naek srar mkokarem kuker sḇadon mkoḇena, mboi, "Yesus Manserendirya," ma naek srar mkokyar ro mkosnemna, mboi Allah ḇyawes Yesus ro marmarya kwar, irya naek srar nari mkosma koreri.
45010010	Snar kuker sneya, snonkaku sikyar Allah, isof Allah nyasiḇe snonkaku ḇeḇye kaḇer kuker Allah. Ma snonkaku skarem kuker sisḇasna isof sisma koreri.
45010011	Ro Refoya sfas radine, "Snonkaku ḇekyar nari simaiḇa."
45010012	Ine ryarirya faro snonkakukam snar rarwas oso isyaḇa fandu kawasa Yahudi ma kawasa er ḇesesyaḇa. Allah oser ani irya Manseren faro kawasakam. Ḇyuk ḇok ḇeḇor syadi faro snonkakukam ḇeyor fafnoḇek faroisya.
45010013	Ro Refo sfas kwar radine, "Snonkakukam ḇeyor Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi, nari sisma koreri."
45010014	Ḇape rariso snonkaku sor Manseren, rofyor sikyar ḇaim? Ma rariso siḇe sikyar faro Manseren, rofyor simnaf Allah ḇaim? Rarirya kako rariso nari simnaf Manseren, rofyor ono sḇaryas faro siḇaim?
45010015	Ma rariso snonkakusya ssun ḇaryas ani, rofyoe sḇeḇewan ḇaim? Ro Refo sfas radine, "Ḇaḇye ḇefnakḇa faro snonkaku ḇerama ḇeyun Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah!"
45010016	Ḇape snonkakukam sna Ankankinem Ḇeḇye aniḇa. Snar Yesaya ikofen, "Manseren, mansei nari ḇekyar ḇaryas inkoḇenanya?"
45010017	I eḇedar snonkaku sikyar snar simnaf ḇararyas ma ḇaryas ani simnafi snar snonkaku ono sisya sḇaryas ro Kristus.
45010018	Ḇape yaḇe yafuken: Inja kaku simnaf ḇaryas ani ḇaimke? Yafawi kaku simnafi kwar! Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Mkaren sena neruran ro supswan ḇesiper, ma wos sena nda kwar isof supna pember."
45010019	Yaḇe yafuken wer: Inja kawasa Israel sifawi ḇaimke? Iḇye syadi fakfuken ine isma kankarem ḇepon ro Moses. Moses ikofen, "Allah ikofen radine, 'Nari yafrur fa mkofafayaf faro er ono yanaḇasya, ma nari yafrur fa mkomsor faro er ono ḇefawi royoḇasya.' "
45010020	Yesaya iḇri syadi wer. Ikofen ḇo doḇo, "Allah ikofen radine, 'Snonkaku ḇesewar ayaḇa, sisrow aya kwar; ma yafasna mankundaya farosi ḇefuken ayaḇasya!' "
45010021	Ḇape faro er Israel Yesaya ikofen ḇo doḇo, "Allah ikofen radine, 'Ras nakam yasu ḇramin ayesuya faro er oso ḇesampum aya ma ḇeḇesyowi ayaḇa.' "
45011001	Yaḇe yafuken: Inja Allah mankundi isawen kawasa ḇyesya kwarke? Roḇa kaku ḇeri! Snar aya ḇardi snon oso ro Israel, Abraham kpu ḇyesi, ma ro keret Benyamin.
45011002	Roḇa! Allah isawen kawasa kyinfir kwar ro randakyansyaḇa. Naek srar mkofawi kwar rosai ḇefas ro Refo fa ḇekur Elia, rofyor ḇyuk safsof ro kawasa Israel faro Allah. Elia ikofen,
45011003	"Manseren, snonkakusya smun nabi-nabi bansi ma simkok rokef ḇekun farsarser faro awna. Yemir monda yakenem ma simarisen siḇe smun aya."
45011004	Rosai Allah kyarem faro Elia? Allah kyarem, "Yafaduru snon syaran rifik faro mankundaya kwar. Ma saksyom faro karwar Baal ḇaim."
45011005	Rarirya kako ro baboine: Allah kyinfir rarwas kasun oso kwar rofandu snonkakusya snar fakamaman ḇyedi.
45011006	Allah kyinfirsi ḇyeknam ro fakamaman ḇyedi mboi ḇyeknam ro fararur senaḇa. Snar rofyor Allah kankinfir ḇyedi ḇyeknam ro snonkakusya fararur sena, nari Allah fakamaman ḇyedi fakamaman ḇekaku risyaḇa.
45011007	Inja, rariso? Kawasa Israelsya sisma rosai ssewaryaḇa. Ḇesmasya isoine rarwas kasun monda Allah kyinfir kwarsya. Ḇesesyakam siḇrusna npakrek faro Allah fararyor ḇyedi.
45011008	Snar ro Refoya sfas radine, "Allah ifrur sne ma swaruser sena fa nedip; ma isof fafisu ine simkasna nmamba ma knaram sena namnafba."
45011009	Daud ikofen kako ḇo doḇo, "Iḇye munara sena nedenem faro mankunsi, ma neder, moḇ sisapi fa semompraf!
45011010	Iḇyekada mamam sena npampan insa smam awer; ma iḇyekada sikrusna nayar isof fyoro-fyoro."
45011011	Yafuken wer: Fafisu kawasa Yahudi sisapiya, inja rarirya insa semomprafke? Roḇaḇeri! Ḇape snar sasar sena, mboi er ḇesesya sisma aski, isof Yahudisya sikram masasor faro er ḇesesya.
45011012	Snar er Yahudi sḇesasar ma siso Allah marisen ḇyenaḇa, inja Allah ḇyeḇok er-er ḇesesya. Isyadi wer rofyor ḇaḇeoser kuker Yahudi iḇye kaḇer wer kuker Allah; nari Allah ḇaḇeḇok ḇyuk faro er-er ansi iba syadi wer!
45011013	Ḇape knikine iḇye yakofen faro naek srar ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya! Fyoro kwar ine, yafararurḇe manwawan faro er-er ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya, snar yaḇe manmin fafaya fararur ayediḇa.
45011014	Yakyar kaku nari yafrur masasor mankundaya er ayedi, insa kuker nyan ine ono rofandusi saksma koreri.
45011015	Snar Allah pyampumsi ro ḇandi, isof ro ḇaḇeoser rofandu supswan ine kuker Allah iḇye kaḇer wer; isyadi wer rofyor Allah nyasi! Mnuk ine imnis raris snonkaku ḇemar ma ḇekenem wer!
45011016	Rofyor mamami mnuk ḇeponya ḇyeḇeḇuk faro Allah kwar, rarirya mamami ḇesiperya ḇyeḇeḇuk kam faro Allah kako. Ma rofyor ai raresna Allah nyana, snaw-snaw ḇyena Allah nyana kako.
45011017	Snaw ono ro zaitun knam -- isoine kawasa Yahudi --sḇeḇekaruk kwar. Ma ro naur snaw skaruk anna, sḇeknof zaitun snaw ḇesurku, isoine naek srar ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya. Naek srar mkoḇe ḇeknof ro dia insa mkakan roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇye ro kankenem Rur kawasa Yahudisya.
45011018	Inja naek srar mkomamkyof awer kawasa skaruk kwar imnis ai snau ansya. Naek srar mkoswarepen, snar ai snawsi mko monda. Ma snawya iḇeḇuk nanan faro raresnaḇa, mboi rares naiso ḇeḇuk nanan faro snawnanya.
45011019	Ḇape naek nari wakofen, "Mboi, ḇape snaw-snaw anna neḇekaruk insa yaḇe ḇeknof ro knamya!"
45011020	Kaku ḇeri. Ḇape sisawensi snar sikyarḇa, mboi naek srar mkokada snamko snar kakyar mkoḇena. Inja naek srar mkomarares awer mko snar mnuk ine; iḇyekada naek srar mkomkak.
45011021	Snar rofyor Allah iswar kawasa Yahudisyaḇa ma isawensi imnis snaw ḇekaku ani, naek srar mko kyar awer nari iswar mko ma isawen mkoba.
45011022	Inja rodine komam Allah ḇaḇye ḇyedi ma Allah ḇaḇepakakrek ḇyedi. Fyasna pakakrek ḇyedi faro kawasa ḇesasar, ḇape iḇye faro naek srar mko -- rofyor naek srar mkokenem faswef ro ḇaḇye ḇyedi. Mboi roḇaido, naek srar mko kako nari sisawen mko.
45011023	Ma faro kawasa Yahudi ansi, rofyor simnai ro kakyarḇa sena, nari seḇena kaḇer wer; snar Allah ipok fa nyakaḇersi wer.
45011024	Naek srar ḇeyakḇe knam ro er Yahudiḇa mkomnis zaitun snaw ḇesurku. Inja, rofyor naek srar, mkosampum rari mkoḇena, nari mkoḇe ḇeknof ro zaitun knam ḇekakuya, rosai wer kuker kawasa Yahudi sḇukmnis kuker snaw ro zaitun knam ḇekakuya. Ikada ipyan syadi fa Allah dun kaḇersi faro zaitun knam sedi wer.
45011025	Naek srar! Yakyar naek srar mkokara awer ḇo mkoḇo mkofawi roi ḇeborkam kwar. Snar Allah imarisen roi oso, ḇape snonkakusya sifawi i ḇaim. Ma yamarisen insa naek srar mkofawi i; isoine: Ono ro kawasa Yahudi siḇrusna npakrek, ḇape fararur ḇeradine nari nambran rao isof dandonek kawasa ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇa ḇerama faro Allah simnis resari.
45011026	Raimnai kawasa Yahudisya nari sisma koreri. Snar ro Refo sfas radine, "Wairek Manfaspar beyun koreriya nari ryama ro Sion; i nari ḇepyos ḇarḇor ḇeborkam ro Yakub kpu ḇyesi.
45011027	Nari yafesepen si kuker asas ine rofyor yaḇe yapyos sasar sena."
45011028	Snar kawasa Yahudi simewer sakna Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah, rarirya sembroḇ Allah; ma kuker nyan ḇeradine, ḇyuk fainda faro naek srar ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya. Ḇape snar Allah kyinfirsi kwar, inja Allah iswar faswefsi snar up sesi.
45011029	Snar rofyor Allah kyinfir snonkaku ma ḇyeḇoksi, Allah iyer kaḇer rosai ifrur kwar naḇa.
45011030	Fyor iwara naek srar mkoḇesyowi Allahḇa. Ḇape baboine Allah fyasna mboi naek srar mkosma ḇaḇemkei ro sasar, snar kawasa Yahudi sesyowiḇa.
45011031	Rarirya kako faro kawasa Yahudi ansi. Fafisu ine sesyowi Allahḇa, insa naek srar sfasnaḇadir mkoḇe mkei ro sasar na. Ḇape nari si kako sfasnaḇadir si ḇesma ḇaḇemkei ro sasar na.
45011032	Snar Allah myam monda ḇo papoik ḇaḇeuserḇaya nya kawasa ḇeborkam, insa fyasna saswar ḇyedi farosi kam.
45011033	Kaku ḇeri Allah arasa ḇyena naba! Kaku ḇeri fawawinananem ḇyena naba! Manseiso nari ḇekukeḇ rosai dawos namuk na? Manseiso nari befawi nyan byuk fararurya?
45011034	Ro Refo sfas radine, "Manseiso ḇefawi Manseren swaruser ḇyena? Manseiso nari ḇeḇuk ananun faroi?
45011035	Manseiso bebuk kwar roi oso faro Manseren isof iḇe dor munsu ro na?"
45011036	Allah ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor nakam. Nakam neknam ro Allah ma Allah i ḇenananya. Sanandik faro Allah isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin.
45012001	Naek srar! Allah ḇaḇye ḇyedi ibakaku maḇeko. Eḇedari yor kaku ḇeri insa naek srar mkoḇuk mankunmkoḇe farsarser ḇekenem oso ḇardi faro Allah ḇefrur sneprei Allah kada. Ikada ḇaḇeari ḇekakuya.
45012002	Mkoso awer nyan famfnom ro supswan ine. Naek buk mankundaw fa Allah ifrur fa babo wer, insa beḇesadwer. Rarirya naek wafawi Allah marisen ḇyena -- isoine rosai ḇeḇye ma ḇefrur sneprei Allah ma ḇemnis.
45012003	Allah ḇyuk fakamaman ḇyedi kwar maḇe aya. Eḇedari yanun naek srar mkokam: Mkoḇaḇir mankunmko mkokaki syadi awer ro roi ḇekakuna. Iḇye syadi naek kwara ma rwun mankundaw; oser-oser kyara mankundi, imnis raris Allah kakyar ḇyuk faroiya.
45012004	Baken koḇena nna kina nabor. Kina oser-oser fararur ḇyedi isya ḇardi.
45012005	Rarirya kuker ko kako, kobor rariso wer, ḇape koḇe baken oser snar koḇe oser kuker Kristus. Ma koḇe oser kuker ḇesesya, raris kina ro baken oser.
45012006	Ko oser-oser nya fakamaman ḇesisye. Fakamaman anna Allah ḇyuk na maḇeko raris saswar ḇyedi. Rarirya kona fakamaman anna. Snonkaku ḇena fakamaman fa ḇeḇaryas Allah wos ḇyena, snonkaku ani ḇyardi ḇararyas ro Allah raris kakyar ismaya.
45012007	Snonkaku ḇena fakamaman fa ḇefnoḇek snonkaku ḇese, snonkaku ani ifnoḇek kaku ḇeri snonkaku ḇese kuker kaku. Snonkaku ḇena fakamaman fa ḇeḇuk farkarkor, iḇyekada ḇyuk farkarkor kuker kaku.
45012008	Snonkaku ḇena fakamaman fa ḇeḇuk wos raryaḇ faro snonkaku ḇese, kaku ḇeri snonkaku ani ḇyuk wos raryaḇ faro snonkaku ḇese. Snonkaku ḇena fakamaman fa ḇeḇuk faro snonkaku ḇese rosai nyana, snonkaku ani ifrur fararur ani kuker snemura kuker napnapes. Snonkaku ḇena fakamaman fa ḇyemanfarkin, kaku ḇeri snonkaku ani ḇyemanfarkin ḇekaku ma ḇemyaren kada. Snonkaku ḇena fakamaman fa ḇefasna saswar faro snonkaku ḇese, snonkaku ani ifrur fararur ani kuker marisen.
45012009	Mkosaswar kuker sne ḇenapes. Mkayin roi ḇeḇarḇor na, ma mkoserepen mko ro roi ḇeḇye.
45012010	Iḇye syadi naek srar mkoswar yae mko oser ḇe oser imnis manbekanaek ro kina oser, ma iḇyekada oser-oser iwarpon min ḇyedi ro ḇaḇearooya.
45012011	Mkofararur kuker mayaryaren. Mkopapum awer. Mkofararur faro Manseren kuker raryaḇ ro Allah Rur ḇyedi.
45012012	Naek srar mkokyar faro Manseren kuker raryaḇ, ma mkokḇaḇ ro ḇaḇekandera, ma mkofarmku ro nadiya.
45012013	Mkofnoḇek mnis ḇaḇefandun ro snonkaku ḇekyar faro Allah ma mkorepen si kuker sne ḇemarisen ro rum mkoḇena.
45012014	Mkor faro Allah insa ḇyeḇok snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor faro mkonsya. Mboi, mkor fa Allah ḇyeḇoksi, ma mkofras awersi.
45012015	Mkoryaḇ fnoḇek snonkaku ḇeryaḇsya, ma mkokanes fnoḇek snonkaku ḇekanes.
45012016	Mkokenem kuker ḇaḇeoser rofandu mko. Mkokara awer roi ḇekakibur fawawi mkoḇena, ḇape mkorun mankun mko faro roi ḇekur kankenem ras-ras. Mboi mkokara mkofawi syadi awer!
45012017	Rofyor ono sifrur sasar faro naek srar mkoido, mkomunsu awer na kuker ḇarḇor. Mboi mkofrur rosai snonkakusyakam skara ḇeḇyena.
45012018	Ro ḇar mkoḇedi, mkosewar fa mkokenem kuker aski faro snonkakusya kam.
45012019	Naek srar yesi! Mkomunsu awer swarapepen mkadu, snar Allah nari ḇeḇuk samamyaiya. Snar ro Refo sfas radine, "Ayaiso nari ḇemunsuya. Ayaiso nari ḇeḇuk samamyaiya, ine Manseren wos ḇyedi."
45012020	Iḇyekada fan mbroḇ besi rofyor sibiser; ma buk aninem farosi, rofyor simbrow. Snar wafrur rarirya, irya wafrur mamyaisi.
45012021	Mkomam monda ḇo ḇarḇorya kyafyo awer mko, mboi iḇyekada naek srar mkokafyo ḇarḇorya kuker ḇaḇyeya.
45013001	Snonkaku oser-oser nari ḇyeyuser faro ḇesasosersya, snar ḇesasoser oso isma papoik ro Allah. Ma ḇesasoser ro baboine, Allah i ḇeḇuk na.
45013002	Eḇedari snonkaku ḇesampum ḇesasosersya, imnis isampum rosai Allah ḇyuk kwar na. Ma manseiso ḇefrur rarirya nari isma samamyai.
45013003	Snar snonkaku ḇefrur roi ḇeḇye simkak ḇesasosersyaḇa. Mboi snonkaku ḇefrur roi ḇeḇarḇor sikada simkak. Rofyor naek srar mkokara insa mkomkak awer ḇesasosersya, naek srar mkofrur roi ḇeḇye, rarirya nari naek srar mkosma sanandik.
45013004	Snar ḇesasoserya Allah manfamyan ḇyedirya ḇefararur faro naek srar mko fa mkosma ḇaḇye. Ḇape rofyor naek srar mkofrur ḇarḇorido nari mkomkak faroi, mboi isma papoik fa ḇyuk samamyai faro snonkaku waworek mondaḇa. Ikada Allah manfamyan ḇyedirya fa ḇyuk samamyai faro snonkaku ḇefrur ḇarḇorsya.
45013005	Eḇedari naek srar mkoḇeyuser faro ḇesasoserya -- snar mkomewer mkosma samamyai mondaḇa, ḇape snar kakara mkoḇena kako.
45013006	I ḇeḇeknam kako fa snaro naek srar mkoḇak som, snar ḇesasoser Allah manfamyan ḇyedirya insa ifrur ḇardi fararur ani.
45013007	Inja bak faro ḇesasoserya, rosai nari bak faroi. Bak som, rofyor sor som ro naek srar mko, ma mkomkak faro mansei fandun fa mkobak farosya; ma mkoḇesyowi faro mansei ḇesma syowisya.
45013008	Mkoḇenyaki awer roi oso faro manseirya kako, ḇape iḇyekada mkoswaryae mko. Snar snonkaku ḇeswar min snonkaku ḇese, ikada ifrur mnis Allah sasoser ḇyena, Moses ḇyuk kwar na.
45013009	Snar sasoser agama Yahudi, isoine: Wafrur farbuk awer; mamun awer; kwaraw awer; warmomen oso ḇese nana ḇyena awer; nakam nafnoḇek sasoser ḇese, nanekam ne sasoser oser monda, isoine, "Waswar min snonkaku ḇese, imnis waswar mankundaw."
45013010	Snonkaku ḇeswar faro snonkaku ḇesesya, nari sifrur ḇarḇor faro snonkaku ansiḇa. Inja snonkaku ḇeswar min sesya sikda sifrur mnis sasoser agamaya kwar.
45013011	Roiḇese ro nanekam mkofawi mboi rofafisu ine, fafisu faro naek srar mko fa mkokḇok ro anenef. Snar fafisu faro kosma askiya fyanam syadiḇe ko kwar rofafisu randak kokyarya.
45013012	Roḇya fyanam isyonde kwar; ma kniko monda meser. Inja, iḇye komnai ro fararur ḇepampan. Mboi kofasos mankunko kuker romamun isnaya.
45013013	Iḇye kofrur roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇeawnos, imnis raris roi kofrur ro isnaya; ma kofrur munara ḇeba syadi awer, isof komser. Roḇaido kofrur farbuk awer, roḇa rari ḇeḇeawnosḇa awer. Komamun awer, roḇa kardu masasor awer.
45013014	Iḇye Manseren Yesus Kristus i ḇefasna rosai naek srar mkoḇe mkofrur na. Ma mkoso awer rari snonkaku ḇesasar fa mkoso rmomen mkoḇena awer.
45014001	Snonkaku kakyar ḇedworenḇasya mkonasi kuker ḇaḇye rofandu naek srar. Mkorakrakrok awer kukersi snar swaruser sena.
45014002	Snonkaku ono skara sima san famfnom monda. Ḇape snonkaku ono ḇese kakyar sena nadworenḇa; inja skara sima san wei monda.
45014003	Snonkaku ḇeyan famfnom, skoryaye awer snonkaku ḇeyakan famfnomḇasya; ma snonkaku ḇeyan famfnomḇasya, skoryaye awer snonkaku ḇeyan famfnomsya, snar Allah nyasikam kwar.
45014004	Manseiso naek srar isof mkoḇe mkoḇemankara snonkaku ḇesesya manfamyan sesi? Manfamyan ani isapi roḇa dores afuf, ikada tuan ḇyedi nari ḇekara faroi. Ma manfamyan ani nari dores afuf, snar Manseren iso ḇepok ḇeḇawesi fa dores afufya.
45014005	Snonkaku ono skara ras ono nefandun syadi ro ras ḇesena, ḇape snonkaku ono ḇese wer skara rasras anna namniskam monda. Iḇye snonkaku oser-oser kyara raris mankundi kakara ḇyena.
45014006	Snonkaku ḇekara ras ono nbefandun syadi, snonkaku ansi skara rarirya faro sikḇesyowi Manseren. Snonkaku ḇeyan famfnom ansya, sifrur rarirya fa sikḇesyowi Manseren, ma sikofen kasumasa faro Allah snar roḇean anna. Rarirya kako faro snonkaku ḇeyan famfnomḇa ansi; snonkaku ansi kako sḇesyowi Manseren ma sikofen kasumasa faro Allah.
45014007	Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ro ko, ikenem faro mankundi; ma snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ro ko ḇemar faro mankundi.
45014008	Rofyor kokenem, kokenem faro Manseren, ma rofyor komar, komar kako faro Manseren. Inja, kankenem roḇa marmarya, Manseren iso ḇenakonya.
45014009	Kristus imar kwar ma ikenem kaḇer wer. Eḇedari ḇye Manseren faro snonkaku ḇekenemsya ma faro snonkaku ḇemar kwarsya kako.
45014010	Inja, naek srar! Rosai eḇedari mkoḇuk sasar faro naek srar mkoḇesi ḇena kakyar oser? Ma rosai eḇedari naek srar mkorun naek srar mkoḇesi? Kokam nari kosma mankara ro ḇarpon Allah.
45014011	Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Manseren ikofen, kaku ḇeri, snonkaku oser-oser nari ḇyansuba ro ḇarpon ayedi; ma snonkaku oser-oser nari kyarem mboi Allah risaya."
45014012	Inja kokam oser-oser nari kyarem fararur ḇeḇor ḇyena faro Allah.
45014013	Snar rarirya koḇuk sasaryaye awer. Mboi naek srar koḇesewar insa kofrur awer roi oso, ḇefrur fa naek ḇena kakyar oser isma fafrowes ma isapi ro sasar.
45014014	Snar yaḇeoser kuker Manseren Yesus, inja yakyar kaku roi osoḇaḇeri fa ifrur ayin; ḇape roi ani ifrur ayin faro snonkaku oser-oser rofyor kyara iḇe roi ḇefrur ayin.
45014015	Ḇape rofyor naek wan roi oso ḇefrur fa naek ḇena kakyar oser imsor, rarirya wakenem kuker saswar werḇa. Rofyor Yesus imar kwar snar snonkaku oso, mam monda ḇo imar awer snar roi wan na.
45014016	Inja mam monda awer roi ḇeḇye faro aw, ḇape snonkaku ḇese skara naḇe roi ḇeḇyeḇa.
45014017	Snar ro Allah ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, rosai snonkakusya san ma sinem, naiso ḇeḇefandun wer naḇa. Mboi roi ḇeḇefandun kakuya isoine, snonkakusya siso user Allah marisen ḇyedi, fa sisma aski ma marisen ḇeba Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk farosi kwarya.
45014018	Snonkaku ḇeyuffarmyan Yesus rarirya, sifrur sneprei Allah, ma sisma syowi ro snonkaku ḇesesya.
45014019	Rarirya komarisen kokenem ro ḇaḇeoser ma kofarkoryaye ko.
45014020	Ma snar roḇean, nafnai fa naek kwakok awer, rosai Allah ifrur kwar na. Roḇean nakam nasren fa neḇeyan; ḇape rosai wan fa ḇefnai snonkaku ḇese fa sisapi ro sasar, rarirya naek swasar.
45014021	Iḇye syadi wan awer manfnai roḇa winem awer anggur roḇa wafrur rosai wer, rofyor nafrur fa naek oso ḇena kakyar oser ḇyesasar.
45014022	Mboi rosai naek wakyarya, wafruri ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi monda faro mankundaw ḇardi. Snonkaku ḇeḇaḇir knam osoḇa fa ḇyesasar faro roi skara ḇekaku, snon ani isma aski.
45014023	Ḇape snonkaku ḇekara ma ḇeḇe ḇirḇar ḇeyan roi oso, ḇape ḇarpurya dan roḇeyan ani, Allah ḇyuk sasar faroi; snar snon ani ifrur mnis kakyar ḇyedi faro Allahḇa. Ma rosairya wer ifrur kuker kakyarḇa, irya syasar.
45015001	Ḇesma kakyar ḇesambraḇ koya faro Allah, nari kokḇaḇser sano-sano ro snonkaku kakyar ḇesambraḇ ḇasya. Ma kofrur marisen mankunko ḇardi awer.
45015002	Inja kono oser-oser ifrur marisen naek srar koḇesi faro ḇaḇye sena, insa kakyar sena faro Allah nsambraḇ syadi wer.
45015003	Snar Kristus kako kyara raryaḇ faro mankundi ḇardiḇa. Ro Refoya sfas radine, "Anonef ḇeḇor ssḇuk faro mko nkur aya kwar."
45015004	Fas-fas ro Refoya kam insa nfarkor ko. Snar farkarkor kosma ro Refoya nafrur fa kodworen ma kosambraḇ isof kokyar faro Allah.
45015005	Iḇyekada Allah, ḇyuk ḇaḇekaḇaḇ ma sneprei faro snonkaku ḇefnoḇek naek srar mko, insa mkokenem kuker ḇaḇesne oser, ma mkoso nyan ro Yesus Kristus.
45015006	Kuker sne oser, mko kam mkosandik Allah Kma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus.
45015007	Inja iḇye naek srar mkoḇesyowiyae mko kuker marisen, imnis raris Kristus kako dakna mko fa mkosandik Allah.
45015008	Inja mkoswarepen, mboi Kristus duffarmyan kawasa Yahudi kwar fa fyasna mboi nari Allah ifrurmnis asas-asas ḇyena faro up koḇesi.
45015009	Yesus ifrur faro er-er ḇese kako fa sisandik Allah, snar saswar ḇyedi farosi. Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Snar rarirya nari yasandik au rofandu er-ersya, ma nari yadisen sandik snonsnon bedi."
45015010	Snar sfas radine wer, "Mkoryaḇ fnoḇek Allah kawasa kyinfirsya, ne, er-er kam!"
45015011	Ma ine wer kako, "Mkosandik Allah, ne, er-er kam, iḇyekada snonkaku kam mkosandiki!"
45015012	Ma Yesaya ikofen kako radine, "Ro Isai kpu ḇyesi nari snon oso isasyar ma nari ḇyuk sasoser faro er-er kam; ma er-er kam nari sikyar faroi."
45015013	Allah knam ro naek srar kakyar mkoḇena. Rarirya ifrur fa naek srar mkosma marisen ḇeba ma aski, snar mkokyar faroi, insa kuker Allah Rur papoik ḇyedi, naek srar mkokyar syadi wer faro Allah.
45015014	Naek srar ayesi! Yafawi mboi roi ḇeḇye nabor kaku naisya ro mko. Naek srar mko kako mkofawi nakam, ma mkoḇukna nfarkoryae mko.
45015015	Ḇape yamarisen yaḇuk swarepen ro roi ono faro mko kaker ro syap ine; snar Allah ḇyuk kwar maro aya fararur ine.
45015016	Allah ḇyuk kwar fa yaḇe manfamyan ro Yesus Kristus, ma iwan aya faro er-er ḇese ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya, ma yafararur imnis imam, ḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah, insa kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya simnis farsarser oso faro Allah ma Allah nyasi. Iḇyekada Allah Rur ḇyedi ifrur fa sḇefarsarser oso faro Allah.
45015017	Inja, snar yaḇe oser kwar kuker Yesus Kristus, inja yamsik kuker fararur ayedi faro Allah.
45015018	Yamsik ḇo yawos rarirya ro rosai Yesus ifrur kuker aya kwar fa yafararur faro kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya, insa sḇeyuser Allah. Yafrur rarirya kuker wos ma fararur,
45015019	ma kuker aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor; nakam ndarirya snar papoik ro Allah Rur ḇyedi. Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Kristus yaḇaryas nakam faro snonkaku, randak ro Yerusalem isof ro Ilirikum.
45015020	Marisen ayedi isoine yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah ro moḇ kawasa sakmnaf Kristus ḇaim. Snar yamewer yaḇawes fararur ro snon ḇese araref senandi.
45015021	Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Snonkaku beyaksma bararyas ro i ḇaim, nari smam; ma snonkaku beyakmnaf ḇaim, nari sifawi."
45015022	Yawḇe rarwan ono kwar fa yaḇe yarakaki naek srar mko, ḇape roi ono nadadwarek aya.
45015023	Ḇape baboine fararur ayena ro supya mnuk ine, naḇro kwar. Wampasi wambarek ono, yamarisen yarakaki naek srar mko.
45015024	Nari rofyor marandan ayedi yaraḇe sup Spanyol, yunuk ro mnu mkoḇedi, yakyar nari yasrow mko kuker marisen. Posa kwar yakyar nari mkofnoḇek aya ro marandan ayedi ḇe Spanyol.
45015025	Ḇape baboine yamarisen yun famfnoḇek faro kawasa Allah ḇyesi ro Yerusalem.
45015026	Snar jemaat-jemaat ro Makedonia ma Akhaya sawos namuk kwar fa siryur famfnoḇek faro naek srar kawasa ḇesaḇarar rofandu Allah kawasa ḇyesi ro Yerusalem.
45015027	Siwos namuk kwar fa simarisen sifrur rarirya. Mboi snonkaku ansi nari sifnoḇek naek srar ḇesaḇarar ro Yerusalem ansi; snar kawasa Yahudisya eḇedari kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya sisma ḇok ro Allah. Inja, kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya kako nari sifnoḇek kawasa Yahudisya kuker arasa sena sisma ro supswan ine.
45015028	Rofyor yafrur posa fararur ayedi kwar, isoine yun famfnoḇek siryur anna faro kawasa ro Yerusalem kwar, nari yara ḇe Spanyol yunuk ro mnu mkoḇedi.
45015029	Rofyor yara fa kwar, nari yaḇedar ḇok nabor ro Kristus faro mko.
45015030	Kuker Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, ma kuker saswar ro Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk na, yor kaku faro naek srar, insa mkakḇenadiwarek aya faro Allah.
45015031	Mkoḇenadi insa Allah fyaspar ayabur kawasa ḇekyarḇa ro Yudeasya, insa yun famfnoḇek ḇe Yerusalem faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi rodia insa sisma na kuker marisen.
45015032	Ma rofyor Allah imarisen, nari yaramufa yasrow mko kuker marisen. Ma nari yasma sneprei rofandu mko.
45015033	Allah ḇeḇeknam askiya ifnoḇek mko kam! Amin.
45016001	Yamarisen yakofen ḇadir srar koḇedi, Febe. Ifnoḇek jemaat ro Kengkrea.
45016002	Mkonai imnis snonkaku oso rofandu Manseren kawasa ḇyesi. Mboi rarirya kawasa ḇekyar faro Allah snayae si. Mkofnoḇeki rofyor ḇyefandun famfnoḇek ro mko, snar i ḇardi ifnoḇek snonkaku sibor kwar ma aya kako.
45016003	Mkokofen ḇadir aroo ayena faro Priska ma Akwila, min ayesi ḇefararurkam faro Yesus Kristus.
45016004	Indokada simar sadwer aya, snar simarisen sfaspar aya. Yakofen kasumasa farosi -- ma yererḇa ḇoi, jemaat-jemaat er ḇese ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya kako sikofen kasumasa faro su.
45016005	Mkokofen aroo ayena kako faro jemaat ḇefanjur ro rum subedi. Aroo faro Epenetus yaswar kaku. Iso bekyar randak faro Kristus ro sup Asia.
45016006	Aroo ayena kako faro Maria. Snar ifararur sambraḇ kaku faro mko kwar.
45016007	Mkokofen ḇadir aroo ayena kako faro Andronikus ma Yunias. Sukada su ḇekeret ma er oser kuker aya ma su yaksun bui kwar fnoḇek aya. Rofyor yakyar faro Kristus ḇaim, sukada sukyar ḇepon kwar. Manwawansya sifawikam su.
45016008	Aroo faro Ampliatus, yaswar kaku ani snar i kuker aya nuḇe oser kwar kuker Manseren.
45016009	Mkokofen jow ayena faro Urbanus, min koḇedi ḇefararur fnoḇek ko faro Kristus. Ma jow ayena kako faro Stakhis yaswar kaku ani.
45016010	Aroo faro Apeles. Snar ḇaḇeyuser ḇyena faro Kristus nbair kwar. Aroo kako faro Aristobulus kina ḇyesi,
45016011	ma faro Herodion. I kuker aya nuna keret ma er oser. Aroo kako faro naek srar ḇena kakyar oser ro Narkisus kina ḇyesi.
45016012	Aroo ayena kako faro Trifena ma Trifosa ḇefararur sambraḇ kaku ro afuffarmyan faro Manseren, ma faro Persis yaswar kaku ani. I kako ifararur sambraḇ faro Manseren kwar.
45016013	Aroo faro Rufus ma snari, imnis sna ayedirya kako. Rufus snonkaku Manseren kyinfir ma ḇesma sanandik rirya.
45016014	Mkokofen ḇadir aroo ayena faro Asinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas ma kawasa kam ḇesma kakyar oser fnoḇeksi.
45016015	Aroo faro Filologus ma Yulia; faro Nereus ma srar ḇyedi; faro Olimpas ma faro snonkaku ḇekyar fnoḇeksya kam.
45016016	Mkoḇe arooyae mko kuker saswar, imnis naek Kristus. Kristus Jemaat-jemaat ḇyenakam sikofen aroo sena faro naek srar.
45016017	Naek srar! Yor kaku ḇeri mkoḇesasor mko ro snonkaku ḇefarkor ninyan ma ḇefrowes mko ro kakyar mkoḇena faro Manseren. Roi ḇerarirya, nasampum farkarkor ssḇuk kwar faro mko. Mkoḇinkwanbur snonkaku ansi.
45016018	Snar snonkaku ḇefrur rarirya ansi sifararur faro Kristus Manseren koḇediḇa, mboi sifararur faro rmomen mankunsi sena monda. Kuker ḇaḇyuk ma wosman sḇeankar snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇasya.
45016019	Snonkaku sifawikam kwar, mboi mkomarisen faro farkarkor ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah. Ma yamarisen snar roi ḇerarirya faro mko. Yamarisen insa naek srar mkofawinanem ro roi ḇeḇye ma mkofawi royoḇa ro roi ḇeḇarḇor na.
45016020	Allah ḇeḇuk aski faro snonkaku, nari ḇyuk papoik faro mko fa mkoḇuki dawef Ibirisya. Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok naek srar mko ḇesya kwarkada!
45016021	Min ayedi Timotius, ḇyuk aroo faro naek srar. Rarirya kako Lukius, Yason ma Sosipater, ḇeḇekeret ma er oser kuker aya.
45016022	Befas syap ine aya Tertius. Yakofen aroo faro naek srar mko.
45016023	Gayus fyarem aroo faro naek srar. Yaḇeryar ro rum ḇyedi ma nkoḇeari ro rum ḇyedi kako. Erastus ḇeḇe ḇukor ro ḇaḇepipi ro mnuya, fyarem aroo faro naek srar. Rarirya kako naek kobedi Kwartus. [
45016024	Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok naek srar, mko ḇesya kwarkada. Amin!]
45016025	Sanandik faro Allah! Ikada ipok ḇyuk samambraḇ ma kakyar faro naek srar imnis Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah yaḇaryas kwar ro Yesus Kristus. Yaḇaryas ḇararyas ani imnis rosai Allah fyasna kwar; isoine roi Allah daw kwar ro wampasi wambarek utin-utin snonkaku sifawiḇa.
45016026	Ḇape baboine raris Allah sasoser ḇyedi, aw ani ḇyeḇefasna ma ḇyeḇeḇaryas faro er-er kam kuker fas-fas ro nabi-nabisya, insa sikam sikyar ma sisoyuser Allah.
45016027	Ikada Allah oser monda befawinanem syadi. Iḇyekada mkobesyowi Allah, isof fyoro-fyoro ro Yesus Kristus! Amin. Ro aya, Paulus, manfamyan ro Yesus Kristus
46001001	-
46001003	Naek srar Allah jemaat ḇyedi ro Korintus, Allah dor kwar fa ḇeḇe kawasa ḇyesi snar Yesus Kristus i ḇena mko, fnoḇek kawasakam ro moḇ rosairyawer ḇeḇesyowi Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, isoine Manseren mkoḇedi ma Manseren koḇedi kako. Aya, Paulus, ma naek koḇedi Sostenes, nkokyar Allah Kma koḇedi, ma Manseren Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok ma ḇyuk aski faro mko. Yafas syap ine imnis wawan ro Yesus Kristus, Allah mankundi ikanow raris marisen ḇyedi kako.
46001004	Yakofen kasumasa ḇesyakwar faro Allah snar naek srar mko, snar mkosma kwar fakamaman Allah ḇerama ro Yesus Kristus.
46001005	Snar Kristus nya naek srar mko kwar, inja naek srar kankenem mkoḇena nafo kuker roi ḇeborkam. Fawawi naek srar mkoḇena ro roiḇebor anna nakaki kaku, ma naek srar mkofawi mkoḇuk farkarkor kuker fawawi anna.
46001006	Naiso ḇefnai mboi ḇararyas ro Kristus nakom ro mkosnemna kwar,
46001007	isof naek srar mkananjar ḇok osoḇa, rofyor naek srar mkowaf Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ryamuma ma nari kawasakam smami.
46001008	Kristus mankundi nari fyaduru naek srar mko isof ro ḇarpurya; insa rofyor ryama werya, isrow mko kuker fasasos ḇemnis.
46001009	Mkokyar nako faro Allah. Allah iso ḇeyor mko kwar fa mko ḇeoser kuker Rumkun ḇyedi, isoine Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
46001010	Naek srar! Kuker snonsnon ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, yor insa mkona wos oser; insa anunḇesisye isya rofandu mko awer. Iḇye wer naek srar mkoḇe oser ro kakara mkoḇena.
46001011	Snar naek srar ono ro Kloë kina ḇyedi, sikofen ḇadir kwar maḇe aya, rakrakrok rofandu mko.
46001012	Roi yakaraya isoine, rofandu mko ono sikofen ḇo soḇo, "Yaso Paulus," ono sikofen ḇo soḇo, "Yaso Apolos," ono wer sikofen ḇo soḇo, "Yaso Petrus," ono ḇese wer, sikofen ḇo soḇo, "Yaso Kristus."
46001013	Inja Kristus ḇyeḇerarwasḇa! Paulus imar ro aprop faro mkoḇa! Naek srar mkosma masi sren fa mkoso Paulusḇa, inke?
46001014	Kasumasa snar yaḇuk masi sren faro snonkaku oso rofandu mkoḇa, mboi Krispus ma Gayus suyerer.
46001015	Imbude snonkaku oso ikofen ḇo doḇo yaḇuk masi sren faroi fa insa iso aya. (
46001016	Oo, kaku! Stefanus ma kina ḇyesi kada, ayai ḇeḇuk masi sren farosiya. Ḇape ḇese rosi, imnis swarepen ayedi, yaḇuk masi sren faro oso werḇa.)
46001017	Kristus iwan aya fa yaḇuk masi sren faro snonkakuḇa, mboi insa yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah; ma ine kako nari yafruri kuker fawawi ro wos snonkakuḇa, insa papoik ro marmar Kristus ro apropya ḇyefromoḇa.
46001018	Ḇaryas ro Kristus marmar ḇyedi ro apropya, ḇyeḇemamkirḇa faro snonkaku nari Allah ḇyuk samamyai farosya. Ḇape, faro ko, snonkaku ḇesma koreri ro Allah, ḇararyas ani papoik ro Allah.
46001019	Snar ro Refo ikofen radine, "Fawawi ro snonkaku ḇemamkarkirsya nari yararḇarenna, ma ḇaḇefawawinanem ro snonkaku ḇefawisya, nari yaḇena fa napromes."
46001020	Inja, fainda rosai ro snonkaku ḇemamkarkirsya? Fainda rosai ro ḇefawinanem ansi? Fainda rosai ro ḇefawinananem kakara ro awar ine? Allah fyasna kwar snonkaku ḇemamkarkirsya nari sifawi royoḇaḇeri!
46001021	Snar fawawi snonkaku sena rariso wer, smambir Allahḇa kuker fawawi mankunsi ḇardi. Ḇape snar Allah myamkarkir, inja imarisen ḇyuk koreri faro snonkaku ḇekyar faroisya snar ḇaryas supswan ine skara ma smamkirḇa ani.
46001022	Kawasa Yahudisya sor aḇyair kanandor ḇefasasnai, ma kawasa Yunanisya ssewari ro fawawi supswan ine.
46001023	Ḇape koine koḇaryas monda ro Kristus ḇemar ro aprop. Ḇaryas ani ifrur masasor faro kawasa Yahudisya. Ma kawasa ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya skara ma smamkirḇa ani.
46001024	Ḇape faro snonkaku Allah dor kwarsya iḇye kawasa Yahudisya, iḇye kako kawasa ḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya -- ḇararyas ani irya papoik Allah ma fawawi ro Allah.
46001025	Snar rosai ḇefasna fawawiḇa ro Allah, ikada ifawi syadi ro ḇaḇefawawi ro snonkaku; ma roi komam ḇepokḇa ro Allah, ikada syambraḇ syadi ro samambraḇ snonkaku.
46001026	Naek srar! Indo mkoswarepen rariso rari mkoḇena, rofyor Allah dor mko. Ma ono rofandu mko si ḇefawinanem, roḇa ḇesma papoik, roḇa ḇesma nasan ḇekaki ro mamam snonkaku.
46001027	Snar rarirya Allah kyinfir rosai supswan ine skaraḇe ḇaḇefawawiḇa, insa snonkaku ḇefawi nanemsya simai.
46001028	Allah kyinfir rosai snonkakusya skaraḇe ḇekaryonḇa, waworek, ma isyadi wer supswan ine skaraḇe ḇeḇefandunḇa, insa Allah kyakok rosai snonkakusya sesyowina.
46001029	Rarirya snonkaku osoḇaḇeri imarares mankundi ro ḇarpon Allah.
46001030	Allah mankundi iso ḇefrur fa naek srar mkoḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus. Allah ḇyuk Kristus maḇe ko, insa fawawinanem koḇena nmambir ro Kristus. Snar Kristus ḇefrur fa koḇye kaḇer wer kuker Allah, ma ifrur ko fa koḇe kawasa faro Allah. Kristus iso ḇefasparko.
46001031	Inja, rarirya, imnis sfas ro Refo radine, "Snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇemarares sya, iḇye syadi simarares si kuker rosai Allah ifrur na."
46002001	Naek srar! Rofafisu yaramufa ḇe mko, ma yaḇaryas faro mko ro Allah aw ḇyena, supswan ine rosai sifawi ḇaim na, yawawos kuker fawawi snonkakuḇa. Yawawos kuker fawawi supswan ineḇa kako.
46002002	Snar yakara namuk kwar mboi rofyor ayaisya fnoḇek mko, nari yawawos ro roi onoḇa, mboi roi ḇekur Yesus Kristus marmar ḇyedi ro apropya.
46002003	Rofafisu ayaisya kuker mko, yaryarḇa ma yamkakḇo yaradai.
46002004	Ḇape ḇararyas yaḇaryas faro naek srar, yaḇaryas na kuker fawawi snonkakuḇa. Mboi yaḇaryas na kuker nyan ḇeḇair papoik ro Allah Rur ḇyedi monda. Naek srar mkomam roi nane kwar.
46002005	Yafrur rarirya insa kakyar naek srar mkoḇena faro Allah nḇeknam ro fawawi snonkakuḇa, mboi nḇeknam ro Allah papoik ḇyedi.
46002006	Inja rariso wer, rofandu kankenem snonkaku rur sena nsambraḇ kwar, sikada yawawos ro ḇaḇefawawinanemya. Ḇape ḇaḇefawawinanem ine ḇaḇefawawinanem ro supswanḇa, oroḇaido ḇaḇefawawinanem bena papoik ro awar ine, nari papoik sena napromes.
46002007	Ḇape fawawi nanem yakofen inekada ḇaḇefawawinanem ro Allah. Ḇaḇefawawinanem ani supswan ine sifawi iḇa ma iyokef, ḇape Allah fyasosi kwar, faro ḇaḇeaski koḇedi, ḇepon ro supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya.
46002008	Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ro ḇeyuf papoik ro awar ine sifawi ḇaḇefawawinanem ineḇa. Snar rofyor sifawi ikada, nari spaiepen Manseren ḇeḇye syadi aniḇa.
46002009	Ḇape snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Faro snonkaku ḇeswar Allah, Allah fyasos roi ono kwar snonkakusya smam roḇa simnaf ḇaim ro snonkaku, ma nek ḇaim ro snonkaku sisnesna."
46002010	Ḇape Allah fyasna na kwar maḇe ko, kuker Rur ḇyedi. Allah Rur ḇyedi kyukeḇ roiḇebor kam, isof ro Allah aw ḇyena ḇeyokef kako.
46002011	Snar ḇefawi kankenem snonkaku isoine rur snonkaku ani bardi, inke? Rarirya faro Allah kako. Ḇefawi Allah kankenem ḇyedi isoine Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇardi!
46002012	Ma Allah ḇyuk ḇeko, rur ro supswan ineḇa mboi Allah Rur ḇyedi, insa kofawi roiḇebor kam Allah ḇyukma ḇeko na.
46002013	Rarirya, rofyor nkoḇaryas roi ḇekur Allah, faro snonkaku ḇena Allah Rur ḇyedi, nkoḇaryas imnis kakara snonkakuḇa, mboi nkoso Allah Rur ḇyedi moḇ fyarkor raya.
46002014	Snonkaku ḇena Allah Rur ḇyediḇa, nari saksma rosai Rurya fyasna naḇa. Snar faro snonkaku ani, roi sikofen anna namnis ḇaḇefawawi royoḇa monda. Snonkaku ani ifawi naḇa, snar roiḇebor anna skara na ro ḇar Rurya.
46002015	Snonkaku ḇena Allah Rur ḇyedi ifawi kankunes ro roiḇebor kam, ḇape iḇardi snonkaku oso myamkir iba kako.
46002016	Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Mansei nari ifawi Manseren kakara ḇyena? Ma mansei nari ḇekofen farkori?" Ḇape kona Kristus kakara ḇyena!
46003001	Ne, naek mko, yawawos kuker mko imnis snonkaku ḇena Allah Rur ḇyediḇa. Inja yawawos faro mko monda imnis snonkaku ḇekenem kaker ro rmomen supswan ine; imnis kuker snonkaku wombrek ro kakyar sena faro Kristus.
46003002	Randakya yaḇuk roḇean snonkuf faro mkoḇa, mboi roḇean wombrek monda; snar naek mkosambraḇ ḇaim fa mkan roḇean ḇepakrek na. Baboine kako naek mkosambraḇ ḇaim fa mkan na.
46003003	Snar naek mkokenem ma mkoso rari snonkaku kaker. Snar rofyor naek mkomsor ma mkomamunyae, kankenem ḇerarirya nfasna naek mkokenem ma mkoso rari snonkaku, imnis kawasa ro supswan ine?
46003004	Rofyor snon oso ikofen, "Aya ro Paulus mun ḇyedi," ma ono ḇese sikofen, "Aya yawaira Apolos," ine nfasna rari mkoḇena namnis kawasa ro supswan ine ḇembror ḇaimsya?
46003005	Inja Apolos mansei irya? Ma Paulus mansei irya? Nko Allah manfamyan ḇyesi monda, ḇekfin mko kwar fa mkokyar faro Allah. Nkokada nkofrur fararur Manseren ḇyukma ḇenko oser-oser.
46003006	Ayai ḇekerya ma Apolos i ḇeruḇya, mboi Allah mankundi ḇardi ḇeḇuk fa rokaker ḇyena nasurya.
46003007	Inja Allah iso ḇeḇefandunya, snar i ḇeḇuksurya. Ḇekerya ma ḇeruḇya suḇefandun mankunba.
46003008	Sukam sumnis ro fararur suḇena monda. Oser-oser nari isma sasuref imnis marmor ḇyedi.
46003009	Nko snonkaku ḇefararur kam faro Allah; ma naek srar mkomnis raris Allah yaf ḇyedi. Naik mkomnis raris Allah rum ḇyedi kako.
46003010	Kuker ḇaḇefawawi Allah ḇyukma ro aya, inja yamnis kamasan ḇaḇawes rum yarir kwar araref ro rum ani, ma snonkaku ḇese sḇawes rum ro araref ani. Snonkaku oser-oser myamepen naḇye rariso ḇyawes ro araref ani bori.
46003011	Snar Allah ḇardi fyasna kwar Yesus Kristus ḇyeararef oser ro rum ani, oso ḇeseḇa.
46003012	Ono sisya sḇawes ro ararefya bori kuker brawen, ono wer ro sarak, ono wer ro karui ḇesnai fafirek, ono wer ro ai, ono wer ro aḇris, roḇa fas baken.
46003013	Fararur snonkaku ansi oser-oser nari nfasna ro fafisu Kristus ifyafer wer mumanya. Snar for napnapesya nari ifrur fa snonkakusya fararur sena oser-oser nbayire. For napnapes nari ikun sas ma fyasna makaku ro fararur anna.
46003014	Rofyor rum, snonkaku sifrur ro araref ani bori inanem ro for aniḇa, snonkaku ani nari isma sasuref.
46003015	Ḇape rofyor snonkakusya fararur sena nananem, nari ḇyefromo; ma mankundi ḇardi nari isma koreri, ḇape imnis snonkaku ḇesasyar ro forya dori.
46003016	Naek srar mkofawiḇake mkoḇe Allah rum ḇyedi? Mboi Allah Rur ḇyedi kyain ro mko?
46003017	Rofyor snonkaku oso kyakok Allah rum ḇyedi, nari Allah kako kyakok snonkaku ani. Snar Allah rum ḇyedi isren faro mankundi ḇardi, ma naek srar mkoiso rum ani.
46003018	Snonkaku oso ḇyeankar mankundi ḇardi awer. Rofyor snonkaku oso rofandu mko kyara ifawi nanem imnis kakara ro supswan ine, snonkaku ani iḇyekada ifawi royoḇa, insa kaku ḇeri ifawinanem.
46003019	Snar supswan ine skaraḇe ḇefawinanemsya ro mamam Allah sifawi royoḇa. Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Allah fyorepen snonkaku ḇemamkarkir kuker fawinanem sena."
46003020	Snar sfas ro Refo radine kako, "Manseren ifawi mboi kakara snonkaku ḇemamkarkirsya kakara sena nefaindaḇa."
46003021	Eḇedari, snonkaku osoḇaḇeri imarares mankundi rofandu snonkakusya, snar roi ḇeborkam neḇeḇuk fa nwana kwar.
46003022	Paulus, Apolos, Petrus, supswan ine, kankenem ma marmar, awar ine roḇa awar nari ḇeramaya, roi ḇeḇor nakam naek srar mkoso ḇenananya.
46003023	Ma Kristus iso ḇena naek srar mkonya, ma Allah iso ḇena Kristus iya.
46004001	Mkokara inkoḇe Kristus manfamyan ḇyesi ḇekarem ma ḇeḇaryas Allah aw ḇyena faro supswan ine sifawi ḇaim na.
46004002	Ḇepon kaku roi sor ro manfamyan ḇerariryasya isoine ḇaḇeuser faro tuan sedi.
46004003	Aya ḇardi yaḇe fakfukenḇa ro rosai naek srar -- roḇa manseirya wer -- skara ro aya. Rarirya rosai mankundaya yakara fa ḇekur aya kako ḇyefakfukenḇa.
46004004	Yaḇaḇir yaḇesasar ro roi osoḇaḇeri, ḇape naiso ḇefasnaḇa mboi kaku yaḇesasarḇaya. Manseren mankundi nari ḇefasna yaḇesasarke roḇa.
46004005	Inja rofyor fafisuya isya ḇaim, naek srar fasna fasaw awer snonkaku oso ḇyesasarke roḇa. Wawaf rao isof Manseren ryama resari. Iso nari ḇeḇas kankunes ḇeḇor ḇeyokef ro pampan. Iso nari ḇekakok swaruser ḇeḇor ḇekram ro snonkaku sisnesna. Rofafisu ani insape snonkaku oser-oser isma ro Allah sanandik ḇyuk ḇeina.
46004006	Naek srar! Snar ḇaḇefandun mkoḇedi, yaḇuk nakam kwar faro Apolos ma faro mankundaya ḇardi. Insa nkoḇe fasasnai faro mko, fa mkofarkor rona, "Insa Mkokara syadi awer faro snonkakusya ro rosai sfas kwar." Rarirya snonkaku osoḇa rofandu mko darer snonkaku oso, mboi kyoryae ḇeseya.
46004007	Mansei ḇefrur aw fa wasyadi ro snonkaku ḇeseya? Wafawiḇake roi ḇeḇor nakam wasmana ro Allah? Snaro wamarisen wamarares mankundaw, imnis rosai isya ro aw roi ḇeḇuk naisyaḇake?
46004008	Mboi naek srar mkofandun roi oso werḇa! Naek srar mkonana kwar! Naek srar mkoḇe wairek kwar! Mboi nkoma roḇa. Iḇye syadi kaku rofyor naek srar mkoḇe wairek kwar, insa nko ma naek srar mko koḇuk sasoser kam.
46004009	Snar ro kakara yena nkoḇe manwawan, Allah ifrur nko kwar imnis roi ḇeser mamam roḇarpon snonkaku ma malaikat. Nkomnis snonkaku ḇekaryonḇa ḇesmai samamyai marmari ro fababa ma supswan sibras nko.
46004010	Snar Kristus, nkoḇe snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa, ma naek srar Kristen mkoiso ḇefawi! Nkosambraḇ ḇa, naek srar mkosambraḇ! Skoryaye nko, ma sisandik mko!
46004011	Isof rofafisu ine nkosma basbiser ma marawrow; mar nkoḇena ḇero baken nerer monda; snonkaku sewayam nko; nkosma moḇ anenef faswef onoḇa;
46004012	nkofararur fa nkosewar nanan. Rofyor nkoḇe ḇefras, nkomunsu na kuker ḇok; rofyor sḇewayam nko, nkokḇaḇ;
46004013	rofyor snonkaku sfamamai nko, nkomunsu na kuker wos ḇemyaren. Inkomnis kaku bakof supswan ine; isof rofafisu ine skara nkomnis arwarem supswan ine.
46004014	Yafas ine mufa ḇenaek srar fa yaḇukfrur mamyai mkoḇa, ḇape yafarkor naek srar imnis romawa ayesi.
46004015	Mboi imnis snonkaku Kristen, naek srar mkosma kwar guru syaran samfur, ḇape oso ḇyekma faro mkoḇa. Yerer monda yaḇekma faro mko, snar ayai ḇeyun Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Kristus faro mko.
46004016	Eḇedari kaku ḇeri yor fa mkomamepen ro aya.
46004017	Rarirya yawan kwar Timotius mufa ḇemko. Raris ḇeso Kristus, ikada imnis romawa karyer yaswar kaku. Ikada romawa kokyar rirya. Nari ḇyuk swarepen faro mko ro moḇ yakenem raya rofyor yakyar faro Kristus, isoine kankenem yafarkor kwar faro jemaat ro moḇ rosairya kaker.
46004018	Ono rofandu mko simarares si kwar, snar skara ḇo soḇo nari yaramufa faro mkoḇa.
46004019	Ḇape, nari yara fasaw mufa faro mko, rofyor Manseren byuk rarirya. Rofafisu ani nari yamam kako snonkaku ḇemarares ansi rosai sifrur na; mboi sawos monda awer.
46004020	Snar rofyor Allah ḇyuk sasoser ḇyedi faro kankenem snon oso, ro roi ḇeḇesya ani ḇyeḇefasna ro samambraḇ kankenem snonkaku ani, mboi ro wos ḇyedi mondaḇa.
46004021	Inja naek srar mkokinfir monda rosai mkomarisen syadiya! Naek srar mkomarisen yaramufa insa yaḇuk farkarkor ḇepakrek roḇa yarafa yaḇuk farkarkor ḇemyaren ma saneraro?
46005001	Kaku ḇeri yasma sikofen ḇadir kwar rofandu mko ono sisya sifrur sasar farbuk ḇesyadadi; rofandu mko ono sisya sifrur sasar farbuk kuker sna ḇefan sesi. Snonkaku ḇefawi Manseren ḇasya kako sakfrur roi ḇeradineḇa!
46005002	Rariryano mkomarares mko. Iḇye syadi mkosnemna nfafardun ma mkosasyar rofandu mko snonkaku ḇefrur rariryasya.
46005003	-
46005004	Ro ḇar baken yaḇinkwanbur mko, ḇape ro ḇar rurya aya isya rofandu mko. Inja, yamarisen yafrur imnis aya isya rofandu mko, "Kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus Kristus, yafasna faro snonkaku ḇefrur kwar fararur ḇeyarwarem ḇerarirya, nari sismai samamyai!" Rofafisu naek srar mkofanjur ma aya isya rofandu mko kuker rur ayedi, ma kuker papoik ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus,
46005005	naek srar koḇuk snonkaku ani faro Ibirisya insa snon ani baken ḇyedi imar ma rarirya rur ḇyedi isma koreri ro fafisu Manseren ifyaferma werya.
46005006	Rosai mkomararesya, roi ḇeḇyeḇa rirya! Naek srar mkofawi kwar wos sarḇer ine, "Mur kermkun ifrur fa terigu amek nakam napisen!"
46005007	Mkosawen ḇepon mur ḇekwar ani, isoine mur ḇesasar, insa mkomnis terigu amek ḇebabo, ḇesren ro mur sasar ḇekwar anna. Snar munara Paskah koḇedi ḇyeḇerak kwar: Kristus imnis domba Paskah koḇedi, ḇyeḇekaruk kwar.
46005008	Inja mkorama kofrur munara koḇedi kuker mamami ḇepisenḇa, isoine mamami ḇefasna saranden ma roi nakam ḇefrur marisen Allah. Mboi kofrur awer munara Paskah ani kuker mamami ḇefamnai kuker mur ḇekwar, isoine mur sasar ma ḇeḇarḇor.
46005009	Ro syap ḇepon ayedi, yafas ḇadir kwar faro mko insa mkokenem awer kuker snonkaku ḇefrur farbukya.
46005010	Snonkaku ḇefrur farbuk roḇa ḇenandip roḇa ḇeyankarkar roḇa ḇesyom amfyanir ḇefawi Allah ḇasya siso yakofensya! Snar rofyor naek binkwanbur si, nari wasasayarbur supswan ine.
46005011	Moḇ yakara raya isoine, naek wakenem awer kuker snonkaku ḇekarem mankundiḇe Kristen, ḇape snonkaku ani ifrur farbuk, roḇa inandip, roḇa isyom amfyanir, roḇa imarisen donef snonkaku ḇese, roḇa ḇemasaser, roḇa wer ḇekarawraw. Mkokain mkananus awer si kako!
46005012	-
46005013	Yaḇe mankara faro snonkaku ḇeḇe Kristen ḇasya, fararur ayedisyaḇa. Allah mankundi iso nari ḇeḇe mankara farosi. Ḇape faro kina jemaat, mkofawiḇake jemaatya mankundi ḇeḇemankara farosi? Snar ro Refo sfas radine, "Mkopampum snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya rofandu mko."
46006001	Snaro ono sisya rofandu mko sra faro mankara ḇenapesḇa fa ssḇuk safsof naek ḇesma kakyar oser, rofyor ryakrakrok kuker naek ḇyani? Snaro dor fa Allah kawasa ḇyesi sawos namuk roi ḇeradineḇa?
46006002	Naek wafawiḇake kawasa Kristen nari sḇemankara supswan ine? Inja rofyor naek wafawi nari bemankara faro supswan ine, snaro wapokḇa wawos namuk roi kasun ḇeradine na?
46006003	Naek srar mkofawiḇake nari koḇemankara faro malaikat-malaikatsya? Isyadi wer roi ḇero kankenem koḇena ro ras-ras!
46006004	Rofyor roi ḇeradine naisya, nari naek bukna faro snonkaku ḇena nasanḇaḇeri ro jemaat?
46006005	Kaku ḇeri ifrur fanor! Mboi rofandu mko ono sisya sifawi nanem fa sawos namuk rakrakrok rofandu naek srar ḇeḇe Kristen kam!
46006006	Ḇape ro ḇarya naek oso rya ḇyuk safsof naek Kristen ḇyedi faro snonkaku ḇeḇe Kristen ḇa!
46006007	Ma rakrakrok rofandu mko kako nfasna ḇadir mkokafyo kwar. Iḇye syadi sewayam mko snar napnapesya roḇa sfandun mkoḇa!
46006008	Ḇape naek srar mko ḇardi ḇefrur napnapesḇa faro snonkaku ḇesesya. Naek mankundaw kako ḇefrur fromo snonkaku ḇesesya. Ma wafrur na faro naek srar ḇesma kakyar oser!
46006009	Wafawiḇake snonkaku ḇeso Allah marisen ḇyenaḇasya, nari sakḇe kinaḇa ro Allah kawasa ḇyesi? Imbude sḇeankar naek uri. Snonkaku ḇefrur farbuk, snonkaku ḇesyom amfyanir, snon ḇefarḇuk kuker snon min sesi,
46006010	mankarawraw, ḇeyanfarmbram ma ḇemasaser, snonkaku ḇeyonef min sesi, ma ḇeyankarkar snonkaku ḇese -- snonkaku ḇeradinesya kam nari sakḇe kina ro Allah kawasa ḇyesiḇa.
46006011	Naek ono rofandu mko ro randakya rari sena namnis rarirya. Ḇape ḇaḇoine mkoḇe ḇefasren kwar ro sasar na. Allah nya mko kwar. Naek mkonapes kwar kuker Allah, snar mkokyar faro Yesus Kristus kwar ma mkona Allah koḇedi Rur ḇyedi.
46006012	Ono sikofen ḇo soḇo, "Ayama yamkei yafrur roi ḇeḇor kam." Ḇape faro aya nefainda kamḇa. Inja yafrur rosairya kaker, ḇape yamewer roi oso ḇyewayam aya.
46006013	Ono kako sikofen ḇo soḇo mboi roḇean faro snewarya, ma snewarya ḇyeḇefasos faro roḇean. Ḇape sukam nari Allah isawen su. Snonkakusya baken sena konana fa kobuki ifrur farbukḇa, ḇape koḇuki duffarmyan Manseren. Ma Manseren nari fyaduru baken ani.
46006014	Allah ḇyawes Manseren Yesus kwar ro marmarya, rarirya kako Allah nari dakḇawes ko kuker papoik ḇyedi.
46006015	Mkofawi ḇake baken mkoḇena irya kina ro Kristus baken ḇyedi. Inja, iḇyeke yun kina oso ro Kristus baken ḇyedi fa yaḇuki ifrur farbuk? Oroḇa beri.
46006016	Roḇa mkofawi ḇaimke snonkaku ḇefosen kuker farbuk, ḇyeoser kwar kuker bin ani! Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Sukam nari suḇe baken oser."
46006017	Mboi mansei ḇeḇeoser kuker Manseren, Manseren Rur ḇyedi kuker snon ani rur ḇyedi suḇeoser.
46006018	Mkoḇinkwan bur fararur farbuk. Snar sasar ḇeḇor ḇese snonkakusya sifrurna, sifrurna ro ḇandibur baken sena. Ḇape snonkaku ḇefrur farbuk, irya ifrur sasar faro mankundi baken ḇyedi ḇardi.
46006019	Mkofawi baken mkoḇena irya moḇ kankain faro Allah Rur ḇyedi. Rur ani kyain ro mko. Ma Allah mankundi ḇeḇuk Rur ani faro mko. Baken mkoḇena mkoi ḇenananyaḇa. Mboi Allah i ḇenananya.
46006020	Allah fyarwenamuk mko kwar ma ḇyak namuk mko kwar. Inja, mkofaduru baken mkoḇena naḇye kaku insa Allah isma sanandik.
46007001	Insape yamarisen yawos ro rosai naek srar mkofas ro syap mkoḇedi. Rofyor snon oso fyakawinḇa, ikada iḇye kaku.
46007002	Ḇape insa isma awer fafrowes fa ifrur roi ḇeḇyeḇa, imnis rmomen, farbuk; iḇye syadi snon ani nya swa oso ḇardi ma bin oser-oser nya swa oso ḇardi.
46007003	Inja, snonya ikenem imnis fararur ḇyedi faro binya raris swa ḇyedi, ma binya ikenem imnis fararur ḇyedi faro snonya raris swa ḇyedi; oser-oser ikenem imnis fararur ḇyena faro suminya.
46007004	Binya baken ḇyedi ḇinkundi ḇardi ḇenaiyaḇa; ḇena baken ḇyeja isoine swa ḇyeja. Rarirya kako snonya baken ḇyeja mankundi ḇardi ḇenaiyaḇa; ḇena baken ḇyeja isoine swa ḇyeja.
46007005	Muḇesisyeyae awer imnis imbeswa mambeswa. Fafisu ono muḇesisyeyae rofyor mumarisen kam wer. Rarirya oser-oser ḇyenadi kuker kananon. Ḇape ḇarpurya mkokaḇer ma mkofanamyae wer ḇeimbeswa mambeswa. Rofyor rariryaḇa, nari mkoso Ibiris embuk ḇyena snar mkosambraḇ ro rmomenyaḇa.
46007006	Yakofen radine imnis sasoserḇa, ḇape imnis ananun.
46007007	Kaku ḇeri yamarisen syadi insa snonkakusya kam simnis aya. Ḇape snonkaku oser-oser isma kwar fakamaman eḇesisye ro Allah. Oso isma fakamaman ine, eḇeseya isma fakamaman iwa.
46007008	Faro snonkaku ḇefakawin ḇaimsya ma bin-bin ḇeḇe ḇindansya, farkarkor ayeja isoine: Iḇye syadi mkokenem ḇesnonkbor inkbor imnis aya.
46007009	Ḇape rofyor mkosambraḇser rmomen mkoḇenaḇa, iḇye mkofakawin monda. Inja, iḇye syadi mkofakawin snar nari mkosambraḇser rmomen mkoḇenaḇa.
46007010	Faro ḇefakawin kwarsya, sasoser ayedi isoine: (Kaku ḇeri ayai ḇeḇuk sasoser ineḇa mboi Manseren). Bin ḇefakawin kwar oso ibur awer swari.
46007011	Ḇape rofyor ḇyeḇefaspar kwar, ipok ḇyeswa werḇa faswef, roḇa kyaḇer faro swari. Ma snon ḇefakawin oso ipok fyaspar awer swari.
46007012	Faro ḇesesya ananun ayena naiso nane: -- ananun nane ro aya ḇardi, mboi Manseren i ḇa -- rofyor snon Kristen oso fyakawin kuker bin ḇekyar faro Kristus ḇa, ma bin ani imarisen ikenem fnoḇek snon ani, inja snon ani fyaspar aweri.
46007013	Ma rofyor bin Kristen oso fyakawin kuker snon ḇekyar faro Kristus ḇa, ma snon ani imarisen ikenem fnoḇek bin ani, inja bin ani fyaspar aweri.
46007014	Snar snon ḇekyarḇa ani Allah fyasreni snar fakawawin ḇyedi kuker bin Allah nya kwar ani. Rarirya kako bin ḇekyarḇa ani Allah fyasreni kwar snar fakawawin ḇyedi kuker snon Allah nya kwar ani. Rofyor rariryaḇa ido, romawa suḇesi simnis romawa korwar, ḇape romawa ansi Allah romawa ḇyesirya.
46007015	Ḇape rofyor snonkaku ḇekyarḇa ani imarisen fyaspar swari ḇeḇe Kristen kwar, mkodwarek aweri. Rarirya ido naek roḇa srar ani imoḇes, snar Allah imarisen insa mkokenem kuker aski.
46007016	Snar imbesrar wamnis bin ḇekyar kwar faro Manseren --rariso imbesrar wafawi kaku mboi nari wapok buk aski faro swambri? Rarirya kako naik ḇeḇe swa Kristen rariso naek wafawi kaku mboi nari wapok buk aski faro swambri?
46007017	Iḇye syadi oser-oser kankenem ḇyedi iso Manseren farkankin ḇyedi imnis Allah fyasna kwar faroi rofyor Allah dori. Moḇ yaḇuk farkarkor rarirya faro jemaat oser-oser.
46007018	Rofyor snonkaku oso isma sofakfuk kwar, rofafisu isma fararyor ro Allah, rarirya snon ani ḇyesewar fa ipyos aḇyair sofakfuk ani awer. Rarirya kako rofyor snonkaku oso ḇyeḇesofuk ḇaim rofyor isma fararyor ro Allah, snon ani dor fa isma sofakfuk awer.
46007019	Snar koso sofakfukyake roḇake, sukam suḇe fainda osoḇaḇeri. Mboi ḇesyadiya isoine koso Allah sasoser ḇyena.
46007020	Iḇye syadi snonkaku oser-oser ikenem raris fafisu isma fararyor ro Allah.
46007021	Rofyor naek srar mkosma fararyor, rofyor ani mkoḇewomen, ḇape mkokara mankenem awer nyan ani. Ḇape rofyor nari mkosma fafisu faro ḇaḇe mkeya, mkun fafisu ani beri.
46007022	Snar manfyan oso ḇekyar Manseren kwar, ikada snonkaku ḇemkei ro Manseren. Ma snonkaku oso ḇeḇemkei ma ḇekyar kwar faro Manseren, ikada Kristus manfamyan ḇyedirya.
46007023	Allah kyoḇes ma ḇyak namuk mko kwar. Rarirya, naek srar mkopok mkoḇuk mankunmko fa mkoḇewomen faro snonkaku awer.
46007024	Inja, naek srar, rariso wer kuker kankenem mkoḇedi rofyor mkosma fararyor, iḇye syadi mkokenem faswef rarirya kuker Allah.
46007025	Faro inkbor ḇefakawin ḇaim. Farosi yasma sasoser osoḇa ro Manseren. Rariryano imnis snonkaku ḇesma fakamaman ro Manseren, yamarisen yaḇuk ananun ayena.
46007026	Koswarepen kandera ḇeḇor ḇemun rofafisu ine, inja yakara iḇye syadi snonkaku sikenem faswef mura imnis moḇ sikenem rofafisu ine raya.
46007027	Rofyor naek fakawin kwar, ḇesewar fa faspar swambri awer. Rofyor naek fakawin ḇaim ḇesewar fa fakawin awer.
46007028	Ḇape rofyor naek fakawin, ima sasar risyaḇa. Rarirya kako rofyor inkbor oso fyakawin, ikako sasar risyaba. Derer ḇefakawin ansi nari sisrow kandera nabor. Inja yamarisen yafaspar mkobur kandera anna.
46007029	Moḇ yakara raya isoine, naek srar: Kosma fafisu ḇeḇor werḇa. Randak ro baboine, snonkaku oso ḇefakawin kwar ikenem imnis fyakawin ḇaim;
46007030	snonkaku ḇekanes, ikenem imnis sneḇefafardunḇa; snonkaku ḇembrif, imnis iryaḇ ḇa; snonkaku ḇekoḇes kwar, imnis isma roi onoḇa;
46007031	ma snonkaku sne ḇero roi ḇero supswan ine, iḇye ikenem raris ḇyefandun naḇa. Snar supswan ine, imnis moḇ ryaya, nari ipromes!
46007032	Yamarisen insa naek srar ḇemkei ro kandera. Snonkaku ḇefakawinḇa nari kyara monda roi ḇekur Manseren snar imarisen ifrur sneperi Allah.
46007033	Mansei ḇefakawin kwar kyara nabor ro roi ḇero supswan ine, snar imarisen ifrur sneprei swari;
46007034	ḇarpurya ḇyerarwas kakara ḇyena. Inkbor oso ḇefakawinḇa, oroḇa dojaru oso nari kyara ker monda roi ḇekur Manseren, snar imarisen insa kraf ma rur ḇyedi Allah nya na. Ḇape bin oso ḇefakawin kwar, kyarai ker monda roi ḇero supswan ine, snar imarisen ifrur sneprei swa ḇyedi.
46007035	Yafas nanekam radine faro ḇaḇye naek srar mko ḇardi, mboi yakara fa yaḇuki idwarek ḇa. Roi yamarisenya insa naek srar mkofrur roi ḇenapes ma ḇeḇye, ma insa naek srar mkokara ker monda faro Manseren.
46007036	Rofyor snon oso ḇyaḇir ifrur roi ḇemnisḇa faro inkbor ssḇuki dapsasori, rofyor fyarmku nafsu ḇyediḇa, ma kyara doḇo fyakawin kuker dojaru ḇyedi, iḇye ifrur rosai kyara ḇo ḇeḇyeya. Ḇyesasar ḇa, rofyor sufakawin.
46007037	Ḇape rofyor snon oso kyara kwar fa fyakawin awer ma kakara ḇyedi sedusu iba, rarirya fararur ḇyedi iḇye, rofafisu fyakawin ḇa kuker dojaru ḇyedi.
46007038	Inja snonkaku ḇeḇekawin fararur ḇyedi iḇye, ma snonkaku ḇeḇekawin ḇa fararur ḇyedi iḇye syadi wer.
46007039	Bin oso ḇefakawin kwar ḇyeḇefesepen kuker swari kwar rofafisu swari ikenem. Rofyor swari imar kwar, bin ani imkei fa ḇyekawin kuker snon sai imarisenya; mboi fakawin ani fakawin Kristen rirya.
46007040	Rariryano fainda syadi faroi rofyor fyakawin werḇa. Ine mankundaya kakara ayedirya, ma yaḇaḇir Allah Rur ḇyedi ikfin aya kako.
46008001	Knikine kowawos ro roḇean ssḇuki fyarsarser faro karwarsya. Mboi kaku raris wos sikofen, "Koine kam kofawinanem kwar." Ḇape ḇaḇefawawinanemya ifrur fa snonkakusya simarares si, mboi saswarya kada ḇyawes snonkaku.
46008002	Snonkaku ḇekara ḇo ḇeyoḇo ikada ifawi nabor, ḇape ifawi ḇaim rariso fawawi ḇekakuya.
46008003	Ḇape snonkaku ḇeswar kaku Allah sya, Allah ifawi si.
46008004	Ro yar kan roḇean ssḇuki fyarsarser kwar faro karwarsya, kofawi karwarsya sisyaḇaḇeri. Ma kofawi Allah oser ḇaken, oso ḇese isyaḇa.
46008005	Kaku ḇaḇoi mboi roi sorḇe alah ma manseren sibor kako, iḇye ḇero nanki, iḇye kako ḇero supswan ine.
46008006	Ḇape faro ko, Allah oser monda i Kma ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor kam. Kuker i kokenem. Ma Manseren oser monda kako, isoine Yesus Kristus. Kuker i roi ḇeḇor kam neḇefrur, ma snar i kokenem.
46008007	Rariryano, snonkakusya sifawi kam moḇ ineḇa. Ono sisya ro ḇepon iwara sisyom karwar. Inja, eḇedari isof baboine kako sisya skara roḇean, ssḇuki fyarsarser kwar faro karwarsya, irya roḇean faro karwar. Inja rofyor san roḇean anna skara ssasar; snar kakyar sena nsambraḇ ḇaim.
46008008	Roḇean anna ḇardi nafrur fa ḇaḇeoser koḇedi kuker Allah idworenḇa. Rofyor kan roḇean anna, kosma ḇaḇefainda osoḇa. Rarirya kako rofyor kan roḇean annaḇa, kokako kosma fromo osoḇa.
46008009	Ḇape, mkoswarepen! Imbude snonkaku ḇese sḇesasardi --snar kakyar sena nsambraḇ ḇaim -- snar naek ḇaḇemkei bedi ro roi mkofrur nakam.
46008010	Kakara ayedi radine: Naek srar mkoi ḇena kakyar ḇesambraḇya, rofyor mkokain mkanan ro rum karwarya. Ḇarpurya snon oso myam naek srar mkokain mkanan ro moḇ ani. Rofyor snon ani kakyar ḇyedi syambraḇ ḇa, inja nari roi mkofrur ani ifrur fa snon ani dakan roḇean ssḇuk kwar faro karwarsya?
46008011	Rarirya, naek srar kakyar mkoḇedi ifrur fa snonkaku kakyar ḇesambraḇ ḇa ani iḇor. Mboi snon ani kako eḇedari Kristus imar.
46008012	Ma rofyor naek srar mkofrur sasar ḇerarirya faro naek srar Kristensya -- isoine naek srar -- mkokakok kakyar ḇesambraḇ ḇasya sena -- rarirya naek srar mkoḇesasar faro Kristus.
46008013	Eḇedari, rofyor roḇean anna nafrur fa naek ayedi ḇyesasar, rarirya nari yakan wer ḇaḇeri roḇean anna. Imbude yafrur fa naek ayedi ḇyesasardi.
46009001	Aya ine snonkaku ḇemkeiḇake? Aya ine manwawanḇake? Aya ine yakmam Yesus, Manseren koḇedi ḇaimke? Inja naek srar mkoido aḇyair ro fararur ayedi faro Manseren bake?
46009002	Rofyor snonkaku ono ḇese simewer skarem aya ḇemanwawanri, ḇape mko kako nari ono skarem rarirya! Snar naek srar kankenem mkoḇedi imnis snonkaku Kristen irya ḇyefasasna aya ine manwawan oso.
46009003	Rofyor snonkaku sisampum aya, nari yakarem radine:
46009004	Inja yasma rarwas roḇean ma aninem snar fararur ayeja ḇake?
46009005	Inja yasma fa yun srar Kristen oso imnis swa fa ifnoḇek aya ro mararan ayediḇake, imnis raris Manseren Yesus ḇedar ḇyesi ma manwawan ḇesesya ma Petrus moḇ sifrur raya ḇake?
46009006	Roḇaido aya ma Barnabas nuyerer monda nuiso ssḇuk fa ḇesewar nanan ro mankun nu?
46009007	Kina ro sarar osoḇa fa syuref mankundi ro sarar embroḇya! Snon ḇefrur yaf osoḇa kyer anggur ro yaf ḇyedi raimnai dakan bon naḇa? Manfarandows osoḇa ḇefaduru dombasya raimnai dakinem domba ansi sus sesiḇa?
46009008	Roi yakofen nane neknam ro roi ras-ras komam na nererḇa, ḇape snar Refoya dakkofen rarirya kako.
46009009	Sfas ro Moses Syap ḇyedi radine, "Rofyor sapiya imas fasibusya insa krafsya siḇesebur pissya, mkosower sapi ani sḇadonya kuker pisan awer." Inja sapiya iso Allah myamepenya?
46009010	Roḇaido koiso Allah kyara koya? Mboi koiso fas-fas ani kyur koya. Snar snonkaku ḇefrur yafya ma ḇefrur sren fasibusya sifararur kwar kuker kakyar insa sisma rarwas bon ro fararur sena.
46009011	Nko kekef kwar mor rurya faro kankenem naek srar. Inja rofyor nkosma ḇaḇeḇok ro naek srar ro nana mkoḇena, irya nkor nabor syadi faro naek srar mkoke?
46009012	Rofyor snonkaku ono ḇese sikyar sisma roi nane ro naek srar, rosai wer kuker nko nari nkosma syadi wer ro mkoḇake? Ḇape yakfrur nyan ani ḇaim. Mboi yamarisen syadi yaḇar roi ḇeḇor nakam, ro yafrur roi ono fa nadwarek ḇaḇeḇaryas ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ro Kristus.
46009013	Naek srar mkofawi kaku snonkaku ḇefararur ro Allah Rum ḇyedi dori sisma roḇean sena ro Allah Rum ḇyedi. Ma snonkaku ḇeḇeuser rokef farsarser sisma rarwas ro farsarser sḇukfarser anna.
46009014	Rarirya kako Allah fyasna kwar mboi snonkaku ḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani nari sisma roḇean ro ḇaryas ani.
46009015	Rariryano, yafrur oso ro nyan annane ḇaim. Ma yafas syap ine insa yakofen fa mkofrur roi annane maḇe ayaḇa. Iḇye syadi yamar ro roi ḇebor yamsik kuker anna ndoë.
46009016	Snar rofyor nyan ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ro Allah monda, rarirya ido yapok yamsik ayaḇa, snar fararur ayedirya. Aroroo faḇye maḇe aya, iḇye yaroe, rofyor yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ḇaido!
46009017	Imnis raris fararur ani yafruri ro marisen ayedi, yakyar nari yasma sasuref. Ḇape yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya irya fararur sḇukma beaya. Allah ḇyuk fa yafrur fararur ani.
46009018	Rarirya ido, rosai yana ḇesasurefya? Sasurefya isoine: mboi yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani kuker fararyor ḇaḇyak warek maḇe aya ro osoḇa, snar yamewer yor sasuref ro sayan ayena imnis manbaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya.
46009019	Aya ine yaḇewomen faro osoḇa; aya ine yamkei. Rariryano yafrur mankundaya ḇemanfyan faro snonkakusya kam. Yafrur rarirya insa yasma snonkaku sibor faro Kristus.
46009020	Faro snon Yahudisya aya ine ya frur imnis snon Yahudi insa yasma snon Yahudi ono faro Kristus. Faro snonkaku ḇeyaser Allah sasoser ḇyena Moses ḇyuk kwar, yafrur imnis yaso sasoser-sasoser anna, ḇape aya ine yamkei ro sasoser anna. Yafrur rarirya insa yasma snonkaku ansi faro Kristus.
46009021	Faro snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya, yafrur imnis snon oso ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, ḇekenem roḇondibur Allah sasoser ḇyena, Moses ḇyuk na. Yafrur rarirya insa yasma snonkaku ansi faro Kristus. Ḇape roi ḇeḇesya ine nari ḇyefa yaḇeuseḇa faro Allah sasoser-sasoser ḇyena snar aya ine Kristus sasoser ḇyena naḇen aya.
46009022	Rofandu snonkaku kakyar ḇesambraḇ ḇasya, aya kako yafrur imnis snonkaku ḇena kakyar ḇesambraḇ ḇa insa yun snonkaku ansi faro Kristus. Kuker wos ḇeknampu, yamnis roi ḇeḇor faro snonkakusya kam insa kuker nyan rosairya kaker yun ono fasisma aski.
46009023	Yafrur nakam rarirya faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah insa yasma ḇok kako.
46009024	Naek srar mkofawi kaku ro fanandi farandar, ḇesosya oser monda i ḇesma sasurefya. Eḇedari naek mkofaḇri ro farandarya insa mkosma sasurefya.
46009025	Snonkaku ḇeso fari, fyarmku ro roi ḇeḇor kam. Ifrur rarirya snar imarisen ssḇuk fa isron irai pampen ḇaḇefaindaya, isoine pampen nari ḇemaryoi fasaw. Ḇape koine kada kofarmku ro roi ḇebor kam snar komarisen ssḇuk fa kosron pampen irai nari ḇemaryoiḇa.
46009026	Eḇedari yafrar karker ḇemoḇ sfasnaya. Imnis fanandi kaku nari yakuk famfnomba.
46009027	Yaḇuk baken ayedi fa sfari pakreki isof yaknonser aya. Yafrur rarirya, snar imbude yor snonkaku ono ḇese kwar fa sakso fanandi ani, mboi mankundaya yaro ḇondiri.
46010001	Naek mko! Iḇye mkoswarepen rofafisu up koḇesi siso Moses rosai ḇeḇesya kuker si. Sikam mandepya fyadiren si, ma sunuk Soren Ḇerik kuker aski.
46010002	Faro ḇeso Moses, sikam sisma masi sren kuker mandep ma soren ani.
46010003	Sikam san roḇean rur ḇemamnis,
46010004	ma sinem aninem rurya ḇemnis kako. Sikam sinem ro bon karui rur ḇefnoḇek si; bon karui ani isoine Kristus derer.
46010005	Rariryano, Allah imarisenba kuker ḇar ḇebaya, eḇedari simar ro sup ḇeḇeursḇa.
46010006	Nakam nefasasna maḇeko, insa nbuk swarapepen ḇeko insa kormomen awer roi ḇeḇarḇor imnis moḇ sifrur kwar raya.
46010007	Ma insa kaksyom awer karwar imnis ḇar ḇebaya moḇ sifrur raya. Sfas ro Refo radine, "Ma er ansikam san ma sinem, ma simas ḇo sisyom karwar."
46010008	Koma kofrur awer farbuk imnis ḇar ḇebaya moḇ sifrur raya. Snar, sifrur farbuk inja ḇemar ro ras osersya sḇesyaran samfur risuru seser rikior.
46010009	Kofrowes sas awer Manseren imnis ḇar ḇebaya moḇ sifrur raya ro ḇepon iwara, isof ikak ḇeknampu sarek si fa simar.
46010010	Kosasurem awer; imnis ḇar ḇebaya moḇ sifrur raya ro ḇepon iwara, isof Malaikat Marmari myun si.
46010011	Roi nanekam ndarirya farosi fa nefasasna maḇeko ma kawasa ḇese. Ma nakam neḇefasepen fa neswarapepen maḇeko. Snar baboine kokenem ro awar ḇepupesya.
46010012	Snonkaku ḇekara ḇeyoḇo ḇeyores nako, iḇye ḇyesasori; insa isapi awer.
46010013	Farawrowes mkosmaya ikada farawrowes snonkakusya sisma kam rirya. Ḇape Allah inapes ro asas ḇyena. Nari myam monda mkoḇa ro fafrowes ḇesyadi ro samambraḇ mkoḇena. Rofafisu mkosma fafrowes, nari ḇyuk nyan faro mko insa mkofarmku.
46010014	Snar rarirya, naek srar yaswar kaku, iḇye mkayin ḇaḇesamsyom faro karwarsya.
46010015	Yawawos faro mko imnis faro snonkaku ḇefawinananem. Iḇye mkokara ro mankun mko ro wos yakofen nane.
46010016	Rofafisu kinem anggur ma kokofen kasumasa faro Allah, fyasna ḇair ḇake mboi koḇeoser kuker Kristus ro marmar ḇyedi? Ma rofafisu koḇerarwas mamami fa kankam, fyasna ḇair ḇake mboi koḇeoser kuker Kristus baken ḇyedi?
46010017	Snar mamami oser baken monda ma kan kam ro mamami oser baken ani kako, inja kokam kofasna koḇeoser baken.
46010018	Indo mkomamepen ro kawasa Yahudisya. Si ḇeyan roḇean sḇukfarser ro rokef farsarser, sikada snonkaku ḇeḇeoser kuker moḇ ani.
46010019	Rosai yakara kukerya? Mboi karwar roḇaido roḇean sḇukfarsarser faro karwarsya nḇuk fainda osoke?
46010020	Roḇaḇeri! Kakara ayedi rosai sḇukfarsarser ro rokef farsarser faro karwarsya nakada farsarser faro Allah ḇa, mboi faro ibiris sya. Ma yamewer mkoḇeoser kuker ibiris.
46010021	Mkinem awer ro Manseren sek aninem ḇyedi, fnoḇek ibiris sek aninem ḇyedi kako. Mkanan awer ro Manseren meja ḇyedi, fnoḇek ibiris meja ḇyedi kako.
46010022	Inja komarisen kofrur fa Manseren imsorke? Inja kosambraḇ syadi Manserenke?
46010023	Snonkaku sikofen, "Kofrur monda rosai komarisen." Kaku! Ḇape roi ḇeḇor komarisen anna nefainda kamḇa. "Iḇye kofrur rosai komarisen anna" -- ḇape roi ḇeḇor komarisen anna nbawes kankenem kobenaḇa.
46010024	Snonkaku oso ifararur faro fandun mankundi ḇyena ḇardi awer. Snonkaku oser-oser ifararur faro fandun snonkaku ḇese kako.
46010025	Iḇye mkan rosai sboḇ ro pasar. Mkokukeḇ ḇepon awer na, ma mkokamananen awer.
46010026	Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Supswan ine kuker roi beroi nakam Manseren i ḇenananya."
46010027	Rofyor naek ḇeḇe Kristen ḇa oso pyos aw fa wakanan kada, ma naek wasma paspos ani, wan rosai srir ro meja ani faro aw. Kwukeḇ awer roḇean anna ndamuma kero, insa wakamananen awer.
46010028	Ḇape rofyor ono sikofen faro aw, "Roḇean nane sḇukna nfarser kwar faro karwarsya," wan awer roḇean anna, snar waswarepen fandun ro snon ani ma swaruser ḇyena.
46010029	Ro kakara yedi faro naek sneuser bediḇa, ḇape sneuser ro snon ani. Ono sisya nari sifuken, "Inja, snaro ḇaḇemkei ayena snonkaku ḇesesya komananen ḇyena nadwarek na?
46010030	Rofyor nyaḇe yanan ido yakofen kasumasa faro Allah, snaro snonkaku skoryaye aya kuker roḇean anna, mboi sifawiḇa yanadi yakofen kasumasa faro Allah snar roḇean anna?"
46010031	Rosai wer mkofrurya -- mkanan roḇa mkinem -- mkofrur nakam fa mkoksandik Allah.
46010032	Mkokenem rarirya insa kankenem mkoḇedi ifrur fa snonkaku ḇeḇesya skarkar ma nafnai fa naek mkoḇesi sḇesasar awer; iḇye snon Yahudi roḇa snon ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, roḇa wer Allah jemaat ḇyedi.
46010033	Mkokenem imnis aya. Yaḇesewar yafrur sneprei snonkaku kam ro roi ḇeḇor kam, kuker kakara faro fandun mankundaya ḇardiḇa. Mboi kakara yedi derer insa sikam sisma aski.
46011001	Mkoso nyan ayedi, imnis aya yaso nyan Kristus.
46011002	Yasandik mko snar mkoswarepen aya ḇesya kwar ma mkoso farkarkor yaḇuk faro mko na.
46011003	Ḇape yamarisen insa mkofawi roi oser wer, isoine ḇeḇeḇru rofandu snonsya oser-oser isoine Kristus; mboi ḇeḇeḇru faro binsya ḇefakawin isoine snonsya, ma ḇeḇeḇru ro Kristus isoine Allah.
46011004	Rofyor snon oso fafisu ḇyenadi roḇa ḇyaryas Allah kafkofen ḇadir ḇyena ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor, iswoi karamas, rarirya snon ani kyoryae Kristus.
46011005	Rofyor bin oso fafisu ḇyenadi roḇa ḇyaryas Allah kafkofen ḇair ḇyena ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor, mboi iswoi karamasḇa, bin ani kyoryae swari ḇeḇeḇru faroi. Rarirya imnis raris bin ani ḇru ḇyeja ḇyebekapnik.
46011006	Snar rofyor bin oso imewer iswoi karamas, iḇye syadi snonburyam ḇyena neḇekapnik. Rofyor bin oso sikapnik snonburyam ḇyena, irya anonef oso faro ḇinkundi. Inja iḇye syadi iswoi karamas.
46011007	Snonsya kada fandunba fasiswoi karamas snar sfasna Allah sananai ma baba ḇyedi. Ḇape binsya sfasna baba ro snonsya,
46011008	snar snonsya seḇefrur ro binsya ḇa, mboi binsya seḇefrur ro snonsya.
46011009	Ma snonsya seḇefrur faro fandun binsyaḇa, mboi binsya kada seḇefrur faro fandun snonsya.
46011010	Eḇedari, insa malaikatsya sakḇe saksi, inja bin oso nari iswoi saswoi, imnis kakop ḇefasna binsya sfadiren ro siswas si.
46011011	Rariryano ro kankenem ḇaḇe Kristen koḇedi, binya demir ro ḇinkundibur snonyaḇa, ma snonya kako demir ro mankundibur binyaḇa.
46011012	Snar imnis bin ḇepon ani ḇyeḇefrur ro snonya, ḇape ḇarpurya binya daḇen snon ani; ma Allah i ḇeḇeknam roi nakamya.
46011013	Indo naek srar mkokara ro mankun mko roi ḇeḇesya ine: iḇyeke bin oso ḇyenadi faro Allah ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇeḇor, imboi iswoi saswoiḇa?
46011014	Ro fawawi koḇena, naek mkoḇe ḇefarkor kwar mboi rofyor snonsya snonburyam sena nakwan, ine roi ḇefrur mamyai.
46011015	Ḇape faro binsya, sisma snonburyam ḇekwan fa nakawef siḇrusna iria marisen sedi.
46011016	Ne, inja ono sisya sfamfaḇri, kuker roi ḇeradine, roi oser monda yamarisen yakofen isoine, iḇye kokako wer ma Allah jemaat-jemaat ḇese ḇyena nakam nasma rari oser monda ro jemaat.
46011017	Ro roi yaḇeyawos nane, yasandik naek srar mkoḇa. Naek srar ro fananjur mkoḇena nbuk bon ḇeḇye onoḇa, mboi roi ḇeḇyeḇa nairi.
46011018	Yamnaf ḇeponya mboi ro fananjur jemaat naek srar ro rarwas ono sisya sfamfaḇriyae. Ma yakyar mboi roi yamnaf nane nkaku.
46011019	Kaku rofandu mko anunḇesisye isya, insa komam mansesi ḇeḇe Kristen kakusya rofandu mko.
46011020	Ḇape naek srar mkofananjur ani mkofrur anan meja sren ḇekakuyoḇa.
46011021	Snar rofyor mkanan ido, mkun famfaḇri roḇean faro mankun mko, isof ono saksma roḇean annaḇa, isyadi wer ono simser.
46011022	Snaro rarirya? Mkona rumbake? Fa mkanan ma mkinem rona! Roḇaido naek srar mkomarisen mkokoryae Allah jemaat ḇyedi ma mkokoryae snonkaku ḇesaḇararsya? Inja rosai nari yakofen faro mko? Yarer mkoke? Roḇa! Nari yarer mkoḇa.
46011023	Snar farkarkor yaḇuk faro mko, yasma na ro Manseren mankundi: mboi ro roḇ ani fafisu Yesus, Manseren koḇedi, ḇyeḇeḇoḇ ani, dun mamami,
46011024	ma ikofen kasumasa faro Allah posa, pyef ma pyanasnis mamami ani, raimnai ikofen, "Inekada baken ayedirya ḇyeḇeḇoḇ faro mko. Mkofrur rarirya fa mkoswarepen aya."
46011025	Rarirya kako rofyor sanan posa kwar, dun sek anggur kako ma ikofen, "Anggur ineido Allah asas ḇebabo ḇyedi, ḇyekakop ro rik ayena. Rofyor mkinem i, mkofrur rarirya fa mkoswarepen aya."
46011026	Mboi rofyor mkan mamami ma mkinem anggur ine, naek srar mkoḇaryas Manseren marmar ḇyedi isof iwerma.
46011027	Eḇedari, snonkaku ḇeyan Manseren mamami ḇyedi roḇa ḇeyinem Manseren anggur ḇyedi kuker rari ḇeḇyeḇa ido, snonkaku ani ḇyesasar faro Manseren baken ma rik ḇyena.
46011028	Inja snonkaku oser-oser kyukeḇ mankundi resari insape dan mamami ma dinem anggur ani.
46011029	Snar rofyor mansei ḇeyan mamami ma ḇeyinem anggur ine, ma ḇyefandun anan Meja sren ḇekur Manseren baken ḇyediḇa, snon ani dan ma dinem fa isma samamyai Allah faro mankundi.
46011030	Eḇedari rofandu mko ono sibor siduf ma siryarḇa, ma ono simar kwar kako.
46011031	Ḇape rofyor kokukeḇ mankunko ḇepon resari, Allah nari ḇyuk samamyai faro koḇa.
46011032	Ḇape rofyor Allah ḇyuk samamyai maroko, nari iprerko, insa kosma samamyai fnoḇek awer samamyai supswan ine.
46011033	Eḇedari naek srar, rofyor mkoryur fa mkanan ro Manseren meja ḇyedi, iḇye mkowafyae mko.
46011034	Rofyor ono sibiser, iḇye sanan ḇepon ro rum sena resari. Imbude naek srar mkofanjur monda fa mkosma samamyai Allah faro mankun mkondi. Faro roi ḇese na, nari yakofen ḇayir na wer faro mko, rofyor yaramufa ḇemko.
46012001	Insape yakofenḇadir rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk na. Ro mnuk ine yamarisen insa naek srar mkofawi kaku.
46012002	Naek srar mkoswarepen rofyor mkofawi Manseren ḇaim, naek mkokara famkoso karwarsya ḇeḇeawer.
46012003	Naek srar mkofawi mboi snonkaku ḇeyawawos ro knam Rur Ḇesrenya nari ikofenḇa, "Yesus ḇyeḇefras kada!" Rarirya kako snonkaku osoḇa nari kyarem, "Yesus Manseren dirya!" Rofyor Allah Rur ḇyedi fyarkin i ḇaido.
46012004	Allah Rur ḇyedi fakamaman rosai ḇyuk na nabor fama naḇesisye, ḇape nakam Rur oser iso ḇeḇuknanya.
46012005	Fararur afuffarmyan Manseren nabor, ḇape Manseren kuffarmyan ani, Manseren oser kako!
46012006	Fararur naisya nabor ro affuffarmyan Manseren fararur ḇyena, ḇape ḇeḇuk sambraḇ faro snonkaku oser-oser ikada Allah oser kako.
46012007	Faro ḇayaye koḇena kam, Allah Rur ḇyedi ifararur ro snonkaku oser-oser mankundi.
46012008	Faro snonkaku oso, Rur ani ḇyuk fawawi ro wawos masasik. Faro oso ḇese Rur ani ḇyuk fawawi ḇeḇaryas ro Allah.
46012009	Rur oser ani kako ḇyuk faro snonkaku ḇena kakyar oser ma faro ḇesesya, Rur ani ḇyuk papoik fa ssḇuk pararei faro snonkaku.
46012010	Faro snonkaku oso ḇyuk papoik fa ifrur aḇyair kanandor ma faro ḇese ḇyuk ḇararyas ro Allah aw ḇyena. Faro ḇese kako Rur ani ḇyuk fawawi fa ifawi Allah Rur ḇyedi rosai ḇyuk na ma rosai ḇyukḇa na. Ḇyuk faro ono fawawi fa siwawos ro wos kofawiḇa, ma ḇese kako ḇyuk fawawi fa sḇaryas kankunes ro wos anna.
46012011	Roi ḇeḇor anna Rur oser ani iso ḇefrur nakamya; ḇyuk fawawi ḇardi faro oser-oser raris Rur ani mankundi moḇ imarisen raya.
46012012	Kristus imnis baken snonkaku; bakenya ḇyeoser, ḇape kina ḇyena nabor. Kina annakam, nabor rariso wer, nebaken oser.
46012013	Rarirya kokam kako, iḇye kawasa Yahudi, ma ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, manfyan ma snonkaku ḇemkei; kokam kosma masasi kwar kuker Rur ani, insa koḇeoser kuker Kristus baken ḇyedi. Kokam kofawi Rur oser ani kako.
46012014	Snar baken ani ḇardi ḇyesya ro kina oser mondaḇa ḇoi kina nabor.
46012015	Rofyor weminya ikofen ḇo doḇo, "Ḇramin risayaḇa inja, yaksun ro baken anyaba," inja rarirya ido weminya dakḇe kina ro bakenya ḇake.
46012016	Ma rofyor knaramya ikofen ḇo doḇo, "Snar mkamor risayaḇa, inja yakḇe kina ro bakenyaḇa," inja rarirya ido knaramya dakḇe kina ro bakenya ḇake.
46012017	Rofyor baken ani ḇesiper ḇyemkamor monda, rariso baken ani nari ryower? Roḇaido rofyor baken ani ḇesiper ḇyeknaram monda, rariso baken ani nari nyas?
46012018	Komam ḇoi kina anna Allah ḇeḇuk na faro bakenya. Allah ḇyuk na oser-oser romoḇ ḇyedi iso marisen ḇyedi.
46012019	Rofyor nakam nekina oser monda, rosaiso sapḇe bakenya?
46012020	Inja kaku kina nabor ḇape bakenya ḇyeoser monda.
46012021	Eḇedari mkamorya nari ikofen faro ḇraminyaḇa ḇo doḇo, "Yafandun awḇa!" roḇaido bruya ikofen faro weminyaḇa ḇo doḇo, "Yafandun awḇa!"
46012022	Roḇarya kina-kina ro baken kokara ḇeryarḇa na kofandun kaku na;
46012023	ma kina-kina kokara ḇeḇefandunḇa na, kina-kina anna naiso koḇuk ḇaḇefandun nabor syadi faro na. Kina ḇepyumba ro bakenya naiso kokara syadi na.
46012024	Kina ḇero baken komambo ḇepyum kwar na, koḇefandun mankun naḇa. Allah fyasos baken koḇedi rarirya kwar isof kina-kina ḇeḇefandun mankunba na naiso koḇuk ḇaḇefandun syadi na.
46012025	Rarirya baken ani ḇyeḇerarwasḇa; kina oser-oser ḇyefandun min ḇese ḇyedi.
46012026	Rofyor kina oso ḇyekandera, kina ḇesena kako nakḇe kandera; rofyor kina oso ḇyeḇesandik, kina ḇesenakam nakraḇ kako.
46012027	Naek srar mko kam Kristus baken ḇyediso mko ma oser-oser ro mko ḇyekina ro baken ani kako.
46012028	Rarirya ro jemaat kako Allah fyasna kwar moḇ faro snonkaku oser-oser: randakya manwawan; ḇeḇesuru, nabi-nabi, ḇeḇekior guru-guru, raimnai ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor, ḇarpurya faro ḇesma papoik fa ḇeḇuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇeduf, roḇaido faro ḇefnoḇek snonkaku ḇese, roḇaido faro manfarkin, roḇaido faro ḇewawos ro wos kofawiḇa.
46012029	Sikam manwawan sisyaḇa, roḇa nabi, robaido guru. Sikam sisma papoikḇa fa sbukfrur aḇyair kanandor,
46012030	robaido ssḇuk pararei faro snonkaku ḇeduf, roḇaido faro ḇewawos ro wos kofawiḇa, roḇaido faro snonkaku ḇepamambar wos-wos anna.
46012031	Eḇedari, naek besewar kaku ḇeri insa wasma fakamaman ḇeba syadiya. Rarirya ro mnuk ine yafasna faro mko nyan ḇeḇye syadi wer.
