46013001	Rofyor yawawos ro wos ḇeḇor ro snonkaku kam, ma yawos wos malaikatsya wer kako, ḇape yana saswarḇa ido yamnis raris mawon ḇeroki ḇemaum roḇaido yamnis jorojoro ḇeroki ḇeḇe brenbren.
46013002	Rofyor yasma fakamaman faro yaḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, ma yafawi kankunes ro roi ḇeborkam, ma yafawi roi ḇeborkam; ma rofyor yasma kakyar ḇeba kaku isof yawan bon nafa nabur, ḇape yaswar snonkaku ḇeseḇa, rarirya yaḇefainda roi osoḇaḇeri!
46013003	Ma yaḇerarwas nana yena fa yaḇukfarser faro ḇesaḇararsya, ma rofyor yaḇuk baken ayedi fa ḇyeḇekun, ḇape yana saswarḇa ido, nakam nefainda ḇaḇeri.
46013004	Saswar ani kaḇaḇaḇ ma ḇaḇenaḇye. Saswar ani isasyar kuker sasuremḇa, sḇadokḇa, mararesḇa.
46013005	Saswar ani imararesḇa, darer iḇa; saswar ani ḇyedafdifer snonkaku ḇese fa siso marisen ḇyenaḇa, imasasor fasawḇa, ma ikram masasorḇa, rofyor snonkakusya sifrur sasar faroi.
46013006	Saswar ani imarisenba rofyor napnapesya isyaḇa, imarisen monda kuker napnapesya.
46013007	Napnapes ani fyarmku roḇarpon ro roi ḇeḇor nakam ma imarisen ikyar roi ḇeḇye ro snonkaku oser-oser, rofafisu ḇerariso wer kako saswar ani kakyar ḇyedi ryobur iḇa ma ikḇaḇ iwaf roi ḇeborkam.
46013008	Saswar ani nari myarmarḇa. Ḇyuk masasik faro ḇararyas Allah wos ḇyena, ma rofafisu oso ḇararyas wos ani nari imnai. Ḇyuk masasik awawos ro wos-wos ḇeḇor kofawiḇa, ma rofafisu oso masasik ani nari sḇeifa imna. Ḇyuk masasik faro fawawi ro roi ḇeborkam, ma ro fafisu oso roi ḇeḇesya ani nari ḇyeḇefandun werḇa.
46013009	Snar fawawi koḇena ma masasik ḇaḇeḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, imnis mankun ḇaim.
46013010	Nari rofyor ḇemnisna ndama kwar, nari ḇemnis mankun ḇaimna nari nadawer kam.
46013011	Rofafisu yaḇe romawamkun, yawos imnis romawamkun yaḇaḇir imnis romawamkun ma yakara imnis romawamkun. Insape yaba kwar, rari ḇaḇeromawamkun yena yasawen na kwar.
46013012	Rosai komam ro baboine namnis nin ḇefafafen ro kansinai. Ḇape nari komambos ḇekakuya. Baboine roi yafawina namnis mankun ḇaim, ḇape nari yafawi namnis imnis raris Allah moḇ ifawi namnis ayaraya.
46013013	Ma roi rikior iḇekainya isoine: kakyarya, saneraroya, ma saswarya; ma ḇeba syadi ro skonya isoine saswari.
46014001	Iḇye naek srar mkoḇesewar fa mkosaswar, insa mkosma fakamaman Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyukna, isyadi kaku faro masasik koḇuki ḇyaryas Allah aw ḇyena faro snonkakusya.
46014002	Snonkaku ḇewawos ro wos Rurya, snon ani dawos faro snonkakuḇa; ikada dawos faro Allah. Snonkaku oso ifawiḇa rosai ikofen na, snar Allah Rur ḇyediso ḇeḇuk fadawos ro roi Allah demir ifawina.
46014003	Roḇarya snonkaku ḇeḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, ḇyaryasna faro snonkaku; fa ḇyuk sambraḇ, masasik, ma sneprei farosi.
46014004	Snonkaku ḇewos kuker wos kofawiḇa dawos fa ḇyuk sambraḇ faro mankundi monda, mboi snonkaku ḇeḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi ifnoḇek jemaat imbror.
46014005	Iḇyekada yamarisen naek srar mko wawos kam kuker wos ḇeḇor kofawiḇa. Ḇape ḇeḇye syadiya mkoḇaryas Allah wos ḇyena kada. Snar snonkaku ḇeḇaryas Allah wos ḇyena, iso ḇeba syadi ro snonkaku ḇewawos kuker wos ḇeḇor kofawiḇa; ma snonkaku ḇewawos ro wos ḇeḇor kofawiḇa ani ikofen ḇadir rosai ikofen na, insa jemaat ḇesiper sisma fainda ro wos anna.
46014006	Rofyor yaramufa faro mko ma yawawos ro wos Rurya, irya fainda rosai faro mko? Fainda keroḇaḇeri! Mboi, rofyor yafasna fasasnai oso ro Allah, oroḇaido yakofen ḇadir roi oso ro Allah, oroḇaido yaḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, oroḇaido yaḇuk farkarkor.
46014007	Dera roi ḇerok ḇeḇenyawayo ḇaḇeri, imnis sonker, sireḇ, rofyor sifnak mnis raroknaḇa mboi ndok fafadi ido, rariso nari snonkaku sifawi dow rosaiso sifnakya?
46014008	Fasasnai oso ḇese isya wer: rofyor siwuf famfnom kḇurya, mansei nari ḇefasos fa ḇeḇe embroḇsya?
46014009	Rarirya kako kuker wos masasik naek srar mkawos ro wos Rurya. Rofyor masasik naek srar mkoḇedi mkawos wos ḇesnaiḇa, snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ifawi rosai mkokofen na. Naek srar wos mkoḇena nari napromes ma nefromo.
46014010	Ro supswan ine wosna nabor kaku, ḇape wos annakam nḇadir roi ono.
46014011	Ḇape rofyor yafawi snon oso wos dawos naḇa, snon ḇeyawos wos ani imnis snon amber maro aya; rarirya kako aya kukeri.
46014012	Faro naek srar mko ḇardi yafawi mkomarisen kaku famkona fakamaman ro Allah Rur ḇyedi. Mboi yakara roi ḇeponya, nari naek srar mkoḇesewar masasik ḇefnoḇek jemaat fa imbrar.
46014013	Eḇedari snonkaku ḇewawos ro wos Rurya nari dor faro Allah insa Allah ḇyuk masasik fa ikofen fasnai rosai ikofen anna.
46014014	Snar rofyor yanadi kuker wos yafawiḇana, rur ayedi kada ḇyenadi, ḇape swaruser ayena nambranḇa.
46014015	Inja nari rosai yafrurya? Nari yafararur radine: Nari yaḇenadi kuker rur ayedi, ma nari yaḇenadi kuker kakara yena kako. Nari yadisen kuker rur ayedi, ma yamarisen yadisen kuker kakara yena kako.
46014016	Snar rofyor naek wakofen kasumasa faro Allah kuker rur bedi monda, ma snonkaku ḇese ḇefawi wos kofawiḇa ḇerama ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, snon ani nari ikofenḇa, "Kaku ḇeri" kuker nadi kasumasa bedi; snar ifawi rosai naek wakofenyaḇa.
46014017	Mboi nadi kasumasa bedi faro Manseren iḇye rariso wer, ḇape nadi ani ḇyuk fainda osoḇa faro snonkaku ḇese.
46014018	Yakofen kasumasa faro Allah snar mankundaya ḇardi yawawos ro wos Rurya isyadi ro naek mkokam.
46014019	Rariryano ro sarawrow ro jemaat koḇuk samsyom faro Manseren, yamarisen syadi yawos wos mnuk ririm snonkakusya sifawina, ro wos mnuk syaran-syaran ro wos kofawiba. Yamarisen syadi rarirya insa yaḇuk farkarkor faro snonkaku.
46014020	Naek srar! Mkokara ḇeromawamkun awer. Ro roi ḇeḇarḇor iḇye naek srar mkomnis romawa kasun. Ḇape ro kakara, naek mkomnis snon kuf.
46014021	Ro Refo sfas radine, "Manseren ikofen, 'Rofandu snonkaku ḇewawos kuker wos Rur ḇesrenya fyarkor na, nari yawawos faro kawasa sine. Mboi rofandu snonkaku amber, nari yawawos faro kawasa ayesi; rariryano, simewer simnaf wos ayenandi.' "
46014022	Inja fakamaman faro wawos kuker wos Rurya imnis aḇyair faro snonkaku ḇekyarsyaḇa, mboi faro snonkaku ḇekyarḇasya. Ma fakamaman koḇuki ḇyaryas Allah aw ḇyena faro snonkaku irya aḇyair faro snonkaku ḇekyarsya, mboi faro snonkaku ḇekyarḇa syaḇa.
46014023	Eḇedari, rofyor sarawrow jemaat, jemaat ḇesiper siwawos kuker wos Rurya, raimnai snonkaku ono ḇese roḇaido snonkaku ḇeḇe Kristen ḇa ono srama, ma nari skara naek srar mkosarḇir kam!
46014024	Mboi rofyor naek srar mkoḇaryas kam Allah wos ḇyedi, raimnai snonkaku ḇeḇe Kristen ḇa ono srama, oroḇaido snon oso ḇese, mboi roi ḇeḇor mkoḇaryas anna kam nari nfasnai snonkaku ani sasar ḇyena ma nafrur faḇyaḇir sasar ḇyena.
46014025	Roi ḇeḇor ḇeyokef ro sneḇyedi nari neḇefasnai, isof nari ryun mankundi ma ḇyansuba faro Allah. Ikada nari kyarem ḇodoḇo: "Kaku ḇeri, Allah isya rofandu mko."
46014026	Inja, naek srar, rosai ḇeḇesya ro roi ḇeḇor anna kam? Rofyor naek srar mkoryur famkosyom Manseren, ono sidisen, ono ssḇuk farkarkor, ono sḇaryas roi ono ro Allah, ono siwawos ro wos Rurya, ma ono wer sikofen ḇadir rosai sikofen na. Ḇape nakam iḇye neḇefrur fa ssḇuki fyarkor ma faro ḇayaye nakam.
46014027	Rofyor ono simarisen sawos ro wos Rurya, iḇyekada snonkaku risuru roḇa kior monda siso ḇeawos asusersya. Ma snonkaku ono sikofen ḇadir rosai ḇewawos ansi sikofen na.
46014028	Rofyor ono sisya fasikofen ḇadirḇa, snonkaku ḇewos ro wos Rurya ansi iḇye sefasis ro sarawrow ani. Iḇye sawos fasis ro sisnesna faro Allah monda.
46014029	Snonkaku risuru roḇa kior ḇesma Allah wos ḇyedi, sḇaryas wos ani rofyor ḇesesya skarauser rosai sikofen na.
46014030	Ḇape rofyor Allah wos ḇyedi ryama faro snonkaku ḇese ḇekain ro sarawrow ani ido, ḇewawos ani imnai.
46014031	Kuker fararur ḇeradine, naek srar mkokam, oser ḇeoser, ḇyaryas Allah wos ḇyedi; insa sikam sisma farkarkor ma sikyar syadi wer.
46014032	Fakamaman ro Rurya ḇyuk fa koḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, ḇeḇaryas ani fyara wos ani.
46014033	Allah ani imarisen roi nari ḇeḇeawnos; Allah ḇemarisenḇa faro ḇaḇesapurnakḇa. Allah kawasa ḇyesi ro jemaat nakam,
46014034	binsya sefasis rofyor sarawrow ro jemaat. Ssḇuk fasakawosḇa. Sima sakḇe ḇinfarkinḇa; ine ḇyeḇefas ro Refo kwar.
46014035	Rofyor simarisen sifawi roi oso, nari sifuken siswassi ro rum sena, snar syowiḇa ḇin oso dawawos ro sarawrow jemaat.
46014036	Inja Allah wos ḇyedi ryamaker mkoke? Roḇaido wos ani ḇyeḇeḇaryas monda faro mkererke?
46014037	Rofyor snon oso ḇyaḇir isma fakamaman faḇyaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, roḇa isma fakamaman ḇese ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, snon ani ifawi roi yafas nane sasoser ḇerama ro Manseren.
46014038	Ḇape rofyor ono sakna naḇa, mkofandun awersi.
46014039	Inja iḇye naek srar mkoḇesewar insa mkoḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, ḇape mkodwarek awer snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇewos ro wos Rur ani.
46014040	Ḇape nakam iḇye neḇefrur kuker syowi ma awnos.
46015001	Inja baboine, naek srar, yamarisen insa mkoswarepen Allah Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi wer yaḇaryas kwar faro mko. Naek wasma kwar, ma kakyar bedi ḇyeknam ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani kako.
46015002	Rofyor naek waswarepen nako faro rosai yaḇaryas ani, rarirya Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani ḇyuk koreri faro au; demir rofyor mkona na kuker kakyarḇa.
46015003	Rosai yaḇuk faro naek srar roi yasma kwar nairya kako. Roi ḇeḇefandun kaku, imnis fasfas ro Refo, yaḇuk na faro naek mko mboi Kristus imar kwar snar sasar koḇena;
46015004	mboi ḇyeḇekrir kwar, ḇape ḇarpurya ḇyeḇeḇawes kaḇer wer ro ras ḇeḇekiorya. Ine kako ḇyeḇefas ro Refo kwar.
46015005	Yaḇaryas kwar faro naek srar kako mboi Kristus ḇekenem kaḇer wer ani fyasnai mankundi faro Petrus, ma ḇarpurya faro manwawan samfur seser risuru ansi.
46015006	Raimnai fyasnai mankundi wer faro manfamyan ḇyesi isyadi ro utin ririm. Snonkaku ansi sibor sikenem kaker isof baboine, mboi ḇemar kwarsya snonkaku riḇeso monda.
46015007	Raimnai Yakobus ma ḇarpurya faro manwawansya kam.
46015008	Papupes kakuya fyasnai mankundi maro aya kako -- ayai ḇemnis wombrek ḇekapaf!
46015009	Aya ine Manseren manwawan ḇyedi ḇesma anonef. Aya ine sipok sap aya ḇe manwawanḇa, snar yaḇewayam Allah jemaat ḇyena kwar.
46015010	Ḇape snar Allah ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyedi aya isya raris moḇ baboine yaraine. Ma Allah ḇyuk payasyos waworek mondaḇa maro aya. Snar aya iso ḇefararur syadi ro manwawan ḇesesya kam. Ḇape kaku ḇeri ḇaḇesewar ayenaisyaḇa; nane Allah ḇaḇesewar ḇyenairya ḇesewar aya ma ḇefararur fnoḇek aya.
46015011	Inja, ro manseirya wer naek mkosma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani -- ro ayake roḇa ro manwawan ḇeseke -- inema ḇyekakaraḇa. Mboi ḇeḇefandunya isoine rosai nkoḇaryas anna ma naek mko kyarna isoine Allah Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyenairya.
46015012	Rofyor rosai nkoḇaryas anna isoine mboi Kristus diḇri kwar ro marmarya, snar rofandu naek srar mko ono sikofen mboi snonkaku ḇemarsya nari siḇer si ḇa?
46015013	Kaku ḇeri rofyor ḇemarsya nari siḇer si werḇa, ine fyasnai Kristus kako nari diḇeri wer ro marmariḇa.
46015014	Ma rofyor imnis raris Kristus diḇri wer ro marmaryaḇa, rarirya fainda osoḇa nkoḇaryas rosai ma fainda osoḇa kako naek wakyar, snar kakyar bedi ḇyeknamba.
46015015	Isyadi wer rona, nfasnai mboi nkoḇeankar faro Allah, snar nkoḇaryas mboi Allah ḇyuk fa Kristus diḇer wer ro marmarya, ḇape Allah ḇyuk aḇiḇer wer faro iḇa -- rofyor kaku rarirya ḇemarsya siḇer si werḇa!
46015016	Snar rofyor snonkaku ḇemarsya siḇer si werḇa, rarirya Kristus kako nari diḇeri ro marmarya werḇa.
46015017	Ma rofyor Kristus diḇeriḇa rarirya ido naek kakyar bena namnis mafafu monda; rarirya ido naek srar mkoisya kaker ro ḇaḇesasar nari ḇesma raroya.
46015018	Rarirya kako snonkaku ḇekyar faro Kristus ḇo ḇemarsya snonkaku ansi sisma raro kako.
46015019	Rofyor saneraro koḇena faro Kristus namuk ro kankenem koḇena ro supswan ine monda, rarirya ido kawasa kam ro supswan ḇesiper ine, koiso nari ḇeḇenyawa ḇaḇeri!
46015020	Ḇape kokam kofawi Kristus ḇyeḇeḇawes ro marmarya. Ine fyasnai sasuref faro snonkaku ḇemar kwar ansi nari sḇeḇeḇawes wer.
46015021	Snar snonkaku oser ifnai fa marmarya syun ro supswan ine, rarirya kako snar snonkaku oser ifnai fa kaḇakḇok ro marmari ḇyeḇeḇuk faro snonkakusya kako.
46015022	Imnis snonkaku kam simar snar ḇaḇeoser kuker Adam, rarirya kako nari sikam sikenem wer, snar ḇaḇeoser kuker Kristus.
46015023	Ḇape oser-oser nari ḇyeḇeḇawes imnis rarwas ḇyedi: ḇepon kakuya Kristus; ḇarpurya ro fafisu Kristus kyaḇerma wer, insape rarwas snonkaku ḇesun ro Kristus kawasa ḇyesi.
46015024	Raimnai ras ḇepupesya ryama. Rofafisu ani nari Kristus ifrur kafyo ḇaḇesasoser kam, ḇaḇepapoik kam, ma ḇaḇesamambraḇ kam; raimnai ḇyuk papoik ḇyedi imnis wairek, faro Allah, Kma koḇedi.
46015025	Kristus iso ḇeyuf ḇaḇesasoserya pdef isof Allah ifrur fa Kristus darefepen mbroḇ ḇyesi kam fa skafyo faroi.
46015026	Mbroḇ ḇepupes nari ifrur kafyoya isoine marmari.
46015027	Sfas ro Refo radine, "Allah ifrur roi ḇeḇor nakam fa nkafyo faroi kwar." Isnaibos ro kakara kuker "roi ḇeḇor kam" ine Allah mankundi daksunba, mboi ifrur fa roi ḇeḇor kam nkafyo faro Kristus.
46015028	Ḇape nakam neḇekafyo kwar faro Kristus ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, ma mankundi, isoine Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, nari kyafyoi mankundi faro Allah ḇefrur kwar roi ḇeḇor kam fa nkafyoi faroi. Rarirya Allah mankundi kako nari ḇeḇuk sasoser faro nakamya.
46015029	Rofyor ḇemarsya sḇeḇeḇawes kaḇer werḇa, snaro snonkaku ḇekenem ono sisma masi sren faro ḇemarsya? Rosai snonkaku ḇekenem sikyar ro ḇemar ansi? Mboi rofyor snonkaku ḇemar ansi nari sḇeḇeḇawes kaḇer werḇa, fainda rosai snonkaku sisma masi sren faro ḇemarsya?
46015030	Ma ko kako, snaro komarisen kosun ro kandera-kandera rofafisu ḇerarirya na?
46015031	Naek srar! Rasras kam yafarmku yaḇekandera ma yamsik kuker kankenem mkoḇena snar mkokyar kwar faro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
46015032	Rofyor mnuk ine kyur ḇar snonkaku monda, fainda rosai maro aya, isof yaḇesewar fayasampum aiwan-aiwan ḇeyanḇepek ro Efesus, fainda rosai maḇe aya? Kaku ḇeri rofyor snonkaku ḇemar ansi sḇeḇeḇawes kaḇer werḇa, oh, iḇye syadi: "Mkorama kankinem ma koryaḇ, snar nari meser komar," rarirya rakrok wos peper oso.
46015033	Naek beḇefrowes awer! Rofyor naek bemaniḇoḇ kuker ḇaḇeḇarḇorya, nari rari ḇeḇye bedi dakḇarḇor kako.
46015034	Baḇir beri, ma wafrur sasar kaker awer. Kaku ḇeri roi ḇefrur mamyaya iso rofandu mko ono sisya sifawi kakubos Allah ḇaim.
46015035	Imbude ono sifuken, "Rariso snonkaku ḇemarsya sḇeḇeḇawes kaḇer wer? Baken ḇerariso nari ssḇuk farosi, rofyor sḇeḇeḇawes kaḇer werya?"
46015036	Mkofawi royoḇaḇeri! Rofyor naek kwer rokaker ro saprop, rokaker ani nari isur ḇeriḇa, rofyor rokaker ani ipokem ḇepon ḇaim.
46015037	Ma rokaker naek kwer ro saprop ani -- fasibuke roḇa rokaker ḇese -- rokaker ani bakenya iso ḇesuryaḇa mboi mor ani monda.
46015038	Allah mankundiso nari ḇeḇuk sananai ḇeḇye faro rokaker ani imnis marisen ḇyedi. Allah ḇyuk sananai faro rokaker anna oser-oser.
46015039	Baken ro roi ḇekenem na namnis kamḇa. Snonkaku baken sena naḇese ro aiwansya baken sena; mansya baken sena naḇese, ma insya kako baken sena naḇese wer.
46015040	Rarirya kako kuker roi ḇeḇor ro nanki ma roi ḇeḇor ro supswan ine. Roi ḇeḇor ro nanki oser-oser nya payamyum ḇardi, ma roi ḇeḇor ro supswan rarirya kako.
46015041	Payamyum ori iḇese ro payamyum paiki. Maksya kako sisnai payamyum ḇardi. Mboi payamyum mak ansi oser-oser iḇese kako.
46015042	Rarirya kako nari snonkaku ḇeḇawes kaḇer ro marmar. Baken sikrirya baken ḇekain fyoroḇa ḇape baken sḇawes kaḇerya baken ḇekain fyoro-fyoro.
46015043	Rofyor baken ani ḇyeḇekrirya, baken ani imyaren ma iḇyeḇa; ḇape rofyor ḇyeḇeḇawes kaḇer, baken ani ipyum ma syambraḇ.
46015044	Rofyor sikriri, baken ani baken ro supswan; ḇape ḇyeḇeḇawes kaḇer kwar, baken ani Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇebukiya. Baken ro supswan isya, ma baken ro Allah isya kako.
46015045	Sfas ro Refo radine, "Snonkaku ḇeponya, isoine Adam, ḇyenyawa ḇekenem," ḇape Adam ḇepupes ikada Rur ḇeḇuk kankenem rirya.
46015046	Ḇape ḇerama ḇepon kakuya baken saprop, mboi Ruryaḇa. Mboi Rurya iso berama papurya.
46015047	Adam ḇeponya ḇyeḇefrur ro saprop, Adam ḇeḇe suruya ḇyeknam ro boiyaswa.
46015048	Snonkaku ro supswan ine simnis Adam ḇeponya sḇeḇefrur ro saprop, ḇape snonkaku ro boiyaswa sikada simnis kuker i ḇeramaker boiyaswa.
46015049	Ko ro baboine komnis kuker Adam sifrur ro saprop, mboi ko kako nari komnis i ḇerama ro boiyaswa ani.
46015050	Naek srar, roi yakofen ine, isoine: baken sifrur ro kraf ma rik, nari dakḇekina ro Allah kawasa ḇyesiḇa; ma baken nari ḇemar nari iso baken ḇekain fyoro-fyoroya ḇa.
46015051	Mkokara naḇye kankunes ine: nari komar kamḇa, mboi kokam koḇe ḇesadwer.
46015052	Roi ḇeḇesya ani nari ryarirya imnis arḇeḇer, rofyor kḇurya ryok papupes. Snar rofyor komnaf rakrok kḇur ani, snonkaku ḇemar ansi sḇeḇeḇawes kaḇer kuker baken ḇekain fyoro, ma kokam nari koḇe ḇefadwer.
46015053	Baken koḇedi ḇemar ine nari syun baken ḇemarḇa, ma baken ro supswan nari syun ḇaken ro boiyaswa.
46015054	Rofyor baken ḇemar ine syun baken ḇemarḇaya, ma baken ḇero supswan ine syun kwar baken ro boiyaswa, rofyor ani imnisbos sfas ro Refo radine, "Marmarya ḇyeḇefmom kwar; ma ḇaḇefaindaya ḇyeḇesma kwar!"
46015055	"Ne, marmare, fainda beja isyaro? Ne, marmare, sayaryur beja isyaro?"
46015056	Sayaryur marmari iso sasari, ma sasari imbran fararur ḇyedi ḇyeuser rari agama.
46015057	Ḇape kasumasa faro Allah; snar ḇyuk maḇeko ḇaḇefainda ḇeḇeuser Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi!
46015058	Eḇedari, naek srar yaswarkuf, iḇyekada mkosambraḇ ma mkodworen. Mkofararur pdef kaku ḇeri faro Manseren, snar naek srar mkofawi mboi roi mkofrur faro Manseren nakam, nari nefromoḇa.
46016001	Insape kawos ro pipi naek srar mkomarisen mko ḇukfnoḇek faro kawasa Kristen, yor insa naek srar mkofrur imnis moḇ yaḇuk kwar faro jemaat-jemaat ro Galatia.
46016002	Ro rasras Arina, iḇye naek srar mkokam mkoḇuk ḇardi pipiker ono, oser-oser ḇyuk raris moḇ ismaraya. Mko kram pipi ansi isof yarafa, insa rofyor ani koryur ssewar awer.
46016003	Rofyor yarafa kwar, nari yawan snonkaku mkomarisensya. Nari yaḇuk farosi syap ḇekofen fasna, insa ssun pipi fafnoḇek ansi ḇe Yerusalem.
46016004	Ma rofyor fandun ido nari yasosi kako, ma nari yasosi ḇo nkora kam.
46016005	Nari yarakaki mko rofyor yunuk ro Makedonia kwar, snar yakara fayunuk rodia.
46016006	Rodia nari yakainus mko resari rofafisu pnunekya. Raimnai naek srar nari mkofnoḇek aya ro marandan ayedi pdef.
46016007	Yamewer yarakaki mko rarirya monda. Rofyor Manseren ḇyukido, yamarisen yakainus mko fyoro knik resari.
46016008	Rofyor ani nari yakain ro Efesus, isof ro munara Sababu Rurḇesren.
46016009	Fafisu nabor rodine faro fararur ḇeḇefainda, ḇape kawasa ḇesampum sibor sisya kako.
46016010	Rofyor Timotius ryafa, mkosrowi kuker ḇaḇye insa isma sambraḇ rofandu mko, snar i kako ifararur ro Manseren fararur ḇyedi imnis aya.
46016011	Imbude ono smamkyof indi. Mkofnoḇeki ro mararan ḇyedi pdef isof kyaḇer maro aya kuker aski snar yawaf raramuma ḇyedi fnoḇek naek srar ḇesesya.
46016012	Naek koḇedi Apolos, rarwan ono yor kwar faroi insa ryakaki mko fnoḇek kuker naek srar ḇesesya. Ḇape kyara namuk ḇaim fa ryamufa. Mboi rofyor isma fafisu ḇeḇye oso ido nari ryamufa.
46016013	Iḇye mkowaren ma mkores nako ro kakyar. Mkoḇri ma mkosambraḇ!
46016014	Roi mkofrur nakam mkofrur nakam kuker saswar.
46016015	Naek srar mkofawi kwar Stefanus kuker kina ḇyesya; si snonkaku randakya ḇeḇe Kristen ro Akhaya. Si ḇefararur kuker sneḇesiper faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi.
46016016	Yor kaku ḇeri insa naek srar mkoso farkankin snonkaku ḇerariryasya, fnoḇek snonkaku ḇese ḇefararur kayam faḇeyuf farmyan fnoḇek si.
46016017	Yaryaḇ kuker Stefanus, Fortunatus ma Akhaikus rarama suḇedi. Sko kada skosadwer naek srar maro aya.
46016018	Kaku ḇeri skofrur sneryaḇ aya; rarirya kako naek srar mkosnemna. Snonkaku ḇerariryasya mko ḇesyowi kaku si.
46016019	Jemaat-jemaat ro Asia sfarem aroo sena mufa ḇenaek srar mko kam. Akwila ma Priska fnoḇek jemaat ḇeryur ro rum suḇedi sfarem aroo Kristen faro mko kako.
46016020	Naek srar kam rodine sikofen aroo mufa ḇemko. Mkokofen arooyaye oser ḇeoser kuker syowi Kristen.
46016021	Yafas ḇardi aroo yena rodine: Aroo ro aya, Paulus.
46016022	Snonkaku ḇeswar Manseren Yesusḇa, Allah ḇyuk samamyai faroi. Maranatha -- Manseren ryama fasaw!
46016023	Aski ro Manseren Yesus kyain somko kada.
46016024	Yafarem saswar yedi mufa ḇenaek srar mko kam ḇekyar kwar faro Yesus Kristus. Ro nu, Paulus ma Sostenes
47001001	Naek srar Allah kawasa ḇyesi ro Korintus ma Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam ro Akhaya ḇesiper. Ayaine, Paulus, Yesus Kristus manwawan ḇyedi, Allah mankundi isiḇeri imnis mankundi marisen ḇyedi, fnoḇek naek koḇedi Timotius,
47001002	nukyar Allah Kma koḇedi ma Manseren Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok ma ḇyuk aski faro mko.
47001003	Sanandik faḇe Allah, Kma ro Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi. I Kma sneḇeḇye, ma Allah ḇeḇuk samambraḇ sne faro snonkaku.
47001004	Ḇyuk samambraḇ ro kosnesna, ro fafisu ḇaḇekandera kosma na, insa samambraḇ Allah ḇyuk maḇeko ani, ko kako koḇuk samambraḇ sne faro kawasa kam ḇesma marindisya.
47001005	Kandera-kandera Kristus isma na nabor kaksma na kwar. Iso eḇedari kuker Kristus kako, kosnesna nasma samambraḇ kaku.
47001006	Rofafisu nkoisya rofyor ḇaḇekandera fafisu ani ḇyuk samambraḇ ro mkosnemna, faro aski mkoḇena. Rofyor nkosma samambraḇ ro nkosnesna, rarirya naek mko kako mkaksma samambraḇ isof naek mkomku rofafisu ḇaḇekandera imnis kandera nkaksma na kako.
47001007	Nko ḇeḇirḇarḇa ro rosai nkokyar ro mko naek srar, snar nkofawi mkakḇe kandera fnoḇek nko. Ma snar rarirya mkosma samambraḇ fnoḇek nko.
47001008	Naek mko! Nkomarisen naek mkakfawi kandera nkosma ro Asia. Kandera nkosma anna nmarḇak mankenem ma nbarekepen nko, isof nkokyar nari nkokenem werḇa;
47001009	nkokara imnis ssḇuk samamyai marmari maro nko kwar. Ḇape roi ḇerariryana ndarirya insa kokyar samambraḇ ro mankunkoḇena awer, mboi faro Allah ḇeḇuk aḇiḇer faro snonkaku ḇemarsya.
47001010	Allah iso ḇeḇuk koreri kwar maḇeko ro kandera raro marmar ḇeba ani. Ma ikako nari ḇeḇuk koreri maḇeko wer ro ras ḇepupesya, snar iso kokyarya.
47001011	Nkokyar kaku mkoḇenadi warek nko, rarirya Allah nari ḇyuk aski maḇeinko wer ro kandera na. Raimnai snonkaku sibor senadi warek nko, ma nari sikofen kasumasa mufaḇe Allah; snar Allah imarisen ḇyeḇok nko imnis kankarem faro nadi ḇeḇor na.
47001012	Roi nkoryaḇya mboi swaruser ro nkosnesna ro roi ḇeḇor nkofrur ro supswan ine -- isyadi ro ḇaḇeoser nkoḇedi kuker naek mko -- nkofrurna kwar kuker kakara ḇenapes ma ḇesren ro Allah. Nkofrurna kuker fawawi snonkakuḇa, ḇape kuker samambraḇ Allah ḇyuk maḇenko.
47001013	-
47001014	Roi nkofas mufa ḇemko ido nkofas monda roi mkowasya ma mkofawi. Fafisu ine mkofawibos nko ḇaim, ḇape yakyar naek srar nari mkofawi kaku nko. Rarirya, fafisu Manseren Yesus ifyafer wer, naek srar nari mkomsik snar nkoimnis raris nko kako nkomsik snar mko.
47001015	Snar kakyar ine iso randakya yaw fayarakaki mko insa naek srar mkosma ḇok ḇerarwan risuru.
47001016	Yakara fayaḇe yaramufa ḇemko ro marandan ayedi ḇeraḇe Makedonia ma yakaḇer nari yasnefer wer faro mko, insa naek mkofnoḇek aya fa yambran pdefḇe Yudea.
47001017	Ḇape yamḇrer kwar swaruser ine; inja, aw ine fyasna yafrur famfnom mondake? Rofafisu yawya, yaw imnis marisen ayedi mondake, inja yakofen, "Mboi", kniko wer, "Roḇa"?
47001018	Kaku ḇeri kuker Allah ḇedworen, snonsnon ḇyedi ro rosai ikofen na, asas ayedi mufa ḇemko yakofenḇa, "Mboi" ma "Roḇa".
47001019	Snar Yesus Kristus Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, Silas ma Timotius suḇaryas faro mko kwar ani, ma mankundaya kako yakofenḇa "Mboi" ma "Roḇa". Inja imnis kankarem "Mboi" ro Allah.
47001020	Snar kuker Yesus Allah ikofen kwar "Mboi" ro asas-asas ḇyena. Knam ine eḇedari kokarem "Amin" ("Kaku ḇeri") mufaḇe Allah snar Yesus Kristus. Kofrur rarirya insa Allah isma sanandik.
47001021	Allah ḇefrur fa nko ma mko kodworen koḇeoser kuker Kristus; iso ḇekimfir koḇardi faro mankundi.
47001022	Iso eḇedari ryem kofa koḇe kawasa ḇyesi ma ḇyuk Rur ḇyedi ro kosnesna imnis fafnoḇek ro roi ḇeḇor kam fyasos maḇeko.
47001023	Allah ḇyesaksi ḇeaya -- snar ifawi aya -- mboi yaraḇe Korintusḇaya, snar yamewer yafrur mkosnemna nfafardundi.
47001024	Yaḇedafdifer mkoḇa ro rosai nari mkokyarya, snar kakyar mkoḇena nadworen kwar. Mboi yafararur fnoḇek mko monda insa mkomarisen syadi wer.
47002001	Iso eḇedari yakara namuk kwar fayarakaki mufa ḇemkoḇa kuker saraurow ḇefrur fafardun mkosnem na.
47002002	Snar rofyor yafrur fafardun mkosnemna, mansei wer nari ḇeḇuk sneprei ḇeaya, imbude snonkaku ansi onoḇa ḇoi mkoiso yafrur fasne ḇefafardunya?
47002003	Iso eḇedari yafas syap ine mufaḇe naek srar mko. Yamewer yarakaki mko, insa rakaki ayedi ifrur fafardun awer aya, snar mko snonkaku ḇeḇuk raryaḇ maḇe aya. Snar yakyar yasma raryaḇ, rarirya naek mkosma raryaḇ kako.
47002004	Yafas mufa ḇemko kuker sne ḇefafardun ma ḇemarḇak ma kuker mkarui ḇeḇor ḇefarsyersyer. Snar ro kakara yedi insa naek mkofafardunḇa, mboi insa naek mkofawi yaswar kaku ḇeri mko kam.
47002005	Rofyor snonkaku ono sifrur roi ḇefrur fafardun nanekam kwar, ifrurna maro ayaḇa, mboi naborke roḇa ma naborḇa -- insa yapakrek faroi awer -- ifrur rarirya faro naek srar mko kam.
47002006	Faro snonkaku ḇerariryasya, samamyai kawasa ḇeborsya ssḇuk faroi imnis kwar.
47002007	Inja naek buk payasyos faroi ma wadifi wer insa fafardun ḇyedi myarḇak mankenem awer.
47002008	Inja yor, insa mkofasna wer faroi mboi kaku ḇeri mkoswari.
47002009	Yafas syap ine mufa ḇemko fa yaḇukmnasen sas rosai mkomarisen mkoso ḇesya kwar ro fasasna ayena.
47002010	Rofyor mkoḇuk payasyos faro snonkaku ḇefrur sasar faro mko rarirya aya kako yakpyos sasar ro snonkaku ani. Snar rosai yapyos kwar -- rofyor roi ḇeḇefandun kaku ono naisya faneḇepyos -- inja roḇarpon Kristus yaḇuk payasyos faḇei snar naek srar mko.
47002011	Yafrur rarirya insa Ibiris dun awer fafisu faḇyuki duf mko; snar kofawi aw ḇyenaḇa.
47002012	Rofyor yarama ro Troas kuker kakara ma yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Kristus, Manseren ḇyas kwar nyan maḇe aya insa yafararur ro moḇ ani.
47002013	Ḇape yaknonba snar yasrow Titus naek koḇani ro diaḇa. Inja yor snonkaku ḇena ro diasyaḇo yaraḇe Makedonia.
47002014	Ḇape kasumasa mufaḇe Allah, snar fyarkin ko ḇesya kwar fakoso yakyaker ḇaḇefainda Kristus. Allah nyako insa ḇararyas ḇekur Kristus imnis mani spum ḇediref ḇeryer ḇemoḇ nakam.
47002015	-
47002016	Snar koine komnis mani spum mamboḇo ḇediref, Kristus ikun ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi. Faro snonkaku ḇeraḇe raro, koine komnis dadiref raro ḇemamun; ḇape faro snonkaku nari ḇesma koreri, komnis dadiref mani spum ḇeyun ḇekankenem. Inja, manseiso nari ḇefrur mnis fararur ine?
47002017	Nkomnis raris snonkaku ḇese ḇefrur Allah wos ḇyediḇe roi ḇefarḇyan mondaḇa. Kakara nkoḇena nasren, snar Allah i ḇeḇuk fararur inema ḇenko. Ma Allah mankundi myam mboi nkoḇaryas wos ani imnis manfamyan Kristus.
47003001	Inja roi ḇeradine fyasna imnis nkosandik mankun nko werke? Roḇa nkofandun syap sanandik faro naek srar mko, roḇawer sanandik ro naek srar mko raris snonkaku ḇesesya sḇefandun raya?
47003002	Syap sanandik nkoḇedi isoine naek srar mankundaw, ḇefas ro nkosnesna ma snonkaku oser-oser iwasya ma ifawi.
47003003	Mankunsi smam mboi naek srar mkomnis Kristus syap fyas, ma fyarem fankune. Syap ani ḇyeḇefas kuker fara esḇa, ḇape kuker Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇekenemya; ḇyeḇefas ro karufasḇa kako, mboi ro snonkaku sisnesna.
47003004	Nkokofen rarirya snar kakyar nkoḇena faro Allah snar Kristus.
47003005	Roi oso isya ro nko ḇaḇeri ḇefrur fa nkomsik fankofrur fararur ine, ḇape Allah i ḇeḇuk masasik ani maḇe nko.
47003006	Iso ḇefrur fankomsik ma nkoḇe manfamyan faro asas ḇebabo oso; asas ḇeḇeknam ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, mboi ro sasoser-sasoser ḇefasḇa. Snar sasoser ḇefasna nari nbuk raro, mboi Allah Rur ḇyedi kada ḇyuk kankenem.
47003007	Rofyor asas nari ḇeḇuk raroya ḇyeḇefrur ma ḇyeḇepaikir ro karui, Allah baba ḇyena nasnai kuker sanapnaper. Sananai ani isnaperbos kaku isof kawasa Israel simku fa smam Moses ḇarpon ḇyediḇa, rofyor sananai ani ipromes fawawasya. Inja rofyor asas nari ḇeḇuk raro ani ḇyeḇefrur ma ḇyeḇeseḇen kuker sanapnaper ḇeba kaku,
47003008	rarirya fararur asas Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyukya, ḇyeḇeseḇen kuker sanapnaper ḇesyadibos kaku ḇeri wer.
47003009	Rofyor ḇakḇuk asas ḇeḇuk samamyai faro snonkaku isnaper kaku, rarirya ḇakḇuk asas ḇeḇuk faro snonkaku iḇye kaḇer kuker Allah isnaperbos kaku wer.
47003010	Nari kokofen mboi rosai ḇesnaper ro ḇepon iwara, isnaper werḇa kwar snar sanapnaper ḇero baboine.
47003011	Rofyor roi ḇekain kawanba oso isnaper, rarirya roi ḇekain fyoroya nari isnaper syadi wer.
47003012	Snar nkona kakyar imnis ine, eḇedari nkawos masasik rarirya.
47003013	Nkomnis raris Mosesḇa, ḇerup ḇarpon ḇyedi kuker mar ḇerup insa kawasa Israel smam awer Manseren sananai ḇyedi ḇeḇe ḇepromes fawasbur ḇarpon ḇyedi.
47003014	Swaruser sena neḇerup kwar. Ma isof ro ras ine kako kakara sena neḇerup kaker kuker mar ḇerup rofafisu siwasya syap-syap ro asas ḇekwar ani. Mar ḇerup ani ḇyeḇeḇas monda rofyor snonkakusya sḇeoser kuker Kristus.
47003015	Baboine kako, rofyor siwasya Moses syap ḇyena, mar ḇerup ani isya ryup kaker kakara sena.
47003016	Ḇape rofyor snonkaku oso kyaḇer wer faro Allah, mar ḇerup ani kako ḇyeḇekanow bur ḇarpon ḇyedi.
47003017	Inja, Manseren kokara rodine isoine Rurya. Ma romoḇsai Manseren Rur ḇyedi isya roya moḇ ani ḇaḇemkeya isya kako.
47003018	Ḇarpon koḇena kam neḇerupḇa kuker mar ḇerup. Komnis fanin smam faswef kuker sanapnaper ro Manseren Yesus. Rarirya koḇe ḇefadwer pdef fakomnis i; faḇaḇye muma kosnaper syadi snar sanapnaper ḇerama ro Rur, Manseren koḇedi.
47004001	Fararur nkofrur ine ḇyeḇefrur kuker Allah famfnoḇek ḇyedi. Iso ḇeḇuk fararur ine maḇenko. Rarirya nkoḇe ḇirḇarḇa.
47004002	Nkofararur kuker nyan ḇepampan ma ḇefrur fanorḇa. Nkomewer nkofararur kuker ankarkar roḇa nkowararye Allah wos ḇyenandi. Kuker sananai nkoḇaryas Allah marisen ḇyena. Inja nkoḇuk faro snonkaku kam faskara nko ro sisnesna ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi.
47004003	Rofyor Ankankinem Ḇeḇye nkoḇaryas ani ono sifawi ḇaim ido, sikada snonkaku nari ḇeramura ḇeraroya.
47004004	Ilah (Manserensya) ḇeḇarḇor ḇeyuf supswan ine srup kakara snonkaku ḇekyarḇasya. Si ḇedwareksi insa smam awer sananai ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ḇekur Kristus baba ḇyedi, ḇemnis Allah fanir ḇyedi.
47004005	Wos nkobaryas ine wos ro mankun nkoḇa. Wos ani ikada wos ḇekur Yesus Kristus; mboi i Manseren; ma nkoine manfamyan ro naek srar mko snar Yesus Kristus.
47004006	Allah ikofen, "Iḇyekada ro pampanya dori sananaya dek," Allah ani kako ḇeḇuk sananaya fadek ro kosnesna, insa kakara koḇena nasnai insa kofawi Allah sanapnaper ḇyedi ḇesnai ro Kristus ḇarpon ḇyedi.
47004007	Ḇape nana ḇepyum ro rur ani nkuni kuker baken sifrur ro saprop ḇeḇemaejaḇa ine. Rarirya isnaibos mboi baba papoik ani isya ro Allah mboi isya ro nkoḇa.
47004008	Sawos nkora ḇandiḇar, ḇape nkodadorḇa. Nko kmom, ḇape nkoḇeḇirḇarḇa.
47004009	Sibor sembroḇ nko, ḇape nkemir nkokain ḇa. Ma fafisu ono siprer nko rao nkosapi, ḇape nkomarḇa.
47004010	Ro moḇ rosai wer nkoisya nkoḇaḇir ḇesya kwar marmar Yesus ḇyedi ro baken nkoḇena, insa kankenem ḇyedi isnaibos ro ḇaken nkoḇena.
47004011	Rofyor nkokenem ine, marmarya iḇemyun nko snar Yesus, insa Yesus kankenem ḇyedi kako isnaibos wer ro baken nkoḇena nari ḇemar ine.
47004012	Ine fyasna ro baken nkoḇena marmarya isya ifararur sambraḇ ro nyan ḇyena, ro naek srar baken bedi kankenemya iso ḇefararur sambraḇya.
47004013	Ro Refo kosma wos ine, "Yakyar eḇedari yawawos." Inja, kuker kakyar ḇerarirya kako, nkawawos snar nkokyar.
47004014	Nkokyar mboi Allah ḇeḇawes kaḇer Manseren Yesus kwar, nari ḇyawes kaḇer kokako kuker Yesus, ma dun naek srar mko ma nko ḇeḇarpon ḇyedi.
47004015	Roi ḇeḇor nane kam nefandun faro naek srar mko. Snar snonkaku sibor sifawi Allah saswar ḇyedi, nadi kasumasa nabor syadi wer ssḇuk mufaḇe Allah; rarirya Allah isma sanandik.
47004016	Iso eḇedari nkoḇeḇirḇarḇa. Nyan ro ḇar baken koḇena namkok syadi rariso wer, ḇape nyan ro ḇar rur koḇena neḇefrur babo ro ras ḇeras.
47004017	Ma kandera ḇemanan, nkofawi ḇekain fyoroḇa, nari ḇyuk maḇenko marisen ḇesyadadi ma ḇekain fyoro. Marasrisen ani ibasyadi wer kaku rofyor koḇuki kyara kandera ani.
47004018	Snar nkomam epen roi komam naneḇa, mboi roi komamba na. Roi komam na nkain fyoroḇa, ḇape roi komamba na nkain faswef isof fyoro-fyoro.
47005001	Snar nkofawi rofyor aḇdares isoine baken -- moḇ kokenem ro supswan ine ḇyeḇemkok, nari Allah fyasos maḇeko rum oso ro boiyaswa, Allah mankundi ḇefruriya ma ḇekain fyoro-fyoroya.
47005002	Ro aḇdares kokain ro ine, kofafko snar komarisen kaku ḇeri kokain ro rum koḇedi ro boiyaswaya.
47005003	Snar ro rum ine, koḇe ḇefadiren.
47005004	Rofyor kokain ro aḇdares ro supswan ine kofafko snar kamnam koḇena nmarḇak. Snar komarisen, kofasparbur baken koḇeja ro supswan ineḇa, mboi komarisen fa kosun baken ro boiyaswa, insa baken koḇedi nari ḇemar ine kankenemya dufepeni.
47005005	Ḇefasos ko faro moḇ ani isoine Allah mankundi, ma ḇyuk Rur ḇyedi maḇeko fa fyaduru ko.
47005006	Eḇedari kosnesna nsambraḇ ḇesyakwar. Kofawi rofyor kokain ro baken koḇena, koḇinkwan ro rum nari kokain roya fnoḇek kuker Manseren.
47005007	Snar kokenem kuker knam kakyar, mboi ḇyeknam ro roi komam naba,
47005008	eḇedari kosnesna naknon. Komarisen syadi kofasparbur baken koḇena, insa kokain fnoḇek kuker Manseren.
47005009	Eḇedari koḇesewar kaku ḇeri fakofrur sneprei Allah, iḇye rofyor koisya ro aḇdares koḇena ro dine, roḇaido ro diwa.
47005010	Snar nari kokam kores ro ḇarpon Kristus karapesa nasan ḇenapes ḇyedi, ma oser-oser isma munsu imnis raris fararur ḇyedi ro supswan ine -- fararur ḇeḇye roḇaido ḇeḇarḇor.
47005011	Kofawi rosaiso komkak Manseren; eḇedari koḇesewar fa snonkaku sikyar. Allah myamḇaḇir parasres ko, ma yakyar naek mko kako mkomamḇaḇir nko ro mkosnemna.
47005012	Kuker ine nkor fa naek mkosandik nkoḇa. Marisen nkoḇeja monda nkoḇuk nyan ḇeḇye oso faro naek mko insa mkosandik maro nko, insa naek mkofawi rariso nari naek mkokarem faro snonkaku ḇeḇefandun roi ḇekur baken ma roi ḇekur ruryaḇa.
47005013	Snar Allah fandun ḇyena, nkofrur imnis ḇesawo. Ma snar fandun naek mkoḇena, nkoknon.
47005014	Kristus saswar ḇyedi ḇedif nko; ma nkofawi snon oser imar fadwer snonkakusya kam kwar, iso eḇedari snonkakusya kam simar kwar.
47005015	Kristus imar fadwer snonkakusya kam, insa snonkaku ḇekenemsya, sikenem faro mankunsi ḇardi werḇa, mboi sikenem faro Kristus ḇemar kwar ma ḇyeḇeḇawes kaḇer wer snar fandun sena.
47005016	Iso eḇedari, nkokara snonkakusya werḇa imnis warnkyara snonkaku. Randakya nkokara Kristus kwar roḇar snonkaku, ḇape baboine roḇa kwar.
47005017	Snonkaku ḇeḇeoser kwar kuker Kristus, sḇesnonkaku ḇebabo kaku ḇeri. Inja roi ḇekwar ro snonkaku ani isyaḇa kwar -- snar nakam nbabo kwar.
47005018	Allah iso ḇefrur nakamya. Ifrur rarirya snar Kristus ma koḇye kaber wer kuker i, raimnai ḇyuk fararur maḇeko fa koḇaryas wos ḇeḇye insa snonkaku ḇesesya kako sakḇye kaḇer wer faro Allah.
47005019	Inja wos nkoḇena kuker manfandu Kristus, Allah ifrur isof snonkakusya siḇye kaḇer wer kuker Allah. Allah ifrurna rarirya mboi kyor sasar snonkakusya sifrur faroi naba. Ma Allah ḇyuk fararur ani maḇenko fa nkoḇaryas wos ani.
47005020	Inja nkoine manwawan Kristus. Ma nkawawos faro naek mko imnis Allah mankundi ḇewawos faro naek mko. Snar Kristus snonsnon ḇyedi, nkor kaku ḇeri ḇemko, mkona Allah saswar ḇyedi ḇeḇuk fa mkoḇye kaḇer wer kuker i.
47005021	Kristus ifrur sasarḇa, ḇape Allah ḇyuk faḇyar sasar koḇena, insa koḇye kaḇer wer kuker Allah, snar ḇaḇeoser koḇena kuker Kristus.
47006001	Snar nkoine min ḇefararur fnoḇek Allah, inja nkor kaku ḇeri insa naek mkoḇefandunba awer Allah ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyedi.
47006002	Allah ikofen, ro Refo radine, "Rofyor yamarisen, yarower aw kwar, ma ro ras koreriya, yafnoḇek aw kwar." Mkoswarepen kaku! Fafisu marisenya isoine. Ma rasya isoine fakosma koreri.
47006003	Nkofrur roi osoḇaḇeri ḇefrur fa snonkakusya sfafayaf. Inja, snonkaku osoḇaḇeri fa kyoryae afuffarmyan nkoḇena.
47006004	Inja, ro fararur ḇeḇor nkoḇena, nkofasna mboi nkoine Allah manfamyan ḇyesi. Kandera ḇeḇor nakam nkoḇar na kuker kaḇaḇaḇ:
47006005	nkosma aprer, nkosmai ro bui, ma spanjuḇerbo smun nko; nkofararur sambraḇ, nkenef mnisḇa, ma nabor kaku nkananba.
47006006	Ḇape kuker sne ḇesren, fawawi, kaḇaḇaḇ ma sne ḇeḇye, nkofasna mboi nkoine Allah manfyan ḇyesi. Ono wer nkokyar faro fanaḇnoḇek Allah Rur ḇyedi, ma kuker saswar ḇenapes,
47006007	ma nkoḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi kuker papoik Allah, nkofasna mboi nkoine Allah manfyan ḇyesi. Nkufepen Allah marisen ḇyena imnis romamun maḇe nko fa nkoḇuki doper, roḇa nkokḇriwarek mankun nko.
47006008	Sḇesyowi nko, ḇape skoryae nko kako; sisandik ma sonef kako. Nkonapes rariso wer, ḇape soḇe nkoḇeankar.
47006009	Soḇe smamḇaḇir nkoḇa, ḇape snonkakusya kam smamḇaḇir nko. Soḇeda nkomar, ḇape nkoisya nkoḇye kaker. Smun siprer nko rariso wer ḇape nkomarḇa.
47006010	Rofyor sifrur fa nkosnesna nfafardun rariso wer, ḇape nkoryaḇ ḇesya kwar kako. Nkomnis snonkaku ḇesaḇarar, ḇape nkofrur fa snonkaku sibor sekayan. Nkomnis snonkaku ḇena royoḇa, ḇape nkona roi ḇeḇor nakam.
47006011	Naek srar yaswar kaku ro Korintus! Nkawos isnai kaku faro naek srar mko kwar. Roi ḇero nkosnesna nkokofen na kwar.
47006012	Nkosnesna nbasbos faro naek srar mko, mboi naek srar mkoiso ḇesisen mkosnemnabur nko.
47006013	Knikine kawawosyae, inja yor, insa mkoḇas mkosnemna kako maro nko. (Yawawos mufa ḇemko imnis romawa karyer ayesi.)
47006014	Mkomarisen mkoḇe oser awer kuker snonkaku ḇekyar faro Yesusḇasya; ine imnisḇa. Inja snonkaku ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyenasya nari sḇeoser kuker snonkaku ḇesampum Allahsyake! Isnaya nari ḇyeoser kuker pampanyaḇa.
47006015	Kristus nari ḇyeoser kuker Ibirisyaḇa. Rosai ḇemnis kuker snonkaku ḇeḇe Kristen ma snonkaku ḇeḇe Kristenḇa?
47006016	Rosai ḇepam Allah rum ḇyedi kuker rum karwarya? Koine Allah rum ḇyedi, isoine Allah ḇekenem. Allah mankundi ikofen, "Nari yakain ro fadu sena, ma yakenem fnoḇeksi. Nari yaḇe Allah farosi, ma nari sḇe kawasa ayesi.
47006017	Eḇedari, mkosasyarbur kawasa ḇemambaḇir Allahḇasya, ma mkoḇinkwanbur si. Mkopampam awer beri kuker roi ḇeyarwarem, rarirya nari yana mko.
47006018	Nari yaḇe Kma faro mko, ma nari mkoḇe romawa maro aya, Manseren ḇepoik kaku ikofen rarirya."
47007001	Naek srar yaswar kaku! Snar asas ḇeḇor kam neḇefrur maroko kwar. Inja, iḇye kofasren mankun ko ro roi ḇeḇor kam ḇefrur mamas baken ma rur koḇesi. Iḇye komkak faro Allah, ma kofrur sren ko insa kosma kankenem ḇardi kuker Allah.
47007002	Naek srar mkoḇuk moḇ ro mkosnemna maḇe nko. Nkawos sasar faro snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri, ma nkofrur fromo snonkaku oseroḇa kako.
47007003	Yakofen rarirya fa yaḇuk sasar faro naek srarḇa. Snar, imnis yakofen ḇepon faro mko kwar, naek mkofanam kaku nkosnesna, ma kokam koḇebati ḇekenem kam ma ḇemar kam.
47007004	Yakyarbos kaku ḇeri faro mko. Ma yamsik syadi kuker mko! Mboi nkosma kandera nabor rariso wer, ḇape yasma sneprei snar naek srar mko. Rarirya yaryaḇ kaku!
47007005	Rofafisu nkofyafer ro Makedonia wer, nkokfis ro kanderayaḇa kako. Ro moḇna kam nkosma marindi; ro mun snonkaku ḇese rakrakrok, romun nkoḇeja makakak ro nkosnesna.
47007006	Ḇape kasumasa faro Allah, ḇeḇuk sneprei faro snonkaku ḇeḇeḇirḇarsya; ḇyuk sneprei maḇe nko, snar Titus rarama ḇyedi.
47007007	Nkosnesna naprei snar Titus ryamaya dererḇa, ḇape snar ikofen ḇadir naek srar mkoḇuk sneprei ḇei. Ikofen ḇadir maro nko naek srar mkomarisen fa mkosrow aya; mboi naek srar mkofafko mboi baboine kuker sneḇemarisen mkoḇesano warek aya. Wos annane nafrur fa yaryaḇ syadi wer.
47007008	Imbude syap ayedi ifrur fa mkosnemna nfafardun kwar, ḇape yafafkoḇa snar syap yafas kwar ani. Kaku rofafisu yamam syap ayedi ifrur fafardun mkosnemna -- ḇape fafardun mkoḇena nkain fyoroḇa -- rariryano yafafko kako.
47007009	Ḇape insape yamarisen -- snar mkosnemna nfafardun kwaryaḇa, mboi snar fafardun mkoḇan na nafrur fa naek srar mkosadwer rari mkoḇena. Mboi Allah imarisen fafardun ḇerarirya na. Inja, nkofrur fromo mkoḇa.
47007010	Snar ḇaḇefafardun Allah imarisen na nbuk bon fararwe sne ḇeḇuk koreri. Ma snonkaku nari sfafko ro roi ḇeḇesya ineḇa. Rarirya, fafardun ro supswan ine ḇyefafardun ḇeḇuk marmar.
47007011	Naek srar indo mkokara sas bon rosai mkosma snar fafardun ḇerama ro Allah! Bon ḇyedi isoine naek srar mkosewar kaku ḇeri fa mkofasren famameya! Naek srar mkoyin sasarya, mkomkake, mkoswarkuf, mkomsik, mkomarisen mkoḇuk samamyai faro ḇesasarsya! Roi ḇeḇor nane kam mkofasna kwar mboi mkofrur sasarḇa.
47007012	Inja, yafas syap ani kwar, syap ani ḇyeḇefas snar snonkaku ḇefrur sasar kwarsyaḇa. Syap ani kako faro snonkaku ḇeḇekandera kwar snar sasar aniḇa. Yafas syap ani insa ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, naek srar mkofawi ro mankun mko rariso naek srar mamamepen mkoḇena naba kaku maḇe nko.
47007013	Iso ḇeḇuk sneprei nko. Ma sneprei mondaḇa, mboi isyadi wer snar nkomam Titus raryaḇ ḇyedi; naek srar mkoḇuk sneprei kwar faroi.
47007014	Ma yasandik mko kwar faroi. Kasumasa, snar mkofrur mamyai ayaḇa. Roi ḇeḇor nkokofen kwar faro mko roi ḇekaku nairi. Rarirya kako sanandik rosai nkokofen ro mko faro Titus nkaku kako.
47007015	Insape iswarsyadi naek mko, snar iswarepen naek mko kam mkomarisen farkankin ḇyena ma rariso naek mkosrowi kuker makakak ma araryof.
47007016	Yamarisen kaku, ma yakyar kaku mko.
47008001	Naek srar, nkomarisen famkofawi kako rariso Allah saswar ḇyedi faro kawasa Kristen ro Makedonia.
47008002	Kawasa Kristen ansi seḇemnasen kwar kuker ḇaḇewayam ḇemarbak kaku. Ḇape rofandu ḇaḇewayam ma saḇarar sena siryaḇ ma ssḇuk fafnoḇek ḇekakaku faro snonkaku ḇese.
47008003	Mankundaya yamam ssḇuk raris moḇ sisma raya, mboi ssḇuk syadi wer. Ma oso ḇyedifer siḇa,
47008004	sikako sor ro nko insa sakḇuk fafnoḇek faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi ro Yudea.
47008005	Nkokyar ma nkor ro siḇa mboi ssḇuk rarirya, snar randakya ssḇuk mankunsi faro Manseren kwar; ḇarpurya faro nko kako, snar Allah imarisen rarirya.
47008006	Inja, nkor kaku faro Titus -- ḇerak sasewar ine -- insa ifrur pdef sasewar ḇeḇye ine ro fandu naek srar kako.
47008007	Naek srar mkoḇye kaku ro roi ḇeḇor kam. Naek srar mkoḇye ro kakyarya, mkoḇuk kakara, ro fawawi, ma ro roi ḇeḇor ḇekur sasewar, ma ro sasewar mkoḇena maḇe nko. Inja, iḇye naek mkofawi nanem kako ro sasewar ḇeḇye ine.
47008008	Yakofen na imnis sasoser oso mufa ḇemkoḇa. Ḇape kuker fasasna ro snonkaku ono ḇese ḇefararur sambraḇ kaku ḇeḇuk fafnoḇek fa ḇefnoḇek snonkaku, ma yamarisen yamam kako isof ro moḇsaiso naek srar saswar mkoḇena.
47008009	Snar naek srar mkofawi kaku mboi Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi iswar ko. Ḇyekayan, ḇape ifrur mankundiḇe ḇesaḇarar faro naek srar fandun mkoḇena, insa kuker saḇarar ḇyena, naek srar mko ḇekayan.
47008010	Imnis kakara yedi, ro roi ḇeḇesya nane iḇye naek srar mkofrur posa rosai mkorandak kwar ro wampasi wambarek aniyafa. Snar naek srar mkoiso ḇerak sasewar ine. Rarirya kako kakara fa mkofrur sasewar ḇeradine ryama ro mko.
47008011	Inja, iḇye naek srar mkofararur pdef imnis samambraḇ mkoḇena. Iḇye naek srar mkomsik fa mkofrur posa sasewar ani, imnis raris randakya kako mkomsik ḇo mkawraya.
47008012	Rofyor mkomarisen fa mkoḇuk, nari Allah imarisen fa nyana snar neknam ro rosai mkosma na, mboi neknam ro saḇarar mkoḇenaḇa.
47008013	Yasma kakara ḇaḇeri fa yaḇuk mananan faro snonkaku ḇese ro kankarem, mboi yaḇuk marḇak faro mko. Iḇye namamnis.
47008014	Ḇape snar baboine naek srar mkosma namnis, inja iḇye mkofamfon ananjar sena. Nari rofyor mkakananjar ma saksma namnis, nari sakfnoḇek naek srar mko. Rarirya sukam suḇe ḇeyuf farmyan.
47008015	Sfas ro Refo radine, "Snonkaku ḇero andido, nya syadiḇa, ma snonkaku ḇero bakyaf, dananjarḇa."
47008016	Nko kofen kasumasa mufaḇe Allah snar ifrur fa Titus imyaren imnis nko fa ifnoḇek naek srar mko!
47008017	Snar Titus imarisen iso fararyor nkoḇedi mondaḇa, ḇape ikako imyaren kaku fa ifnoḇek mko isof mankundi imarisen ma dawos namuk fa ryamufa ḇemko.
47008018	Nkofarem fnoḇeki naek oso semafi rofandu kawasa Kristen snar fararur ḇyedi ro ḇararyas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah.
47008019	Snar naek ani ḇyeḇekinfir kwar kako ma kawasa Kristen sikanowi fa ifnoḇek nko ro marandan nkoḇena. Snar nari ro marandan nkoḇedi fa nkoḇuk fafnoḇek anna, insa Manseren isma sanandik ma insa naek srar mkomam mboi nkomarisen nkofnoḇek.
47008020	Nkoḇesasor kaku insa snonkaku ono skara sasar awer nko ro fafnoḇek ḇeba nkoḇuk anna.
47008021	Nkomarisen nkofrur napnapes ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi mondaba, ḇape roḇarpon snonkaku kako.
47008022	Titus kuker naek kokofen ani, ma nkowan naek oso ḇese kako. Nkomnasen birikwar ḇerarwan ono ma nkomam imarisen ifamfnoḇek. Ma baboine, imarisen syadi ifnoḇek naek srar snar ikyar kaku nko.
47008023	Titus, inido min ayedi ḇefararur fnoḇek aya fa ḇefnoḇek mko. Ma faro naek ḇese ansuine, ḇeso fnoḇek Titus, kawasa Kristen siso ḇewan sunya -- sanandik oso faro Kristus.
47008024	Nkokyar naek srar mkofasna saswar farosi, insa kawasa Kristen kam sifawi naek srar mkoswar si ma rosai nkomsik kukerya faro naek srar mkokyar beri.
47009001	Fandun werḇa yafas faro naek srar ro fafnoḇek sfarem faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi ro Yudea.
47009002	Yafawi naek srar mkomarisen mkofnoḇek, ma yasandik mko kwar faro kawasa ro Makedonia. Yakofen farosi, naek srar ro Akhaya randak ro wampasi wambarek ḇesyonde kwar sfasos kwar fa ssḇuk famfnoḇek. Ma naek srar sasewar mkoḇena nadif ḇarḇebaya kwar ro sasewar sena kako.
47009003	Insape yawan Titus ma naek ḇese ansuine mufa ḇemko insa rosai nkomsik nko fa ḇekur mko nebeidi awer. Inja, naek srar iḇye mkofasos, snar yakofen farosi mboi mkofasos famfnoḇek anna kwar.
47009004	Yamkak warek rofyor kawasa Makedonia ono siso fnoḇek aya rofafisu yara mufaḇe mko. Ma rofyor sisrow mkofasos ḇaim, sye, nari komai kaku, snar nkokofen kwar mboi nkokyar faro mko! Ma naek srar mankun mko kako nari mkomai.
47009005	Eḇedari fandun kaku fa yawan ḇepon snonkaku sine faro mko fa mkofasos fanaḇnoḇek mkoḇe asas anna. Yafrur rarirya insa rofyor yarafa, famfnoḇek mkoḇena nfasos kwar. Rarirya, famfnoḇek ro naek srar mko, neḇeḇuk kuker marisen, mboi kuker ḇaḇedafdiferḇa.
47009006	Mkoswarepen! Snonkaku ḇeḇuḇer rokaker kermkun monda nari duf kermkun monda kako. Ḇape snonkaku ḇeḇuḇer rokaker nabor nari duf nabor kako.
47009007	Snonkaku oser-oser ḇyuk imnis marisen ḇyedi. Ḇyuk kuker fafardun awer roba snar ḇaḇedafdifer, snar Allah iswar snonkaku ḇeḇuk kuker marisensya.
47009008	Allah nari ḇyuk ḇok ḇefarsbawer faro naek srar, insa naek srar mkosma rosai mkoḇe fandun na; mboi nari naek srar mkona syadi fa mkokfrur ḇaḇye.
47009009	Sfas ro Refo ro Allah radine, "Allah ḇyerarwas, ḇyuk faro snonkaku ḇesaḇararsya; ḇaḇye ḇyedi ḇekain fyoro-fyoroya."
47009010	Allah i ḇefasos rokaker faro mambuḇer ma roḇeyan maḇeko, Allah ani kako nari fyasos ma ḇyuk nabor rosai naek buḇer na, insa ḇaḇenaḇye bedi nabor syadi wer.
47009011	Rarirya naek srar nari mkosma mnis roi ḇeḇor kam isof mkomarisen mkoḇuk kuker sanemura. Ma roi ḇeḇor mkoḇuk ma nkoḇerarwas na, nbedar snonkaku sibor sikofen kasumasa faro Allah.
47009012	Snar fararur ḇeḇye naek srar mkofrur ine, ḇyefa Allah kawasa ḇyesi sisma mnis monda ro ananjar senaḇa, ḇape nari sḇedar snonkaku sibor sikofen kasumasa faro Allah.
47009013	Snar ro ḇaḇenaḇye naek srar mkofasna ine, kawasa Kristen ḇeḇor ro Yudea nari sisandik Allah snar smam ḇaḇesyowi mkoḇena faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Kristus mkoso ani. Ma snar sanemura ro naek srar mkoḇerwas rosai isya ro mko farosi ma faro snonkaku ḇesesya kam.
47009014	Ma nari senadi warek naek srar kuker saswar ḇeba snar Allah ḇyenaḇye faro mko.
47009015	Iḇye kokofen kasumasa mufaḇe Allah snar roi ḇyukma naba kaku.
47010001	Ro aya, Paulus, mankundaya ḇardi yamarisen yaḇuk wos ono faro mko. Snonkaku ono sikofen ro aya soḇo, rofyor yasrow naek srar mko, yamsik ayaḇa, mboi yaḇinkwan ido yamsik aya. Mboi snar fafafir ma ḇaḇenaḇye ro Kristus,
47010002	inja yor kaku faro mko: insa mkodif awer aya fa yafasna masasik ayena rofyor yaramufa ḇemko. Snar yakara fa yaḇe yafasna masasik ayena faro kawasa ḇekofen mboi nkofararur kuker kakara ro supswan ine.
47010003	Mboi koisya kokenem kaker ro supswan ine, ḇape kofaḇaḇri kuker romamun supswan ine senaḇa.
47010004	Romamun koḇuki fyaḇaḇri na romamun supswan naisyaḇa, ḇape romamun Allah fyasos kuker papoik ḇyedi. Kuker romamun anna koḇuki kyakok ayar mamun snonkaku; ma koḇuki idwarek famfaḇri na
47010005	ma koḇukna nkakok ayar mamun marares sḇawes fa ssḇuki isampum napnapes ro Allah. Koḇukna nfor kakara kawasa ma kofrursi fa sesyowi mufaḇe Kristus.
47010006	Ma rofyor naek srar mkoḇeuser kaku kwar, nari mkofasos fa mkoḇuk samamyai faro snonkaku kam ḇeḇeuser ḇasya.
47010007	Naek srar mkofawi rosai ḇekakuya. Fyor snonkaku ono sikyar Kristus nyasi, iḇye kyukeḇ mankundi ma ifawi mboi Kristus nya nko kako imnis si.
47010008	Yafawi yamaiḇa rofyor yamsik nabor syadi wer ro Manseren papoik ḇyuk kwar maḇe nko, snar papoik ani ḇyeḇeḇuk fa nkokḇawes naek srar, mboi nkoḇuki kyakok ḇa.
47010009	Ro syap ayena yamewer mkokara ḇo mkoḇo yafrur makakak mko.
47010010	Nari snonkaku ono sikofen ḇosoḇo, "Paulus syap ḇyena nmarḇak ma npakrek, ḇape rofyor mankundi isya ro fandu ko, syambraḇ ḇa ma wos ḇyena nefaindaḇa!"
47010011	Iḇye snonkaku ḇerarirya ansi sifawi mboi rofyor nkorafa, nari nkofrur imnis rosai nkofas ro syap anna.
47010012	Kakuḇaḇoi nari yakara roḇa yaḇuk mankundaya fayamnis kuker kawasa ḇesandik mankunsisya ḇa. Snonkaku ansi sifawi royoḇaḇeri ssḇuk mankunsi skara imnis warnkyara fa skarayae mankunsi.
47010013	Nkoma rariryaḇa. Nkomsik nko, fa nkosyadi yawek yaḇa. Mboi nkoisya ro yawek supya fyor Allah ḇyuk fa nko fararur roya. Ma naek srar mkaksun ro supya fyor ani kako.
47010014	Inja, rofyor nkorakaki naek srar ma nkoḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Kristus mufa ḇemko, kaku ḇeri nkunuk yawek ro supya fyor nkofararur royaḇa, snar naek srar mkoisya ro yawek ani dori.
47010015	Ine fyasna nkosandik nkoḇa ro fararur snonkaku ḇese ḇekain ro ḇondibur Allah yawek ḇyuk maḇe nko. Mboi nkokyar naek srar kakyar mkoḇena neḇefamfon wer insa nkofrur fararur ḇeba syadi wer rofandu naek srar, ḇape nkokain faswef ro Allah yawek ḇyuk maḇe nko.
47010016	Rarirya nkoḇaryas kako Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani ro mnu-mnu ḇese mboi nkomarares mankun nkoḇa ro fararur nkofrur kwar ro supya mnuk snonkaku ḇesesya suffarmyan rona.
47010017	Sfas ro Refo radine, "Snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇemarares kuker roi oso, iḇye imarares i kuker rosai Allah ifrur kwar na."
47010018	Snonkaku mansei Allah isandikya, i besma sanandik ro kawasa, mboi ḇesandik mankundiḇa.
47011001	Mkoḇuk fa yafrurḇe ḇefawi royoḇa kerkoper. Iḇyeke?
47011002	Yaswar mufaḇe naek srar, imnis Allah mankundi iswar mufaḇe naek srar kako. Naek srar mkomnis dojaro ḇesren kaker oso, yaḇe asas kwar fa nari ḇefakawin kuker snon oso, isoine Kristus.
47011003	Ḇape yamkak warek kakara naek srar mkosma fafrowes fa nari mkoḇesyowi faro Kristusḇa, imnis raris ḇepon iwara Hawa kako isma fafrowes ro ikakya.
47011004	Snar rofyor snon oso ryama faro naek srar ma ḇyuk farkarkor ro Yesus eḇeseya -- mboi Yesus nkofasna kwar aniḇa. Ma naek srar mkomarisen kako mkona rur ma 'ankankinem ḇeḇye' eḇesebos beri kuker Allah Rur ḇyedi ma Ankankinem Ḇeḇye mkosma kwar ro nko.
47011005	Yafawi yasasar kermkuno ḇaḇeri ro 'manwawan-manwawan' ḇebasyadi mkoḇesi!
47011006	Mboi yafawi yawawos mankunba, ḇape fawawi ḇekur Allah yafawi syadi. Eḇedari nkofas na kwar roi ḇeḇor kam mufaḇe naek srar.
47011007	Rofyor yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah faro naek srar mko, yor sasuref kermkun oḇa ro naek srar kako; ma rarirya yarun mankundaya. Yafrur rarirya insa yakanow naek srar mko. Inja, yafrur sasar oso faro naek srarke?
47011008	Rofafisu yuffarmyan naek srar mko kawasa Kristen ḇese siso ḇeḇak warek aya. Rarirya ido yafrur fromo kawasa Kristen ansi insa yafnoḇek naek srar.
47011009	Rofyor yasma pipiḇa rofafisu ani, yamewer yafrur kandera snon oso ro fandu mko. Fandun ayena kam naek srar ḇeramaker Makedonia siso befasosna. Yamkuser aya naḇye insa yaḇuk kandera awer faro naek oso ro rosai ryawer, ma nari yamku pdef faswef rarirya.
47011010	Masasik ayedine oso nari ḇyereriḇa ro moḇ sairya wer ro supya mnuk Akhaya ḇesiper, snar Kristus farkarkor ḇenapes ḇyena naisya ro aya.
47011011	Yakofen rarirya snaro? Yaswar naek srar mkoḇake? Allah ifawi yaswar mko!
47011012	Rosai yafrur ro baboine nari yafrur pdefi insa manwawan ḇese ḇemarares ansi, sisma nyan osoḇa fa simsiksi ḇo sikofen, mboi sakfararur kako imnis ko.
47011013	Snonkaku ḇerarirya syaido manwawan ḇesararer. Sikada sifararur kuker ankarkar ma sefarari imnis Kristus manwawan ḇyesi.
47011014	Kokandor fararur sedi ḇerariryaḇa snar Ibiris mankundi kako ḇyefarari malaikat ḇesren.
47011015	Inja nari kokandorḇa rofyor manfamyan ḇyesi sifrur farari imnis manfamyan ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyedi. Ḇape ḇarpurya nari smunsu farosi imnis fararur ḇeḇor sena.
47011016	Yakofen ḇeosero wer: Imbude ono skara ayaḇe ḇefawi royoḇari. Ḇape rofyor naek mkokara aya rariryano, mkomarisen ido mkoḇuk fa yafawi royoḇayo yamsik kerkoper kako.
47011017	Rodine nari yakofen masasik ayedi, ḇape Manseren iso ḇewan fa yakofenyaḇa. Mboi roi ḇeḇesya ine yawawos imnis snon ḇefawi royoḇa oso.
47011018	Kakuḇaḇoi snonkaku sibor simsiksi ro roi ḇeḇor ro supswan, inja yoḇe yamsik mankundaya kermkuno kako.
47011019	Naek srar kuker sneḇemarisen mkokḇaḇ faro snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇasya, snar mkokara mkofawi nanemrya!
47011020	Rofyor snonkaku sifrur mkoḇe women, roḇa sinem rik mkoḇena, sfasyar nana mkoḇena, ma skara sikaki syadi ro mko ma sḇaser mko, mkoren monda!
47011021	Yamai yakarem mboi nkosambraḇ ḇafa nkofrur imnis si. Ḇape rosai snonkaku ḇese simsiksi kuker na, yamsik aya kako! (Yawawos imnis snon ḇefawi royoḇa.)
47011022	Snon Ibrani siryake? Aya kako snon Ibrani. Snon Israel siryake? Aya kako snon Israel. Abraham up ḇyesiryake? Aya kako rarirya!
47011023	Kristus manfamyan ḇyesiryake? Mboi yawawos imnis snonkaku ḇena swaruserḇa, ḇape aya manfamyan ḇeḇye syadi ro sikam. Yafararur sambraḇ syadi, sḇeaya fa yasun ro bui, siprer aya syadi isof fanam yamar.
47011024	Kawasa Yahudi siprer aya ḇerarwan ririm kwar kuker ayos samfur rikior seser risiw.
47011025	Kawasa Roma siprer ayaḇe rarwan rikior; fafisu ono sso aya kuker karui. Kapalna nambroi kuker ayaḇe rarwan rikior ro soren, ma rarwan oser yapyar yaki yararyoi ḇeoras samfur risuru seser fiak.
47011026	Rarwan nabor kaku yambran mararan ḇeyun raro: war ḇedaf ḇeyun raro, manfasyar ḇeyun raro ro kawasa Yahudi rarirya kako kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, raro ro mnu ḇebana, ḇondina, raro ro soren, ma raro ro kawasa ḇeyap mankunsiḇe naek Kristen ḇape Kristen sisyaḇa.
47011027	Yafararur sambraḇ isof yaḇe yamar kaku: rarwan ono yenefḇa, yananḇa, yinemḇa, rarwan nabor yabiser, yasyuf snar mar bemnisba ma yasma mob fa yakain roḇa.
47011028	Robo nakam, ras ono yararyofwarek kawasa Kristen kam.
47011029	Rofyor ono ssambraḇ ḇa aya kako yaksambraḇ ḇa. Rofyor ono sisapi ro sasar, sne ayedi fyafardun kako.
47011030	Rofyor yamsik ro ras ono, rarirya yamsik ro roi ḇefasna samambraḇ ḇa ayena.
47011031	Yaḇe ankarḇa; Allah, Manseren Yesus Kma ḇyedi ḇyesaksi ḇeaya! Snonsnon ḇyedi isma sanandik ro fyoro-fyoro.
47011032	Rofafisu aya isya ro Damsyik, wairek Aretas faker ḇyedi, iwan bo sordadesya siwaren warek kedwai ro mnuya insa sfor aya.
47011033	Ḇape sikyu aya kuker aram oso ro koḇkir ayar mamun karuya. Rarirya yasma faspar rodia.
47012001	Kakuḇaḇoi fainda oso ro masasikyaḇa. Ḇape yamarisen yaḇaryas kako Allah rosai ḇyuk maḇe aya ro fasasna ma mamam oso.
47012002	Ro wampasi wambarek samfur seser rifiak ḇesyonde yamam snon Kristen oso ḇyeḇekanow ḇesyos ḇeḇekior ro Firdaus (Yafawiḇa baken ḇyedi ḇyeḇekanow kaku roḇa ine mamam oso monda -- Allah i ḇefawi mondaya).
47012003	-
47012004	Yakofen ḇeosero wer yafawi mboi snon ine ḇyeḇekanow ḇe Firdaus (Yafawiḇa baken ḇyedi ḇyeḇekanow kaku roḇa ine mamam oso monda -- Allah i ḇefawi mondaya). Rodiwa snon ani imnaf roi ono snonkakusya sifawi skara naba ma ssḇuk fa snonkakusya sawos naba.
47012005	Snonkaku ani iso eḇedari yamarisen yamsikya, mboi mankundayaḇa. Faro mankundaya, yawos monda roi ḇeḇor ḇekur samambraḇ ḇa ayena, iso eḇedari yamarisen yamsikya.
47012006	Imnis raris yamarisen yamsik ro roi oso kako, ḇape yamewer yaḇe mandawri; mboi nari yakofen roi ḇenapes. Ḇape yafarmkuser aya, snar yamewer snonkaku ono skara ayaḇe ḇesyadi ro rosai smam yafrur kwar roḇa rosai simnaf yakofen kwar.
47012007	Ḇape insa yamarares mankenem awer snar mamam ḇefrur kanandor anna inja skuk baken ayedi kuker borek oso imnis malaikat Ibirisya ḇyaserpum aya. Dafduf ani ḇyeḇeḇuk faiprer aya insa yamararesḇa.
47012008	Yaḇenadi ḇerarwan rikior faro Manseren ro dafduf ani. Yor fa Manseren imarisen ido ikanow dafduf anibur aya.
47012009	Ḇape Manseren kyarem, "Yaswar aw inja imnis mufa ḇeaw; snar papoik ayena nsambraḇ syadi rofyor awsya rwoi samambraḇ ḇaya." Iso eḇedari yamarisen yamsik ro samambraḇ ḇayena, snar rofyor yasambraḇ ḇa, rofafisu ani yaḇaḇir Kristus samambraḇ ḇyedi fyadiren aya.
47012010	Inja yaryaḇ kako kuker samambraḇ ḇa ayena. Yaryaḇ rofyor sonef aya, rofyor yasma kandera, rofyor siyawyaw aya ma rofyor yasma kandera snar Kristus. Snar rofyor yasambraḇ ḇa, rofafisu ani yapok kaku.
47012011	Kaku ḇeri yafrur imnis snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa -- ḇape naek srar mkoiso ḇefrur fa yararirya. Inja yafawi mkoiso ḇesandik aya. Mboi yaḇe maejaḇa rariso wer, nari yakafyoḇa faro manwawan ḇebasyadi mkoḇesi!
47012012	Aḇyair-aḇyair kanandor ma papoik yafasna ro fararur ḇeba kuker kabaḇaḇ mufaḇe naek srar fa nfasna aya ine manwawan oso.
47012013	Ma rosaiso nkomam mankunba ro mko, rofyor nkoḇuk kakara kuker kawasa Kristen ḇese? Mboi roi oser monda isoine: Yafrur kandera faro naek srar mkoḇa famkoḇak warek aya. Mkoḇuk maaf ro sasar aninekada.
47012014	Baboine yafasos ḇerarwan ḇeḇekiorya fa yara kaki mko. Ma yamewer yafrur kandera mko, snar roi yamarisenya arasa mkoḇenaḇa, mboi mankun mko. Snar romawa siso ḇesewar arasa faro sinan sesiḇa, ḇape sinan ansiso ḇesewar arasa faro romawa sesya.
47012015	Snar naek srar mkoi eḇedari kuker sne ḇeryaḇ yamarisen fayaḇuk roi ḇeḇor kam, mboi isof yamarisen yaḇuk mankundaya kako faro naek srar mko. Rofyor yaswar mko rarirya, rosai eḇedari naek srar mkoswar mankun ayaḇa?
47012016	Inja, naek srar mkokofen mankundaya yafrur kandera mkoḇa. Ḇape ono sisya sikofen aya ine yafawi yasararer; inja yasma ḇaḇefainda ro naek srar mko snar kakara sararer ayena.
47012017	Rariryaḇa! Inja ḇaḇefainda rosai yasma ro naek srar ro snonkaku yawan faro mkonsya?
47012018	Yawan Titus ma naek Kristen ḇese ansi kwar fa srakaki mko. Inja Titus dun ḇaḇefainda ono ro mkoke? Ḇape Titus ma aya nufararur kam kuker rur ḇemamnis ma nuso wewur oser!
47012019	Inja mkokara mkoḇo fafisu ine nuḇesewar fa nuḇesano warek nu faro mkoke? Roḇaḇeri! Naek srar nuswar kaku, Allah ifawi roi nkokofen anna kam kada namnis Kristus marisen ḇyedi. Ma roi ḇeḇor nkofrur annakada nkoḇukḇawes kankenem rur ro naek srar.
47012020	Yamames warek imbude rofafisu yarakaki naek srar, nari yasrow naek srar mko imnis moḇ yakyar rayaḇari, ma naek srar kako nari mkosrow aya imnis moḇ mkokyar rayaḇari. Imḇude kosrow ko kuker rakrakrok, sasurem, dosam, rmomen arasa, anonefyae, sikofenyae, marares ma anunḇesisye.
47012021	Yamkak warek imbude Allah ayedi ryun aya wer ro ḇarpon naek srar rofafisu yaramufa ḇemko. Yamames warek kako roḇepon iwara naek srar ono ḇefrur sasar kwar, nari sifrur fayakanes snar simbror baim ma simnaiba ro sifrur farbuk, roi bemamas ma roi ḇemnisḇa.
47013001	Ine rarwan ḇeḇekior nari yarakaki naek srar wer. Sfas ro Refo radine, "Wawos (parakara) oso kyaku rofyor kosma saksi risuru roba kior."
47013002	Snonkaku ḇefrur sasar ro ḇepon iwara kwar ma snonkaku ḇesesya kam, yaḇuk swarepen ḇepon farosi kwar rofafisu yarakaki naek srar ro rarwan ḇeḇesuruya. Insape, rofafisu yaḇinkwan ro naek srar, yaḇuk swarepen wer insa rofyor yaramufa wer, snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri rosi nari ikfisḇa ro samamyaiya.
47013003	Nari naek srar mkosma fasasna kaku ḇeri Kristus dawawos kuker sḇayo ayedi. Rofyor Kristus fyasna papoik ḇyedi faro mko, papoik ḇyedi syambraḇ kaku, rarirya fyasna papoik ḇyedi rofandu naek srar.
47013004	Mboi rofafisu ḇyeḇepai ro aprop, syambraḇ ḇa, ḇape snar Allah papoik ḇyedi baboine ikenem. Nko kako nkosambraḇ ḇa, snar nko ḇeoser kuker Kristus ro kankenemya, ḇape rofyor nkoisya ro ḇarpon mkoḇedi, nko kako nkosambraḇ fnoḇek Kristus snar Allah papoik ḇyedi.
47013005	Indo naek srar mkomnasenbir mankun mko ma mkokukeḇ kaku ḇeri naek srar mkoisya mkokenem imnis kankarem kakyar mkoḇena faro Kristus! Nari naek srar mkofawi mboi Yesus Kristus isya ro fandu mko! -- mboi rofyor naek srar kakyar mkoḇena nkakuḇari.
47013006	Yakyar naek srar mkofawi nkoine nkodworen kaku ro manasnasenya.
47013007	Nkonadi mufaḇe Allah insa imarisen ifnoḇek naek srar famkofrur sasar awer. Mboi nkofasnaḇa nkoine nkofawi nkofrur posa fararur nkoḇena, ḇape insa naek srar mkofawi Allah rosai imarisen na -- imnis raris nkoḇefromo, ḇape roi osoḇa!
47013008	Snar nari nkofrur roi osoḇaḇeri ḇemnisḇa ḇesampum Allah marisen ḇyena; nkokada nkoso Allah marisen ḇyena.
47013009	Nkoryaḇ rofyor nkosambraḇ ḇa, mboi naek srar mkosambraḇ. Nkonadi warek naek srar insa mkokenem mnis.
47013010	Eḇedari yafas syap ine ḇepon rofyor aya isya ḇaim rofandu naek srar mko. Rarirya, rofyor yarafa kwar, nari yafasna pakakrek faro mkoḇa kuker papoik Manseren ḇyukma ḇeaya. Papoik ani ḇyeḇeḇuk fa nkoḇuki ḇyawes naek srar mko, mboi nkoḇuki kyakokḇa.
47013011	Ḇarpurya, naek srar, iḇye mkoryaḇ, ma mkoḇesewar mkokenem mnis. Mko kram farkarkor ḇeḇor ayena. Iḇye naek srar mkoḇe sne oser ma mkokenem kuker aski. Allah ḇesaswar syadi ma ḇeḇeknam aski ani nari ryowus naek srar mko.
47013012	Mkokofen arooyae ma faḇyee imnis naek srar Kristen. Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam sfarem aroo mufa ḇenaek srar.
47013013	Manseren Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok naek srar, ma Allah iswar naek srar. Iḇye Allah Rur ḇyedi ryowus naek srar mko kam kada! Ro nu, Paulus ma Timotius
48001001	Ro Paulus, manwawan oso, mboi snar ro snonkakuḇa, ma ro snonkaku osoḇa kako, mboi ro Yesus Kristus ma Allah, Kmaya, ḇeḇawes i kwar rofandu ḇemarsya,
48001002	ma aya kuker naek ḇerowus ayasya kam, faro jemaat-jemaat ro Galatia:
48001003	Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ḇeramaker Allah, Kma koḇedi, ḇerama ro Yesus Kristus.
48001004	Ḇeḇuk mankundi kwar ḇefarsarser snar sasar koḇena, insa fyasparko ro ḇarḇor supswan ine imnis Allah ma Kma koḇedi marisen ḇyedi.
48001005	Sanandik mufaḇe Allah rawo isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin.
48001006	Yakandor, snar mkowai dokor fasaw bur Allah, ro saswar-fakamaman Yesus ḇeyor mko kwar, ma mkoso ankankinem ḇeḇye oso ḇese,
48001007	Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekakuḇa. Snar snonkaku ono sisya sfarkor ninyan mko ma skara fasoḇo siwararye Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Kristus.
48001008	Ḇape iḇye nko roḇaido malaikat oso ro boiyaswa ḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye oso ḇese bur Ankankakinem Ḇeḇye nkoḇaryas faro mko, nari ḇyeḇefras kada.
48001009	Imnis nkokofen ḇepon kwar, baboine yakofen ḇeoser wer: rofyor snonkaku sisya sḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye oso ḇese bur, rosai mkosma kwar, nari ḇyeḇefras kada.
48001010	Inja knikine rariso: yasewar snonkaku marisen sena roḇaido yasewar Allah marisen ḇyenake? Yasewar fayun snonkaku sisnesna insa simarisen aya kaker? Rofyor yamarisen yasewar fayun snonkaku sisnesna insa simarisen maro aya, rarirya ido ayaine Kristus manfamyan ḇyedi sayaḇa.
48001011	Rarirya yaḇuk farkarkor faro naek ayesi mko, mboi Ankankinem Ḇeḇye yaḇukfarkor ani Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro snonkaku riryaḇa.
48001012	Snar yasma i ro snonkakuḇa, ma snonkakusi ḇefarkor i maḇe ayasyaḇa, mboi yasma i kuker fasasna ro Yesus Kristus.
48001013	Snar mkomnaf ḇepon kwar kankenem ayedi ro agama Yahudi: Yafrur kandera Allah jemaat ḇyena kuker pakakrek kaku ma yasewar fayakakok na.
48001014	Ma rofyor ayaisya ro agama Yahudi ayaiso ḇero ḇarpon syadi ro min ḇeḇor ayesi ḇemnis kuker aya rofandu er ayedi, imnis snonkaku ḇemyaren ḇefaduru rari up ayesi.
48001015	Ḇape rofafisu Allah, ḇekimfir aya randak ro yaḇe ḇeyaḇen ḇaimya ma dor aya kuker saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi,
48001016	imarisen fyasna Rumkun ḇyedi maḇe aya, insa yaḇaryas i rofandu er-er ḇese ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, rarirya fafisu oso ḇaḇeri fayor kakara ro snonkaku;
48001017	ma yara ḇe Yerusalemḇa kako fayasrow naek ḇeḇe manwawan ḇepon kwar ro aya, ḇape yara ḇesup Arab raimnai yakaḇer wer ḇe Damsyik.
48001018	Raimnai, wampasi wambarek rikior posa, yara ḇe Yerusalem fa yarakaki Kefas, ma yeḇeryar ro rum ḇyedi ḇeras samfur seser ririm.
48001019	Ḇape yamam manwawan ḇese ansi oso ḇaḇeri, derer Manseren Yesus naek ḇyedi Yakobus.
48001020	Ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi yakofenbos: roi yafas faro mko nane nkaku rarirya, yasrerḇa.
48001021	Ḇarpurya yara ḇesupya fyor Siria ma Kilikia.
48001022	Ḇape jemaat-jemaat ro Yudea smamḇaḇir aya ḇaim.
48001023	Sikada srower monda, iso ḇeponiwara ḇefrur kandera si, knikine ḇyaryas kakyar saiso, imarisen kyakok ani.
48001024	Ma sisandik Allah snar aya.
48002001	Ḇarpur ro wampasi wambarek samfur seser rifiak besyof kwar, aya kuker Barnabas nura ḇe Yerusalem wer ma yun Titus kako.
48002002	Yara snar fasasna oso. Ma yafar farosi Ankankinem Ḇeḇye yaḇaryas faro er-er ḇese ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa -- yawawos ḇardi kuker ḇefawisya serer, -- insa fararur yafrur ḇepon ma yafrur wer na nefromoḇa.
48002003	Rariryano Titus, ḇewarpu aya ani, ikada snon Yunani rirya, ḇape ḇyeḇedif faifrur sofakfuk ḇyediḇa.
48002004	Mboi kaku naek ḇesararer ono sisya ssun fasis fa sidafdif, isoine ḇesun fasis faḇedwarek ḇaḇemkei koḇedi kosma ro Yesus Kristus, insa kuker nyan ine sewayam ko wer.
48002005	Ḇape fafisu oso ḇaḇeri fa komarisen kosusu ma kokunem farosi insa Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekakuya kyain faswef faro mko.
48002006	Ma faro si kokara ḇefawi ansi rariso kankain ḇepon sena, faro aya nefandunḇa, snar Allah myam ḇaḇekaryerḇa -- ḇefawi ansi rariso wer kako, nari sedafdifer aya kuker roi oso ḇeseḇa.
48002007	Ḇape rarirya roḇarya, fafisu smam kwar mboi faro aya ssḇuk kakyar kwar ro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro kawasa ḇesma ḇaḇesofakfuk ḇasya, imnis raris Petrus faro ḇesma ḇaḇesofakfuksya
48002008	-- snar Allah ḇeḇuk kwar samambraḇ mufaḇe Petrus fa ḇyemanwawan faro snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuksya, Allah ani kako ḇyuk kwar samambraḇ maḇe aya faro snonkaku ḇeyaksma sofakfuk ḇaimsya.
48002009	Ma smam saswar-fakamaman ḇeḇuk kwar maḇe aya, inja Yakobus, Kefas ma Yohanes, smam imnis ḇeḇe manfarkin jemaat, sedasi kuker aya ma Barnabas imnis aḇyair ḇaḇeoser, insa nkora mura ḇe snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk ḇaimsya ma sikada sra faro snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk kwarsya;
48002010	mboi nkoswarepen kaku snonkaku ḇesaḇararsya ma iso yamarisen yaḇesewar kaku ḇeri fayafrurya.
48002011	Rofafisu Kefas ryama ḇe Antiokhia, kuker fababa yasampumi snar ikada syasar.
48002012	Snar snonkaku ono ro ḇar Yakobus srama ḇaim, Petrus danan kuker naek ḇeyaksma sofakfuk ḇaimsya, ḇape srama kwar, isusu ma ḇyinkwanbur si snar imkak kawasa ḇesma sofakfuk kwarsya.
48002013	Ma kawasa Yahudi ḇesesya sifrur ankar kako kuker i, isof Barnabas dakso ankarkar sena kako.
48002014	Ḇape rofyor yamam, mboi kankenem sena namnis kuker Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekakuyaḇa, yakofen bos kaku mufaḇe Kefas ro ḇarpon sena kam: "Rofyor aw, snon Yahudi oso, wakenem imnis korwar ma wakenem imnis Yahudiḇa, rariso nari wadafdif naek ḇeyakso sofakfuk ḇasya fasikenem imnis snonkaku Yahudi?"
48002015	Koḇe ḇeyaḇen imnis snon Yahudi ma komnis snon ḇesasar ro er-er ḇesesyaḇa.
48002016	Mkofawi, mboi snonkaku osero ḇaḇeri sbuk napnapes faroi snar ḇyeuser sasoser Refo Yahudiya, ḇape snar kakyar faro Yesus Kristus monda. Eḇedari nko kako nkokyar faro Yesus Kristus kwar, insa nkosma ḇaḇenapnapesya snar kakyar faro Kristus. Mboi snar ḇaḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudiyaḇa.
48002017	Ḇape rofyor mankun nko ḇardi, nkoḇesewar insa ssḇuk ḇaḇenapnapesya maḇe nko ro Kristus, rofyor ani nkofawi nko snonkaku ḇesasar, rarirya ido roi ḇeradine fyasna inja Kristus duffarmyan sasar na ke? Oroḇaḇeri.
48002018	Ḇape aya ine yafasna mankundaya imnis snon ḇeḇeyuk sasoser Refo Yahudi, rofyor yaḇawes kaḇer rosai yakakok kwar na.
48002019	Ḇape yamar kwar faro sasoser agama anna -- inja sasoser anna naiso ḇemun aya -- insa yakenem kuker Allah. Spai epen aya ro aprop kuker Kristus kwar;
48002020	rariryano yakenem, ḇape yakenem ro mankundaya ḇa, mboi Kristus ikenem fnoḇek aya. Ma kankenem ayedi yakenem kuker baken ro baboine, irya kankenem ro kakyarya faro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ḇeswar aya kwar ma ḇyuk mankundi ḇefarsarser maro aya.
48002021	Nari yapampum saswar-fakamaman Allah ḇyena ḇa. Snar rofyor ḇaḇenapnapes isya ro sasoser Refo Yahudi ido, nari Kristus ḇaḇemarmar ḇyedi ḇyefromo monda.
48003001	Sye, kawasa Galatia mkoyano, ḇemamkarkirḇa, mansei ḇeyawninyan mko kwar? Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇepaiepen kwar ro aprop ani ḇyeḇefasna kwar faro mko ḇake?
48003002	Inja roi yamarisen yafawi ro mko isoine: Mkosma Rurya kwarke snar mkoḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudi roḇaido snar kakyar faro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya?
48003003	Snaro mkomamkarkir ḇaḇeri rarirya? Mkorandak kwar kuker Rurya, raimnai ro ḇarpurya mkomarisen mkosma i kuker papoik ro mankun mko?
48003004	Roi mkosma kwar anna kam nefromoke? Nari nefromoḇa!
48003005	Inja knikine rariso, Allah ḇeḇuk fa mkofo kuker Rurya ma ḇefrur aḇyair kanandor rofandu mko, ifrur rarirya snar mkoḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudiya roḇaido snar kakyar faro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya?
48003006	Rarirya kako kakyar Abraham ḇyedi faro Allah, eḇedari Allah kyor roi ani ḇenapnapesya faro i.
48003007	Inja mkomam, snonkaku ḇekenem kuker kakyarsya sikada Abraham romawa ḇyesirya.
48003008	Ma Refo ifawi ḇepon kwar, Allah ḇyuk napnapesya faro snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya snar kakyar, Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine ḇyeḇeḇaryas ḇepon faro Abraham kwar: "Snar aw nari er-ersya kam ro sup ine sḇeḇeḇok."
48003009	Inja ḇekenem kuker kakyarsya sikada sisma ḇaḇeḇok fnoḇek kuker Abraham snon ḇekyar ani.
48003010	Snonkaku ḇekyar ma ḇeswarmura ro kankenem sena neknam ro ḇaḇekoreri -- snaro sḇeḇefras? Snar sfas kwar radine: "Fafras faḇe snonkaku ḇeḇeuser ma ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor ḇefas kwar ro syap sasoser Refo Yahudiḇasya."
48003011	Ma ḇaḇenapnapesya isya faro snonkaku osoḇa ro Allah barpon ḇyedi snar ifrur sasoser Refo Yahudi isna kwar, snar: "Snonkaku ḇenapes nari sikenem kuker kakyarya."
48003012	Ḇape sasoser Refo Yahudi ḇyeknam ro kakyaryaḇa, mboi mansei ḇefrur na, nari sikenem snar na.
48003013	Kristus ḇyak namuk ko kwar ro fafras sasoser Refo Yahudi kuker nyan ḇyuk mankundi fa isma fras snar ko, snar sfas kwar radine: "Fafras faro snonkaku ḇekaf ro ai apropya!"
48003014	Yesus Kristus ifrur rarirya kwar, insa kuker i Abraham ḇaḇeḇok ḇyedi rya faro er-er ḇese, isof kuker kakyar kosma Rur ḇeḇeasas kwar ani.
48003015	Naek srar, iḇye yun fasasna oso ro kankenem ras-ras. Asas oso ḇeser kankarem namuk kwar ro snonkaku, osoḇaḇeri faḇyereri roḇa pyami.
48003016	Faro Abraham ma ḇeḇekpu roi Allah ikofen asas ḇeḇor anna kam. Sikofenḇa "faro kpu-kpu ḇyesi" imnis raris kawasa ḇeḇor, ḇape faro snonkaku oser monda: "ma faro kpu besi," isoine Kristus.
48003017	Swaruser ayedi isoine: Allah asas ḇyena ro randakya neḇekarem namuk kwar, inja sasoser Refo Yahudi nari damrer naba, snar insape nasasyar babo ro wampasi wambarek utin rifiak samfur rikior ro ḇarpurya, isof samambraḇ asas ani ipromes.
48003018	Snar, rofyor rosai Allah ḇyuk na neknam ro sasoser Refo Yahudi, mboi neknam ro asasḇa; ḇape snar Allah asas ḇyena ḇyuk saswar-fakamaman ḇyena faro Abraham kwar.
48003019	Rarirya ido fandun rosai kuker sasoser Refo Yahudiya? Sasoser anna nafnoḇek snar ḇaḇeyuk -- sasoser anna nambran isof fafisu kpu ro asas ani ryama -- ma malaikat-malaikatsya ssḇuki faro manfandu oso.
48003020	Manfandu dun wos ro snonkaku oser mondaḇa, mboi Allah ikada ḇyeoser.
48003021	Rariryaido, sasoser Refo Yahudi nasampum kuker Allah asas ḇyenake? Roḇaḇeri. Snar sasoser Refo Yahudi ḇyeḇeḇuk imnis roi oso ḇeḇuk kankenem, rariryaido napnapesya ḇyeknam ro sasoser Refo Yahudiya.
48003022	Ḇape sfas ro Refo radine mboi roi ḇeḇor kam naisya ro ḇaḇepapoik sasarya, insa kuker kakyar faro Yesus Kristus asas ani ḇyeḇeḇuk faro bekyarsya.
48003023	Rofyor kakyar ani ryama ḇaim sasoser Refo Yahudi iwaren warek ko, ma pyadwar ko isof kakyar ani ḇyeḇefasna.
48003024	Rarirya sasoser Refo Yahudi ikfin ko isof Kristus ryama, insa ḇyuk napnapesya maḇe ko snar kakyar koḇena.
48003025	Baboine kakyar ani ryama kwar, inja koisyaḇa kwar ro manwadwaren ḇefarkin ani.
48003026	Snar mkokam mkoḇe romawa faro Allah snar kakyar faro Yesus Kristus.
48003027	Snar mkokam, mkoḇe ḇemasi kuker snonsnon Kristus, inja mkona Kristus kwar.
48003028	Rarisya rarwas oso isyaḇa rofandu snonkaku Yahudi roḇaido snonkaku Yunani, manfyanoḇa roḇaido snonkaku ḇemkei, snon ma bin isyaḇa kwar, snar mko kam mko ḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus.
48003029	Rofyor Kristus nya mko, mko kako mko ḇeup ro Abraham ma nari mkosma kako Allah asas ḇyena.
48004001	Swaruser ayedi isoine: rofyor snon ḇena waris oso ḇyesnonkuf ḇaim, imnisbos kaku manfyan oso, ḇape i ḇena waris ḇeḇor anna;
48004002	ḇape isya ro manwadwaren ḇefaduru i isof fafisu kmari ikofen faroiya imnis kwar.
48004003	Rarirya ko kako: rofyor koḇesnonkuf ḇaim, koḇemanfyan faro rodur ḇero supswan ine.
48004004	Ḇape fafisuya imnis kwar, Allah iwan Rumkun ḇyedi, ma bin oso daḇen i ma kyunem faro sasoser Refo Yahudi.
48004005	Ḇyeḇewan faḇyak namuk kawasa kam ḇekunem faro sasoser Refo Yahudisya, insa nya ko ḇeromawa ḇyesi.
48004006	Ma snar nya mko ḇeromawa ḇyesi, inja Allah iwan Rumkun ḇyedi Rur ḇyedi fasyun ro kosnesna, ma kyaru: "o Mami, o Mami yedi!"
48004007	Inja mkoḇemanfyan wer ḇa kwar, mboi mko ḇeromawa; rofyor mko ḇeromawa, nari mko kako mkasma Allah waris ḇyena kam.
48004008	Ro ḇeponiwara, rofyor mkomamḇaḇir Allah ḇa, mko ḇemanfyan faro papoik-papoik imnis allah, ḇape Allah ḇekaku naisya ḇaḇeri.
48004009	Ḇape baboine mkofawi Allah kwar, roḇaido Allah ifawi mko kwar, inja rariso mko kaḇer wer faro rodur-rodur ro supswan ḇesambraḇ ḇa ma ḇesaḇarar ma mkomarisen mkorandak mko ḇemanfyan faro na wer?
48004010	Kuker aunos mkofaduru ras ono, paik ono, fafisu ono faswef ma wampasi wambarek ono.
48004011	Yamames warek imbude kandera yena faro mko nefromo mondari.
48004012	Naek srar yor faro mko, insa mkomnis raris aya, snar aya kako yamnis raris mko kwar. Mko frur roi ḇeḇyeḇa oso ḇaim maro aya.
48004013	Mkofawi, mboi ro randakya yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya faro mko kwar isoine snar baken ayedi iduf.
48004014	Kaku ḇeri rariryano baken ayedi ḇyefafrowes faro mkono, mkayin ayaḇa mboi mkosrow aya kwar, imnis mkosrow Allah malaikat ḇyesi oso, isyadi wer imnis mkosrow Yesus Kristus mankundi.
48004015	Fyor ani aski ḇeba faro mko! Ma baboine, ḇaḇeaski mkoḇani ryoiyo? Snar yaḇesaksi ḇemko, mboi rofyor ani mkomarisen mker mka mkoḇesi maḇe aya kwar.
48004016	Inja baboine mkokara aya ḇembroḇ mkoḇedi, snar yafasna napnapesya faro mko?
48004017	Sikada sfaḇri sesewar insa ssun mko, ḇape kuker sne ḇenapesḇa sena, snar simarisen ssun mko fa mkoso si kuker kaku ḇeri.
48004018	Mboi iḇye rofyor snonkaku sesewar fasun snonkaku ḇese faro roi ḇeḇye, mboi sifrur rarirya rofafisu nakam, imbude rofafisu aya isya rofandu mko mondari.
48004019	Ne, romawa yesi, snar mko yaḇekandera dafduf yaḇeyaḇen wer, isof rari Kristus ḇyair ro mko.
48004020	Yaswarkuf kaku aya isya rofandu mko rofyor ine fa yawawos kuker mko kuker mkaren ḇese, snar yafawi werba yafrur rosai mufabemko.
48004021	Mkokofen maḇe aya, ne, mko kam ḇemarisen ḇeso sasoser Refo Yahudi, mkomnaf ḇaimke sasoser Refo Yahudiya?
48004022	Ro dia isya sfas, Abraham nya romawa risuru, oso ro infyan bin ḇyedi ma oso ro bin ḇemkeya?
48004023	Ḇape romawa ro infyan bin ani ḇyeḇeaḇen imnis marisen snonkaku ma romawa ro bin ḇemkei ani ḇyeḇeaḇen snar Allah asas ḇyedi.
48004024	Inekada wospeper. Snar bin risuru ansuya supeperyar ḇaḇeasas risuru ro Allah: Oso ḇyeknam ro bon Sinai (isoine Hagar) -- (Hagar daḇen romawa ḇyesi simnis manfyan.)
48004025	Hagar imnis bon Sinai ro sup Arab -- ma imnis kuker Yerusalem ro baboine, snar ikenem ro ḇaḇeinfyan kuker romawa ḇyesi.
48004026	Ḇape Yerusalem ro boiyaswa ikada bin ḇemkeiya ma ikada sna kobedirya.
48004027	Snar sfas kwar radine: "Mkoryaḇ naba ḇae, ne, bin ḇepansnasem ḇefawi ḇeaḇen ḇaim! Mkoryaḇ ma mkobras, ne aw ḇefawi ḇaḇekandera ḇaim dafduf aḇaḇenya! Snar bin swa ḇyedi iburya nari daḇen romawa sibor syadi ro bin ḇeḇeswaya."
48004028	Inja naek srar, mkokada romawa sḇeasas imnis Ishak.
48004029	Ḇape imnis ḇeponiwara, saḇen kuker marisen snonkaku, ḇyewayam faro saḇen kuker marisen Rurya, rarirya baboine kako.
48004030	Ḇape rosai sfas ro Refoya? Ro Refo sfas radine: "Mkoyaw infyan ani kuker romawa ḇyedi, snar romawa ro infyan ani nari daksma warisḇa fnoḇek kuker romawa ro bin ḇemkei ani."
48004031	Inja, naek srar, koine romawa ro infyan aniḇa, mboi romawa ro bin ḇemkeiya.
48005001	Baboine komkei, snar Kristus ḇyuk makakei maḇe ko kwar! Inja mkufnako ro ḇaḇemkei mkoḇedi ma mkomarisen fasrir awer kamnam ḇaḇemanfyan ani wer.
48005002	Kaku ḇeri, aya, Paulus, yakofen faro mko: rofyor mkor famkosma sofakfuk ido, Kristus ḇyefainda faro mkoḇa.
48005003	Yakofen wer faro snonkaku mansei ḇeyor faḇesma sofakfuk, insa sifrur sasoser ḇeḇor kam ḇero Refo Yahudi na.
48005004	Ḇaḇeoser mkoḇedi kuker Kristus imuk, rofyor mkokyar ḇaḇenapnapes sasoser Refo Yahudiya; nari mkokenem ro ḇandibur saswar-fakamaman Allahya.
48005005	Snar fafnoḇek Rurya, ma snar kakyarya faro Kristus, kowaf ḇaḇenapnapes, koswarmura roya.
48005006	Snar kuker Kristus, ḇaḇesofakfuk ro baken, nefandunḇa, mboi fararur kakyarya kuker saswar monda.
48005007	Ro ḇeponiwara mkofaḇri naḇye kwar. Baboine mansei ḇedwarek mko wer, isof mkoso napnapesya wer ḇa?
48005008	Dafdif faro mkoso si wer ndama ro Allah ḇeyor mko kwar aniḇa.
48005009	Mur kermkun ifrur faterigu amek oser ipisen.
48005010	Snar koḇeoser kuker Manseren, inja yakyar mkosma swaruser ḇesebur swaruser ineḇa. Ḇape manseirya wer kako ḇefrur ḇirḇar mko nari isma samamyaiya, ro Allah.
48005011	Ma aya ine wer, naek srar, rofafisu yaḇaryas kaker sofakfuk ani, ḇyefandun, snaro sewayam aya kaker? Rarirya ido, aprop ani ḇyekarui karkar werḇa.
48005012	Iḇyesyadi ḇefrur ḇirḇar mko ansi skar mankunsi monda!
48005013	Naek srar, mkoḇe ḇeyor kwar famkomkei. Ḇape mkona ḇaḇemkei ani imnis fafisu fa mkoḇuki ifrur marisen kankenem ḇesasar awer, mboi iḇye mkuffarmyan yae mko kuker saswar.
48005014	Snar sasoser Refo Yahudi nakam neknam ro wos oser ine, isoine: "Waswar min ḇesi snonkaku ḇese imnis waswar mankundaw!"
48005015	Ḇape rofyor mkarek yae ma mkoren yae mko ido, mko swarepen naḇye, insa mkofarmambri yae awer.
48005016	Kakara yedi radine: mkokenem kuker Rurya kada, nari mkoso kankenem rmomen krafya ḇa.
48005017	Snar rmomen krafya fyamfaḇri kuker rmomen Rurya ma rmomen Rurya fyamfaḇri kuker rmomen krafya -- snar sukam sufamfaḇriyae -- isof ro rarwan ono mkofrur rosai mkomarisen naba.
48005018	Ḇape rofyor Rurya ikfin, mko nari mkokenem ro sasoser Refo Yahudiya ḇa.
48005019	Fararur krafya isna kwar, isoine: farbuk, mamas, rmomen,
48005020	ḇaḇesyom amfyanir, mon, mbroḇ, fadḇan, masasor ro sne, msor, fandun mankun, rakrakrok, rur-makakok,
48005021	ayin, masaser, munara marares, ma ḇese na. Nane kam yaḇuk swarepen faro mko -- imnis yaḇuk swarepen ro ḇepon kwar -- mboi mansei ḇefrur roi ḇerarirya, nari isma rarwas ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ḇa.
48005022	Ḇape rofyor Rurya ikfin ido bon ḇyena isoine: saswar, raryaḇ, aski, ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ, ḇaḇenaḇye, ḇaḇeuser, ḇaḇesyowi,
48005023	ḇaḇerandun sne, ḇaḇefarmku mankun. Roi ḇeradine sasoser oso isyaḇa faisampum na.
48005024	Yesus Kristus nya manseirya kwar ido, nari myun kraf kuker nafsu ḇeḇor ma rmomen ḇyena kam.
48005025	Rofyor kokenem kuker Rurya, iḇye wer Rur ani ikfin kankenem koḇena kako,
48005026	inja komararesḇa, kosampumyae ḇa ma kayinyae awer ko.
48006001	Naek srar, rofyor mkosrow snon oso rofandu mko ifrur sasar, iḇye syadi ḇekenem kuker Allah Rur ḇyedi, mkokfin snon ani ḇenyan ḇenapes kuker rur kaḇaḇaḇ, ma mkoḇesasor mankun mko, insa mkaksapi awer ro farawrowesya kako.
48006002	Mkofnoḇekyae mko ma mkoḇar kamnam mkoḇena! Rarirya mkoḇeimnis sasoser Kristus.
48006003	Snar rofyor snon oso kyara iso ḇesyadiya, mboi ḇyerarirya ḇaido, ikada ḇyeankar mankundi.
48006004	Iḇye syadi snonkaku oser-oser imnasen mankundi resari ro kankenem ḇyedi; insape imsik mankundi, mboi myam awer faro kankenem snonkaku ḇese.
48006005	Snar snonkaku oser kamnam ḇyena namnis faro i kwar.
48006006	Ma mansei ḇesma farkarkor ro Manseren wosya, nari ḇyerwas roi ismana faro snonkaku ḇeḇuk farkarkor faro iya.
48006007	Mkoḇor awer! Allah myam monda mankundi ḇo ḇyeḇekoryae ḇa. Snar rosai snonkakusya sker ma skekef na nari sinekna.
48006008	Snar mansei ḇeker ma ḇekekef imnis rari snonkaku, nari dinek marmarya ro rari ḇyedi. Ḇape rofyor kyer ma kyekef imnis farkankin ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, nari dinek kankenem ḇekaku ma ḇekain fyoro ro Allah Rur ḇyedi.
