48006009	Inja komor awer ro kofrur roi ḇeḇye, snar rofyor fafisuya ryama, nari kinek bon na rofyor ani.
48006010	Rarirya, rofyor kosma fafisu ine, mkorama kofrur roi ḇeḇye faro snonkakusya kam, isyadi faro min koḇesi ḇesma kakyar oser.
48006011	Mkomam, ro mnuk ine mankundayai ḇefas faro mko rodine, kuker fasfas ker ḇeba.
48006012	Snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇeyow mankun kuker roi ḇero baken, sikada sesewar seyayu mko faro ḇaḇesofakfuk, kuker kakara, insa sisma awer kandera snar aprop Kristus.
48006013	Snar snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuksya kako, sfaduru sasoser Refo Yahudiya ḇa. Mboi simarisen, fa mkosma sofakfuk, insa simarares si snar mkoḇeyuser sasoser anna.
48006014	Ḇape ayama yamewerbos kaku yamarares aya, mboi kuker aprop Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, snar kuker i supswan ine ḇyeḇepai maro aya, ma aya faro supswan ine.
48006015	Snar ḇaḇesofakfukke roḇake, nefainda ḇa. Ḇeḇefaindaya isoine snonkaku saḇen babosya.
48006016	Ma snonkaku kam, ḇeḇuk mankun faro kakara ine, aski ḇaḇenaḇye Allah isabu faro si ma faro Israel ḇyesi.
48006017	Inja snonkaku oso ifrur kandera ḇe aya awer, snar aḇyair-aḇyair Yesus nya aya naisya ro baken ayedi.
48006018	Saswar-fakamaman ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ḇyeḇok mko! Amin. Ro aya, Paulus
49001001	Aya Paulus, manwawan Yesus Kristus kuker marisen ro Allah, mufaḇe kawasa ḇesren ro Efesus, kawasa ḇekyar faro Yesus Kristus!
49001002	Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ḇerama ro Allah, Kma koḇedi ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryoyus mko.
49001003	Sanandik faro Allah, Kma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, ḇeḇuk kwar maḇeko ro Kristus, ḇaḇeḇok rur ḇeḇor kam ro boiyaswa.
49001004	Snar kuker Yesus Allah kyinfir ko kwar rofyor supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya, insa kosren ma kofarorew ḇa ro ḇarpon ḇyedi.
49001005	Kuker Allah saswar ḇyedi fyasna ḇepon ko kwar ro randakya ro Yesus Kristus fa koḇeromawa ḇe i imnisbos marisen ḇyedi,
49001006	insa koḇuk sanandik mufaḇe Allah saswar-fakamaman baba ḇyedi, ḇyukma ḇeko ro Yesus, Rumkun ḇyedi iswarbos ani.
49001007	Snar ro Yesus kosma fasaspar snar rik ḇyedi, isoine ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar, imnis nana saswar-fakamaman ḇyena,
49001008	fakamaman ḇyena, ḇyuk fawawi ma kakara, nabor syadi maḇeko.
49001009	Snar fyasna kwar kankunes marisen ḇyedi maḇeko, imnis aw ḇyedi, isoine aw dun namuk kwar ro randakya kuker Yesus
49001010	imnis fasasos faro fafisuya ryama roi ḇeḇor kam neoser ro Kristus ma ḇyeḇru faro nakam, iḇye ro boiyaswa iḇye kako ro supswan ine.
49001011	Yakofen "ro Kristus", snar ro Allah kosma rarwas ro ḇaḇeasas ḇyedi -- koine ro awarya ḇyuk fa kosma rarwas ani imnisbos kuker Allah kakara ḇyedi, ifrur roi ḇeḇor kam imnis marisen ḇyedi --
49001012	insa koine ro randakya bekyar faro Kristus, kosandik faro Allah, baba ḇyedi.
49001013	Ma ro Allah mko kako -- snar mkomnaf kwar wos napnapesya, isoine Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇeḇuk koreri faro mko -- ro Allah mko kako, rofyor mkokyarya, Allah ḇyuk aḇyair mboi nya mko, isoine Rur Ḇesren ḇyedi ḇyeasas kwar faro mko ani.
49001014	Ma Rur Ḇesren ani isaramper ko insa kosma rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar faro kawasa ḇyesi, isoine ḇaḇefaspar ḇefrur fa Allah nya ko, insa kosandik Allah baba ḇyedi.
49001015	Snar yamnaf kwar mkokyar faro Manseren Yesus ma mkoswar snonkaku ḇesrensya,
49001016	inja yamnaiḇa yakofen kasumasa ḇemko. Ma indo yaswarepen mko ma yanadiwarek mko ḇesya kwar,
49001017	ma yor ḇe Allah Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, Kma ḇepyum ani, ḇyuk Rur fawawi nanem ḇyedi fa fyasna i faro mko isof mkomambir kaku i.
49001018	Insa kakara ḇero snembri neḇeseḇen fanasnai, insa mkofawi sanemura ro rosai nari mkosma ro fararyor ḇyedi: isoine payamyum ḇeḇor ḇyena fyasos mufaḇekawasa ḇesrensya,
49001019	ma Allah papoik ḇyedi iba faro ḇekyar koya, imnis raris mankundi papoik ḇyedi,
49001020	ḇyuki ifrur rofafisu ḇyawes Kristus rofandu ḇemarsya ma ḇyeifa kyain ro ḇar raku ḇyedi ro boiyaswa,
49001021	kankain Kristus ikaki syadibur ro ḇeḇuk sasoser ḇeborsya kam, ḇesma papoiksya kam, ḇeḇeḇrusya kam, ma manseirya kaker ḇeḇesnonsnon ro supswan ine mondaḇa ma supswan nari ḇeramaya.
49001022	Ma roi ḇeḇor kam Allah ryir na kwar ro Kristus weḇam ḇyedi ma ḇyeifa ḇyeḇru ro jemaat ro roi ḇeḇor nakam kwar.
49001023	Jemaat ani Kristus baken ḇyedirya, iḇeḇefa namnis, snar mankundi ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor kam fanamnisya.
49002001	Ḇeponiwara mkomar snar ḇaḇeyuk ma sasar mkoḇena.
49002002	Mkokenem ro sasar na, snar mko nyan supswan ine, ma mkoḇeyuser ḇesma papoik ḇaḇesasoser ro sansoren, isoine rur ḇeḇarḇor baboine ḇefararur rofandu snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya.
49002003	Kaku ḇeri roḇeponiwara ko kako sakkor ko rofandu si, rofyor kokenem ro kakara ma marisen baken ḇeḇarḇor koḇena. Rofafisu ani kosma masasor ro Allah kako, imnis snonkaku ḇese ansi.
49002004	Ḇape Allah ḇyuk maḇe ko fakamaman snar ifo kuker saswar ḇeba.
49002005	Koine snonkaku ḇemar kwar snar sasar koḇena -- ḇape ifrur fa kokenem kaḇer fnoḇek Kristus, snar saswar-fakamaman Allah mkosma koreri --
49002006	snar koḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus, Allah ḇyawes kaḇer ko ma ḇyuk moḇ ḇeko fnoḇek Yesus Kristus ro boiyaswa,
49002007	insa rofafisu nari ḇeramaya, fyasna saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi imnis raris ḇaḇye ḇyedi maḇeko ro Yesus Kristus.
49002008	Snar saswar-fakamaman mkosma koreri snar kakyar; ima bon ro sasewar bediḇa, mboi Allah i ḇeḇukiya,
49002009	ine bon ro fararur bediḇa: insa snonkaku ono simarares awer mankunsi.
49002010	Snar Allah iso ḇefrur konya, koḇe ḇefrur ro Yesus Kristus insa kofrur fararur ḇeḇye, Allah fyasos ḇepon maḇeko kwarya.
49002011	Rarirya mkoswarepen, mboi fafisu iwara -- mkoḇe snonkaku Yahudiḇa ḇesma aḇyair ro baken, imnis snir ḇesnonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk ḇa ro kawasa Yahudi ḇenir mankunsi "ḇesofakfuk", isoine sofakfuk ro baken kuker fararur snonkaku, --
49002012	mboi rofafisu ani mkoḇeoser kuker Kristusḇa, mkaksun ḇekawasa Israel ḇa ma mkaksma rarwasḇa ro asas sikofen na, kuker saneraroḇa ma kuker Allah ro supswan ineḇa.
49002013	Ḇape baboine mkoḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus, ḇeponiwara mko "ḇinkwan", ḇape mko "fanam" kwar snar Kristus rik ḇyedi.
49002014	Snar ikada aski ma raryaḇ koḇedirya, ifrur fakawasa Yahudi ma kawasa Yahudiḇa sḇeoser kwar ma kyakok ayar ḇerwas, isoine ḇaḇembroḇ,
49002015	snar marmar ḇyedi; imnis snonkaku ipyos kwar sasoser Refo Yahudi ma sasoser ḇeborna ma ifrur er ansuya fasuḇe er oser snonkaku babo ḇeḇeoser kuker Kristus, ma rarirya ifrur askiya,
49002016	ma ifrur fa er ansuya suḇedasi kuker Allah fa suḇebaken oser, kuker aprop ipyos ḇaḇembroḇ ro su.
49002017	Ryama ma ḇyaryas kwar aski faro "ḇeḇinkwan" mkoya ma aski faro "ḇefanamsya",
49002018	snar kuker Kristus kokam -- iḇye kawasa Yahudi iḇye kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa -- kosma Rur oser fakofanam Kmari.
49002019	Rarirya mkoḇe amber ma mandamanḇa, mboi mkoḇe min kina oser ro snonkaku ḇesren ma kina-kina ro Allah,
49002020	sḇawes robo araref manwawan ma nabisya, kuker Yesus Kristus ḇeḇe karui dopir.
49002021	I ḇepam ḇaḇawes rum ani ḇesiper fa ḇyerum ḇepyum faro Allah ḇesrenya, ro Manseren.
49002022	Kuker Kristus mko kako mkomnis dera-dera insa mkoḇe ḇeḇawes fa mko kako mkoḇe Rum Rur faro Allah.
49003001	Rarirya aya ine, Paulus, manfamyan Yesus Kristus, ḇesmai snar fandun mkoḇena, ne kawasa ḇefawi Allahḇa
49003002	-- ma mkomnaf kwar rariso fararur saswar-fakamaman Allah, sikyar mabe aya faro mko,
49003003	isoine kuker nyan mamam sfasna maḇe aya kankunes, imnis fas-fas ḇeknampu yafas iyasne.
49003004	Fyor mkowasya i, nari mkofawi kakara ayedi ro Kristus kankunes ḇyedi,
49003005	rofyor syos ḇeponiwara kankunes ani ḇyeḇeḇaryas ḇa faro romawa-romawa snonkaku, ḇape ro baboine Allah Rur ḇyedi fyasna i faro manwawansya ma nabi ḇesren ḇyesya,
49003006	isoine snonkaku ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa, ḇape snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, sisma kako ḇaḇeromowi ma sḇekina ro baken ma siwarpu ro amar ssḇuk ro Yesus Kristus ani.
49003007	Ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani yuffarmyan kwar raris Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyukma ḇeaya, imnisbos kaku fararur papoik ḇyedi.
49003008	Aya kada, yaḇyeḇa syadi rofandu kawasa kam ḇesrensya, ḇape ssḇuk saswar-fakamaman ine, insa yaḇaryas mufaḇe kawasa ḇeḇe Yahudiḇa nana Kristus ḇyena nari ḇeḇroḇa,
49003009	ma insa yaḇaryas rosai ḇeḇeknam ro fararur kankunes ro wampasi wambarek utin-utin ono ḇeyokef ro Allah, ḇeau roi nakam,
49003010	baboine insa jemaatna nbaryas Allah fawawi ḇeḇor ḇyena faro ḇeḇuk sasoser, ma ḇesma papoik ro boiyaswa,
49003011	imnisbos kuker Allah marisen ḇyena ḇekain fyoro, ifrur kwar kuker Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
49003012	Kokyar faro Kristus ma koḇeoser kuker i nari komsik ma kosma nyan ḇesun mufaḇe Allah, kuker kakyar koḇena faro i.
49003013	Rarirya yor faro mko, insa mkomkak warek awer aya ro kandera ayedi snar mko, snar kandera ayedi kada idaw ḇaḇye ḇemko.
49003014	Rarirya yakain wepur yaḇansubainaḇe Mami ḇarpon ḇyedi,
49003015	faro i kina kam ro boiyaswa ma ro supswan ine sna snonsnon ḇyedi.
49003016	Yaḇenadi insa Allah ḇeḇye syadi imarisen ḇyuk samambraḇ ma makaku faro mkosnemna kuker Rur ḇyedi,
49003017	insa Kristus kyain ro mkosnemna snar kakyar mkoḇena, ma mkoḇe rares ma mkoḇe knam ro saswar.
49003018	Yanadi, insa mko ma snonkaku ḇesrensya kam mkofawi, saswar Kristus ḇyedi aḇaḇamya, kawanwanya, kakakiya ma swafya,
49003019	insa mkofawi kaku saswar Kristus ani isyadi fawawi ḇeḇor kam. Yanadi, insa mkofo kuker Allah ḇaḇeimnis ḇyena.
49003020	Kuker Allah papoik ḇyedi ḇefararur sambraḇ ro ko, Allah ifrur rosai kam nasyadi ro rosai konadi ma korna roḇa kokarana,
49003021	Allah imarisen akak-awob ro jemaat sisandik Allah kada ro Yesus Kristus isof fyoro-fyoro. Amin.
49004001	Snar rarirya yaḇuk swarapepen faro mko, aya, snon sḇefa ḇesma samamyai snar Manseren, insa kankenem mkoḇena namnis snonkaku sor kwar imnis raris fararyor ani.
49004002	Inja mkorun mkosnemna ḇesya kwar, mkosnemna nasḇunek ma mkokaḇaḇaḇ. Mkofasnai saswar mkoḇena ro mkofnoḇekyae mko.
49004003	Ma mkoḇesewar famkofaduru ḇaḇeoser Rurya insa fyesepen mko kuker aski:
49004004	baken oser ma Rur oser, imnis raris moḇ sor mko kwar raya faro saneraro oser ro fararyor mko smaya,
49004005	Manseren oser, kakyar oser, masisren oser,
49004006	Allah oser ma Kma ro roi nakam, Allah robo roi nakam ma ifnoḇek roi nakam ma nya papoik nakam.
49004007	Faro oser-oser ro ko ssḇuk kwar saswar-fakamaman siso warnkyara Kristus ḇyukya.
49004008	Rarirya mnuk ro Refo doḇo: "Rofafisu dek ḇemoḇ ḇekaki, dun women sibor; i ḇebuk roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇye faro snonkaku."
49004009	Rarirya "dek kwar" isoine, ido kwar kako ḇesupswan mun ḇerabaḇ syadiya?
49004010	I ḇedo kwar, i kako dek ḇinkwan ḇemoḇ ḇekaki syadi kwar ro nanki kam, insa ifrur mnis roi ḇeḇor kam.
49004011	Ma i ḇeḇuk kwar iḇye manwawan, iḇye kako nabi-nabi, iḇye manbaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, iḇye kako manfarandous ma ḇeḇuk farkarkorsya,
49004012	insa sfasos snonkaku ḇesren faro fararur afuffarmyan, faro ḇaḇawes Kristus baken ḇyedi,
49004013	isof kokam kosma kwar ḇaḇeoser ro kakyarya ma fawawi ḇekaku ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, ma komnis snonkuf ḇepduk, ma faḇaḇye muma ḇesur imnis Kristus,
49004014	inja komnis romawa kasun werḇa, ro farkarkor wam syoso-syoso ḇefrur ḇirḇar ro farfnak fromo ro snonkaku ḇefawi ankarkar ḇeḇuk farkarkor ninyan,
49004015	ḇape kuf nako farkarkor ḇenapes ma saswar, ro roi ḇeḇor kam insa nasur faro i, isoine Kristus, ḇeḇeḇruya.
49004016	Ro i baken ḇesiper ani, -- ḇyeḇesyos ma ḇyeḇeyaḇek ḇeoser imnis afuffarmyan baken ḇesiper ro kina oser-oser, --ḇesma sasur ḇyedi ma ḇeḇawes mankundi ro saswarya.
49004017	Rarirya kuker snonsnon Manseren, yakofenbos faro mko: Mkokenem kaker awer imnis snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇa kuker kakara ḇeḇefromo
49004018	ma kakara ḇepampan ḇyena sikenem ḇinkwanbur ḇaḇeoser kuker Allah, snar fawawiḇa ma pakakrek ro sisnesna.
49004019	Ḇaḇaḇir sena napup, isof siso rmomen ḇeḇor kam, ma sifrur farbuk raris marisen sena kuker mamyaiḇa.
49004020	Ḇape mko kada mkoḇese kaku ḇeri. Mko kada mkofarkor kwar ma mkofawi Kristus.
49004021	Snar mkomnaf i kwar ma mkosma farkarkor ro i ma mkoḇeuser napnapes ro Yesus,
49004022	isoine mkosawen kankenem ḇekwar ro ḇepon, rmomenya kyakok kwar kuker ankarkar,
49004023	insama mkosnemna ma kakara ḇeḇor mkoḇena nbabo kam,
49004024	inja mkokenem babo, imnis raris Allah ifrur kwar ma marisen ḇyedi isoine kankenem ḇenapes, ma ḇesren.
49004025	Rarirya mkosawen ankarkar ma mkokofen roi ḇekakuyae faro mko, snar kokam koḇekina ro Kristus baken ḇyedi.
49004026	Rofyor mkomsor, mkomsor isof ori isyun epen awer, rarirya ido mkoḇesasar,
49004027	inja mkoḇuk fafisu faro Ibirisya awer.
49004028	Snonkaku ḇekarawraw, kyaraw wer awer, iḇye syadi ifararur sambraḇ kaku ro fararur ḇeḇye kuker ḇra ḇyesuya, isof isma roi ono faḇyerwas na faro snonkaku ḇesma mnisḇasya.
49004029	Wawos ḇemamas nasasyar awer ro mkosḇamna, mkawos kuker wos ḇeḇefandun ḇeḇawes, insa ḇemnafsya, sisma saswar-fakamaman.
49004030	Mkofrur snefafardun Allah Rur Ḇesren ḇyedi awer, snar Rur ani ryem mko kwar famkowaf ras Koreriya.
49004031	Mkosawen swaruser ḇeḇor ḇesarmar ro mkosnemna, dosam masasor, rakrakrok ma famfaras, rarirya kako ḇarḇor ḇeḇor ḇero mkosnemna kam.
49004032	Mboi mkosnemna nfafir faro min mkoḇesi, mko swaryae mko, ma mkoḇuk ampunyae faro mko, imnis raris Allah ḇyuk ampun ḇemko ro Kristus.
49005001	Rarirya mkoso asuser Allah, imnis romawa iswar kaku
49005002	ma mkokenem ro saswar, imnis Yesus Kristus iswar mko ma ḇyuk mankundi fa ḇyefarsarser samsom ḇediref faro Allah.
49005003	Ḇape farbuk ma roi ḇemamas roḇa fararur famfnom neḇekofen awer rofandu mko, imnis kankenem ro snonkaku ḇesrensya.
49005004	Rarirya kako wos ḇemamas, ḇeḇebei roḇa fararur famfnom -- snar roi ḇeradine nasyusḇa -- iḇye syadi wakofen kasumasa faro Allah.
49005005	Mkoswarepen naḇye: snonkaku ḇefrur farbuk, ḇefrur mamas roḇaido snonkaku ḇefrur famfnom, isoine ḇesyom faro amfyanir, osoḇaḇeri fanari isma rarwas ro Kristus ma Allah Ḇaḇesasoser suḇedi.
49005006	Mkoḇor awer kuker wos ḇeḇebeidi ro snonkaku, snar roi ḇerarirya nbuk masasor faro Allah ro kawasa ḇeḇeuser i ḇasya.
49005007	Mkoḇebati awer kuker si.
49005008	Ḇepon iwara mkoro pampan, ḇape baboine mkoroi Manseren isnai ḇyedi. Inja mkokenem imnis romawa ro isnaiya,
49005009	bon ro isnaiya isoine kankenem ḇeḇye ma fararur ḇenapes ma ḇekaku faro Allah,
49005010	ma mkoḇesewar fa mkomamḇaḇir rosai ḇefrur sneprei faro Allah.
49005011	Mkoso ma mkun awer rarwas ro fararur ḇepampan ḇeḇefaindaḇa, iḇye syadi mkosampum fararur anna.
49005012	Snar roi sifrur ro kankunes sikofen na ido nafrur mamyai kwar.
49005013	Ḇape roi ḇeḇor ḇero isnaiya na nfababa, snar isnaiya isnaiyar nakam kwar.
49005014	Rarirya sikofen kwar: "Mkokḇok, ne, ḇeyenef mko, ma mkiḇer mko rofandu ḇemarsya ma nari Kristus isnai mko."
49005015	Rarirya, mkokara naḇye kaku, mkokenem rariso, mkomnis awer snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa, mboi mkokenem imnis snonkaku ḇemamkarkir,
49005016	mkofandun fafisuna kuker aunos, snar fafisu ine fafisu ḇeḇarḇor.
49005017	Snar rarirya mkofawi royoḇa awer, ḇape mkoḇesewar insa mkofawi Manseren marisen ḇyedi.
49005018	Ma mkinem awer anggur ḇefrur masaser mko, snar anggur ifrur rarmomen-nafsu, mboi mkoḇesewar insa mkofo kuker Rurya,
49005019	ma mkowawosyae faro min mkoḇesi kuker dow, dow sanandik. Mkodisen dow rurya mkobras faro Manseren kuker sneḇesiper.
49005020	Ma mkomarisen syadi ro roi ḇeḇor kam ma mkokofen kasumasa ḇesyakwar faro Allah -- Kmaya, kuker snonsnon ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus,
49005021	ma mkorun mankun mko oser faro ḇeseya ma nari mkomkak Kristus.
49005022	Ne, bin, kwunem faro swambri imnis kwunem faro Manseren,
49005023	snar swambri ḇyebru faro aw imnis raris Kristus ḇyebru ro jemaat. I kada ḇyuk aski faro jemaat ḇeḇebaken oser ro i.
49005024	Snar jemaat kyunem faro Kristus, rarirya kako binya kyunem faro swari ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
49005025	Ne, snon, waswar swambri imnis Kristus iswar jemaat kwar ma ḇyuk mankundi faḇyesom warek jemaat ani
49005026	ma fyasren jemaat, fyasren kwar ani kuker war masisren ma Allah wos ḇyedi,
49005027	insa ḇye jemaat ani fadores ro ḇarpon ḇyedi kuker baba fyarorewḇa, ikruremḇa roḇaido eḇesena, insa jemaat isren ma fyarorewḇa.
49005028	Rarirya kako snonya iswar swari kada imnis raris baken mankundi ḇyedi: Mansei ḇeswar swari imnis raris iswar mankundi.
49005029	Snar snonkaku oso dayin baken mankundi ḇyedi ḇaim, mboi fyaduru ma ḇyemanmin i imnis raris Kristus faro jemaat ḇyedi,
49005030	snar koine kina ro Kristus baken ḇyedi.
49005031	Ro Refo sfas radine, "Rarirya nari snon oso ibur snari ma kmari ma ḇyeoser kuker swari, isof suḇe baken oser."
49005032	Kankunes ine ibabos, ḇape ro yakofen kukerya isoine ḇaḇeoser Kristus kuker jemaat ḇyena.
49005033	Ḇape rariso wer kako snon mko oser-oser: iswar swari imnis iswar mankundi ma bin oser-oser iḇye kada ḇyesyowi swa ḇyedi.
49006001	Snar rarirya, ne, romawa mko, indo mkosouser sasoser ro sna-kma mkoḇesi snar Manseren.
49006002	Mkoḇesyowi sna-kma mkoḇesi -- ine kada sasoser ḇeḇefandun ro asas ine:
49006003	insa mkosma aski ma kankenem ḇekwan ro supswan ine.
49006004	Ma kma mkoya, mkomsor awer romawa mkoḇesi, mboi mkofarkor si kuker farkarkor ma ananun Manseren.
49006005	Ne, manfamyan mkoya, mkosouser tuan mkoḇesi kuker makakak ma radadai kuker sne ḇeḇye ro supswan ine, imnis raris mko souser faro Kristus,
49006006	ma mkoso user ro ḇarpon sena monda awer fa mkofrur sneprei sisnesna, ḇape mkomnis manfyan faro Kristus inja mkofrur Allah marisen ḇyena kuker sne ḇesiper,
49006007	ma ḇemarisen ḇefrur afuffarmyan ḇyedi imnis snonkaku ḇeyuffarmyan faro Manseren mboi faro snonkaku ḇa.
49006008	Mkofawi, mboi snonkaku oser-oser, iḇye manfamyan, iḇye kako ḇemkei, rofyor ifrur roi ḇeḇye oso, nari isma munsu ḇyedi ro Manseren.
49006009	Ma tuan-tuan mkofrur rarirya kako faro si ma mkosawen masasor. Mkoswarepen, mboi Manseren sedi ma Manseren mkoḇedi isya ro boiyaswa ma ikada snonkakusya simnis kam.
49006010	Ḇarpurya, mkosambraḇ kuker papoik ro Manseren.
49006011	Mkuf Allah romamun ḇeḇor fyasos faḇyuk faro mkona, insa mkofarmku mkosampum Ibiris ankarkar ḇyena;
49006012	snar kofaḇri fakosampum snonkaku ḇa, ḇape kosampum samambraḇ ḇeḇuk sasoser, ḇesma papoiksya, ḇeḇeḇru ro supswan ḇepampan ine, rur ḇeḇarḇor ro farsyos sansoren.
49006013	Snar rarirya mkun Allah romamun ḇeḇor fyasos na, insa mkosambraḇ mkoḇuk sampum ro ras ḇeḇarḇor ani ma mkores nako, famkokfrur mnis roi ḇeḇor kam kwar.
49006014	Inja mkores nako, mkoḇoḇek roi ḇeḇoḇek napnapesya ma mkosansun-sansun embroḇ napnapesya,
49006015	mkosower mkowemna kuker roi ḇesower wemin, ma mkoḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro askiya.
49006016	Rofafisu nakam mkun adai kakyar snar kuker adai ani nari mkofasye ikoi ḇesak nakam ro Ibirisya;
49006017	mkosaswo ḇaḇeaskiya imnis roi ḇesaswo ma Allah wos ḇyedi imnis sepada Rurya,
49006018	mkofrur nakam kuker nadi famkor fafnoḇek ro Allah. Mkonadi kada rofafisu nakam kuker Rurya ma mkomnai awer ro nadi ma fararyor faro snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇesrensya,
49006019	ma aya kako, insa yasma wawos ḇemnis, rofyor yaḇas sḇadon ayedi, yasma fakamaman ḇenapes, insa yaḇri yaḇaryas kankunes Ankankinem Ḇeḇye,
49006020	yuffarmyan imnis manwawan sḇefa ḇesmai. Mkonadi kada insa kuker ḇri yaḇaryas i, imnis moḇ yawos rai.
49006021	Insa mkofawi rariso ro mankundaya ma rariso ro dine, nakam nari Tikhikus, naek koḇedi yaswar ani ma ḇefnoḇek aya ro afuffarmyan ro Manseren, nari ikofen ḇadir faro mko.
49006022	Kuker kakara ine yawan i faro mko insa ikofen ḇadir rariso kuker nko faro mko ma iwos sneprei mkosnemna.
49006023	Aski ma saswar kuker kakyar ro Allah, Kmaya ma Manseren Yesus Kristus ryowus mko kam.
49006024	Iḇye Allah ḇyeḇok naek srar mko kam kada, ḇeswar Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus kuker saswar ḇekain fyoro-fyoroya. Ro aya Paulus
50001001	Syap ro Paulus ma Timotius, Yesus Kristus manfamyan ḇyesi, faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam ro Yesus Kristus ro Filipi, kuker manfarkin ma ḇeyuffarmyan (syamas) jemaat.
50001002	Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-marisen ro Allah, Kma koḇedi, ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryous mko kada.
50001003	Rofyor yaswarepen mko rofafisu ono yakofen kasumasa faro Allah yedi.
50001004	Ma rofyor yanadiwarek mko kam, yaḇenadi ḇesya kwar kuker sneḇemarisen.
50001005	Yakofen kasumasa faro Allah yedi snar ḇaḇeoser mkoḇedi ro ḇararyas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro ras randakya isof baboine.
50001006	Inja yakyar kuker sne ḇesiper, insa Allah, ḇerandak fararur ḇeḇye ine rofandu mko, nari ifnoḇek pdefi isof ro papupesya ro ras Yesus Kristus kyaḇer muma werya.
50001007	Mboi yakara rarirya kwar ro mko kam, snar yaswarepen mko ro sneri, snar mko kam mkosma rarwas ro saswar-fakamaman Allah ḇyuk ḇeaya, iḇye rofyor yasmai ro bui, iḇye kako rofyor yaḇesanowarek Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya.
50001008	Snar Allah ḇyesaksi ḇeaya ro roi yakofen na kaku ḇeri yaswar mko kuker saswarkuf ro Yesus Kristus mankundi.
50001009	Ma yanadi radine, iḇyekada saswar mkoḇena nafo ro fawawi ḇenapes ma kakara ḇeḇor kam,
50001010	isof mkokinfir roi ḇeḇye kam, insa mkosren ma mkofarorewḇa famkowaf Kristus ras ḇyedi,
50001011	ḇefo kuker bon napnapes Yesus Kristus ifrur kwar faro payamyum ma sanandik Allah.
50001012	Yamarisen, insa naek srar mkofawi, mboi roi ḇeradine kuker aya nane, nai ḇeḇewar fa Ankankinem Ḇeḇye iryer,
50001013	isof ḇekon ro istana (rum) Gubernur ma snonkaku ḇese ḇero diansya kam sakfawi yasmai ro bui snar Kristus.
50001014	Ma samamyai yedi eḇedari naek srar ḇena kakyar oser sibor sikyar syadi faro Manseren ma simsik ḇo siwawos ro Allah wos ḇyedi kuker makakak ḇa.
50001015	Snonkaku ono sisya sḇaryas Kristus snar masasor ma rakrakrok, ḇape ono kako sḇaryasi kuker kakara ḇeḇye.
50001016	Snonkaku sine kada sḇaryas Kristus kuker saswar, snar sifawi, mboi aya isya rodine fayaḇesanowarek Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya,
50001017	ḇape ḇesesya snar ḇaḇefandun mankunsi sena ma kuker kakara ḇenapesḇa, skara ḇo soḇo kuker rarirya sifrur samamyai yedi famyarḇak ro bui.
50001018	Ḇape rariryano royoḇa, snar rariso wer kako, Kristus ḇyeḇeḇaryas, kuker kakara ḇesasar roḇaido kakara ḇeḇye. Roi ḇeradine yamarisen na. Ma nari yamarisen faswef,
50001019	snar yafawi, mboi ro roi ḇeḇor nane kam ḇarpurya isoine yasma aski snar nadi mkoḇena ma fafnoḇek ro Yesus Kristus Rur ḇyedi.
50001020	Snar roi yaḇe ḇare ma yakyar kakuya isoine mboi ro roi ḇeḇor anna kam nari yamai ḇa, mboi raris fafisu nakam, rarirya baboine, Kristus isma syom snar aya, ro kankenem yedi, iḇye ro marmar yedi kako.
50001021	Snar kankenemya maḇe aya Kristus irya ma marmarya fainda rirya.
50001022	Ḇape rofyor nari yakenem ro supswan ine, irya fyasna ḇeaya yafararur fayaḇuk bon. Inja rosai nari yakimfirya, yafawi ḇa.
50001023	Ḇar risuru suḇedifer aya: yamarisen yara yakain fnoḇek Kristus -- ikada iḇye syadi kaku;
50001024	ḇape fandun syadi yakain ro supswan ine snar mko.
50001025	Ma ro kakyar ine yafawi: nari yakain ma nari yarowus mko kam wer, insa mkosamberen syadi ma nkoryaḇ snar kakyarya,
50001026	isof masasik mkoḇena ro Yesus Kristus nasyadi wer snar aya, rofyor yakaḇer faro mko.
50001027	Iḇye syadi mkokenem namnis kuker Kristus Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi insa rofyor yaramufa yamam, mboi rofyor yarafa ḇaido yamnaf, mboi mkores nako ro rur oser, ma mkoḇe sne oser ro fararur faro kakyar ḇerama ro ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye,
50001028	kuker makakak kermkuno ḇaḇeri faro mbroḇ mkoḇesi. Faro sikam irya aḇyair raroya, ḇape faro mko aḇyair ro askiya, ḇerama ro Allah.
50001029	Snar faro mko mkosma fakamaman snar kakyar faro Kristus monda ḇa, mboi mkoḇekandera kukeri kako,
50001030	ḇaḇesewar mkoḇedi imnis kuker rosai mkomam ro aya, ma baboine rosai mkomnaf ro aya.
50002001	Inja ro Kristus ananun naisya, sneprei ma saswar, ḇaḇeoser ro Rurya isya, saswarya ma snesoya isya,
50002002	insa mkofrur mnis raryaḇ yedi isoine: iḇye mkona sne-kakara oser, mkona saswar oser, rur oser, kakara oser,
50002003	mboi mkosewar ḇaḇefandun mankun mkoḇena ḇardi awer roḇa sanandik ḇeḇefromo awer. Inja iḇye kuker randun sne mkomam min mkoḇesi sikaki syadi ro mankun mko;
50002004	ma mkono oser-oser syewar fandun mankundi ḇyena awer, ḇape fandun snonkaku ḇesesya kako.
50002005	Iḇye ro kankenem kayam mkona, swaruser ma ḇaḇir raris kosma ro Yesus Kristus kako,
50002006	I kada imnis kuker Allah, ḇape kyara ḇaḇaḇeoser ḇyedi ḇemnis kuker Allah, nari iḇriwarek naḇa.
50002007	Mboi ryir nakam kwar ma ḇyeimnis mankundi raris manfyan oso. Imnis raris snonkaku, ma ikenem imnis snonkaku.
50002008	Ryun mankundi, ma ikenem kuker aunos faro Allah isof imar -- isoine spai ro aprop faimar.
50002009	Eḇedari Allah ikanowi fa ikaki syadi, ma ḇyuk faroi snonsnon ḇeba syadi ro snonsnon besena kam.
50002010	Ma faro ḇaḇesyowi Yesus, roi ḇeḇor kam ḇekenem ro boiyaswa, ma ro supnane baḇna, nari nbansuba faroi.
50002011	Sikam nari skarem Yesus Kristus ikada Manseren, ma rarirya Allah Kmaya isma syom.
50002012	Naek srar yaswar kaku mkoine, indo mkoḇeuser; inja mko fararur faswef ro sasewar koreri mkoḇena kuker makakak ma araryof, imnis raris rofyor aya isya rofandu mko, mboi isyadi baboine rofafisu aya isya rofandu mko ḇa kako,
50002013	snar Allah iso ḇefararur ro mko iḇye marisen ma ro fararur kako imnis marisen ḇyedi.
50002014	Mkofrur roi ḇeḇor kam kuker sasurem ma famfaḇri awer,
50002015	ma mkofrur sasar awer, imnis Allah romawa ḇesren ḇyesi rofandu snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇesasar ma ḇeḇor sine, isof mkosna rofandusi imnis maksya ro supswan ine,
50002016	ma mkoserepen ro wos ḇekenemya, insa ro ras Kristus ḇyedi yamsik aya, mboi yafaḇri waworek ḇa ma yaḇekandera fromo ḇa.
50002017	Ḇape rik ayena neḇesbawer ḇefasarser kako snar kakyar mkoḇena, yamarisen naba ma yaryaḇ naba kaku kuker mko.
50002018	Ma rarirya kako nari mkoryaḇ kaku ma mkoryaḇ kuker aya.
50002019	Ḇape ro Manseren Yesus yakyar nari yawan Timotius faro mko, insa yasma sneprei kako rofyor yamnaf rariso kankenem mkoḇena.
50002020	Snar snonkaku oso isya ro dine ḇa, ḇena sne ma kakara oser kukeri ma ḇekara kaku ḇeri ḇaḇefandun mkoḇena;
50002021	snar sikam ssewar ḇaḇefandun mankunsi sena, mboi ḇaḇefandun ro Yesus Kristus ḇa.
50002022	Mboi mkofawi ḇaḇeuser ḇyena neḇemnasen kwar ma ifnoḇek aya kwar ro afuffarmyan ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya imnis romawa oso ifnoḇek kmari.
50002023	Iso nari yakyar yawan fasaw mufaḇemko, rofyor wawos ḇekur aya nane nasnai kwar maḇeaya.
50002024	Ḇape yakyar faro Manseren, nari mankundaya kako yarakaki fasaw faro mko.
50002025	Rofafisu ine yakara iḇye yawan Epafroditus faro mko, isoine naek ayedi ma min ḇefararur kayam, mkowan faḇeyuffarmyan aya ro ḇaḇefandun yena.
50002026	Snar iswarkuf mko kam ma imkakwarek mko snar mkomnaf dafduf ḇyedi kwar.
50002027	Kaku iduf rawo fanam imar, ḇape Allah iswari, ma derer monda ḇa, mboi aya kako, insa yaḇekandera mankenem awer.
50002028	Eḇedari yawan fasaw i, insa rofyor mkomam i, mkoryaḇ wer ma sneri iknon.
50002029	Inja mkosrow i kuker marisen ḇeba ma mkoḇesyowi snonkaku ḇerariryasya.
50002030	Snar kuker fararur Kristus ḇyena indokada imar ma ḇyuk rur ḇyedi fa ifrur mnis rosai ḇemisḇa ro afuffarmyan mkoḇena maro aya.
50003001	(1a) Papupesya naek srar mkoryaḇ snar Manseren. (1b) Yafas radine faro mko snar nmarḇak maro aya ḇa mboi nbuk aski faro mko.
50003002	Mkosasor mko ro nafsya, mkosasor mko ro snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya, mkosasor mko ro sofakfuk ḇesasarna,
50003003	snar koine snonkaku ḇesma sofakfuk ḇekaku, ḇeḇeari kuker Allah Rur ḇyedi, ma ḇemsik kuker Yesus Kristus mboi kosma kakyar faro rari snonkaku ḇa.
50003004	Kaku ḇeri aya kako yasma knam faro yakyar rari snonkaku sena. Rofyor snonkaku ono ḇese sisya skara soḇo sikyar faro rari snonkaku sena, ayama yasyadi wer:
50003005	yasma sofakfuk ro ras ḇeḇewar, ro er Israel, ro keret Benyamin, snon Ibrani kaku, ro ḇaḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudi aya ine snon Farisi,
50003006	ro fararur yaḇewayam jemaat, ro ḇaḇenapnapes ma sasouser sasoser Refo Yahudi yafarorewḇa.
50003007	Ḇape rosai ḇeḇefandun ḇeaya, baboine nefainda ḇa snar Kristus.
50003008	Rarirya roi ḇeḇor kam yakara naḇe roi ḇeḇefromo, snar mambir faro Yesus Kristus Manseren ayedi, naḇye syadi ro roi nakam. Snar i eḇedari yasawen ḇesena kam ma yakara naḇe mamas, insa yasma Kristus,
50003009	ma aya isya kuker Kristus mboi kuker ḇaḇenapnapes ayena ḇa snar yaḇeuser sasoser Refo Yahudi, mboi kuker napnapes snar kakyar faro Kristus, isoine napnapes Allah ḇyuk snar kakyarya.
50003010	Ma Yamarisen insa yamambaḇir Kristus ma papoik ro ḇaḇeaḇiḇer ḇyedi ma ḇaḇeoser ro ḇaḇekandera ḇyena, ro moḇ yaḇeoser kuker Kristus ro ḇaḇemarmar ḇyedi,
50003011	insa ro papupesya yasma ḇaḇeaḇiḇer rofandu ḇemarsya.
50003012	Inja imnis raris yasma moḇ ine kwar roḇa yamnis kwar, mboi yayawna, isof yaforna, snar aya kako Yesus Kristus fyor aya ro marandan ḇeraḇe Damsyik.
50003013	Naek srar, yakara ḇa ro mankundaya, mboi yaforna kwar,
50003014	ḇape moḇ yafararur raiso ine: yafanander rosai ḇero ḇarpur ayedi kwar ma yamamker monda faro rosai ḇero ḇarpon ayedi, ma yafrar faro yasma sasuref, isoine fararyor ro boiyaswa ro Allah snar Yesus Kristus.
50003015	Inja mkorama, ḇemnis kwar koya, kokara rarirya. Ma rofyor mkona kakara ḇese ro roi oso, roi ḇerarirya ani nari Allah fyasnai faro mko.
50003016	Ma rosairya monda kosma kwar, kombran rarirya monda.
50003017	Naek srar, mkoso kankenem ayedi ma mkomam warek si, imnis kankenem mkomam ro nko.
50003018	Snar, raris yakofen ḇerarwan ono faro mko kwar, ma yafasḇair wer ro baboine kuker kankanes, snar kawasa sibor sikenem imnis sembroḇ Kristus aprop ḇyedi.
50003019	Ḇarpurya nari sisma raro, snar Manseren sedi iso marisen baken sena, simsik si kuker roi ḇefrur mamyai, siswaruserker monda roi ḇero supswan ine.
50003020	Snar koine koḇe kina ro boiyaswa, ma rodia kako kowaf Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ḇeḇuk koreri ḇeko,
50003021	ma nari ḇesadwer baken ḇepyumba koḇenane, fanamnis kuker baken ḇepyum ḇyedi, imnis papoik ḇyedi ḇefrur kafyo roi ḇeḇor kam faro mankundi.
50004001	Eḇedari, naek srar yaswar kaku ma yaḇeḇare-ḇeswar, raryaḇ ayedi ma wower ayedi, mkores nako kako snar Manseren, ne, naek srar yaswar kaku!
50004002	Yanun mu Euodia ma Sintike, insa muna sne-kakara oser snar Manseren.
50004003	Mboi, yor kaku faro mko kako, Sunsugos, min ḇeḇeasuser ayedi: mkofnoḇek si. Snar sifnoḇek aya kwar ro ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, fnoḇek kuker Klemens ma min ḇese yesi ḇesma fararur oser, ḇena snonsnon ḇefasepen ro syap kankenemya.
50004004	Mkoryaḇ ḇesya kwar snar Manseren! Yakofen ḇeoser wer: mkoryaḇ mura!
50004005	Iḇye syadi sneḇefafir mkoḇena snonkakusya kam sifawina. Manseren fyanam kwar!
50004006	Iḇye mkoraryof rosairya wer kako, mboi mkofasna roi ḇeḇor kam marisen mkoḇena faro Allah ro nadi ma fararyor kuker kafkofen kasumasa.
50004007	Saswar-ḇaḇye ro Allah, ḇesyadi ro kakara, nari nfaduru sne ma kakara mkoḇena snar Yesus Kristus.
50004008	Inja papupesya, naek srar, ḇekaku mkoya kam, ḇesma snonsnon mkoya kam, ḇenapes mkoya kam, ḇesren mkoya kam, ḇefafir mkoya kam, ḇewos pyum mkoya kam, ḇeḇenaḇye mkoya kam ma nari ḇesma sanandik, mkokara roi ḇeḇor anna kam.
50004009	Ma rosai mkofarkor kwar, ma rosai mkosma kwar, ma rosai mkomnaf kwar, ma rosai mkomam kwar ro aya, mkofrurna. Mboi Allah ḇeḇeknam saswar-ḇaḇenaḇye nari ryowus mko.
50004010	Yaryab fafayaḇa snar Manseren, mboi ḇarpurya kakara mkoḇena ma ḇaḇaḇir mkoḇena mkoswar aya wer. Mboi swarapepen mkoḇena naisya, ḇape mkosma fafisu ḇa.
50004011	Yakofen rarirya snar yananjar ḇa, snar mankundaya yafrur mnis fandun yena ro fafisu nakam.
50004012	Yafawi rosaiso ḇaḇebakyafya ma yafawi rosaiso andidoya. Ro roi ḇeḇor kam ma rosairya wer nekankunes wer maro aya ḇa; iḇye rofafisu yasyopen, iḇye rofafisu yabiser, iḇye rofafisu andido, iḇye rofafisu bakyaf kako.
50004013	Ro roi ḇeḇor nakam yaḇarna snar Kristus ḇeḇuk samambraḇ maḇe aya.
50004014	Rarirya fararur mkoḇena naḇye kako, snar mkun rarwas kwar ro kandera yena.
50004015	Mankun mkofawi kako, ne, kawasa Filipi; rofafisu yarandak yaḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, rofyor yabur Makedonia, jemaat oso isya ḇa ifrur karkor kuker aya ro nyaki yena mboi mkerer.
50004016	Snar ro Tesalonika kako rarwan risuru mkofarem kwar fafnoḇek mkoḇena maro aya.
50004017	Mboi farsarser anna naiso yakor syadina ḇa, mboi bon ḇyena, ḇefrur fainda mkoḇena naba syadi.
50004018	Baboine yasma kwar rosai ḇeḇefandun ro mko, mboi isyadi wer ro roi ḇeḇor anna. Ayaisya ro andido, snar yasma kwar farem mkoḇena ro Epafroditus, farsarser ḇediref oso, samsom oso ḇefrur marisen ma Allah imarisen na.
50004019	Allah yedi nari myunsu fandun mkoḇena kam imnis raris nana ma papoik ḇyedi ro Yesus Kristus.
50004020	Sanandik faro Allah ma Kma koḇedi isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin!
50004021	Mko kofen aroo ayena faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi ḇeḇeoser kuker Yesus Kristus. Aroo faro mko ro naek srar ḇewarpu aya rodinesya.
50004022	Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam rodine, isyadi wer snonkaku ro istana (rum) Kaisar, sfarem aroo faro naek srar.
50004023	Saswar-ḇaḇye ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryowus rur mkoḇesi! Ro nu, Paulus ma Timotius
51001001	Ro Paulus, Yesus Kristus manwawan ḇyedi, snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, ma Timotius naek koḇedi,
51001002	faro naek srar Allah kawasa ḇyesi ḇekyar faro Kristus ro Kolose. Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ro Allah, Kma koḇedi, ryowus mko kada.
51001003	Rofafisu nkoḇenadiwarek mko, nkokofen kasumasa ḇesya kwar faro Allah, Kma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus,
51001004	snar nkomnaf kwar kakyar mkoḇena faro Yesus Kristus ma ro saswar mkoḇena faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi,
51001005	snar kakyar, ḇefasos kwar faḇemko ro boiyaswa. Ro kakyar ani mkorower ḇepon kwar ro wos ḇaḇenapnapesya, isoine Ankankinem Ḇeḇye,
51001006	mkosma kwar. Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani imarem ma iryer supswan ḇesiper, rarirya kako rofandu mko rofafisu mkorower i ma mkomam baḇir Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇekaku ḇyena.
51001007	Mkofawi nakam kwar ro Epafras, min nkoswar ro afuffarmyan, ḇeḇemanfamyan ḇeḇeuser Kristus snar nko.
51001008	I ḇekofen kako saswar mkoḇedi ḇyeknam ro Rurya.
51001009	Eḇedari rofyor nkomnafya, nkomnai ḇa nkonadiwarek mko. Ma nkor, insa mkona fawawi nakam ma kakara rurya, faro mkofawi mnis Manseren marisen ḇyena,
51001010	isof kankenem mkoḇena naḇye ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ma imarisen na ro roi ḇeḇor nakam, ma mkoḇuk bon ro fararur ḇeḇor ḇeḇyena ma mkosur ro fawawi ḇekaku ro Allah,
51001011	ma mkosambraḇ kuker samambraḇ ḇeḇor kam kuker Allah papoik ḇyedi kada insa mkoḇar roi ḇeḇor kam kuker farmku ma kbaḇ,
51001012	ma mkokofen kasumasa kuker raryaḇ faro Kmaya, iso ḇefrur famkona rarwas ro rosai ssḇuk faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam ro ḇaḇesasoser isnaya.
51001013	Fyaspar kobur papoik pampanya ma dun koḇe papoik Ḇaḇesasoser Rumkun saswar ḇyedi;
51001014	kuker Rumkun ḇyedi kosma faspar, isoine sasar koḇena neḇepyos kwar.
51001015	Kristus ikada fanir ro Allah kopok komamba, i rumkun rak, i ḇepon ro roi ḇeḇor ḇefrur kwarna.
51001016	Snar kuker i, Allah ifrur kwar roi ḇeḇor kam, ro boiyaswa ma ro supnane, roi komamna ma roi komambana, iḇye karapesa ḇaḇesasoser, ḇaḇesasoser kako, iḇye ḇesasosersya, iḇye kako ḇesma papoiksya; roi ḇeḇor kam neḇefrur snar Kristus ma faro Kristus.
51001017	Kristus isya ḇepon kaku kwar ro roi ḇeḇor nakam ma roi ḇeḇor anna kam naisya snar Kristus.
51001018	I ḇeḇeḇru ro bakenya, isoine jemaat. I rumkun rak, ḇyeḇeḇawes ḇepon rofandu snonkaku ḇemarsya, isof i ḇeḇefandun syadi ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
51001019	Allah mankundi imarisen insa roi ḇeḇor anna kam ḇemnis ro Allah, kosma nakam ro Rumkun ḇyedi,
51001020	snar Rumkun ani kako Allah ifrur roi ḇeḇor kam kuker ḇaḇeaski faro mankundi, iḇye roi ḇeḇor kam ro supnane, ma roi ḇeḇor kam ro boiyaswa kako, Allah ifrurna snar marmar Rumkun ḇyedi ro apropya.
51001021	Randakya mkokenem ḇinkwanbur Allah, ma mkoḇe mbroḇ i kuker rari ma kakara ḇeḇarḇor mkoḇena;
51001022	ḇape ro baboine, kuker marmar ro Rumkun ḇyedi, Allah ifrur ḇaḇeoser mkoḇedi, iḇye kaḇer wer kuker mankundi. Kuker nyan ine dun mko faro Allah imnis snonkaku ḇesren, mkokaku ma mkofarorew ḇa.
51001023	Inja nari mkodworen ro kakyarya, mkores faswef ma mkomarmer ḇa, ma mkorir awer kakyar faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya, mkomnaf kwarya ma ḇyeḇeḇaryas kwar ro supswan ine, ma aya ine, Paulus, ḇeyuffarmyan faro i kwar.
51001024	Baboine yaryaḇ snar yaḇekandera kuker mko, snar kuker kandera yena, yafasos rosai ḇemnis ḇa ro kandera Kristus ḇyena, ro baken ḇyedi, isoine jemaat.
51001025	Aya ine yaḇemanfyan faro jemaat ani imnis raris fararur Allah ikyar kwar maro aya fayaḇaryas pdef wos ḇyedi faro mko,
51001026	isoine ḇaryas ḇeyokef ma ḇeḇekankunes wampasi wambarek utin-utin roḇepon iwara faro snonkakusya kam, ḇape baboine ḇyeḇekofenḇadir faro kawasa ḇyesi.
51001027	Allah imarisen ikofenḇadir faro si, ro ḇaḇye ma baba ro kankunes ani rofandu er-er ḇese, isoine: Kristus isya rofandu mko, isoine nari mkosma rarwas ro Allah baba ḇyedi!
51001028	Iso nkoḇaryasya, rofyor nkoḇuk farkarkor ma nkanun snonkaku oser-oser ro fawawi ḇeḇor kam, insa sfarkin snonkaku oser-oser faro ḇaḇeimnis snar Kristus.
51001029	Eḇedari yaḇesewar kaku kuker samambraḇ ḇeḇor kam imnis Kristus papoik ḇyedi ḇefararur sambraḇ ro aya.
51002001	Snar yamarisen insa mkofawi, fararur ḇemarḇak yafrur faro mko, ma faro si ro Laodikia ma faro mko kam, ḇemambaḇir aya ḇaimsya,
51002002	insa sisnesna naprei ma sḇeoser ro saswari, isof sisma nana ḇeḇor kam ḇekur ḇaḇesnekin ro kakara, inja smambaḇir Allah kankunes ḇyedi isoine Kristus, sna nana ḇaḇemamkarkir ḇeḇor kam ma fawawi anna neḇeyokef ro Kristus.
51002003	Snar nana fawawinanem ḇeḇor kam ma fawawi neknam ro Kristus.
51002004	Roi ḇeḇor nane kam yakofena, insa ono sḇeankar mko maroḇa kuker wos ḇerok marndanden.
51002005	Snar rariso wer kako imburo baken yedi isya rofandu mkoḇa, ḇape rur yedi isya fnoḇek mko ma yamam kuker raryaḇ kankenem aunos ma kakyar ḇedworen mkoḇena snar Kristus.
51002006	Mkona Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi kwar. Inja nari mkokenem faswef kuker i.
51002007	Ma mkoḇerares ro i ma mko ḇeḇeḇawes roi, ma kakyar mkoḇena nadworen syadi ro rosai sḇukfarkor mko, ma mkosnemna nafo kuker kasumasa.
51002008	Mkosasor mko insa rosai sḇukfarkor ninyan mko fasfarkin mko ro nyan sasar awer ma ḇekaku ḇana, snar siso farkarkor ninyan ma rodur ḇero supswan ine, fama ḇyeknam ro Kristus ḇa.
51002009	Snar roi ḇeḇor kam ro Allah naisya ro Kristus, isoine ro ḇaḇesnonkaku ḇyedi,
51002010	ma ssḇuk namnis ḇemko kwar ro Kristus, snar Kristus iso ḇeḇeḇru ro ḇesasosersya ma ḇesma papoiksya kam.
51002011	Ro Kristus mkosma sofakfuk kwar, sofakfuk snonkaku sifrur ḇa, ḇape kuker Kristus sofakfuk ḇyedi, ḇeḇeknam ro ḇaḇemkei baken ḇesasar ine,
51002012	snar kuker Kristus mko ḇeḇekrir ro masisren, ma kuker Kristus mko ḇeḇeḇawes kako snar kakyar mkoḇena faro Allah fararur papoik ḇyedi, ḇeḇawes Kristus rofandu ḇemarsya kwar.
51002013	Mko kako, ro randakya mkomar ro ḇar rurya snar sasar mkoḇena, ma snar mkosma sofakfuk ro ḇaken ḇa, ḇape ro baboine Allah ḇyuk kankenem faro mko fnoḇek Kristus. Allah ipyos sasar ḇeḇor mkoḇena kwar.
51002014	Snar kuker payasyos syap nyakiya, ro fasasna sasoser ḇeḇuksof ma ḇesampum ko. Ma ipyosna ḇo pyaepenna ro ai apropya:
51002015	Kristus pyampum ḇesasosersya ma ḇesma papoiksya kwar ma ifrur si ḇeḇaḇeuni ḇefababa ro ḇaḇefainda ḇyedi faro si.
51002016	Inja mkomam monda awer snonkaku oso ḇeḇuksof faro mko ro roi ḇefor, inja rosai mkan ma mkinem roḇaido ras munara, munara paik babo roḇa wer ras Mananai Yahudi:
51002017	Nane kam nenin monda ro roi nari ḇerama, mboi neknam ro Kristus.
51002018	Mkomam monda awer fainda mkoḇena ḇo neḇeposer ro snonkaku ḇefrur ḇeḇefawi ḇa ḇerun mankun ḇo ḇeḇenadi faro malaikatsya, ḇeḇesewar ro ḇaḇemamam kuker knam oso ḇa ḇekanow mankun ro kakara sena ro supswan ine.
51002019	Mboi iserepen nako ḇa faro Ḇeḇeḇru, ro moḇsai baken ḇesiper ḇyeḇefaduru ma ḇyeḇefesepen faḇyeoser kuker urek ma faswisew, ḇesma sarsur ḇerama ro Allahya.
51002020	Rofyor mkomar fnoḇek Kristus kwar ma mkomkei ro rodur ro supswan ine, rosai eḇedari mkokafyo faro rari ḇeḇor, imnis raris mkoisya mkokenem kaker ro supswan ine:
51002021	Mkopan awer ine, mkorepen awer iwa, mkoḇyunek awer ine;
51002022	nakam nkur monda roi ḇeḇor kona ma nari ḇero snar naso monda sasoser ma farkarkor snonkaku.
51002023	Kaku ḇeri, rari anna komamna nafo kuker fawawi nanem kuker ḇaḇeari sifrur ro mankunsi, imnis raris randun mankun, ḇaḇewayam mankun, nefainda oso ḇa mboi sifrur syopen kankenem sena ro supswan ine.
51003001	Eḇedari rofyor mko ḇeḇeḇawes fnoḇek Kristus, mkosewar roi ḇero boiyaswa, ro moḇ Kristus isya, kyain ro Allah ḇar raku ḇyedi.
51003002	Mkoswarepen monda roi ḇekur boiyaswana, mboi mkoswaruser roi ḇero supswan inena awer.
51003003	Snar mkomar kwar ma kankenem mkoḇena nayokef kuker Kristus snar Allah.
51003004	Rofyor Kristus, ḇeḇeknam kankenem koḇena, nari fyasna mankundi kwar, mko kako nari mkakfasna mkofnoḇek i ro ḇaḇenasan ḇyedi.
51003005	Eḇedari mkomun marisen rosai ḇero baken mkoḇena ro supswan ine, isoine ḇaḇe farḇuk, ḇaḇearwarem, ḇaḇermomen, marisen ḇeḇarḇor, ma faḇri mankun kako, imnis kuker ḇaḇesamsyom faro karwar,
51003006	nakam nafrur fa Allah imsor [faro snonkaku ḇeso Allah ḇasya].
51003007	Ma mko kako ro randakya mkakfrur roi ḇerarirya rofafisu mkokenem rona.
51003008	Ḇape baboine, mkosawen roi ḇerarirya kam, isoine masasor, dosam, ḇarḇor, kankonem ma wos ḇemamas ḇesasyar ro mkosḇamna.
51003009	Ma mko ḇeankaryae awer, snar mkobur snonkaku ḇekwar ani ma rari ḇyena kwar,
51003010	ma mkorer kwarbur snonkaku ḇekwar fnoḇek rari ḇeponiwara, ma mko ḇeḇefrur babo pdef ro ras ḇe ras farari fanir (Allah) ḇefrur mko kwar.
51003011	Roi ḇeradine isya wer ḇa snonkaku Yunani, roḇa snonkaku Yahudi, snonkaku ḇesofakfuk ma snonkaku ḇesofakfuk ḇa, snonkaku Barbar roḇa snonkaku Skit, women roḇa ḇemkei, ḇape Kristus monda ḇyeknam ro roi ḇeḇor nakam.
51003012	Eḇedari, mkomnis snonkaku Allah kyinfir ma fyasren ma iswar syadi, ma mkofasna ḇaḇesneso, snemura, ḇaḇerun sne, ḇaḇefafir ma ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ.
51003013	Mkokḇaḇyae mko ma mkoḇuk ampunyae rofyor snon oso ikram masasor faro min ḇyedi; imnis raris Manseren ipyos sasar mkoḇena kwar mko kako mkakfrur rarirya kada.
51003014	Ma ro roi ḇeḇor nane kam: mkona saswari, ḇekaḇrai ḇefesepen ḇaḇeoser ma ḇaḇemanasnisya.
51003015	Ma saswar-ḇaḇye Kristus ḇyedi ḇyepoik mkosnemna, snar i eḇedari mko ḇeḇeyor kwar famko ḇebaken oser. Inja mkokofen kasumasa.
51003016	Mboi Kristus wos ḇyena nakenem kuker nana ḇeḇor ḇyena kam rofandu mko, isof kuker fawawinanem ḇeḇor kam mkoḇuk farkarkor ma mkosonekyae mko ma mkodisen mazmur, ma sanandik ma dow rurya, ma mkokofen kasumasa ro mkosnemna faro Allah.
51003017	Ma roi ḇeḇor kam mkofrurna, mkofrurna kuker wawos ma fararur, mkofrur nakam kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus, ma mkokofen kasumasa snar Kristus faro Allah, Kma koḇedi.
51003018	Ne, bin ḇena swa, wasouser swambri imnis faro Manseren.
51003019	Ne, snon ḇena swa, waswar swambri ma bewayam awer i.
51003020	Ne, inai ma romawa mko, indo mkoḇeuser sna-kma mkoḇesi ro roi ḇeḇor kam, snar naiso ḇefrur marisen faro Manseren.
51003021	Ne, sna-kma mkoya, indo mkofrur sneduf awer faro inai ma romawa mkoḇesi, insa sisnesna nfafayaf awer.
51003022	Ne, manfamyan mkoya, mkoḇeuser kuker manseren mkoḇesi ro supswan ine ro roi ḇeḇor kam, mboi mkoḇeuser ro ḇarpon sena monda awer famkofrur sneprei si, mboi kuker sneḇenapes snar mkomkak faro Manseren.
51003023	Ma rosairyawer mkofrurna, mkofrur kuker sne ḇeryaḇ imnis faro Manseren mboi faro snonkaku ḇa.
51003024	Mkofawi, isoine ro Manseren nari mkosma rarwas sfasnaḇadir imnis sasuref. Kristus imnis tuan ma mko ḇemanfamyan ḇei.
51003025	Mansei ḇefrur sasar, nari ḇyar sasar ḇyena, snar ro Manseren kakara ḇyedi snonkaku simnis kame.
51004001	Ne, faro manseren mkoya, mkofrur mnis kuker napnapes faro manfamyan mkoḇesi ro sasuref sena; snar mkofawi mkona Manseren oso ro boiyaswa.
51004002	Mkofarmku ro nadi ma mkepen mko ma mkokofen kasumasa.
51004003	Ma mkonadiwarek aya kako, insa Allah ḇyas kedwai faro ḇaḇeḇaryas nkoḇena, isof nkawawos kankunes ro Kristus, ḇefnai fayasmai ro buiya.
51004004	Rarirya nari yafasnai, ḇararyas ani imnis moḇ ryaya.
51004005	Inja mkokenem kuker fawawi faro snonkaku ḇekyar ḇasya, ma mkofnak awer fafisuna.
51004006	Iḇye mkawawos kuker saswar, ma wos anna mbuar awer, isof mkofawi, rariso nari mkokarem faro snonkaku oser-oser.
51004007	Tikhikus, naek koḇedi koswar kaku ani, manfamyan ḇeḇeuser ma min ḇeyuffarmyan faro Manseren nari ikofenḇayir faro mko, ro roi ḇeḇor kam ḇekur ayana.
51004008	Yawan i faro mko kuker kakara insa mkofawi roi ḇekur nko ma insa ḇyuk sneprei faro mko.
51004009	Yawan i warpu Onesimus, naek koswar kaku ani ma ḇeḇeuser, snon oso rofandu mko. Nari sukofenḇayir faro mko ro roi ḇeḇor kam ḇero dinena.
51004010	Ma Aristarkus fyarem aroo faro mko, min ḇesmai fnoḇek aya ro bui ma Barnabas fno ḇyedi Markus mkosma ankinem kwar ro i; mkosrow i rofyor ryafa kwar faro mko.
51004011	Ma ro Yesus snirḇe Yustus. Snonkaku rikior skoine skerer skoi ḇesma sofakfuk skoi ḇeḇemin kuker aya ḇesma fararur oser ro Ḇaḇesasoser Allah; skoiso ḇeḇesneprei maro aya.
51004012	Epafras fyarem aroo faro mko; i snon oso rofandu mko, Yesus Kristus manfamyan ḇyedi, ḇeḇenadi ḇesyakwar faro mko, insa mkores nako, imnis snonkuf ma ḇekyar kaku roi ḇeḇor kam Allah imarisen na.
51004013	Mankundaya yaḇesaksi mboi ifararur sambraḇ kaku kwar faro mko ma naek srar ro Laodikia ma Hierapolis.
51004014	Lukas dokter (ḇefawinanem aryawin faro ḇedufsya) koswar kaku ma Demas sufarem aroo faro mko.
51004015	Mko kofenḇayir aroo nkoḇena faro naek srar ro Laodikia; ma faro Nimfa ma jemaat ḇero rum ḇyedi.
51004016	Ma rofafisu syap ine ḇyeḇewasya rofandu mko kwar, mkosewar fainsa ḇyeḇewasya faro jemaat Laodikia kako ma syap faro Laodikia kako ḇyeḇewasya faro mko.
51004017	Ma mko kofenḇayir faro Arkhipus: Mamwarek naḇye, insa afuffarmyan wasma ro Manseren ani wafrur mnisna.
51004018	Aya, Paulus, yafarem aroo faro mko. Aroo ine mankundaya iso ḇefas iya. Nari mkoswarepen wanka yena. Saswar-fakamaman ryowus mko kada. Ro nu, Paulus ma Timotius
52001001	Ro Paulus, Silwanus ma Timotius faro kawasa jemaat ro Tesalonika, kawasa ro Allah Kmaya ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus: Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇye ryowus mko kada.
52001002	Nkokofen kasumasa faro Allah ḇesyakwar snar nko kam ma nkap mko ronadi nkoḇena ḇesyakwar.
52001003	Snar nkoswarepen fararur kakyar mkoḇena ḇeaya kwar, fararur saswar mkoḇena ma ḇaḇesaneraro ḇedworen mkoḇena faro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ro ḇarpon Allah ma Kma koḇedi.
52001004	Ma nkofawi, ne, naek srar Allah iswar mkoya, mboi Allah kyinfir mko kwar.
52001005	Snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye nkoḇaryas ani nkoḇuki faro mko kuker wawos monda ḇa, ḇape kuker papoik ro Rur Ḇesrenya ma kuker kakyar ḇeko. Mboi mkofawi, rariso nkofararur rofandu mko snar mko.
52001006	Mboi fyasna ḇadir mkosouser nko ma mkoso Manseren kwar; ro ḇaḇewayam ḇemarḇak mkona wos ani kuker raryaḇ ḇeḇeknam ro Rur Ḇesrenya.
52001007	Isof mko ḇefasasna kwar faro kawasa ḇekyarsya kam ro supya mnuk Makedonia ma ro Akhaya.
52001008	Snar rofandu mko, Manseren wos ḇyedi ryok ḇeruran ro Makedonia ma Akhaya monda ḇa, ḇape ro moḇna kam kakyar mkoḇedi faro Allah, ḇyesno kwar, isof nari nkokofen roi oso ḇa.
52001009	Snar mankunsi sfarfyar ro nko, rariso mkosrow nko ma rariso mkokaḇerbur karwarsya faro Allah famkuffarmyan Allah ḇekenem ma ḇenapes,
52001010	ma insa mkowaf raramuma ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ro boiyaswa, ḇyefa ḇeyiḇer kwar rofandu ḇemarsya isoine Yesus, ḇefaspar kobur masasor nari ḇeramumaya.
52002001	Naek srar mankun mko kako mkofawi, raramufa nkoḇedi faro mko waworek ḇa.
52002002	Mboi kaku ḇeri nkorafa ḇaimya, mkofawi sewayam ma sonef nko ro Filipi kwar, ḇape kuker fafnoḇek ro Allah koḇedi, nkosma makaku fankoḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah faro mko ro fararur ḇemarḇak ine.
52002003	Snar ananun nkoḇena farkarkor ninyan naisya ḇa roḇaido kakara ḇekaku nairya ma sararer naisya ḇa kako.
52002004	Roḇa. Snar Allah kyara nkosyus ma ikyar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani faro nko, rarirya nkoḇaryas, fankofrur marisen snonkaku ḇa, mboi nkofrurfa Allah imarisen ma imnasen nkosnesna.
52002005	Snar fafisu oso ḇaim fankowos marnden -- roi ḇeradine mkofawi -- ma nkona kakara faḇrimankun ḇeyokef ḇa -- Allah ḇeḇesaksiya --
52002006	fafisu oso ḇaim nkosewar sanandik ro snonkaku, inja ro naek srar mko ma snonkaku ḇese kako. Kaku ḇeri nkofrur rarirya imnis Kristus manwawan ḇyesi, rarirya nari nkor roi ono ro mko.
52002007	Ḇape nkoḇeaḇaḇen mko, imnis sna oso fyarus ma fyaduru romawa ḇyedi.
52002008	Rarirya kako, nkoswar naba faro mko, inja nkomarisen nkoḇerwas Allah Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi monda faro mkoḇa, ḇape kankenem nkoḇena ḇardi kako kuker mko, snar nkoswar mko kwar.
52002009	Snar mkoswarepen kaker ḇaḇesewar ma kandera -- marmor nkoḇena kwar. Rofafisu nkofararur ro roḇ meser, insa nkofrur kandera faro oso ḇa kako rofandu mko, snar nkoḇaryas Allah Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi faro mko.
52002010	Mko ḇesaksi maro nko, rarirya kako Allah, nkokenem nasren, nkofrur mnis ma nkofarorew ḇa fankokenem rofandu mko ḇekyar faro Kristus kwar.
52002011	Mkofawi, nkomnis kma oso faro romawa ḇyesi, nkanun mko ma nkoḇuk sambraḇ faro mko oser ḇe oser kwar;
52002012	ma nkor kaku ḇeri, insa mkokenem namnis raris Allah marisen ḇyena, ḇeyor mko faro Ḇaḇesasoser ma baba ḇyedi.
52002013	Ma rarirya nkomnai ḇa ro nkokofen kasumasa faro Allah kako, snar mkona Allah wos ḇyedi nkoḇaryas kwar ani, imnis wos ro snonkaku ḇa, ḇape -- ma kaku ḇeri rarirya -- Allah wos ḇyedi, ḇefararur ro ḇekyar mkoya kako.
52002014	Naek srar ḇaḇewayam rosai mkosmana, jemaat-jemaat Allah ro Yudea ḇena Yesus Kristus saksma ḇaḇewayam anna kako kwar. Ḇaḇewayam mkosmana ro er mankun mkoḇansya, imnisbos kaku moḇ Allah jemaat ḇyena ro Yudea sisma ḇaḇewayam raya ro Yahudisya.
52002015	Mboi Yahudisya smun Manseren Yesus kwar ma nabisya ma sḇewayam nko ḇesya kwar. Allah rosai imarisenna sfandun naba mboi sḇembroḇ snonkakusya kam,
52002016	snar simarisen sidwarek nko insa nkobaryas awer wos ani faro er ḇese fasaksma koreri. Rarirya sifrur pdef ḇesya kwar sasar sena rawo nabor kaku inja baboine Allah masasor ḇyedi myun si kwar.
52002017	Ḇape naek srar rofafisu koḇesisyeya koḇinkwan ro mamamyae, ḇape kofanamyae ro kosnesna, nkoḇeḇare ḇeswar kaku ḇeri ma nkoḇesewar insa nkorakaki fankomam mko.
52002018	Snar nkokara kwar fankorakaki mko -- ma aya, Paulus, yafasos kwar isyadi ro rarwan oser, -- ḇape Ibirisya idwarek nko.
52002019	Kaku ḇeri mkoiso nkokyar ma nkoryaḇ kukerya. Snar nari rofyor Manseren Yesus ryama ma kosrow iya, nari mkoiso komsik kukerya.
52002020	Kaku ḇeri, mkoi eḇedar nkomsik ma nkoryaḇya.
52003001	Ḇarpurya nkofarmku wer ḇa, mboi nkokara iḇye syadi yerer yakain ro Atena.
52003002	Mboi nkowan Timotius, naek ḇefararur faro Allah fnoḇek ro ḇaḇeḇaryas Kristus Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi ryafa ḇyuk sambraḇ ḇemko ma danun mko ro kakyarya,
52003003	insa ono kakyar sena namarmer awer snar ḇaḇewayam anna. Mankun mkofawi, mboi sfasna ko faro ḇaḇewayam ḇera dinena kwar.
52003004	Snar, rofyor nkoisya fnoḇek mko, nkokofen faro mko kwar, nari kosma ḇaḇewayam. Ma mkofawi, ḇaḇewayam ḇeradine ndarirya kwar.
52003005	Eḇedari yafarmku wer ḇa, mboi yawan Timotius, insa yafawi rariso kakyar mkoḇena, snar yaḇeḇirḇar rofyor mkosma fafrowes ro Ibirisya kwar ma nari ḇaḇesewar nkoḇeja ḇyefromo.
52003006	Ḇape baboine, Timotius kyaḇerma kwar ma dun ḇaryas ḇefrur raryaḇ ro kakyar ma saswar mkoḇena, ma mkoḇe ḇare nko ḇesyakwar ma mkomarisen mkosrow nko, imnis nko kako nkomarisen nkosrow mko,
52003007	naek srar, nko kako, ro ḇaḇewayam ḇeḇor nkoḇena nkosma sneprei snar kakyar mkoḇena.
52003008	Baboine rofyor mkores faswef ro Manseren, imnis raris nkokenem kaḇer wer.
52003009	Snar kafkofen kasumasa rosai nari nkoḇuk faro Allah ro ḇaḇeraryaḇ ḇeḇor, nkosma ro mko, ro ḇarpon Allah koḇedi?
52003010	Ro roḇ meser nkonadi kaku ḇeri, insa kosrowyae ḇarpon kuker ḇarpon ma nkofamfon rosai ḇedawer kaker ro kakyar mkoḇena.
52003011	Allah, Kma koḇedi, ma Manseren koḇedi Yesus, ḇyuk nyan maro nko fankosrow mko kada.
52003012	Manseren ifrur famkoswar syadiyae mko ma mkoswar kawasa kam, imnis raris nko kako nkoswar mko.
52003013	Manseren ḇyuk sambraḇ faro mko kada, insa mkosren ma mkofarorew ḇa, ro ḇarpon Allah ma Kma koḇedi rofyor raramuma ro Manseren koḇedi, Yesus fnoḇek kawasa ḇyesya kam.
52004001	Ḇarpurya, naek srar, nkor ma nkanun mko ro Manseren Yesus: Mkorower ro nko kwar rariso mkokenem insa mkofrur Allah marisen ḇyedi. Roi ḇerarirya ani mkoso i kwar, ḇape kaku ḇeri mkofrur i kada.
52004002	Snar mkofawi kako fasasnai rosai nkoḇuk kwar faro mko ro snonsnon Yesus.
52004003	Snar Allah marisen ḇyedi isoine ido: Insa mkokenem kuker saranden, isoine mkofrur farḇuk awer,
52004004	inja mkono oser-oser dun bin oser faḇyeswa faro mankundi ḇardi insa ikenem kuker saranden ma ḇaḇesyowi,
52004005	mboi kuker rmomen baken nafsu ḇa, imnis fararur ro snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇasya,
52004006	ma insa roi ḇeradine kawasa sifrur awer roi ḇeḇyeḇa faro naek sesi roḇa seankar si. Snar Manseren nari myunsu roi nanekam, imnis nkokofen fasna faro mko ro ḇeponnya.
52004007	Allah dorko insa kofrur roi ḇemamas ḇa, mboi roi ḇesren.
52004008	Inja, mansei ḇesampum roi ḇeradine, isampum snonkaku ḇa, mboi isampum Allah ḇeḇuk Rur Ḇesren ḇyedi faro mko kako.
52004009	Ro saswar manbekanaek fandun faneḇefas faro mko ḇa, snar mankun mko mkofarkor kwar saswaryae ro Allah.
52004010	Roi ḇeradine mkofrurna kako faro naek mkoḇesi kam ro supya mnuk Makedonia ḇesiper. Ḇape nkanun mko, naek srar, insa mkofrur syadi kakuna wer.
52004011	Ma mkokarana imnis ḇaḇesyowi oso faro kankenem ḇeknon, famkokara roi ḇekur mankun mko ḇardi ma mkosewar nanan ro mankun mko, imnis nkanun kwar faro mko,
52004012	isof mkokenem raris snonkaku ḇeḇesyowi ro mamam snonkaku ḇese ma mkokasandem awer faro si.
52004013	Naek srar nkomarisen insa mkakfawi kaku roi ḇekur snonkaku ḇemar kwar ansi; insa mkoḇarop awer imnis snonkaku ḇese ḇena kakyar ḇasya.
52004014	Snar rofyor kokyar, mboi Yesus imar kwar ma ḇyeḇeḇawes wer, ma kokyar kako mboi ḇemar kwar ro Yesus nari Allah fyanjur si fasiwarpui.
52004015	Nkokofen radine faro mko kuker Manseren wos ḇyedi: ma ḇekenem kaker koya isof Manseren raramuma ḇyedi nari kopon ḇemar ansya ḇaḇeri.
52004016	Snar rofafisu ssḇuk aḇyair, isoine rofafisu mananir malaikatya kyaru ma Allah kḇur ḇyedi ryok, ma nari Manseren mankundi dado ro boiyaswa ma ḇemar ro Kristus nari sḇawes si ḇepon;
52004017	raimnai, ḇekenem kaker koya, nari koḇe ḇekanow fnoḇek si ḇemandep ro farsyos sansoren fakosrow Manseren. Rarirya nari kowarpu Manseren isof fyoro-fyoro.
52004018	Inja mkoḇuk snepreiyae faro mko kuker wos nane.
52005001	Ro awar ma fafisu fandun faneḇefas faro mko ḇa,
52005002	snar mankun mko ḇardi mkofawi kwar, mboi ras Manseren ryamumaya imnisbos kaku ḇekaraw ro roḇna.
52005003	Rofyor sikofen: Nakam neaski ma naknon -- ḇape fasaw kaku ḇaḇeraroya kyur si, imnis bin ḇemoḇesḇa oso iduf iḇedaḇen romawa ḇyedi.
52005004	Ḇape naek srar, mkokenem ro pampanya ḇa, isof ras ani ryama ifrur kanandor mko imnis ḇekaraw oso,
52005005	snar mko kam romawa ro sananai ma romawa ro meser. Koine snonkaku ro pampan roḇa snonkaku ro roḇ ḇa.
52005006	Rarirya kenef awer imnis kawasa ḇese, mboi koḇaḇir ma kowaren.
52005007	Snar ḇeyenefsya, senef ro fafisu roḇ ma ḇemsersya simser rofafisu roḇ.
52005008	Ḇape koine, kawasa ro meser, iḇyekada koḇaḇir, kona kakyar ma saswar imnis sansun mankarmomen ma kona saswoi mankarmomen kakyar faro koreri.
52005009	Snar Allah ḇyuk fakosma masasor ḇyedi ḇa, mboi kosma koreri snar Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi,
52005010	ḇemar kwar snar ko, insa kowarenke, roḇa kenefke, kokenem fnoḇek kuker Kristus.
52005011	Rarirya mkanunyae mko ma mkosonemyae mko, imnis moḇ mkofrur ro baboine raya.
52005012	Nkor faro naek srar, insa mkoḇesyowi ḇefararur sambraḇ rofandu mko, ḇefarkin ma ḇesonek mko snar Manseren;
52005013	ma insa kaku ḇeri mkoḇeuser si kuker saswar snar fararur sena. Mkokenemyae ḇesya kwar kuker aski.
52005014	Nkanun mko kako, naek srar, insa mkosonek ḇekenem kuker aunos ḇasya, mkawos sneprei faro ḇefafardunsya, mko ḇesanowarek ḇeryarḇasya, mkokḇaḇ faro snonkakusya kam.
52005015	Mkoswarepen naḇye, insa snonkaku ono smunsu ḇarḇor kuker ḇarḇor awer, ḇape mkoḇesewar ḇesya kwar roi ḇeḇye, faro mko oser-oser ma faro snonkaku kam.
52005016	Mkorayaḇ ḇesya kwar.
52005017	Mkoḇenadi faswef.
52005018	Mkokofen kasumasa ro roi ḇeḇor kam, snar Allah marisen ḇyedi faro mko ro Yesus Kristus.
52005019	Mkofasye awer Rurya.
52005020	Ma mkomamkyof awer ḇardadi Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyukna.
52005021	Mkomnasen roi ḇeḇor kam ma mkona ḇeḇyena.
52005022	Ma mkoḇinkwanbur ḇarḇor syoso-syoso kam kada.
52005023	Allah saswar-ḇaḇye ḇyedi fyasren mko kam kada mboi rur kenem fnoḇek baken mkoḇena, neḇefaduru mnis kuker farorewḇa faro raramuma ro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
52005024	Allah i ḇeyor mko kwar ima ikaḇaḇaḇ, i kako nari ḇyefanamnis.
52005025	Naek srar mkonadiwarek nko kada.
52005026	Mkokofen aroo nkoḇenane faro naeksya kam ḇena kakyar oser.
52005027	Kuker snonsnon ro Manseren yor kaku ḇeri insa mkowasya syap ine faro naeksya kam.
52005028	Saswar-fakamaman ro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi, ryowus mko kam kada! Ro nko, Paulus, Silas ma Timotius
53001001	Ro Paulus, Silwanus ma Timotius, faro kawasa jemaat Tesalonika ro Allah Kma koḇedi ma Manseren Yesus Kristus.
53001002	Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇenaḇye ro Allah, Kma koḇedi, ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryowus mko kada.
53001003	Naek srar, ro ras nakam nkokofen kasumasa faro Allah snar mko. Ma nkofrur rarirya, snar kakyar mkoḇena nfamfon syadi ma saswaryae mkoḇena nsambraḇ syadi rofandu mko,
53001004	isof ro Allah jemaat ḇyena mankun nkomsik snar mko snar ḇaḇefarmku mkoḇena ma kakyar mkoḇena ro kandera ma wayam ḇeḇor mkosmana:
53001005	fasasna oso ro napnapes ro Allah ḇaḇemankara ḇyedi, ḇekofen mboi mkosyus famkosun ro Allah Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, snar rofafisu ine mkoḇekandera kuker Ḇaḇesasoser ani.
53001006	Snar ḇeḇenapnapes Allah nari myunsu ḇaḇewayam mkoḇena faro ḇeḇewayam mkosya.
53001007	Ma ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro sewayam mkoya, ma faro nko kako, rofafisu Manseren Yesus Kristus fyasna mankundi fnoḇek malaikat ḇyesi ro boiyaswa kuker papoik ḇyedi,
53001008	rofor ḇesak-ḇesber ma myunsu faro si ḇefawi Allah ḇasya ma ḇeḇeuser Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Yesus, Manseren koḇedi ḇa.
53001009	Sikada nari sisma samamyai raro fyoro-fyoroya, sḇinkwanbur Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ma ro papoik samambraḇ ḇyedi,
53001010	rofyor ryama ro ras ani kawasa ḇesren ḇyesya nari sisandik baba ḇyedi ma snonkaku ḇekyarsya sikandori, snar ḇaḇesaksi nkun faro mkona mkokyarna kwar.
53001011	Rarirya nkoḇenadiwarek mko ḇesyakwar kako, insa Allah koḇedi kyara mkosyus faro fararyor ḇyedi ma kuker samambraḇ ḇyedi ifrur mnis marisen mkoḇena famkofrur roi ḇeḇye ma ḇyeimnis fararur kakyar ḇeḇor mkoḇena kam,
53001012	isof snonsnon Yesus, Manseren koḇedi, isma baba snar mko ma mkosma baba snar i, imnis Allah koḇedi saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi ma Manseren Yesus Kristus.
53002001	Ro raramuma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ma raryur koḇedi kuker Yesus Kristus nkor faro mko naek srar,
53002002	insa mkokmom ma mkoḇeḇirḇar fasaw awer, roi ḇekur fasasna rurya, ma kako ro ḇaḇeḇararyasya roḇa sikofen ro syap nkoḇeja, ma wos ḇeyoḇo Manseren ras ḇyedi ryama kwar.
53002003	Rariso wer kako, imbude snonkakusya sḇeankar mkori. Snar ras ani ryama ḇaimya roi ḇeradinena ndama ḇepon resari: Ma sfasna ḇepon snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya fa nari simar,
53002004	isoine mbroḇ ḇekanow mankunsi syadi ro roi ḇeḇor kam sapḇe roba sisyom imnis Allah. Ma kyain ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ma imarisen fyasna mankundiḇe Allah.
53002005	Mkoswarepen ḇake roi ḇeradinena yakofenna ḇesyakwar faro mko, rofafisu aya isya yarowus mko?
53002006	Ma baboine mkofawi rosai ḇeḇriwareki, isof nari insape fyasna mankundi rofafisu sfasna faro iya.
53002007	Snar kuker kankunes ḇarḇorya irandak ifararur kwar, ḇape baboine oso isya idwarek. Rofyor ḇedwarek ani sḇeifa ikren kwar,
53002008	rofyor ani ḇeḇarḇor ani nari fyasna mankundi, ḇape Manseren Yesus nari myuni kuker sḇayo ḇyedi faimar, rofyor Manseren Yesus kyaḇer muma werya.
53002009	Raramuma ro ḇeḇarḇor ani ikada fararur ro Ibirisya, ma nari ifrur ḇaḇekanandor nabor, aḇyair-aḇyair ma aḇyair kanandor ḇekaku ḇa.
53002010	Ma nari ifrur ankarsararer ḇeḇor faḇyukḇeninyan snonkaku rawo isof nari simar, ma simar snar simewer siswar ḇaḇenapnapes ḇeḇuk koreri faro siya.
53002011	Eḇedari Allah ḇyuk papoik oso fadun siḇe nyan ḇeḇor, isof sikyar faro roi ḇeḇeankarkar.
53002012	Ḇarpurya snonkaku ḇemarisen ḇaḇeḇarḇorya ma simewer sikyar faro ḇaḇenapnapesya nari sisma samamyai.
53002013	Ma nari nkokofen kasumasa ḇesyakwar faro Allah snar mko, naek srar, Manseren iswar kaku, snar ro randakya Allah kyinfir mko kwar famkosma koreri kuker Rur ḇefasren mko ma ro napnapes mkokyar ani.
53002014	Eḇedari dor mko kwar kuker Ankankinem Ḇeḇye nkoḇaryas ani, insa mkaksma ḇaḇebaba ro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
53002015	Inja mkores nako ma mkufepen farkarkor mkosma ro nko kwar, ma kuker wos roḇa wer kuker fas-fas.
53002016	Ma Allah, Kma koḇedi, kuker Manseren Yesus Kristus, saswar-fakamaman ḇyena iswar ko kwar ma ḇyuk ḇeko sneprei ḇekain fyoro ma saneraro ḇeḇye maḇeko,
53002017	ma nbuk sneprei ma samambraḇ faro mko ro fararur mkoḇena kada, fnoḇek awawos ḇeḇye ro kakyarya.
53003001	Inja, naek srar, mko ḇenadiwarek nko, insa Manseren wos ḇyedi irwuren ma imbran kuker payamyum rofandu mko.
53003002	Ma insa nkosma faspar ro ḇefrur fafardun ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, snar snonkakusya saksma kakyar kam ḇa.
53003003	Manseren ikada i kaḇaḇaḇ. Nari ḇyuk samambraḇ ma i ḇriwarek mko ro ḇeḇarḇorsya.
53003004	Ma nkokyar faro Manseren, mboi rosai nkanun faro mko kwar, nari mkofrur pdefna.
53003005	Ma Manseren ikfin mko faswef rarirya ḇesyakwar faro Allah saswar ḇyedi kada, isof Kristus kananon ḇyedi.
53003006	Ḇape nkanun faro mko, naek srar, kuker snonsnon Manseren Yesus Kristus, insa mkoḇinkwanbur naek ono ḇefrur fararur sena ḇa ma ḇeḇeuser farkarkor mkosma kwar ro nko anna ḇa.
53003007	Snar mankun mkofawi, rariso nari mkoso kankenem nkoḇena. Rofyor nkoisya rofandu mko nkofararur myaren kaku.
53003008	Ma nkan snonkakusya roḇeyan sena waworek ḇa, mboi nkoḇesewar rawo nkardomes ro roḇ meser, insa nkofrur kandera awer oso ro mko.
53003009	Nkosma hak fankor fafnoḇek faro naek srar kako, ḇape nkor ḇa, snar nkomarisen nkoḇe fasasna faro mko, insa mkoso fasasna ani.
53003010	Snar, rofyor nkoisya rofandu mko kako, nkoḇuk swarapepen ine faro mko kwar: Rofyor snonkaku oso imewer ifararur, dakanan awer.
53003011	Nkokofen radine snar nkomnaf, mboi ono sisya sikenem kuker aunosḇa ma sifararur ḇa, mboi ssombirek kuker roi ḇeḇefandun ḇa,
53003012	snonkaku ḇerariryasya nkoḇuk swarepen ma anun kuker Manseren Yesus Kristus, insa siknon ma sifrur faswef fararur sena ma rarirya nari sanan ro mankunsi.
53003013	Ma mko, naek srar, mko papum fasaw awer mkofrur fararur ḇeḇye.
53003014	Rofyor snonkaku ono simewer simnaf rosai nkokofen ro syap ine, mko kakop si (mko fasepen si) ma mkokenem awer kuker si, insa simai,
53003015	mboi mkokara si ḇembroḇ awer, ḇape mkosonek si imnis naek mkoḇesirya.
53003016	Manseren ḇeḇeknam aski-fakamaman, ani ḇyuk aski-fakamaman ḇyedi ro roi ḇeḇor kam, faro mko kada. Manseren ryowus mko kam kada.
53003017	Aroo ro aya, Paulus. Aroo ine mankundaya yafas ḇardi. Ine aḇyair ro syap ḇeḇor ayena.
53003018	Ma saswar fnoḇek fakamaman ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, ryowus mko kam kada! Ro nko, Paulus, Silas ma Timotius
54001001	Ro Paulus, manwawan Yesus Kristus ḇeso Allah sasoser ḇyedi, ḇeḇe Manfaspar ḇeko, snar kakyar koḇedi,
54001002	faro Timotius, romawa karyer ayedi snar wakyar faro Kristus: saswar-fakamaman, ma aski-ḇaḇenaḇye ro Allah Kmaya ma Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi, ryous aw kada!
54001003	Rofyor yaḇe yambran pdef mararan ayedi ḇesupya mnuk Makedonia, yanun aw insa kwain ro Efesus ma buk farkarkor faro snonkaku ono ḇardi, insa ssḇuk farkarkor eḇese awer
54001004	roḇaido ssombirek kuker farfyar kakais ma ḇaḇeḇarpur ḇemnaiḇa, ḇeḇawes rakrakrok monda, mboi sisoḇa kankenem awnos ma ḇaḇeaski Allah ḇyukya snar kakyarya.
54001005	Knam ro ananun ani isoine saswar ḇeyek ro sne ḇesren, ro sneuser ḇesren kaku ma ro kakyar ḇenapes kakuya.
54001006	Ḇape snonkaku ono sisya srarpon ro knam aniḇa mboi sikmom ro wawos ḇeḇefromo monda.
54001007	Simarisen sḇeguru fasḇuk farkarkor ro sasoser Refo Yahudi ḇape sifawi mankunsi wos sikofen naba ma knam siḇe ssḇuki fyarkarkor naba.
54001008	Kofawi mboi sasoser Refo Yahudi ani iḇye rofyor koḇeuser i,
54001009	isoine kuker fawawi mboi sasoser Refo Yahudi ani faro snonkaku ḇenapesya ḇa, mboi faro snonkaku ḇefrur arubiru ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, faro manankarkar ma snonkaku ḇesasar, faro snonkaku ḇefrur marisen supswan ma ḇena agama ḇasya, faro ḇemun sna ma kma sesi, faro ḇemamun ḇesyakwarsya,
54001010	faro snonkaku ḇefrur farḇuk ma snon ḇefarḇuk kuker snon, faro ḇefor snonkaku faḇeḇoḇ, faro manankarkar, faro mananfafores ma roi ḇemnisḇa nabor kaker ḇesampum farkarkor ḇenapesya
54001011	ḇeḇeknam ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah ḇeba ma ḇesma sanandik, imnis sikyar kwar faro aya.
54001012	Yakofen kasumasa faro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇani, ḇeḇuk sambraḇ ḇeaya ma snar kyara aya ḇeḇeuser ma ikyar afuffarmyan ine maḇeaya --
54001013	Ḇeponya yonef ma yaḇewayam kuker yakoryae ma yamsor Yesus Kristus, ḇape Allah iswar aya, snar yafrur nakam kuker fawawiḇa snar rofyor ani yakyar ḇaim.
54001014	Ḇape saswar-fakamaman ro Manseren koḇani ḇyuk kwar maro aya kakyar ma saswar snar Yesus Kristus.
54001015	Wos nane nkaku inja konakasiperna: "Yesus Kristus ryafes ḇesupswan ine insa ḇyuk koreri faro snonkaku ḇesasarsya," ma rofandu si ayaiso ḇesasar syadiya.
54001016	Ḇape rariryano Allah iswar aya, insa aya ḇardi imnis snon ḇesasar syadi, Yesus Kristus fyasna kaḇaḇaḇ ḇyena kam maro aya. Snar rarirya yaḇefasasna faro snonkaku ḇekyar papur faro isya insa sisma kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
54001017	Syowi ma sanandik faro Allah isof fyoro-fyoro, Wairek ro awar nakam, snar i ḇekain fyoro, ḇyeoser ma komami ḇa! Amin.
54001018	Timotius romawa yedi, yaḇuk fararur ine faro aw, imnis rosai ḇeḇardi kwar faḇekur aw, insa ḇardadi ani ḇyuk samambraḇ faro aw fawafararur kuker fararur ḇeḇye kuker kakyar ma sneuser ḇekaku.
54001019	Snonkaku ono sisampum sneuser ḇesren ani eḇedari kakyar sena ndo,
54001020	rofandu si Himeneus ma Aleksander, yaḇuk kwar faro Ibiris, insa sumnai ro anonef suḇena.
54002001	Ananun yaḇuk ḇepon kaku: Insa mkoḇenadi, mkofararyor fafnoḇek ma mkokofen kasumasa faro Allah snar snonkakusya kam,
54002002	ma faro waireksya ma faro ḇebararasya kam, insa kokenem kuker kananon ma aski, ro kakyar ma ḇaḇesyowi faro Allah.
54002003	Naiso ḇeḇyena ma ḇefrur marisen faro Allah, Manfaspar koḇedi,
54002004	ḇemarisen insa snonkakusya kam sisma koreri ma sifawi ro ḇaḇenapnapesya.
54002005	Snar Allah ḇyeoser ma i ḇeḇemanfandu rofandu Allah ma snonkaku, ḇyeoser kako, isoine snonkaku Yesus Kristus,
54002006	Yesus Kristus ḇyuk mankundi kwar imnis sasuref warek sasar ro snonkakusya kam: iso ḇeḇesaksi rofafisu ḇemnis kwar.
54002007	Faro ḇaḇesaksi ani yaḇe ḇekinfir kwar imnis manbaryas ma manwawan -- roi yakofen nane kam, yasrer ḇa -- ma yamnis ḇeḇuk farkarkor faro ḇeḇe-Yahudibasya, ro kakyar ma ḇaḇenapnapesya.
54002008	Eḇedari yamarisen, insa ro moḇna kam snonsya sḇenadi kuker sne ḇesren, kuker masasor ma sasurem ḇa.
54002009	Rarirya kako binsya. Bin ansi sḇemaris faḇaḇye si mboi kuker syowi, ma snonburyam sena nbekapyai -- kapyai awer, semaris awer si kuker karamas brawen roḇa mustika roḇa kako sansun ḇekakur,
54002010	ḇape ḇyemaris i kuker fararur ḇeḇye, imnis bin ḇesyus faro ḇaḇeariya.
54002011	Iḇyesyadi binsya sḇefasis ro ḇinkunsi ma sisma farkarkor kaku ḇeri ma srun ḇinkunsi.
54002012	Yaḇuk kaku ro binsya ḇa fasakḇuk farkarkor oroḇa kako yaḇuk kaku ḇa fasawawos syadi snonsya; iḇye sefasis ro ḇinkunsi.
54002013	Snar Adam i sifrur ḇeponya, raimnai insape Hawa.
54002014	Ma Adam i ḇesma fafrowesya ḇa mboi bin ani iso ḇesma fafrowes ma ḇesapi ro sasar.
54002015	Rariryano, bin ani nari isma koreri snar aḇaḇen romawa, rofyor ḇyeuser kuker kakyar ma saswar ma ḇaḇesaranden ma ikenem faro Allah.
54003001	Kaku ḇeri ro wos ine: "Snonkaku ḇemarisen nasan manfarkin ro jemaat imarisen snar fararur ine iḇye kaku."
54003002	Eḇedari manfarkin ro jemaat iḇye snonkaku ḇefarorewḇa, snon ḇefakawin kuker bin oser, imkuser mankundi, ifawi nanem, ikenem kuker aunos, imarisen nya dakam, ifawi ḇyuk farkarkor,
54003003	fyarandinem ḇa, ḇemasasor ḇa mboi ḇefafir, ḇewos sneprei, ḇermomen pipi ḇa,
54003004	ifawi fyaduru kina ḇyesi kuker ḇaḇye, ma ḇyuk farkarkor faro romawa ḇyesi fasikenem kuker aunos ma sesyowi mankundi.
54003005	Snar rofyor snon oso ifawi fyaduru kina mankundi ḇyesi ḇa, rariso nari fyaduru Allah jemaat ḇyena?
54003006	Manfarkin ani snonkaku ḇeḇe-Kristen babo awer, insa imarares awer i, imbude isma fras imnis Ibiris ro ḇeponiwara.
54003007	Snonkaku ḇesma snonsnon ḇeḇye rofandu kawasa, insa sonef awer i ma isapi awer ro Ibirisya denem ḇyedi.
54003008	Rarirya kako (syamas) ḇefnoḇek ro jemaat iḇye snonkaku ḇesma syowi, mboi snonkaku ḇeḇeramar kasipḇa, snonkaku ḇefarandinem ḇa, snonkaku ḇermomen pipi ḇa,
54003009	mboi snonkaku ḇekram kankunes kakyar ro sneuser ḇesren.
54003010	Iḇye seḇemnasen ḇepon resari, rawo sfarorewḇa, insape sifnoḇek ro jemaat.
54003011	Rarirya kako swa sesi bin ḇeḇesyowi, bin ḇeyawos anonef ḇa, iḇye fyarmkuser ḇinkundi ma ḇyeḇekyar ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
54003012	Syamas (ḇefnoḇek ro jemaat) fyakawin bin oser ma fyaduru romawa ḇyesi ma kina ḇyena kuker ḇaḇye.
54003013	Snar snonkaku ḇeyuffarmyan ro jemaat nari isma syowi ma nari imku ro ḇaḇesaksi kakyar sena faro Yesus Kristus.
54003014	Yakyar nari yarakaki aw fasaw, rariryano yafas roi ḇeḇor nane faro aw.
54003015	Inja, rofyor yasaryar ido, wafawi kwar rariso snonkaku sikenem imnis Allah kina ḇyesi, isoine jemaat ro Allah ḇekenem, adir kakyar ma knam napnapes.
54003016	Ma kaku ḇeri kankunes ḇaḇeari koḇedi iba kaku: "Fyasna mankundi kwar ro ḇaḇesnonkakuya, Rurya fyasna irya kaku; ḇefasna mankundi faro malaikatsya. Ḇyeḇeḇaryas rofandu er-er ḇemamḇaḇir Allah ḇasya; ḇyeḇekyar ro supswan ḇesiper, ma ḇyeḇekanow ḇeboiyaswa."
54004001	Ḇape Rurya ikofenbos mboi rofafisu ḇarpurya, nari snonkaku ono nari sfamyunepen Allah raimnai siso rodur ḇeḇeninyan ma farkarkor ro Ibiris
54004002	ma kuker farawrowes ro ḇesararersya snar sneuser sena npanpan.
54004003	Sikada sidwarek snonkaku sfakawin awer, sidwarek snonkaku san awer Allah roḇean ifrurna, insa roḇean anna nbeḇeyan kuker kafkofen kasumasa faro Allah, ro snonkaku ḇekyar faro Kristus ma ḇemamḇaḇir kwar Allah ḇaḇenapnapes ḇyedi.
54004004	Snar Allah roi ifrur anna kam naḇye ma osoḇaḇeri faḇyeḇean farfor, rofyor neḇean kuker nadi kafkofen kasumasa faro Allah,
54004005	snar nakam neḇefasren kuker nadi ma Allah wos ḇyedi.
54004006	Ma buk swarepen ḇesyakwar ro roi ḇeḇor anna kam faro naek srar koḇansi, nari wamnis snonkaku ḇeḇye oso ḇeyuffarmyan Yesus Kristus, farkor mankundaw ro knam kakyar koḇedi ma farkarkor ḇekaku waso fyoro kwar ani.
54004007	Waso awer kakyar famfnom ma farfyar kakais ḇeḇefainda ḇa.
54004008	Fari faro baken ḇyefandun mankenem ba, ḇape ḇaḇeari ani ḇyefandun ro roi ḇeḇor kam, snar naisya kuker asas, iḇye faro kankenem ine ma faro kankenem nari ḇeramaya kako.
54004009	Kaku ḇeri wos ine ma kona kakui.
54004010	Eḇedari kofaḇri isof kardomes, snar kona kakyar faro Allah ḇekenem, Ḇeḇuk koreri faro snonkaku kam, isyadi faro ḇekyarsya.
54004011	Baryas ma buk farkarkor ro roi anna kam.
54004012	Snar besnonkbor kaker, imbude snonkaku ono skara ma srun awri. Mankundaw fasna faro kawasa ḇekyarsya, ro wawos bena, ro rari bena, ro saswar bena, ro ḇaḇesyowi bena ma ro saranden bena.
54004013	Rofafisu ine, isof nari yarafa, wawasya kaku ḇeri Refo faro si wadif si ma buk farkarkor faro si.
54004014	Waswarepen naḇye insa wafrur raris fakamaman wasma kwar ro Allah Rur ḇyedi, rofyor manfarkin jemaatsya sisawar dofen aw ma nabisya ssḇuk kwar faro mankundaw ro ananun Allah.
54004015	Waswarepen roi nane kam, wafrurna insa marandan bedi isnai faro kawasa kam.
54004016	Wepen mankundaw ma wepen farkarkor bena. Beasuser roi ḇeḇor kam, snar wafrur rarirya ido nari mankundaw ma kawasa ḇerowersya mkosma aski kam.
54005001	Wamsor awer mansarsya, mboi wasonek si imnis kma oso faro aw. Wasonek snonkborsya imnis naek besi,
54005002	ḇinsarsya imnis sna faro aw ma dojarusya imnis srar besi kuker saranden.
54005003	Besyowi faro ḇeḇekabom kakusya.
54005004	Ḇape rofyor kabom oso nya romawa roḇa kpu ono, iḇye simor faro kina mankunsi sena ma smunsu syowi kma ma kpu sesi, snar naiso ḇefrur marisen faro Allah.
54005005	Mboi kabom oso ḇeḇekabom kaku, ḇeyerer ro ḇinkundi, ḇerir kakyar ḇyedi faro Allah ma fyarmku ro nadi ma fararyor ro roḇ ma meser.
54005006	Ḇape kabom oso ḇekenem kuker maris ikada imar kwar rofyor isya ikenem kaker.
54005007	Buk swarepen roi ḇeradine kako faro kabom ansi insa sikenem kuker farorew ḇa.
54005008	Ḇape rofyor snon oso fyaduru kawasa ro keret ḇyedi ḇa, isyadi wer kina mankundi ḇyesi, snon ani iḇyeḇa syadi ro snonkaku ḇekyar ḇasya.
54005009	Sfasepen ḇe ḇekabomsya, isoine ḇeḇewampasi wambarek samfur riwonem kwar, ma sfakawin ḇeoser monda
54005010	ma sfasna ḇair sifrur fararur ḇeḇye, imnis sfaduru romawa, ssḇuk sim ḇeḇeryar faro dakam, suffarmyan snonkaku ḇena kakyar oser, ma sifnoḇek snonkaku ḇeyananjarsya --rarirya sifrur kaku ḇeri fararur ḇeḇyena.
54005011	Mkofasepen awer kabom ḇeḇebinkufsya. Snar rofyor nafsu sedi faro sfakawin wer, nafsu ani fyaspar sibur Kristus.
54005012	Inja sikada sor samamyai faro ḇinkunsi, snar sḇerer asas ssḇuk faro Kristus.
54005013	Osower syun-swaye ro ono ḇese rum sena, indo simyaren ḇa ma simyaren ḇaya derer mondaḇaḇoi sḇeḇindaw ma spambarḇar snonkaku ḇese wawos sena ma sikofen roi ḇenapes ḇa.
54005014	Eḇedari yamarisen fakabom ḇeḇebinkufsya sfakawin wer, insa sna romawa, ma sfaduru kina sena ma ssḇuk moḇ fambroḇ koḇesi sifrur fanor kosnosna awer.
54005015	Snar kabom ono sibor siso Ibiris kwar.
54005016	Rofyor snon roḇa bin ḇekyar ono kina sena kabom ono sisya, iḇye ifnoḇek si mboi sekamnam faro jemaat awer. Rarirya jemaat ifnoḇek monda kabom ḇena kina ḇasya.
54005017	Penetuasya manfarkin ḇefararur mnis ro jemaat, indo sisma syowi rarwan risuru, isyadi faro ḇeḇesewar kuker ardomes faḇefaya ma ḇeḇuk farkarkorsya.
54005018	Snar sfas ro Refo radine: "Swower sapiya sḇadon ḇyedi kuker pisan awer rofyor imas fasibu famorsya siḇesebur smarya," ma "Snon ḇefararur oso nari isma sasuref ḇyedi."
54005019	Safsof ro penetua oso wamnafi rofyor snon risuru roḇa kior sḇesaksi.
54005020	Snonkaku ḇefrur sasarsya sḇeḇesonek ro fababa ro ḇarpon jemaat insa eḇesesya simkak.
54005021	Ro ḇarpon Allah, Yesus Kristus ma malaikat skinfirsya yanun kaku ḇeri faro aw: insa waswarepen ananun ine kuker warkaki ḇa ma wafrur roi ḇeḇor kam mboi wafnoḇek awer ono.
54005022	Wasawsaw awer wasawardofen snonkaku oso ma wasaso awer sasar ro snonkaku ḇese. Swasor saranden mankundaw bedi.
54005023	Winem monda war awer, mboi winem anggur kenmkun ono kako imnis aryawin faro snewar, snar indo wadafdufrya.
54005024	Snonkaku ono sasar sena indo nfababa, rofyor sun na ḇeḇaḇemankara ḇaimya, ḇape ono sasar sena insape nasnai ro ḇarpurya.
54005025	Rarirya kako fararur ḇeḇyena indo nasnai fasaw ma rofyor rarirya ḇaido, nari nayokef ḇa.
54006001	Kawasa Kristen ḇeḇewomensya skara tuan sesi sisyus fasisma syowi ḇeḇor kam, insa Allah snonsnon ḇyedi ma farkarkor koḇena nḇeḇeyonef awer.
54006002	(2a) Rofyor tuan sesi snonkaku ḇeḇe-Kristen sirya, imbude soḇo semanbekanaek ro Kristus inja suffarmyan mnis siḇari, snar tuan ḇesma ḇok ro afuffarmyan ḇeḇye syadi wer, ikada naek ḇekyar ma koswar kaku. (2b) Buk farkarkor ma wanun roi nane kam.
54006003	Rofyor oso ḇyuk farkarkor eḇese ḇemnis ḇa kuker farkarkor ḇenapes ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus -- ma iso farkarkor ḇemnis kuker ḇaḇeari koḇena ḇa,
54006004	snonkaku ani imarares ḇo doḇo ifawi ḇape ifawi royoḇaḇeri. Dafduf ḇyedi isoine imarisen fyamfaḇri kuker wawos, ḇefrur masasor, anunḇesisye, anonef, warkaki ḇeḇyeḇa,
54006005	ma anunḇesisye rofandu kawasa ḇekara mnisḇa ma ḇaḇenapnapes ḇa, skara ḇaḇeari ani sun oso ḇeḇuk ḇaḇefainda.
54006006	Kakuḇaḇoi ḇaḇeari ani rofyor kofrur mnis i, ḇyuk fainda ḇeba.
54006007	Snar kun roi oso ḇesupswan ineḇa rarirya kako nari kun roi oso ḇokosasyarbur supswan ineḇa.
54006008	Rofyor roḇean ma sansun naisya, namnis kwar.
54006009	Ḇape mansei ḇemarisen ḇenana nari isapi ro fafrowes, ro denem ma ro nafsu ḇeḇor ḇeḇebei ma ḇeyun raro. Nafsu anna nafrur fasnonkakusya sfarmambriwer ma sro.
54006010	Snar ḇarḇor ḇeḇor nakam nerares ro mkaba pipiya. Snar sasewar pipi eḇedari snonkaku ono ssunkirbur kakyar sena ma sewayam mankunsi kuker ḇarop nabor.
54006011	Ḇape, aw, ne, Allah snonkaku ḇyedi, nari rwoḇandibur roi ḇeḇor nane kam, mboi swewar ḇaḇenapnapesya, ḇaḇeariya, ḇaḇefarmkuya, saswarya, ḇaḇekaḇabaḇya ma ḇaḇefafafirya.
54006012	Faḇri kada ro famfaḇri kakyar ḇenapesya insa nwa kankenem ḇekain fyoroya. Iso eḇedari beḇeyor kwar ma kwarem kwar kankarem ḇenapes ro ḇarpon saksi ḇeḇor.
54006013	Ma ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇeḇuk kankenem faro roi ḇeḇor kam ma ro Yesus Kristus ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇekarem kankarem ḇenapes ani kako ro Pontius Pilatus ḇarpon ḇyedi yaḇaryas faro mko:
54006014	Mkoḇeuser sasoser nanekam, ma mkoḇeuk awerna, isof rofafisu Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ifyaferya,
54006015	isoine fafisu Allah nari fyasnaya ma fafisu ani ifo kuker aski, Wairek robo waireksya kam ma Tuan robo tuansya kam.
54006016	Demir monda kyunem faro marmari ḇa, ḇekain ro isnai nari kofanam ba. Snonkaku osero ḇaim famyam i ma kaku ḇeri snonkakuyo nari myam i ḇa. Faroi syowi ma papoik isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin.
54006017	Buk swarepen faro ḇenanasya ro supswan ine insa simarares awer si ma sikyar awer roi nari ḇero imnis nana, mboi sikyar faro Allah ro nana ḇyena ḇyukma ḇeko ro roi ḇeḇor fakona na.
54006018	Buk swarepen faro si insa sifrur roi ḇeḇye, snana ro ḇaḇenapnapesya, simarisen ssḇuk ma sirarwas
54006019	ma rarirya sfanjur arasa ono imnis knam ḇeḇye faro mankunsi rofafisu nari ḇeramaya insa sisma kankenem ḇekakuya.
54006020	Ne, Timotius, faduru rosai yakofen kwar faro aw. Binkwanbur wawos ḇeḇebei ma ḇemamas ma ḇesren ḇa ma famfaḇri ḇaḇeknam ro rosai sap ḇefawawi,
54006021	snar snonkaku ono sisya ssḇuk farkarkor rona ma rarirya ssayebur kakyarya. Saswar-fakamaman ndous mko kam kada! Ro aya, Paulus
55001001	Ro Paulus, manwawan Yesus Kristus snar Allah marisen ḇyedi yaḇaryas asas ro kankenem kuker Yesus Kristus,
55001002	faro Timotius, romawa karyer ayedi: saswar-fakamaman, ḇaḇye ma aski ro Allah Kmaya ma Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi, ryous aw kada.
55001003	Yakofen kasumasa faro Allah, yuffarmyan kuker sneuser ḇesren imnis raris up ayesi sifrur kwar. Ma yaswarepen aw ḇesyakwar ro fararyor yena, ro roḇ ma meser.
55001004	Ma rofyor yaswarepen mkaru ḇena, yamarisen fayasrow aw wer kuker marisen.
55001005	Snar yaswarepen kakyar ḇesrendam bedi, isoine kakyar ḇekenem randak ro kpumi Lois ma ro snami Eunike ma yakyar naisya ro mankundaw kako.
55001006	Eḇedari yaḇuk swarepen faro aw rofyor yasawardofen aw fabaryas fakamaman Allah ḇero awya.
55001007	Snar Allah ḇyuk rur ḇemakakak maro koḇa, mboi rur ḇeḇawes samambraḇ, saswar ma ḇaḇeawnos.
55001008	Inja wamsik ma besaksi Manseren koḇedi ma wamsik kako snar aya, snon ḇesmai ro bui snar Yesus Kristus, mboi wakḇe kandera faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyedi kuker Allah samambraḇ ḇyedi.
55001009	Allah iso ḇeḇuk koreri ḇeko ma ḇeyor ko kuker fararyor ḇesren, ḇeḇeknam ro fararur koḇena ḇa, mboi ḇyeknam ro kakara ma saswar-fakamaman mankundi ḇyena, ḇeḇuk ḇeko kwar ro Yesus Kristus ro awarmadero ḇaimya.
55001010	Ma baboine ḇyeḇefasna snar rarama Yesus Kristus ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko, ro papoik marmari kwar ma ḇeyun kankenem ḇekain fyoroya.
55001011	Snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine yaḇe ḇefasna imnis manbaryas, imnis manwawan ma imnis guru.
55001012	Eḇedari yasma kandera kukerna kam, ḇape yamai ḇa; snar yafawi manseiso yakyarya ma yakyar nari ipok fyaduru rosai ikyar kwar maḇeaya isof ro Ras Ḇepupesya.
55001013	Waserepen roi ḇeḇor wamnaf kwar ro aya imnis fasasna faro farkarkor ḇeḇye ma wafrurna kuker kakyar ma saswar snar Yesus Kristus.
55001014	Faduru arasai ḇeḇye, sikyar kwarma ḇeko, ro Rur Ḇesren ḇekain ro kosnesna.
55001015	Wafawi kwar mboi sikam ro supya mnuk Asia-Kasun si susubur aya; rarirya kako Figerus ma Hermogenes.
55001016	Manseren ḇyuk ḇaḇye ḇyedi faro Onesiforus kina ḇyesi snar rarwan riḇeso kwar ifrur sneprei aya. Imai ḇa ryakaki aya ro bui.
55001017	Fafisu aya isya ro Roma, syewar aya ma isrow aya kako kwar.
55001018	Ma ro Efesus ifnoḇek aya nabor kwar. Roi ḇeradinena wafawi kwar. Manseren fyasna ḇaḇye ḇyedi faro i ro Ras Ḇepupesya kada.
55002001	Inja, ne, romawa yedi, swambraḇ ro saswar-fakamaman ro Yesus Kristus.
