55002002	Rosai wamnaf ro aya kwar ro saksi ḇeḇor, farkorna kada faro snonkaku wakyarsya, ma sifawinanem kako sakfarkor snonkaku ḇese.
55002003	Mkoso ma mkakḇekandera imnis sordade ḇeḇye ro Yesus Kristus.
55002004	Rofyor sordade oso ḇyesewar ro fararur ma ḇyefandun ḇaḇefandun mankundi ḇyena ḇa, rarirya mananir ro sarar ḇyedi imarisen.
55002005	Snonkaku oso ḇefaḇri ro farfnak syewar monda faisma wower rofyor isomnis sasoser ḇekur farfnak ani.
55002006	Manfrudo oso ḇefararur myaren ro yaf iso nari ḇeyan ḇepon pun ro ardomes ḇyena.
55002007	Waswarepen rosai yakofen nane; Manseren nari ḇyuk fawawi faro aw ro roi ḇeḇor kam.
55002008	Waswarepen: Yesus Kristus ḇekḇok kwar rofandu ḇemarsya, ḇyeḇeyaḇen kwar imnis up ro Daud, iso yaḇaryas ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ayedi.
55002009	Snar ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ine eḇedari yaḇekandera, ma sewanka aya imnis snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor oso, ḇape Allah wos ḇyedi kada ḇyeḇeḇewanka ḇa.
55002010	Eḇedari yakbaḇ ḇo yaḇarna kam faro snonkaku Allah kyinfirsya, insa si kako saksma koreri snar Yesus Kristus kuker ḇaḇebaba ḇyedi ḇekain fyoroya.
55002011	Kaku ḇeri ro wos ine: "Rofyor komar fnoḇek i, ko kako nari kokenem fnoḇek i;
55002012	Rofyor kofarmku, ko kako nari kakḇuk sasoser fnoḇek i. Rofyor ko famyun i, i kako nari dakfamyun ko.
55002013	Rofyor komkuser ko ḇa, i kada imku faswef, snar nari fyamyunepen mankundi ḇa."
55002014	Buk swarepen ma wanun nakam kuker kaku ḇeri faro si ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, insa spambarḇar wos awer, snar roi ḇeradine nefainda ḇaḇeri, isyadi naser famfaḇri faro ḇemnafsya.
55002015	Besewar insa wasyus ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi imnis snon oso ḇemai ḇa, mboi baryasbos wos ḇenapes ani.
55002016	Ḇape wamnaf awer faro wos ḇekaku ḇa ma ḇemamasna.
55002017	Wawos sena naduḇ imnis dafduf kanker: Rofandu si Himeneus ma Filetus su kako,
55002018	ḇeḇor kwar ro nyan ḇenapesya ma ḇefarkor mboi kuker ḇaḇeaḇiḇer ro bakenya isyof kwar ma rarirya skokok kakyar ro snonkaku ono.
55002019	Ḇape araref Allah ryirya idworen ma sfas ro araref ani radine: "Manseren ifawi snonkaku ḇyesi" ma "Snonkaku oser-oser ḇeyap Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi isusubur ḇarḇorna kada."
55002020	Ro rum ḇebaya dori kosma dera brawen ma sarak monda ḇa, mboi ono kako ro ai ma saprop; kona ono faro roi ḇeḇye syadi ma kona ono faro roi ḇeḇye mankenem ḇa.
55002021	Rofyor snon oso fyasren mankundi ro roi ḇeḇarḇor, nari ḇyedera ro rum ani faro roi ḇeḇye syadi, ḇyeḇefasren, ma ḇyefainda faro tuan ḇyedi ma ḇyeḇefasos faro fararur rosai ḇeḇye syadiya.
55002022	Fanam awer marasrisen ḇeḇerarmomen baken ro snonkborsya, mboi swewar ḇaḇenapnapesya, ḇaḇefarmkuya, saswar ma aski fnoḇek snonkaku ḇefararyor faro Manseren kuker sne ḇesrensya.
55002023	Fanam awer wawos ḇeḇor ro snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇasya. Snar wafawi roi ḇerarirya nbawes rakrakrok,
55002024	snar Manseren manfamyan ḇyesi nari srakrakrok ḇa, mboi sfafir faro snonkakusya kam. Ifawi ḇyuk farkarkor, ikbaḇ
55002025	ma kuker aḇaḇen fyarkin snonkaku ḇesampampumsya, snar kofawi ḇa imbude Manseren ḇyuk farosi fafisu ono fasimbror ma fyarkin si isof smamḇaḇir ḇaḇenapnapesya,
55002026	ma rarirya nari sḇaḇir wer, nari sḇeḇeperbur Ibirisya denem ḇyedi ḇeyaḇek si kwar kuker marisen ḇyena.
55003001	Mkofawi mboi ro ras ḇepupesna nari ndama kuker kandera nabor.
55003002	Snonkakusya nari siswar mankunsi ḇardi ma sewomen faro pipi. Nari sḇemandaw ma simarares mankunsi, sanonef, nari sisampum sinansya ma sifawi sikofen kasumasa ḇa, sfandun ḇar rurya ḇa,
55003003	sifawi saswar ḇa, simewer ḇaḇeaskiya, simarisen skoryae snonkaku, sfarmkuepen mankunsi ḇa, siḇarḇor, simewer roi ḇeḇyena,
55003004	simarisen sḇoḇ min sesi, skara nakwan ba ma simarares si, siso syadi rmomen-nafsu sena ro siso Allah.
55003005	Sifrur ḇaḇeari sena imnis kakara snonkaku, ḇape simewer knam ro agama ani ḇardi. Inja mkofanam awer si!
55003006	Snar rofandu si ono sisya ssun fasis ḇerum snonkaku ono bese ma sidenem bin ono ḇefo kuker sasar ma ḇefo kuker rmomen bakenya,
55003007	ma simarisen sḇeḇefarkor, ḇape smambir ḇaḇenapnapesya ḇa.
55003008	Simnisbos kaku Yanes ma Yambres ḇesampum Muses, rarirya si kako sisampum ḇaḇenapnapesya. Swaruser sena ndobur si ma kakyar sena nasusu.
55003009	Inja nari sirwuren ḇa, snar simnis raris Yanes ma Yambres, ḇaḇefawawi royoḇa sena nari nfababa faro snonkakusya kam.
55003010	Ḇape waser farkarkor yena kwar, rariso kankenem ayedi, marisen ayedi, kakyar ayedi, kaḇaḇaḇ ayedi, saswar ayedi, ma ḇaḇenamu ayedi.
55003011	Waso kwar ḇaḇekandera ḇaḇewayam ma kandera imnis yaḇekandera ro Antiokia ma ro Ikonium ma ro Listera kwar. Kandera anna kam yaḇarna ma Manseren fyaspar ayaburna kam.
55003012	Mboi snonkaku oser-oser ḇemarisen ḇekenem ro ḇaḇeari snar Yesus Kristus nari sisma ḇaḇewayam,
55003013	mboi ḇeḇarḇorsya ma ḇesararersya sikada nari sḇarḇor syadi, sfarkor ninyan ma sḇeḇeyakḇeninyan kako.
55003014	Ḇape wuf faswef ro ḇaḇenapnapes wasma kwar ma wakyar ani, ma waswarepen ḇesyakwar snonkaku ḇefarkorna kwar faro aw.
55003015	Waswarepen kako mboi rofyor wabaḇaya mambir kwar Refo ḇeḇuk fawawinanem faro aw ma ḇefarkin aw faro koreri snar kakyar faro Yesus Kristus.
55003016	Fasfas ḇeḇor ḇeramuma ro Allah nbefainda kaku fakoḇuki fyarkor, koḇuki ikofen fasna ḇaḇesasarya, koḇuki ifrur mnis rari ma koḇuki fyarkor snonkaku ro ḇaḇenapnapesya.
55003017	Rarirya Allah snonkaku ḇyesi oser-oser sḇeḇefasos faro fararur ḇeḇyeya.
55004001	Ro ḇarpon Allah ma Yesus Kristus nari bemankara snonkaku ḇekenem ma ḇemarsya, inja yanunkaku ḇeri faro aw kuker fasasna ro Allah ma Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi:
55004002	Baryas Allah wos ḇyedi, fasos rofafisu ḇeḇye roḇa fafisu ḇesamswen, fasna rosai ḇesasar, wasonek ma buk ananun kuker kaḇaḇaḇ ma farkarkor.
55004003	Snar rofafisuya nari ryama, snonkakusya nari sisma farkarkor ḇenapes werḇa, mboi nari siryur gurusya raris marisen sena fasḇuk farkarkor raris mankunsi marisen sena.
55004004	Sikada nari snos knaram senabur napnapesya ma sḇasna faro farfyar kakais monda.
55004005	Ḇape wepen mankundaw ro roi ḇeḇor kam, wakḇaḇ ro ḇaḇekandera, wafrur fararur ḇaḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye, ma wafrur posa afuffarmyan bedi!
55004006	Faro mankundaya, fafisuya ryama kwar nari yamar imnis farsarser faro Allah ma kniko wer nari yabur supswan ine.
55004007	Fanandi ḇeḇyeya yafrur posai kwar, ma yasma mun ḇepupesya kwar ma rarirya yafaduru kakyarya kwar.
55004008	Ras suine wower napnapesya ḇyeḇefasosma ḇeaya kwar nari Manseren ḇyukima ḇeaya, Mankara ḇenapes, ro ras ḇepupes ḇyedi; ḇape faro yerer monda ḇa, mboi faro snonkaku kam ḇewaf raramuma ḇyedi.
55004009	Besewar insa rwamuma fasaw,
55004010	snar Demas iswar supswan ine inja ibur aya. Ryai Tesalonika kwar. Kreskes ryai Galatia kwar ma Titus ryaḇe Dalmatia.
55004011	Mboi Lukas derer i ḇekainus aya. Wun Markusi ḇo muramuma, snar afuffarmyan ḇyedi ḇyefandun kakuma ḇeaya.
55004012	Tikhikus yawan i kwar ḇe-Efesus.
55004013	Rofyor rwamuma ido wun syatu ayedi ro Troas yaburi ro Karpus rum ḇyedi ma wun kako syap ayena, isyadi kaku perkamenya (aiwan kif imnis syap ḇefasapepen).
55004014	Aleksander, kamasan kansai ani, ifrur ḇarḇor nabor kwar maro aya. Manseren nari myunsuna imnis fararur ḇyena.
55004015	Inja wepen aw, snar Aleksander isampumbosḇeri farkarkor koḇena.
55004016	Rofyor yaḇesano ro randakya snonkaku oso ifnoḇek aya ḇaḇeri, sikam sibur aya -- roi ḇeradine sikamar awerna, --
55004017	ḇape Manseren ifnoḇek aya ma ḇyuk samambraḇma ḇeaya, insa Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya yaḇaryasi faḇeyakḇe Yahudiḇasya sakmnaf i. Rarirya yasma faspar ro marmarya.
55004018	Ma Manseren nari fyaspar ayabur ḇarḇorna kam. I kada nari ḇyuk aksi ḇeaya isof yasun ro Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ro boiyaswa. Sanandik faro ḇaḇebaba ḇyedi fyoro-fyoro kada! Amin.
55004019	Aroo faro Priskila ma Akwila ma faro Onesiforus kina ḇyesi.
55004020	Erastus kyain ro Korintus ma Trofinus yabur i ro Miletus snar iduf. Rofafisu primya ḇaim besewar farwamuma kada.
55004021	Aroo faro aw ro Ebulus, Pudes, Linus, Klaudia ma ro naek srarsya kam.
55004022	Manseren ryous aw. Manseren ḇyeḇok naek srar mko kam kada! Ro aya, Paulus
56001001	Ro Paulus, Allah manfamyan ḇyedi ma Yesus Kristus manwawan ḇyedi faḇefaduru Allah snonkaku kyinfir kwarsya kakyar sena ma fawawi ro napnapesya ḇeḇair ro ḇaḇeari koḇena,
56001002	ma ḇyeknam ro saneraro ḇekaku ḇekain fyoro rofyor awarya ḇaim Allah ḇyeasas i kwar ma Allah ipok isrer ḇa,
56001003	ma rofyor Allah imarisen, fyasna kwar ro wos ḇyedi ro ḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ikyar kwar maro aya imnis Allah sasoser ḇyedi, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
56001004	Faro Titus, romawa karyer yedi ro kakyar koḇena kam: Allah Kmaya ma Yesus Kristus, saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇye ḇyedi ryous aw kada.
56001005	Yaḇur aw kwar ro Kreta kuker swaruser ine, insa wafrur rosai ḇeḇefandun ma insa wakanaw penetua-penetua ro mnuna imnis raris moḇ yanun kwar faro aw,
56001006	isoine snonkaku ḇefarorewḇa, ḇena swa oser monda, kina ḇyena sikenem kuker kakyar faro Kristus ma sisma safsof awer ro kankenem ḇeḇyeḇa mboi sikenem kuker aunos.
56001007	Snar ḇefararur ro Allah rum ḇyedi snonkaku ḇefarorewḇa, ḇemarares ḇa, ḇemasasor ḇa, ḇemasaser ḇa, mkaba pipiḇa,
56001008	mboi ḇemarisen ḇeḇuk moḇ ḇeḇeryar, ḇemarisen roi ḇeḇye, ḇefawi nanem, ḇenapes, ḇekenem nasren, ḇemkuser mankundi
56001009	ma ḇeserepen wos ḇenapes ḇemnis kuker farkarkor ḇeḇye, insa ifawi ḇyuk farkarkor faro snonkaku ro knam farkarkor anna ma ḇyenamu faḇyuk snekin faro ḇesampumisya.
56001010	Snar snonkaku sibor kwar sikenem kuker aunos ḇa, isyadi rofandu snonkaku ḇeso sasoser sofakfukya. Kuker wos ḇeḇefromo ma sfarkor ninyan snonkaku.
56001011	Snonkaku ḇerariryasya sḇadon sena neḇesisen kada, snar sfarkor ninyan kina sibor kuker farkarkor ḇemnis ḇa fasisma fainda ḇefrur mamyai.
56001012	Nabi oso ro siḇardi, ḇekain ro Kreta ikofen kako: "Kretasya indo sankarkar, sḇeaiwan ḇeḇarḇor, ḇeyanburamek ma ḇemanon."
56001013	Nabi ani wos ḇyedi kyaku. Inja wasonek pakrek kaku si insa sikyar faro Allah kuker nyan ḇenapes,
56001014	ma sikyar kaker awer farfyar kakais Yahudi ma sasoser-sasoser snonkaku ḇesasyarbur ḇaḇenapnapesya.
56001015	Faro ḇesrensya roi ḇeḇor nakam nasren; ḇape faro ḇearwaremsya ma ḇekyar ḇasya osoḇaḇeri faisren, snar kakara ma swaruser sena nmamas.
56001016	Skarem soḇo sifawi Allah, ḇape ro fararur sena sfamyun Allah. Sikada snonkaku befrur roi ḇemnis oso ḇaḇeri.
56002001	Ḇape aw Titus, baryas farkarkor ḇenapes raris Allah farkarkor ḇyena.
56002002	Snonkaku ḇeḇesinansya simkuser si, sesyowi, sifawinanem, kakyar sena nanapes, sisaswar ma senamu.
56002003	Rarirya kako ḇinsarsya, sikenem imnis snonkaku ḇesren, skoraryae ḇa, seḇinfyan faro swan ḇa, ḇape sifawi ssḇuk farkarkor ro roi ḇeḇyena
56002004	ma rarirya sfarkor inai babosya fasiswar swasesi ma romawasesi,
56002005	sikenem kuker fawawinanem ma saranden, simyaren sfaduru kina sena, sfafir ma saser faro swasesi, insa Allah wos ḇyedi snonkakusya sonef aweri.
56002006	Rarirya kako romawa babosya; wanunsi insa simkusersi ro roi ḇeḇor kam
56002007	ma mankundaw benyan ḇefasna kankenem ḇeḇye. Inja buk farkarkor kuker aunos ma kaku ḇeri,
56002008	wawos bena nanapes ma ḇaryas bena nfarorewḇa isof ḇesampum awsya simai, snar roi ḇeḇyeḇa ono naisyaḇa fasikofen ro ko.
56002009	Manfamyansya sesyowi manseren sesi ro roi ḇeḇor kam ma sisampum awer si,
56002010	ma skaraw awer, ḇape sikenem naḇye kuker awnos, insa rarirya snonkakusya sisandik Allah farkarkor ḇeḇor ḇyena kam, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
56002011	Snar Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyena ḇeḇuk koreri faro snonkakusya kam nasnai kwar.
56002012	Allah saswar ḇyedi fyarkor ko insa kobur ḇarḇorna ma rmomen supswan ine ma insa kokenem kuker fawawinanem, nanapes ma ḇaḇeari faro Allah ro supswan ine.
56002013	Ma kowaf Ras ḇepupes sanemura ro ani, ḇefo kuker aski; ro Ras ḇepupes ani nari supswan smam Yesus Kristus baba ḇyedi, isoine Allah Ḇebasyadi ma Wairek Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
56002014	Ḇeḇuk mankundi kwar maḇeko insa ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei ḇeko ro ḇarḇor nakam ma fyasren kawasa ono faro mankundi, ḇemyaren ḇefrur roi ḇeḇye.
56002015	Baryas roi ḇeḇor anna kam, ma buk ananun ma buk snekin snonkaku kuker papoik wasmana. Ma snonkaku ono smamkyof awer aw.
56003001	Buk swarepen faro si insa siso ḇaḇesasoserya ma snonkaku ḇesma papoik, sisouser ma sfasos fasifrur fararur ḇeḇye.
56003002	Sonefyae awer si, srakrok awer, iḇye sikenem kuker fafir faro snonkakusya kam.
56003003	Snar ḇeponiwara ko kako kokenem ro fawawi royoḇa: koḇeuser ḇa, koḇor, koḇemanfyan faro nafsu ḇeḇor ma rmomen, kokonem ro ḇarḇor ma kram masasor, kayinyae ko.
56003004	Ḇape Allah, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko fyasna saswar ḇyedi kwar ma ḇaḇye ḇyedi faro ko,
56003005	rofyor ani ḇyuk korerima ḇeko, snar fararur ḇeḇye koḇena ḇa, ḇape snar ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyedi ro masi sren ḇeyaḇen kaḇer ko snar fararur ro Allah Rur ḇyedi,
56003006	Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyukma ḇeko ro Yesus Kristus, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko,
56003007	insa komnis snonkaku ḇenapes snar saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi, ko kako kosma kankenem ḇekain fyoro, imnis raris sanemura koḇena.
56003008	Wos ine kyaku ma yamarisen insa kuker snekin swambrabser i, insa ḇekyar kwar faro Allahsya sesewar kaku ḇeri fasifrur roi ḇeḇye ma ḇeḇefainda faro kawasa kam.
56003009	Ḇape binkwanbur famfaḇri ma ḇefawiroyoḇa, ma wawos ḇekur up, kankenem ḇemnisḇa ma rakrakrok ḇekur sasoser Refo Yahudi, snar nakam nefainda ḇa ma nefromo monda.
56003010	Snonkaku ḇeḇuk farkarkor ninyan oso wasonek i ḇerarwan oser roba suru, posa wakenem awer kuker i.
56003011	Wafawi kwar ḇerariryasya siḇarḇor ma sasar sena nbuk samamyai faro mankunsi.
56003012	Yawan Artemas roba Tikhikus faro aw, ḇesewar fawasrow aya ro Nikopolis, snar yakara namuk kwar fayakain ro dia rofafisu primya.
56003013	Wafnoḇek naḇye kaku Zenas, ḇefawinanem Refo Yahudi ani, ma Apolos, ro mararan suḇedi, insa suyananjar royo awer.
56003014	Ma snonkaku koḇesi farkor si kako insa sifrur roi ḇeḇye faro fandun sena, insa kankenem sena nefromo awer.
56003015	Naek srar ḇewarpu aya rodine nkofarem aroo faro aw. Ma wakofen aroo nkoḇena faro min koḇesi ḇekyar fnoḇek ko faro Kristus. Manseren ḇyeḇok naek srar mko kam kada. Ro aya, Paulus
57001001	Ro Paulus, snon ḇesmai snar Yesus Kristus ma ro Timotius naek koḇedi, faro Filemon yaswar kaku, bati ḇefararur kayam
57001002	ma faro Apfia, srar koḇedi ma faro Arkipus, bati ro fararur koḇedi ma faro jemaat ḇefananjur ro rum ḇyedi:
57001003	Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇenaḇye ro Allah, Kma koḇedi ma ro Manseren Yesus Kristus ryous mko kada!
57001004	Rofyor yabenadi, yap snonsnon bedi ma yakofen kasumasa faro Allah yedi.
57001005	Snar yamnaf saswar bedi faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi, ma kakyar ḇena faro Manseren Yesus.
57001006	Ma yanadi, insa ḇaḇeoser koḇedi ro kakyarya iso ḇefrur fawawi ḇeḇye rofandu ko faro Kristus.
57001007	Ro saswar bena yasma kwar marasrisen ḇeba ma samambraḇ, ma Allah kawasa ḇyesi sisma sneprei snar aw.
57001008	Snar rarirya naek ḇena kakyar oser eḇedari yaḇuk sasoser faro naek aw insa wafrur rosai nari wafrurna,
57001009	ḇape yaswarepen saswar ḇena, iḇye syadi yor faro aw. Aya, Paulus, yaḇemansar kwar, ma baboine kako yasmai ro bui snar Yesus Kristus,
57001010	inja yor ro aw snar romawa yedi Onesimus yasma kwar rofafisu aya isya ro bui
57001011	-- randakya ḇyefainda faro aw ḇa, ḇape baboine ḇyefainda kaku iḇye faro aw ma aya kako.
57001012	Yawan kaḇer i faro aw -- ikada sneuser yedi. --
57001013	Yaḇe yakarwarek kaku i rodine faisadwer aw insa duffarmyan aya rofyor yasmai ro bui snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya,
57001014	ḇape rofyor wamarisen ḇaim, nari yafrur roi oso ro marisen ayedi ḇa, insa roi ḇeḇyena wafrur awerna kuker ḇaḇedafdifer mboi wafrurna kuker marisen.
57001015	Eḇedari Onesimus byinkwanbur aw resari, insape nwa i isof fyoro-fyoro,
57001016	imnis manfyan wer ḇa, mboi isyadi ro manfyan, isoine imnis naek koswar kaku, faro aya rarirya, rosai wer faro aw, iḇye faro snonkaku ma faro Manseren kako.
57001017	Rofyor kwara aya ḇemin bedi ḇena kakyar oser, nwa Onesimus imnis nwa aya.
57001018	Ma rofyor ifrur fromo faro aw roḇawer ḇyenyaki faro aw, buknama yaḇarna kam, --
57001019	aya, Paulus, yafaduru i kuker fasfas ro mankundaya: Nari yaḇakna -- insa yakofen awer: "Aw ḇeḇarna kamya!" -- snar ḇyenyaki maro aya, isoine mankundaw ḇardi.
57001020	O, naek ayedi, befaindama ḇeaya kada snar Manseren: Buk sneprei maḇe aya snar Kristus!
57001021	Yafas mufaḇe aw, snar yakyar nari beuser wos ayena. Mboi yafawi nari wafrur syadi ro fararyor ayedine.
57001022	Rofyor ani fasos kako fabuk moḇ yaḇeryar ro, snar yakyar nadi ḇena nari yakaḇer faro aw.
57001023	Aroo faro aw ro Epafras, min ayedi ḇeyaksmai fnoḇek aya ro bui snar Yesus Kristus,
57001024	ma ro Markus, Aristarkus, Demas ma Lukas, min ḇefararur kayam kuker aya.
57001025	Saswar-fakamaman Manseren Yesus Kristus ryous rur mkoḇesi kada! Ro aya, Paulus
58001001	Ro awar ḇeponiwara Allah dawawos ḇerarwan ono mufaḇe kpu koḇesi kuker nabi ḇyesya ro nyan nabor, ḇape ro awar ḇepupes ine Allah dawawos maḇeko kwar kuker Rumkun ḇyedi ḇeḇemanfanduya.
58001002	Allah ḇyeasas kwar mboi Rumkun ḇyedi i ḇena roi ḇeḇor kam. Snar Yesus Allah ifrur kwar sansoren ḇoka.
58001003	I ḇeḇeisnai ro Allah ḇaḇe baba ḇyedi; ma fanir ro Allah mankundi. Ikada fyaduru sansoren ḇoka ine kuker papoik ro wos ḇyedi. Ma fyasren snonkakusya ro sasar sena kwar, insape kyain ro karapesa sasoser fnoḇek Allah, ḇena papoik ḇekaki syadiya ro boiyaswa.
58001004	I sma kankain ḇekaki syadi ro malaikatsya, imnis raris Allah snonsnon ḇyuk faroi kako ipyum syadi ro snonsnon malaikatsya.
58001005	Snar Allah ikofen ḇaim radine faro malaikat oso: "Awkada Rumkun ayedi! ro ras ine yaḇe Kma faro aw?" ma Allah ikofen kako faro malaikat oso ḇaim, "Nari yaḇe Kma faroi, ma nari ḇyeromawaḇe aya?"
58001006	Ma rofyor Allah iwan Rumkun rak ḇyedima ḇesupswan ine, ikofen radine: "Allah malaikat ḇyesi kam sḇansuba faro i."
58001007	Faro malaikatsya, Allah ikofen radine: "Allah ifrur malaikat ḇyesi fasewamdoḇer, ma ḇeyuffarmyan besi fasimnis for ḇesber."
58001008	Ḇape Allah ikofen faro Rumkun ḇyedi: "Karapesa nasan bedi, o Allah, nari kyain fyoro-fyoro, ma ḇaḇesasoser bedikada sasoser ḇaḇenapnapes."
58001009	"Awkada wamarisen ḇaḇenapnapesya ma wayin ḇarḇorya, rarirya Allah, Allah bedi ryem aw kwar kuker mani imnis aḇyair marasrisen, isyadi ro min besi."
58001010	Allah ikofen wer: "Ro awar ḇeponiwara, aw o Allah, wafrur kwar sup ine, ma kuker ḇramin beja wafrur nanki.
58001011	Ma nari nakam napromes, ma nari nakwar imnis mar wai, ḇape awma nari farweḇa.
58001012	Nari waper sansoren ḇoka ine imnis mar ma nari wasadwerna, ḇape auma nari fadwerḇa, ma kankenem bedi kyain fyoro-fyoro."
58001013	Ma Allah ikofen ḇaim radine faro snon oso ro malaikat ḇyesi kako: "Kwain ro ḇar raku yedi, isof yafrur mbroḇ besi faskuk wepur ro ḇarpon bedi?"
58001014	Malaikat ansi kam isoine rur ḇeyuffarmyan Allah sirya, ma iwan si fasifnoḇek snonkaku nari ḇesma koreri?
58002001	Snar rarirya kufepen nako ma kodworen ro rosai komnaf kwar, insa koki awer ro kiraya.
58002002	Snar wos malaikatsya sikofen nari ndarirya faswef, ma ḇaḇeuk ono ma ḇaḇeuserḇa nari nasma munsu,
58002003	nari kokfis rariso rofyor kokara kuker awnosḇa knam ro koreri ani, randakya Manseren ikofen kwar ma kosma na ro snonkaku ḇerower kwarsya sfar pampyam maḇeko kuker nyan kokyar na,
58002004	Allah ifrur ḇaryas sena fanadworen kaku kuker aḇyair ma aḇyair kanandor ma fasasna ḇeḇor kuker papoik ḇyena ma Rur ḇyedi ḇyerarwas na imnis mankundi marisen ḇyedi.
58002005	Snar malaikatsya sisma papoik ro Allah ḇa fasḇuk sasoser ro supswan ḇebabo nari ḇeramaya, isoine sup koḇekawawos ine.
58002006	Ro Refo mnuk oso isya sfas radine: "O, Allah, snonkakusya mansesirya, isof wamarisen waswarepen si, oroḇaido rumkun snonkaku, isof ḇefandun si?
58002007	Rofafisu ḇeknampu rwun syadi i ro malaikatsya, ma buk ḇei kankain ḇepyum ma ḇaḇesyowi,
58002008	wafrur i faisma papoik ro roi ḇeborkam." Isoine roi oso kako ryobaḇ papoik snonkaku ḇa. Ḇape baboine komam ḇaim, snonkaku sisma papoik ro roi ḇeḇor anna.
58002009	Ḇape Yesus rofafisu kermkun ḇyeḇerun faryobaḇ malaikatsya, isoine Yesus komam, snar kandera marmar, ḇyeḇesiḇer kuker wower payamyum ma syowi, insa Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyena ifawi marmari faro snonkakusya kam.
58002010	Snar imnis raris Allah rari ḇyedi -- ifrur ma fyaduru roi ḇeḇor kam, -- Allah dun snonkaku sibor faro babaya, ma ḇyeimnis Yesus, faḇyemanfarkin ḇesi faro koreri, kuker ḇaḇekandera ḇyedi.
58002011	Snar Yesus fyasren ma sḇeḇefasren, sikam sḇeknam oser; eḇedari imai ḇa dap siḇe naek srar.
58002012	Yesus ikofen faro Allah: "Nari yaḇaryas snombri faro naek srar ayesi, ma yasandik aw rofandu jemaat."
58002013	Yesus ikofen wer: "Nari yarir kakyar ayedi mufaḇe Allah." Ma Yesus ikofen wer: "Kaku ḇeri, aya isoine ma romawa Allah ḇyuk maḇe aya kwarsya."
58002014	Snar snonkaku dap ḇeromawa ansi, sikada kankenem snonkaku, nari ḇemar, inja Yesus mankundi imnis kuker si ma ikenem ro rari snonkaku imnis si. Ifrur rarirya insa marmar ḇyedi kyakok Ibiris, ḇesma papoik ro marmari,
58002015	ma kuker nyan ḇerarirya ḇyuk ḇaḇemakakei faro snonkaku ro kankenem sena ḇesiper sisya ro ḇaḇewomen snar simkak faro marmari.
58002016	Snar kaku ḇeri, malaikatsya si iswarsya ḇa, ḇape Abraham kpu ḇyesi iswar si.
58002017	Snar rarirya ro roi ḇeḇor kam imnisbos naek srar ḇyesi, insa ḇye Imam Ḇeba ḇena saswarya ma ḇeḇeuser faro Allah ma ḇyuk aski faro ersya kam ro sasar sena.
58002018	Kuker nyan ine mankundi isma kwar kandera ma fafrowes, insa ifnoḇek snonkaku ḇesma fafrowes sya.
58003001	Inja, naek srar Allah kawasa ḇesren ḇyesi, ḇesma rarwas ma fararyor ro boiyaswa, mkomam faro Manwawan ma Imam Ḇeba kokarem ani, isoine Yesus,
58003002	Yesus iso ḇeḇeuser Allah ḇekinfir i kwar, imnis Moses kako ḇeponya ḇeḇeuser ḇefrur mnis rum ḇesiper ḇyedi.
58003003	Yesus isma ḇaḇesyowi ḇeba syadi ro Moses, imnis snon ḇefawinananem ḇaḇawes rum ḇyesyowi syadi i ro rum sḇawesya.
58003004	Snar snon oso ḇefawinananem ḇaḇawes rum ḇape snon ḇefawinananem ḇaḇawes roi ḇeborkam isoine Allah.
58003005	Moses ikada ḇyeuser Allah rum ḇyedi ḇesiper imnis manfamyan ḇaḇesaksi roi kam Allah fyasna faroi nari ḇerama na.
58003006	Ḇape Kristus ikada ḇyeuser imnis Rumkun nari ḇeḇeḇru ro Allah rum ḇyedi; ma Allah rum ḇyedi isoine koine, rofyor koisya ro papupesya kuf nako ro kakyar ma saneraro ro rosai komsik kukerya.
58003007	Snar rarirya, imnis raris Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen: "Ro ras ine, rofyor Allah mkaren ḇyedi,
58003008	mkosnemna npakrek awer imnis kpu mkoḇesi spakrek, rofafisu sisma fafrowes ro sup ḇeursba.
58003009	Rodiwa kpu mkoḇesi smam fararur ayena kwar, ro wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak, ḇape sifrowes sas aya kuker nyan simnasen aya.
58003010	Rarirya yamsor si, ma yakofen: 'Sikada indo sankarkar, ma ssmambaḇir nyan ayena ḇa.'
58003011	Isof yamsorḇo yafores: 'Nari saksun ro moḇ mananai ayedi ḇa.' "
58003012	Naek srar, mkepen mko, insa rofandu mko snon oso iḇarḇor awer ma ikyarḇa awer ma isusubur Allah ḇekenemya.
58003013	Inja rasras mkofarkor yae mko, rofafisu sapḇe "Ras Ine," imnis ono rofandu mko sisnesna npakrek, snar ankarkar sararer ro sasarya.
58003014	Snar kosma kwar rarwas ro Kristus, inja kuf nadworen ro kakyar ḇepon koḇena isof ras ḇepupesya.
58003015	Ine kada sfasi ro Refo: "Ro ras ine rofyor mkorower Allah mkaren ḇyedi, mkosnemna npakrek awer, imnis kpu mkoḇesi spakrek rofafisu sisampum Allah."
58003016	Inja, snonkaku mansesiso ḇerower Allah mkaren ḇyedi raimnai ḇesampum i? Sikada kawasa kam Moses dun faḇesasyarbur sup Masir inke?
58003017	Manseren Allah imsor ro wampasi wambarek samfur rifiak? Faro si ḇefrur sasar ma ḇesapi ḇemar ro sup ḇeursḇa?
58003018	Mansesiso Allah fyoreswas nari ḇeyaksun ḇa romoḇ mananai ḇyedi? Mansesiso Allah ikofen wersya? Sikada snonkaku besampum Allah inke?
58003019	Rarirya komam kada, mboi sima saksun ḇa snar ḇaḇekakyar ḇa sena.
58004001	Inja, iḇye kepen ko, insa oso isya rofandu mko skara iḇe ḇesusu awer, snar Allah asas ḇyedi nari kosun ro ḇaḇemananai ḇyedi isya kaker.
58004002	Snar Ankankinem Ḇeḇye sḇaryas ani ssḇuki kwar maroko imnis raris faro si, ḇaryas ani ḇyefainda faro siḇa, snar rofafisu simnafya, sna na kuker kakyar ḇa.
58004003	Mboi ḇekyar koya kada, nari kosun ḇemoḇ mananaiya raris wos ḇyedi: "Yamsor ma yaforeswas: Mboi sikada nari saksun ḇemoḇ mananai yedi ḇaḇeri!" Allah ikofen rarirya, ḇape fararur ḇyedi imnai kwar ro randak supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur kwarya.
58004004	Snar ro ras ḇeḇefikya sfas kwar ro Refo radine: "Ro ras ḇeḇefikya Allah imnai ro fararur ḇeḇor ḇyena."
58004005	Ma ro mnuk ani sfas radine wer: "Nari saksun ḇemoḇ mananai ayedi ḇaḇeri."
58004006	Inja ḇemnaf ḇepon ḇaryas ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ani, ssḇuk moḇ mananai ḇesi ḇa, snar sikyar ḇari.
58004007	Ḇape Allah fyasna ḇepon kwar ras oso, sapḇe "Ras Ine," rofafisu ikofenbadir fyoro ḇepon kwar faro Daud imnis sikofen ro diasne radine: "Ro ras ine, rofafisu mkorower mkaren ḇyedi ido, mkoḇe mkosnemna fanpakrek awer!"
58004008	Snar imnis raris Yosua dun snonkaku ansi fasun kwar ḇemoḇ mananai ani, nari Allah dawawos ro ḇarpurya ro ras ḇese nari ḇeramuma werya ḇa.
58004009	Inja ras mananai oso isya ḇyeḇefasos, faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi, imnis Allah imnai ro ras ḇeḇefikya.
58004010	Snar mansei ḇesun ḇemoḇ mananai Allah ḇyuk faro i kwar, nari imnai kwar ro fararur ḇeḇor ḇyena imnis raris Allah imnai ro fararur ḇyena.
58004011	Inja mkorama koḇesasewar kaku ḇeri fakosun ḇemoḇ manai ani ro Allah. Imbude komindi oso isapiri imnis si roḇepon, snar sikyar faro Allah ḇa.
58004012	Snar Allah wos ḇyena wos ḇekenem ma ḇepok isar syadi ro sumber ḇesar raḇandiḇar. Wos ani kyuk randum ḇyerwas rur ma kankenem, faswisew ma korkor kuker sorem na; isof ifrur fakakara ma swaruser ro kosnesna nbaḇer kam.
58004013	Ma roi ḇekenem oso kako iyokef ḇa ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, snar roi ḇeḇor kam nbas ma nbaḇer ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi. Ma nari kokarem faro i.
58004014	Baboine kona Imam Ḇeba kaku ḇesun isof ro ḇarpon Allah ḇyedi, isoine, Yesus Kristus, Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, inja kuf nako ro kakyar koḇedi kada.
58004015	Imam Ḇeba koḇedi, imam ḇemam monda ko ro raryar ḇa koḇena, snar mankundi kako isma kwar faraurowes sas ḇeḇor kwar imnis ko, mboi dakfrur sasar ḇa.
58004016	Rarirya komkak ḇa kora faro Allah ḇeḇuk sasoser kuker snemura. Nari Allah iswar ko ma ḇyeḇok ko ma kosma fafnoḇek, rofafisu koḇefandunya.
58005001	Snar imam ḇeba oser-oser, skinfir rofandu snonkaku, sikanow faḇeḇeḇru ḇeyuffarmyan Allah, fararur ḇyedi isoine ḇyuk farsarser faro Allah ro rosai ssḇuk fasna ḇesom snar sasar sena.
58005002	Imam ḇeba ani mankundi syambraḇ ḇa ro roi nabor, rarirya ikḇaḇ snonkaku ḇefawi royoḇa ma ḇembran sasarsya,
58005003	mankundi syambraḇ ḇa kako, inja ḇyuk farsarser som snar sasar kawasa sena monda ḇa, ḇape faro mankundi kako.
58005004	Ma snonkaku osoḇa kako dun ḇaḇesyowi ani faro mankundi ḇardi, ḇape Allah dori faro nasan ani imnis raris Harun.
58005005	Kristus kako rarirya, ikanow mankundi ḇa faḇye Imam Ḇeba, Allah, mankundi ḇekanow i, Allah ikofen faro i: "Awkada Rumkun ayedi! Ro ras ine yaḇe Kma faro aw."
58005006	Allah ikofen kako ro mnuk oso ḇese: "Awkada nari be Imam ro fyoro-fyoro, imnis raris rarwas imam Melkisedek."
58005007	Rofyor Yesus ikenem imnis snonkaku, ḇyenadi kwar ma dor kuker kankanes faro Allah, ḇepok ḇefaspar i bur marmari, ma snar kyunem faro Allah inja Allah imnaf i.
58005008	Yesus ikada Rumkun Allah, ḇape isouser rosai isma kandera kukerya kwar,
58005009	ma isma payamyum ḇyedi kwar, ḇyeknam ro koreri ḇekain fyoro faro snonkaku ḇesouser i sya,
58005010	ma Allah fyasna i fabye Imam Ḇeba ro rarwas imnis imam Melkisedek.
58005011	Ro Yesus ḇaḇenasan ḇyedi imnis Imam Ḇeba, roi nabor nkoḇenkoḇaryas faro mko, ḇape nsamswen faneḇekofen snar nari mkofawi fasaw na ḇa.
58005012	Fafisu mkoḇedi imnis kwar fa mkoḇe guru, ḇape mkofandun kaku snonkaku ono ḇese fasḇuk farkarkor ḇemko ro Allah fasasna ḇyena moḇ neknam raya ma nari mkosma roḇean ḇepnas ḇa mboi mkinem sus monda.
58005013	Snar mansei ḇeḇefandun ḇeyinem sus kaker, ḇyewombrek kaker, ifawi ḇaim roi ḇekaku ma roi ḇesasar na.
58005014	Roḇean ḇepnas kada faro ḇebasya, snar sima sifawi smambir kwar roi ḇeḇye ma roi ḇeḇarḇor.
58006001	Snar rarirya mkorama komnai ro koḇuk farkarkor araref ḇepon ro ḇaḇe Kristen, ma iḇyekada kombrar ro farkarkor ḇemnis, isoine snonkaku simnai ro sifrur roi ḇeḇefromo, mboi sikyar faro Allah,
58006002	isoine farkarkor ḇeḇeararef ro masi sren, kanow ḇramin ro snonkaku siḇrus na, kaḇakḇok ro ḇemarsya ma ḇaḇesamamyai ḇekain fyoroya.
58006003	Roi nanekam, Allah imarisen ido, nari kofrur na. (Inja kokara awer roi kofrur ma kokyar na naiso ḇefnai koreri maḇeko naba, mboi snar Yesus iso ḇefnai fakosma koreriya.)
58006004	Snar sisya ḇepon kwar ro Allah isna ḇyedi, ma san kwar ḇaḇeḇok ḇeḇye ro boiyaswa, ma sisma rarwas ro Rur Ḇesrenya,
58006005	ma san Allah wos ḇeḇye ḇyena ma fakamaman awar nari ḇeramaya,
58006006	ḇape sfamyun wer, rariso nari kokfin kaḇer si fasimbror ro sasar sena, snar mankunsi spaiepen Allah Rumkun ḇyedi wer ma sfafirek i ro fababa.
58006007	Snar saprop ḇesosef nanek ḇemyun roi, ḇyuk mamarem rokaker ḇeḇefainda faro snonkaku ḇefrurisya, sisma Allah ḇaḇeḇok ḇyena.
58006008	Ḇape rofyor saprop ani ḇyuksur rokaker ḇemarem ḇemanuk, ma kaḇrai borek, saprop ani ḇyefainda ḇa ma nari Allah ifrasi, ma ḇarpurya ḇyeḇekun.
58006009	Ḇape naek srar yaswar kaku, nkokofen wos ḇeḇuk kandera nemirḇa, mboi yafawi kaku ḇeri rariso nari mkokfisbur na, snar mkona roi ḇeba syadi ro kandera anna, isoine koreri.
58006010	Snar Allah inapes, isof nari fyanander ḇa fararur mkoḇena faro i ro fafnoḇek mkoḇena mkofrur faro kawasa ḇese ḇeḇe Kristensya, mkofnoḇek isof ro baboine kako.
58006011	Nkomarisen insa mko oser-oser fyasna kaku ḇeri roi ikyarya isoine koreri isof isma i ro ḇarpurya,
58006012	ma mkomyaren ḇa awer, ḇape nkomarisen mkoso si snar kakyar ma kaḇaḇaḇ sisma rarwas ro Allah ḇaḇeasas ḇyedi mkowaf ani.
58006013	Snar rofafisu Allah ḇyuk asas ḇyedi faro Abraham, Allah ḇyuk mankundi fyores warek, snar oso ikaki syadiḇa ro i,
58006014	doḇe: "Kaku ḇeri nari yaḇeḇok aw ma yafrur fawaryewen."
58006015	Abraham iwaf kuker kaḇaḇaḇ ma rarirya isma rosai sḇeasas faroi.
58006016	Snar snonkaku indo sfafores kuker snonkaku mansei ḇekaki syadi, isma samambraḇ ro fafores ani, ma isma fafnoḇek.
58006017	Allah imarisen kawasa ḇesma asas ḇyedi ani, insa sikyar kaku, eḇedari ḇyuk mankundi fyores,
58006018	insa fasasna risuru ansuya susadwer ḇa, isoine asas ma fafores, Allah fyes mankundi kuker fafores ani, Allah isrer ḇa, inja ḇesewar fafnoḇek koya, idif ko fakufnako kakyar ḇero ḇarpon koḇena.
58006019	Kakyar ani kada yor ḇesambraḇ moḇ kufepen ko ma kankenem koḇena naknon, snar ḇyeḇemsawer isof ro sorenya ropukya, knamya isya ro sim ḇesren ro Allah rum ḇyedi ro boiyaswa.
58006020	Yesus syun fapyon ko kwar, rofafisu iso rarwas Melkisedek, ḇye Imam Ḇeba isof fyoro-fyoro.
58007001	Melkisedek ine Allah Ḇekaki Syadi imam ḇyedirya ḇye wairek ro Salem; fafisu Abraham ḇyeembroḇ waireksya ma kyafyo si, Melkisedek ryama isrow i ma ḇyeḇoki.
58007002	Abraham ḇyuk faro Melkisedek rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro rosai dun ro embroḇ ani. (Snonsnon Melkisedek ḇeponya "Wairek Ḇenapes"; wairek ro Salem, "Wairek Aski".)
58007003	Melkisedek ine sikofen ḇadir snariḇa, kmariḇa ma ḇarpur ḇyediḇa, sikofen ḇadir ras saḇeniya ma ras imarya ḇa. Imnis raris Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, ḇyeimam isof fyoro-fyoro.
58007004	Komam Melkisedek ine iba syadi isof Abraham kpu koḇedi, ḇyuk rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur faroi ro rosai ḇeḇye syadi dun ro embroḇ.
58007005	Lewi kpu ḇyesi sisma nasan imam, imnis sasoser Refo Yahudi, insa sor rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro er Israel, isoine ro naek sesi, snar sikako seknam ro Abraham.
58007006	Melkisedek ḇyekpu ro siḇa, ḇape isma rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro Abraham ma ḇyeḇoki, snar Allah ḇyuk asas faroi.
58007007	Rarirya sisampumḇa ḇeba syadiya ḇyuk ḇok faro ḇebaḇaya.
58007008	Imamsya ḇesma ḇaḇyak rarwas ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ani sikada snonkaku monda nari ḇemar, ḇape Refoya doḇo: Melkisedek ḇesma ḇar rarwas ḇeḇesamfur ani ikada snonkaku ḇekenem.
58007009	Inja kofawi Lewi mankundi ḇyeknam kako ro Abraham isma ḇaḇyak ḇar rarwas ḇeḇesamfur ro kawasa Israel -- ḇyak kako faro Melkisedek ḇar rarwas ḇeḇesamfur ani ro Abraham.
58007010	Fafisu Melkisedek isrow Abraham, Lewi ḇyeḇeaḇen ḇaim, ḇape ḇyeknam ro Abraham.
58007011	Rofafisu imam Lewisya ssḇuk sasoser agama Yahudi faro kawasa Israel. Snar imam Lewisya sifrur mnisḇa ro roi sifrurna, inja fandun kaku imam ḇese, ro rarwas imam Melkisedek, mboi rarwas imam Harun werḇa.
58007012	Snar rofyor nasan imam ḇyeḇefadwer rarirya, nari sasoser Refo Yahudi ani ḇyeḇefadwer kako.
58007013	Manseren koḇani iso sikofen rodineya, ikada ḇye Manseren faro er ḇese, ma er ḇyedi kada snon oso ifrur fararur imnis imam ḇaim.
58007014	Snonkaku sikam sifawi Manseren koḇedi ḇyeknam ro er Yehuda; ma Moses dap er aniḇa rofyor iwawos ro imamsya.
58007015	Roi siwos ine isnai syadi wer, kuker imam oso ḇese dores imnis Melkisedek.
58007016	Sikanow i faḇyeimam, snar ḇarpur ḇyediḇa, ḇape snar papoik ro kankenem ḇyedi ma nari imar ḇa.
58007017	Snar ro Refo sikofen: "Nari au beimam fyoro-fyoro, imnis nasan imam rarwas Melkisedek."
58007018	Inja, baboine sasoser ḇekwar sisusu na, snar samambraḇ ḇa nbefainda ḇa,
58007019	-- snar kaser sasoser Refo Yahudiya nari ḇyuk koreri ḇaḇeri -- inja baboine ssḇuk ḇeko kakyar ḇeḇye syadi oso; rarirya kofanam Allah.
58007020	Ma roi ḇeradine ndarirya kuker fafores ḇa. Rofafisu imam ḇesesya sikanow si faseimam, Allah iso kuker fafores ḇa.
58007021	Ḇape Yesus ḇyeḇekanow faḇyeimam, syun ro fafores, rofafisu Allah ikofen faroi: "Manseren fyores kwar, ma nari syadwer marisen ḇyedi ḇa: 'Au kada beimam fyoro-fyoro,' "
58007022	rarirya kako Yesus ḇyefafnoḇek oso ro asas ḇeḇye syadi.
58007023	Ma imam-imam ḇeḇor ḇese ansi, snar oseroser imar isof sifararur pdef ro nasan sedi ḇa.
58007024	Yesus kada ikenem fyoro-fyoro, inja nasan imam ḇyedi ssḇuki faro snonkaku ḇese ḇa.
58007025	Rarirya Yesus ḇyuk aski fyoro-fyoro faro kawasa ḇerama faro Allah snar i. Yesus ifrur rarirya snar ikenem fyoro-fyoro fadun fararyor kawasa sena faro Allah.
58007026	Yesus ikada Imam Ḇeba kofandun kaku. Ima isren, kosma ḇaḇesasar oso ro iḇa roḇaido sasar rosai wer kako. Skinfir i kwarbur snonkaku ḇesasarsya, ma ḇyeḇekanow ḇemoḇ ḇekaki syadi kam ro nanki.
58007027	Ima imnis imam-imam ḇeba ḇesesya ḇa, insa rasras ssḇuk farsarser som snar mankunsi sasar sena ḇepon, posa insape kawasa sasar sena, Yesus ḇyuk farsarser som ḇerarwan oser monda rofyor ḇyuk mankundi ḇefarsarser somya.
58007028	Sasoser Refo Yahudi ikanow snonkaku ḇemnis ḇa fasḇe Imam Ḇeba, ḇape ḇarpur ro sasoser Refo Yahudi, Allah ifrur asas kuker soar, ikanow faḇeḇe Imam Ḇeba, isoine Rumkun ḇemnis kwar isof fyoro-fyoro.
58008001	Knam ro wos ḇeḇor nane isoine: kosma Imam Ḇeba ḇerarirya, ḇekain ro Allah Ḇeba syadi ḇar raku ro karapesa nasan ḇyedi ro boiyaswa,
58008002	ma ḇeyuf fararur imnis Imam Ḇeba ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi, ro Rum kruḇen Ḇaḇeari ḇekaku, Manseren ifrurya ma snonkaku oso ifruri ḇa.
58008003	Imam ḇeba oseroser ḇyeḇekanow insa ḇyuk farsarser roḇa som faro Allah: Rarirya kako Imam Ḇeba koḇedi, nari isma roi ono fanya ḇefarsarser.
58008004	Imnis raris isya ro supswan inekada, nari ḇyeimam ḇa, snar imam sisya kwar fasḇuk farsarser som siso sasoser Refo Yahudi.
58008005	Fararur sifrur imnis imam ani ḇyefanir ma nin ro rosai isya ro boiyaswa, Allah ikofen ḇadir ḇepon faro Moses kwar rofafisu nari ḇyawes Rum kruḇen faseari roya. Allah ikofen radine faro Moses: "Waswarepen! Wafrur nakam imnis raris sfasna faro au ro bonya bori kwar."
58008006	Ḇape baboine Yesus isma nasan imam ḇeba syadi, ro fararur imam sifrur na. Snar asas ḇeyaḇek epen ḇyeḇefrur rofandu Allah kuker snonkaku, ikada imnis Manfandu ro ḇaḇeasas ḇeḇye syadi, snar roi ḇeradine neknam ro asas ḇekaki syadi.
58008007	Snar rofyor asas ḇeyaḇek ḇepon ani fyarorewḇa kada, nari faindaḇa fakofrur asas ḇeyaḇek ḇeḇesuruya.
58008008	Ḇape Allah isrow farorew ani ro kawasa ḇyesi, isof ikofen: "Mkoswarepen nari fafisu iyama, nari yafrur asas ḇebabo kuker kawasa yesi Israel, ma kawasa Yehuda.
58008009	Asas ani imnis kuker asas yafrur kwar kuker kpu sesiḇa rofafisu yakfin si fasisasyarbur sup Masir. Sḇeuser asas yafrur faro siyaḇa, rarirya yafandun siḇa.
58008010	Ḇape baboine, asas yafrur faro kawasa Israel ro rasras nari ḇerama, rarirya Manseren ikofen: Nari yaker sasoser ayena ro kakara sena, ma neḇefas ro sisnesna. Nari yaḇe Allah ḇesi, ma nari sḇekawasa ḇeaya.
58008011	Ma osoḇa rofandu si fyandun ḇyuk farkarkor faro kina min ḇyesi, robaido ifkai faro naek byesi: 'Mkofawi Manseren kada!' Snar sikam, ḇeba kasun, nari sifawi aya.
58008012	Nari yapyos sasar sena, ma yafanander na."
58008013	Snar ifkaiḇair asas ḇebabo oso, Allah ifrur asas ḇepon ḇekwar ani faipromes fasaw.
58009001	Asas ḇeyaḇekepen ḇepon isma sasoser ḇaḇeari, ma isma kako moḇ ḇaḇeari snonkaku sifrur na.
58009002	Sifrur rum kruḇen oser ḇarpondi sniriḇe Moḇ Ḇesren. Rodia isya paramrom ma meja kuker mamami ssḇuki fyarsarser faro Allah.
58009003	Roḇarpur kruḇen ḇeḇesuru ḇepandwas sim ḇesren ma sim Ḇesren Syadiya.
58009004	Ro sim Ḇesren Syadi ani isya rokef ḇekun mamboḇo, sifruri ro brawen, ma isya kako Burua Asas soweri kam kuker brawen. Ro Burua ani dori isya sek brawen ḇeser mamami (manna), Harun ankyon ḇyedi ḇekpirew kwar, ma karufas risuru sḇukfasepen Allah sasoser samfur ḇyena.
58009005	Ro Burua ani sosef ḇyedi isya fanir malaikat risuru roi ḇekenem ḇeḇeprer ḇekakopḇair Allah isya. Prer ro fanir malaikat ansu skambreres robo moḇ snepek rik, ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar. Ḇape fafisu ine nari kawos roi ḇeḇor anna kamba.
58009006	Rarirya srir roi ḇeḇor anna ro moḇ ḇesren ani. Ma rasras kam imamsya ssun ro rum kruḇen ani sim ḇero ḇarponya fasḇeari.
58009007	Ro sim ḇeḇesuru ro rum kruḇen ani imam ḇebaya derer i ḇesunya. Ifararur rodia ḇerarwan oser monda ro wampasi wambarek oser, ma ifararur rodia dun rik ḇyukfarser warek faro Allah snar mankundi sasar ḇyena ma snar kawasa ḇyesi sasar sena sifrur ḇo sḇaḇirḇana.
58009008	Kuker sasoser ine, Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk farkarkor isnai ḇeko, rofyor sim ḇepon ro rum kruḇen ani ḇarpon ḇyedi isya kaker, nyan kosunyoḇ Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ani nari syeḇen ḇaim.
58009009	Ine ḇyewos peper ro awar baboine. Isoine farsarser ma aiwan sikun ḇesom faro Allah, nari nafrur mnis ḇeḇuk farsarser ansi sisnesnaḇa.
58009010	Snar nakam nun monda marisen ḇeroḇean, aninem ma farsarser syoso-syoso, nama sasoser faro kankenem baken, nari ndarirya rawoo isof fafisu Allah ifrur ḇaḇebaboya.
58009011	Ḇape Kristus ryama kwar, imnis Imam Ḇeba ro roi ḇeḇye ḇerama kwar: Rum kruḇen moḇ ḇaḇeari ifrur fararur ḇyeja roya imnis Imam Ḇeba ikada, Rum kruḇen ḇeba syadi ma ḇemnis syadi, snonkaku sifrur ḇa, --isoine ḇeḇeknam ro supswan ineḇa, --
58009012	Kristus syun ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ani ḇerarawan oser ma imnis isof fyoro-fyoro. Rofafisu ani dun domba som ono rik senaḇa roḇaido lembu mkuno rik ḇyenaḇa faḇyukfarser, ḇape ḇyuk mankundi rik ḇyena, rarirya ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei ḇekain fyoro-fyoro ḇeko.
58009013	Snar rofyor domba snon oso rik ḇyena ma lembu snon oso rik ḇyena fnoḇek oref ro lembu mkun sikun ḇesom, snepekna faro ḇearwaremsya isof sisren ro baken monda,
58009014	ḇape Kristus rik ḇyena nasyadi ro Rur ḇekain fyoro, Kristus ḇyuk mankundi fyarserḇe Allah kwar raris som ḇefarorewḇa, rik ḇyena nfasren kosnesna ro fararur kankenem ḇekaku ḇaya insa koḇeari faro Allah ḇekenemya.
58009015	Snar rarirya, ro Kristus, Allah ifrur asas ḇeyabekepen babo oso insa ḇesma fararyor kwar ro Allah sisma ḇok ḇekain fyoro Allah ḇyeasas kwarya. Nakam ndarirya snar oso imar kwar, isoine Kristus ma marmar ḇyedi ḇyuk ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku, sasar sifrur rofafisu asas ḇeyaḇekepen ḇepon ani isya kaker.
58009016	Rofafisu syap romowi isya, rodia sikofen ḇadir snonkaku ḇefrur romowi ani imar kwar.
58009017	Snar syap romowi ani kyaku ḇa, rofyor ḇefruriya isya ikenem. Syap ani kyaku rofyor ḇefruriya imar kwar.
58009018	Rarirya snaro asas ḇeyaḇekepen ḇepon ani ḇyeḇekarem namuk kuker rikḇa.
58009019	Randakya Moses ikofen ḇadir kam sasoser Refo Yahudi faro er Israel ḇesiper; posa kwar Moses dun lembu mkun rik ḇyena ma domba snon rik ḇyena, irḇaren na kuker war, ḇarpurya nyepek na ro syap Allah ma er Israel ḇesiper kuker dombabur ḇeafuk ma hisop (ajumek ram),
58009020	ma ikofen, ḇo doḇo: "Inekada rik ḇeḇeasas ḇeyabek epen Allah ifrur ḇemko."
58009021	Ḇarpurya Moses nyepek rik anna kako ro Rum kruḇen ḇaḇeari ma roi ḇeḇor ssḇuki isyom Allah na.
58009022	Rarirya siso sasoser Refo Yahudi, roi ḇeḇor kam neḇefasren kuker rik; inja sasar nasma payasyos rofyor rikya isbawer.
58009023	Kuker nyan ḇeradine roi ḇeḇor ḇeḇekakop ro roi ḇeḇesya nane ro boiyaswa, neḇefasren. Ḇape roi ḇeḇor ro boiyaswa ḇardi nefandun som ḇeḇye syadi.
58009024	Snar Moḇ Ḇesren Kristus syun roya moḇ snonkaku sifrur risyaḇa. Moḇ ani ḇyekakop monda ro Moḇ Ḇesren ḇekakuya. Kristus mankundi syun ro boiyaswa isrow Allah fadawawos fandun koḇena.
58009025	Imam Ḇeba Yahudi wampasi wambarek nakam syun ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ro Allah Rum ḇyedi dun rik ro aiwan oso. Ḇape Kristus syun faḇyuk mankundi fyarser kaḇer ḇesya kwar ḇa.
58009026	Snar rarirya ido, randak supswan ine ḇyeḇefrurya, isma kandera ḇesya kwar. Ḇape kofawi baboine ro awar ḇepupes ine, ryama ḇerarwan oser monda faipyos sasar kuker ḇyuk mankundi ḇefarsarser.
58009027	Allah ikofen kwar mboi snonkaku simar ḇerarwan oser munda, posa kwar Allah kyakara si.
58009028	Rarirya kako Kristus ḇyefarsarser ḇerarwan oser monda imnis som ḇepyos sasar snonkaku sibor. Nari ryama wer ḇerarwan ḇeḇesuruya ḇyar sasar werḇa, mboi ḇyuk koreri faro snonkaku ḇewaf rarama ḇyedi.
58010001	Ro sasoser Refo Yahudiya ḇyuk monda nin ro koreri nari ḇeramaya, ḇape nin ro koreri ḇardiḇa. Wampasi wambarek nakam samsom ssḇuk ḇefarsarser namnis ḇesyakwar monda. Inja rariso sasoser Refo Yahudi ma samsom ḇerarirya nbuk manasnis faro snonkaku ḇerama ḇesyom Allahsyake?
58010002	Ma snonkaku ḇesyom Allah seḇefasren kaku kwar ro sasar, nari sḇaḇir sḇesasar wer ḇa, ma nari simnai ro ssḇuk som.
58010003	Ḇape samsom ro wampasi wambarek nakam nḇuk swarepen faro snonkaku sasar sena.
58010004	Snar lembu snon rik ḇyena ma domba snon rik ḇyena nari napyos sasar ḇa.
58010005	Rarirya rofafisu Kristus syun ḇesupswan ine, ikofen faro Allah: "Aw wamarisen ḇa som ma farsarser ḇape fasos kwar baken oso ḇeaya.
58010006	Wamarisen ḇa som aiwan ḇekun imnis farsarser oroḇaido samsom ssḇuk farser faḇepyos sasar.
58010007	Inja yakofen: 'Ayaisoine, o Allah! Yarama insa yafrur marisen bedi, imnis fasfas ḇekur aya ro syap ḇeniw ine.' "
58010008	Randakya Kristus ikofen: "Wamarisen ḇa som ma farsarser; wamarisen ḇa som aiwan ḇekun imnis farsarser ma samsom ḇepyos sasar." Kristus ikofen rarirya, ḇape som ḇeḇor anna ssḇuk farser siso sasoser Refo Yahudi.
58010009	Ma ḇarpurya Kristus ikofen: "Aya isoine, o Allah! Yarama insa yafrur marisen bedi." Rarirya Allah ipyos som-som ḇekwar ḇeḇor anna kam, isadwer na kuker Kristus raris som ḇebabo.
58010010	Ma snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, Yesus Kristus fyasren ko kam ro sasar kuker som ro Yesus mankundi ḇyeḇefarser ḇerarwan oser monda isof fyoro-fyoro.
58010011	Imam Yahudi oser-oser ifrur fararur ḇyedi ro ras oser-oser, ma fyarser kaḇer ḇesyakwar som ḇemnis nari ḇepyos sasar ḇa.
58010012	Kristus ḇyuk farsarser som oser monda snar sasar, som ani kyain rawo isof fyoro-fyoro. Posa kwar Kristus kyain ro Allah ḇar raku ḇyedi ma ḇyuk sasoser fnoḇek Allah.
58010013	Ma baboine Kristus iwaf isof Allah ifrur mbroḇ ḇyesi faskafyo faroi.
58010014	Snar kuker som oser monda, Kristus ifrur snonkaku ḇesma ḇaḇefasren ro sasar, fasinapes isof fyoro-fyoro.
58010015	Ma roi ḇeḇesya ani Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuk ḇaḇesaksi ḇeko. Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen:
58010016	" 'Ine kada asas nari yafrur faro si ro rasras nari ḇerama,' Manseren ikofen, 'Nari yarir sasoser yena ro sisnesna, ma yaker na ro kakara sena.'
58010017	'Nari yafanander sasar ma ḇarḇor sena.' "
58010018	Inja, sasar ma ḇarḇor anna neḇepyos kwar fandun fasḇuk som ḇaḇepayasyos sasar wer ḇa.
58010019	Inja naek srar, baboine kuker marmar Yesus ani ḇyuk makakei fakosun ro Moḇ Ḇesren Syadi ani,
58010020	snar Yesus syeḇen kwar nyan babo oso ḇeko, isoine nyan ḇeḇuk kankenem. Nyan ani dunuk kruḇen eruk, isoine Yesus mankundi baken ḇyedi,
58010021	ma kona snon oso ḇeḇe Imam Ḇeba ḇeḇeḇru ro Allah Rum ḇyedi.
58010022	Inja, mkorama kofanam Allah kuker sne ḇenapes ma kakyar ḇekaku beri, snar kosnesna neḇeḇan sren ro ḇaḇaḇir sasar, ma ḇaken koḇena neḇeḇan sren kwar kuker war ḇesren.
58010023	Mkorama kufnako ro rosai kokarem imnis raris kakyar koḇedi, snar kokyar Allah nari ḇyuk raris asas ḇyedi.
58010024	Mkorama kokarayaye insa kodifyae ko, insa kofrur roi ḇeḇye ma kofasna saswarya.
58010025	Koḇinkwanbur awer fananjur kayam ro ḇaḇeari koḇena, imnis snonkaku ono sifrur kwar, ḇape mkorama kanun yaeko, snar kofawi mboi fyoroḇa wer nari Manseren ryama.
58010026	Snar rofyor Allah ḇaryas ḇyedi sikofen i kwar maḇeko, ḇape kofrur sasar ḇesyakwar, kuker famamyun nari som oso isyaḇa faipyos sasar koḇena.
58010027	Ḇape isya faroko isoine kofanam Allah kakara ḇenapes ḇyedi ma for masasor Allah nari ḇekunpres snonkaku ḇesampum isya.
58010028	Ro ḇeponiwara ḇesampum sasoser Moses ḇyuknasya nari sisma payasyos ro sasar senaḇa mboi sisma samamyai ma marmar, rofyor saksi risuru roḇa kior sesaksi snonkaku ani ḇyesasar kaku ḇeri.
58010029	Rariso samamyai ḇemarḇak ssḇuk faro snonkaku ḇekoryae Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, snonkaku ḇekofen rik asas ḇefasreni darwarem, ma snonkaku ḇekoryae saswar-fakamaman Rurya?
58010030	Snar kofawi mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo: "Nari ayaiso ḇemunsuya. Ma kakuḇaḇoi nari mankundayaiso ḇemunsu na." Ma ikofen wer ḇo doḇo: "Nari Manseren ḇyemankara faro kawasa ḇyesi."
58010031	Ḇayesi ḇeyonef ansi nari simkak namsinḇaḇeri, rofyor sisapi ro Allah ḇekenemya ḇramin ḇyesuya.
58010032	Mkoswarepen fafisu ḇesyof. Rofyor ani mkosma kandera ḇemaḇak, ḇape snar mkosma Allah isna ḇyedi kwar inja mkofaḇri ma mkosusuḇa,
58010033	fafisu ono skoryae naek srar ma sifrur iḇyeḇa ro fababa. Fafisu ono kako mkun ḇar fnoḇek ḇesma kandera ansya.
58010034	Fafisu ono mkun kwar ḇar ro kandera samamyai snonkaku ma fafisu ono papus mkoḇena sfasyar na, mkosma roi ḇeḇesya nane kuker marisen monda, snar mkofawi nari mkona arasai ḇeḇye syadi ḇekain fyoro-fyoroya.
58010035	Rarirya mkorir awer kakyar mkoḇena, snar sasuref ḇeba isya iwaf.
58010036	Mkofandun kaku kaḇaḇaḇi insa mkofrur Allah marisen ḇyedi, ma rarirya nari mkosma rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar faro mko.
58010037	Snar sfas ro Refo radine, "Knikmkun monda wer, sfasna faḇerama ani, nari ryama; ma nari isusu rarama ḇyediḇa.
58010038	Ḇape snonkaku yesi ḇenapes nari ikenem; snar kakyar ḇyedi faro aya, ḇape rofyor fandusi ono sisusu, nari yamarisen siḇa."
58010039	Ḇape nkoine nkoḇeoser kuker ḇaḇeoserya ma ḇeḇorḇa, mboi nkoine kawasa ḇekyar faro Allah ma ḇesma kankenem.
58011001	Ḇaḇe kakyar ḇyeknam ro roi ḇeḇor kokyar ma bon ro roi ḇeḇor komam ḇaim na.
58011002	Snar kakyarya, sikofen ḇadir kwar kuker ḇaḇesaksi faro kpu koḇesi ro awar madero.
58011003	Snar kakyarya, kofawi mboi sansoren ḇoka ḇyeḇefrur kuker rosai Allah ikofen, isof rosai komam na ndarirya ro rosai komam ḇaim na.
58011004	Snar kakyarya, Habel ḇyuk farsarser kwar faro Allah kuker samsom ḇeḇye syadi ro samsom Kain ḇyena. Snar kakyar ḇyedi Allah nya Habel imnis snonkaku ḇenapes, snar Allah imarisen farsarser ḇyena. Habel imar kwar, ḇape snar kakyar ḇyedi, isya iwawos wer.
58011005	Snar kakyarya, Henokh imarḇa, mboi ḇyeḇekanow ma ḇyeḇeyun faro Allah. Snonkaku oso isrow iḇa kako, snar Allah i kanowi kwar. Sfas ro Refo mboi rofyor Henokh ḇyeḇekanow ḇaim, isma ḇaḇesaksi, ifrur marisen Allah ḇyedi kwar.
58011006	Kakyar isyaḇa, snonkaku osoḇa kako ifrur Allah marisen ḇyedi. Snar snonkaku ḇerama faro Allah, ikyar Allah isya, ma Allah myunsu faro ḇesewar kaku isya.
58011007	Snar kakyarya, Nuh isma swarapepen Allah ḇyuk faroi roi nari ḇerama ro ḇarpurya, ḇyeḇemam ḇaim ma snar Nuh ḇyesyowi Allah isof ifrur wai oso faḇyuk ḇeaski faro kina ḇyena; papupesya ssḇuk samamyai faro supswan, ḇape rofyor ani Allah fyasnai Nuh mankundi ḇeḇenapes snar kakyar ḇyedi.
58011008	Snar kakyarya, Abraham ḇyesyowi Allah rofafisu Allah dori ma iwani farya ḇemnu Allah ḇyeasas faroi, raimnai Abraham rya ḇoi ifawi moḇ iḇe ryayoḇya ḇa.
58011009	Kuker kakyar faro Allah, Abraham kyain ro mnu Allah ḇyeasas faroi ani imnis mandaman. Abraham kyain rodia ro rum kruḇen kuker Ishak ma Yakub, ḇeyaksma asas ani kako ro Allah.
58011010	Snar Abraham ikyar nari iḇe kyain ro mnu Allah dawya ma ḇyawes kuker araref ḇesambraḇ.
58011011	Snar kakyarya, Abraham ma Sara suyaḇen romawa kpu, rofyor Abraham ḇyemansar kaku kwar ma Sara ḇinkundi pyansnasem. Abraham ikyar nari Allah ifrur namnis asas ḇyedi.
58011012	Fafisu ani Abraham syambraḇ ḇa fanya romawa, ḇape romankundi daḇen kpu up sibor, dandonek sedi kokor napok siba-- simnis dandonek maksya ro nanki ma karyen mor ro swan andirya.
58011013	Sikam snonkaku ḇekyar faswef, isof rofafisu simar, ḇape sakmam ḇaim rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar, sikada smam mura rona monda ḇoi srar na kuker kakyar ro sisnesna, ma rarirya sfasna, sikada mandaman ma snon dakam ro supswan ine.
58011014	Snonkaku ḇekofen rarirya sfasnaibos mboi simarisen ssewar mnu kaku sedi.
58011015	Ḇape mnu seknam ro ma sibur kwar ani skaraya ḇa. Snar rarirya ido sisma fafisu kwar faskaḇer ḇemnu ani wer.
58011016	Ḇape baboine simarisen mnu oso ḇeḇye syadi, isoine mnu ro boiyaswa. Rarirya Allah imai ḇa sap iḇe Allah sedi, snar Allah fyasos mnu oso faro si kwar.
58011017	-
58011018	Snar kakyar kako, fafisu Allah imnasenpan Abraham, Abraham ḇyuk Ishak, romawa ḇyedi faḇyefarsarser som. Romawa Allah ḇyeasas ani ḇyuki faro Abraham kwar; ma romawa ani Allah ikofen kwar, "Ro Ishak inekada nari wasma kpu-up yaḇeasas faro aw." Rariryano Abraham imarisen ḇyuk romawa oser ḇyani kako.
58011019	Snar Abraham kyara Allah ipok ḇyuk kaḇer kankenem faro Ishak ro marmar ḇyedi -- inja kokofen raris Abraham isma kaḇer Ishak kwar ro marmar.
58011020	Snar kakyar, Ishak ḇyeasas ḇok-ḇok faro Yakub ma Esau ro ḇarpuriyama.
58011021	Snar kakyar, rofafisu Yakub imar ḇaim -- ikasandem ro ankyon ḇyedi ḇo ḇyansuba faro Allah -- Yakub ḇyuk ḇok ḇyena faro Yusuf romawa ḇyesuya.
58011022	Snar kakyar, Yusuf -- rofafisu fanam imar -- iwawos ro kawasa Israel nari sisasyarbur sup Masir. Raimnai kwar Yusuf ḇyuk ananun insa sfaduru rombronbyesya.
58011023	Snar kakyar, Moses sinan ḇyesuya suyokef i ḇepaik rikior rofyor Moses ḇyeḇeyaḇenya. Sumam romawa snon ani ipyum kaku, ma sumkak ḇa fasusampum wairek sasoser ḇyena.
58011024	Snar kakyar, Moses iba kwar imewer sap i ḇeromawa ro imboki wairek Masir.
58011025	Imarisen syadi ḇyekandera kuker Allah kawasa ḇyesi rofafisu kermkun ikenem ro marisen kankenem ḇesasar.
58011026	Moses ḇyaḇir maeja ḇesyadiya isma anonef kuker Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri Allah ḇyeasas ani ro isma arasai ḇeḇor ro mnu Masir; snar Moses ikyar sasuref ro ras ḇarpurya.
58011027	Snar kakyar, Moses ibur Masir kwar ma imkak ḇa wairek masasor ḇyedi. Moses imbran pdef ḇemoḇ ryayoḇya imnis raris myam kwar, Allah komam ḇaim ani.
58011028	Snar kakyar, Moses ifrur munara Paskah ma isasyar sasoser fakawasa Israel snepek rik ro rum sena ro kedwa na insa Malaikat Marmari myun awer romawa rak sesi.
58011029	Snar kakyar, kawasa Israel ssunuk Soren Ḇerik, raris simbran ro saprop ḇesyor, ma rofyor kawasa Masir sakunuksas kako ḇape soren ani doren si.
58011030	Snar kakyar, kawasa Israel simbran yaryar ayar karui Yerikho ras rifik, ma ayar karui ani imbroḇen.
58011031	Snar kakyar kako, Rakhab, bin ḇefrur farbuk ani sakmun iḇa fnoḇek kawasa ḇeḇeankarkar, snar fyaduru manpaf ro Israelsya.
58011032	O, yaḇe yawos pdef ḇape fafisu yena nabor ḇa, rofyor yamarisen yafarfyar ro Gideon, Barak, Simson, Yefta, Daud, Semuel ma nabisya.
58011033	Snar kakyarya, sḇefainda ro embroḇ kuker ḇaḇesasosersya. Sifrur rosai ḇenapes, isof sisma rosai Allah ḇyeasas faro si. Spanoser singasya sisḇasna,
58011034	sfasye for ḇeba. Sikfis kwar ro sumber ḇemamun. Sambraḇ ro raryarḇa sena; sambraḇ syadi ro embroḇ isof sifrur kafyo sararsya ro er mandaman.
58011035	Snar kakyar, bin-binsya sisma kaḇer kawasa ḇemar kwar sesi. Ḇape ono simarisen sisma kandera isof simar, simewer sisma mkei, snar simarisen sisma kaḇer kankenem ḇeḇye syadiya.
58011036	Kawasa ono kako sḇeḇekoryae, siprersi, sewanka si ma sesifa ssun ro bui.
58011037	Ssosi kuker karui isof simar, sisyoḇuksi, smunsi kuker sumber. Sinarbur kuker famamar ro domba kif roḇa kambing kif; ssabarar ma sifrur kandera si.
58011038	Supswan ine isyusḇa farosi. Sinarbur ro supḇeursḇa ma ro bon na, skain ro abyaḇ na ma ner ro saprop.
58011039	Fainda ḇeba kaku faro snonkaku sine snar kakyar sena! Ḇape sisma ḇaim rosai Allah ḇyeasas faro si.
58011040	Snar Allah fyasos kwar faro ko roi ḇemnis syadi; koisya ḇa ido nari sisma manasnisya ḇa.
58012001	Snar kona saksisya sibor ḇesiryaryar ko raris mandepna, eḇedari mkoramuma kosawen roi ḇemarḇakna ma sasar ḇekrof roko ma mkorama kofarmku koso famfaḇri sḇukma ḇeko.
58012002	Mkorama komam monda faro Yesus, snar i ḇefnoḇek ko faro ḇaḇekakyarya faro i ro randakya isof papupesya! Ḇyefandun ḇa imar ro apropya imnis roi oso ḇefrur mamyai. Iswarepen monda marisen nari ḇyaḇir ro ḇarpurya. Baboine ḇyuk sasoser fnoḇek Allah ro ḇar raku karapesa nasanya.
58012003	Mko karasas rariso Yesus kandera ḇyedi ro ḇarpon snonkaku ḇesasar ḇesampum i. Rarirya mkosambraḇ ma kakyar mkoḇena namuk awer.
58012004	Snar mkofaḇri mkosampum sasar, isof ro mkosasyar rik ḇaim.
58012005	Ma mkosampum awer Allah ananun ḇyena faro mko imnis kma oso dawawos kuker romawa ḇyesi! Allah ikofen, "Ne, rumkun yedi, kwara nabye rofyor Manseren fyarkor aw, ma kakyar mkoḇena namuk awer rofyor imsor mko.
58012006	Snar Manseren fyarkor snonkaku saneraro ḇyesi, ma iprer snonkaku kyarem imnis romawa ḇyesi."
58012007	Rofyor mkosma aprer ro Allah imnis raris farkarkor ro kma oso. Snar rariso romawa oso isma aprer ro kmari ḇa?
58012008	Rofyor mkoso aprer ḇyena ḇa imnis romawa fyarkor, mkoḇeromawa kaku ḇa, mboi mkoḇeromawa daḇyor.
58012009	Kosma kma ro supswan ine. Kosma farkarkor ro kma ani, ma nari koḇesyowi i. Rarirya kako faro kma rur koḇedi ro boiyaswa, kokenem syadi faroi insa kosma kankenem.
58012010	Sinan koḇesi ro supswan ine ssḇuk farkarkor rofyor ḇeknampu monda, ro rosai skara ḇeḇye. Ḇape Allah fyarkor ko faro ḇaḇye mankun koḇena, insa kosren fnoḇek i.
58012011	Rofyor sfarkor ko, aprer anna nbuk marisen ro kosnesna ḇa. Ḇape ro ḇarpurya, sfarkor kwar koya, koso kankenem Allah imarisen na, isof nbuk bon ḇeḇaḇir aski maro ko.
58012012	Snar rarirya swambraḇser ḇramin ḇemor bedi ma wepur ḇeradadai bedi.
58012013	Wambran ro nyan ḇepyom insa wemin ḇeryarḇa bedi ryosdis awer mboi iprei.
58012014	Besewar wakenem kuker aski faro kawasa kam, ma faḇri fawakenem nasren kuker Manseren, snar kuker nyan ine ḇa snonkaku osoḇa nari myam Manseren.
58012015	Mkowaren insa snon oso ḇaḇeri isasyarbur awer Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyedi, insa ono simnis awer rokaker ḇemamur rofandu naek srar isof nḇuk rakrakrok ma makakok snonkaku ḇeḇor kuker mamur ḇyedi.
58012016	Mkowaren insa mkokenem ro farḇuk awer roḇaido mkofandunḇa rosai ḇesren, imnis raris Esau, ḇyoḇ nasan romawa rawer ḇyedi kuker roḇean ben oser monda.
58012017	Snar mkofawi mboi ro ḇarpurya Esau imarisen isma ḇok ani ro kmari, ḇape ḇyeḇepampum. Esau dor kuker kankanes, ḇape isma fafisu osoḇa fa fyadwer sasar ḇyena.
58012018	Snar mkaksrow roi oso ḇaim imnis er Israel fyoriwara sisrow kwar. Sisrow bon span roya, isoine Bon Sinai kuker for ḇesber ḇyena; sisrow ḇaḇepampan, fnureḇ ma wam doḇer,
58012019	sisrow kḇur ḇerok, ma mkaren ḇerok nababos. Rofafisu kawasa Israel ansi srower mkaren ani, sor insa mkaren ani dawawos kaker faro si awer.
58012020	Snar ssambraḇ srower mkaren ani ḇa ro sasoser ḇyuk na. Snar mkaren ani ikofen, "Rofyor aiwanke roḇa manseirya wer kako, ḇefanam bon ine, nari ḇyeḇeso kuker karui isof imar."
58012021	Ma rosai kawasa Israel smam ani dun nyawa isof Moses ikofen, "Yamkak ma yaradai!"
58012022	Ḇape mkora kwar ḇe Bon Sion Allah mnu ḇekenem ḇyedi, isoine Yerusalem ro boiyaswa kuker malaikat syaran-syaran ḇyesi.
58012023	Ma mkorower raryaḇ fananjur oso--fananjur Allah rumkun rak ḇyesi, snonsnon sena neḇefas epen ro boiyaswa. Mkorower Allah, Mankara ro snonkaku kam. Mkosrow snonkaku ḇeḇye rur sesi sifrur faḇemnis kwar.
58012024	Ma mkosrow Yesus manfandu ḇeyun asas ḇebabo ḇeyaḇek epen ani; mkosrow rik ḇesepek ḇefaduru roi ḇeḇye syadiya ro fadaduru Habel rik ḇyedi.
58012025	Rarirya mkepen mko imbude ḇeyawawos ani mkomewer mkorower indi. Rofyor simewer simnafi, ḇefkai ḇayir Allah wos ḇyedi ro sup ine, nari sikfisbur ḇa, isyadi wer koine ḇemnaf i ḇeyawawos ro boiyaswa ani! Rofyor komewer komnaf i, rariso nari kokfisbur i?
58012026	Rofafisu ani mkaren ḇyedi imkiker sup ine. Ḇape baboine ḇyuk asas kwar, "Nari yamkiker ḇerarwan oser wer, sup ine derer monda ḇa mboi nanki kako."
58012027	Wos "ḇerarwan oser wer" fyasna roi ḇeḇor kam sifrur faḇemkiker kwar anna, nari sena fanakrenbur insa ḇemkiker ḇa na nkain faswef.
58012028	Inja kokofen kasumasa faro Allah, snar kosma kwar ro Allah ḇaḇesasoser oso nari ḇemarmer ḇa. Inja kokofen kasumasa ma koḇeari kuker kakyar faro Allah kuker syowi ma makakak, imnis raris Allah mankundi marisen ḇyedi.
58012029	Snar Allah koḇedi imnis for ḇekun.
58013001	Inja mkoswaryae mko imnis raris kawasa Kristen ḇeḇemanbekanaek.
58013002	Mkofanander awer mkoḇuk moḇ ḇeḇeryar faro snonkaku, snar fararur ḇorarirya snonkaku ono kuker fawawi ḇa sedakam malaikat ono kwar.
58013003	Mkoswarepen snonkaku ḇesma samamyai ro bui, imnis mkoisya kuker si ro bui kako. Ma snonkaku sifrur mnis ḇa, mkoswarepen si imnis mko kako sakfrur mko rarirya.
58013004	Mko kam mkoḇesyowi fakawawinya, eḇedari imbeswasya sesyowiyae si. Snar ḇefrur farḇuk ma ḇefrur ḇarḇor nari Allah ḇyuk samamyai faro si.
58013005	Mkormomen pipi awer, mboi mkokenem imnis kuker rosai isya faro mko. Snar Allah ikofen kwar, "Nari yarir aw ḇa ma nari yabur aw ḇa."
58013006	Rarirya kuker kakyar kokofen: "Manseren ifnoḇek aya, inja nari yamkak ḇa. Snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ifrur roi oso maḇe aya!"
58013007	Mkofanander awer manfarkin mkoḇesi, ḇefkai ḇair Allah wos ḇyedi faro mko kwar. Mkoswarepen kankenem ḇepupes sena ma mkokyar faro Allah ma mkofrur farari kakyar ma fararur sena.
58013008	Yesus Kristus fyarwe ḇa, ro ḇeponiwara, baboine, isof fyoro-fyoro.
58013009	Mkomam monda awer farkarkor syoso-syoso ḇeḇor ḇefarkor ninyan mko. Allah ḇaḇye ḇyedi ifrur mkosnemna fanamku, mboi sasoser ro roḇean ḇa. Snar kawasa ḇepon ansi sisouser sasoser anna ḇape sisma fainda oso ḇa.
58013010	Kona rokef farsarser oso fakobuk farsarser som faro Allah. Ma imamsya ḇeyuffarmyan ro rum kruḇen ḇaḇeariya nari san rosai isyaro rokef farsarser ani ḇaḇeri.
58013011	Aiwan rik ssḇuk farsarser imnis som ḇepyos sasar, Imam ḇebaya dun iḇe Moḇ Ḇesren Syadiya ro rum kruḇen ani dori; ḇape aiwan kraf ani kada ḇyeḇerap ro rum kruḇen ani ḇandiri.
58013012	Rarirya Yesus kako imar ro kedwai ḇeba ro mnuya ḇandiri faipyos kawasa ḇyesi sasar sena kuker rik mankundi ḇyedi.
58013013	Snar rarirya mkorama kora faro i ro rum kruḇen ani ḇandiri ma kosma anonef kuker i.
58013014	Snar ro sup ine moḇ ḇekain fyoro oso faro koḇa; inja kosewar mnu nari ḇeramumaya.
58013015	Rarirya kuker Yesus mkorama kosandik Allah ḇesya kwar; ine imnis som kasumasa koḇena faroi, isoine sanandik ro sḇadon koḇena faro snonsnon ḇyedi.
58013016	Mkofanander awer mkofrur roi ḇeḇye ma mkofnoḇekyae mko, snar Allah i marisen samsom ḇerarirya.
58013017	Mkoḇeuser manfarkin-manfarkin mkoḇesi, ma mkoḇesyowi faro sikada, snar siwaren ḇesya kwar rur mkoḇesi ma skarem faro Allah. Rofyor mkoḇeuser si, nari sifararur kuker marisen; rofyor rarirya ḇa, nari sifararur kuker fafafko, snar roi ḇerarirya nbuk fainda osoḇa faro mko.
58013018	Mkonadiwarek ḇesya kwar faro nko; snar nkokyar nkosnesna nasren, snar nkomarisen nkofrur roi ḇenapes ḇesya kwar.
58013019	Yor faro mkerer, mkonadiwarek aya, insa Allah dun kaḇer aya fasaw faro mko.
58013020	Allah ḇyawes kwar Manseren koḇedi Yesus ro marmar. Snar marmar ḇyedi, baboine ḇye Manfarandous Ḇeba maro ko imnis domba-domba ḇyesi. Marmar ḇyedi kako ḇyuk kaku ro Allah asas ḇyedi ḇekain fyoroya.
58013021	Allah knam askiya fyasos mko kuker roi ḇeḇye kada, mkofandun famkofrur imnis marisen ḇyedi. Kuker Yesus Kristus manfandu Allah, ifrur maro ko rosai imarisenya. Sanandik fyoro-fyoro faro Kristus! Amin.
58013022	Yor ro mko, naek srar, insa mkokara wos ananun ayenane kuker kaḇaḇaḇ kada, snar syap ayedine ikwan mankenem ḇa.
58013023	Mkofawi naek koḇani Timotius sisasyar i kwar ro bui. Rofyor ryama kwar ro moḇ ayedine, nari yuni rofyor yaḇe yarakaki mko.
58013024	Mkokofen ḇadir aroo ayedi faro manfarkin mkoḇesi kam ma faro Allah kawasa ḇyesi kam. Naek srar ro Italia kako sfarem aroo faro mko kam.
58013025	Manseren ḇyebok naek srar mko kam kada.
59001001	Ro aya, Yakobus, Allah ma Manseren Yesus Kristus manfamyan suḇedi yafarem aroo faro keret samfur seser risuru ḇekakek ro supswan ine.
59001002	Naek srar ayesi, rofyor mkosapi ro fafrowes ḇeḇor, mkokarana imnis aski oso,
59001003	snar mkofawi, mboi manasnasen ḇekur kakyar mkoḇena nbuk ḇaḇenamu faro mko.
59001004	Ma ḇaḇenamu ani ḇyuk bon ḇemku, insa mkomnis ma mkosiper ma mkananjar awer roi ono kako kada.
59001005	Ḇape rofyor rofandu mko ono sisya smamkarkir mnis ḇa ido, sor mamkarkir ani ro Allah kada, ḇeḇuk faro snonkaku kam kuker sanemura ma ḇeyor kaḇerna ḇa,-- inja roi anna nari neḇeḇuk faroi.
59001006	Inja dorna kuker kakyar, ma ḇyeḇirḇar awer, snar ḇeḇeḇirḇar simnis kuker ḇak ro soren, wamya dun mura-muma.
59001007	Snonkaku ḇerarirya kyara awer nari isma roi oso ro Manseren.
59001008	Snar snonkaku ḇeḇesnemandu nari iknon ro kenem ḇyedi ḇa.
59001009	Kawasa Kristen ḇesaḇarar siryaḇ kada rofyor Allah ikanow si.
59001010	Ma kawasa Kristen ḇeḇekayan siryaḇ kako kada, rofyor Allah ryun si. Snar snonkaku ḇeḇekayan nari sipromes imnis aḇris pampen.
59001011	Snar ori dek kuker samsam ḇeyosuk ma ḇefrur maryoi aḇris ansi, isof pampen sesi skapaf ma sananai ḇepyum sena ndo. Rarirya kako kuker ḇeḇekayansya; rofandu ḇaḇesewar ḇeḇor sena nari napromes.
59001012	Aski faro snonkaku ḇedworen ro fafrowesna, ma dores nako kwar ro manasnasen ido, nari isma wower kankenem Allah ḇyeasas faro mansei ḇeswar Allah.
59001013	Rofyor snonkaku oso isma fafrowes ido ikofen awer: "Fafrowes ine ryama ro Allah!" Snar ḇarḇorya ipok ifrowes Allah ḇa, ma Allah mankundi ifrowespan manseirya ḇa kako.
59001014	Ḇape snonkaku oser-oser isma fafrowespan snar mankundi rmomen baken ḇyena, nasmeri ma nadenemi.
59001015	Ma ḇaḇermomen baken ani ḇyebon kwar daḇen sasar; ma rofyor sasar imku kwar, daḇen marmari.
59001016	Naek srar yaswar kaku, mkoḇor awer!
59001017	Roi ḇeḇye ma ḇemnis kosmana ndamaker boiyaswa, Allah ḇyena fanado, i ḇefrur isnai ḇeḇor kam ro nanki.
59001018	Kuker marisen ḇyedi i frur ko kwar kuker wos ḇenapes ḇyedi, insa kosma moḇ ḇepon fakoḇe romawa rak rofandu roi ḇekenem kam ifrurna.
59001019	Ne, naek srar yaswar kaku, mkoswarepen: Mko kam mkosamberen famkomnaf, ḇape mkowawos ma mkomasasor fasaw awer kako;
59001020	snar masasor snonkaku nafrur roi ḇenapes ono ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇa.
59001021	Inja mkosawen roi ḇemamasna kam ma ḇarḇor ḇeborna kam ma kuker randun sne mkona Allah wos ḇyedi kyer kwar ro mkosnemna, nari ḇeḇuk koreri faro rur mkoḇesi.
59001022	Ḇape mkuffarmyan wos ani ma mkorower monda awer; snar rarirya ḇaido mkoḇeankar mankun mko.
59001023	Snar snon oso imnaf monda wosya ma ifrur ḇaido, imnis kuker snon oso ḇemam mankundi ro kansinai.
59001024	Kniko fasaw myam mankundi, raimnai rya ma ḇyeprobos moḇ isnairaya.
59001025	Ḇape mansei ḇekukeḇ sasoser ḇemnis anna isoine sasoser ḇeḇuk ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku, ma ḇyenamu faḇyeuserna, inja ryower monda ma fyananderna ḇa, ḇape ifrur kakuḇerina, nari isma aski ro fararur ḇyena.
59001026	Rofyor snon oso kyara mankundiḇe ḇeḇeari nasrawen, ḇape fyarmku ramar ḇyedi ḇa, ḇyeankar mankundi, ma ḇaḇeari ḇyena nefromo.
59001027	Ḇaḇeari ḇekaku ma ḇefarorewḇa ro Allah, Kma koḇedi ḇarpon ḇyedi, isoine ryakaki awak param ma kabomsya ro ananjar sena, ma ḇyesasor mankundi insa supswan ine ifrur mamas aweri.
59002001	Naek srar ayesi, imnis snonkaku ḇekyar faro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi ḇepoksyadi, kakyar ani mkofrur i kuker mkomam karyer awer.
59002002	Snar, rofyor snon oso syun ro fananjur mkoḇedi kuker iwur kawin brawen ma syansun sansun ḇepyum ma snon ḇesaḇarar oso kako ryama daksun kuker sansun ḇepyum ba,
59002003	ma nari mkoḇesyowi snonkaku ḇesansun-sansun ḇepyum ani ma mkokofen faroi: "Tuan kwain ro moḇ ḇeḇye ine!" -- mboi faro snonkaku ḇesaḇarar ani mkokofen: "Wores rodiwa!" roḇa: "Kwain rosop fanam wemin ayesi!"
59002004	Mkofawiḇake mkofrur kwar ḇaḇemambaḇir ro mkosnemna ma mkofrur imnis mankara kuker kakara ḇeḇarḇor?
59002005	Mkomnaf naḇye, ne naek srar yaswar kaku! Mkofawiḇake Allah kyinfir snonkaku supswan ine skaraḇe ḇesaḇarar fasekayan ro kakyar ma sepusaka ro ḇaḇesasoser Allah ḇyeasas kwar faro mansei ḇeswarisya?
59002006	Ḇape mkokoryae snonkaku ḇesabararsya kwar. Mkofawiḇake snonkaku ḇeḇekayan siso ḇeḇewayam mko ma ḇesmer mko ḇekankain karkara ḇenapes?
59002007	Mkofawiḇake siso ḇeyonef snonsnon ḇesma syowi syadi, eḇedari Allah nya mko?
59002008	Ḇape, rofyor mkofruruser sasoser ḇepon sfas ro Refo: "Waswar snonkaku min besi imnis waswar mankundaw."
59002009	Ḇape, mkomam karyer ido, mkofrur sasar, ma mkoḇeyuk Allah sasoser ḇyena.
59002010	Snar mansei ḇeḇeuser sasoser ḇeḇor anna kam, ḇape ḇyeuser mnuk osoḇa rona, ḇyesasar farona kam.
59002011	Snar ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo: "Wafrur farbuk awer," Ikofen kako: "Mamun awer." Inja mkofrur farbuk ḇa ḇape mkomamun, rarirya mkoḇeyuk sasoserna kako.
59002012	Mkawos ma mkofrur imnis snonkaku nari ḇesun ro ḇaḇemankara kuker sasoser ḇeḇuk makakei faro snonkaku.
59002013	Snar ḇaḇemankara ḇena saswari isyaḇa nari ryarirya faro ḇesaswar ḇasya. Ḇape saswari nari ḇyuk fainda faro mankaraya.
59002014	Fainda rosai, naek srar ayesi, rofyor oso ikofen, ikada nya kakyarya, ḇape fyasna ro rari fararur ḇyena ḇa? Nari kakyar berarirya ḇyuk koreri faroike?
59002015	Rofyor naek oso roḇa srar oso isma sansun ḇa ma dananjar roḇean ro ras-ras,
59002016	ma snonkaku oso rofandu mko ikofen: "Parperoo, swabusum maramuk ma wanan rao warbor!" -- ḇape ḇyuk rosai ḇeḇefandun faroiḇa, fainda rosai ro wos anna?
59002017	Rarirya kako kuker kakyarya: Kakyarya ifnoḇek farararur ḇa, kakyar ani imar.
59002018	Ḇape nari snonkaku ono sisya sikofen: "Faro aw kakyarya isya ma faro aya fararurya isya," nari yakarem faroi: "Fasna maro aya kakyar bedi fnoḇek fararur ḇa, ma nari yafasna faro aw kakyar ayedi kuker fararurna."
59002019	Wakyare, snar Allah oser monda isya. Ḇape rodursya kako sikyar rarirya ma sradai.
59002020	Ne, snonkaku ḇefawiroyoḇa, wamarisen fakwarem ro knikine, mboi kakyar kuker fararur ḇa irya kakyar ḇeḇefainda ḇa?
59002021	Mkofawiḇake Abraham kma koḇedi, ssḇuk napnapes faroi snar fararur ḇyena, rofyor ḇyuk romawa ḇyedi Ishak ḇefarsarser, ro rokef farsarserya?
59002022	Mkomam, mboi kakyarya fyasna ifararur kayam kuker fararurya rarirya kakyar ani imnis.
59002023	Rarirya mnuk ro Refo ḇekofen: "Abraham ikyar faro Allah, ma Allah kyori ḇeḇenapes." Eḇedari Abraham sapiḇe: "Allah bati ḇyedi."
59002024	Inja mkomam, mboi snonkakusya sisma napnapesya snar fararur sena ma snar kakyar monda ḇa.
59002025	Mkofawiḇake Rakhab, bin befrur farbuk ani kako, isma napnapes snar fararur ḇyena, rofyor iyokef manpaf Israel ro rum ḇyedi, raimnai fyaspar si ro nyan oso ḇese?
59002026	Snar imnis baken ḇena rur ḇa irya kakyar ḇemar rirya, rarirya kako kakyar fnoḇek fararur ḇa irya kakyar ḇemar rirya kako.
59003001	Naek srar ayesi, rofandu mko sibor simarisen seguru awer; snar kofawi, mboi ḇaḇeguruya nari kosma mankara imnis warnkyara ḇemarḇak syadi.
59003002	Snar kokam kosasar ro roi nabor; mansei ḇesasar ḇa kuker wos ḇyena, ikada snonkaku ḇenapes, ma nari fyara baken ḇesiper ḇyedi kako.
59003003	Korir pisan ro kudaya sḇadon ḇyedi, insa iso marisen koḇena, kuker nyan ḇerarirya kako koḇuki fyara baken ḇesiper ḇyedi.
59003004	Ma komam monda faro jawarana, naba rariso wer ma wamdoḇerna nmunna rariso, ḇape neḇefara kuker remis kasun imnis manfaraya marisen ḇyedi.
59003005	Rarirya ramarya kako, ḇyekina ḇeba ḇa ro baken, ḇesyaḇo imararesi kuker roi ḇebana. Mkomam for ḇeba ḇa kako wer, ḇape ikun supna mnuk ḇesiper.
59003006	Ramarya imnis for kako. Ro baken koḇeja ramar ani ḇyeknam ro ḇarḇor fakyakek ḇarḇorya ro baken ḇesiper koḇedi. Kuker for ḇeḇeknam ro for ḇembrerḇa, for ani ikun kankenem ḇesiper koḇedi.
59003007	Aiwan ḇeḇor ḇekafdirsya kam, isoine: mansya, aiwan ḇeyanawer, ma insya snonkakusya sḇesi fasfafir kwar.
59003008	Ḇape snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri ipok faḇye ramarya fafyafir; ramar ani roi oso ḇeyan ḇepek, ma kopok i ḇa, ma ifo kuker inamer ḇeḇuk marmar.
59003009	Kuker ramarya kosandik Manseren. Kma koḇedi; ma kuker ramarya kofras snonkaku Allah fyanir faḇemnis mankundi,
59003010	ro sḇadon oser ani isasyar ḇaḇok ma fafras. Inja naek srar ayesi roi ḇeradine ndarirya awer.
59003011	Isyake war ḇeprim ma war ḇesarmar susasyar ro war sun oser?
59003012	Naek srar ayesi, isyake imyui knam imarem ḇeawai bon ma isyake ur knam imarem ḇesrai bon? Rarirya kako sun ḇemasmasen nari ḇyuk war ḇeprim ba.
59003013	Mansei rofandu mko ḇefawinanem ma ḇena fawawi? Kuker kankenem ḇeḇye fyasna fararur ḇyena ro mamamkarkir ma ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ kada.
59003014	Rofyor mkokram masasor ma mkofandun mankun mko, mkomarares mankun mko awer ma mkankarkar ḇo mkosampum awer ḇaḇenapnapesya!
59003015	Inja irya ido fawawi nanem ḇerama ro boiyaswa ḇa, mboi ro supswan, ro snonkaku nafsu-rmomen sena, ro rudur ḇemaḇak.
59003016	Inja ro moḇ kokram masasor ma kofandun mankun ko rodia isya anunḇesisye ma fararur ḇeḇor ḇeḇarḇorna naisya.
59003017	Ḇape fawawinanem ḇerama ro boiyaswa ikada kyaku, ma ḇyuk aski, fyafir, iso asuser, ifo kuker saswar ma ḇyuk bon ḇeḇye, iwaira mun osoḇa ma dankarkar ḇa.
59003018	Ḇape ḇaḇenapnapesya irya bon ro askiya ma snonkaku beswar askiya siso benaisya.
59004001	Mamunmun ma rakrakrok rofandu mko ndama kero? Mkofawiḇake ndama ro rmomen-nafsu ḇefamfaḇriyae ro baken mkoḇena?
59004002	Mkormomen roi oso, ḇape mkosma i ḇa, inja mkomamun; mkokram masasor, ḇape marisen mkoḇena mkosmana ḇa, inja mkorakrakrok ma mko mamunmun. Mkosma roi oso ḇa snar mkoḇenadi ḇa.
59004003	Roḇa mkoḇenadi kako, ḇape mkosma roi oso ḇa, snar mkonadi sasar, snar roi mkorna faro marisen mankun mko ḇardi.
59004004	Ne mko, snonkaku ḇefarmku ḇa! Mkofawiḇake, ḇaḇebati kuker supswan ine, mko ḇeembroḇ kuker Allah?
59004005	Mko kara awer, mboi Refoya ḇyeknam ba faikofen: "Rur Allah ḇyukma ḇeko marisen ḇyedi syambraḇ kaku!"
59004006	Ḇape saswar-fakamaman, Allah ḇyukma ḇeko, syambraḇ syadi ro marisen rur koḇesi. Rarirya ikofen: "Allah isampum ḇemarares, ḇape iswar ḇerun sisnesna."
59004007	Eḇedari mkokunem faro Allah, ma kosampum Ibiris, rarirya nari ifrarbur mko!
59004008	Mkofanam faro Allah, ma nari Allah fyanam faro mko. Wafrur sren ḇramsi, ne snonkaku ḇesasar! ma wafrur sren snembri, ne mko ḇeḇesnemandu!
59004009	Mkofawi ḇaḇekandera mkoḇenaḇae, mkoḇarop ma mkokanes; marafrif mkoḇena neḇesadwer kuker kankanes ma raryaḇ mkoḇena kuker barop.
59004010	Mkorun mko ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi, ma nari ikanow mko.
59004011	Naek srar ayesi, mkonefyae awer mko! Mansei ḇeyonef naek ḇyedi roḇa ḇyemankara i, kyoryae Allah sasoser ḇyena; ma rofyor bemankara Allah sasoser ḇyena, rarirya ido waser sasoser anna ḇa mboi bemankarana.
59004012	Oser monda i Ḇeḇuk sasoser ma Ḇeḇemankara. Isoine Allah ḇepok ḇeḇuk koreri ma ḇeḇuk raro. Ḇape aw ido, isof wamarisen bemankara faro min besi?
59004013	Inja knikine, ne ḇekofen mkoya: "Ras Ine roḇa meser nkora ḇemnu oso, ma rodiwa nari nkokain wampasi wambarek oser ma nko farḇaḇyan ma nkosma fainda,"
59004014	rofyor ani nari mkofawi roi ḇekur mko ro meserdiya ḇa. Mankun mko kako mkofawi ḇa. Kankenem mkoḇena namnis raris kamayow ḇeḇair knik monda raimnai ipromes.
59004015	Iḇye mkokofen radine: "Manseren imarisen ido, nari nkokenem ma nkofrur ine roḇa iwa."
59004016	Ḇape knikine mkomarares ma mkofakḇun mko, ma marares ḇeḇor ḇerarirya nsasar.
59004017	Inja snonkaku oso ifawi rariso nari ifrur ḇaḇye, ḇape ifrurna ḇa, ikada, ḇyesasar.
59005001	Inja knikine ḇeḇekayan mkoya, mkoḇarop ma mkokanes snar kandera nari ḇekur mko!
59005002	Kayan mkoḇena nari ndo ma sansun mkoḇena nari opsya sanna kwar!
59005003	Sarak ma brawen mkoḇena napraf kwar, ma praf anna nesaksi faro mko ma nari nan mko imnis for. Mkofanjur kwar arasa ro rasras ḇefanam rofyor ras papupesya.
59005004	Kaku ḇeri fararar ḇeba neḇemnaf kwar, snar mkoḇak sasuref ro ḇefararur ro yaf mkoḇenasya ḇa, ma fararar anna, Manseren ḇefrur sansoren ḇoka ḇena ma ḇepoik nakam imnafna kwar.
59005005	Ro marares mkoḇena mkokenem mkan ma mkomarisen isof mkosyopen ro supswan ine, faro ras kawakwukya.
59005006	Mkoḇuk samamyai kwar, mboi mkomun snonkaku ḇenapes ḇepok ḇesampum mko ḇasya.
59005007	Rarirya, naek srar, mkokḇaḇ isof Manseren ryama! Kaku ḇeri manfrudo siwaf bon ḇeḇemaeja ro yaf sena ma sikḇaḇ isof awar mekemya isabu ma awar mekem ḇeḇuk kakyeiya.
59005008	Mko kako mkokḇaḇ ma mkofarmku, snar Manseren raramuma ḇyedi fyanam kwar!
59005009	Naek srar, mkosurem awer mko ma mkoḇuk safsofyae, insa Allah ḇyuk samamyai awer faro mko. Kaku ḇeri Mankaraya dores kwar ro kedwaya fyasos faryama.
59005010	Naek srar, mkoso nyan kandera ma ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ nabisya ḇewawos kwar kuker Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi.
59005011	Kaku ḇeri nkap si ḇeḇeaski, isoine si ḇefarmku kwar; ma mkomnaf kwar ro Ayub farmku ḇyena ma mkofawi ro ḇarpurya rosai Manseren fyasos faro i kwar, snar Manseren saswar ḇyedi iba ma ifo kuker saneso.
59005012	Ḇape ḇepon kakuya, naek srar, mko soar awer kuker boiyaswa, kako wer kuker supswan roḇa kuker roi ḇese. Inja, mboi ido mkokofen monda mboi ma roroḇa ido, mkokofen monda roroḇa, insa mkosma samamyai awer.
59005013	Rofyor snon oso rofandu mko dananjar ido ḇyenadi! Rofyor snon oso iryaḇ ido idisen!
59005014	Rofyor snon oso rofandu mko iduf ido dor penetua jemaat kada insa sinadiwarek i ma sipyosi kuker mani ro Manseren snonsnon ḇyedi.
59005015	Ma nadi ḇesasyar ro kakyar nari ḇyuk pararei faro ḇeduf ani ma Manseren nari ḇyawes i; ma ifrur sasar kwar, nari sasar ḇyena neḇepyos.
59005016	Eḇedari mko karemyae sasar mkoḇena kwar ido mko nadiwarekyae mko kada, insa mkoprei. Nadi ro snonkaku ḇenapes, rofyor senadi kuker snekin, nadi ani papoik ḇyedi iba kaku.
59005017	Elia snonkaku monda ḇemnis kuker ko, ma ḇyenadi kaku ḇeri kwar, insa mekemya imyun awer, ma mekemya imyun ro supya ḇa isof wampasi wambarek rikior ma paik riwonem.
59005018	Raimnai ḇyenadi wer ma nanki ḇyuk mekem ma supya kako ḇyuk bon ḇyena.
59005019	Naek srar ayesi, rofandu mko oso isasyarbur ḇaḇenapnapesya ido ma snon oso dun siḇer i,
59005020	mkofawi, mboi mansei ḇeyun kaḇer snon ḇesasar ani ro nyan ḇeḇorya, nari ḇyuk koreri faro snon ani rur ḇyedi ro marmar ma ifrur fasasar ḇeḇor ḇyena neḇepyos ma neḇefanander. Ro aya, Yakobus
60001001	Ro Petrus, Yesus Kristus wawan ḇyedi, faro kawasa Kristen ḇefamakmok ro sup Pontus, Galatia, Kapadokia, Asia-Kasun ma Bitinia,
60001002	isoine kawasa skinfir, imnis kuker Allah, Kma koḇedi, aw ḇyedi ma Rurya fyasren kwar, insa sisouser faro Yesus Kristus ma ḇesma fasasren kuker rik ḇyedi. Saswar-fakamaman ma aski-ḇaḇye ro Allah fyarsbawer syadi faro mko kada.
60001003	Sanandik faro Allah ma Kma ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, snar ḇaḇye ḇyedi daḇen kaḇer ko kwar snar Yesus Kristus aḇiḇer ḇyedi rofandu ḇemarsya, faro kankenem oso ḇefo kuker saneraro,
60001004	insa kosma rarwas oso nari ḇero ḇa, ḇemamas ḇa ma ḇemaryoi ḇa, ḇekram ro boiyaswa faro mko.
60001005	Isoine mko, Allah fyaduru kuker samambraḇ ḇyedi snar kakyar mkoḇena rofafisu mkowaf koreri ḇefasos kwar fanari ḇyeḇefasnai ro awar ḇepupesya.
60001006	Mkoryaḇ, mboi fafisu ine mko ḇekandera snar mkosma farawrowes nabor.
60001007	Nakam ndarirya fanfasnaḇair kakyar ḇekaku bedi -- ḇeḇemaeja syadi ro brawen nari ḇero, simnasen kakaku ḇyedi kuker for -- isof mkosma sanandik kanawnow ma ḇaḇesyowi ro ras Yesus Kristus fyasnai mankundiya.
60001008	Mko mam ḇeponi ḇaim, ḇape mkoswar i. Knikine mko mam i ḇaimo ḇape mkokyar faro i. Mkoryaḇ kuker raryaḇ ḇeba syadi.
60001009	Snar mkosma bon kwar ro kakyar mkoḇena, isoine koreri faro rur mko ḇesi.
60001010	Koreri iso nabisya skukeḇ kuker aunos, ma sḇardi kwar ro saswar-fakamaman Allah ḇyuk faro mko.
60001011	Ma skukeḇ rariso fafisu rosai koreri nari ryamaya, imnis kakara Kristus Rur ḇyedi ḇekenem ro si. Rofafisu ani Rur ḇyedi ḇyardi faro si ro kandera-kandera Kristus nari ismana ma ro baba ḇyedi nari ḇeyom ro ḇarpurya.
60001012	Fasasnaya isya kwar faro si, mboi suffarmyan mankunsi ḇardi ḇa, ḇape suffarmyan mko kuker roi ḇeḇor kam baboine sḇaryas kwar faro mko rofandu si, kuker Rur Ḇesren, ḇewanker boiyaswa, faḇeḇaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro mko, ma malaikatsya simarisen fasifawi rosai sḇaryas ani kako.
60001013	Eḇedari wepen aw, ma waswaruser naḇye insa rwir saneraro ḇena kam faro saswar-fakamaman nari ssḇuk faro aw rofyor Yesus Kristus kyaḇerma werya.
60001014	Mko kenem imnis romawa ḇeḇeuser ma mkoso awer rmomen nafsu ro ḇeponiwara rofyor ḇaḇefawawi ḇa mkoḇena,
60001015	ḇape kankenem mkoḇena kam nasren imnis raris Yesus Kristus saranden ḇyedi, ḇeyor mko kwar ani kada,
60001016	snar sfas ro Refo radine: Mkosren snar aya ine yasren.
60001017	Ma rofyor mkap Allah ḇe-Kma, isoine Allah ḇemamkaryer ḇa mboi ḇeḇemankara faro snonkaku kam imnis fararur ḇyena inja mkokenem kuker araryof rofyor mkoisya ro supswan ine.
60001018	Snar mkofawi, mko ḇeḇeḇak namuk kwar ro kankenem ḇeḇefromo kpu mkoḇesi sḇefa ḇeḇewaris faro mko. Ḇaḇyak ani roi oso nari ḇeroḇa imnis sarak roḇa brawen,
60001019	mboi kuker Kristus rik ḇyedi, ḇekakur kaku, ḇemnis raris rik domba mkun ḇemamas ḇa ma ḇefarorew ḇa.
60001020	Allah kyinfir Kristus kwar rofyor supswan ine ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya, ma rofyor awar ḇepupes ine, ryama ḇesupswan ine insa ḇyuk koreri faro mko.
60001021	Kuker i mkokyar faro Allah ḇeḇawes i kwar rofandu ḇemarsya ma ḇeḇuk baba faro i isof kakyar ma saneraro mkoḇena faro Allah.
60001022	Snar mkofasren mankun mko kwar kuker ḇaḇeuser faro napnapesya, isof mkoswar faro naek srar mkoḇesi kuker napnapes, inja kaku ḇeri mkoswaryae mko kuker sne ḇesiper.
60001023	Snar mko ḇeḇeyaḇen kaḇer kwar famkobabo kuker Allah wos ḇekenem ma ḇekain fyoro ḇyedi mboi mko ḇeḇeyaḇen ro ḇaḇesnonkaku ḇa, mboi ro Kma ḇekain fyoroya.
60001024	Snar ro Refo sfas radine: "Snonkakusya kam simnis aḇris, ma baba sena kam namnis aḇris pampen. Aḇrisya myaryoi, ma pampenya kako kyapaf,
60001025	ḇape Manseren wos ḇyedi kyain faswef isof fyoro-fyoro." Ine kada Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇyuk faro mko.
60002001	Eḇedari mkosawen ḇarḇor ḇeḇor kam, ankarkar ḇeḇor kam ma roi ḇeḇyeḇa kam, kram masasor ma anonef.
60002002	Ma mkomnis wombrek ḇeaḇen babo, ḇemarisen ḇeyinem sus ro Rur ḇekaku, insa mkosur ma mkosma askiya.
60002003	Rofyor mkoḇaḇir Manseren ḇaḇye ḇyedi kaku ḇeri.
60002004	Ma mkora faro Manseren, karui ḇekenem ani, snonkakusya sisawen i, ḇape Allah kyinfir i imnis karui ḇeḇemaeja.
60002005	Ma mko kako mkomnis karui ḇekenem faro ḇaḇawes rum rur oso, imnis imam-imam ḇesren, faḇeḇuk farsarser rur, snar Yesus Kristus ḇeḇuk marisen faro Allah.
60002006	Snar sfas ro Refo radine: "Kaku ḇeri, yarir karui ḇekinfir oso ro Sion, karui dopir ḇekakur oso, ma mansei ḇekyar faroi, nari sifrur mamyai i ḇa."
60002007	Eḇedari faro ḇekyar mkoya, karui dopir ani kyakur, boi faro ḇekyar basya: "Karui kamasan ḇaḇawessya sisawen kwar, ḇyekarui dopir kwar ma ḇyekarui karkar kako kwar ma karui warki oso."
60002008	Siwarki snar sikyar Allah wos ḇyena ḇa; rarirya Allah fyasna kwar faro si.
60002009	Ḇape mko kada er ḇekinfir, imnis imam ḇeḇewairek, er ḇesren; Allah kawasa mankundi ḇyesi, insa mkoḇaryas Allah fararur ḇeba ḇyena, ḇeyor mko kwar famkosasyarbur pampanya faro isnai ḇyedi ḇedameserya:
60002010	Mko, Allah kawasa ḇyesi ro randakya ḇa, ḇape knikine, mko ḇekawasa ḇyesi kwar mko ḇeḇeswar ro randakya ḇa ḇape knikine mkosma saswar saneso kwar.
60002011	Naek srar yaswar kaku! Yaḇuk swarepen faro mko mkomnis mandaman ḇeḇeryar ro supswan ine, mkoso awer rmomen-nafsu ro snonkaku ḇefamfaḇri ḇesampum rurya.
60002012	Kankenem mkoḇena naḇye rofandu er-er ḇeḇe Yahudiḇasya, insa rofyor sonef mko imnis snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, nari smam fararur ḇeḇye mkoḇena ma sisandik Allah ro ras raramuma ḇyedi.
60002013	Kuker snonsnon Manseren, mkokunem faro snonkaku ḇesma papoiksya; iḇye faro Kaisar ḇesma papoik ḇekakiya,
