60002014	iḇye kako faro gubernur, Kaisar fyasna kwar faḇeḇuk samamyai faro ḇeḇarḇor ma syowi faro ḇefrur roi ḇeḇyesya.
60002015	Snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, mkofrur roi ḇeḇye insa mko panos sḇadon ro ḇewosḇo ḇefawi royoḇasya.
60002016	Mkokenem imnis snonkaku ḇemkei, ma mkomnis awer snonkaku ḇeyokef ḇarḇorsena kuker ḇaḇemkeiya mboi mkokenem imnis Allah manfamyan ḇyesi.
60002017	Mko ḇesyowi snonkaku kam, mkoswar naek srar mkoḇesi, mkomkak Allah, mkoḇesyowi waireksya!
60002018	Ne, ḇeyuffarmyan, mkokunem kuker makakak faro manseren mkoḇesi, ḇefafir ma ḇeḇenaḇyesya serer ḇa, mboi faro ḇemasasorsya kako.
60002019	Snar saswar-fakamaman naisya, rofyor snon oso ifawi Allah marisen ḇyedi inja ikbaḇ ḇyar kandera ḇenapes ḇana.
60002020	Nari mkosma sanandik rariso, rofyor mkosma kandera snar sasar mko frurna? Ḇape rofyor mkofrur roi ḇeḇye raimnai mkosma kandera, nari Allah ḇyeḇok mko.
60002021	Snar faro roi ḇerarirya eḇedari mko ḇeḇeyor, snar Kristus ḇyekandera faro mko kwar ma ḇyuk fasasna faro mko kwar insa mkoso wewur ḇyena.
60002022	Ikada ifrur sasar ḇa, ma dankarkar ḇa.
60002023	Rofyor sonef-sifyaki, ima dakonef-dakfyak ḇa; rofyor isma kandera, iḇriwarek iḇa, ḇape ḇyuk mankundi faro Allah, Mankara ḇenapesya.
60002024	Mankundi ḇyar sasar koḇena kwar ro ai apropya, insa koine, ḇemar faro sasar kwar ko kenem faro ḇaḇenapnapesya. Snar amborew ḇyena kosma pararei kwar.
60002025	Snar ḇeponiwara koḇor imnis domba, ḇape baboine kokaḇer kwar faro Manfarandows Ḇefaduru Rur koḇesi.
60003001	Rarirya kako mko ne, bin ḇefakawin kwar mkoya, mkokunem faro swa mkoḇesi, insa ono ro mko seuser Allah wos ḇyedi ḇa, mkokofen roi oso faro si awer mboi rari mkoḇena nafrur fasikyar kako,
60003002	rofyor smam, kankenem ḇekaku ma ḇesren ro swa sesi.
60003003	Karamas bena, karamas ro kankenem monda awer imnis raris famankor ofur, famankor ro brawen roḇa mkosansun sansun ḇepyum,
60003004	mboi karamas ḇena nek ro sne ḇeyokef kuker karamas nari ḇero ḇa ḇeḇeknam ro rur ḇefafir ma ḇeknon, ḇeḇemaeja kaku ro Allah mamam ḇyedi.
60003005	Snar ḇeponiwara bin ḇesrensya sfamankor si rarirya, isoine bin ḇena saneraro faro Allah; skunem faro swa sesi,
60003006	imnis raris Sara ḇyesyowi Abraham ma nyiri ḇetuan ḇyedi. Ma mko kada mko ḇeromawa faroi, rofyor mkofrur roi ḇeḇye ido mkomkak awer faro rosairyawer kako:
60003007	Rarirya kako mko, ne snon ḇefakawin kwar mkoya, mkokenem kuker fawawi faro swa mkoḇesi, imnis snonkaku ḇesambraḇ ḇa syadi! Mko ḇesyowi si snar mko kam nari mkosma saswar-fakamaman ro Allah, isoine kankenem, insa nadi mkoḇena royo idwarekna ḇa.
60003008	Ma ḇarpurya, mko kam mkona wos oser, ḇaḇaḇir oser, mkoswaryae mko imnis manḇekanaek ma ḇerun sne,
60003009	ma mkomunsu awer ḇarḇor kuker ḇarḇor, roḇa anonef-fanfadak kuker anonef-fanfadak, mboi mko kaḇer kuker mkor ḇaḇok ro Allah. Snar Allah dor mko insa mkosma ḇaḇok ro i.
60003010	Ro Refo sfas radine, "Mansei ḇeswar kankenem ma bemarisen bemam ras ḇeḇye, depen sḇadon ḇyedi insa dawos roi ḇeḇye ḇa awer ma ikofen awer roi ḇeḇeankarkar.
60003011	Ḇyinkwanbur roi ḇeḇarḇor ma ifrur roi ḇeḇye, syewar ḇaḇeaski isof isma i.
60003012	Snar Manseren myamepen ḇeso marisen ḇyenasya, ma Manseren imnaf nadi sena; ḇape Manseren isampum ḇefrur ḇarḇorsya."
60003013	Ma mansei nari ḇefrur ḇarḇor faro mko, rofyor mkomyaren mkofrur roi ḇeḇye?
60003014	Ḇape mkosma kandera rariso wer kako snar ḇaḇenapnapes, nari mkosma aski. Inja mkomkak awer faro manseiryawer kako ma mkoradai awer.
60003015	Ḇape mko ḇesyowi Yesus ro mkosnemna imnis Manseren! Rofafisuna kam mkofasos insa mkoḇuk kankarem faro mansei ḇefuken saneraro mkoḇena, ḇape iḇye kada kuker fawawi ma syowi,
60003016	ma kuker sneuser ḇesren kaku insa rofyor ḇeyonef mko smam kankenem ḇeḇye mkoḇena imnis ḇeso Kristus, nari ḇeyonef ansi simai ro mankun si.
60003017	Iḇye syadi koḇekandera snar kofrur roi ḇeḇye rofyor Allah imarisen roi ḇerarirya, ro kofrur ḇarḇor.
60003018	Snar Kristus mankundi imar ḇeoser isof fyoro-fyoro snar snonkakusya sasar sena -- snonkaku oser ḇesasar ḇa imar sadwer ḇefrur sasarsya. Kristus ifrur rarirya insa dun ko faro Allah; smuni kwar imnis ḇaḇesnonkaku, ḇape ḇyeḇeḇawes kaḇer kwar imnis ḇaḇerurya.
60003019	Ma Kristus Rur ḇyedi kako rya ḇyaryas Ankankinem Ḇeḇye faro rur-rur ḇero buisya,
60003020	isoine rur snonkaku ḇeḇeuser Allah ḇa ro awar Nuh, rofafisu ani Allah ikḇaḇ ma iwaf Nuh fasasos jawara ḇyedi, faro snonkaku riwar monda ḇekenem ro faḇruḇ ani.
60003021	Baboine mko kako mkosma kankenem snar sarḇer ani, isoine masi sren -- ḇeḇuk fasasren mamas ro baken ḇa, mboi faro fararyor sneuser ḇeḇye faro Allah -- snar kaḇaḇaḇ Yesus Kristus,
60003022	ḇekain ro Allah ḇar raku ḇyedi, rofyor ḇyeḇekanow ḇeboiyaswa kwar ḇyuk sasoser faro malaikatsya kam, papoikna kam ma samambraḇna kam nkunem faroi.
60004001	Inja, Kristus isma kandera kwar imnis kandera ḇaḇesnonkaku, rarirya mko kako mkofasos romamun mkoḇena kuker kakara ḇeradine, -- snar mansesi ḇesma kandera ḇaḇesnonkaku, imnai kwar ro ifrur sasar, --
60004002	insa fafisu ḇedawerya mkoḇuki ifrur awer marisen ḇaḇesnonkakuya, mboi mkoso Allah marisen ḇyedi.
60004003	Snar fafisu nabor kwar mkoḇuki ifrur marisen snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ḇasya. Mkokenem kwar ro rmomen-nafsu, ḇaḇemasaser, munara ḇefnak pipi, farandinem ma syom karwar ḇeyarwarem.
60004004	Rarirya si kandor snar mkoso si famkaksun ro aner raris kankenem sena ḇa, eḇedari sonef mko.
60004005	Ḇape nari skarem faro Allah, ḇefasos kwar faḇeḇemankara faro ḇekenem ma ḇemarsya.
60004006	Eḇedari Ankankinem Ḇeḇyeya ḇyeḇeḇaryas kako faro ḇemarsya, insa sḇemankara si kwar kako ro ḇaḇesnonkaku -- imnis raris nari snonkakusya kam semankara si -- insa sikenem imnis ḇaḇerurya, siso Allah marisen ḇyedi.
60004007	Fafisu ḇepupesya ro roi ḇeḇor kam fyanam kwar. Inja mkepen mko ma mkoknon, ḇo mkoḇenadi.
60004008	Ḇape ḇepon kakuya: mkoswaryae mko kaku ḇeri, snar saswarya ikawef sasar nabor kaku.
60004009	Mkoḇuk moḇ ḇaḇeryaryae faro mko kuker sasurem ḇa.
60004010	Mkuffarmyanyae mko, imnis raris fakamaman snonkaku oser-oser isma kwar imnis manfarkin ḇeḇye ro Allah saswar-fakamaman ḇyena.
60004011	Rofyor snonkaku ono sawawos ido, sawos imnis ḇeḇuk Allah wos ḇyedi; rofyor snonkaku ono suffarmyan ido, sifrurna kuker samambraḇ Allah ḇyukna, insa Allah isma baba ro roi ḇeḇor kam snar Yesus Kristus. I ḇesma papoik ma babaya isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin.
60004012	Naek srar yaswar kaku, mko kandor awer for ḇesber ḇerama ḇefrur kandera mko imnis manasnasen, imnis roi ḇeba oso isya kyur mko.
60004013	Mkoryaḇ syadi, imnis kuker rarwas mkosma ro Kristus kandera ḇyedi, insa mko kako mkoryaḇ ma mkomarisen naba rofyor Kristus fyasna baba ḇyedi.
60004014	Fainda faro mko, rofyor mkosma anonef snar Kristus snonsnon ḇyedi, snar Rur ḇeḇye, isoine Allah Rur ḇyedi isya ro mko.
60004015	Snonkaku oso kako rofandu mko ḇyekandera awer snar myamun, roḇa kyaraw, roḇa ḇyarḇor, roba snar ifrur arubiru, snonkaku ḇese wos sena.
60004016	Ḇape, rofyor isma kandera imnis snonkaku Kristen, imai awer, mboi isandik Allah snar snonsnon Kristus ani.
60004017	Snar fafisuya ryama kwar fa-Allah ḇyemankara supswan ine. Ma Allah mankundi kawasa ḇyesiso nari ḇyemankara ḇepon kakusya. Ma rofyor ḇaḇemankara ani irandak maro ko, rariso kuker snonkaku ḇekyar ḇa faro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ro Allah ani?
60004018	Ro Refo sfas radine: "Rofyor ḇenapessya kermkuno kada sisma koreri ḇa, nari rariso kuker ḇeḇarḇor ma ḇesasarsya?"
60004019	Eḇedari iḇye kako ḇesma kandera snar Allah marisen ḇyedi, ssḇuk rur sesi, ma sifrur roi ḇeḇye ḇesya kwar faro Ḇefrur siya.
60005001	Yaḇuk swarepen faro penetua-penetua rofandu mko, aya imnis min penetua ma saksi ḇaḇekandera Kristus, nari ḇesma kako rarwas ro baba, rofyor Kristus baba ḇyedi ḇyeḇefasna faro snonkakusya.
60005002	Inja mkofarandows domba nai Allah ḇyesi ḇero mkororisya, kuker dafdifer awer, ḇape kuker sneḇemarisen imnis Allah marisen ḇyedi, ma mkosewar awer ḇaḇefainda, mboi mkuffarmyan kaku ḇeri.
60005003	Mkofrur imnis awer raris mkomarisen mkoḇuk sasoser faro Allah domba ḇyesi ikyar faro mko kwar, ḇape mkoḇefasasna faro domba ansi.
60005004	Ma rofyor Manfarandows Ḇebasyadi ani ryama, nari mkosma wower ḇesnaper fyoroya.
60005005	Rarirya kako, ne, snonkbor mko, mkokunem faro mansarsya. Ma mkorunyae mko, snar sfas ro Refo radine: "Allah isampum ḇemararessya, ḇape iswar ḇerun snesya."
60005006	Eḇedari rwun mankundaw faro Manseren ḇramin ḇesambraḇ ḇyesuya, insa ikanow mko rofafisu ḇyedi.
60005007	Mkoḇuk makakwarek mkoḇena kam faro Allah, snar i ḇefaduru mko.
60005008	Mkoḇaḇir ma mkepen mko! Snar mbroḇ mkoḇedi, Ibiris, imbran yar mura muma imnis raris singa (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) ḇeaur ma ḇesewar snonkaku fadoren ḇepek.
60005009	Kosampum i kuker kakyar ḇedworen, snar mkofawi, naek srar Kristen kam ro supswan ine ḇesiper sḇar kandera ḇemnis kam.
60005010	Ma Allah knam ro saswar-fakamaman nakam, ḇeyor mko kwar snar Kristus baba ḇyena ḇekain fyoroya nari fyasos ma isonem, ma ḇyuk samambraḇ ma syoser mko, rofyor mkosma kandera knik monda kwar.
60005011	I ḇena papoik isof fyoro-fyoroya! Amin.
60005012	Yafas syap ḇeknampu yedine faro mko kuker fafnoḇek ro Silwanus (Silas), yakara i ḇesnon Kristen oso ḇeḇeuser. Yamarisen yadif ma yaḇuk snekin faro mko mboi ine kada fakamaman Allah ḇenapes. Inja mkufepen fakamaman ani nadworen.
60005013	Bati ḇena jemaat oser ro Babilon, Allah kyinfir si kako, sfarem aroo faro mko, rarirya kako romawa saswar ayedi Markus.
60005014	Mkokofen arooyae faro mko kuker saswar imnis snon Kristen. Manseren ḇyuk aski faro mko kam ḇena Kristus i kada! Amin. Ro aya, Petrus
61001001	Ro Simon Petrus, manfamyan ma wawan Yesus Kristus, faro si ḇefnoḇek kuker nko ḇesma kakyar snar Allah ḇenapes ma Yesus Kristus Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko.
61001002	Saswar-fakamaman ma aski nabor faro mko ḇemamḇaḇir Allah ma Yesus, Manseren koḇedi.
61001003	Snar Allah papoik ro ḇaḇe-Manseren ḇyena ḇyukma ḇeko kwar roi ḇeḇefandun nabor faro kankenem ḇesren snar mamamḇaḇir koḇena faro i, ḇeyor ko kwar snar papoik baba ma ḇaḇye ḇyedi.
61001004	Kuker nyan ani ḇyuk maro ko kwar ḇaḇeasas ḇeḇemaeja ḇeba kaku, insa kukerna mkun rarwas ro papoik ḇaḇe-Manseren, ma mkokfisbur rmomen-nafsu supswan ḇeḇuk raro faro mko.
61001005	Rarirya mkoḇesewar kaku ḇeri famkofamfon kakyar ḇeḇye mkoḇena, ma faro fawawi ḇeḇye,
61001006	ma faro fawawi farmkuwarek mankun, faro ḇriwarek farmku mankun, ma faro ḇaḇenamu sarandenya,
61001007	sarandenya isoine mkokenem kuker ḇeḇeuser Allah marisen ḇyedi ma mko ḇeḇefasos kuker saswar faro naek srar min Kristensya. Saswar mkoḇedi faro min Kristen fnoḇek kuker saswar faro snonkaku kam.
61001008	Snar rofyor roi ḇeḇor nane kam naisya ro mko, nari nafrur famkomyaren ma mkoḇuk bon mamamḇaḇir faro Yesus Kristus, Manseren koḇedi.
61001009	Ḇape mansei ḇeyakna roi ḇeḇor nane kam ḇasya, sipraf ma siḇor, ma sepro mboi sasar ḇepon sena neḇepyos kwar.
61001010	Eḇedari naek srar ayesi, mkoḇesewar kaku ḇeri, insa fararyor ma kankinfir mkoḇena nadworen syadi. Snar rofyor mkofrurna, nari mko karkar ḇa.
61001011	Rarirya nari ssḇuk syadi faro mko nyan famkaksun ro Ḇaḇesasoser ḇekain fyoroya, isoine Manseren Ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ma Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko, isoine Yesus Kristus.
61001012	Inja yakara ḇesyakwar fayaḇuk swarepen faro mko ro roi ḇeḇor anna kam, mboi mkofawina kwar ma mkodworen ro napnapes mkosma kwar.
61001013	Rofyor yakenem kaker, yakara fararur ayedi fayaḇuk swarapepen faro mko ro roi kokofen nane.
61001014	Snar yafawi, nari fyoro ḇa yabur supswan ine, snar Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus ikofen kwar maḇe aya.
61001015	Ḇape nari yaḇesewar, insa yabur kwar ido mkoswarepen nakam ḇesya kwar.
61001016	Snar nkoso farfyar kakais fararur snonkaku ḇa, rofafisu nko ḇaryas faro mko baba ma rarama Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus. Baba Kristus ani nkomam i kwar.
61001017	Nkoḇesaksi, rariso isma ḇaḇesyowi ma baba ro Allah Kmaya, rofafisu mkaren ryama faro i ro Allah mankundi, ḇekofen: "Ine kada Rumkun yedi yaswar kaku, yamarisen kuker i."
61001018	Mkaren nkomnaf ryamaker boiyaswa, rofyor nkowarpu i ro bon ḇesrenya bori.
61001019	Rarirya nkosma samambraḇ syadi wer ro Allah wos ḇyedi nabisya sḇaryas kwarna. Mkoswarepenna imnis raris mkoswarepen paramrom ḇesnai ro moḇ ḇepampan isof dorekna nakpef ma mak meser dek faisna mkosnemna kada.
61001020	Roi mkofawi ḇepon kakuya, isoine ḇardadi ro Refo ḇyeḇeper imnis marisen snonkaku ḇa,
61001021	snar ḇardadi anna neḇeḇaryas ro marisen snonkaku ḇa, ḇape kuker dafdif ro Rur Ḇesren snonkaku sawos kuker snonsnon Allah.
61002001	Ro ḇeponiwara nabi ḇekakuḇasya ssun rofandu Allah kawasa ḇyesi, rarirya kako rofandu mko nari guru ḇekakuḇa ono sisya. Nari ssḇuk farkarkor ninyan ḇeḇuk raro, ma nari sfamyun Ḇesma papoik ḇeḇaknamuk si kwar ma kuker nyan ḇerarirya ssun mankunsi fasaw faro raroya.
61002002	Kawasa sibor nari siso kankenem guru-guru ḇekaku ḇa ansi ḇefo kuker rmomen-nafsu sena, ma guru ansi fararur sena nari nafrur fakawasa sibor sonef Nyan Ḇenapes Allah ḇyukna.
61002003	Snar sfaḇri mankun si, inja guru ḇekakuḇa ansi nari sfarfyar faro mko farfyar sun ro mankun si fasiksma ḇaḇefainda ro mko. Ḇape faro fararur sena samamyai isya fyasos fyoro kwar ma raroya isya iwaf si.
61002004	Snar rofyor Allah iswar malaikat ḇefrur sasarsya ḇa, ḇape isawen si ro for ḇembrer ḇa ma rarirya ḇyuk si faro aḇyaḇ ḇepampan faikram si isof ras mankaraya;
61002005	ma rofyor Allah iswar supswan ḇepon ani ḇa, mboi myuni kuker faḇruḇ ḇape ḇyuk aski faro Nuh munda, manḇaryas napnapes ani, kuker snonkaku ḇese rifik;
61002006	ma rofyor Allah myun mnu Sodom ma Gomora kuker for, ma rarirya myunpres si ma ifrur swarapepen oso faro ḇekenem kuker ḇarḇor ro ḇarpursya,
61002007	ḇape ḇyuk aski faro Lot, snonkaku ḇenapes, ḇekenem pdef kuker kandera snar kankenem snonkaku ḇefawi sasoser ḇa ma ḇeso monda rmomen-nafsu sena,
61002008	snar snonkaku ḇenapes sine sikenem rofandu si ma ro rasras smam ma simnaf fararur ḇarḇor sena, isof rur ḇenapes sesi sisma kandera --
61002009	inja Manseren ifawi rariso ḇyuk aski faro snonkaku ḇesouser marisen ḇyena rofyor sisma fafrowes. Ma Manseren ifawi rariso ikram snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor faro kandera ro Ras Ḇaḇemankaraya,
61002010	ḇeponya snonkaku ḇeso rmomen-nafsu sena ḇemamas ma ḇeyonef Allah papoik ḇyedi. Guru ḇekakuḇa ansi sararyof ḇa mboi simarares si isof skormararu ḇa fasonef roi ḇekenem ma ḇepyum ro boiyaswa kako!
61002011	Mboi malaikatsya ḇesambraḇ ma ḇesma papoik syadi ro guru-guru ḇekakuḇa ansi ḇesyaḇo, sakkofen wos anonef faro roi ḇekenem ma ḇepyum ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇa.
61002012	Guru ansi simnis aiwan ḇena swaruser ḇa, simnis kuker aiwan sikapar faseḇefor ma seḇemun kam monda. Sonef rosai sifawi ḇa, isof kuker fararur ḇeḇarḇor sena nari mankunsi simar kukerna imnis aiwan ḇekafdir,
61002013	ma nari sisma kankenem ḇeḇyeḇa imnis sasuref ro ḇarḇor sena. Sifrur marisen sisnesna kuker rosairya monda ro meserna, fanafrur syopen rmomen-nafsu baken sena. Rofyor skain warpu mko ro munara nanan, simnis mamas ḇefrur ayin snar simser kuker rmomen-nafsu.
61002014	Mamam sena nafo kuker rmomen-nafsu ḇaḇefarḇuk ma simnai ḇa ro sifrur sasar. Sidenem snonkaku kakyar ḇedworen ḇasya fasiso kakara sena. Sisnesna nebefari kwar kuker faḇri mankun. Sikada snonkaku ḇesma fafras!
61002015	Snar sibur nyan ḇenapesya kwar, inja siḇor, ḇo siso Bileam, Beor mandaḇendi nyan ḇyedi ḇemarisen ḇena sasuref ro fararur ḇeḇarḇor.
61002016	Ḇape Bileam isma swarapepen ḇepakrek snar ḇarḇor ḇyena, rofyor keledai ḇeḇeawer dawos imnis mkaren snonkaku ma idwarek nabi ḇefawiroyoḇa ani.
61002017	Guru ḇekakuḇa ansi simnis war sun ḇesyor, simnis mandep doḇerya isopum; sfasos kwar faro si moḇ ḇepampan ḇeyun nyawa.
61002018	Snar sikofen wos marares ḇeḇebei ma sifrur rmomen-nafsu farḇakḇuk fasidenem snonkaku ḇesusu babobur kankenem ḇeḇor.
61002019	Guru ḇekakuḇa ansi sḇeasas ḇaḇemkei faro snonkaku ansi mboi mankun sikada sḇewomen faro kankenem nari ḇero -- snar roi oso ḇefrur kafyo snonkaku, ikada ḇyewomen faro roi ḇefrur kafyo iya.
61002020	Ma smamḇaḇir Manseren ma Yesus Kristus, Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko, fyaspar mankundi kwar ro arwarem supswan, ḇape kyaḇer faro nawer, isof ḇarpurya kankenem sena naḇyeḇa syadi wer ro randakya.
61002021	Eḇedari iḇye syadi smamḇaḇir awer napnapesya, snar rofyor ssmambaḇir i, ḇape ḇarpurya skaḇerbur Allah sasoser ḇyuk faro siya.
61002022	Wos peper ine kyaku fafyasna rosai sifrurna, "Rofanya kyaḇer fadan ḇayorem ḇyena," ma "Randip simasi kwar, nari kyaḇer fadaner i ro aner ḇyedi."
61003001	Naek srar yaswar kaku, ine syap ḇeḇesuru yafas faro mko. Ro syap ansuya yaḇesewar fayaḇawes kakara ḇekaku ro mko,
61003002	insa mkoswarepen Allah nabi ḇyesi wos sikofen ro ḇeponiwara ma mkoswarepen Manseren sasoser ḇyena, Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri, wawan mkoḇesi sikofen ḇadir faro mko kwar.
61003003	Roi mkoswarepen ḇepon kakuya isoine, ro ras awar ḇepupesya nari snonkaku ḇekenem ma ḇeso rmomen-nafsu nari sikḇawes fasonef mko.
61003004	Sikofen ḇo soḇo: "Asas Manseren iḇe ryamumaya isyaro? Snar kma ma up nkoḇesi simar kwar, ḇape roi ḇeḇor kam namnis raris ro randakya rofafisu supswan ḇyeḇefrurya!"
61003005	Sikada sifrur ḇeḇefawi ḇa, mboi snar Allah ikofen nanki isya kwar ro ḇepon ma supswan kako ḇeḇeknam ro warya ma snar warya,
61003006	ma snar war ani, supswan ḇepon ani ryo kwar kuker faḇruḇya.
61003007	Ḇape kuker wos ani kako nanki ma supswan ro baboine ḇyeḇefaduru ro for ma ḇyeḇekram isof ras ḇaḇemankara ma snonkaku ḇeḇarḇorsya sro.
61003008	Ḇape naek srar yaswar kaku, roi oser ine mkofanander awer i, isoine mboi ro Manseren ḇarpon ḇyedi ras oser imnis raris wampasi wambarek syaran oser ma wampasi wambarek syaran oser imnis raris ras oser.
61003009	Manseren nari isusu asas ḇyedi ḇa, mboi snonkaku ono sisya skara rarirya, ḇape ikḇaḇ faro mko, snar imewer oso ryo, mboi insa snonkaku kam simbror ma skaḇer.
61003010	Ḇape Manseren Ras raramuma ḇyedi imnis ḇekaraw. Ro ras ani nari nanki ipromes kuker rakrok maum ḇeyun nyawa ma roi ḇeḇor ro supswan nari narus ro for ḇesberya, ma supswan kuker roi ḇeḇor ḇeroina nari napromes.
61003011	Inja, roi ḇeḇor anna kam nemompraf rarirya, iḇye mkokenem nasren
61003012	isoine mko ḇewaf ma ḇeswarmura ro Manseren Ras raramuma ḇyedi. Ro ras ani nari nanki inanem kuker for ma roi ḇeḇor ro supswan nari najaren snar saksak forya.
61003013	Ḇape kowaf rosai Allah ḇyeasas kwar, isoine nanki ḇebabo ma supswan ḇebabo, ro moḇ kosma ḇaḇenapnapesya.
61003014	Inja, naek srar yaswar kaku, rofafisu mkowafwaf roi ḇeḇor nane kam, iḇye syadi mkoḇesewar, insa sisma mkofarorewḇa ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi kuker ḇaḇeaski ro Allah.
61003015	Kwara Manseren koḇedi ḇaḇekaḇaḇaḇ ḇyedi imnis fafisu famkosma aski, imnis Paulus kako, naek koswar ani, fyas faro mko kwar iso mamkarkir Allah ḇyuk faro iya.
61003016	Paulus syap ḇeḇor ḇyena fyas ḇesya kwar roi ḇeḇor nane. Kaku roi ono naisya nsamswen isof sifawina ḇa ro syap anna. Ma ḇefawina ḇasya ma kakyar ḇedworen ḇasya, siwararye rosai Paulus fyasna. Mnuk ḇese ro Refo siwararyena rarirya kako. Nane nari neknam raro faro mankun si.
61003017	Ḇape mko naek srar yaswar kaku, mkofawi ḇepon roi ḇeḇor nane kwar. Inja mkepen mko, imbude mkosaso snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇefawi sasoser ḇa isof mkosapibur moḇ ḇeknonya.
61003018	Iḇye kada mkofawi kaku Manseren ḇaḇenaḇye ḇyena, Wairek Ḇeḇuk korerima ḇeko isoine Yesus Kristus, ma mko kako mkofawi kaku i. Sanandik faro i, ro baboine isof fyoro-fyoro kada! Amin. Ro aya, Petrus
62001001	Syap ine kyur Wos ḇeḇuk kankenem, isoine Wosya isya kwar roawar madero. Nkomnaf i kwar, ma nkomam i kwar, kuker nkomkasna. Nkomami kwar ma nkuf i kwar kuker nkoḇrasna.
62001002	Rofafisu kankenem ani ḇyeḇefasnai, ma nkomami kwar. Rarirya nkoḇesaksi i ma nkoḇaryas faro mko kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoro, isya fnoḇek Kmaya, ma sfasnai kwar faro nko.
62001003	Rosai nkomam kwar ma nkorower, ikada nkokofen ḇadir faro mko kako, insa mkoḇeoser kuker nko ma koso Kmaya ma Rumkun ḇyedi, Yesus Kristus.
62001004	Ma nkofasna kam faro mko, insa kosnesna namarisen kaku ḇeri.
62001005	Wos nkosma kwar ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ma nkoḇuk faro mko isoine: Allah ikada isnai, ma pampanya isya ro iḇaḇeri.
62001006	Rofyor kokofen ḇo koḇo, mboi koḇeoser kuker i, ḇape kokenem ro pampan, koḇeankar iḇye ro wos ma fararur koḇena kako.
62001007	Ḇape rofyor kokenem ro isnai imnis raris Allah isya ro isnai kako, nari kosma ḇaḇeoser kuker snonkaku ḇesesya, ma Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, Yesus rik ḇyena, nfasren sasar ḇeḇor koḇena kam.
62001008	Rofyor kokofen ḇo koḇo, kosasar ḇa, koḇeankar mankun ko ma napnapesya isya ro koḇa.
62001009	Mboi rofyor kokarem sasar koḇena faro Allah, nari ḇyuk raris asas ḇyedi ma ifrur rosai ḇenapes. Nari ipyos sasar koḇena ma fyasren ko ro ḇarḇor ḇeḇor koḇena.
62001010	Ḇape rofyor kokofen ḇo koḇo, kosasar ḇa, kofrur Allah imnis raris ḇeḇeankarkar; isoine kokram Allah wos ḇyena ro kosnesna ḇa.
62002001	Romawayesi! Yafas roi nane faro mko insa mkofrur sasar awer. Ḇape rofyor ono sifrur sasar, ḇefnoḇek ko isoine Yesus Kristus, ḇenapes ani; nari iwos fandun koḇena ro ḇarpon Kmaya.
62002002	Kuker fafnoḇek Yesus Kristus ani kosma ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar koḇena. Ma kerer kosma payasyos ro sasar koḇena ḇa, mboi sasar ro kawasa kam ro supswan ine kako.
62002003	Rofyor koḇeuser Allah sasoser ḇyena, irya kofawi Allah.
62002004	Mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, "Yafawi Allah," ḇape ḇyeuser Allah sasoser ḇyena ḇa, snon ani dankar, ma Allah wos ḇekaku ḇyedi isya ro sne ḇyedi ḇa.
62002005	Ḇape mansei ḇeḇeuser Allah wos ḇyena ido, iswar kaku Allah. Ine fyasna koḇeoser ma kokenem kuker Allah kwar.
62002006	Mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, ḇyeoser ma ikenem kuker Allah, kankenem ḇyedi imnis raris Yesus kada.
62002007	Naek srar yaswar kaku! Roi yafas nane sasoser ḇebabo naisya ḇa. Mboi sasoser ḇekwar ro randakya sikofen faro mko isoine wos mkorower ro Allah kwar.
62002008	Ma roi yafas nane sasoser babo nairya kako; sasoser anna nfasna Yesus mankundi ma faro mankun mko kako; snar rofyor pampanya ipromes ma isnaiya iyar kwar.
62002009	Mansei ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, ima isya ro isnaya dori, ḇape dayin naek ḇyedi, ikada isya ro pampanya isof baboine.
62002010	Mansei ḇeswar naek ḇyedi, ikada ikenem ro isnaiya, snar roi oso isya ro iḇa ḇefrur fanari snonkaku ḇese sifrur sasar.
62002011	Ḇape mansei ḇeayin naek ḇyedi, ikada isya ro pampan, imbran ro pampanya, ma ifawi moḇ iḇe ryaḇeya ḇa, snar pampanya ifrur famyam ba.
62002012	Yafas faro mko kam, ne, romawa yesi, snar sasar mkoḇena Kristus ipyos na kwar.
62002013	Yafas faro mko kam, ne, kma yesi, snar mkofawi Allah, isya kwar ro awar madero. Yafas faro mko, ne, snonkbor mkoya, snar mkokafyo ḇarḇor Ibirisya kwar.
62002014	Yafas faro mko kam, ne, romawa yesi, snar mkofawi Kmaya kwar. Yafas faro mko kam, ne, kma yesi, snar mko kam mkofawi wos ma ro awar madero isya kwar. Yafas faro mko kam, ne, snonkbor mkoya, snar mkosambraḇ ma Allah wos ḇyedi isya ro mkosnemna, inja mkokafyo Ibirisya kwar.
62002015	Mkoswar awer supswan ine, roḇa rosai isya ro supswan ine. Rofyor mkoswar supswan ine, nari mkoswar Kmaya ḇa.
62002016	Roi ḇeḇor ro supswan ine kawasa ḇesasarsya sirmomen na -- isoine roi ḇeḇor ḇeyun sne, isof sirmomen sna na, ma roi ḇeḇor sirmomen na insa ssḇuki darer mankunsi -- nane neknam ro Kmaya ḇa, mboi ro supswan ine.
62002017	Supswan ine ma roi ḇeḇor kawasa sirmomen ro ina nari napromes. Ḇape snonkaku ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyena, ikenem faswef isof fyoro-fyoro.
62002018	Romawa yesi mko, awar papupesya fyanam kwar! Ma imnis raris sikofen ḇadir faro mko kwar, Kristus mbroḇ ḇyesi nari srama, rarirya baboine Kristus mbroḇ ḇyesi sikḇok kwar. Ine aḇyair ḇeko rofafisu Ras Ḇepupesya fyanam kwarya.
62002019	Mbroḇ Kristus ḇyesi snonkaku ḇebur ko kwar, inja snonkaku koḇesisya ḇa. Snar sun ro rarwas koḇedi ido nari sisya kuker ko. Ḇape sisasyarbur ko, fyasnai oso ro si snonkaku koḇedisya ḇa.
62002020	Ḇape Yesus Kristus ḇyuk Allah Rur ḇyedi fabyepoik mko kwar. Ma rarirya mko kam mkofawi Allah ḇenapesya.
62002021	Inja yafas ine faro mko snar mkofawi Allah kwar, ma mkofawi Allah ḇenapes dankar ḇaim.
62002022	Mansei ḇeḇeankarkar ani? Ḇeḇeankarkar isoine snonkaku ḇekofen ḇo ḇeyoḇo, Yesus Wairek Ḇeyun koreri raris Allah asas ḇyedi ḇa. Snonkaku ani Kristus mbroḇ ḇyedirya; ikada kyarem Kmaya ma Rumkunya ḇa.
62002023	Mansei ḇekarem Rumkun ani ḇa, ikako nya Kmaya ḇa kako. Mansei ḇekarem Rumkun ani, ikada nya Kmaya kako.
62002024	Snar rarirya ḇyaryas mkomnaf kwar ro randakya mkokara naḇye i ro mkosnemna. Rofyor mkokarai naḇye ḇaryas ani, nari mko ḇeoser kuker Rumkun ani ma Kmaya.
62002025	Ma inekada Kristus mankundi ḇyeasas maroko isoine: Kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoro.
62002026	Rosai yafas nane kam nkur snonkaku ḇeḇesasewar ḇefarkor ninyan mkosya.
62002027	Ḇape mankun mko ḇardi, Kristus isbawer Rur ḇyedi kwar faro mko. Ma rofyor Rur ḇyedi isya ro mko, inja fandunḇa fasnonkaku sfarkor mko. Snar Rur ḇyedi fyarkor mko ro roi ḇeḇor kam; ma rosai fyarkor na nkaku, ma nasrer ḇa. Rarirya, mkomarisen ma mkoḇesyowi Rurya rosai fyarkor na, ma mkomarisen mkoḇeoser kuker Kristus.
62002028	Inja, romawa yena mko, mko ḇeoser kuker Kristus, insa rofafisu ryama, kuker kakyar nari komku ro ḇarpon ḇyedi, ma koḇaḇir komai ḇa.
62002029	Mkofawi kwar Kristus ikenem ma iso Allah marisen ḇyedi. Snar rarirya mkofawi kako snon oso ikenem ma iso Allah marisen ḇyedi, ikada Allah romawa ḇyedirya.
62003001	Mkomame! Allah iswar ko rarirya isof sap ko ḇeromawa ḇyesi; ma rarirya -- koine Allah romawa ḇyesi. Rarirya supswan ḇeḇarḇor ine sifawi koḇa, snar supswan sifawi Allah ḇa.
62003002	Naek srar yaswar kaku! Baboine koine Allah romawa ḇyesi ko, ḇape rariso kuker ko, ima ḇyeḇefasnai ḇaim maro ko. Mboi kofawi rofyor Kristus ryama nari komnis i, snar nari komam kaku i.
62003003	Snonkaku kam ḇena kakyar ine faro Kristus, iwaren mankundi insa isren kaku ḇeri ro sasar, imnis Kristus kako isren ro sasar.
62003004	Mansei ḇefrur sasar, ḇyeuk Allah sasoser ḇyena; snar sasar ikada ḇaḇeuk Allah sasoser ḇyena.
62003005	Ma mkofawi Kristus ryama faipyos snonkakusya sasar sena, ḇape ima dakḇesasar ḇa.
62003006	Snar snonkaku kam ḇekenem ma ḇeḇeoser kuker Kristus, ifrur sawawek sasar ḇa. Ḇape snonkaku ḇefrur sawawek sasar, isrow Kristus ḇaim roḇaido ifawi Kristus ḇaim.
62003007	Romawa yesi mko, mkomam monda awer ḇo manseirya kako ḇyeninyan awer mko. Mansei ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyedi, ḇyeknam ro Allah, imnis Kristus ḇyeknam ro Allah kako.
62003008	Mansei ḇefrur sawawek sasar ikada Ibirisya romawa ḇyedirya, snar Ibiris ifrur sasar ro randakya. Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ryama ḇesupswan ine insa kyakok Ibirisya fararur ḇyena.
62003009	Snonkaku oser-oser ḇeḇeromawa faro Allah kwar, ifrur sawawek sasar ḇa, snar Allah papoik ḇyedi isya roi. Ma snar Kma ḇyedi Allah, inja ifrur sawawek sasar ḇa.
62003010	Inekada aḇyair rofandu Allah romawa ḇyesi kuker Ibirisya romawa ḇyesi: Mansei ḇefrur Allah marisen ḇyedi ḇa, roḇaido iswar naek ḇyesi ḇa, ḇyeromawa Allah ḇaim.
62003011	Snar ro randakya sḇair ḇaryas ine faro mko kwar: isoine mkoswaryae mko.
62003012	Ma komnis awer Kain, ḇeḇeknam ro Ibiris isof myun ḇedar ḇyedi. Snaro Kain myun ḇedar ḇyedi? Snar roi ifrur na nsasar, ma roi ḇedar ḇyedi ifrur na nakada nanapes.
62003013	Rarirya, naek srar yesi, mkokandor awer rofyor snonkaku ro supswan ine siyin mko.
62003014	Kofawi kosasyar kwar ro marmar, ma baboine kokenem. Kofawi snar koswar naek koḇesi. Mansei ḇesaswar ḇa, ikada isya ro papoik marmarya.
62003015	Mansei ḇeayin naek ḇyedi, ikada snon mamun, ma mkofawi snon oso myamun ikada nya kankenem ḇekain fyoroya ḇa.
62003016	Rarirya kofawi Kristus saswar ḇyedi, isoine ḇyuk kankenem ḇyedi faro ko kwar; ma ko kako koḇuk kankenem koḇena faro naek srar koḇesi!
62003017	Rofyor snon oso nya papus ro supswan ine, ma myam naek ḇyedi isma namnis ḇa, ḇape imewer fyasna fafnoḇek faro naek ḇyedi, rariso snon ani ikofen ḇo doḇo, iswar Allah?
62003018	Romawa yena mko! Koswar monda awer kuker sḇadon roḇaido wawos. Ḇape koswar kuker saswar ḇekaku, kofasna ro fararur koḇena.
62003019	Rarirya kofawi koḇeknam ro Allah, isof koknon ro ḇarpon Allah.
62003020	Ma rofyor kosnesna nbaḇir kosasar, kofawi Allah ibasyadi ro kosnesna ma ifawi roi ḇeḇor kam.
62003021	Inja naek srar ayesi yaswar kaku, rofyor kosnesna nbaḇir kosasar ḇa, kora faro Allah kuker kakyar.
62003022	Ma rosai kor roi kosmana, snar koso sasoser ḇyena kam ma kofrur rosai imarisen na.
62003023	Roi syoser maroko isoine: Kokyar faro Rumkun ḇyedi Yesus Kristus; ma koswaryae ko, imnis raris sasoser Kristus faro ko.
62003024	Mansei ḇeḇesyowi Allah sasoser ḇyena, ḇyeoser kuker Allah, ma Allah ḇyeoser kuker si. Ma kofawi Allah ḇyeoser kuker ko snar Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyuki faro ko kwar.
62004001	Naek srar yesi yaswar kaku! Mkokyar awer faro snonkaku ḇekarem ḇo ḇeyoḇo, ḇena Allah Rur ḇyedisya, ḇape mkomnasen ḇepon si famkofawi rur rosai isya ro si ḇyeknam ro Allahke roḇa. Snar nabi sararer sibor sikḇok ḇo sraḇe supswan ḇesiper.
62004002	Rarirya kofawi Allah Rur ḇyedi: snonkaku ḇekarem Yesus Kristus ryama ḇesupswan ine imnis snonkaku, snon ani nya Rur ḇerama ro Allah.
62004003	Ma snonkaku ḇekarem Yesus ḇa, nya Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇa. Snon ani nya rur ḇeḇembroḇ Kristus. Rur ani sikofen ḇadir faro mko kwar nari ryama. Baboine isya ro supswan ine kwar.
62004004	Ḇape romawa ayesi, mko kada Allah romawa ḇyesi. Mko kada mkokafyo nabi-nabi sararer ansi kwar, snar Rur ani isya ro mko ipok syadi ro rur ḇero snonkaku ḇeḇeknam ro supswan ine.
62004005	Nabi sararer ansya sowawos ro roiḇero supswan, ma supswan simnaf wos sena, snar si seknam ro supswan ine.
62004006	Ḇape ko kada Allah romawa ḇyesi; ma snonkaku ḇemambaḇir Allah, simnaf wawos koḇena kako. Snonkaku ḇeḇeromawa Allah ḇa, simnaf wos koḇena ḇa. Rarirya aḇyair ine kofawi rofandu Rur ḇekfin snonkaku ḇefawi Allah ma rur ḇefarkor ninyan snonkaku.
62004007	Naek srar yaswar kaku! Mkorama koswaryae ko, snar saswar ḇyeknam ro Allah. Snonkaku ḇesaswar, ikada Allah romawa ḇyedi ma ifawi Allah.
62004008	Mansei ḇesaswar ḇa, ikada myambaḇir Allah ḇa, snar Allah ikada isaswar.
62004009	Allah fyasna saswar ḇyedi ro kosnesna snar iwan Rumkun oser ḇyedi ḇesupswan ine insa kuker Rumkun ḇyedi kosma kankenem.
62004010	Inekada saswar: Koi ḇeswar kwar Allah i ḇa, ḇape Allah i ḇeswar ko kwar, inja iwan Rumkun ḇyedi insa kuker i kosma ḇaḇepayasyos ro sasar koḇena.
62004011	Naek srar yaswar kaku, rofyor Allah iswar ko rarirya, ko kako koswaryae ko.
62004012	Snon osoḇa kako ḇemam Allah kwar, ḇape Allah ḇyeoser kuker ko ma saswar ḇyedi imnis maro ko, rofyor koswaryae ko.
62004013	Rarirya Allah ḇyuk kwar maro ko Rur ḇyedi, inja kofawi koḇeoser kwar kuker Allah ma Allah ḇyeoser kuker ko.
62004014	Mankun nko nkomam kwar Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ma nkoḇaryas faro snonkaku ḇese mboi Kmaya iwan i kwar faḇye Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri faro supswan ine.
62004015	Mansei ḇekarem Yesus ani Allah Rumkun ḇyedirya, Allah ḇyeoser kuker snonkaku ani, ma snonkaku ani kako ḇyeoser kuker Allah.
62004016	Ko ḇardi kofawi ma kokyar Allah saswar ḇyedi maḇeko. Allah ikada isaswar. Snonkaku Allah saswar ḇyedi ḇyepoiksya, snon ani ḇyeoser kuker Allah, ma Allah ḇyeoser kukeri.
62004017	Saswarya ḇyeḇefrur faimnis maḇe ko, insa komkak ḇa kora faro Allah ro Ras Mankaraya. Nari komkak ḇa, snar kokenem imnis raris Kristus, koisya kokenem ro supswan ine.
62004018	Mansei ḇesaswar, snonkaku ani imkak ḇa; snar saswar ḇemnis iyaw ḇaḇaḇir makakakya. Rarirya, saswar ani ḇyeḇefrur mnis ḇaim ro snonkaku ḇemkak ani, snar makakak dun samamyai.
62004019	Kosaswar snar Allah iswar syadi ko ḇepon kwar.
62004020	Rofyor snonkaku oso ikofen ḇo doḇo, "Yaswar Allah," ḇape dayin naek ḇyedi, snonkaku ani isararer. Snar snonkaku ḇeayin naek ḇyedi myam faroya, nari rariso iswar Allah myam ḇaimya.
62004021	Ma inekada sasoser Kristus ḇyuk maḇe ko: Mansei ḇeswar Allah, dakswar naek ḇyedi kako.
62005001	Snonkaku ḇekyar Yesus ikada Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri, Allah ḇyeasas kwar, snonkaku ani kada Allah romawa ḇyedirya. Ma snonkaku ḇeswar Kmaya, iswar Kmaya Rumkun ḇyedi kako.
62005002	Nari kofawi koswar Allah romawa ḇyesi, rofyor koswar Allah ma koḇesyowi sasoser ḇyena.
62005003	Snar, koswar Allah inja koḇeuser sasoser ḇyena. Ma sasoser ḇyena nmarḇak maro ko ḇa,
62005004	snar Allah romawa ḇyesi sambraḇ sifrurkafyo supswan ḇeḇarḇor ine. Ma kofrurkafyo supswan kuker kakyar koḇena.
62005005	Mansei ḇefrurkafyo supswan kuker ḇarḇor ḇyena? Derer monda snonkaku ḇekyar Yesus ikada Allah Rumkun ḇyedi.
62005006	Yesus Kristus ryama ḇesupswan kuker masisren ḇyedi ma kuker rik marmar ḇyedi. Ryama kuker war monda ḇa, ḇape kuker war ma rik kako. Ma Allah Rur ḇyedi mankundi ḇeḇesaksi mboi inekada kyaku, snar Rur anikada inapes.
62005007	Snar saksi rikior isya [ro boiyaswa: Kmaya, Wosya ma Rur Ḇesrenya; sko kam skoḇeoser.
62005008	Ma saksi rikior skoḇuk ḇaḇesaksi ro supswan ine]: Rurya, warya ma rikya, skokam skoḇeoser.
62005009	Kokyar ḇaḇesaksi ro snonkaku, ḇape ḇaḇesaksi ro Allah syambraḇ syadi wer. Ma inekada ḇaḇesaksi Allah ḇyuk kwar ro Rumkun ḇyedi.
62005010	Mansei ḇekyar faro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, isma kwar ḇaḇesaksi ani ro mankundi; ḇape mansei ḇekyar Allah ḇa, ifrur kwar Allah ḇe ḇeḇeankarkar, snar ikyar ḇa rosai Allah ḇyesaksi kwar ro Rumkun ḇyedi.
62005011	Ḇaḇesaksi ani isoine: Allah ḇyuk kwar ḇeko kankenem ḇekain fyoroya; ma Rumkun ḇyedi ḇeḇeknam kankenem ḇekain fyoro ani.
62005012	Ma mansei ḇena Rumkun ani, nari nya kankenem ḇekain fyoro ani; ma mansei ḇena Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ḇa, nari nya kankenem ani ḇa.
62005013	Faro ḇekyar Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, yafas nane kam insa mkofawi mkona kankenem ḇekain fyoroya kwar.
62005014	Ma komsik ḇo kora faro Allah, snar kokyar imnaf fararyor koḇena, rofyor kor rosairya wer imnis kuker marisen ḇyedi.
62005015	Ma rofyor kofawi imnaf fararyor koḇena ma kofawi kako nari ḇyuk rosai kor kwar faroi na.
62005016	Rofyor snon Kristen koḇesi oso ifrur sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar ḇa, mkonadi warek i faro Allah; ma nari Allah ḇyuk kankenem faro snon ani. Ine kyur ḇefrur sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar ḇa. Ḇape isya sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar, ima yakofen ḇa insa mkonadi warek faro Allah ro sasar ani.
62005017	Fararur ḇeḇor ḇeḇarḇor, sasarnairya, ḇape isya sasar ḇeyun ḇemarmar ḇa.
62005018	Kofawi snonkaku ḇeḇeromawa Allah, sifrur sasar sawawek ḇa, snar Allah Rumkun ḇyedi fyadiren si, ma Ibirisya ifrur roi oso faro si ḇa.
62005019	Kofawi koine koḇeknam ro Allah, ma supswan ḇesiper ine isya ro papoik Ibirisya.
62005020	Kofawi Allah Rumkun ḇyedi ryama kwar ma ḇyuk ḇeko fawawi kwar, insa kofawi Allah Ḇenapesya. Kankenem koḇena neoser kuker Allah Ḇenapes ani ma koḇeoser kuker Rumkun ḇyedi Yesus Kristus. Ikada Allah Ḇenapes, ma ikada kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoroya.
62005021	Romawa ayesi, mkoḇinkwanbur amfyanir ḇeḇor kam!
63001001	Syap ine ro aya, manfarkin jemaat, faro Sna Allah kyinfir ma romawa ḇyesi yaswar kaku ḇeri. Yerer monda ḇa, ḇape snonkakusya kam ḇefawi wos ḇenapes ro Allah, ḇeswar mko kako,
63001002	snar Allah ḇenapes kyain ro kosnesna, ma nari isya ḇesya kwar kuker ko isof fyoro-fyoro.
63001003	Saswar-fakamaman ma aski ro Allah Kmaya, ma ro Yesus Kristus, Kmaya Rumkun ḇyedi nari ifnoḇek ko kuker napnapes ma saswarya.
63001004	Yamarisen kaku yafawi mboi romawa besi ono sisya sikenem siso napnapes ro Allah raris Kmaya syoser faro ko kwar.
63001005	Snar rarirya, yor kaku ḇeri, faro awin au, insa kokam koswaryae ko. Roi yafas nane sasoser ḇebabo oso irya ḇa; sasoser ine ssḇuki faro ko kwar ro randakya.
63001006	Mkosaswar isoine mkokenem mkoso Allah sasoser ḇyena. Ma sasoser mkomnaf kwar ro randakya isoine mkoswaryae mko.
63001007	Ḇesararer sibor sisasyar kwar ḇesupswan ḇesiper. Sima snonkaku ḇekarem ḇa Yesus Kristus ryama ḇesupswan imnis raris snonkaku. Snonkaku ḇerarirya sikada ḇesararer ma mbroḇ Kristus ḇyesirya.
63001008	Inja mkowaren imbude rosai koḇesewar faro mko ryobur mkondi. Mkoḇesewar insa mkosma sasuref mkoḇena kam.
63001009	Mansei ḇeso Kristus farkarkor ḇyena ḇa, mboi isasyarbur rosai Kristus fyarkor na, snonkaku ani ḇyeoser kuker Allah ḇa. Mansei ḇekain nako ro Kristus farkarkor ḇyena, nari ḇyeoser kuker Kmaya ma kuker Rumkunya kako.
63001010	Rofyor snonkaku oso ryama faro mko ma ḇyuk farkarkor Kristus ḇyuk na ḇa, mkosrow i ro rum mkoḇena awer; ma mkokofen awer aroo faro i.
63001011	Snar mansei ḇekofen aroo faro snonkaku ḇerarirya, iso kako snon ani ḇo sufrur fararur ḇeḇarḇor ani.
63001012	Roi nabor kaku ḇeḇefandun yaḇe yakofen ḇadir faro mko, ḇape yaḇaḇir iḇye syadi yafas awer na ro syap ine. Yakyar nari yarakaki mko ma mankundaya yawawos kuker mko, insa kosnesna namarisen kaku ḇeri.
63001013	Romawasya ro naek Sna koswar ro dine sfarem aroo faro Sna ro diya.
64001001	Gayus, naek yedi yaswar kaku! Aya, manfarkin jemaat, yaswar kaku ḇeri naek aw.
64001002	Yaḇenadiwarek insa nakam naḇye kuker aw ma wasma pararei imnis raris rur bedi iḇye kako.
64001003	Yaryaḇ kaku rofyor naek Kristen ono srama ma sikofen ḇadir ma beya ḇaḇeuser bedi ro ḇaryas ḇenapes ro Allah, snar wakenem ma wasouser ḇaryas ḇenapes ani.
64001004	Roi oso ḇa ḇefrur fayaryaḇ syadi ro yamnaf romawa yesi sikenem imnis ḇaryas ro Allah.
64001005	Naek yedi! Sasoasuser naek bedi komam fyasna ro rosai naek wafrurya faro naek Kristensya; ma naek wafawi ḇaimsya kako wuffarmyan si.
64001006	Sikofen ḇadir kwar faro jemaat ro dine ro saswar bedi. Wafnoḇek si insa simbran pdef ro mararan sedi. Wafrur rarirya imnis raris Allah marisen ḇyedi,
64001007	snar naek ansi mararan seja suffarmyan faro Kristus. Sifararur ma sisma fafnoḇek rosai ḇa kako ro kawasa ḇekyar faro Kristus ḇa.
64001008	Rarirya kawasa Kristen ko kofnoḇek min Kristen koḇesi imnis raris sine, insa koso si ro ḇaḇesewar sedi fakoḇaryas ḇemoḇ nakam ro Allah ḇekakuya wos ḇenapes ḇyedi.
64001009	Yafas kwar syap ḇeknampu faro jemaat, ḇape Diotrefes ḇemarisen ḇeḇe manfarkin ro jemaat, imewer iso aya.
64001010	Nari rofyor yarafa, yawos ro rosai ifrur kwar, isoine ro roi ḇarḇor ma sararer ikofen ro inkoya! Ḇape nakam namnis ḇaim faroi. Rofyor naek Kristen koḇesi srama faro i, imewer isrow si. Isyadi wer myunwarek kawasa ḇemarisen ḇesrow naek srar ansi, ma iwan fasisasyarbur jemaat!
64001011	Naek ayedi yaswar kaku, waso awer rosai ḇeḇye ḇa. Mboi waso rosai ḇeḇye. Mansei ḇefrur roi ḇeḇye, ḇyeknam ro Allah. Ma mansei ḇefrur roi ḇarḇor, isoine isrow Allah ḇaim.
64001012	Kawasa kam sisandik Demetrius. Ma ro ḇaryas ḇekaku ro Allah kako, sisandik i. Inko kako inkosandik i, ma mkofawi sanandik inkoḇena nkaku.
64001013	Roi nabor ḇeḇefandun yaḇe yakofen faro mko, ḇape yaḇaḇir iḇye syadi kuker syap awer.
64001014	Yakyar fyoro ḇa nari yasrow mko wer, ma nari kowawos ro ḇarpon kuker ḇarpon.
64001015	Aski faro aw! Min koḇesi ro dine sfarem aroo faro naek aw. Wakofen ḇadir aroo yena faro min kobansi kam.
65001001	Naek srar ḇesma fararyor kwar ro Allah Kmaya, iswar kaku ma mkoḇeḇewaren faro Yesus Kristus. Aya -- Yudas -- naek ro Yakobus, ḇeḇemanwawan ro Yesus Kristus;
65001002	yakyar Allah ḇyeḇok mko ma ḇyuk ḇemko ḇaḇye ma aski nabor kada.
65001003	Naek srar yaswar kaku! Kaku ḇeri yakara yafas syap faro mko ro ḇaḇeaski kokam kofawi kwar ani. Ḇape baboine yaḇaḇir yasma dafdif fayaḇuk ananun faro mko kuker syap ine insa mkofaḇri ro Allah kakyar ḇyuk ḇeoser kwar monda isof fyoro-fyoro faro kawasa ḇyesi.
65001004	Snar fawawi ḇa, mboi snonkaku ono sisya ssun yokef rofandu mko. Si snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor ḇeḇeninyan ḇaryas ro Allah koḇedi ḇaḇye ḇyena fasḇuk ifrur nafsu-rmomen sena. Ma sfamyunepen Yesus Kristus, Manpapoik oser monda isoine Manseren koḇedi. Ro awar ḇeponya samamyai sedi ḇyeḇeḇaryas ro Refo kwar.
65001005	Nane kam mkofawina kwar. Mboi yamarisen yaḇuk swarepen faro mko rariso Manseren ḇyuk aski faro Israelsya ro sup Masir, ḇape ḇarpurya myun ḇekyar ḇa sya.
65001006	Mkoswarepen malaikat-malaikat ḇeyunuk yawek papoik sedi, isof sisasyarbur moḇ kankain sena. Malaikat ansi Allah ḇyewanka si kuker wanka ḇekain fyoro ro moḇ ḇepampan. Ro diwa sidwarek pdef si isof ssḇuk samamyai faro si ro Ras ḇebaya.
65001007	Mkoswarepen kako mnu Sodom ma Gomora fnoḇek mnumnu ḇefanami na, kawasa ḇekain ro mnu anna sakfrur roi ḇarḇor imnis malaikat ansi sifrur na. Sifrur farḇuk ma ḇarḇor, isof sisma kandera kuker samamyai ro for ḇekain fyoro, insa neswarapepen faro kawasasya kam.
65001008	Rarirya kako kawasa ḇemafu isof sifrur mamas faro baken mankunsi sena. Smam kyof Allah papoik ḇyena ma sonef roi ḇekenem ḇepyum ro boiyaswa.
65001009	Mikhael mankundi ḇeḇeḇru ro malaikatsya, rofyor fyamfaḇri ryakrakrok kuker Ibiris ro mansei nari ḇesrow Moses kekḇa ḇyedi, Mikhael ipok ḇyemankara faro Ibiris kuker wos anonef ḇa. Mikhael ikofen monda, "Manseren nari isonek aw!"
65001010	Ḇape snonkaku ansi sisampum ma sonef roi ḇeḇor sifawi ḇana. Sikada simnis raris aiwan ḇena swaruser ḇa, ma ḇefawi roi ḇeḇor kuker kakara sena. Ḇape snar roi ḇeradine nafrur farmambriwer si.
65001011	Raro faro si, snar siso Kain nyan ḇyena. Insa sisma pipi, simbran nyan ḇeḇor imnis raris Bileam. Ma si kako sroe snar sisampum imnis raris Korakh.
65001012	Rofyor mkofrur munara nanan, snonkaku ansi sifrur mamas rofandu mko, snar simai ḇa sanan kuker masaḇsoḇ, ma sfandun mankunsi monda. Sikada simnis mandep wamya iwufpum, ḇape ssḇuk mekem ḇa. Sikada simnis ai knam ḇemarem ḇa rofyor mamaremya; ai knam spas rares na kwar inja nmasbos kaku.
65001013	Simnis raris risen ḇekaḇaḇus ḇemun ro soren, rarirya kako sḇayorem fararur ḇeḇyeḇa sena ḇefrur mamyai. Sikada simnis kumsya ḇewayan mura-muma ma Allah fyasos moḇ ḇepampan syadi ḇekain fyoro faro si kwar.
65001014	Henokh, ḇeḇeḇarpur ro Adam ro syos ḇeḇefikya, ḇyaryar snonkaku sine ro ḇepon kwar ḇo doḇo, "Mkomam, Manseren nari ryama kuker malaikat syaran-syaran ḇesren ḇyesya,
65001015	fasḇuk kakara faro snonkaku kam. Manseren nari ḇyuk samamyai faro fararur ḇeḇarḇor ro ḇefawi i ḇasya. Ma nari ḇyuk samamyai kako faro wos anonef ro kawasa ḇesasar ma ḇeḇeankarkar sikofen faro i kwar."
65001016	Snonkaku ansi sisurem ma sfafayaf ḇesya kwar. Sikenem imnis marisen-rmomen ḇesasar sena. Sisandik mankun si, ma skara snonkaku nari sisma fainda rosya.
65001017	Ḇape naek srar yesi mko, mkoswarepen rosai Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus manwawan ḇyesi sikofen ro ḇepon kwar.
65001018	Sikofen ḇadir ḇepon faro mko kwar, mboi kowaf Ras Ḇepupesya, nari snonkaku ḇeyonef mko sikḇawes isoine snonkaku ḇekenem imnis marisen nafsu-rmomen ḇarḇor sena.
65001019	Sikada snonkaku ḇefrur anun ḇesisya ma sisma papoik ro rarmomen rari supswan. Sikada snonkaku ḇena Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇa.
65001020	Ḇape mko kam, naek srar ayesi, mko kada mkokfin mankun mko ro kankenem kakyarya kada; kakyar mkoḇena nasren kaku; ma mkonadi kuker papoik Allah Rur ḇyedi,
65001021	ma mkokenem ḇesya kwar ro fadadiren Allah saswar ḇyedi rofyor mkowaf ḇaḇye ro Manseren koḇedi Yesus Kristus, nari ḇeḇuk kankenem ḇekaku ḇekain fyoroya faro mko.
65001022	Faro snonkaku ḇeḇeḇirḇarsya mkofasna mkoswar si kada.
65001023	Mkosmer sibur for insa sisma aski. Faro ḇesesya iḇye mkofasna saswar kuker makakak, ḇape mkayin mar sena ḇemamas kuker nafsu-rmomen ḇesasar sena.
65001024	Allah, ḇesma papoikya i waren insa mkosapi ḇa, ma papoik ani ḇeyun mko ḇeḇarpon baba ḇyedi kuker raryaḇ ḇefarorew ḇa,
65001025	ikada Allah oser monda Ḇeḇuk koreri faro ko ro Yesus Kristus Manseren koḇedi. Ikada Allah ḇepyum, ḇeba, ḇesma papoik ma samambraḇ ro awar ḇepon isof baboine ma fyoroya! Amin.
66001001	Syap ine kyur rosai Allah ikofen ḇadir faro Yesus Kristus insa fyasna na faro Allah manfamyan ḇyesi rosai nari ḇerama fasaw na. Kristus iwan malaekat ḇyedi faro manfamyan ḇyedi. Yohanes, insa ikofen ḇadir roi anna faroi.
66001002	Yohanes fyarfyar roi myam anna kam; ma ḇaḇesaksi ḇyedi ḇekur Allah wos ḇyena ḇyuk faro Yesus Kristus.
66001003	Fainda faro snonkaku ḇewasya ma ḇerower ḇaryas ḇardadi syap ine roi ikofen ḇadir na ma isouser rosai sfas roi na. Snar fyoroḇa wer nari nakam ndama.
66001004	Naek srar ḇekain ro jemaat rifik ro supya mnuk Asia! Aya, Yohanes, yakyar naek srar mkosma ro Allah, ḇaḇye ma aski --isoine i sya, ma i sya kwar, ma nari ryama -- ma rur rifik sisya ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi kako,
66001005	ma ro Yesus Kristus, Saksi ḇeḇeuser. I sḇawes kaḇer ḇepon ro marmar ma ikada isma papoik ḇesyadi ro wairek-wairek ro sup ine. Yesus iswar ko, ma kuker marmar ḇyedi fyaspar ko ro sasar koḇena kuker rikḇyena --
66001006	ḇarpurya ifrur ko fakoḇe er oser, koḇe imam-imam ḇeyuffarmyan Allah, Kma ḇyedi. Yesus Kristus iba syadi ma ḇena papoik isof fyoro-fyoro. Amin!
66001007	Mkomam, ryama kuker mandep! Kawasa kam nari smam i, ḇewan i kuker bomsya kako. Ersya kam ro supna nari skanes snar i. O, Amin.
66001008	"Aya kada ḇeponyama ḇepupesya, Manseren Allah ikofen, isya, isya kwar, ma nari ryama, Ḇesma Papoik syadiya."
66001009	Aya Yohanes, naek mkoḇedi bemnis kuker mko ḇeḇekandera imnis manfamyan oser-oser ḇeso Kristus. Kofarmku ro kandera imnis kawasa ḇyesi. Sisawen aya ro myos Patmos snar yaḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi, Yesus ḇyuk na.
66001010	Ro Manseren ras ḇyedi, Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyepoik aya, inja yarower mkaren ḇeba oso -- imnis kḇur ḇerok -- dawos ro dokor ayedi.
66001011	Mkaren ani ikofen, "Fas rosai mam na, ma farem syap ine faro jemaat rifik nane: Efesus, Smirna, Pergamus, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia ma Laodikia."
66001012	Yaknenef ḇedokor fayamam mansei ḇewawos faro aya. Ma yamam padamara ḇeḇewemin rifik ḇeḇemarom sifrur naro brawen.
66001013	Rofandu padamara wemin anna yamam snon oso dores imnis snonkaku. Syansun syatu ḇekwan isof ro wemin ḇyesi. Ro andersi isron sarei brawen.
66001014	Snonburyam ḇyena napyoper imnis manwarefbur, payapyoper mankum. Mka ḇyesi sisak imnis for;
66001015	wemin ḇyesi sinyar imnis kansai sikun ro for. Mkaren ḇyedi imnis sriḇwar ḇesobir ḇerok maum.
66001016	Dufepen kum rifik ro ḇramin ḇyedi ḇar rakuya, ma sumber ḇesar raḇanḇar isya ro sḇadon ḇyedi. Ḇarpon ḇyedi isna imnis ori ro orkok pandaf.
66001017	Rofyor yamam i, yakain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇyedi imnis snonkaku ḇemar kwar. Ḇape ryir ḇramin raku ḇyedi ro aya ma ikofen, "Wamkak awer! Aya kada ḇeponya ma ḇepupesya.
66001018	Aya kada ḇekenem! Yamar kwar, ḇape mam kada, yakenem isof fyoro-fyoro. Yasma papoik syadi ro marmarya ma mun aiḇui.
66001019	Rarirya, fas rosai mam na, isoine rosai naisya ro baboine, ma rosai nari ḇerama na.
66001020	Inekada kankunes ro kum rifik mam ro ḇramin ḇar raku yedi, ma ro padamara ḇeḇewemin rifik ro brawen anna. Kum rifik ansi isoine malaikatsya ro jemaat rifik, ma padamara ḇeḇewemin rifik anna isoine jemaat rifik anna."
66002001	"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Efesus, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇeyufepen kum rifik ro ḇramin ḇar raku ḇyedi, ma ḇembran rofandu padamara brawen ḇeḇewemin rifik anna.
66002002	Yafawi roi mkofrurna: mko fararur sambraḇ ma mkosnemna nadworen kaku. Yafawi mkomewer mkoso ḇeḇarḇorsya. Ma snonkaku ḇekarem mankun si ḇemanwawan ḇape roḇa, iḇye mkomnasen si, insa mkofawi wawan sisyaḇa, mboi sankarkar.
66002003	Ma mkoknon mboi mkoḇekandera snar aya, ma mkofawi mkomor ḇa.
66002004	Ḇape yasampum mko: Snar saswar ḇepon mkobani maro aya isyaḇa kwar.
66002005	Rarirya mkoswarepen mkosapi ḇinkwan kaku! Mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena, ma mkofrur rosai mkofrur ro ḇepon kwar ani. Rarirya ḇaido, nari yarama ma yapas padamara wemin mkoḇanibur moḇ ḇyedi.
66002006	Ḇape roi ḇeḇye oso isya ro mko isoine: Mkayin fararur ro ḇeso Nikolaus sya, aya kako yayin si.
66002007	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat! Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yaḇuk fadan bon ro ai knam kankenem ḇesur ro Allah yaf ḇyedi."
66002008	"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Smirna, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇeponya ma ḇepupesya -- ḇemar kwar ma ḇekḇok kaḇer.
66002009	Yafawi kandera mkoḇena; yafawi mkosaḇarar -- ḇape mkoḇekayan kaku ḇeri! Yafawi anonef ro kawasa ḇekarem mankun siḇe Yahudi, ḇape rarirya ḇa; sikada Ibiris kawasa ḇyesiri!
66002010	Mkomkak awer kandera nari fyoro ḇa mkosma na. Mkoswarepen, Ibiris nari ḇyeono ro mko fassun ro bui faifrowes sas mko. Nari mkosma kandera ras samfur. Iḇyesyadi mkofarmku nako faro aya isof mkomar, nari yaḇuk faro mko wower ḇekakuya.
66002011	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat! Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari ismaḇaḇeri kandera marmar ḇeḇesuruya."
66002012	"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Pergamus, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇeyuf sumber ḇesar raḇanḇar.
66002013	Yafawi moḇ mkokain rona. Mkokain ro moḇ karapesa ḇaḇesasoser Ibirisya. Mkofarmku nako faro aya. Rofafisu Antipas, saksi ḇeḇeuser ayedi, ḇyeḇemun rofandu mko, ro ayar mamun. Ibirisya kyain roya, rofyor ani kako mkofamyun kakyar mkoḇena ḇa faro aya.
66002014	Ma rariryano roi ono naisya yamarisen naba ro mko: Rofandu mko ono sisya siso farkarkor rosai Bileam ḇyukna. Bileam ḇyuk farkarkor faro Balak insa ḇyeninyan kawasa Israel, fasifrur sasar; ḇyeḇuk si fasan roḇean ḇefarser kwar faro amfyanir ma sifrur farbuk.
66002015	Rarirya kako rofandu mko snonkaku ono sisya siso farkarkor ro ḇeso Nikolaus.
66002016	Snar rarirya mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena! Mkofrur rarirya ḇaido, kniko nari yarama faro mko wer ma yaḇe embroḇ snonkaku ansi kuker sumber ḇero sḇadon ayedi.
66002017	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat! Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yaḇuk fadan mamami (manna) ḇeyokef, ma nari oser-oser isma ro aya karui ḇepyoper oser. Ro karui ani sfas snonsnon babo oso, manseirya wer kako ifawi ḇa, mboi snonkaku ḇesma iya derer."
66002018	"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Tiatira, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro Allah Rumkun ḇyedi, mka ḇyesi sisak imnis for, ma wemin ḇyesu sumnis kansai ḇenyar sikun ro for.
66002019	Yafawi roi ḇeḇor mkofrur na -- yafawi mkosaswar, mkosouser, mkofararur, ma mkofarmku ro kandera. Yafawi baboine mkofararur nabor syadi ro ḇeponiwara.
66002020	Ḇape yasampum mko: Snar mkoḇuk mkosnemna faro Izebel kwar, bin ḇekarem ḇinkundiḇe Allah wawan ḇyedi. Manfamyan ayesi sibor kwar isrer si ma fyarkor si fasifrur farḇuk ma san roḇean sḇukfarser kwar faro amfyanirsya.
66002021	Yaḇuk fafisu kwar faro si fasimbror ro sasar sena, ḇape simarisen simnai ḇa rofararur farḇuk.
66002022	Mkoswarepen! Nari yapyasbos i isof iduf ro kamboi ḇyedi. Rodia i kuker snonkaku ḇefrur farḇuk fnoḇek isya nari sisma kandera ḇeba. Nakam nari yafrurna ro baboine -- mboi rofyor simnai ro sifrur roi ḇeḇarḇor fnoḇek kuker iḇa.
66002023	Ma ḇeso isya nari yamun si kako insa jemaat sifawi kam aya kada yafawi snonkakusya swaruser sena. Nari yamunsu faro mko kam imnis oser-oser fararur ḇyedi.
66002024	Ḇape eḇesesya ro Tiatira ḇeyakso farkarkor ḇeḇarḇor ani ḇa, ma ḇefarkor fawawi Ibiris ani ḇa. Yakofen nari yaḇuk kamnam ḇemarḇak faro mko ḇa.
66002025	Ḇape isof rofyor nari yaramumaya, iḇyesyadi mkoso faswef rosai mkosma kwar.
66002026	-
66002027	Mansei ḇeḇefainda, ma ḇefararur pdef isof ro papupesya ḇefrur rosai yamarisen, nari yaḇuk papoik faroi imnis yasma ro Kma yedi. Nari sisma papoik ro aya fasḇuk sasoser faro er-er kuker ankyon mankarmomen, ma ḇyuki ryaḇdiwer er-er ansi isof semommom imnis uren saprop.
66002028	Nari sisma kum mesri ro aya.
66002029	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"
66003001	"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Sardis, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇena Allah Rur rifik ḇyesi ma kum rifik ansi. Yafawi rosai mkofrurna. Soḇeda mkokenem ḇape mkomar kwar!
66003002	Inja, mkokḇok, ma mkosambraḇser rosai isya kaker faro mko ḇepon ro nakam namar ḇaimya. Snar yasma mboi rosai mkofrurna, oso imnis ḇaim ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi.
66003003	Inja, mkoswarepen kaḇer wer rosai sfarkor ḇepon kwar faro mko ma rosai mkomnaf kwar. Mkofrurna ma mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena. Rofyor mkombror ḇa, nari yarama faro mko imnis raris ḇekaraw; ma nari mkofawi ḇa fafisu yaramaya.
66003004	Ma rofandu mko ro Sardis snonkaku ono sisya siwaren sansun sena insa nasren faswef. Sima nari simbran fnoḇek aya kuker ssun sansun ḇepyoper, snar sikada sisyus.
66003005	Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari ssḇuk fasyun sansun ḇepyoper. Snonsnon sena nari yapyosna ḇa ro syap kawasa ḇekenem. Ma roḇarpon Kma yedi ma malaikat ḇyesya nari yakarem si ḇekawasa ayesi.
66003006	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"
66003007	"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Filadelfia, fas radine: Inekada ananun roi Ḇesren, Ḇenapes. Ikada dufepen asyopder Daud ḇyedi; rofyor syeḇen, oso fakyeni ḇa, ma rofyor kyeni, oso fasyeḇeni ḇa kako.
66003008	Yafawi rosai mkofrurna. Yafawi mkosambraḇ mankun ḇa; mkoso farkarkor ayena kwar ma mkoḇeuser faro aya. Yaseḇen kedwai oso faro mko kwar, oso fakyeni ḇa kako.
66003009	Mkoswarepen ine: Mansei ḇeḇekawasa Ibiris ani, ḇeḇeankarkar ḇekarem mankundiḇe Yahudi, mboi sima roḇa. Nari yafrur fasrama sḇansuba ro ḇarpon mkoḇena. Ma nari sifawi mboi yaswar mko.
66003010	Snar mkoso sasoser ayena kwar ma mkofarmku kwar, aya kako nari yafadiren mko rofafisu kandera nari ḇemun supswan ḇesiper ine. Roi ḇeradine nari ndama nefarawrowes faro kawasa kam ro supna.
66003011	Nari yarama fasaw! Mkowaren naḇye rosai mkona kwar, insa oso fadun awer wower ḇeḇefainda mkoḇedi ḇa.
66003012	Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yafrur faimnis adir ro Allah yedi rum ḇesren ḇyedi, ma nari isasyar ro moḇ ani wer ḇa. Snonsnon Allah yedi, ma snonsnon mnu Allah yedi -- isoine Yerusalem babo nari ḇesabu roboiyaswa, ro Allah yedi -- nari yafas i ro snonkaku ani mankundi. Snonsnon babo yedi kako nari yafas i ro mankundi.
66003013	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"
66003014	"Faro malaikat jemaat ro Laodikia, fas radine: Inekada ananun ro i ḇenirḇe Amin (Yesus) saksi ḇeḇeuser ma ḇenapes, knam ḇedafdif roi ḇeḇor kam Allah ifrurna.
66003015	Yafawi rosai mkofrurna; Yafawi mkoprim ba ma mkosam ba kako. Iḇyekada mkoprim roḇa mkosam!
66003016	Ḇape mkofarmandin; mkosam ba ma mkoprim ba kako. Rarirya nari yaḇayorem mko.
66003017	Rofyor mkokofen, 'Nko ḇekayan ma nana nko ḇena namnis; nkananjar royo ḇa.' Ḇape mkofawi ḇa mkosaḇarar ma mkofrur saneso mankun mko! Mkosaḇarar, mkoḇaḇer, ma mkoparyaref.
66003018	Inja yanun faro mko insa mkokoḇes brawen ro aya, isoine brawen ḇekaku, insa mkoḇekayan. Mkokoḇes ro aya sansun ḇepyoper kako famkosansunwarek baken ḇeḇaḇer mkoḇena ḇefrur mamyai. Ma mkokoḇes aryawin kako fasḇuki isfu mka mkoḇesi insa mkomam.
66003019	Snonkaku yaswarsya si yasonek ma yaprersya. Inja mkomarisen ido mkombror ro sasar mkoḇena.
66003020	Mkomam! Yores ro kedwaya ḇarpondi ma yanuk. Rofyor oso ryower mkaren yedi, ma syeḇen kedwai, nari yasun fayasrowi; nari yanan fnoḇek i ma dakanan fnoḇek aya.
66003021	Mansei ḇeḇefainda, nari yaḇuk fakyain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ayedi fnoḇek aya. Snar mankun daya kako yaḇefainda kwar ma baboine yakain fnoḇek Kma yedi ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
66003022	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido ryower ma kyara rosai Allah Rur ḇyedi ikofen faro jemaat-jemaat!"
66004001	Posa kwar yasma mamam oso wer. Yamam kedwai oso ro boiyaswa ḇyeḇeseḇen. Ḇarpurya yarower wer mkaren randakya ḇewawos kwar maro aya imnis rakrok kḇur. Mkaren ani ikofen, "Rwama wekmumyas. Nari yafasna faro aw rosai nari ḇeramana."
66004002	Fasaw kaku yasma papoik ro Allah Rur ḇyedi. Ma yamam ro boiyaswa karapesa ḇaḇesasoser oso, ma snon oso kyain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani.
66004003	Snon ani ḇarpon ḇyedi isna imnis permata baiduri pandan (karui ḇekakur sananai ḇyedi ryumek) ma permata delima (karui ḇekakur sananai ḇyedi irik). Saseḇi oso isnai ḇezamrud (karui ḇekakur kaku, sananai ḇyedi ryumek), ḇeparek yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani.
66004004	Karapesa ḇaḇesasoser samfur risuru seser rifiak ḇese nkainyar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani. Rodia manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak skain rona ssansun sansun ḇepyoper ma sisaswo wower brawen.
66004005	Karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani isasyar arḇeḇer ma karadu ḇerok ḇeruru. Ma roḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani paramrom rifik naisya nasnai; nakada Allah Rur rifik ḇyenairya.
66004006	Ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani kosma roi oso komam imnis soren fanin, isren imnis kristal, (fanin sanana ḇyedi isren). Ma roi ḇekenem rifiak nores snefer yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ro ḇarpon, ma dokorya nafo kuker mka ro kum.
66004007	Roi ḇekenem ḇepon ani komam imnis singa, (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek). Ḇeḇesuruya, imnis sapi snon. Ḇeḇekiorya ḇarpon ḇyedi imnis snonkaku. Ḇeḇefiakya, komam imnis mankankan ḇeroḇ.
66004008	Roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi, oser-oser ḇyeprer riwonem, ḇandiri ma dori nafo kuker mka ro kum, nkain yari. Roḇ meser roi ḇekenem ansi sidisen ḇesyakwar, "Sren, sren, Manseren isren, Allah ḇepik syadi; isya, isya kwar, ma nari ḇeramumaya."
66004009	Roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi sidisen, dow sanandik, jow ma kasumasa faro i ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, isoine i ḇekenem isof fyoro-fyoro. Ma rofyor roi ḇekenem ansi sidisen,
66004010	ma manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak ansi skain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, raimnai sḇan suba faro i ḇekenem isof fyoro-fyoro ani. Ḇarpurya srir wower sena ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani ma sikofen,
66004011	"O, Manseren, o, Allah nkobedi! Aw monda kada wasyus fawasma sanandik, syowi ma papik. Snar aw ḇefrur roi ḇeḇor kam, ma snar marisen ḇedi kako roi ḇeḇor anna neḇefrur kwar ma nakenem."
66005001	Ma ḇarpurya yamam ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ro ḇramin ḇyeja syap oso isya, syap ḇeniw. Syap ani ifo kuker fasfas ro ḇanḇar. Syap ḇeniw ani ḇyeḇekakop kuker kakop rifik.
66005002	Raimnai yamam malaikat ḇesambraḇ oso, kyaru naba, "Mansei ḇesyus faḇeḇas kakop ma syap ḇeniw ine?"
66005003	Ḇape snon oso ḇa iḇye ro boiyaswa, ma sup ine, roḇa ro sup ine baḇdi osoḇa faḇyas syap ani, ma myam rodori.
66005004	Inja yakanes rawo yamarpapyoi, snar snon oso isya ḇa kako isyus faḇyas syap ani, ma myam rodori.
66005005	Raimnai snon oso ro manfamyan ansi ikofen maro aya, "Kwanes awer! Mame! Singa (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) ro er Yehuda, ḇeḇeḇarpur ro Daud ḇeba ani, ḇyefainda kwar. I ḇesyus faḇeḇas kakop rifik ma syap ḇeniw ani."
66005006	Ma yamam Rumkun Domba oso dores rofandu karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ma roi ḇekenem rifik kuker manfarkin-manfarkin ansi sores yar i. Rumkun Domba ani imnis raris ḇyeḇekauk kwar. Ḇyeknapur rifik ma mka rifik: isoine Rur rifik ro Allah, iwan kwar ḇesupna ḇesiper.
66005007	Ḇarpurya Rumkun Domba ani rya dun syap ḇeniw ani ro ḇramin ḇar raku ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani.
66005008	Ro fafisu Rumkun Domba ani dun syap ḇeniw ani, roi ḇekenem rifiak ma manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak ansi skain wepur ro ḇarpon ḇyedi. Manfarkin ansi oser-oser duf sonker ma sek brawen ḇeser mamboḇo, isoine Allah kawasa ḇyesi nadi sena.
66005009	Ma sidisen mkaren dow ḇaḇo oso: "Aw kada wasyus fawun syap ani, ma bas kakop ḇyena. Snar beḇemun kwar, ma kuker marmar ḇedi, snonkaku ro keret kam, wos, kawasa ma er bak namuk si kwar faro Allah.
66005010	Wafrur si fase er oser seimam-imam, insa suffarmyan Allah koḇedi, ma ssḇuk sasoser imnis wairek ro supna."
66005011	Ḇarpurya yamam wer ma yarower mkaren malaikat sibor sesyaran-syaran ma syaran samfur-risamfur! Sores yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma roi ḇekenem rifiak ma manfarkin ansya.
66005012	Sidisen kuker mkaren ḇeba, "Rumkun Domba skawuk kwar ani, isyus faisma papoik, ḇaḇekayan, ḇaḇefawawi ma ḇaḇesamambraḇ; i syus fasesyowi i, isma baba ma sisandik i!"
66005013	Ma yarower roi ḇekenem ro nanki, ro supna, ro supna baḇna, ro sorenya dori -- roi ḇekenem ḇeḇor kam ro farsyos sansoren ine -- nadisen, "I ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser, ma Rumkun Domba ani, ikada isma sanandik ma syowi ma baba ma ḇaḇepapoik isof fyoro-fyoro!"
66005014	Ma roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi skarem: "Amin!" Ma manfarkin ansi kako skain wepur ma sḇan suba.
66006001	Posa kwar yamam Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeponya rofandu kakop rifik anna. Ma yarower roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi oso ikofen, "Rwama!" Mkaren ḇyedi ryok imnis rakrok karadu.
66006002	Raimnai yamam, kuda ḇepyoper oso ḇeyekroiya duf saren oser, ma ssḇuk faroi wower oser. Ma rya imnis snon oser ḇesma fainda faḇefaḇri ḇaḇefaindaya.
66006003	Ma ḇarpurya Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇesuruya, ma yarower roi ḇekenem ḇeḇesuruya ikofen, "Rwama!"
66006004	Inja kuda ḇese oser isasyar wer. Kuda ani irik ma dafuk. Ḇeyekiya ssḇuk papoik fadun askibur supna ḇesiper, insa snonkaku smunyae si. Ma ssḇuk faroi sumber ḇeba oser.
66006005	Raimnai Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇekiorya. Ma yarower roi ḇekenem ḇeḇekiorya ikofen, "Rwama!" Yamam, kuda ḇepaisem oser. Ḇeyekiya duf warnkyara risuru ro ḇraminya.
66006006	Ma yarower imnis mkaren rofandu roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi ḇekofen, "Sasuref ras oser fasibu amek oser, ḇyepipi sarak dinar oser; ma sasuref ras oser katera amek rikior, ḇyepipi sarak dinar oser. Ḇape mkokaruk awer zaitun knam ma anggur knam anna."
66006007	Raimnai Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇefiakya. Ma yarower roi ḇekenem ḇeḇefiakya ikofen, "Rwama!"
66006008	Wakmam kada kuda oser sanana ḇyedi ryumek-nyanyar. Ḇeyekiya snonsnon ḇyedi Marmari. Ma mun aiḇui duserfaku ro dokor ḇyedi. Ssḇuk faro si mun ḇeḇefiak ro supna faro papoik sedi, insa smamun kuker ḇaḇe embroḇ, kuker fafisu basbiser, kuker dafduf ma kuker aiwan ḇeḇarḇor.
66006009	Raimnai Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇerimya. Ma yamam ro rokef farsarserya baḇdi rur snonkaku smun faḇemar kwar ansya, snar sḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi kuker ḇaḇesaksi sena.
66006010	Ma sfararar kuker mkaren ḇeba, "O, Manseren Ḇepoik syadi, ḇesren ma ḇenapes! Fafisu rosai wer insape kwukeḇ kankain supna ma ḇuk samamyai faro si snar smun inko kwar?"
66006011	Ḇarpurya ssḇuk faro si oser-oser syatu ḇepyoper oser. Ma siwan si fasimnaisu fafisu knik wer, isof dandonek sedi imnis min sesi ḇeyuffarmyan ma naek srar sesi nari sḇeḇemun imnis si kako.
66006012	Raimnai yamam Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇewonemya. Ma rim ḇeba ḇeyun nyawa myun. Ori pyaisem imnis sanampuru, ma paikya fyanandik imnis rik.
66006013	Maksya sfarbrubru ro nanki ḇesupna imnis imyui bon ḇekamur ḇerwu ro knamya rofafisu wam doḇerya kyiker.
66006014	Ma nanki ipromes imnis syap ḇeniw, bon ma aimandoi (myos) nakam neḇekanowbur moḇ nena.
66006015	Ma waireksya ro supna, ḇebararasya, mambrisya, kawasa ḇeḇekayan ma kawasa ḇesma papoik, ma kawasa ḇesesya, fnoḇek manfyan ma snonkaku ḇemkei, sikam siyokef ro aḇyaḇ ma ro bon karuina swaf-swafna.
66006016	Ma sfararar faro bon ma karui anna, "Mkomsiserepen inko! Mkoyokef inko ro mamam ḇyedi ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser, snar masasor ro Rumkun Domba ani!
66006017	Snar ras ḇeba ḇeyun nyawa ryama kwar, baboine sfasna masasor sena ma snonkaku oso ḇa kako fyarmku ro ḇarpon sena!"
66007001	Ḇarpurya, yamam malaikat rifiak sores ro dopir rifiak ro supna. Ma sidwarek wam rifiak ro supna insa wamo iso awer roḇande, roḇa rosoren, roḇa ro ai knamna.
66007002	Raimnai yamam malaikat oso ḇese isasyar ro ḇar ori dek. Dun Allah kakop ḇekenem ḇyedi. Ma kuker mkaren ḇeba malaikat ani dor malaikat rifiak ḇesma Allah papoik ḇyedi faḇemkok ḇande ma soren.
66007003	Malaikat ani ikofen, "Mkomkok ḇepon awer ḇandeya, roḇa sorenya, roḇa ai knam na, rofyor koḇuk kakop aḇyair ro Allah koḇedi faro manfamyan ḇyesya andar sena ḇaim."
66007004	Raimnai ikofen ḇadir maro aya, snonkaku ssḇuk kakop aḇyair Allah ro andar sena, dandonek seja syaran utin oser samfur rifiak seser rifiak. Snonkaku sine sunsi ro er Israel keret samfur seser risuru;
66007005	ro keret oser-oser syaran samfur oser seser risuru. Isoine ro keret ma er: Yehuda, Ruben, Gad,
66007006	Asyer, Naftali, Manasye,
66007007	Simeon, Lewi, Isakhar,
66007008	Zebulon, Yusuf ma Benyamin.
66007009	Ḇarpurya yamam, snonkaku sibor syadi wer -- isof snon oso nari kyor dandonek sejaḇa! Sikada snonkaku ro ersya kam, keret, kawasa ma wosna. Ssansun syatu ḇepyoper ma suf srai ram, snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi sores roḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma roḇarpon Rumkun Domba ani.
66007010	Raimnai skaru kuker mkaren ḇeba, "Korer koḇeja ryama ro Allah koḇedi, ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, ma ro Rumkun Domba ani!"
66007011	Malaikatsya kam sores yar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma manfarkinsya kuker roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi. Malaikat ansi skain wepur roḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ma sḇansuba faro Allah.
66007012	Skaru kam, "Amin! Allah koḇeja ikada Allah ḇesma sanandik, baba ma ḇefawinananem. Ko kofen kasumasa nabor kaku faro Allah ma ḇaḇesyowi. I Allah ḇepoik ma ḇesambraḇ isof fyoro-fyoro! Amin."
66007013	Ma snon oso ro manfarkin ansi ifuken aya, "Snonkaku ḇesun syatu ḇepyoper sine, mansesirya ma sramakero?"
66007014	Yakarem, "Yafawi ḇa, tuan. Tuan mankundaw wafawi." Inja ikofen maro aya, "Sinekada snonkaku ḇesma koreri kwar, posa ro sisasyarbur kandera ḇeba. Spap syatu sena kwar ma sifrurna fanapyoper kuker Rumkun Domba ani rik ḇyena.
66007015	Rarirya sores ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser Allah, ma ssesyowi faro Allah roḇ meser ro Allah rum ḇesren ḇyedi. Ma i ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani nari iso si fafyadiren si.
66007016	Nari sibiser ma simbrow wer ḇa; samsam ori nari myun si wer ḇa,
66007017	snar Rumkun Domba ḇekain rofandu karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani nari ḇyemanfarandows faro si. Nari fyarkin si ḇewar baken ḇeḇuk kankenem. Ma nari Allah ipyos mkaru senabur simkasna."
66008001	Rofafisu Rumkun Domba ani ḇyas kakop ḇeḇefikya, boiyaswa ḇyeusḇa isof indokada oras muno.
66008002	Raimnai yamam malaikat rifik sores ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, ma ssḇuk kḇur rifik faro si.
66008003	Malaikat oso ḇese, dun ben brawen ḇeser farsarser ḇekun, ḇo ryama dores ro ḇarpon meja farsarser. Ssḇuk faroi kwar ben brawen ḇeser mamboḇo nabor kaku insa ḇyuk nfarser fnoḇek Allah kawasa ḇyesi nadi sena kam ro rokef brawen farsarser ani ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoserya.
66008004	Mamboḇo paw ma Allah kawasa ḇyesi nadi sena, nek ro malaikat ḇeyores ani ḇramin ḇyedi ro ḇarpon Allah.
66008005	Ḇarpurya malaikat ani dun ben brawen ḇeser farsarser ḇekun ani ma iseri kuker for ro rokef farsarser, posa isawen na ḇesupna. Ma karadu nḇeruru ma arḇeḇer ma rim.
66008006	Posa kwar, malaikat rifik ḇeyuf kḇur rifik ansi sfasos fasiḇe siwuf.
66008007	Malaikat ḇeponya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma mekem karui ma for irḇaren rik nasapi ḇesupna. Ma mun rikior ro supna nananem ranaḇro; rarirya kako mun rikior ro ai knam ma aḇrisna.
66008008	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇesuruya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma roi oso imnis bon ḇeba isber, ḇyeḇesawen ḇesoren. Ma mun rikior ro soren fyarwe ḇerik,
66008009	ma mun rikior ro roi ḇekenem ḇeḇor ro soren simar; rarirya kako mun rikior ro jawasina namsawer.
66008010	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇekiorya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma kum ḇeba oso, isber imnis paramrom, isapi ro nanki, ma myun munrikior ro warna ma war sunna.
66008011	(Kum ani snonsnon ḇyedi "Apsintus" = "Sarmar".) Ma mun rikior ro warna nsarmar, ma snonkaku sibor simar snar sinem war ḇesarmar anna.
66008012	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇefiakya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi. Ma mun rikior ro ori, mun rikior ro paiki, ma mun rikior ro kumsya seḇeprer isof mun rikior ro sambraḇ sena napromes. Ma mun rikior ro meserya pyampan ma rarirya kako mun rikior ro roḇya.
66008013	Raimnai yamam, ma yarower mankankan oso iroḇ ro sansoren ḇoka ḇo kyaru, "Raro! Raro! Rarokada faro snonkaku kam ro supna, nari rofafisu mkorower malaikat rikior ḇese ansko skowuf kḇur skoḇesi!"
66009001	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇerimya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma yamam kum oso isapi ro nanki ḇesupna. Ssḇuk faro kum ani asyopder mun aiḇui.
66009002	Ma kum ani syeḇen mun aiḇui; ma paw nasasyar roi imnis paw ro apen ḇeba. Ori ma sansoren ḇoka pyampan, snar paw ro mun aiḇui.
66009003	Raimnai kampam sisasyar ro paw ani sisabu ḇesupna. Ssḇuk papoik faro kampam ansi imnis raris ssḇuk faro manora (aiwan ḇeyarek sayaryur).
66009004	Sidwarek si fasan awer aḇris roḇa ai knam, roḇa rokaker ḇesena. Mboi smun monda snonkaku ḇesma kakop aḇyair ro Allah ḇa ro andar sena.
66009005	Kampam ansi sidwarek si insa smun awer snonkaku ansi, mboi sifrur kandera monda si paik ririm. Sayaryur ani imnis kandera manora, ḇeyarek, rofyor darek snonkaku.
66009006	Paik ririm ani, snonkaku ssḇesasewar insa simar, ḇape nari simar ḇa; simarisen simar mura, ḇape marmarya ḇyinkwanbur si.
66009007	Kampam ansi komam simnis kuda-kuda ḇefasos faḇeḇe embroḇ. Ro ḇrusena roi oso komam imnis wower brawen. Ḇarpon sena namnis snonkaku.
66009008	Snonburyam sena namnis snonburyam bine, ma nakor sena namnis singa nakor. (Aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek.)
66009009	Sisosefwarek sianderna kuker adai sansun mankarmomen. Prer sena ndok imnis rakrok dandonek kuda kareta ḇeḇeḇeyoper ḇe embroḇ.
66009010	Sḇepurai ma sarek sayaryur imnis manora. Ma ropurai sena sisma samambraḇ fasifrur kandera snonkaku isof paik ririm.
66009011	Sisma wairek ḇesasoser si, wairek ani isoine malaikat ḇekarem ro munaiḇui. Snonsnon ḇyedi ro wos Ibrani Abadon; ma ro wos Yunani Apolion (isoine "Ḇefrur makakok").
66009012	Raro ḇeponya isyonde kwar. Posa kwar nari raro risuru surama wer.
66009013	Ḇarpurya malaikat ḇeḇewonemya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi. Ma yarower mkaren oso ryok ro dopir rifiak ro rokef farsarser brawen ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi.
66009014	Mkaren ani ikofen faro malaikat ḇeḇewonem ani, "Per malaikat rifiak siyaḇek fanam war Efratsya!"
66009015	Raimnai sper malaikat ansya, snar sfasos si kwar faḇe oras, ras, paik, ma wampasi wambarek anna fasmun mun rikior ro kawasa kam.
66009016	Sikofen maro aya mboi dandonek sarar ḇeyek kudasya sesyaran-risyaran utin risuru.
66009017	Ma ro mamam, yamam kuda ansi ma ḇeyeksisya ssun sansun mankarmomen ḇefanandik ḇesak, ḇerumek imnis batu nilam, (karui ḇemnis for ḇerumek) ma nnanyar ḇebelerang (roi ḇesak ḇesam kaku ḇenanyar). Kudasya siḇrusna namnis singa (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) siḇrusna, ma ro sisḇasna nasasyar for, paw, ma belerang.
66009018	For, paw, ma belerang ḇesasyar ro kuda ansi sisḇasna nmun kawasa mun rikior kuker kandera rikior anna.
66009019	Samambraḇ kudasya neknam ro sisḇasna ma purai sena kako. Purai sena nbe ikak ḇru. Kuker purai sena, kuda ansi ssḇuk kandera faro snonkaku.
66009020	Ḇape kawasa ḇese ḇemar ḇa ro kandera anna kako, simbror ḇa ro roi mankunsi sifrurna. Simnai ḇa ro sisyom Ibiris, ma amfyanir brawen, sarak, kansai, karui ma ai, ḇemamḇa, roḇa ḇerower ma ḇembran ḇa.
66009021	Ma simbror ḇa ro smamun, sifrur fawawi rawan, sifrur farḇuk ma skaraw.
66010001	Raimnai yamam malaikat ḇesambraḇ oso ḇese isabu ro boiyaswa. Mandep nasawoḇi, ma saseḇi pyarek ḇru ḇyedi. Ḇarpon ḇyedi isnaper imnis ori, ma wemin ḇyesi simnis adir for.
66010002	Ro ḇraminsya syap kasun beniw ḇeḇaspyan oso isya. Wemin ḇar rakuya daref ro soren, ma ḇar rasarya daref ro ḇande.
66010003	Raimnai kyaru naba kaku imnis singa ḇeawur. Malaikat ani kyaru posa kwar, karadu rifik ndok ḇeruru.
66010004	Rarirya karadu rifik anna ndok, yamarisen yafasepen na, ḇape yamnaf mkaren oso ro boiyaswa ikofen, "Fasepen awer rosai karadu rifik anna nakofen na; ma kankunes ḇyena!"
66010005	Raimnai yamam malaikat beyaref ro soren ma ro ḇande ani ikanow ḇramin ḇar raku ḇyedi ḇenanki.
66010006	Ma syowar kuker Allah ḇekenem fyoroya snonsnon ḇyedi, ḇefrur nanki, supna, soren, ma roi ḇeḇor kam ḇero ina. Malaikat ani ikofen, "Fafisuya nari ḇyeḇesusu wer ḇa!
66010007	Ḇape rofafisu malaikat ḇeḇefikya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma nari Allah ifrur aw kankunes ḇyedi, imnis ikofen ḇadir kwar faro manfamyan ḇyesi, isoine nabisya."
66010008	Ḇarpurya mkaren ḇewawos kuker aya kwar ro boiyaswa ani, dawawos maro aya wer. Ikofen, "Rwa wun syap ḇeniw ḇeḇaspyan ro ḇramin malaikat ḇeyaref ro soren ma ḇande ani."
66010009	Inja yara faro malaikat ani ma yor insa ḇyuk syap kasun ḇeniwpyan ani maḇe aya. Ikofen, "Wuni ma wani. Ma ro snembri dori nari syarmar, ḇape ro sḇa bedi myarnden imnis umber."
66010010	Inja yun syap kasun ḇeniwpyan ani ro ḇramin ḇyedi ma yani. Ro sḇa yedi ḇyaḇir imnis umber, ḇape yoreni kwar, sneri syarmar.
66010011	Ḇarpurya ssḇuk sasoser maḇe aya, "Baryas ḇeoser wer ro Allah wos ḇyedi faro ersya, kawasa, wosna ma waireksya kam."
66011001	Raimnai ssḇuk maro aya ai fyor oser imnis ankyon warnkyara, raimnai ssḇuk sasoser, "Rwa kwara Allah Rum ḇyedi ma rokef farsarserya. Kwor dandonek snonkaku ḇeḇenadi ro dorisya.
66011002	Ḇape buḇes ḇero Allah Rum ḇyedi ḇandiriya, ima kwara aweri, snar mun ani ḇyeḇeḇuk kwar faro ḇefawi Allah ḇasya. Sikada nari sarefapepen mnu ḇesren ani isof paik samfur rifiak seser risuru.
66011003	Ma nari yawan saksi yesuya susun sansun mandak, ma nari suḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi isof ras syaran oser utin risuru samfur riwonem."
66011004	Saksi ansuya kada zaitun knam risuru ma padamara wemin risuru kosma ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi ḇefrur nanki, farsyos sansoren.
66011005	Rofyor snonkaku sifrowes sas fasifrur roi ḇeḇyeḇa oso faro su, nari for isasyar ro susḇasna ma ikun mbroḇ suḇesi. Kuker nyan ḇerarirya, snonkaku kam ḇemarisen ḇefrur dafduf faro su nari sḇeḇemun.
66011006	Susma papoik fasusisenwarek nanki insa mekemya isabu awer rofyor suḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi. Susma papoik faro war sun na kako, insa sufadwer war anna fanarik. Ma susma papoik kako fasuprer supna kuker kandera syoso kam, rofafisu rosai sumarisenya.
66011007	Ma rofyor suḇaryas kwar ḇaḇesaksi suḇena posa, aiwan ḇesasyar ro munaiḇui nari ḇye embroḇ su ma myun su.
66011008	Ma aipyokem ansu srir su ro nyanmor mnu ḇeba, ro moḇ Manseren suḇedi spai i roya. Snonsnon ḇeḇaryar mnu ḇeba ani isoine Sodom roḇa Masir.
66011009	Kawasa ro er kam, keret, wosna ma kawasa nari smam aipyokem ansu isof ras rikior munya, ma simarisen fa aipyokem ansu suḇeḇepim ḇa.
66011010	Kankain supna nari siryaḇ snar marmar ro saksi ansuya. Nari sifrur munara ma sfaremyae pankun, snar nabi ansuya sufrur kandera nabor faro kawasa kam ro supna kwar.
66011011	Posa ro ras kior munya, Allah Rur ḇekenem ḇyedi syun wer ro nabi ansuya. Inja suyor su fasuyores, isof kawasa kam smam su simkak kaku.
66011012	Ḇarpurya nabi ansuya surower mkaren ḇeba dor su ro boiyaswa, "Murama, muyek mumyas ro dine!" Inja suyek ḇeboiyaswa, ro ḇarpon mamam mbroḇ suḇesi, kuker mandep oso isawoḇ su.
66011013	Rofafisu ani rim ḇebayo myun. Ma ḇar ḇeḇesamfur ro mnu ani imsiser, ma snonkaku syaran rifik simar ro rim ani. Kawasa ḇese simkak kaku, ma sisandik Allah ro boiyaswa baba ḇyedi.
66011014	Raro ḇeḇesuruya isyonde kwar. Ḇape mkomam kada. Raro ḇeḇekiorya kniko nari ryama wer.
66011015	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇefikya iwuf kḇur ḇyedi, ma ro boiyaswa korower mkaren ḇeba kaku ḇekofen, "Papoik ḇaḇesasoser supswan baboine isya ro Manseren koḇedi ḇramin ḇyedi ma Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri sḇeasas kwarya. Nari ḇyuk sasoser isof fyoro-fyoro!"
66011016	Ma manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser sena ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi, skain wepur ma sḇansuba faro Allah.
66011017	Sikofen, "Manseren, Allah bepoik syadi, isya, ma isya kwar! Nko kofen kasumasa mufa ḇeaw, snar kwain ro papoik ḇeba bedi kwar, ma warandak ḇesasoser kwar!
66011018	Kawasa ḇefawi Allah ḇa, sirmomen snar fafisuya imnis kwar fa fasna masasor bedi, ma fafisuya imnis kwar fabuk samamyai faro snonkaku ḇemarsya. Fafisuya isoine fabuk sasuref faro manfamyan ḇesi nabisya, ma faro kawasa ḇesi kam, isoine snonkaku kam ḇekyar faro aw, ḇeba ma kasun kako. Fafisuya isoine fawafrur farmambriwer si ḇefrur farmambriwer supna!"
66011019	Raimnai Allah Rum ḇyedi ro boiyaswa ḇyeḇeseḇen, ma yamam burua asas ḇyedi ro rumya dori. Raimnai arḇeḇer nasamar apepen ma rakrok karadu ndok ḇeruru ma rimya myun ma mekem karui.
66012001	Raimnai ḇaḇemamam ḇeba ḇesnai kanandor oso isya ro nanki. Isoine bin oso syansun ori imnis sansun ḇyedi, ḇo dores ro paikya bori. Ro ḇru ḇyedi kosma wower oso ḇyekum samfur seser risuru.
66012002	Bin ani imoḇesḇa, ma snar fafisu ḇyedi imnis kwar faiḇe daḇen, inja iduf ma fyararar.
66012003	Raimnai ḇaḇemamam ḇesnai kanandor oso isya wer ro nanki. Isoine korḇen ḇeba ḇerik oso isya ḇyebru rifik ma ḇyeknapur samfur. Ḇru oser-oser isaswo wower oser.
66012004	Kuker purai ḇyedi ḇyuki dawerepen maksya ḇar ḇeḇekior ro nanki ma syosi ḇesupna. Korḇen ani dores fanam bin ḇeḇeḇeyaḇen ani, insa doren romawa ḇyedi rofyor daḇen i kwar.
66012005	Bin ani daḇen romawa snon oso nari ḇeḇesasoser er kam kuker ankyon mankarmomen. Ḇape romawa ani ḇyeḇeposerbur bin ani, ma ḇyeḇeyun faro Allah ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi.
66012006	Ma bin ani ifrar ḇesup ḇeursḇa, moḇ Allah fyasos kwar faroi. Ro moḇ ani nari ḇyeḇefaduru ras syaran oser utin risuru samfur riwonem.
66012007	Raimnai ḇaḇe embroḇ isya ro boiyaswa. Mikhael kuker malaikat ḇyesi se embroḇ korḇen ani. Ma korḇen ani kuker malaikat ḇyesi sifnoḇek i ḇo sisampum Mikhael.
66012008	Ḇape korḇen ani ḇyeḇefrur kafyo. I ma malaikat ḇyesi ssḇuk wer faskain ro boiyaswa ḇa.
66012009	Korḇen ḇeba ani ḇyeḇesawen ḇeḇondi! Ikada ikak sinan ani ḇenirḇe Ibiris, roḇa Setan (manfamyan Ibiris) ḇeḇeankarkar supswan ḇesiper. Ḇyeḇesawen fnoḇek malaikat ḇyesi ḇesupna.
66012010	Raimnai yarower mkaren ḇeba oso ro boiyaswa ikofen, "Baboine Allah fafisu ḇyedi ḇyuk koreri faro kawasa ḇyesi! Baboine Allah fyasna kwar papoik ḇyedi imnis Wairek! Baboine Wairek Ḇeḇuk koreri sḇeasas kwar ani kako fyasna ḇaḇepapoik ḇyedi kwar! Snar ḇeḇoḇ naek srar koḇesi ro Allah ḇarpon ḇyedi roḇ meser, ḇyeḇesasyarbur boiyaswa kwar.
66012011	Naek srar koḇesi sifrur kafyo i kwar kuker Rumkun Domba rik ḇyena, ma kuker wos ḇenapes ro Allah sifkai ḇairya. Inja ssḇuk kankenem sena isof simar.
66012012	Rarirya ḇekain ro boiyaswa mkoya kam mkoryaḇ kada! Ḇape faro supna ma soren nari mkoroë. Snar Ibiris isabu faro mko kwar kuker masasor ḇeba kaku, snar ifawi fafisu ḇyedi fyanam kwar!"
66012013	Rofafisu korḇen ani ḇyaḇir mboi sisawen i ḇesupna kwar, inja iyom bin ḇeḇeḇeyaḇen romawa snon ani.
66012014	Ḇape ssḇuk faro bin ani kwar mankankan prer ḇeba risuru, insa iroḇ ḇemoḇ ḇyedi ro sup ḇeursḇa, ro moḇ nari sfaduru i wampasi wambarek rikior munya, ḇyinkwanbur korḇen ani.
66012015	Ma korḇen ani kyup war nabor ḇemoḇ bin ani, insa bin ani iki.
66012016	Ḇape supna nafnoḇek bin ani; supna nbas nasḇasna ma noren war ḇesasyar ro korḇen ani sḇadonya na.
66012017	Korḇen ani imsor kaku bin ani, isof rya ḇye embroḇ romawa ḇese ro bin ani, isoine snonkaku kam ḇeḇeuser faro Allah sasoser ḇyena, ma ḇeḇeuser faro Allah wos ḇenapes ḇyena, Yesus fyasna kwarna.
66012018	Raimnai korḇen ani dores ro swan andir.
66013001	Ma yamam aiwan oso isasyar ro sorenya dori. Ḇyeknapur samfur ma ḇyeḇru rifik. Knapur oser-oser isya wower oser, ma ro ḇru oser-oser sfas snonsnon anonef faro Allah.
66013002	Aiwan yamam ani isna imnis harimau, (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) ma weminsya simnis beruang (aiwan ḇeḇarḇor) wemin, ma snonipoiya imnis singa (aiwan ḇeyan ḇepek) snonipoi. Ma korḇen ani ḇyuk samambraḇ ḇyena faroi, ma karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi, ma papoik ḇeba ḇyedi.
66013003	Oso ro ḇru rifik ro aiwan ani komam imnis ḇyepar ḇeba kwar, ḇape par ani iprei wer. Supna kam sḇaḇir i, sikandor ma siso aiwan ani.
66013004	Ma sikam sḇansubaina faro korḇen ani snar ḇyuk papoik ḇyedi faro aiwan ani! Ma sḇansubaina faro aiwan ani kako. Sikofen, "Oso imnis kuker aiwan ani ḇa! Oso nari ḇye embroḇ ma isampum i ḇa!"
66013005	Aiwan ani imarisen faikofen roi ḇeḇor ḇefrur marares ma ḇeyonef Allah. Sḇeifa ḇyesasoser paik samfur rifiak seser risuru monda.
66013006	Raimnai irandak donef Allah ma snonsnon ḇyedi. Rarirya kako Allah moḇ kankain ḇyedi, ma kankain ro boiyaswa donef si kam.
66013007	Simarisen faḇye embroḇ Allah kawasa ḇyesi ma ifrur kafyo si. Ma ssḇuk papoik faro i robo keret, kawasa, wos, ma ersya.
66013008	Kawasa kam ḇekenem ro supna, nari sḇansuba faro aiwan ani, derer kawasa sfasepen snonsnon kwar, ro syap snonkaku ḇekenem, ḇepon ro supswan ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya, isoine kawasa ro Rumkun Domba skauk kwar ani ḇyesi.
66013009	Mansei ḇeḇeknaram ido imnaf naḇye ḇaryas ine kada:
66013010	"Mansei ḇefasna fasemanfyan nari ḇyemanfyan. Ma mansei ḇefasna fasḇeḇemun kuker sumber nari smuni kuker sumber. I eḇedari Allah kawasa ḇyesi nari sfarmku ma sesyowi i."
66013011	Ma yamam aiwan oser ḇese isasyar ro supna don na. Ḇyeknapur risuru imnis knapur ro rumkun domba. Mkarenya imnis mkaren korḇen.
66013012	Nya ḇaḇepapoik ḇeba ro aiwan ḇepon ani ro ḇarpon mka ḇyedi. Supna ḇesiper ma ḇekain ro borisya, ḇyedusu si fasḇansuba faro aiwan ḇepon ani, ḇena par ḇeba ḇeprei wer ani.
66013013	Aiwan ḇeḇesuru ine ifrur aḇyair kanandor ḇeba. Ifrur for ḇesabu ro nanki ḇesupna ro ḇarpon kawasa kam.
66013014	Kawasa kam ḇekenem ro supna isrer si kuker fararur kanandor ro ḇarpon aiwan ḇepon ani. Ma iwan sikam fasifrur amfyanir oso fa sḇukḇesyowi aiwan skorpar kuker sumber, ḇape ikenem faswef.
66013015	Aiwan ḇeḇesuru ine ssḇuk faḇyuk kankenem faro amfyanir ani, isof amfyanir ani dawawos ma myun kawasa kam ḇemewer ḇeḇan suba faroisya.
66013016	Kawasa kam, ḇeba ma kasun, ḇeḇekayan ma ḇesaḇarar, manfamyan roḇa ḇemkei, aiwan ani ḇyedafdifer si fasisma aḇyair ro ḇramin ḇar raku sena roḇa ro andar sena.
66013017	Ma osoḇa fakyoḇes roḇa ḇyoḇ roi oso, rofyor nya aḇyair ani ḇa, isoine snonsnon aiwan ani mankundi, roḇa nomor ḇefasna snonsnon ḇyedi.
