66013018	Rodine fandun kaku mamkarkir. Snonkaku ḇefawi nanem sikada sawof kankunes ro nomor aiwan ani, snar nomor anna kada snonsnon ro snonkaku oso, nomor anna naiso nane utin riwonem samfur riwonem seser riwonem.
66014001	Ma yaknower wer, ma wakmam: Rumkun Domba dores ro urek Sion, ma ḇefnoḇekisya snonkaku syaran utin oser samfur rifiak seser rifiak sfas snonsnon ḇyedi ro andar sena ma snonsnon Kma ḇyedi.
66014002	Raimnai yarower mkaren oso ro nanki syobir imnis rakrok sriḇ ḇeba ma ryok ḇeruru imnis karadu ḇeba. Mkaren ani ḇyeḇerower imnis mkaren sonker ro ḇefnak sonker sesya.
66014003	Ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser, ma roi ḇekenem rifiak kuker manfarkinsya siyar karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ma dandonek snonkakusya syaran utin oser samfur rifiak seser rifiak ansi sidisen dow ḇebabo oso. Dow ani osoḇa fafyarkor i kako, derer monda snonkaku syaran utin oser samfur rifiak seser rifiak ansi. Sikada snonkaku sḇakwarek faḇemkei ro supna kwar.
66014004	Sikada snonkaku ḇewaren saranden ḇaken sena snar sifrur ḇaḇeoser kuker bin ḇa. Sikada sisren imnis dojaru babo. Siso Rumkun Domba ani ḇemoḇ rosai iḇeryayoḇ na. Rofandu kawasa kam, sikada snonkaku sḇakwarek faḇemkei kwar imnis farsarser ḇepon faro Allah ma Rumkun Dombaya.
66014005	Sakḇe ankarkar ḇaim; ma sfarorewḇa.
66014006	Ma yamam malaikat oso ḇese iroḇ ro farsyos nanki. Malaikat ani dun ḇaryas ro Ankankinem Ḇeḇye ḇekain fyoroya ma ḇyaryas faro snonkaku ro sup ine; isoine faro er oser-oser, keret, wos, ma kawasa.
66014007	Malaikat ani kyaru kuker mkaren ḇeba, "Mkomkak faro Allah, ma mkosandik baba ḇyedi! Snar fafisuya imnis kwar fa Allah ḇyemankara snonkaku. Mkoḇansuba faroi ḇefrur nanki, supna, soren ma war ssun na kam!"
66014008	Malaikat ḇeḇesuruya iyomuser malaikat ḇeponya ma kyaru, "Isapi kwar! Mnu ḇeba Babel isapi kwar! Ifrur er nakam fasimser kwar kuker war anggur isoine anggur rmomen farḇuk ḇyena!"
66014009	Malaikat ḇeḇekior oso iyomuser malaikat risuru ansu, ma kyaru kuker mkaren ḇeba, "Snonkaku ḇeḇansuba faro aiwan ma amfyanir ḇyedi, ma ḇena aḇyair aiwan ani ro andar roḇa ḇraminya,
66014010	snonkaku ani nari dinem Allah anggur ḇyedi, isoine anggur masasor ḇyedi iwek kwar ro sek aninem ḇyedi, fyosen roi kermkuno ḇa. Kawasa ansi kam nari sifrur kandera si ro forya dori ma belerang (roi ḇesak ḇenanyar ḇesam kaku) ro ḇarpon malaikat ḇesrensya ma ro ḇarpon Rumkun Domba ani.
66014011	For ḇepaw ḇefrur kandera kawasa ansi nari ipaw pdef isof fyoro-fyoro. Roḇ meser simnaḇa sisma kandera, isoine ḇeḇansuba faro aiwan ani ma amfyanir ḇyedi, kawasa kam ḇena aḇyair snonsnon aiwan ani."
66014012	Rarirya Allah kawasa ḇyesi ḇeḇesyowi Allah sasoser ḇyena skain nako ro kakyar faro Yesus.
66014013	Raimnai yarower mkaren oso ryamaker boiyaswa ḇekofen, "Fasepen nane: Ḇaḇeaski faro kawasa randak ro baboine ḇemar rofafisu suffarmyan Manseren!" Allah Rur ḇyedi kyarem, "Kaku! Nari simnaisu ro sifararur, snar bon ro afuffarmyan sena nafnoḇek si."
66014014	Ḇarpurya yamam, mandep ḇepyoper oso. Ro mandepya bori snon oso kyain, isna imnis snonkaku. Ro ḇru ḇyedi wower brawen oso isya, ma ro ḇramin ḇyedi sabit (sumber oso imnis paik ḇesrew babo) ḇesar oso isya.
66014015	Ḇarpurya malaikat oso ḇese isasyar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi. Ma kyaru kuker mkaren ḇeba, faro ḇekain ro mandepya bori ani, "Wawai sabit bedi fabuki kyawuk, snar fafisu ekdofenya imnis kwar; supna nadufen kwar faneḇeyekdofen!"
66014016	Inja bekain ro mandepya bori ani iwai sabit ḇyedi ḇesupna, ma supna neḇeyekdofen kako.
66014017	Ḇarpurya yamam malaikat oso ḇese wer isasyar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi ro boiyaswa. I kako duf sabit ḇesar oso.
66014018	Posa kwar, malaikat oso ḇese, ḇesma papoik for, isasyar ro rokef farsarser. Kuker mkaren ḇeba kyaru faro malaikat ḇeyuf sabit ḇesar ani, "Wawai sabit bedi ma kwawuk anggur bon ro anggur knam ro supna, snar bonna nambrai kwar!"
66014019	Ma malaikat ani iwai sabit ḇyedi ḇesupna ma kyawuk anggur bon ro knamna, posa ryirna ro moḇ ḇekafos anggur masasor Allah.
66014020	Anggur bon anna neḇekafos ro mnuya ḇandiri, ma ro moḇ ḇekafos ani rik nadaf imnis kirai isof kilometer utin rikior, ma kakakiya fyanam meter risuru.
66015001	Ma yamam aḇyair ḇese ḇeba fafayaḇa oso ro nanki, nyaiso: Malaikat rifik sisya kuker kandera rifik ḇepupes. Inekada rarwan ḇepupes Allah isbawer masasor ḇyedi.
66015002	Raimnai yamam roi oso ḇesna imnis soren fanin, fyasfosen kuker for. Yamam kako kawasa ḇeḇefainda kwar ro aiwan ma amfyanir ḇyedi, ma sefainda ro snonsnon kawasa ḇesma nomor aḇyairya. Kawasa ḇeḇefainda kwar ansi sores ro soren fanin andir ani ma suf sonker Allah ḇyuk faro sina.
66015003	Ma sidisen Moses, Allah manfamyan ḇyedi _dow ḇyedi, ma Rumkun Domba dow ḇyedi. Rakrok ḇyedi radine, "Manseren, Allah ḇepoik syadi, fararur bena naba ma nafnai kanandor! Wairek ro er nakam, nyan bena nanapes ma nkaku!
66015004	Manseren, mansei nari ḇemkak aw ḇa? Mansei nari ḇemewer ḇeḇaryas baba bedi? Werer monda wasren. Er nakam nari srama sḇansuba faro aw snar nyan bena nanapes kawasa kam smamna kwar."
66015005	Ma posa kwar ro roinane kam, yamam Allah Rum ḇyedi ro boiyaswa ḇyeḇeseḇen, ma rum kruḇen moḇ Allah kyain roya isya ro dori.
66015006	Ma malaikat rifik kuker kandera rifik anna sisasyar ro Allah Rum ḇyedi. Sansun sena ro kruḇen ḇepyoper ma ḇesnaper. Ma siandersna neḇeḇoḇek kuker ḇeḇoḇek brawen.
66015007	Ḇarpurya roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi oso ḇyuk faro malaikat rifik ansi sek brawen rifik ḇefo kuker Allah masasor ḇyedi, --Allah ḇekenem isof fyoro-fyoroya.
66015008	Ma Allah Rum ḇyedi ifo kuker paw ro baba ma papoik ḇyedi. Ma rofyor malaikat rifik ḇeyun kandera rifik anna namnai ḇaim, snonkaku osoḇa nari syun ro Allah Rum ḇyedi.
66016001	Raimnai yarower mkaren ḇeba oso ḇeraker Allah Rum ḇyedi dori ikofen faro malaikat rifik ansi, "Mkora mkosbawer sek masasor rifik ro Allah murḇaḇ ḇesupna!"
66016002	Malaikat ḇeponya rya isbawer sek ḇeponya ḇesupna. Ma kawasa ḇesma aḇyair ro aiwan ani ma ḇeḇansuba faro amfyanir ḇyedi, sisma makisyo ḇefrur sayaryur kaku si.
66016003	Posa kwar malaikat ḇeḇesuruya isbawer sek ḇyedi ḇesoren. Ma soren ani fyarwe imnis smoi ro ḇemarsya, isof roi ḇekenem ro soren ani simar kam.
66016004	Posa kwar malaikat ḇeḇekiorya isbawer sek ḇyedi ḇewarna ma war sun nakam, isof warna kam nfarwe ḇerik.
66016005	Ma yarower malaikat ḇesma papoik ro warya ikofen, "Samamyai bukya inapes, o, Ḇesren syadi, Allah isya ro baboine ma Allah isya ro ḇeponya kwar.
66016006	Snar sisbawer Allah kawasa ḇyesi rik sena ma nabisya rik sena; inja baboine wafrur fasinem rik. Rarirya kada namnis faro si!"
66016007	Raimnai yarower mkaren oso ro rokef farsarser ikofen, "Manseren, Allah Ḇepoik syadi, ḇekaku ma kakara bena nanapes!"
66016008	Ma insape malaikat ḇeḇefikya isbawer sek ḇyedi ḇeori, ma ori kako ssḇuk faikun snonkaku kuker samsam ḇyedi.
66016009	Snonkaku sinanem snar samsam ḇyedi, isof sifras Allah snonsnon ḇyedi, ḇepoik ro kandera anna. Rariryano, simewer simbror ro sasar sena ma simewer sisandik Allah ḇaḇebaba ḇyedi.
66016010	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇerimya isbawer sek ḇyedi ro karapesa aiwan ani ḇyedi. Isof ḇaḇesasoser aiwan ani ḇesiper pyampan, ma snonkaku sarekuk sḇardip sena snar siduf.
66016011	Ma sifras Allah ro boiyaswa snar sayaryur ro makisyo sesi. Ḇape simbror ḇa kaker ro fararur ḇeḇarḇor sena.
66016012	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇewonemya isbawer sek ḇyedi ḇewar ḇeba Efrat. Ma war ani isyor faḇye nyan isof waireksya ḇeraker ḇar ori dek simbran roi.
66016013	Ma yamam rur ḇeḇarḇor rikior imnis mankyaw. Mankyaw ansi oser-oser isasyar ro korḇen ani sḇadon ḇyedi, ro sḇadon aiwan, ma nabi sararersya sbadon sena.
66016014	Sikada setansya (manfamyan ro Ibiris) rur ḇyesi ḇefrur roi ḇefrur kanandor. Rur rikior ansi sra faro waireksya kam ro supswan ḇesiper ma fyanjur si insa se embroḇ ro Ras ḇebaya, isoine ro Allah Ras ḇyedi Ḇepoik syadiya.
66016015	"Mkakmam! Yarama imnis ḇekaraw! Aski faro snonkaku ḇewaren faswef ma ḇefasos sansun ḇyena, isof ḇyaḇer ḇo imbran ma imai ro ḇarpon kawasa ḇa!"
66016016	Ma raimnai rur ḇeḇarḇor ansi siryur wairek ansya ro moḇ oso, ro wos Ibrani sniriḇe Harmagedon, (snonsnon ḇeḇaryar moḇ ḇaḇe embroḇ).
66016017	Raimnai malaikat ḇeḇefikya isbawer sek ḇyedi ḇefarsyos sansoren ḇoka. Ma mkaren oso ryok naba ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ro Allah Rum ḇyedi, ḇekofen, "Posa kwar!"
66016018	Raimnai arḇeḇer nasak, ma karadu ndok ḇeruru ma rim ḇeba myun. Rim ḇeba ḇeradine myun ḇaim rofyor snonkaku seḇefrurya. Inekada rim ḇeba syadi.
66016019	Mnu ḇeba ani imbriwer ḇemun rikior, ma mnu nakam ro supswan ḇesiper nemom-mom: Raimnai Allah iswarepen Babel ḇeba ani. Ma Allah ḇyefadinem anggur ro sek anggur Allah ḇyedi --isoine anggur masasor ḇyedi.
66016020	Aimandoi ḇeḇor ma bon nakam kako napromes.
66016021	Ma mekem karui ḇemarḇak kilogram samfur ririm, nasapi ro nanki fanmun kawasa. Ma kawasa sifras Allah snar kandera mekem karui ḇeba anna.
66017001	Raimnai snon oso ro malaikat rifik ḇeyuf sek rifik anna ryama ikofen maro aya, "Rwama, insa yafasna faro aw rariso ḇefrur farḇuk ḇesyakwar ani nari isma samamyai, isoine mnu ḇeba ani sḇawes fanam warna.
66017002	Waireksya ro supna sifrur farḇuk kuker i, ma ḇekain ro supna simser snar sinem anggur farḇuk ḇyena."
66017003	Ma Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyepoik aya, ma malaikat ani dun aya ḇesup ḇeursḇa. Rodiwa yamam bin oso kyain ro aiwan ḇerik ḇesak oso bori, ifo kuker fasfas snonsnon ḇeyonef Allah. Aiwan ani ḇyeḇru rifik ma ḇyeknapur samfur.
66017004	Bin ani syansun sansun ḇerik ḇeyafuk, ma sfamankor i kuker karamas brawen, permatasya (karui ḇekakur) ma mustika. Dufepen sek brawen oso ḇefo kuker roi ḇefrur ayin ma ḇemamas, bon ro farḇuk ḇyena.
66017005	Ro andar ḇyedi sfas snonsnon oso ḇesma kankunes. Snonsnon ani isoine "Babel Ḇeba, sna ro ḇefrur farḇuk sawawek ma snonkaku ḇeyarwarem ro supswan ine."
66017006	Ma yamam bin ani imser kuker rik ro Allah kawasa ḇyesi ma rik ro kawasa smunsya snar sisouser faro Yesus Kristus. Rofyor yamam bin ani, yakandor kaku.
66017007	Raimnai malaikat ani ikofen maro aya, "Snaro wakandor rarirya? Iḇye syadi yakofen ḇadir kankunes ro bin ani ḇyedi faro aw ma kankunes ro aiwan dek ani, isoine aiwan ḇeḇeḇru rifik ma knapur samfur.
66017008	Aiwan ani ikenem ḇepon kwar, ḇape baboine ikenem wer ḇa. Nari fyoroḇa isasyar wer ro munaiḇui ma nari rya faro ḇaḇeraroya. Snonkaku ḇekenem ro supna, snonsnon sena neḇefas ḇa [rofyor supswan ḇyeḇefrur ḇaimya] ro syap snonkaku ḇekenem, nari snonkaku ansi sikandor rofyor smam aiwan ani. Snar aiwan ani ikenem ro ḇepon kwar. Baboine ikenem wer ḇa, ḇape nari isasyar kaḇer wer.
66017009	Inja fandun kaku mamam karkir ma fawi nanem. Ḇru rifik nakada urek rifik; isoine urek moḇ bin ani kyain roya. Ma ḇru rifik anna kada wairek rifik kako;
66017010	rim ro si sisapi kwar, oser isya ḇyesasoser kaker, ma oso wer ryama ḇaim. Rofyor nari ryamaya, nari ḇyesasoser knik monda.
66017011	Ma aiwan ḇekenem ro ḇepon kwar, ḇape baboine ḇekenem wer ḇa, ikada wairek ḇeḇewar. Ikada oso ro wairek rifik ansi kako, ḇape ḇaboine ḇeraḇe ḇaḇeraroya.
66017012	Knapur samfur mam anna kada wairek samfur ḇeḇesasoser ḇaim. Ḇape nari ssḇuk papoik faro si fasakḇe sasoser kam imnis wairek fnoḇek aiwan ani ḇeoras oser.
66017013	Wairek samfur ansine sna wos oser; sikam ssḇuk sambraḇ ma papoik sena kam faro aiwan ani.
66017014	Nari se embroḇ sisampum Rumkun Domba ani. Ḇape Rumkun Domba kuker ḇeso ma ḇeḇeuser isya sḇeḇeyor kwar ma sḇeḇekinfir insa skafyo wairek ansi, snar ikada Tuan ro tuansya kam, ma Wairek ro waireksya kam."
66017015	Malaikat ani ikofen kako, "War mam ani, moḇ bin ḇefrur farḇuk ani kyain roya, ikada er, kawasa, ma wosna kam.
66017016	Knapur samfur mam anna ma aiwan ani nari dayin ḇefrur farḇuk ani. Nari sfasyar nana ḇeḇor ḇyena, ma seifa ḇyaḇer. Nari san kraf ḇyedi ma sikuni kuker for.
66017017	Snar Allah ifrur sisnesna fasifrur Allah aw ḇyena. Allah ḇyefaseoser fasḇuk ḇaḇepapoik faro aiwan ani, insa aiwan ani ḇyesasoser isof Allah roi ikofen na ndarirya.
66017018	Bin mam ani kada mnu ḇeba, ḇeḇesasoser waireksya ro supna."
66018001	Raimnai yamam malaikat oso ḇese isabu ro boiyaswa. Isma papoik ḇeba, ma sananai ḇyedi ifrur supswan ḇesiper faisnai.
66018002	Ma kuker mkaren ḇeba, kyaru, "Bin ani isapi kwar! Babel Ḇeba isapi kwar! Baboine ḇyemoḇ faro setansya ma rur ḇemabak. Rodori man ḇeḇor kam ḇeyarwarem syososyoso ma snonkakusya sayin sikenem roi.
66018003	Er ḇeḇor kam sinem anggur rmomen farḇuk ḇyena. Waireksya ro supswan sifrur farḇuk kukeri, ma ḇefaḇaḇyan ro supswan sekayan snar syambraḇser rmomen-nafsu ḇyedi ḇa."
66018004	Raimnai yarower mkaren ḇese ro boiyaswa ḇekofen, "Kawasa yesi, mkosasyar! Mkosasyar buri! Mkoso awer sasar ḇyena, ma mkakḇar awer samamyai ḇyedi!
66018005	Snar sasar ḇyena nkamnamnam isof ro nanki, ma Allah iswarepen ḇarḇor ḇeḇor ḇyena.
66018006	Mkomunsu faroi imnis ifrur faro mko kwar; mkomunsu syadi faroi ro roi ḇeḇor kam ifrur kwarna. Mkoser sek ḇyedi kuker aninem ḇepakrek syadi ro anininem sfasos faro mko kwar.
66018007	Mkoḇuk faroi kandera ma marindi nabor namnis baba ḇyedi ma marisen ssḇuk faro mankundi ḇardi. Snar ikofen sawawek faro mankundi, 'Aya ine wairek bin ḇesasoser! Yaḇe kabom ḇa; ma nari yasma marindi ḇa!'
66018008	Snar rarirya, nari ro ras oser monda isma kandera -- dafduf, snefafardun, ma basbiser. Ma nari sikuni kuker for, snar Manseren Allah ḇekukeḇ iya nya papoik ḇeba."
66018009	Waireksya ro supna ḇeso fararur farḇakḇuk ma rmomen bin ani nari skanes mnu ani rofafisu smam for ḇekuniya paw ḇyena nek.
66018010	Nari sores ḇinkwan snar simkak saksma kandera ḇyedi. Sikofen, "Syee, raro ḇefnakḇa mnu ḇesma snonsnon ine -- mnu Babel ḇesambraḇ ḇesyaḇo! Ro ras oser monda samamyai bedi myun marmar aw!"
66018011	Ḇefaḇaḇyan ro supna skanes kako ma smandak snar bin ani, snar snonkaku oso ḇaḇeri nari ḇekoḇes roi ḇefarḇyan sena.
66018012	Osoḇa nari kyoḇes brawen, sarak, mutiara (mustika), ma permata (roi ḇesnai fafirek ḇesisye) sesi; kain lenan (kruḇen ḇepyoper) kako, kain ungu (kruḇen ḇefuk), sutera, ma kain merah padam (kruḇen ḇerik ḇeyafuk); ai ḇeḇor kam kosma famfnomḇa, roi ḇeḇor ro gading (kakyom) ma roi ḇekakur, ro kansai, mankarmomen ma pualam (karui afer ḇepakrek ḇenyaser);
66018013	ai kif ḇemarnden, kefikefi, setagi (roi oso sikuni paw ḇyena nadiref), mur, ma mamboḇo; anggur ma mani, tepung ma fasibu; sapi ma domba, kuda ma kereta, manfamyan ma kankenem snonkaku kako.
66018014	Ḇefarḇaḇyan sya sikofen faro bin ani, "Roi ḇeḇor wamarisen nwa na naisyaḇa kwar, ma marares ḇeḇor kam ma roi ḇepyum bena ndo kwar. Nari wasrowna wer ḇa!"
66018015	Ḇefarḇaḇyan ro mnu ani isof sḇekayan nari sores ḇinkwan, snar simkak kandera ḇekuriya. Nari skanes ma smandak,
66018016	ma sikofen, "Syee, raro ḇefnakḇa ro mnu ḇeḇesnonsnon ine! Indo syun pakaian lenan (sansun ḇepyoper), kain ungu (kruḇen ḇefuk) ma kain merah menyala (kruḇen ḇerik ḇesak); indo ifo kuker karamas brawen, permata (roi ḇesnai fafirek ḇesisye) ma mutiara (mustika)!
66018017	Ḇape ro oras oser monda, kayan ḇyena kam ndoburi kwar!" Nakhoda (manfarasya) kam, ḇesosya, ma ḇefararur ro jawarana, ma mandaswan ro sorensya kam sores ḇinkwan
66018018	ma sar rofafisu smam for ḇekun mnu ani paw ḇyena nekya. Ma sikofen, "Mnu oso imnis mnu ḇeba ineḇa!"
66018019	Inja skokef fafen ro ḇru sena ḇeaḇyair mandak, ma sarḇo skanes, "Syee, mnu ḇeba ine raro ḇyedi ifnakḇa! Kayan ḇyena nafrur fasnonkaku kam ḇena jawarasya ro soren sḇekayan! Ḇape ro oras oser monda, roi ḇeḇor anna ndoburi!"
66018020	Ne, boiyaswa, mkoryaḇ naba snar mnu ani fyarmambriwer! Ne, Allah kawasa ḇyesi, manwawan, ma nabisya, mkoryaḇ naba! Snar Allah ḇyuk samamyai ḇei imnis myunsu rosai ifrur faro mko kwar!
66018021	Raimnai malaikat ḇesambraḇ oso ikanow karui oso -- iba imnis karui ḇeyisdiwer -- ma syoi ḇesoren ma ikofen, "Radine mnu Babel ḇeḇesnonsnon ani nari ḇyeḇeso isof sisrowi werḇa.
66018022	Ma mkaren ḇefnak sonker, ḇedasdisen, ma ḇewuf sonker, ma ḇewuf kḇur, nari neḇerower wer ḇa ro aw! Ma snon ḇefawinananem oso ro manwarwor nari isrowi wer ḇa rodiya, ma rakrok ro roi ḇeyisdiwer nari ḇyeḇerower wer ḇa.
66018023	Snonkaku nari smam padamara ḇena nasnai wer ḇa; ma nari srower munara marisen fakawawin rodia wer ḇa. Ḇefaḇaḇyan besi snonkaku ḇefawi syadi ro supna, ma kuker fawawi rawan bena beankar ersya ro supna!"
66018024	Babel isma samamyai snar ro mnu ani sisma kwar nabisya rik sena, kawasa Allah ḇyesi rik sena -- ma kawasa ḇeḇor rik sena smun ro supna.
66019001	Ḇarpurya yarower roi oso imnis mkaren snonkaku ḇeḇor ḇerok ḇeruran ro boiyaswa ḇekaru, "Haleluya (Sanandik) faro Allah! Allah koḇedi ikada Allah ḇena aski ma koreri, ikada Allah ḇeba syadi ma ḇesma papoikya!
66019002	Ḇaḇemankara ḇyedi inapes ma kyaku! Ḇyuk samamyai faro pelacur yang besar (ḇinfarḇuk ḇeba) ani kuker ḇaḇefarḇuk ḇyena. Allah ḇyuk samamyai kwar faro ḇinfarḇuk ani, ma myun Allah manfamyan ḇyesi."
66019003	Raimnai mkaren snonkaku ḇeḇor ansi skaru wer, "Haleluya (Sanandik) faro Allah! For ḇekun mnu ḇeba ani paw ḇyena nek ḇesya kwar ma namnai ḇa!"
66019004	Ma manfarkin samfur risuru seser rifiak ma roi ḇekenem rifiak ansi skain wepur ma sḇansuba faro Allah ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani. Sikofen, "Amin! Haleluya (Sanandik), faro Allah!"
66019005	Raimnai korower mkaren oso ryok ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani ikofen, "Allah manfyan ḇyesi kam, ma kawasa kam -- ḇeba ma kasun -- ḇeḇansuba faro Allah, mkosandik Allah!"
66019006	Posa kwar yarower rakrok oso imnis mkaren fananjur kawasa ḇeḇor kaku; rakrok ḇyedi imnis ḇak ḇemef ḇemaum ma imnis karadu ḇerok ḇeruru. Yarower sikofen, "Sanandik faro Allah! Snar Manseren, Allah koḇedi Ḇepoik syadi ani baboine ḇyewairek.
66019007	Mkorama komarisen ma koryaḇ; mkorama kosandik baba ḇyedi! Snar ras fakawawin Rumkun Domba ryama kwar ma ḇinfakawin ḇyedi fyasos kwar faro wafwofer ḇyedi.
66019008	Sansun ḇepyoper ḇesnaper neḇeḇuk faroi kwar fasyansun." [Sansun ḇepyoper ani kada fararur ḇeḇye Allah kawasa ḇyesi sifrur kwar.]
66019009	Raimnai malaikat ani ikofen maro aya, "Fasepen roi nane: 'Aski faro snonkaku ḇesma fararyor ḇemunara fakawawin Rumkun Domba ani.' " Ḇarpurya malaikat ani ikofen wer, "Wos inekada wos ḇekaku ro Allah."
66019010	Ma yakain wepur ro malaikat ani ḇarpon ḇyedi yamarisen yaḇansuba faroi, ḇape ikofen maro aya, "Bansuba awer! Bansuba faro aya awer, mboi bansuba faro Allah! Snar aya kako manfamyan imnis aw ma imnis naek srar besi ḇeyufepen wos ḇekaku ro Yesus ḇyaryasna!" Snar ḇekofen ḇadir faro nabisya ikada wos ḇekaku Yesus ḇyaryasna.
66019011	Ḇarpurya yamam boiyaswa ḇyeḇeḇas, ma yakmam kuda ḇepyoper oser. Ḇeyekiya snonsnon ḇyedi Ḇesouser ma Ḇekaku. Inapes ro ḇyuk samamyai ro ḇaḇe embroḇ ifrurna.
66019012	Mka ḇyesi simnis for ḇesak ma isaswo wower nabor ro ḇru ḇyedi. Sfas kwar ro baken ḇyedi snonsnon oso; ma mankundi derer monda ifawi snonsnon ani.
66019013	Syatu syansunya ḇyeḇesowen kwar ro rik. Ma sniriḇe "Allah wos ḇyedi."
66019014	Sarar ḇero boiyaswa ssansun sansun ḇepyoper ḇesren ma sek kuda ḇepyopersya ḇo sisoi.
66019015	Sumber ḇesar oso isya ro sḇadon ḇyedi ma kuker sumber ani nari ḇyukfrur kafyo ersya kam, ma nari ḇyesasoser si kuker ankyon mankarmomen. Ma nari ikafos anggur ro moḇ ḇeyisdiwer anggur masasor Allah ḇepoik syadiya.
66019016	Ro syatu ḇyedi ma wesop ḇyedi sfas snonsnon ine, "Wairek robo waireksya, ma Tuan robo tuansya."
66019017	Raimnai yamam malaikat oso dores ro orya bori. Ma kyaru kuker mkaren ḇeba faro mansya kam ḇeroḇ ro farsyos sansorenḇoka, "Mkorama mkofanjur mkoso munara ḇeba Allah ifrurya!
66019018	Mkorama mkan waireksya baken sena, mambrisya baken sena ma mambri ḇemarsya baken sena; mkorama mkan ḇeyek kudasya baken sena kuker kudasya baken sena ma snonkaku kam baken sena, ḇeba ma kasun, manfyan ma ḇemkei!"
66019019	Ḇarpurya yamam aiwan ani, ma waireksya ro supna kuker sarar embroḇ sesi, sfanjur fase embroḇ sisampum ḇeyek ro kuda ḇepyoper ansi, ma sarar embroḇ ḇyesi.
66019020	Ma aiwan ani ḇyeḇefor fnoḇek nabi ḇekakuḇa ḇefrur kwar roi kanandor ro ḇarpon aiwan ani. [Kuker roi kanandor anna aiwan ani dankar snonkaku ḇena aḇyair aiwan ani, ma snonkaku ḇeḇansuba faro amfyanir aiwan ani.] Raimnai aiwan ani ma nabi ḇekakuḇasya sikenem ḇo sisawen si ro soren for ḇesber kuker belerang (roi ḇesak ḇenanyar ḇesam kaku).
66019021	Ma sarar embroḇ sesi sḇeḇemun kuker sumber ḇesasyar ro sḇadon ḇeyek kuda ḇepyoper ani. Ma mansya kako srama ma san aipyokem snonkaku ansi kuker masaḇsoḇ isof sarbor.
66020001	Raimnai kwar yamam malaikat oso isabu ro boiyaswa. Dufepen asyopder munaiḇui -- ma wanka ḇeba oso.
66020002	Raimnai fyorepen korḇen ani, ikak mansar ani, -- isoine Ibiris roḇa Setan, (manfamyan Ibiris) ani ma ḇyewankai isof wampasi wambarek syaran oser.
66020003	Ḇarpurya malaikat ani isawen korḇen ani ḇemunaiḇui, ma syopder der ani ma ryir kakop ḇesisen, insa korḇen ani ḇyeankarkar ersya wer ḇa, rofyor wampasi wambarek syaran oser iḇro ḇaim. Posa kwar nari speri faro fafisu ḇeknampu wer.
66020004	Ma yamam karapesa ḇaḇesasoser nabor, ma snonkaku ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser anna ssḇuk papoik farosi fasawos namuk samamyaiya. Yamam kako rur snonkaku skauk ḇru sena snar sḇesaksi Yesus, ma sḇaryas Allah wos ḇyedi. Snonkaku sinema sakḇansuba maroḇa faro aiwan, roḇa amfyanir ḇyedi kako. Si kako saksma aḇyair ḇaim ro aiwan ani ro andar roḇa ḇramin sena. Sikada sikenem kaḇer wer ma sḇesasoser imnis wairek fnoḇek Kristus rofafisu wampasi wambarek syaran oser.
66020005	Ine kada kaḇakḇok ḇepon ro snonkaku ḇemar si. [Ḇape snonkaku ḇese ḇemarsya sakḇok ḇaim rofafisu wampasi wambarek syaran oser ani.]
66020006	Aski faro snonkaku ḇesma ḇaḇeḇok ḇeso kaḇakḇok ḇepon ine. Marmar ḇeḇesuruya ipok siḇa. Nari sḇeimam faro Allah, ma sḇeimam faro Kristus; ma nari ssḇuk sasoser fnoḇek i ro wampasi wambarek syaran oser.
66020007	Ma wampasi wambarek syaran oser ani isyonde kwar, insape Ibiris ḇyeḇesasyar ro bui,
66020008	ma nari rya ḇyeankarkar ersya ḇekain ro supna ḇesiper, isoine Gog ma Magog (wairek Gog ro sup Magog). Ibiris iryur si fasḇe embroḇ, dandonek sedi iba kaku, imnis barbor karyen ro soren.
66020009	Ma sisasyar ḇesupswan ḇesiper, ma seruren kankain rum Allah kawasa ḇyesi ma mnu Allah iswar ani. Ḇape for isabu ro nanki ma ikun pres si.
66020010	Ḇarpurya Ibiris ḇeḇeankar si ani ḇyeḇeso ḇesoren for ma belerang (roi ḇesak ḇenanyar ḇesam kaku). Isoine moḇ sisawen ḇepon aiwan ma nabi ḇekakuḇa ansuya roya. Nari susma kandera ḇemnai ḇa roḇ meser isof fyoro-fyoro.
66020011	Raimnai kwar yamam karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇepyoper ḇeba oso ma ḇekain ro iya. Nanki ma supna napromes ro ḇarpon ḇyedi, isof komamna wer ḇa.
66020012	Ma yamam snonkaku ḇemarsya, ḇeba ma kasun, sores kam ro ḇarpon karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani. Ma syapna neḇeḇas. Ḇarpurya syap oso ḇese ḇyeḇeḇas, isoine syap kankenemya. Ma rofafisu ani samamyai ssḇuk faro snonkaku ḇemarsya, imnis rosai sifrur kwar siso fasfasepen ro syap anna.
66020013	Raimnai sorenya ḇyefa ḇemar roisya sisasyar. Marmar ma munaiḇui daksasyar ḇemar roisya. Ma sikam sisma samamyai imnis kuker rosai sifrur kwar.
66020014	Ḇarpurya Marmari ma Munaiḇui sisawen suḇe soren for. [Soren for inekada marmar ḇeḇesuruya.]
66020015	Snonkaku sfasepen sisnosna ḇa ro syap kankenemya, sisawen si ro soren for ani.
66021001	Raimnai yamam nanki ḇebabo ma supna ḇebabo. Snar nanki ḇepon ma supna ḇepon nasyonde, ma sorenya ipromes.
66021002	Ma yamam mnu ḇesren ani, isoine Yerusalem ḇebabo, isabu ro boiyaswa ro Allah. Mnu ani ḇyeḇefasos kwar imnis ḇinfakawin oso sḇekaramasi faisrow swa ḇyedi.
66021003	Ma yarower mkaren ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani kyaru naba, "Baboine Allah rum kruḇen ḇyedi isya rofandu snonkakusya! Nari ikenem kuker si, ma sḇekawasa ḇyesi. Nari Allah mankundi isya kuker si ma ḇye Allah faro si.
66021004	Nari ipyos mkarui nakambur mka sena, snar marmarya isyaḇa kwar; sne ḇefafardun, kankanes, roḇa dafduf naisyaḇa kako. Roi ḇeḇor ḇekwar napromes."
66021005	Ma ḇekain ro karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ani, ikofen, "Baboine yafrur nakam fanbabo!" Ikofen maro aya kako, "Fasepen nane, snar wos nane nkaku ma neḇekyare."
66021006	Raimnai ikofen, "Posa kwar! Aya kada ḇeponya ma papupesya; Ayaine Manseren ro Randakya isof ro Papupesya. Mansei ḇembrowsya nari yaḇefa sinem ro war sun ḇeḇuk kankenem; ma nari sḇak royoḇa.
66021007	Snonkaku ḇeḇefaindaya, nari isma roi anna kam ro aya. Nari yaḇe Allah faroi, ma nari ḇyeromawa maro aya.
66021008	Ḇape snonkaku ḇemakakak, ḇekyar ḇa, ḇefrur ayin, ḇemamun, ḇefrur farḇakḇuk, ḇena rawan, ḇeḇansuba faro amfyanir ma ḇeḇeankarkarsya kam, moḇ sedi isoine soren for ma belerang (roi ḇesak ḇenanyar ḇesam kaku), ikada marmar ḇeḇesuruya."
66021009	Ma malaikat oso rofandu malaikat rifik ḇeyuf sek anna ḇefo kuker kandera rifik ḇepupes ani ryama ikofen maro aya ḇo doḇo, "Rwama! Nari yafasna faro aw Ḇinfakawin, isoine Rumkun Domba ani swari."
66021010	Ma Allah Rur ḇyedi ḇyepoik aya, ma malaikat ani dun aya ḇebon ḇekaki oso bori. Fyasna maro aya Yerusalem, mnu ḇesren ani. Mnu ani isabu mufes ro boiyaswa, ro Allah,
66021011	kuker kamayai ma Allah baba ḇyedi. Mnu ani idameser imnis karui permata (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇesisye), imnis karui baiduri pandan (karui ḇerumek ḇesnai fafirek ḇesnaper), ḇesren imnis kristal (fanin ḇesren).
66021012	Ayar karui ḇeyarwareki, ikaki ma iḇam, kuker kedwai ḇeba samfur seser risuru ma malaikat samfur seser risuru siwaren na. Ro kedwai ḇeba anna sfas snonsnon keret samfur seser risuru ro er Israel.
66021013	Kedwai ḇeba rikior nfasna ḇeḇar oser-oser. Roḇar wamurem kedwai rikior, roḇar wambraw kedwai rikior, roḇar wambrur kedwai rikior, ma roḇar wambarek kedwai rikior.
66021014	Mnu ani ayar karui ḇyedi sḇawesi robo araref karui samfur seser risuru. Ro karui araref anna sfas snonsnon manwawan samfur seser risuru ro Rumkun Domba ani.
66021015	Malaikat ḇeyawawos kuker aya ani nya ankyon warnkyara ro brawen, faḇyuk ḇewarnkyara mnu ani, kedwai ḇeba ḇyena ma ayar karui ḇyena.
66021016	Mnu ani ḇyedopir rifiak -- kawanwanya imnis kuker aḇaḇamya. Ma malaikat ani ḇyewarnkyara mnu ani kuker ankyon warnkyara ḇyedi; ma kawanwanya kilometer syaran risuru utin rifiak; aḇaḇam ma kakakiya imnis kawanwanya.
66021017	Rofafisu malaikat ani ḇyewarnkyara ayar karui ḇyena, kakaki ayar ani ḇyemeter samfur riwonem. Warnkyara malaikat ani ḇyukḇewarnkyaraya ikada warnkyara ro snonkaku.
66021018	Ayar karui ro mnu ani ḇyeḇefrur ro karui baiduri pandan (karui ḇerumek ḇesnaper) ma mnu ani ḇardi ro brawen ḇekaku, isren imnis fanin.
66021019	Araref karui ro mnu ani sḇekaramasi kuker karui permata (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇesisye) nabor. Araref karui ḇepon sifruri ro karui baiduri pandan (karui ḇerumek ḇesnaper), ḇeḇesuruya ro karui nilam (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇeramen), ḇeḇekiorya ro karui yakut (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇerumek), ḇeḇefiakya ro karui zamrud (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇerumek ḇeḇemaeja kaku),
66021020	ḇeḇerimya ro karui baiduri sepah (karui ḇepyoper ma ḇesasyek ḇesnai rakrik), ḇeḇewonemya ro karui delima (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇerik), ḇeḇefikya ro karui ratna cempaka (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇenar ḇebrawen), ḇeḇewarya ro karui pirus (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇerumek ḇeramen), ḇeḇesiwya ro karui topas (karui ḇenanyar ḇeḇemaeja), ḇeḇesamfurya ro karui krisopras (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇerumek ḇesasyek), ḇeḇesamfur seser oserya ro karui lazuardi (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇeramen), ma ḇeḇesamfur seser risuruya ro karui kecubung (karui ḇesnai fafirek ḇefuk).
66021021	Kedwai ḇeba samfur seser risuru ḇyena nasma mutiara (mustika) samfur seser risuru; kedwai oser-oser sifruri ro mustika oser. Nyan mor ro mnu ani sifruri ro brawen ḇekaku, imnis fanin ḇesnaper.
66021022	Yamam Allah Rum ḇyedi ro mnu ani ḇa, snar Allah mankundi ḇeḇe Rum Allah, Allah Ḇepoik syadi, ma Rumkun Domba ani.
66021023	Mnu ani ḇyefandun ori sananai ḇyedi ḇa roḇa paikya snar Allah baba ḇyedi ḇyeisnai yari, ma Rumkun Domba ani kada padamara ḇyedi.
66021024	Ma nari ersya ro supna simbran ro isna ḇyedi, ma nari waireksya kako ssun ḇaḇekayan sena ḇemnu ani.
66021025	Kedwai ḇeba anna ro mnu ani nari neḇeseḇen ro ras ḇesiper; nari sken naba, snar roḇ isya rodiwa ḇa.
66021026	Ḇaḇebaba ma ḇaḇekayan ro ersya nari ssun naḇe mnu ani.
66021027	Ḇape snonkaku ḇefrur roi ḇeyarwarem, ma ḇeḇeankarkar ssḇuk fasaksun ḇa -- rosai ḇemamas, sun naḇaḇeri fansun ro dori. Mboi ḇesun ro mnu ani, derer snonkaku snonsnon sena neḇefas ro syap Rumkun Domba ani, isoine syap kankenemya.
66022001	Malaikat ani fyasna maro aya kako, war ḇesnaper imnis kristal (fanin ḇesren); war kankenem rirya. War ani idaf ro Allah karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ma ro Rumkun Domba ani,
66022002	ipdef ḇenyan morya faduri ro mnu ani. Ro war andir ani, ḇanḇarya ai knam kankenemna naisya, namarem ḇesamfur seser risuru ro wampasi wambarek oser, isoine paik oser namarem ḇeoser. Ram ḇyena ssḇuk nafrur ersya fasiprei.
66022003	Ro mnu ani kosma roi osoḇa kako ḇesma fras ro Allah. Allah karapesa ḇaḇesasoser ḇyedi ma Rumkun Domba ani nari naisya ro mnu ani. Allah manfamyan ḇyesi sḇeari faro Allah
66022004	ma nari smam ḇarpon ḇyedi. Allah snonsnon ḇyedi nari ḇyeḇefas ro andar sena.
66022005	Nari sfandun padamara roḇa ori sananai ḇyediḇa, -- snar roḇ isyaḇa kwar, mboi Manseren Allah mankundi nari isnai si. Ma nari sḇesasoser imnis wairek isof fyoro-fyoro.
66022006	Raimnai malaikat ani ikofen maro aya, "Wawos nane nkaku ma neḇekyar. Manseren Allah ḇeḇuk Rur ḇyedi faro nabisya, iwan malaikat ḇyedi kwar fafyasna faro manwawan ḇyesi rosai nari fyoroḇa ḇeramana."
66022007	"Waswarepen nane!" Yesus ikofen. "Fyoroḇa nari yarama wer. Fainda faro snonkaku ḇeswarepen wos ḇararyar ro syap inesya!"
66022008	Ma aya, Yohanes, ḇerower ma ḇemam roi nane kam kwar. Yarower ma yamam posa kwar, yakain wepur ro ḇarpon malaikat ḇefasna nakamya maro aya, ma yamarisen yaḇansuba faroi,
66022009	ḇape ikofen maro aya, "Bansuba awer! Bansuba maro aya awer! Bansuba faro Allah kada! Snar aya kako manfamyan imnis aw, ma imnis naek srar besi nabisya ma snonkaku kam ḇeswarepen farkarkor ro syap ine!"
66022010	Ma ikofen wer, "Bekankunes awer wos ḇararyar ro syap ine, snar fafisuya fyanam kwar fa roi nane kam nari ndarirya.
66022011	Snonkaku ḇeḇarḇor, iḇye ifrur pdef ḇarḇor; snonkaku ḇemamas, iḇye ifrur mamas mankundi; snonkaku ḇeso Allah marisen ḇyedi iso pdef Allah marisen ḇyedi, ma snonkaku ḇekenem faro Allah, ikenem pdef faro Allah kada."
66022012	"Waswarepen ine!" Yesus ikofen, "Fyoroḇa nari yarama wer ma yun sasuref fayakmunsu faro snonkaku oser-oser imnis rosai ifrur kwarya.
66022013	Ayai ḇeponya ma ḇepupesya; aya Manseren ro Randakya isof ro Papupesya."
66022014	Aski faro snonkaku ḇepap syatu ḇyedi isof isren. Sikada nari san bon ro ai knam kankenem ma simbran ma ssun ro mnu ani ro kedwai ḇebaya.
66022015	Ḇape snonkaku ḇefrur ayin, ḇena rawan, ḇefrur ker farḇakḇuk, ḇemamun, ḇeḇansuba faro karwar ma ḇeḇeankarkarsya, iḇye ro wos ma kuker fararur, sine kam moḇ seja isya ro mnuya ḇandiri.
66022016	"Aya, Yesus, yafarem malaikat ayedi faro mko kwar insa ḇyaryas roi nane faro fandun jemaatna. Aya ine yaḇe ḇarpur ro Daud; aya kum wamurem ḇesna ani."
66022017	Allah Rur ḇyedi ma Ḇinfakawin ikofen, "Rwama!" Mansei ḇerower i kako ikofen, "Rwama!" Mansei ḇembrow, ryama kada! Ma mansei ḇemarisen, dun war ḇeḇuk kankenem ani waworek monda!
66022018	Faro snonkaku oser-oser ḇerower wos ḇararyar ro syap ine, aya, Yohanes, ḇeḇuk swarepen ine: Snonkaku ḇepam syadi roi oso ro wos ḇararyar ine, samamyai snonkaku ani kako nari Allah pyam syadi faroi kanderana sfas ro syap ine.
66022019	Ma snonkaku ḇekaruk roi oso ro wos ḇararyar ine, mun ḇyedi sfas ro syap ine nari Allah kyaruki kako -- isoine mun ro ai knam kankenemya ma ro mnu ḇesren ani.
66022020	I ḇeḇuk ḇaryas ḇeḇor nane kam i kofen, "Kaku, nari yarama fasaw!" Kaku! Rwamuma, o Manseren Yesus!
66022021	Saswar ma aski ro Manseren Yesus kyainus mko kam kada! Amin.
